text: And when Jesus came into the ruler ' s house , and saw the minstrels and the people making a noise ,
text2: Aretak ri Jesús xopan cho rachoch ri tataˈ ri qui nimal ri winak aj Israel , xrilo chi e cˈo chi ri ajkˈojomab ri quebeˈ che ri muknajic , xukujeˈ xeril ri winak chi sibalaj cäquiqˈuis quib che okˈej , sibalaj cäquirak qui chiˈ .

text: He said unto them , Give place : for the maid is not dead , but sleepeth . And they laughed him to scorn .
text2: Xubij cˈu chque : ¡ Chel na apan alak cho ja ! Man cäminak tä ri ali , xane xa cäwaric , ― xcha chque . Are cˈu ri winak xa xquitzeˈj u wäch ri Jesús .

text: But when the people were put forth , he went in , and took her by the hand , and the maid arose .
text2: Ri Jesús cˈut xeresaj bi ri winak cho ja , te cˈu riˈ xoc bic . Xuchap ri ali che ru kˈab . Ri ali cˈut xwalijic .

text: And the fame hereof went abroad into all that land .
text2: Xel cˈu u tzijol waˈ ri xbantajic pa tak conojel ri tinimit chilaˈ .

text: And when Jesus departed thence , two blind men followed him , crying , and saying , Thou Son of David , have mercy on us .
text2: Aretak xel bi ri Jesús chilaˈ , quieb moyab xeteri bi chrij , xquirak qui chiˈ , xquibij : ¡ Tat , lal riˈ ri Ralcˈual can ri ka mam David , tokˈobisaj la ka wäch ! ― xecha che .

text: And when he was come into the house , the blind men came to him : and Jesus saith unto them , Believe ye that I am able to do this ? They said unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: Aretak ri Jesús xoc bi pa ri ja , ri quieb moyab xekeb rucˈ . Ri Jesús xutaˈ chque : ¿ A cäcoj alak chi quincowin chubanic waˈ ? ― xcha chque . Cäkacojo , Tat , ― xecha ri e areˈ .

text: Then touched he their eyes , saying , According to your faith be it unto you .
text2: Ri Jesús xuchap cok ri qui wakˈäch , xubij chque : Jeˈ ta baˈ chbantajic jas ri xcoj alak chi quincowin chubanic , ― xcha chque .

text: And their eyes were opened ; and Jesus straitly charged them , saying , See that no man know it .
text2: Xutzir cˈu ri qui wakˈäch . Ri Jesús sibalaj xeupixbaj , xubij chque : Mätzijoj alak waˈ che jachin jun , ― xcha chque .

text: But they , when they were departed , spread abroad his fame in all that country .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ , aretak xebel bic , xquichap u tzijoxic waˈ jas ri xuban ri Jesús cucˈ pa conojel tak ri tinimit ri cˈo jelaˈ .

text: As they went out , behold , they brought to him a dumb man possessed with a devil .
text2: Tajin quebel bi ri quieb moyab ri xecunaxic , aretak xcˈam lok chuwäch ri Jesús jun achi mem ri cˈo jun itzel espíritu che .

text: And when the devil was cast out , the dumb spake : and the multitudes marvelled , saying , It was never so seen in Israel .
text2: Aretak xesax bi ri itzel espíritu rumal ri Jesús , ri achi ri mem xuchaplej tzijonem . Ri winak sibalaj xquicajmaj waˈ , xquibij : Man cˈo tä jumul ri jeˈ kilom waˈ waral pa Israel , ― xechaˈ .

text: But the Pharisees said , He casteth out devils through the prince of the devils .
text2: Are cˈu ri tataˈib fariseos xquibij : We achi riˈ queresaj bi ri itzel tak espíritus chque ri winak rucˈ ru chukˈab ri qui nimal ri itzel tak espíritus , ― xechaˈ .

text: And Jesus went about all the cities and villages , teaching in their synagogues , and preaching the gospel of the kingdom , and healing every sickness and every disease among the people .
text2: Ri Jesús xeusolij ri nimak tak tinimit xukujeˈ ri alaj tak tinimit . Pa tak ri rachoch Dios ri cäquimulij wi quib ri winak xuya tijonic , xutzijoj ri Utzalaj Tzij re ri Evangelio chrij ru takanic ri Dios pa qui wiˈ ri winak . Xucunaj ronojel u wäch yabil , xukujeˈ xresaj ronojel u wäch cˈäx chque ri winak .

text: But when he saw the multitudes , he was moved with compassion on them , because they fainted , and were scattered abroad , as sheep having no shepherd .
text2: Aretak xeril ri qˈuialaj winak , xel u cˈux chque rumal chi quebisonic , man cˈo tä cäcuˈbisan qui cˈux . E jeˈ ta ne chij ri man cˈo tä cajyukˈ .

text: Then saith he unto his disciples , The harvest truly is plenteous , but the labourers are few ;
text2: Xubij cˈu chque ru tijoxelab : Kas tzij sibalaj nim ri kˈatoj , xa cˈu e quieb oxib ri ajchaquib .

text: Pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest , that he will send forth labourers into his harvest .
text2: Chibochiˈj baˈ ri Ajchakˈel ri kˈatoj chi queutak bi niqˈuiaj ajchaquib chic pa ru chac , ― xcha chque .

text: And when he had called unto him his twelve disciples , he gave them power against unclean spirits , to cast them out , and to heal all manner of sickness and all manner of disease .
text2: Ri Jesús xeusiqˈuij ri cablajuj u tijoxelab . Xuya chque chi cäcˈoji takanic pa qui kˈab che quesaxic bi ri itzel tak espíritus , xukujeˈ che qui cunaxic ri winak che ronojel u wäch yabil o ronojel u wäch cˈäx ri cˈo chque .

text: Now the names of the twelve apostles are these ; The first , Simon , who is called Peter , and Andrew his brother ; James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother ;
text2: Are waˈ ri qui biˈ ri cablajuj apóstoles : nabe ri tat Simón ri xukujeˈ cäbix Pedro che , rucˈ ri tat Andrés ri rachalal . Ri tat Jacobo rucˈ ri tat Juan ri rachalal ri e u cˈojol ri tat Zebedeo .

text: Philip , and Bartholomew ; Thomas , and Matthew the publican ; James the son of Alphaeus , and Lebbaeus , whose surname was Thaddaeus ;
text2: Ri tat Felipe , ri tat Bartolomé , ri tat Tomás , xukujeˈ ri tat Mateo ri tokˈil alcabal . Ri tat Jacobo ru cˈojol ri tat Alfeo . Ri tat Lebeo ri xukujeˈ cäbix Tadeo che .

text: Simon the Canaanite , and Judas Iscariot , who also betrayed him .
text2: Ri tat Simón ri cäbix u nimal tinimit che , xukujeˈ ri tat Judas Iscariote ri xjachow ri Jesús .

text: These twelve Jesus sent forth , and commanded them , saying , Go not into the way of the Gentiles , and into any city of the Samaritans enter ye not :
text2: Ri Jesús xeutak bi we achijab riˈ , xeupixbaj bic , xubij chque : Mixeˈ pa tak ri qui tinimit ri winak ri man aj Israel taj . Man quixoc tä cˈut pa tak ri qui tinimit ri winak aj Samaria .

text: But go rather to the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: Xane are quixeˈ cucˈ ri winak aj Israel , ri e jeˈ ta ne chij e sachinak can pa tak juyub .

text: And as ye go , preach , saying , The kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: Jix , jibij chque chi xa jubikˈ man cuchaplej ru takanic ri Dios .

text: Heal the sick , cleanse the lepers , raise the dead , cast out devils : freely ye have received , freely give .
text2: Cheicunaj ri yawabib , cheicˈastajisaj ri cäminakib , cheicunaj ri cˈo itzel tak chˈaˈc chquij , cheiwesaj cˈu bi ri itzel tak espíritus chque ri winak . Ri ix xak sipam waˈ we cuinem riˈ chiwe , cˈo cˈu baˈ mitaˈ che ri qui toˈic ri winak , ― xcha chque .

text: Provide neither gold , nor silver , nor brass in your purses ,
text2: Micˈam bi i rajil . Ri kˈän puak , ri sak puak , ri quiäk puak micˈam cˈu bic .

text: Nor scrip for your journey , neither two coats , neither shoes , nor yet staves : for the workman is worthy of his meat .
text2: Micˈam bi ri i chim che ri be . Xa jun i camixaˈ quicˈam bic . Micˈam bi i xajäb . Micˈam bi i chˈimiy . Je riˈ , rumal chi takal che ri ajchac chi cäyiˈ ri cajwataj che .

text: And into whatsoever city or town ye shall enter , inquire who in it is worthy ; and there abide till ye go thence .
text2: Apachique tinimit ri quixopan wi , we nim , we chˈutin , chitzucuj jun winak chilaˈ ri kas quixcˈulaj . Chixcanaj can chilaˈ cˈä quichap na bi jumul chic ri i be .

text: And when ye come into an house , salute it .
text2: Aretak quixoc pa jun ja , chiya rutzil qui wäch ri e cˈo pa ri ja . Quibij chque chi are utzil quiwaj chque .

text: And if the house be worthy , let your peace come upon it : but if it be not worthy , let your peace return to you .
text2: We takal chque ri winak ri e cˈo pa ri ja chi quiya can rutzil qui wäch rucˈ utzil , chiya canok . We cˈu man takal chque , miya can rutzil qui wäch .

text: And whosoever shall not receive you , nor hear your words , when ye depart out of that house or city , shake off the dust of your feet .
text2: Are cˈu we man quixcˈulax cumal , we man cäcaj taj cäquitatabej ri i tzij , chixel bi cho ri ja riˈ o pa ri tinimit riˈ . Chitotaˈ can ri ulew ri cˈo che tak ri iwakan . ( Chibana waˈ chukˈalajisaxic chquij ri winak re ri tinimit riˈ chi man utz tä ri cäcaˈno , cˈo qui mac . )

text: Verily I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment , than for that city .
text2: Kas tzij quinbij chiwe chi pa ri kˈij ri cäkˈat na tzij pa qui wiˈ ri winak riˈ rumal ri Dios , nim na ri cˈäjisabal qui wäch ri winak re ri tinimit riˈ chuwäch ri cˈäjisabal qui wäch ri winak aj Sodoma xukujeˈ ri winak aj Gomorra , ― xcha chque .

text: Behold , I send you forth as sheep in the midst of wolves : be ye therefore wise as serpents , and harmless as doves .
text2: ¡ Chiwilampeˈ ! Ri in quixintak bic jeˈ ta ne chi ix chij chquixol ri utiw . Chixsacˈlaj baˈ jeˈ jas ri cumätz , chibana cˈut jeˈ jas ri cuban ri palomäx ri man cuban tä cˈäx .

text: But beware of men : for they will deliver you up to the councils , and they will scourge you in their synagogues ;
text2: Chiwila baˈ iwib , rumal chi ri winak quixquijach na pa qui kˈab ri qui nimakil ri winak , quixquichˈay na pa tak ri rachoch Dios ri cäquimulij wi quib ri winak .

text: And ye shall be brought before governors and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them and the Gentiles .
text2: Quixquicˈam na bi chquiwäch kˈatal tak tzij , xukujeˈ chquiwäch nimak tak takanelab rumal wech in , rech quikˈalajisaj ri Utzalaj Tzij re ri Evangelio chquiwäch ri e areˈ xukujeˈ chquiwäch ri winak ri man aj Israel taj .

text: But when they deliver you up , take no thought how or what ye shall speak : for it shall be given you in that same hour what ye shall speak .
text2: Aretak cˈut quixcˈam bic rech quixjach chquiwäch ri kˈatal tak tzij , mixej iwib . Michomaj bic jas ri quibij , o jas ri quiban chubixic waˈ . Cˈol baˈ pa i jolom chi aretak rajwaxic quixchˈawic , ri Dios cäyoˈw na chiwe ri tzij ri quibij .

text: For it is not ye that speak , but the Spirit of your Father which speaketh in you .
text2: Man ix tä cˈu riˈ ri quixtzijon na , xane are ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu rech ri ka Tat cäyoˈw na ri tzij pa ri iwanimaˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: And the brother shall deliver up the brother to death , and the father the child : and the children shall rise up against their parents , and cause them to be put to death .
text2: Ri winak quequijach na ri cachalal pa cämisaxic . Ri nan tat quequijach na ri calcˈual pa cämisaxic . Ri alcˈualaxelab cäquiyac na quib chquij ri qui nan qui tat , quequijach na pa cämisaxic .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that endureth to the end shall be saved .
text2: Quetzelax na i wäch cumal conojel ri winak xa rumal wech in . Apachin cˈu ri cuchˈij ri cˈäx cˈä cäqˈuis na ronojel curik na ru tobanic ri Dios .

text: But when they persecute you in this city , flee ye into another : for verily I say unto you , Ye shall not have gone over the cities of Israel , till the Son of man be come .
text2: Aretak cäban cˈäx chiwe pa jun tinimit , chixanimaj bi pa jun tinimit chic . Kas tzij quinbij chiwe chi mäjaˈ quixcowin chusolixic tak conojel ri tinimit ri e cˈo wi ri winak aj Israel aretak quinpe in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , ― xcha chque ru tijoxelab .

text: The disciple is not above his master , nor the servant above his lord .
text2: Ri tijoxel man are tä nim na u banic chuwäch ru tijonel . Ri ajchac cˈut man are tä nim na u banic chuwäch ri u patrón .

text: It is enough for the disciple that he be as his master , and the servant as his lord . If they have called the master of the house Beelzebub , how much more shall they call them of his household ?
text2: Ri tijoxel rajwaxic cäcuˈbi u cˈux chi cäjunamataj na rucˈ ru tijonel . Ri ajchac cˈut rajwaxic cäcuˈbi u cˈux chi cäjunamataj na rucˈ ru patrón . We ri ajchakˈel ja cäbix Beelzebú che xa che yokˈbal re , ¿ jas ta cˈu lo cäbix chque ri rachalaxic ri areˈ ?

text: Fear them not therefore : for there is nothing covered , that shall not be revealed ; and hid , that shall not be known .
text2: Rumal riˈ mixej iwib chquiwäch ri winak . Man cˈo tä ri chˈuktalic ri mat quel na chi sak . Man cˈo tä cˈu ri cˈuˈtalic ri mat quetamax na .

text: What I tell you in darkness , that speak ye in light : and what ye hear in the ear , that preach ye upon the housetops .
text2: Ri quinbij chiwe ix pa ri kˈekum , chiya u bixic pa sakil . Ri quinbij chiwe chicˈuyal , chiraka i chiˈ chubixic waˈ pa tak ri be .

text: And fear not them which kill the body , but are not able to kill the soul : but rather fear him which is able to destroy both soul and body in hell .
text2: Mixej iwib chquiwäch ri winak ri quecowinic cäquicämisaj ri cuerpo , man quecowin tä cˈu chucämisaxic ri ranimaˈ jun . Xane are chixej iwib chuwäch ri Jun ri cäcowinic cusach u wäch ru cuerpo jun winak xukujeˈ ri ranimaˈ ri areˈ pa ri kˈakˈ .

text: Are not two sparrows sold for a farthing ? and one of them shall not fall on the ground without your Father .
text2: ¿ A mat xa jun centavo queqˈuiyix wi quieb alaj tak chicop ajuwocaj ? Man cˈo tä cˈu jun chque we alaj tak chicop riˈ ri cäcämic we ta mat craj ri i Tat .

text: But the very hairs of your head are all numbered .
text2: Xukujeˈ ne ri rismal i wiˈ , conojel waˈ e ajilatal rumal ri Dios .

text: Fear ye not therefore , ye are of more value than many sparrows .
text2: Mixej baˈ iwib , ri ix sibalaj ix lokˈ na chquiwäch qˈuia alaj tak chicop ajuwocaj , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: Whosoever therefore shall confess me before men , him will I confess also before my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Conojel ri cäquikˈalajisaj quib chquiwäch ri winak chi e cojoninak chwe , ri in xukujeˈ quinkˈalajisaj na chuwäch ri nu Tat ri cˈo chilaˈ chicaj chi e wachiˈl in .

text: But whosoever shall deny me before men , him will I also deny before my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Apachin cˈu ri cubij chquiwäch ri winak chi man retam tä nu wäch , ri in xukujeˈ quinbij chuwäch ri nu Tat ri cˈo chilaˈ chicaj chi man wetam tä u wäch ri areˈ , ― xcha ri Jesús .

text: Think not that I am come to send peace on earth : I came not to send peace , but a sword .
text2: Michomaj chi ri in petinak chuyaˈic utzil chquixol ri winak cho ruwächulew , xane rumal wech in cäcˈoji na chˈoj chquixol ri winak .

text: For I am come to set a man at variance against his father , and the daughter against her mother , and the daughter in law against her mother in law .
text2: Cäbantaj na chˈoj rumal wech , jun tataˈ chrij ri u cˈojol , ru cˈojol cˈut chrij ru tat , jun chichuˈ chrij ri ral ali , ri ali cˈut chrij ru nan , xukujeˈ ne ri jun ali chic chrij ru nan ralib , ru nan ralib cˈut chrij ri areˈ .

text: And a man ' s foes shall be they of his own household .
text2: Je riˈ chi ri qui cˈulel ri winak chquijujunal , e areˈ ri cachalaxic ri e areˈ , ― cächa ri Jesús .

text: He that loveth father or mother more than me is not worthy of me : and he that loveth son or daughter more than me is not worthy of me .
text2: Apachin ri lokˈ na cäril ru nan u tat chnuwäch in , man takal tä riˈ chi coc che nu tijoxel . Apachin ri lokˈ na cäril ru cˈojol o ru miaˈl chnuwäch in , man takal tä riˈ chi coc che nu tijoxel .

text: And he that taketh not his cross , and followeth after me , is not worthy of me .
text2: Apachin ri man cäpe tä wucˈ in rumal chi man craj taj curik ri cämical jas ri quinrik in , man takal tä riˈ chi coc che nu tijoxel .

text: He that findeth his life shall lose it : and he that loseth his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: Jachin ri craj cutoˈ u wiˈ ru cˈaslemal waral cho ruwächulew , cäcäm na riˈ . Jachin cˈu ri cuya ru cˈaslemal rumal wech in , cutoˈ na u wiˈ riˈ ru cˈaslemal .

text: He that receiveth you receiveth me , and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: Ri winak ri utz i cˈulaxic cubano , in riˈ quinucˈulaj . Jachin ri quinucˈulaj in , are cucˈulaj riˈ ri Jun ri xintakow lok .

text: He that receiveth a prophet in the name of a prophet shall receive a prophet ' s reward ; and he that receiveth a righteous man in the name of a righteous man shall receive a righteous man ' s reward .
text2: Jachin ri cucˈulaj jun kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri takom lok rumal ri Dios , cucˈam na ri tojbal re jas ri cäyiˈ che jun kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios . Jachin ri cucˈulaj jun utzalaj achi , cucˈam na ri tojbal re jas ri cäyiˈ che jun utzalaj achi rumal ri utzil ri cubano .

text: And whosoever shall give to drink unto one of these little ones a cup of cold water only in the name of a disciple , verily I say unto you , he shall in no wise lose his reward .
text2: Apachin ri cuya jun vaso joron che jun chque we winak riˈ ri man nim tä qui banic xa rumal chi are nu tijoxel waˈ , kas curik na ri tojbal re , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had made an end of commanding his twelve disciples , he departed thence to teach and to preach in their cities .
text2: Aretak ri Jesús xtoˈtaj che qui pixbexic ri cablajuj u tijoxelab , xel bi chilaˈ rech cuya tijonic chque niqˈuiaj winak pa tak ri tinimit jelaˈ , xukujeˈ rech cutzijoj ri Utzalaj Tzij re ri Evangelio chque .

text: Now when John had heard in the prison the works of Christ , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Are cˈu ri tat Juan Kasal Jaˈ cˈo pa cheˈ . Xretamaj cˈut jas ri tajin cuban ri Cristo . Ri areˈ xeutak bi quieb chque ru tijoxelab rucˈ ri Jesús .

text: And said unto him , Art thou he that should come , or do we look for another ?
text2: Jeˈ xubano rech cäquitaˈ che : ¿ A lal riˈ ri Cristo ri cäpe na ? o ¿ A rajwaxic ne cäkeyej chi na jun chic ? ― xecha che .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Go and shew John again those things which ye do hear and see :
text2: Xchˈaw cˈu ri Jesús , xubij chque : Oj alak , bij alak che ri tat Juan jas ri tajin quil alak , xukujeˈ ri tajin cäta alak .

text: The blind receive their sight , and the lame walk , the lepers are cleansed , and the deaf hear , the dead are raised up , and the poor have the gospel preached to them .
text2: Bij alak che chi ri moyab quecaˈy chic , ri chˈocojib quebin chic , ri cˈo itzel chˈaˈc chquij tajin queutzir che ri qui yab . Bij alak che chi ri soˈrab cäquita chic , ri cäminakib tajin quecˈastajic , xukujeˈ chi ri mebaˈib tajin cätzijox ri Utzalaj Tzij re ri Evangelio chque .

text: And blessed is he , whosoever shall not be offended in me .
text2: Utz re ri winak ri man cuban tä quieb u cˈux chwij , ― xcha chque ru tijoxelab ri tat Juan .

text: And as they departed , Jesus began to say unto the multitudes concerning John , What went ye out into the wilderness to see ? A reed shaken with the wind ?
text2: Aretak xebeˈ ru tijoxelab ri tat Juan , ri Jesús xuchaplej u tzijoxic ri tat Juan chque ri winak , xubij chque : ¿ Jas xeˈ alak che rilic pa ri juyub ri cätzˈinowic ? ¿ A xeˈ alak che rilic jun aj ri tajin cäslabisax rumal ri quiäkikˈ ?

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A man clothed in soft raiment ? behold , they that wear soft clothing are in kings ' houses .
text2: We man are tä riˈ , ¿ jas ri xil alak ? ¿ A xil alak jun achi ri jeˈl ri ratzˈiak u cojom ? Etam alak chi ri cˈo jeˈlalaj tak catzˈiak , e cˈo ri e areˈ pa tak cachoch ri nimak tak takanelab .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A prophet ? yea , I say unto you , and more than a prophet .
text2: ¿ Jas cˈu ri xeˈ alak che rilic ? ¿ A xil alak jun kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ? Jeˈ , je riˈ , ― xchaˈ . Tzare cˈu ri tat Juan nim na u banic chuwäch apachique kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios .

text: For this is he , of whom it is written , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Ri tat Juan are waˈ ri tzˈibam can chrij pa ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic ri cubij : Quintak na bi ri nu takoˈn , cänabej cˈu na chawäch ri cuban na u banic ra be ,

text: Verily I say unto you , Among them that are born of women there hath not risen a greater than John the Baptist : notwithstanding he that is least in the kingdom of heaven is greater than he .
text2: ― cächa riˈ , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ri winak . Kas tzij ri quinbij chiwe chi chquixol conojel ri winak ri e cˈolinak cˈä we cämic riˈ , man cˈo tä jun ri nim na u kˈij chuwäch ri tat Juan Kasal Jaˈ . Pune je riˈ , ri jun ri man kas nim tä u banic ri cätakan ri Dios pa ranimaˈ , are nim na u kˈij waˈ chuwäch ri tat Juan Kasal Jaˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: And from the days of John the Baptist until now the kingdom of heaven suffereth violence , and the violent take it by force .
text2: Tzpa tak ri kˈij ri xpe ri tat Juan Kasal Jaˈ cˈä cämic , ri winak xquichaplej lok u tijic qui chukˈab rech queboc pa ru takanic ri Dios . Ri cäquicoj qui chukˈab cäquichomaj chi e areˈ quechˈacan na .

text: For all the prophets and the law prophesied until John .
text2: Ri Pixab ri xutzˈibaj ri ka mam Moisés cubij chi cäpe na ri Dios rech cätakan pa qui wiˈ ri winak , xukujeˈ jeˈ xquibij conojel ri kˈalajisal tak re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios cˈä xpe na ri tat Juan .

text: And if ye will receive it , this is Elias , which was for to come .
text2: We cˈu ri ix kas quiwaj quicoj waˈ , ri tat Juan are ri kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri cäpe na jas ri xpe ri ka mam Elías ojer .

text: He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Jachin tak ri cäquijiquiba canimaˈ chutatabexic ri nu tzij , chquitatabej baˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: But whereunto shall I liken this generation ? It is like unto children sitting in the markets , and calling unto their fellows ,
text2: ¿ Jas rucˈ queinjunamaj wi ri winak re we kˈij junab riˈ ? Ri winak cämic quejunamataj cucˈ ri acˈalab ri queetzˈen pa tak ri cˈayibal , cäquirak qui chiˈ che qui chˈabexic ri cachiˈl , cäquibij :

text: And saying , We have piped unto you , and ye have not danced ; we have mourned unto you , and ye have not lamented .
text2: “ Xkokˈesaj ri suˈ chiwe , man xixxojow tä cˈut . Xkaˈn u kˈojom cäminak , man xixokˈ tä cˈut , ” ― quecha riˈ .

text: For John came neither eating nor drinking , and they say , He hath a devil .
text2: Xpe cˈu ri tat Juan ri man wiˈj taj , ri man cutij tä vino . Ri winak cˈut cäquibij chi xa cˈo jun itzel espíritu che .

text: The Son of man came eating and drinking , and they say , Behold a man gluttonous , and a winebibber , a friend of publicans and sinners . But wisdom is justified of her children .
text2: Aretak cˈut xinpe in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , ri quinwiˈc , ri quintij vino , conojel cˈut cäquibij chi xa in jikˈalaj achi , in kˈabarel , in cachiˈl ajmaquib xukujeˈ tokˈil tak alcabal . Ri winak ri utz ru chac kˈalaj waˈ chi cˈo ri u noˈj ri Dios rucˈ , ― xcha ri Jesús .

text: Then began he to upbraid the cities wherein most of his mighty works were done , because they repented not :
text2: Ri Jesús cˈut xuchap qui yajic ri winak pa tak ri tinimit jawijeˈ u banom wi qˈuia tak cajmabal . Je riˈ , rumal chi ri winak ri e cˈo chilaˈ man qui qˈuexom tä canimaˈ , man qui qˈuexom tä cˈu ri qui chomanic . Xubij cˈu chque :

text: Woe unto thee , Chorazin ! woe unto thee , Bethsaida ! for if the mighty works , which were done in you , had been done in Tyre and Sidon , they would have repented long ago in sackcloth and ashes .
text2: ¡ Cˈäx iwe , winak re ri tinimit Corazín ! ¡ Cˈäx iwe , winak re ri tinimit Betsaida ! We ta xeban waˈ we cajmabal riˈ pa tak ri tinimit Tiro , ri tinimit Sidón jas ri xebantaj iwucˈ ix , qˈuextajinak ta chi riˈ ri canimaˈ , ri qui chomanic ri winak jelaˈ . Xquicoj ta catzˈiak riˈ ri cukˈalajisaj chi quebisonic . Xukujeˈ cˈo ta banom wi chi cukˈalajisaj chi are rumal ri qui mac chi quebisonic , ― xchaˈ .

text: But I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the day of judgment , than for you .
text2: Quinbij cˈu chiwe ix chi pa ri kˈij ri cukˈat na tzij ri Dios , nim na ri cˈäjisabal i wäch quirik na chuwäch ri cˈäjisabal qui wäch ri cäquirik na ri winak aj Tiro , aj Sidón .

text: And thou , Capernaum , which art exalted unto heaven , shalt be brought down to hell : for if the mighty works , which have been done in thee , had been done in Sodom , it would have remained until this day .
text2: Are cˈu ri ix winak aj Capernaum , ri sibalaj quinimarisaj iwib , cˈä pa ri kˈakˈ cˈut quixkasax wi na . We ta cucˈ ri winak aj Sodoma xeban wi tak ri cajmabal ri xebantaj iwucˈ ix , cˈo ta na riˈ ri qui tinimit cämic .

text: But I say unto you , That it shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom in the day of judgment , than for thee .
text2: Quinbij cˈu chiwe chi pa ri kˈij aretak cukˈat na tzij ri Dios , nim na ri cˈäjisabal i wäch ix quirik na chuwäch ri cäquirik ri winak aj Sodoma , ― xcha ri Jesús .

text: At that time Jesus answered and said , I thank thee , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , because thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent , and hast revealed them unto babes .
text2: Pa ri kˈij riˈ xubij ri Jesús : Quinnimarisaj kˈij la , Tat , Rajaw ri cajulew . Je riˈ , rumal chi xcˈuˈ la ri etambal la chquiwäch ri winak ri cˈo qui noˈj , ri cˈo quetambal , are cˈutum cˈu la waˈ chquiwäch ri man cˈo tä quetambal , ri jeˈ ta ne chi e acˈalab .

text: Even so , Father : for so it seemed good in thy sight .
text2: Jeˈ , Tat , rumal chi je riˈ ri utzalaj rayibal la chque ri winak .

text: All things are delivered unto me of my Father : and no man knoweth the Son , but the Father ; neither knoweth any man the Father , save the Son , and he to whomsoever the Son will reveal him .
text2: Ri nu Tat u jachom pa nu kˈab ronojel ri cˈolic . Man cˈo tä jun ri kas retam u wäch ru Cˈojol ri Dios , xane xak xuwi ri ka Tat . Xukujeˈ man cˈo tä jun ri kas retam u wäch ri ka Tat , xane xak xuwi ri in , in riˈ ri u Cˈojol , xukujeˈ jachin cˈu tak chque ri cwaj quinbij wi jas ru banic ri ka Tat Dios .

text: Come unto me , all ye that labour and are heavy laden , and I will give you rest .
text2: Chixsaˈj wucˈ in , iwonojel ri ix cosinak , iwonojel ri cˈo iwekaˈn , quinya cˈu uxlanem chiwe .

text: Take my yoke upon you , and learn of me ; for I am meek and lowly in heart : and ye shall find rest unto your souls .
text2: Chicˈama ri ekbal yunt ri quinya chiwij . Chiwetamaj iwe wucˈ in rumal chi ri in cˈo nu paciencia , man quinnimarisaj tä wib . Cuxlan cˈu na ri iwanimaˈ .

text: For my yoke is easy , and my burden is light .
text2: Ri ekbal yunt ri quinya chiwij man cˈäx tä rucˈaxic . Ri ekaˈn cˈut ri quinya chiwij , man al tä riˈ .

text: At that time Jesus went on the sabbath day through the corn ; and his disciples were an hungred , and began to pluck the ears of corn , and to eat .
text2: Pa jun kˈij re uxlanem ri Jesús tajin cocˈow xol tak ri trico . Are cˈu ru tijoxelab xpe qui numic , xquichap cˈu u chˈupic ru jolom tak ri trico . Xquibak pa qui kˈab , te cˈu riˈ xquitijo .

text: But when the Pharisees saw it , they said unto him , Behold , thy disciples do that which is not lawful to do upon the sabbath day .
text2: Aretak ri tataˈib fariseos xquilo , xquibij che ri Jesús : Chilampe la , ri tijoxelab la tajin cäcaˈn chac ri äwas u banic pa tak ri kˈij re uxlanem .

text: But he said unto them , Have ye not read what David did , when he was an hungred , and they that were with him ;
text2: Ri Jesús xubij chque : ¿ A mat cˈo jumul ri siqˈuim alak jas ri xuban ri ka mam David ojer aretak ri areˈ xunaˈ numic , xukujeˈ jas ri xcaˈn ri e cˈo rucˈ ?

text: How he entered into the house of God , and did eat the shewbread , which was not lawful for him to eat , neither for them which were with him , but only for the priests ?
text2: Xoc cˈu bi ri ka mam David pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , xutij cˈu re ri wa ri yoˈm cho ri Dios , xuya cˈu que ri e cˈo rucˈ xukujeˈ . Äwas cˈu u tijic waˈ cumal xak jachinok , xane xak xuwi chque ri sacerdotes yaˈtal wi waˈ , ― xchaˈ .

text: Or have ye not read in the law , how that on the sabbath days the priests in the temple profane the sabbath , and are blameless ?
text2: Xukujeˈ xubij : ¿ A mat cˈo jumul ri siqˈuim alak pa ri Pixab ri xutzˈibaj ri ka mam Moisés , chi ri sacerdotes ri quepatänin pa ri rachoch Dios man queuxlan tä pa ri kˈij re uxlanem ? Pune ta ne je riˈ man mac tä cˈu riˈ chi jeˈ cäcaˈn waˈ .

text: But I say unto you , That in this place is one greater than the temple .
text2: Quinbij cˈu chech alak , chi waral cˈo Jun ri nim na u banic chuwäch ri nimalaj rachoch Dios .

text: But if ye had known what this meaneth , I will have mercy , and not sacrifice , ye would not have condemned the guiltless .
text2: Ri alak xa man cächˈob tä alak jas quel cubij waˈ we tzij riˈ ri tzˈibtal can pa ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri cubij : “ Ri in cwaj chi ri ix quiban tokˈob chque ri winak , man are tä cwaj chi queicämisaj awaj che qui sipaxic chnuwäch , ” ― cächa riˈ . We ta kas cächˈob alak waˈ , mat cäkˈat alak tzij chi cäcˈäjisax qui wäch ri winak ri man cˈo tä qui mac .

text: For the Son of man is Lord even of the sabbath day .
text2: Are cˈu riˈ ri in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , cˈo nu takanic puwiˈ ri kˈij re uxlanem xukujeˈ , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ri tataˈib fariseos .

text: And when he was departed thence , he went into their synagogue :
text2: Xel cˈu bi ri Jesús chilaˈ , xoc bi pa jun chque ri rachoch Dios ri cäquimulij wi quib ri winak .

text: And , behold , there was a man which had his hand withered . And they asked him , saying , Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath days ? that they might accuse him .
text2: Cˈo cˈu jun achi chilaˈ ri cäminak jun u kˈab . Are cˈu ri tataˈib fariseos cäcaj cäquitzucuj u mac ri Jesús , rumal riˈ xquitaˈ che : ¿ A yaˈtalic cäcunax jun yawab pa ri kˈij re uxlanem ? ― xecha che .

text: And he said unto them , What man shall there be among you , that shall have one sheep , and if it fall into a pit on the sabbath day , will he not lay hold on it , and lift it out ?
text2: Xchˈaw ri Jesús , xubij chque : We jun chiwe cˈo jun u chij , cätzak cˈu bi pa jun cˈuaˈ pa jun kˈij re uxlanem , ¿ a mat queˈ riˈ che resaxic ?

text: How much then is a man better than a sheep ? Wherefore it is lawful to do well on the sabbath days .
text2: E ta cˈu lo jun winak , are ri Dios nim na u banic cäril wi waˈ chuwäch jun chij . Rumal riˈ yaˈtal u banic tokˈob pa tak ri kˈij re uxlanem , ― xcha chque .

text: Then saith he to the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it forth ; and it was restored whole , like as the other .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús che ri achi : Yuku ri kˈab la , ― xcha che . Xuyuk ru kˈab , xutzir cˈut . Jeˈ chic ri u kˈab riˈ jas ri jun chic .

text: Then the Pharisees went out , and held a council against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: Xebel cˈu bi ri tataˈib fariseos , xquitala qui noˈj chbil tak quib jas ri cäcaˈn chucämisaxic ri Jesús .

text: But when Jesus knew it , he withdrew himself from thence : and great multitudes followed him , and he healed them all ;
text2: Aretak ri Jesús xuchˈob ri qui chomanic ri tataˈib fariseos , xel bi chilaˈ . E qˈuia cˈu ri winak xeteri bi chrij . Ri Jesús cˈut xeucunaj conojel tak ri yawabib .

text: And charged them that they should not make him known :
text2: Xeutak cˈu ri winak , xubij chque chi cˈo jachin che mäquibij wi jachin ri Areˈ .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying ,
text2: Xubij ri Jesús waˈ rech jeˈ quel wi jas ri xubij lok ri ka mam Isaías ri kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri xubij :

text: Behold my servant , whom I have chosen ; my beloved , in whom my soul is well pleased : I will put my spirit upon him , and he shall shew judgment to the Gentiles .
text2: Are waˈ ri patänil we ri chaˈtal wumal , ri sibalaj lokˈ chnuwäch , ri cäquicot ri wanimaˈ rumal . Quinya na ri Lokˈalaj nu Espíritu pa ranimaˈ ri Areˈ . Cubij cˈu na chque conojel qui wäch winak chi ri in quinkˈat na tzij pa qui wiˈ .

text: He shall not strive , nor cry ; neither shall any man hear his voice in the streets .
text2: Man cächˈojin taj , man curak tä u chiˈ , man cˈo ta jun cätoˈw ri Areˈ co cächˈaw pa tak ri be .

text: A bruised reed shall he not break , and smoking flax shall he not quench , till he send forth judgment unto victory .
text2: We cˈo jun winak ri jeˈ jas jun aj ri cotaquic , man cukˈup taj . We ne cˈo jun winak ri junam jas jun candela ri man nim tä ru kˈakˈal , man cuchup tä riˈ . Xane cächacun na che rilic chi copan na ri kˈij aretak kas cäkˈat na tzij rucˈ jicomal .

text: And in his name shall the Gentiles trust .
text2: Conojel cˈu qui wäch winak cho ruwächulew , cäcuˈbi na qui cˈux chrij ri Areˈ ,

text: Then was brought unto him one possessed with a devil , blind , and dumb : and he healed him , insomuch that the blind and dumb both spake and saw .
text2: ― xcha ri Dios chuchiˈ ri kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab . Xcˈam cˈu bi jun achi rucˈ ri Jesús . Ri achi mem xukujeˈ moy , cˈo cˈu jun itzel espíritu rucˈ . Xcunax cˈu rumal ri Jesús , je riˈ chi ri achi xcowinic xcaˈyic xukujeˈ xchˈawic .

text: And all the people were amazed , and said , Is not this the son of David ?
text2: Conojel ri winak xquicajmaj waˈ , xquibij : ¿ A mat are waˈ ri Ralcˈual can ri ka mam David ri cäbixic chi cäpe na ? ― xechaˈ .

text: But when the Pharisees heard it , they said , This fellow doth not cast out devils , but by Beelzebub the prince of the devils .
text2: Aretak cˈut xquita ri tataˈib fariseos ri cäquibij ri winak , ri e areˈ xquibij : We achi riˈ cäcowinic queresaj bi ri itzel tak espíritus chque ri winak xa rumal ru chukˈab ri Beelzebú ri qui nimal ri itzel tak espíritus ri cˈo rucˈ , ― xechaˈ .

text: And Jesus knew their thoughts , and said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and every city or house divided against itself shall not stand :
text2: Ri Jesús xuchˈobo jas ri tajin cäquichomaj , xubij cˈu chque : Apachique kˈatbal tzij ri u banom quieb , ri juchˈob kˈatal tak tzij cäquiyac quib chquij ri juchˈob chic , ri kˈatbal tzij riˈ cäqˈuis na u wäch . We jun tinimit o jun ja winak u banom quieb rumal chi cˈo chˈoj chquixol , man naj tä riˈ cuchˈijo .

text: And if Satan cast out Satan , he is divided against himself ; how shall then his kingdom stand ?
text2: Je riˈ xukujeˈ , we ta ri Satanás cäresaj bi ri Satanás , u banom quieb riˈ . We ta je riˈ , ¿ a naj ta cˈu riˈ cuchˈij ru takanic ? ¡ Man jeˈ taj !

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your children cast them out ? therefore they shall be your judges .
text2: Ri alak cäbij alak chi ri in quinwesaj bi ri itzel tak espíritus rucˈ ru chukˈab ri Beelzebú . We ta je riˈ , ¿ jachin cäyoˈw qui chukˈab ri tijoxelab alak che quesaxic bi ri itzel tak espíritus ? Kas are ri e areˈ cäquikˈalajisaj chi xa sachinak alak .

text: But if I cast out devils by the Spirit of God , then the kingdom of God is come unto you .
text2: Ri in cˈut quinwesaj bi ri itzel tak espíritus rucˈ ru chukˈab ri Espíritu rech ri Dios ri cˈo wucˈ . Quel cubij waˈ chi ri Dios cˈo chi ucˈ alak rech cätakan puwiˈ alak , ― xcha chque .

text: Or else how can one enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he first bind the strong man ? and then he will spoil his house .
text2: Man cˈo tä jun cäcowinic coc pa rachoch jun achi ri sibalaj cˈo u chukˈab , cärelakˈaj cˈu bi ri jastak re , we ta mat nabe cuyut na ri achi ri cˈo u chukˈab . Te cˈu riˈ cäcowinic cärelakˈaj bi ri jastak re .

text: He that is not with me is against me ; and he that gathereth not with me scattereth abroad .
text2: Ri jun ri man junam tä u chomanic wucˈ , quinucˈulelaj riˈ . Ri jun ri man cächacun tä wucˈ , xak cutur riˈ ri nu chac , ― xcha chque .

text: Wherefore I say unto you , All manner of sin and blasphemy shall be forgiven unto men : but the blasphemy against the Holy Ghost shall not be forgiven unto men .
text2: Rumal riˈ quinbij chech alak : Ronojel mac ri cäcaˈn ri winak cuyaˈ cäsachtaj na qui mac riˈ rumal ri Dios , xukujeˈ ronojel ri äwas u bixic chrij ri Dios ri cäquibij ri winak cuyaˈ cäsachtaj na qui mac riˈ . Are cˈu we cäquibij ri äwas u bixic chrij ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu man cuyaˈ taj cäsachtaj ri qui mac riˈ .

text: And whosoever speaketh a word against the Son of man , it shall be forgiven him : but whosoever speaketh against the Holy Ghost , it shall not be forgiven him , neither in this world , neither in the world to come .
text2: Apachin ri cubij tzij ri äwas u bixic chwij in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , cäsachtaj na u mac riˈ che . Apachin cˈu ri cubij ri äwas u bixic chrij ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu , man cäsachtaj tä na u mac riˈ che waral cho we uwächulew . Man cäsach tä cˈu u mac riˈ pa ri jun cˈaslemal chic ri cäpe na , ― xcha ri Jesús .

text: Either make the tree good , and his fruit good ; or else make the tree corrupt , and his fruit corrupt : for the tree is known by his fruit .
text2: We utz ri cheˈ , utz ru wäch ri cuya . We man utz tä ri cheˈ , man utz tä ru wäch riˈ ri cuya . Ri jun cheˈ rumal ru wäch cächˈobtajic jas u banic .

text: O generation of vipers , how can ye , being evil , speak good things ? for out of the abundance of the heart the mouth speaketh .
text2: ¡ Ri alak , alak subanelab tak winak ! ¿ A cäcowin lo alak riˈ chubixic utzalaj tak tzij , alak itzel tak winak cˈut ? Ri quel lok pu chiˈ ri winak , are waˈ ri kas cˈo pa ranimaˈ .

text: A good man out of the good treasure of the heart bringeth forth good things : and an evil man out of the evil treasure bringeth forth evil things .
text2: Ri utzalaj winak , utz riˈ ri cubij rumal rech ri utzil ri cˈo pa ranimaˈ . Ri itzel winak , man utz tä riˈ ri cubij rumal chi etzelal waˈ ri cˈo pa ranimaˈ .

text: But I say unto you , That every idle word that men shall speak , they shall give account thereof in the day of judgment .
text2: Quinbij cˈu chech alak , chi pa ri kˈij aretak cukˈat na tzij ri Dios , conojel ri winak cäquijach na cuenta rumal ronojel tzij ri qui bim ri man cˈo tä u patän .

text: For by thy words thou shalt be justified , and by thy words thou shalt be condemned .
text2: Jas cˈu jeˈ ri cätzijon ri winak , are je riˈ ri kˈatow tzij ri cäban na puwiˈ . Cäkˈalajisax cˈu na we cˈo u mac o man cˈo taj .

text: Then certain of the scribes and of the Pharisees answered , saying , Master , we would see a sign from thee .
text2: Jujun tataˈib fariseos cachiˈl jujun tijonelab re ri Pixab , xquibij che ri Jesús : Ajtij , cäkaj chi cäban la jun cajmabal etal chkawäch rech cäkilo , ― xecha che .

text: But he answered and said unto them , An evil and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given to it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas :
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij chque : Ri lawalo tak winak , ri man jicom tä canimaˈ , cäcaj chi quinban jun cajmabal etal chquiwäch . Man cäyiˈ tä cˈu waˈ chque , xane xak xuwi ri etal chrij ri Jonás ri kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ojer .

text: For as Jonas was three days and three nights in the whale ' s belly ; so shall the Son of man be three days and three nights in the heart of the earth .
text2: Jeˈ jas ri Jonás xcˈoji chupam ri jun nimalaj cär oxib kˈij , oxib akˈab , are cˈu jeˈ quinban na in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , quincˈoji cˈu na xeˈ ri ulew oxib kˈij , oxib akˈab .

text: The men of Nineveh shall rise in judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : because they repented at the preaching of Jonas ; and , behold , a greater than Jonas is here .
text2: Ri winak aj Nínive , pa ri kˈij re ri kˈatow tzij aretak cäkˈat tzij pa qui wiˈ ri winak ri e cˈo cämic , cäquikˈat na tzij pa qui wiˈ chi cäcˈäjisax qui wäch . Je riˈ , rumal chi ri winak aj Nínive , xquiqˈuex ri canimaˈ , xquiqˈuex cˈu ri qui chomanic aretak ri Jonás xutzijoj ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios chque . Waral cˈut cˈo Jun ri nim na u banic chuwäch ri Jonás .

text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : for she came from the uttermost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and , behold , a greater than Solomon is here .
text2: Xukujeˈ ri nimalaj takanel ixok ri xcˈoji chumox ri relbal kˈij , cäcˈoji na pa ri kˈij re ri kˈatow tzij . Aretak cäkˈat tzij pa qui wiˈ ri winak ri e cˈo cämic , ri areˈ cukˈat na tzij pa qui wiˈ chi cäcˈäjisax qui wäch . Je riˈ , rumal chi ri ixok riˈ naj xel wi lok , xpe cˈu chutatabexic ri nimalaj retambal ri Salomón . Waral cˈut cˈo wi Jun ri nim na u banic chuwäch ri Salomón .

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest , and findeth none .
text2: Aretak jun itzelalaj espíritu quel bi che jun winak , xak cäwacatalob chic pa tak juyub ri cätzˈinowic , cutzucuj jawijeˈ cuxlan wi . Aretak man curik taj jawijeˈ cuxlan wi , cubij :

text: Then he saith , I will return into my house from whence I came out ; and when he is come , he findeth it empty , swept , and garnished .
text2: “ Quintzelej na bi cho ri wachoch jawijeˈ ri xinel wi lok , ” ― cächaˈ . Aretak copanic , curika ri ranimaˈ ri winak jeˈ u banic jun ja tolonic , mesom chi u pam , utz cˈu banom che .

text: Then goeth he , and taketh with himself seven other spirits more wicked than himself , and they enter in and dwell there : and the last state of that man is worse than the first . Even so shall it be also unto this wicked generation .
text2: Queˈ cˈut , queucˈama chi na wukub itzelalaj tak espíritus ri sibalaj e lawalo na chuwäch ri areˈ . Conojel waˈ queboc pa ranimaˈ ri winak . Ri winak riˈ nim na ri cˈäx curik na chuwäch ri cˈäx ri xurik nabe . Je cˈu waˈ ri cäquicˈulmaj na ri lawalo tak winak cämic , ― xcha chque .

text: While he yet talked to the people , behold , his mother and his brethren stood without , desiring to speak with him .
text2: Ri Jesús tajin cätzijon na cucˈ ri winak aretak xopan ru nan , e rachiˈl ri rachalal . Xak cˈu chrij ri ja e tacˈatoj wi , cäcaj cˈut quetzijon rucˈ ri Jesús .

text: Then one said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to speak with thee .
text2: Cˈo cˈu jun ri xubij che ri Jesús : Ri nan la , xukujeˈ ri chakˈ la e cˈo chrij ri ja , cächˈabex la cumal , ― xecha che .

text: But he answered and said unto him that told him , Who is my mother ? and who are my brethren ?
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús che ri xbin che : ¿ Jachin riˈ ri nu nan , xukujeˈ jachin tak ri kas e wachalal ? ― xcha che .

text: And he stretched forth his hand toward his disciples , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Xeucˈut ru tijoxelab chquiwäch ri winak , te cˈu riˈ xubij : E are waˈ jeˈ ta ne ri nu nan , xukujeˈ ri nu chakˈ , ― xchaˈ .

text: For whosoever shall do the will of my Father which is in heaven , the same is my brother , and sister , and mother .
text2: Je riˈ , rumal chi apachin ta ne ri cäbanow ru rayibal ri nu Tat ri cˈo chilaˈ chicaj , are waˈ ri kas wachalal , ri nu chakˈ , ri wanab , ri nu nan , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: The same day went Jesus out of the house , and sat by the sea side .
text2: Pa ri kˈij riˈ ri Jesús xel lok cho ja , xeˈ cˈu chuchiˈ ri mar , xtˈuyi cˈu chilaˈ .

text: And great multitudes were gathered together unto him , so that he went into a ship , and sat ; and the whole multitude stood on the shore .
text2: Xquimulij cˈu quib qˈuia winak rucˈ , je riˈ chi xoc bi ri Areˈ pa jun barco , xtˈuyi cˈu chupam . Conojel ri winak xecanaj can cho ri ulew chuchiˈ ri mar .

text: And he spake many things unto them in parables , saying , Behold , a sower went forth to sow ;
text2: Xeucoj cˈu tak cˈutbal che qui tijoxic ri winak chquij qˈuia u wäch tak noˈj , xubij chque : Xel bi jun ticol ijaˈ cho rachoch , xeˈ chubanic u ticoˈn , ― xcha chque .

text: And when he sowed , some seeds fell by the way side , and the fowls came and devoured them up :
text2: Aretak tajin cujopij ri ijaˈ , xkaj jubikˈ ri ijaˈ pa ri be . Xeopan cˈu ri chicop ajuwocaj . Querapapic xekajic , xa xquitij bi ri ijaˈ .

text: Some fell upon stony places , where they had not much earth : and forthwith they sprung up , because they had no deepness of earth :
text2: Xkaj chi jubikˈ xol tak ri abaj , ri man cˈo tä wi qˈuia ulew . Chanim cˈut xqˈuiy ri jubikˈ ijaˈ riˈ rumal chi man pim tä ri ulew .

text: And when the sun was up , they were scorched ; and because they had no root , they withered away .
text2: Aretak cˈut xel lok ri kˈij , xecˈat ri alaj tak ticoˈn rumal , xechakiˈjic rumal chi man kas tä cˈu cˈo qui xeraˈ .

text: And some fell among thorns ; and the thorns sprung up , and choked them :
text2: Xkaj chi cˈu jubikˈ ri ijaˈ pa tak ri kˈayes ri cˈo qui qˈuixol . Xeqˈuiy cˈu ri kˈayes , xequijikˈisaj ri ticoˈn .

text: But other fell into good ground , and brought forth fruit , some an hundredfold , some sixtyfold , some thirtyfold .
text2: Are cˈu ri niqˈuiaj ijaˈ chic xekaj pa utzalaj ulew . Sibalaj xewächinic . E cˈo jujun ticoˈn xquiya jujun ciento qui wäch pa tak ri qui jolom ri trico chquijujunal , e cˈo cˈu juleˈ chic xquiya oxcˈal qui wäch pa tak ri jujun qui jolom . Ri niqˈuiaj ticoˈn chic xquiya juwinak lajuj qui wäch chquijujunal , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ri winak .

text: Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: We ri ix quijiquiba ri iwanimaˈ chutatabexic ri nu tzij , ¡ chitatabej baˈ ! ― xcha chque .

text: And the disciples came , and said unto him , Why speakest thou unto them in parables ?
text2: Ru tijoxelab ri Jesús xekeb rucˈ , xquitaˈ che : ¿ Jas che cucˈ tak cˈutbal quetzijobej la ri winak ? ― xecha che .

text: He answered and said unto them , Because it is given unto you to know the mysteries of the kingdom of heaven , but to them it is not given .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij chque : Ri ix yoˈm chiwe rumal ri Dios ri retamaxic ri man quetam tä ri niqˈuiaj winak chic chrij ru takanic ri Dios pa qui wiˈ ri winak . Man yaˈtal tä cˈu chque ri e areˈ chi cäquichˈob waˈ .

text: For whosoever hath , to him shall be given , and he shall have more abundance : but whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken away even that he hath .
text2: Ri winak ri cˈo cˈo rucˈ , cäyiˈ chi na niqˈuiaj che rech cänimar ri cˈo rucˈ . Are cˈu ri winak ri man cˈo tä cˈo rucˈ , ri jubikˈ ri cˈo rucˈ quesax na che .

text: Therefore speak I to them in parables : because they seeing see not ; and hearing they hear not , neither do they understand .
text2: Rumal riˈ queintzijobej ri winak cucˈ tak cˈutbal , rumal chi pune jakal ri qui wakˈäch , man quecowin tä chuchˈobic ri cäquilo , jeˈ ta ne chi man quecaˈy taj . Pune cäquitatabej ri kas tzij , man cäquichˈob tä riˈ ri qui tatabem . Jeˈ ta ne chi man cäquita tä ri quinbij .

text: And in them is fulfilled the prophecy of Esaias , which saith , By hearing ye shall hear , and shall not understand ; and seeing ye shall see , and shall not perceive :
text2: Are cˈu jeˈ cäbantaj na waˈ cucˈ ri e areˈ jas ri xubij ri ka mam Isaías ri kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios : Ri ix , pune quitatabej ri kas tzij , man quichˈob taj . Pune quixcaˈyic , man quichˈob tä ri quiwilo .

text: For this people ' s heart is waxed gross , and their ears are dull of hearing , and their eyes they have closed ; lest at any time they should see with their eyes , and hear with their ears , and should understand with their heart , and should be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Je riˈ , rumal chi abajarinak ri canimaˈ we winak riˈ . Man utz tä quetow tzij . Qui tzˈapim cˈu ri qui wakˈäch rech man quecaˈy taj . Jeˈ u banom ri canimaˈ rech man cäquita taj , rech man cäkaj tä ri nu tzij pa canimaˈ , rech man quinquitzucuj taj rech queincunaj ,

text: But blessed are your eyes , for they see : and your ears , for they hear .
text2: ― xcha ri Dios chuchiˈ ri kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab . Are cˈu ri iwe ix , sibalaj utz iwe , rumal chi tajin quiwil ri tajin quinbano , tajin quita ri tajin quinbij .

text: For verily I say unto you , That many prophets and righteous men have desired to see those things which ye see , and have not seen them ; and to hear those things which ye hear , and have not heard them .
text2: Kas tzij quinbij chiwe chi e qˈuia kˈalajisal tak re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios , xukujeˈ e qˈuia utzalaj tak winak xcaj xquilo jas ri tajin quiwil ix cämic , man xquil tä cˈut . Xcaj xquita jas ri tajin quita ix cämic , man xquita tä cˈut , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ru tijoxelab .

text: Hear ye therefore the parable of the sower .
text2: Chitatabej baˈ jas quel cubij ri cˈutbal chrij ri ticol ijaˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: When any one heareth the word of the kingdom , and understandeth it not , then cometh the wicked one , and catcheth away that which was sown in his heart . This is he which received seed by the way side .
text2: Ri ijaˈ ri xekaj pa ri be , e are waˈ jas ri winak ri cäquitatabej ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios chrij ru takanic ri Dios pa qui wiˈ ri winak , man cäquichˈob tä cˈut . Chanim cäpe ri Itzel , cäresaj cˈu bi ri tzij ri xkaj pa canimaˈ .

text: But he that received the seed into stony places , the same is he that heareth the word , and anon with joy receiveth it ;
text2: Ri ijaˈ ri xekaj xol tak ri abaj , e are waˈ jas ri winak ri cäquita ru Tzij ri Dios rucˈ quicotemal , jeˈl cäquito .

text: Yet hath he not root in himself , but dureth for a while : for when tribulation or persecution ariseth because of the word , by and by he is offended .
text2: Rumal cˈut chi man kas tä cˈo ri qui xeraˈ , xa quieb oxib kˈij cäquichˈijo . Aretak cˈut cäquichaplej u rikic cˈäx , craj queyokˈic rumal rech ru Tzij ri Dios , chanim quetzak canok .

text: He also that received seed among the thorns is he that heareth the word ; and the care of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , choke the word , and he becometh unfruitful .
text2: Ri ijaˈ ri xekaj pa tak ri kˈayes ri cˈo qui qˈuixol , e are waˈ jas ri winak ri cäquita ru Tzij ri Dios , are cˈu cäquilij na ri jastak rech we uwächulew riˈ , quesubtaj rumal ri kˈinomal . Are cˈu waˈ cäjikˈisan ru Tzij ri Dios , man cäwächin tä cˈu riˈ pa ri canimaˈ .

text: But he that received seed into the good ground is he that heareth the word , and understandeth it ; which also beareth fruit , and bringeth forth , some an hundredfold , some sixty , some thirty .
text2: Are cˈu ri ijaˈ ri xekaj pa utzalaj ulew , e are waˈ jas ri winak ri cäquita ru Tzij ri Dios , cäquichˈobo . Cäquiya cˈu qˈuia qui wäch . E jeˈ jas ri ijaˈ ri xquiya jujun ciento qui wäch chquijujunal , niqˈuiaj chic e jeˈ jas ri ijaˈ ri xquiya oxcˈal qui wäch chquijujunal , jujun chic e jeˈ jas ri ijaˈ ri xquiya juwinak lajuj qui wäch chquijujunal , ― xcha chque .

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is likened unto a man which sowed good seed in his field :
text2: Ri Jesús xucoj jun cˈutbal chic chquiwäch : Ru takanic ri Dios pa qui wiˈ ri winak , are junam rucˈ jun achi ri xutic utzalaj ijaˈ pa ri rulew .

text: But while men slept , his enemy came and sowed tares among the wheat , and went his way .
text2: Xpe cˈu jun u cˈulel ri ajchakˈel ri ticoˈn . Aretak conojel tajin quewaric , xoc bi pa ri ulew , xutica cˈu can itzel tak kˈayes xol tak ri trico . Te cˈu riˈ xeˈc .

text: But when the blade was sprung up , and brought forth fruit , then appeared the tares also .
text2: Aretak xqˈuiy ri trico , xechomakir ru jolom , xukujeˈ xeqˈuiy ri itzel tak kˈayes .

text: So the servants of the householder came and said unto him , Sir , didst not thou sow good seed in thy field ? from whence then hath it tares ?
text2: Xebeˈ cˈu ri ajchaquib , xequibij che ri qui patrón : “ Tat , we kas utz ri ijaˈ ri xtic la , ¿ jawijeˈ cˈut xpe wi waˈ we itzel kˈayes riˈ ? ” ― xecha che .

text: He said unto them , An enemy hath done this . The servants said unto him , Wilt thou then that we go and gather them up ?
text2: Xubij cˈu ri patrón chque : “ Xa cˈo jun nu cˈulel xbanow waˈ , ” ― xcha chque . Ri ajchaquib xquibij che ri qui patrón : “ ¿ A caj la chi quekabok ri itzel tak kˈayes ? ” ― xecha che .

text: But he said , Nay ; lest while ye gather up the tares , ye root up also the wheat with them .
text2: Ri patrón xubij chque : “ Man utz tä riˈ we jeˈ quibano , rumal chi we ne quibok bi ri trico junam rucˈ ri itzel kˈayes .

text: Let both grow together until the harvest : and in the time of harvest I will say to the reapers , Gather ye together first the tares , and bind them in bundles to burn them : but gather the wheat into my barn .
text2: Cheqˈuiy na ri itzel tak kˈayes junam rucˈ ri trico , chiweyej na cˈä curik ri kˈatoj . Queintak cˈu na bi ri ajchaquib rech nabe cäquimol ri itzel tak kˈayes , cäquixim pa tak yataj , te cˈu riˈ cäquiporoj . Are cˈu ri trico cäquicˈol na pa ri nu cˈuja , ” ― xcha chque .

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is like to a grain of mustard seed , which a man took , and sowed in his field :
text2: Ri Jesús xucoj chi jun cˈutbal chquiwäch , xubij : Ru takanic ri Dios pa qui wiˈ ri winak , junam waˈ rucˈ ri ijaˈ re ri ticoˈn ri cäbix “ mostaza ” che , ri cutic jun achi pa ri rulew .

text: Which indeed is the least of all seeds : but when it is grown , it is the greatest among herbs , and becometh a tree , so that the birds of the air come and lodge in the branches thereof .
text2: Kas tzij ri ijaˈ riˈ are ri sibalaj nitzˈ na chquiwäch conojel tak u wäch ijaˈ . Aretak cˈut cäqˈuiyic , are nim na queˈ chquiwäch conojel tak ri ticoˈn . Cuban jun nimalaj cheˈ , je riˈ chi ri chicop ajuwocaj cäcaˈn ri qui soc xol tak ru kˈab , quemuˈjan chupam , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: Another parable spake he unto them ; The kingdom of heaven is like unto leaven , which a woman took , and hid in three measures of meal , till the whole was leavened .
text2: Ri Jesús xucoj chi jun cˈutbal chquiwäch , xubij : Ru takanic ri Dios pa qui wiˈ ri winak , are jeˈ jas ri chˈäm ri cuya jun ixok rucˈ oxib pajbal cˈäj , rech cuqˈuiyisaj ronojel ri kˈor re caxlan wa , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: All these things spake Jesus unto the multitude in parables ; and without a parable spake he not unto them :
text2: Ronojel waˈ we tzij riˈ xubij ri Jesús chque ri winak cucˈ tak cˈutbal . Xak xuwi cucˈ tak cˈutbal xeutzijobej ri winak .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying , I will open my mouth in parables ; I will utter things which have been kept secret from the foundation of the world .
text2: Jeˈ xbantaj waˈ rech kas jeˈ quel wi jas ri xubij ri kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtal canok : Quintzijon na cucˈ tak cˈutbal , quinbij na ri man etamtal taj tzaretak ri Dios xuban ri cajulew ,

text: Then Jesus sent the multitude away , and went into the house : and his disciples came unto him , saying , Declare unto us the parable of the tares of the field .
text2: ― xcha riˈ . Xtäni cˈu ri Jesús che ru tzij , xeutak bi ri winak cho tak ri cachoch , ri Areˈ cˈut xoc pa ja . Are cˈu ri tijoxelab xquirik quib rucˈ , xquibij che : Bij la chke jas quel cubij ri cˈutbal chrij ri itzel kˈayes ri xtic can pa ri ulew , ― xecha che .

text: He answered and said unto them , He that soweth the good seed is the Son of man ;
text2: Ri Jesús xubij chque : Ri cäticow ri utzalaj ijaˈ , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak .

text: The field is the world ; the good seed are the children of the kingdom ; but the tares are the children of the wicked one ;
text2: Ri ulew are ronojel ruwächulew . Ri utzalaj ijaˈ e are waˈ ri winak ri cätakan ri Dios pa qui wiˈ . Ri itzel kˈayes e are waˈ ri winak ri e rech ri itzel .

text: The enemy that sowed them is the devil ; the harvest is the end of the world ; and the reapers are the angels .
text2: Ri cˈulel ri xticow ri itzel kˈayes , are ri Itzel waˈ . Ri kˈatoj quel cubij ri qˈuisbal re ruwächulew aretak cäqˈuis ronojel . Ri quebanow ri kˈatoj e areˈ ri ángeles .

text: As therefore the tares are gathered and burned in the fire ; so shall it be in the end of this world .
text2: Jeˈ jas ri cäban che ri itzel kˈayes , cämolic , cäqˈuiäk pa ri kˈakˈ , are cˈu jeˈ cäban na pa ri qˈuisbal re ruwächulew .

text: The Son of man shall send forth his angels , and they shall gather out of his kingdom all things that offend , and them which do iniquity ;
text2: Ri in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , queintak na lok ri nu ángeles che qui molic conojel ri winak ri quequitakchiˈj niqˈuiaj winak chic che mac , xukujeˈ ri banal tak etzelal .

text: And shall cast them into a furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Quequiqˈuiäk cˈu na bi pa ri nimalaj kˈakˈ , jawijeˈ quebokˈ wi na , cäquikuchˈuchˈej na ri qui ware .

text: Then shall the righteous shine forth as the sun in the kingdom of their Father . Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Are cˈu ri cäcaˈn ri craj ri Dios , queopan na jawijeˈ ri cätakan wi ri ka Tat chilaˈ chicaj . Quejuluw na jeˈ jas ri kˈij . We quijiquiba ri iwanimaˈ chutatabexic ri quinbij , ¡ chitatabej baˈ ! ― xcha ri Jesús chque ru tijoxelab .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto treasure hid in a field ; the which when a man hath found , he hideth , and for joy thereof goeth and selleth all that he hath , and buyeth that field .
text2: Ru takanic ri Dios pa qui wiˈ ri winak , quinjunamaj rucˈ jun coxon puak ri muktalic . Cäriktaj cˈu ri puak rumal jun achi . Ri areˈ cumuk chi cˈu can jumul chic chilaˈ . Rumal ru quicotemal queˈc , cuqˈuiyij ronojel ri jastak re , culokˈ ri ulew , ― cächaˈ .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a merchant man , seeking goodly pearls :
text2: Xukujeˈ quinjunamaj ru takanic ri Dios rucˈ jun ajcˈay ri cutzucuj jeˈlalaj tak abaj ri quejuluwic .

text: Who , when he had found one pearl of great price , went and sold all that he had , and bought it .
text2: Aretak curik jun ri sibalaj pakal rajil , queˈc , cuqˈuiyij ronojel ri jastak re , culokˈ ri perla ri xuriko , ― cächaˈ .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a net , that was cast into the sea , and gathered of every kind :
text2: Xukujeˈ quinjunamaj ru takanic ri Dios pa qui wiˈ ri winak rucˈ jun cˈat chapäbal cär ri cäqˈuiäk bi pa ri jaˈ , queboc cˈu ronojel qui wäch cär chupam .

text: Which , when it was full , they drew to shore , and sat down , and gathered the good into vessels , but cast the bad away .
text2: Aretak nojinak chi ri cˈat , quesax lok cumal ri chapal tak cär , cäquiya chuchiˈ ri jaˈ , te cˈu riˈ quetˈuyi che qui chaˈic ri cär . Ri utzalaj tak cär quequiya pa tak chicäch , are cˈu ri man e utz taj , quequiqˈuiäk can pa ri jaˈ , ― cächaˈ .

text: So shall it be at the end of the world : the angels shall come forth , and sever the wicked from among the just ,
text2: Are je waˈ cäbantaj na aretak cäqˈuis ruwächulew . Quepe ri ángeles che qui chaˈic ri utzalaj tak winak chquixol ri man e utz taj .

text: And shall cast them into the furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Ri man e utz taj quequiqˈuiäk na pa ri nimalaj kˈakˈ . Chilaˈ quebokˈ wi na , cäquikuchˈuchˈej na ri qui ware , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Have ye understood all these things ? They say unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: Ri Jesús xutaˈ chque ri winak , xubij : ¿ A quichˈob ronojel ri xinbij ? ― xcha chque . Cäkachˈobo , ― xecha che .

text: Then said he unto them , Therefore every scribe which is instructed unto the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which bringeth forth out of his treasure things new and old .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque : Aretak jun tijonel re ri Pixab craj cäretamaj ronojel chrij ru takanic ri Dios pa qui wiˈ ri winak , jeˈ u banic riˈ jas jun ajchakˈel ja ri cˈo qˈuia jastak re . Aretak rajwaxic ri kˈel che , cäresaj lok , cucojo . Aretak rajwaxic ri cˈacˈ che , cäresaj lok , cucojo , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these parables , he departed thence .
text2: Aretak xtoˈtaj ri Jesús che qui tijoxic ri winak cucˈ tak we cˈutbal riˈ , xel bi chilaˈ .

text: And when he was come into his own country , he taught them in their synagogue , insomuch that they were astonished , and said , Whence hath this man this wisdom , and these mighty works ?
text2: Xopan cˈu pa ri u tinimit ri Areˈ . Xuchaplej qui tijoxic ri winak pa ri rachoch Dios ri cˈo chilaˈ . Are cˈu ri winak sibalaj xquicajmaj waˈ , xquibij : ¿ Jawijeˈ xretamaj wi we achi riˈ we noˈj riˈ ? ¿ Jas lo cubano che qui banic ri nimak tak cajmabal ri tajin quebantaj rumal ? ― xechaˈ .

text: Is not this the carpenter ' s son ? is not his mother called Mary ? and his brethren , James , and Joses , and Simon , and Judas ?
text2: Are waˈ ru cˈojol ri tataˈ ri kolol cheˈ , ru nan cˈut are ri nan María . Catz ri a Jacobo , ri a José , ri a Simón , xukujeˈ ri a Judas .

text: And his sisters , are they not all with us ? Whence then hath this man all these things ?
text2: E cˈo cˈu ri ranab kucˈ waral xukujeˈ . ¿ Jawijeˈ cˈut xretamaj wi waˈ ronojel ri tajin cubano ? ― xechaˈ .

text: And they were offended in him . But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , save in his own country , and in his own house .
text2: Rumal riˈ ri winak xa tzel xquita ru tzij . Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque : Pa niqˈuiaj tinimit chic , nim quil wi ronojel kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios . Xak xuwi pa ru tinimit ri areˈ , xukujeˈ chquixol ri rachalal , xukujeˈ cho rachoch man nim tä quil wi , ― xcha chque .

text: And he did not many mighty works there because of their unbelief .
text2: Man xcowin tä cˈu ri Jesús chubanic qˈuia tak cajmabal chilaˈ rumal chi ri winak man xecojon tä che ri Areˈ .

text: At that time Herod the tetrarch heard of the fame of Jesus ,
text2: Pa tak ri kˈij riˈ ri tat Herodes , ri nim takanel pa Galilea , xretamaj ri tajin cuban ri Jesús .

text: And said unto his servants , This is John the Baptist ; he is risen from the dead ; and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: Xubij cˈu chque ri winak ri e cˈo rucˈ : Are ri Juan Kasal Jaˈ riˈ ri xcˈastaj lok chquixol ri cäminakib , rumal riˈ cäcowin ri areˈ chubanic qˈuia u wäch cajmabal , ― xcha ri tat Herodes chque .

text: For Herod had laid hold on John , and bound him , and put him in prison for Herodias ' sake , his brother Philip ' s wife .
text2: Tzare cˈu ri tat Herodes xtakan chuchapic ri tat Juan rech cäyutic , cäyiˈ pa cheˈ , xa rumal rech ri nan Herodías ri xcˈuli rucˈ areˈ pune are rixokil ri Felipe ru chakˈ .

text: For John said unto him , It is not lawful for thee to have her .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri tat Juan che ri tat Herodes : Man takal tä che la chi cäban ixokil la che ri rixokil ri chakˈ la , ― xcha che .

text: And when he would have put him to death , he feared the multitude , because they counted him as a prophet .
text2: Ri tat Herodes sibalaj craj cucämisaj ri tat Juan , cuxej cˈu rib chquiwäch ri winak . Je riˈ , rumal chi conojel quetam chi ri Juan Kasal Jaˈ , are jun kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios .

text: But when Herod ' s birthday was kept , the daughter of Herodias danced before them , and pleased Herod .
text2: Xurik cˈu ri nimakˈij re ri rocˈowisaxic u junab ri tat Herodes . Are cˈu ri ali ri ral ri nan Herodías xoc bi cucˈ , xuchap xojowem chquiwäch ri ulaˈ ri e cˈolic . Xkaj cˈu ri ali chuwäch ri tat Herodes .

text: Whereupon he promised with an oath to give her whatsoever she would ask .
text2: Sibalaj xkaj chuwäch , xuban cˈu juramento chi cuya che ri ali apachique ta ne ri craj ri areˈ .

text: And she , being before instructed of her mother , said , Give me here John Baptist ' s head in a charger .
text2: Ri ali cˈut cojom chi lok u cˈux rumal ru nan , xubij che ri tat Herodes : Cwaj chi cäya la chwe ru jolom ri Juan Kasal Jaˈ pa jun plato , ― xcha che .

text: And the king was sorry : nevertheless for the oath ' s sake , and them which sat with him at meat , he commanded it to be given her .
text2: Sibalaj cˈu xbison ri tat Herodes . Rumal cˈu rech chi xubij waˈ rucˈ juramento chquiwäch conojel ri rulaˈ chi cuya che ri ali apachique ri cutaˈ che , xtakan cˈu chuyaˈic waˈ che .

text: And he sent , and beheaded John in the prison .
text2: Xtakan che resaxic ru jolom ri Juan Kasal Jaˈ ri cˈo pa cheˈ .

text: And his head was brought in a charger , and given to the damsel : and she brought it to her mother .
text2: Xcˈam lok pa jun plato , xyiˈ cˈu che ri ali . Ri ali cˈut xuya che ru nan .

text: And his disciples came , and took up the body , and buried it , and went and told Jesus .
text2: Xeopan cˈu ru tijoxelab ri tat Juan , xquicˈam bi ru cuerpo , xequiya can pa jun mukubal . Xebeˈ cˈut , xequibij che ri Jesús .

text: When Jesus heard of it , he departed thence by ship into a desert place apart : and when the people had heard thereof , they followed him on foot out of the cities .
text2: Ri Jesús , aretak xuto jas ri xbantaj che ri tat Juan , xel bi chilaˈ u tuquiel , xoc pa jun barco , xeˈ cˈu jelaˈ jawijeˈ ri man cˈo tä wi winak . Xquetamaj cˈu ri winak chi ri Jesús benak jelaˈ . Xebel lok pa tak ri qui tinimit , xebeˈ cˈu chi cakan churikic ri Jesús .

text: And Jesus went forth , and saw a great multitude , and was moved with compassion toward them , and he healed their sick .
text2: Aretak xel lok ri Jesús pa ri barco , xeril ri qˈuialaj winak , xel cˈu u cˈux chque . Xeucunaj ri yawabib ri xquicˈam bi jelaˈ cucˈ .

text: And when it was evening , his disciples came to him , saying , This is a desert place , and the time is now past ; send the multitude away , that they may go into the villages , and buy themselves victuals .
text2: Kajem cˈu cuban ri kˈij , ru tijoxelab ri Jesús xekeb rucˈ , xquibij che : We juyub riˈ ri uj cˈo wi sibalaj cätzˈinowic , benak chi cˈu ri kˈij . Chetaka la bi ri winak rech quebeˈ pa ri alaj tak tinimit ri nakaj e cˈo wi , rech cäquilokˈ cˈu na ri qui wa , ― xecha che .

text: But Jesus said unto them , They need not depart ; give ye them to eat .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij chque : Man rajwaxic taj quebeˈc , xane xa chiya ix ri cäquitijo , ― xcha chque .

text: And they say unto him , We have here but five loaves , and two fishes .
text2: Xquibij cˈu ru tijoxelab che : Xa job caxlan wa rachiˈl quieb cär cˈo kucˈ , ― xecha che .

text: He said , Bring them hither to me .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij chque : Chicˈama lok chwe waral , ― xcha chque .

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the grass , and took the five loaves , and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed , and brake , and gave the loaves to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Xtakan cˈu ri Jesús chi quetˈuyi ri winak cho ri räxalaj uwosak . Ri Jesús xeucˈam cˈu ri job caxlan wa xukujeˈ ri quieb cär , xcaˈy chicaj , xeutewchij . Te cˈu riˈ xeupir ri caxlan wa , xeuya chque ri tijoxelab rech quequijach waˈ chquiwäch ri winak .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the fragments that remained twelve baskets full .
text2: Xewiˈ cˈu conojel , xenoj cˈut . Te cˈu riˈ xequicˈol ri chˈakatak ri xecanaj canok . Xuban cablajuj chicäch waˈ chi ronojel .

text: And they that had eaten were about five thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Craj are job mil achijab ri xewiˈc . Man xeajilax tä cˈu ri ixokib xukujeˈ ri acˈalab ( ri xukujeˈ xewiˈc ) .

text: And straightway Jesus constrained his disciples to get into a ship , and to go before him unto the other side , while he sent the multitudes away .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ ri Jesús xubij chque ru tijoxelab chi utz we queboc pa ri barco rech quebeˈc , quenabej apan chuwäch ri Areˈ rech queopan chˈäkäp che ri mar . Are cˈu ri Areˈ xcanaj na can cucˈ ri qˈuialaj winak che qui jachic bic .

text: And when he had sent the multitudes away , he went up into a mountain apart to pray : and when the evening was come , he was there alone .
text2: Aretak e jachtajinak chi bi ri winak rumal ri Jesús , xeˈ ri Areˈ puwiˈ ri juyub u tuquiel chubanic orar . Aretak xoc ri akˈab , ri Jesús u tuquiel cˈo chilaˈ .

text: But the ship was now in the midst of the sea , tossed with waves : for the wind was contrary .
text2: Are cˈu ri tijoxelab e cˈo chi pa ri barco puwiˈ ri jaˈ pu niqˈuiajal ri mar . Ri nimak tak uwojaˈ xupuqˈuij rib chrij ri barco , rumal chi xa chquiwäch petinak wi ri quiäkikˈ .

text: And in the fourth watch of the night Jesus went unto them , walking on the sea .
text2: Xa cˈu jubikˈ man cäsakiric aretak xopan ri Jesús cucˈ , tajin cäbin puwiˈ ri jaˈ .

text: And when the disciples saw him walking on the sea , they were troubled , saying , It is a spirit ; and they cried out for fear .
text2: Aretak ri tijoxelab xquilo chi cäbin ri Jesús puwiˈ ri jaˈ , xquixej quib . Rumal rech chi xquixej quib xquirak qui chiˈ , xquibij : ¡ Are jun xibinel waˈ ! ― xechaˈ .

text: But straightway Jesus spake unto them , saying , Be of good cheer ; it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Chanim ri Jesús xeuchˈabej , xubij chque : ¡ In waˈ , mixej iwib , chichajij animaˈ ! ― xcha chque .

text: And Peter answered him and said , Lord , if it be thou , bid me come unto thee on the water .
text2: Xchˈaw cˈu ri tat Pedro , xubij che : We lal riˈ , Tat , takan la chi quinbin puwiˈ ri jaˈ , rech quinopan ucˈ la , ― xcha che .

text: And he said , Come . And when Peter was come down out of the ship , he walked on the water , to go to Jesus .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij che : Tasaˈj baˈ , ― xcha ri Jesús che . Ri tat Pedro xel bi pa ri barco , xuchaplej binem puwiˈ ri jaˈ rech curika ri Jesús .

text: But when he saw the wind boisterous , he was afraid ; and beginning to sink , he cried , saying , Lord , save me .
text2: Aretak cˈut xrilo chi sibalaj cˈo u chukˈab ri quiäkikˈ , xuxej rib . Xeˈ ri rakan pa ri jaˈ , xurak u chiˈ , xubij che ri Jesús : ¡ Wajaw , chintoˈ la ! ― xcha che .

text: And immediately Jesus stretched forth his hand , and caught him , and said unto him , O thou of little faith , wherefore didst thou doubt ?
text2: Ri Jesús chanim xuchap che ru kˈab , xubij che : ¡ Tzij riˈ chi man kas tä catcojonic ! ¿ Jas che xuban quieb a cˈux ? ― xcha che .

text: And when they were come into the ship , the wind ceased .
text2: Aretak cˈut xpaki ri Jesús pa ri barco , xtäni ri quiäkikˈ .

text: Then they that were in the ship came and worshipped him , saying , Of a truth thou art the Son of God .
text2: Ri e cˈo pa ri barco xexuqui chuwäch ri Jesús , xquibij che : Kas tzij , lal riˈ ri u Cˈojol ri Dios , ― xecha che .

text: And when they were gone over , they came into the land of Gennesaret .
text2: Xekˈax pa ri mar , xeopan cˈu chuchiˈ ri ulew pa Genesaret .

text: And when the men of that place had knowledge of him , they sent out into all that country round about , and brought unto him all that were diseased ;
text2: Aretak ri winak ajchilaˈ xquichˈob u wäch ri Jesús , xquesaj u tzijol waˈ pa tak ri tinimit . Xequicˈam cˈu lok conojel ri yawabib jawijeˈ chiˈ cˈo wi ri Jesús .

text: And besought him that they might only touch the hem of his garment : and as many as touched were made perfectly whole .
text2: Xquibochiˈj ri Jesús chi xuwi ta ne cuya chque chi cäquichap cok ru chiˈ ru kˈuˈ . Conojel cˈu ri xechapowic , xeutziric .

text: Then came to Jesus scribes and Pharisees , which were of Jerusalem , saying ,
text2: Te riˈ jujun tataˈib fariseos xukujeˈ jujun chque ri tataˈib tijonelab re ri Pixab ri e petinak pa ri tinimit Jerusalén , xquimulij quib chrij ri Jesús , xquitaˈ che :

text: Why do thy disciples transgress the tradition of the elders ? for they wash not their hands when they eat bread .
text2: ¿ Jas che ri tijoxelab la man cäcaˈn taj jas ri e nakˈatal wi ri ka nan ka tat ojer ? Man cäcaˈn taj jas ri nakˈatal u banic . Are waˈ ru chˈajic ri rij ri qui kˈab aretak mäjaˈ quewiˈc , ― xecha che .

text: But he answered and said unto them , Why do ye also transgress the commandment of God by your tradition ?
text2: Xutaˈ cˈu ri Jesús chque : E ri alak , ¿ jas che yoˈm can alak ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ? Chuqˈuexwäch waˈ are jiquibam animaˈ alak chrij ri nakˈatal wi alak .

text: For God commanded , saying , Honour thy father and mother : and , He that curseth father or mother , let him die the death .
text2: Cubij cˈu ri Dios pa ri Lokˈ Pixab ri Tzˈibtalic : “ Nim cheawila wi ra nan a tat , ” ― cächaˈ . Xukujeˈ cubij : “ Jachin ri cuyokˈ ru nan u tat , tzrajwaxic wi riˈ cäcämisaxic , ” ― cächaˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: But ye say , Whosoever shall say to his father or his mother , It is a gift , by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me ;
text2: Ri alak cˈut cäbij alak chi xak xuwi rajwaxic cubij jun achi chque ru nan u tat : “ Ronojel ri quincowinic quincoj che toˈic alak , nu yoˈm cho ri Dios , ” ― cächaˈ .

text: And honour not his father or his mother , he shall be free . Thus have ye made the commandment of God of none effect by your tradition .
text2: We ri achi jeˈ cubij waˈ , man cäya tä alak che chi cˈo jas cuban che qui toˈic ru nan u tat . Je riˈ man nim tä chic quil wi alak ru Tzij ri Dios , man cˈo tä cˈu u patän ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios chuwäch alak rumal ru banic ri nakˈatal wi alak .

text: Ye hypocrites , well did Esaias prophesy of you , saying ,
text2: ¡ Xak quieb wäch alak ! Kas tzij ri xubij ri ka mam Isaías ri kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios chij alak aretak xutzˈibaj can we tzij riˈ ri cubij :

text: This people draweth nigh unto me with their mouth , and honoureth me with their lips ; but their heart is far from me .
text2: We winak riˈ xak chi qui chiˈ cäquinimarisaj nu kˈij , Man kas tä cäquijiquiba ri canimaˈ chwij ,

text: But in vain they do worship me , teaching for doctrines the commandments of men .
text2: ― xchaˈ . Xak lokˈ quekˈijilan chwe , xak cˈu qui takanic winak cäquiya che tijonic ,

text: And he called the multitude , and said unto them , Hear , and understand :
text2: ― xcha ri Dios chuchiˈ ri ka mam Isaías . Ri Jesús xeusiqˈuij ri winak rucˈ , xubij chque : Alak , onojel alak , tatabej alak ri nu tzij , chˈobo alak ri quinbij .

text: Not that which goeth into the mouth defileth a man ; but that which cometh out of the mouth , this defileth a man .
text2: Ri cutij ri winak , man are tä riˈ ri quetzelan u wäch ru cˈaslemal , xane xa are ri quel lok pu chiˈ ri winak are waˈ ri quetzelan u wäch ru cˈaslemal , ― xcha chque .

text: Then came his disciples , and said unto him , Knowest thou that the Pharisees were offended , after they heard this saying ?
text2: Xekeb cˈu ri tijoxelab rucˈ ri Jesús , xquibij che : ¿ A etam la chi ri tataˈib fariseos cˈäx xquinaˈ ri xbij la ? ― xecha che .

text: But he answered and said , Every plant , which my heavenly Father hath not planted , shall be rooted up .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij chque : Apachique u wäch ticoˈn ri man xtic tä rumal ri nu Tat ajchicaj , cäbok na apanok .

text: Let them alone : they be blind leaders of the blind . And if the blind lead the blind , both shall fall into the ditch .
text2: Xak jeˈ tak que laˈ ri fariseos . Ri e areˈ e jeˈ jas moyab ri cäquicˈam qui be niqˈuiaj moyab chic . We jun moy cucˈam u be jun moy chic , ri quieb riˈ quetzak na pa jun jul .

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Declare unto us this parable .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri tat Pedro che ri Jesús : Bij la chke jas quel cubij ri cˈutbal ri xcoj la , ― xcha che .

text: And Jesus said , Are ye also yet without understanding ?
text2: Ri Jesús xubij che : ¿ A mat lo quichˈob waˈ ri ix ? ― xcha che .

text: Do not ye yet understand , that whatsoever entereth in at the mouth goeth into the belly , and is cast out into the draught ?
text2: ¿ A mat iwetam chi ronojel ri cutij ri winak pa ri rixcoˈl queˈ wi , quel cˈu canok aretak cubana ru chul ? ― cächa chque .

text: But those things which proceed out of the mouth come forth from the heart ; and they defile the man .
text2: Are cˈu ri quel lok pu chiˈ ri winak , pa ranimaˈ riˈ quel wi lok . Are cˈu waˈ ri quetzelan u wäch ru cˈaslemal .

text: For out of the heart proceed evil thoughts , murders , adulteries , fornications , thefts , false witness , blasphemies :
text2: Je riˈ , rumal chi pa ranimaˈ ri winak quel wi lok ri itzel tak chomanic , ru banic cämisanic , ru banic ri nimalaj mac rucˈ ri rixokil jun winak chic , ru banic jas ri cäcaˈn ri tzˈiˈ ri xak cäquirik quib , man cˈo tä qui pixab , ru banic elakˈ , ru banic ri banow tzij , xukujeˈ ru yaquic tzij chrij jun winak chic .

text: These are the things which defile a man : but to eat with unwashen hands defileth not a man .
text2: E are waˈ we etzelal riˈ ri quetzelan u wäch ru cˈaslemal ri winak cho ri Dios . Are cˈu we jun winak man cuban tä ri nakˈatal u banic , man cuchˈaj tä ri rij ru kˈab aretak mäjaˈ cäwiˈc , man cäretzelaj tä ru cˈaslemal riˈ cho ri Dios , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ru tijoxelab .

text: Then Jesus went thence , and departed into the coasts of Tyre and Sidon .
text2: Xel bi ri Jesús chilaˈ , xeˈc , xopan pa Fenicia chunakaj ri tinimit Tiro , xukujeˈ ri tinimit Sidón .

text: And , behold , a woman of Canaan came out of the same coasts , and cried unto him , saying , Have mercy on me , O Lord , thou Son of David ; my daughter is grievously vexed with a devil .
text2: Xpe cˈu jun ixok aj Cananea ri cˈo chilaˈ , xopan rucˈ ri Jesús , xurak cˈu u chiˈ , xubij : ¡ Tat , lal riˈ ri rachalaxic can ri David , chel cˈux la chwe ! Ri wal ali cˈo jun itzel espíritu che , sibalaj curik cˈäx rumal , ― xcha che .

text: But he answered her not a word . And his disciples came and besought him , saying , Send her away ; for she crieth after us .
text2: Ri Jesús cˈut man cˈo tä jun tzij xubij che . Xepe cˈu ru tijoxelab ri Jesús , xquitaˈ tokˈob che , xquibij : Taka la bi ri chichuˈ rumal chi xak curak u chiˈ teren chkij , ― xecha che .

text: But he answered and said , I am not sent but unto the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque : Ri Dios in u takom lok xak xuwi cucˈ ri winak aj Israel , rumal chi ri e areˈ e jeˈ ta ne chij ri e sachinak , ― xcha chque .

text: Then came she and worshipped him , saying , Lord , help me .
text2: Xpe cˈu ri ixok , xkeb rucˈ ri Jesús , xxuqui chuwäch , xubij che : ¡ Tat , chintoˈ la ! ― xcha che .

text: But he answered and said , It is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it to dogs .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij che : Man utz tä ru chapic ri qui wa ri kas ralcˈual jun , cäqˈuiäk ta cˈu chquiwäch ri alaj tak tzˈiˈ , ― xcha che .

text: And she said , Truth , Lord : yet the dogs eat of the crumbs which fall from their masters ' table .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri ixok che : Jeˈ , Tat . Xukujeˈ ne ri alaj tak tzˈiˈ ri queboc pa ja , cäquitij ru xeˈr tak qui wa ri cajaw ri quetzak pulew , ― xcha che .

text: Then Jesus answered and said unto her , O woman , great is thy faith : be it unto thee even as thou wilt . And her daughter was made whole from that very hour .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij che ri ixok : ¡ Kas tzij baˈ chi nim ri cojonic la , nan ! Chbantaj ta baˈ jas ri caj la , ― xcha che . Tzare chiˈ cˈut xutzir ri ral ali .

text: And Jesus departed from thence , and came nigh unto the sea of Galilee ; and went up into a mountain , and sat down there .
text2: Xel bi ri Jesús chilaˈ , xocˈow chuchiˈ ri mar re Galilea . Te cˈu riˈ xpaki puwiˈ jun juyub , xtˈuyi cˈu chilaˈ .

text: And great multitudes came unto him , having with them those that were lame , blind , dumb , maimed , and many others , and cast them down at Jesus ' feet ; and he healed them :
text2: Xeopan cˈu qˈuia winak rucˈ cucˈam bi chˈocojib , moyab , memab , winak ri cˈäx u banom ri qui kˈab , xukujeˈ e qˈuia ri cˈo niqˈuiaj yabil chic chque . Xequiya chuwäch ri Jesús , ri Areˈ cˈut xeucunaj .
