text: Insomuch that the multitude wondered , when they saw the dumb to speak , the maimed to be whole , the lame to walk , and the blind to see : and they glorified the God of Israel .
text2: Ri winak sibalaj xquicajmaj aretak xquilo chi ri memab xechˈaw chic , ri cˈäx u banom qui kˈab xeutziric , ri chˈocojib xebin chic , ri moyab xecaˈy chic . Xquichap cˈu u nimarisaxic u kˈij ri Dios aj Israel .

text: Then Jesus called his disciples unto him , and said , I have compassion on the multitude , because they continue with me now three days , and have nothing to eat : and I will not send them away fasting , lest they faint in the way .
text2: Ri Jesús xeusiqˈuij ru tijoxelab , xubij chque : Quel nu cˈux chque ri winak rumal chi oxib kˈij chi waˈ e cˈo wucˈ , man cˈo tä cˈu jas cäquitijo . Man cwaj taj queintak bi cho tak cachoch mäjaˈ cˈu quewiˈc , quetzak ta cˈu ne pa tak ri be , ― xcha chque .

text: And his disciples say unto him , Whence should we have so much bread in the wilderness , as to fill so great a multitude ?
text2: Ru tijoxelab xechˈawic , xquibij che : ¿ Jawijeˈ ta cˈu lo cäkarik wi ri wa ri cäkaya chque we qˈuialaj winak riˈ waral pa we juyub riˈ ri cätzˈinowic ? ― xecha che .

text: And Jesus saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? And they said , Seven , and a few little fishes .
text2: Xutaˈ cˈu ri Jesús chque : ¿ Janipaˈ caxlan wa cˈo iwucˈ ? ― xcha chque . Ri e areˈ xquibij : Wukub caxlan wa , rachiˈl quieb oxib alaj tak cär , ― xecha che .

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the ground .
text2: Xtakan cˈu ri Jesús chque ri qˈuialaj winak chi quecuˈbi pulew .

text: And he took the seven loaves and the fishes , and gave thanks , and brake them , and gave to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ xeucˈam ri wukub caxlan wa , xukujeˈ ri alaj tak cär , xmaltioxinic . Xeupiro , xeuya chque ru tijoxelab rech cäquijach waˈ chquiwäch ri winak . Je cˈu riˈ xcaˈno .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets full .
text2: Xewiˈ cˈu conojel ri winak , xenojic . Xequimulij cˈu ri chˈakatak tak wa ri xecanaj canok . Ronojel waˈ xuban wukub chicäch wa .

text: And they that did eat were four thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: E quiejeb mil achijab cˈut ri xewiˈc . Man xecajilaj tä cˈu ri ixokib xukujeˈ ri acˈalab ( ri xukujeˈ xewiˈc ) .

text: And he sent away the multitude , and took ship , and came into the coasts of Magdala ,
text2: Te cˈu riˈ ri Jesús xeujach bi ri winak rech quebeˈ cho tak cachoch . Ri Areˈ xoc bi pa ri barco , xeˈ pa ri tinimit Magdala .

text: The Pharisees also with the Sadducees came , and tempting desired him that he would shew them a sign from heaven .
text2: Ri tataˈib fariseos xukujeˈ ri tataˈib saduceos xeopan rucˈ ri Jesús . Te cˈu riˈ xquitaˈ che chi cucˈut chquiwäch jun cajmabal etal ri cäpe chicaj . Xquibij waˈ che xak rech cäkaj ri Jesús pa qui kˈab .

text: He answered and said unto them , When it is evening , ye say , It will be fair weather : for the sky is red .
text2: Xchˈaw cˈu ri Jesús , xubij chque : Pa benak tak kˈij cäbij alak : “ Sakˈij waˈ cubano rumal chi quiäk ri uwocaj , ” ― cächa alak .

text: And in the morning , It will be foul weather to day : for the sky is red and lowring . O ye hypocrites , ye can discern the face of the sky ; but can ye not discern the signs of the times ?
text2: Are cˈu ri akˈabil cäbij alak : “ Cämic cäpe jäb rumal chi quiäk ri uwocaj , xukujeˈ kˈekmuj , ” ― cächa alak . ¡ Ri alak xak quieb wäch alak ! Cäcowin alak chuchˈobic ri u wäch ri caj , man cächˈob tä cˈu alak jas ri tajin cucˈut ri Dios chuwäch alak pa tak we kˈij junab riˈ .

text: A wicked and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given unto it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas . And he left them , and departed .
text2: We winak riˈ ri e lawalo , ri man jicom tä canimaˈ , cäcaj chi quinban jun cajmabal etal chquiwäch . Man cäyiˈ tä chi cˈu na jun etal chque , xane are quinnaˈtaj chque ri etal rech ri Jonás , ― xcha chque . Ri Jesús xeuya can waˈ we achijab riˈ , xeˈc .

text: And when his disciples were come to the other side , they had forgotten to take bread .
text2: Aretak xekˈax ru tijoxelab ri Jesús chˈäkäp che ri mar , xsach pa qui jolom ru cˈamic bi qui wa .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Take heed and beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque : ¡ Chitampeˈ ! Chichajij iwib chuwäch ri qui chˈamil ri tataˈib fariseos xukujeˈ chuwäch ri qui chˈamil ri tataˈib saduceos , ― xcha chque .

text: And they reasoned among themselves , saying , It is because we have taken no bread .
text2: Xquitzijobela cˈu quib ri tijoxelab , xquibij : Ri Areˈ cubij waˈ chke rumal chi man cˈo tä ka wa ka cˈamom lok , ― xechaˈ .

text: Which when Jesus perceived , he said unto them , O ye of little faith , why reason ye among yourselves , because ye have brought no bread ?
text2: Aretak ri Jesús xretamaj jas ri tajin cäquibij , xubij chque : ¿ Jas che tajin quibij chi man cˈo tä i wa ? ¡ Tzij riˈ chi xa man kas tä quixcojonic ! ― xcha chque .

text: Do ye not yet understand , neither remember the five loaves of the five thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: ¿ A xak are mäjaˈ quichˈobo , man cänaˈtaj tä chiwe chi xinpir ri job caxlan wa , xinjach cˈu waˈ chquiwäch ri job mil winak ? ¿ A mat cänaˈtaj chiwe janipaˈ chicäch chˈakatak tak caxlan wa ri man xeqˈuis taj ri xeicˈolo ?

text: Neither the seven loaves of the four thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: ¿ A mat cˈu cänaˈtaj chiwe xukujeˈ chi xinpir ri wukub caxlan wa , xinjach cˈu waˈ chquiwäch quiejeb mil winak , janipaˈ chicäch chˈakatak tak caxlan wa ri man xeqˈuis taj ri xeicˈolo ?

text: How is it that ye do not understand that I spake it not to you concerning bread , that ye should beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees ?
text2: ¿ Jas che man quichˈob taj chi ri in man are tä tajin quinbij ri caxlan wa aretak xinbij chi quichajij iwib chuwäch ri qui chˈamil ri tataˈib fariseos xukujeˈ ri tataˈib saduceos ? ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: Then understood they how that he bade them not beware of the leaven of bread , but of the doctrine of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ ri tijoxelab xquichˈobo chi ri Jesús man are tä xubij chque chi cäquichajij quib chuwäch ri chˈäm re caxlan wa , xane chuwäch ri qui tijonic ri tataˈib fariseos xukujeˈ ri tataˈib saduceos .

text: When Jesus came into the coasts of Caesarea Philippi , he asked his disciples , saying , Whom do men say that I the Son of man am ?
text2: Aretak ri Jesús tajin cänakajin che ri tinimit Cesarea Filipo , xutaˈ chque ru tijoxelab , xubij chque : ¿ Jas cäquibij ri winak chwij chi jachin ri in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak ? ― xcha chque .

text: And they said , Some say that thou art John the Baptist : some , Elias ; and others , Jeremias , or one of the prophets .
text2: Xquibij cˈu che : E cˈo jujun winak cäquibij chi lal riˈ ri Juan Kasal Jaˈ , xukujeˈ cäquibij juleˈ chic chi lal riˈ ri ka mam Elías . E cˈo chi niqˈuiaj cäquibij chi lal riˈ ri ka mam Jeremías o jun chic chque ri ojer kˈalajisal tak re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios , ― xecha che .

text: He saith unto them , But whom say ye that I am ?
text2: Xutaˈ cˈu ri Jesús chque : E cˈu ri ix , ¿ jachin ri in ri quibij ix ? ― xcha chque .

text: And Simon Peter answered and said , Thou art the Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Xchˈaw ri tat Pedro , xubij che : Lal riˈ ri Cristo , ru Cˈojol ri cˈaslic Dios , ― xcha che .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , Blessed art thou , Simon Barjona : for flesh and blood hath not revealed it unto thee , but my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij che : Utz awe , Simón , u cˈojol ri tat Jonás , rumal chi man are tä jun winak ri xbin waˈ chawe , xane are ri nu Tat ri cˈo chilaˈ chicaj .

text: And I say also unto thee , That thou art Peter , and upon this rock I will build my church ; and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it .
text2: Ri in quinbij chawe chi ri at , at Pedro . Puwiˈ cˈu we nimalaj abaj riˈ queinjekba wi na ri winak ri quecojon chwe . Man cäcowin tä cˈu na ri cämical chusachic qui wäch , ― xcha che .

text: And I will give unto thee the keys of the kingdom of heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: Queinya chawe ri lawe re ri cˈolibal ri takan wi ri Dios . Jachique ri cakˈalajisaj chi man utz tä u banic cho ruwächulew , man utz tä u banic riˈ chilaˈ chicaj . Jachique ri cakˈalajisaj chi utz u banic cho ruwächulew , utz u banic riˈ chilaˈ chicaj .

text: Then charged he his disciples that they should tell no man that he was Jesus the Christ .
text2: Ri Jesús cˈut xeupixbaj ru tijoxelab , xubij chque chi mäquitzijoj waˈ che jachin jun chi ri Areˈ are ri Cristo .

text: From that time forth began Jesus to shew unto his disciples , how that he must go unto Jerusalem , and suffer many things of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be killed , and be raised again the third day .
text2: Tzare chiˈ cˈut ri Jesús xuchaplej u kˈalajisaxic chquiwäch ru tijoxelab chi ri Areˈ rajwaxic queˈ na pa ri tinimit Jerusalén . Xubij chi cäban na sibalaj cˈäx che cumal ri qui nimakil ri winak , cumal ri qui nimakil ri sacerdotes , xukujeˈ cumal ri tijonelab re ri Pixab . Xukujeˈ rajwaxic chi cäcämisax na , te riˈ cäcˈastaj chi cˈu na churox kˈij chquixol ri cäminakib .

text: Then Peter took him , and began to rebuke him , saying , Be it far from thee , Lord : this shall not be unto thee .
text2: Are cˈu ri tat Pedro xucˈam bi ri Jesús u tuquiel wi . Xuchaplej u yajic , xubij che : ¡ Mat craj ri Dios waˈ , Wajaw ! ¡ Mat jeˈ cäcˈulmaj la waˈ ! ― xcha che .

text: But he turned , and said unto Peter , Get thee behind me , Satan : thou art an offence unto me : for thou savourest not the things that be of God , but those that be of men .
text2: Xutzolkˈomij cˈu rib ri Jesús , xubij che ri tat Pedro : ¡ Chatel chnuwäch , Satanás , xak at yaˈl latzˈ chwe ! Man cachˈob tä cˈu ru chomanic ri Dios , xane xak xuwi cachˈob ri qui chomanic winak , ― xcha che .

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
text2: Ri Jesús cˈut xubij chque ru tijoxelab : We cˈo jun craj cäpe wucˈ in , rajwaxic chi muban chic xak jas ri craj ri areˈ . Rajwaxic cutelej lok ru cruz , cäpe wucˈ in , ― xcha chque . ( Quel cubij waˈ chi ri winak riˈ man nim tä chic cäril ru cˈaslemal , xane cuya u tzij pune ta ne curik ri cämical rumal rech ri Jesús . )

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it : and whosoever will lose his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: Je riˈ , rumal chi apachin ta ne ri craj cutoˈ u wiˈ ru cˈaslemal cho ruwächulew , cäcäm na ri winak riˈ , cutzak na ronojel . Apachin cˈu ri cuya ru cˈaslemal pa ri cˈäx rumal wech in , cutoˈ na u wiˈ riˈ ri kas u cˈaslemal waˈ .

text: For what is a man profited , if he shall gain the whole world , and lose his own soul ? or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul ?
text2: ¿ Jas ta cˈu lo ri cuchˈac jun winak we cärechbej ronojel ruwächulew , cutzak cˈu na ri ranimaˈ ? ¿ Jas ta cˈu lo ri cäcowin ri winak chuyaˈic chuqˈuexwäch ri ranimaˈ ? ― xcha chque .

text: For the Son of man shall come in the glory of his Father with his angels ; and then he shall reward every man according to his works .
text2: Quinpe cˈu na in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , e wachiˈl ri lokˈalaj tak ángeles . Cänimarisax na nu kˈij jas ru nimarisaxic u kˈij ri nu Tat . Quinya cˈu na ri tojbal que ri winak chquijujunal jas ri xcaˈn ri e areˈ pa ri qui cˈaslemal .

text: Verily I say unto you , There be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the Son of man coming in his kingdom .
text2: Kas tzij quinbij chiwe chi e cˈo jujun chque ri e cˈo waral ri man quecäm tä na cˈä quinquil na in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , in petinak rech quintakan pa qui wiˈ ri winak , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ru tijoxelab .

text: And after six days Jesus taketh Peter , James , and John his brother , and bringeth them up into an high mountain apart ,
text2: Xqueˈ wakib kˈij u bim can ri Jesús waˈ , aretak xeucˈam bi ri tat Pedro , ri tat Jacobo , xukujeˈ ri tat Juan ru chakˈ ri tat Jacobo . Qui tuquiel wi xepaki puwiˈ jun nimalaj juyub .

text: And was transfigured before them : and his face did shine as the sun , and his raiment was white as the light .
text2: Xqˈuextaj cˈu ru cayebal ri Jesús chquiwäch . Ru palaj ri Jesús xjuluwic jeˈ jas ri kˈij . Ri ratzˈiak xuban sibalaj sakloloj jeˈ jas ri sakil .

text: And , behold , there appeared unto them Moses and Elias talking with him .
text2: Xak cˈu teˈtalic xquicˈut quib quieb achijab ri tajin quetzijon rucˈ ri Jesús . E areˈ ri ka mam Moisés rachiˈl ri ka mam Elías .

text: Then answered Peter , and said unto Jesus , Lord , it is good for us to be here : if thou wilt , let us make here three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias .
text2: Xchˈaw cˈu ri tat Pedro , xubij che ri Jesús : Kajaw , ¡ sibalaj utz chi uj cˈo waral ! We caj la , cäkaˈn na oxib moˈ , jun che la , jun che ri ka mam Moisés , jun chic che ri ka mam Elías , ― xcha che .

text: While he yet spake , behold , a bright cloud overshadowed them : and behold a voice out of the cloud , which said , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased ; hear ye him .
text2: Aretak tajin cätzijon ri tat Pedro , xkaj lok jun sakloloj sutzˈ chquij , xechˈuktaj cˈu rumal . Te cˈu riˈ xchˈaw lok Jun chupam ri sutzˈ , xubij : Are ri lokˈalaj nu Cˈojol waˈ , sibalaj cäquicot ri wanimaˈ rumal . Chitatabej baˈ ri cubij , ― xcha riˈ .

text: And when the disciples heard it , they fell on their face , and were sore afraid .
text2: Ri tijoxelab , aretak xquita waˈ , sibalaj xquixej quib . Xexuquiˈc xquikasaj ri qui palaj cho ri ulew .

text: And Jesus came and touched them , and said , Arise , and be not afraid .
text2: Are cˈu ri Jesús xkeb cucˈ , xeuchap cˈu kajok , xubij chque : Mixej baˈ iwib . Chixwalijok , ― xcha chque .

text: And when they had lifted up their eyes , they saw no man , save Jesus only .
text2: Ri e areˈ chanim xecaˈylobic . Man cˈo tä chi cˈu jachin xquilo , xane xak xuwi ri Jesús cˈo cucˈ .

text: And as they came down from the mountain , Jesus charged them , saying , Tell the vision to no man , until the Son of man be risen again from the dead .
text2: Kajem que lok cho ri juyub , ri Jesús xeupixbaj , xubij chque : Cˈo jachin mitzijoj wi ri iwilom cˈä quincˈastaj na chquixol ri cäminakib , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , ― xcha chque .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Why then say the scribes that Elias must first come ?
text2: Ri tijoxelab xquitaˈ che ri Jesús , xquibij che : ¿ Jas che cäquibij ri tijonelab re ri Pixab chi rajwaxic cäpe na ri ka mam Elías nabe ? ― xecha che .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Elias truly shall first come , and restore all things .
text2: Xchˈaw cˈu ri Jesús , xubij chque : Tzij riˈ chi cäpe ri ka mam Elías nabe , rech cuban na u banic ronojel .

text: But I say unto you , That Elias is come already , and they knew him not , but have done unto him whatsoever they listed . Likewise shall also the Son of man suffer of them .
text2: Ri in cˈut quinbij chiwe chi ya ulinak chic ri ka mam Elías . Ri winak cˈut man xquichˈob tä u wäch , xane xa xcaˈn che ri areˈ jas ri xcaj xcaˈno . Je cˈu riˈ xukujeˈ ri in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , quinrik na cˈäx pa qui kˈab , ― xcha chque .

text: Then the disciples understood that he spake unto them of John the Baptist .
text2: Xquichˈob cˈu ri tijoxelab chi ri tajin cubij ri Jesús chque , are ri Juan Kasal Jaˈ .

text: And when they were come to the multitude , there came to him a certain man , kneeling down to him , and saying ,
text2: Aretak cˈut xeopan chilaˈ jawijeˈ e cˈo wi ri qˈuialaj winak , xpe jun achi , xopan rucˈ ri Jesús , xxuqui cˈu chuwäch , xubij che :

text: Lord , have mercy on my son : for he is lunatick , and sore vexed : for ofttimes he falleth into the fire , and oft into the water .
text2: Tat , chel cˈux la che ri nu cˈojol , xa cˈo jun itzel espíritu che , sibalaj cˈu curik cˈäx rumal . Qˈuia mul cätzak pa ri kˈakˈ , pa ri jaˈ .

text: And I brought him to thy disciples , and they could not cure him .
text2: Xincˈam lok , xinya chquiwäch ri tijoxelab la , ri e areˈ cˈut man xecowin tä chucunaxic , ― xcha che ri Jesús .

text: Then Jesus answered and said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you ? how long shall I suffer you ? bring him hither to me .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij : ¡ Ay , ri alak winak ri man cäcojon tä alak che ri Dios ! ¡ Xak xuwi cäban alak jas ri caj alak ! ¿ A are lo caj alak chi xak tajin wi quincˈoji ucˈ alak ronojel kˈij ? ¿ A are lo caj alak chi xak quincuy alak ? Cˈama baˈ alak lok ri ala chnuwäch , ― xcha chque .

text: And Jesus rebuked the devil ; and he departed out of him : and the child was cured from that very hour .
text2: Ri Jesús cˈut xuyaj ri itzel espíritu ri cˈo che ri ala , xresaj bic . Tzare chiˈ xutzir ri ala , utz chi cˈu canok .

text: Then came the disciples to Jesus apart , and said , Why could not we cast him out ?
text2: Ru tijoxelab ri Jesús xquitaˈ che pa u tuquiel wi : ¿ Jas che ri uj man xujcowin tä che resaxic bi ri itzel espíritu riˈ ? ― xecha che .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Because of your unbelief : for verily I say unto you , If ye have faith as a grain of mustard seed , ye shall say unto this mountain , Remove hence to yonder place ; and it shall remove ; and nothing shall be impossible unto you .
text2: Xubij ri Jesús chque : Are waˈ rumal chi man kas tä cˈo ri i cojonic , ― xcha chque . Kas tzij quinbij chiwe chi we ta ri i cojonic jeˈ jas ri in nitzˈ ijaˈ re mostaza , quixcowin riˈ quibij che we juyub riˈ : “ ¡ Chatel bi chiˈ , jat jelaˈ ! ” ― quixcha che . Ri juyub quel na bic . Man cˈo tä ri mat quixcowin chubanic we ta kas tzij quixcojonic , ― xcha chque .

text: Howbeit this kind goeth not out but by prayer and fasting .
text2: Xak xuwi rucˈ ru banic orar , xukujeˈ rucˈ ru banic ayuno quel bi jun itzel espíritu ri jeˈ u banic waˈ , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ru tijoxelab .

text: And while they abode in Galilee , Jesus said unto them , The Son of man shall be betrayed into the hands of men :
text2: Aretak xetzelej bi cucˈ ri qˈuialaj winak , ri Jesús xubij chque ru tijoxelab : Ri in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , quinjach na pa qui kˈab ri winak .

text: And they shall kill him , and the third day he shall be raised again . And they were exceeding sorry .
text2: Quincämisax na , churox kˈij cˈut quincˈastaj na chquixol ri cäminakib , ― xcha chque . Aretak xquita waˈ ri tijoxelab , sibalaj xebisonic .

text: And when they were come to Capernaum , they that received tribute money came to Peter , and said , Doth not your master pay tribute ?
text2: Aretak ri Jesús cucˈ ru tijoxelab xeopan pa ri tinimit Capernaum , ri tokˈil tak alcabal re ri nimalaj rachoch Dios xeopan rucˈ ri tat Pedro , xquibij che : ¿ A mat cutoj re ri ajtij alak ri alcabal re ri nimalaj rachoch Dios ? ― xecha che .

text: He saith , Yes . And when he was come into the house , Jesus prevented him , saying , What thinkest thou , Simon ? of whom do the kings of the earth take custom or tribute ? of their own children , or of strangers ?
text2: Jeˈ , je riˈ , ― xcha ri tat Pedro chque . Aretak cˈut xoc bi ri tat Pedro pa ri ja , nabe xchˈaw ri Jesús , xubij che : Simón , ¿ jas cachomaj ? ¿ Jachin tak chque cäquitaˈ wi ri alcabal o ri cuchuj ri nimak tak takanelab rech ruwächulew ? ¿ A cäquitaˈ waˈ chque ri qui winakil o chque ri man qui winakil taj ? ― xcha che .

text: Peter saith unto him , Of strangers . Jesus saith unto him , Then are the children free .
text2: Ri tat Pedro xchˈawic , xubij che : Chque ri man qui winakil taj cäquitaˈ wi waˈ , ― xcha che . Ri Jesús xubij che : We je riˈ , ri winak ri quebel pa ri qui tinimit ri nimak tak takanelab man cˈo tä alcabal riˈ cäquitojo , ― xcha che .

text: Notwithstanding , lest we should offend them , go thou to the sea , and cast an hook , and take up the fish that first cometh up ; and when thou hast opened his mouth , thou shalt find a piece of money : that take , and give unto them for me and thee .
text2: Man cwaj tä cˈut chi quinyac royowal jachin jun winak . Rumal riˈ jat chuchiˈ ri mar , chaqˈuiäka bi ri anzuelo pa ri jaˈ . Chawesaj lok ri nabe cär ri cachapo , pu chiˈ cˈut cawesaj wi jun puak . Rucˈ ri puak riˈ catoj ri alcabal re ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , ri wech in xukujeˈ ri awech at . Chacˈama cˈu waˈ , cateˈ cˈut , catojo canok , ― xcha che .

text: At the same time came the disciples unto Jesus , saying , Who is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven ?
text2: Pa ri kˈij riˈ ri tijoxelab xquimulij quib rucˈ ri Jesús , xquitaˈ che : ¿ Jachin ri nim na u banic chilaˈ jawijeˈ ri cätakan wi ri Dios ? ― xecha che .

text: And Jesus called a little child unto him , and set him in the midst of them ,
text2: Ri Jesús xusiqˈuij apan jun alaj acˈal , xucˈamo , xutacˈaba chquiwäch ru tijoxelab .

text: And said , Verily I say unto you , Except ye be converted , and become as little children , ye shall not enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Xubij cˈu chque : Kas tzij quinbij chiwe . We ri ix man quiqˈuex tä ri iwanimaˈ , ri i chomanic , we man quiban iwe jas ri cäcaˈn ri acˈalab man cäcaˈn tä nimal , man quixopan tä riˈ chilaˈ jawijeˈ ri cätakan wi ri Dios , ― xcha chque .

text: Whosoever therefore shall humble himself as this little child , the same is greatest in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Je cˈu riˈ quinbij chiwe chi ri nim na u banic chilaˈ jawijeˈ ri cätakan wi ri Dios , are ri man nim tä cuban che rib , cuban cˈut jas we acˈal riˈ .

text: And whoso shall receive one such little child in my name receiveth me .
text2: Apachin ri cucˈulaj jun acˈal jas we acˈal riˈ rumal wech in , in riˈ quinucˈulaj , ― xcha chque .

text: But whoso shall offend one of these little ones which believe in me , it were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and that he were drowned in the depth of the sea .
text2: Apachin cˈu ri cubano chi jun chque we chˈutik riˈ ri quecojon chwe curik ri be ri man utz taj , are utz riˈ we ta cäxim jun caˈ re molino chukul ri winak riˈ , cäqˈuiäk ta cˈu bi pa ri mar .

text: Woe unto the world because of offences ! for it must needs be that offences come ; but woe to that man by whom the offence cometh !
text2: ¡ Sibalaj cˈäx chque ri winak cho ruwächulew chi cˈo jas ri cubano chi ri winak cäquirik ri be ri man utz taj ! Amakˈel cˈut cäquicˈulmaj waˈ . Sibalaj cˈäx cˈu re ri winak ri cubano chi jun winak chic curik ri be ri man utz taj .

text: Wherefore if thy hand or thy foot offend thee , cut them off , and cast them from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life halt or maimed , rather than having two hands or two feet to be cast into everlasting fire .
text2: Rumal riˈ , we ri a kˈab o ri awakan cubano chi ri at carik ri be ri man utz taj , chakˈataˈ , chaqˈuiäka apanok . Are utz na chawe we carik na ri kas cˈaslemal pune at cut o at chˈocoˈ , chuwäch ri cˈo quieb a kˈab o quieb awakan cateˈ pa ri cˈatic jawijeˈ cˈo wi ri kˈakˈ ri man cächuptaj taj .

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out , and cast it from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life with one eye , rather than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire .
text2: We are ri a wakˈäch cubano chi carik ri be ri man utz taj , chawesaj , chaqˈuiäka apanok . Are utz na chawe we carik na ri kas cˈaslemal pune xa jun ra wakˈäch cˈolic , chuwäch ri cˈo quieb a wakˈäch , catqˈuiäk bi pa ri nimalaj kˈakˈ , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: Take heed that ye despise not one of these little ones ; for I say unto you , That in heaven their angels do always behold the face of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Miwetzelaj baˈ qui wäch jun chque we chˈutik riˈ ri quecojon chwe . Quinbij cˈu chiwe chi ri e areˈ amakˈel ronojel kˈij cˈo ri qui ángeles chuwäch ri nu Tat chilaˈ chicaj .

text: For the Son of man is come to save that which was lost .
text2: Je riˈ , rumal chi ri in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , xinpe che qui toˈic ri winak ri e sachinak .

text: How think ye ? if a man have an hundred sheep , and one of them be gone astray , doth he not leave the ninety and nine , and goeth into the mountains , and seeketh that which is gone astray ?
text2: ¿ Jas quichomaj chrij ri quinbij na ? We cˈo jun achi ri cˈo jun ciento u chij , cätzak cˈu can jun chque , ¿ a mat queuya na can riˈ ri jumuchˈ belejlajuj pa ri juyub , queˈ cˈu chutzucuxic ri jun ri xtzak canok ? Jeˈ , je riˈ .

text: And if so be that he find it , verily I say unto you , he rejoiceth more of that sheep , than of the ninety and nine which went not astray .
text2: We curiko , sibalaj cäquicot na rucˈ . Nim na ru quicotemal rucˈ waˈ chuwäch ru quicotemal cucˈ ri jumuchˈ belejlajuj ri man xetzak taj .

text: Even so it is not the will of your Father which is in heaven , that one of these little ones should perish .
text2: Je cˈu riˈ ri i Tat ri cˈo chilaˈ chicaj man craj taj chi cätzak jun chque we chˈutik riˈ ri quecojon chwe .

text: Moreover if thy brother shall trespass against thee , go and tell him his fault between thee and him alone : if he shall hear thee , thou hast gained thy brother .
text2: We ri awachalal cuban jun cˈäx chawe , chattzijon rucˈ pa u tuquiel wi , chabij che jas ru mac . We cucoj rib chupam , xatcowin riˈ chuchˈaquic ra wachalal .

text: But if he will not hear thee , then take with thee one or two more , that in the mouth of two or three witnesses every word may be established .
text2: We cˈu ri awachalal man cucoj tä rib pa ru mac aretak cattzijon rucˈ , chasiqˈuij jun o quieb winak chic , rech ronojel ri quibij quetamax waˈ cumal quieb u oxib tal tak tzij .

text: And if he shall neglect to hear them , tell it unto the church : but if he neglect to hear the church , let him be unto thee as an heathen man and a publican .
text2: We cˈu man coc ri tzij pu jolom ri cäbix che cumal ri niqˈuiaj chic , cheasiqˈuij conojel ri niqˈuiaj kachalal . We cˈu man cuto jas ri cäquibij conojel ri kachalal , chabana che chi jeˈ jas jun winak ri man cäcojon tä che ri Dios o jun tokˈil alcabal .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever ye shall loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: Kas tzij quinbij chiwe chi jachique ri quikˈalajisaj chi man utz tä u banic cumal ri winak cho ruwächulew , man utz tä u banic riˈ chilaˈ chicaj . Jachique cˈu ri quikˈalajisaj chi utz u banic cumal ri winak waral cho ruwächulew , utz u banic riˈ chilaˈ chicaj .

text: Again I say unto you , That if two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask , it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Xukujeˈ quinbij chiwe chi we cˈo quieb chixol waral cho we uwächulew ri curik rib qui chomanic puwiˈ jun rajwaxic , cäcaˈn cˈu orar chutaˈic waˈ , ri ka Tat ri cˈo chilaˈ chicaj cuya na waˈ chque .

text: For where two or three are gathered together in my name , there am I in the midst of them .
text2: Je riˈ , rumal chi jawijeˈ ri qui mulim wi quib quieb oxib winak rumal chi quecojon chwe , cucˈ riˈ in cˈo wi , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ru tijoxelab .

text: Then came Peter to him , and said , Lord , how oft shall my brother sin against me , and I forgive him ? till seven times ?
text2: Xpe ri tat Pedro , xutaˈ cˈu che ri Jesús : Kajaw , we ri wachalal qˈuia mul cuban cˈäx chwe , ¿ janipaˈ mul rajwaxic quinsach u mac ? ¿ A craj ne wukub mul riˈ ? ― xcha che .

text: Jesus saith unto him , I say not unto thee , Until seven times : but , Until seventy times seven .
text2: Xchˈaw cˈu ri Jesús , xubij che : Man quinbij tä chawe chi xa wukub mul casach u mac , xane rajwaxic casach u mac wukub mul chic , wukub mul chic , cˈä copan na pa job ciento , ― xcha che .

text: Therefore is the kingdom of heaven likened unto a certain king , which would take account of his servants .
text2: Je riˈ , rumal chi ru takanic ri Dios pa qui wiˈ ri winak , are jeˈ jas jun kˈinom achi ri xeumulij ri rajchaquib , xuchap cˈu u taˈic we cˈo ri qui cˈas , o we ne cˈo u cˈas ri areˈ cucˈ .

text: And when he had begun to reckon , one was brought unto him , which owed him ten thousand talents .
text2: Aretak tajin cuchaplej rajilaxic ri qui cuenta chquijujunal , xcˈam lok jun ajchac ri u cˈas qˈuia mil quetzales .

text: But forasmuch as he had not to pay , his lord commanded him to be sold , and his wife , and children , and all that he had , and payment to be made .
text2: Are cˈu ri jun ajchac riˈ man cˈo tä cutojbej re ru cˈas . Ri patrón xtakanic chi cäqˈuiyix ri ajchac riˈ pu kˈab jun winak chic rech cäpatänin che , rachiˈl ri rixokil , ri ralcˈual , xukujeˈ conojel ri jastak re , rech cätojtaj ru cˈas .

text: The servant therefore fell down , and worshipped him , saying , Lord , have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: Are cˈu ri ajchac xxuqui chuwäch ru patrón , xbochiˈnic , xutaˈ tokˈob , xubij che : “ Tat , chajij la paciencia wucˈ , quintoj na ronojel ri nu cˈas , ” ― xcha che .

text: Then the lord of that servant was moved with compassion , and loosed him , and forgave him the debt .
text2: Ri patrón xutokˈobisaj u wäch ri rajchac , xusach u mac , xubij che chi man cutoj tä chi ru cˈas , xutzokopij cˈu bic .

text: But the same servant went out , and found one of his fellowservants , which owed him an hundred pence : and he laid hands on him , and took him by the throat , saying , Pay me that thou owest .
text2: Te riˈ ri ajchac ri xtzokopitaj bic , xurik jun rach ajchac ri u cˈas quieb oxib quetzal rucˈ . Xuchap ri rach ajchac chukul , xuchap u jitzˈaxic , xubij che : “ ¡ Chatojo ra cˈas wucˈ ! ” ― xcha che .

text: And his fellowservant fell down at his feet , and besought him , saying , Have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: Ri rach ajchac xxuqui chuwäch , xbochiˈnic , xutaˈ tokˈob che , xubij : “ Chachajij paciencia wucˈ , quintoj na ronojel ri nu cˈas , ” ― xcha che .

text: And he would not : but went and cast him into prison , till he should pay the debt .
text2: Ri areˈ cˈut man xusach tä u mac ri rach ajchac , xane xucoj pa cheˈ , xubij che chi rajwaxic cutoj na ru cˈas .

text: So when his fellowservants saw what was done , they were very sorry , and came and told unto their lord all that was done .
text2: Aretak xquil waˈ ri niqˈuiaj ajchaquib chic , sibalaj xebisonic . Xebeˈ cˈut , xequibij che ri qui patrón ronojel ri xbantajic .

text: Then his lord , after that he had called him , said unto him , O thou wicked servant , I forgave thee all that debt , because thou desiredst me :
text2: Xpe cˈu ri qui patrón , xtakan chusiqˈuixic ri ajchac riˈ , xubij che : “ ¡ Itzel ajchac ! Ri in xincuy ra cˈas rumal chi xataˈ tokˈob chwe .

text: Shouldest not thou also have had compassion on thy fellowservant , even as I had pity on thee ?
text2: Ri at xukujeˈ rajwaxic xatokˈobisaj ta u wäch ri awach ajchac , jas ri xinban in chawe xintokˈobisaj a wäch , ” ― xcha che .

text: And his lord was wroth , and delivered him to the tormentors , till he should pay all that was due unto him .
text2: ¡ Ru patrón cˈut , sibalaj xpe royowal ! Xtakanic chi cäcˈäjisax u wäch ri rajchac cˈä cutoj na ru cˈas .

text: So likewise shall my heavenly Father do also unto you , if ye from your hearts forgive not every one his brother their trespasses .
text2: Ri Jesús xuqˈuisbej re ru tzij , xubij : Jas ri xuban ri patrón che ri rajchac , are jeˈ cuban na ri nu Tat ri cˈo chilaˈ chicaj chiwe , we man kas quisach qui mac ri iwachalal , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these sayings , he departed from Galilee , and came into the coasts of Judaea beyond Jordan ;
text2: Aretak xtoˈtaj ri Jesús chubixic ronojel waˈ we tzij riˈ , xel bi pa Galilea , xeˈ pa tak ri tinimit re Judea , chˈäkäp che ri nimaˈ Jordán .

text: And great multitudes followed him ; and he healed them there .
text2: E qˈuia winak xeteri bi chrij , xeucunaj cˈu tak ri yawabib chilaˈ .

text: The Pharisees also came unto him , tempting him , and saying unto him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife for every cause ?
text2: Xeopan cˈu jujun tataˈib fariseos rucˈ ri Jesús , xquitaˈ che : ¿ A takal che jun achi cujach bi ri rixokil pune man kas cˈo u mac ? ― xecha che . Xquibij waˈ che xak rech cäkaj ri Jesús pa qui kˈab .

text: And he answered and said unto them , Have ye not read , that he which made them at the beginning made them male and female ,
text2: Xchˈaw cˈu ri Jesús , xubij chque : ¿ A mat siqˈuim alak pa ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic jas ri xuban ri Dios pa ru chaplexic lok ronojel , “ chi achi chi ixok xeubano ” ? ― cächaˈ .

text: And said , For this cause shall a man leave father and mother , and shall cleave to his wife : and they twain shall be one flesh ?
text2: Xukujeˈ cubij : “ Rumal waˈ jun achi cuya na can ru nan u tat , cätuni cˈu na rucˈ ri rixokil . Xa e jun chic ri quieb winak riˈ , ” ― cächaˈ .

text: Wherefore they are no more twain , but one flesh . What therefore God hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
text2: Je cˈu riˈ man e quieb tä chic , xane xa e jun chic . Rumal cˈu riˈ , jas ri xeutunuba ri Dios , mäjach qui wäch waˈ cumal ri winak , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ri tataˈib fariseos .

text: They say unto him , Why did Moses then command to give a writing of divorcement , and to put her away ?
text2: Xquibij cˈu ri tataˈib fariseos : ¿ Jas che ri ka mam Moisés xtakanic chi jun achi cuyaˈ cutzˈibaj jun wuj ri cubij wi chi cujach bi ri rixokil ? Je cˈu riˈ cuyaˈ cujach bi ri rixokil , ― xecha che .

text: He saith unto them , Moses because of the hardness of your hearts suffered you to put away your wives : but from the beginning it was not so .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij chque : Xa rumal chi sibalaj abajarinak ri animaˈ alak , are rumal riˈ xuya chech alak chi cuyaˈ cäjach bi alak ri ixokil alak . Man jeˈ tä cˈu waˈ aretak xchapletaj lok ronojel .

text: And I say unto you , Whosoever shall put away his wife , except it be for fornication , and shall marry another , committeth adultery : and whoso marrieth her which is put away doth commit adultery .
text2: Ri in cˈut quinbij chech alak chi apachin ri cujach bi ri rixokil , we man rumal ru chˈabexic jun achi chic , cäcˈuli chi cˈu na rucˈ jun ixok chic , ri achi riˈ cuban ri nimalaj mac ri äwas u banic chrij ri nabe rixokil . Ri achi cˈut ri cäcˈuli rucˈ jun ixok ri jachom canok cuban ri nimalaj mac riˈ , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ri tataˈib fariseos .

text: His disciples say unto him , If the case of the man be so with his wife , it is not good to marry .
text2: Xquibij cˈu ru tijoxelab ri Jesús che ri Areˈ : We jun achi man cuyaˈ taj cujach bi ri rixokil , are utz na riˈ chi man cäcˈuli taj , ― xecha che .

text: But he said unto them , All men cannot receive this saying , save they to whom it is given .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij chque : Man conojel tä winak cäquichˈij waˈ chi man quecˈuli taj , xane xak xuwi ri yoˈm chque rumal ri Dios chi cäquichˈijo .

text: For there are some eunuchs , which were so born from their mother ' s womb : and there are some eunuchs , which were made eunuchs of men : and there be eunuchs , which have made themselves eunuchs for the kingdom of heaven ' s sake . He that is able to receive it , let him receive it .
text2: Cˈo cˈu jas che jujun achijab man quecˈuli taj . E cˈo jujun xa tzquech wi man quecˈuli taj , e cˈo niqˈuiaj chic ri xa banom chque cumal ri achijab chi man quecˈuli taj , e cˈo cˈu niqˈuiaj chic cäquichˈijo man quecˈuli taj xa rumal chi cäcaj cäquipatänij ri Dios . Jachin ri cäcowinic jeˈ cuban waˈ , chubanaˈ , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ru tijoxelab .

text: Then were there brought unto him little children , that he should put his hands on them , and pray : and the disciples rebuked them .
text2: Ri winak xequicˈam lok ri acˈalab cho ri Jesús rech cuya ru kˈab pa qui wiˈ , rech xukujeˈ cuban orar pa qui wiˈ . Ri winak ri xequicˈam lok ri acˈalab xeyaj cumal ri tijoxelab .

text: But Jesus said , Suffer little children , and forbid them not , to come unto me : for of such is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Ri Jesús cˈut xubij chque : Chiya chque ri acˈalab chi quepe wucˈ , meikˈatej rumal chi ri winak ri cätakan ri Dios pa qui wiˈ e areˈ winak ri e jeˈ jas we acˈalab riˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: And he laid his hands on them , and departed thence .
text2: Xuya cˈu ru kˈab pa qui wiˈ ri acˈalab , te cˈu riˈ xel bi chilaˈ .

text: And , behold , one came and said unto him , Good Master , what good thing shall I do , that I may have eternal life ?
text2: Jun acˈal achi xopan rucˈ ri Jesús , xutaˈ che : Utzalaj Ajtij , ¿ jas u wäch utzil rajwaxic quinbano rech quinrik ri cˈaslemal ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic ? ― xcha che .

text: And he said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God : but if thou wilt enter into life , keep the commandments .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij che : ¿ Jas che cabij chwe chi utz ri in ? Man cˈo tä jun kas utz , xane xak xuwi ri Dios , ― xcha che . We cˈu cawaj carik ri cˈaslemal ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic , chanimaj ru takanic ri Dios , ― xcha che .

text: He saith unto him , Which ? Jesus said , Thou shalt do no murder , Thou shalt not commit adultery , Thou shalt not steal , Thou shalt not bear false witness ,
text2: Ri achi xubij che : ¿ Jachique tak riˈ ru takanic ri Dios ri rajwaxic quinniman chque ? ― xcha che . Ri Jesús xubij che : Matcämisanic , maban ri nimalaj mac ri äwas u banic rucˈ ri rixokil jun winak chic , maban ri elakˈ , maban tzij chrij jun winak chic .

text: Honour thy father and thy mother : and , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Nim cheawila wi ra nan a tat . Lokˈ cheawila wi ri awach winak jas ri at lokˈ cawil awib , ― xcha ri Jesús che ri achi .

text: The young man saith unto him , All these things have I kept from my youth up : what lack I yet ?
text2: Ri achi xubij che ri Jesús : Ronojel waˈ nu takem u banic tzaretak in acˈal na . ¿ Jas ta chi cˈu ri rajwaxic quinbano ? ― xcha che .

text: Jesus said unto him , If thou wilt be perfect , go and sell that thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come and follow me .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij che : We cawaj cäjicomataj ra cˈaslemal cho ri Dios , jat , cheaqˈuiyij conojel ri jastak awe , chaya ri rajil chque ri mebaˈib . Cäcˈoji cˈu na ra kˈinomal chilaˈ chicaj . Te riˈ tasaˈj wucˈ , ― xcha che .

text: But when the young man heard that saying , he went away sorrowful : for he had great possessions .
text2: Aretak ri achi xuta ri xubij ri Jesús , xqˈuextaj ru wäch , xbisonic , xeˈc rumal chi qˈuia ru kˈinomal cˈolic .

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , Verily I say unto you , That a rich man shall hardly enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque ru tijoxelab : Kas tzij quinbij chiwe , chi sibalaj cˈäx cutij jun kˈinom coc chquixol ri winak ri cätakan ri Dios pa qui wiˈ .

text: And again I say unto you , It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Are man cˈäx tä ri rocˈowisaxic jun awaj camello pa ru julil jun tˈisombal bak , chuwäch ri roquic jun kˈinom chquixol ri winak ri cätakan ri Dios pa qui wiˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: When his disciples heard it , they were exceedingly amazed , saying , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Ri tijoxelab aretak xquita waˈ , sibalaj xquicajmaj , xquibij cˈu chbil tak quib : ¿ Jachin ta cˈu lo ri cäcowinic curik ru tobanic ri Dios ? ― xechaˈ .

text: But Jesus beheld them , and said unto them , With men this is impossible ; but with God all things are possible .
text2: Ri Jesús co xcaˈy chque , te riˈ xubij : Man quecowin tä ri winak chubanic waˈ , cäcowin cˈu na ri Dios che ronojel , ― xcha chque .

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Behold , we have forsaken all , and followed thee ; what shall we have therefore ?
text2: Ri tat Pedro xubij che ri Jesús : Kajaw , chilampe la chi ri uj ka yoˈm can conojel ri jastak ke , uj cˈo ucˈ la . ¿ Jas cˈu ri cäyiˈ na chke ? ― xcha che .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Verily I say unto you , That ye which have followed me , in the regeneration when the Son of man shall sit in the throne of his glory , ye also shall sit upon twelve thrones , judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Xchˈaw cˈu ri Jesús , xubij chque : Kas tzij quinbij chiwe , copan na jun kˈij aretak cäban cˈacˈ che ronojel . Aretak ri in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , quincuˈbi na pa ri jeˈlalaj nu tˈuyulibal , cänimarisax nu kˈij , are chiˈ cˈut chi ri ix , ri ix ri cˈo wucˈ quixcuˈbi na xukujeˈ pa cablajuj jeˈlalaj tak tˈuyulibal . Quikˈat cˈu na tzij pa qui wiˈ ri cablajuj tinimit re Israel .

text: And every one that hath forsaken houses , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my name ' s sake , shall receive an hundredfold , and shall inherit everlasting life .
text2: Conojel ri qui yoˈm can cachoch , cachalal , qui nan qui tat , quixokil , calcˈual , culew rumal wech in , cäquirik na jun ciento mul ri tojbal que , xukujeˈ cäquirik na ri cˈaslemal ri man cˈo ta u qˈuisic pa tak ri kˈij ri junab ri quepe na , ― xcha chque .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last shall be first .
text2: E qˈuia cˈu ri winak ri nim queˈil wi cämic ri man nim tä chi na queˈil wi pa tak ri kˈij riˈ . Xukujeˈ e qˈuia ri man nim tä queˈil wi cämic ri nim queˈil wi na pa ri kˈij riˈ , ― xcha chque ru tijoxelab .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which went out early in the morning to hire labourers into his vineyard .
text2: Ru takanic ri Dios pa qui wiˈ ri winak , are jeˈ jas jun achi ajchakˈel jun nimalaj ulew . Xel bi sibalaj akˈab che qui tzucuxic ajchaquib che qui mulixic ru wäch tak uvas .

text: And when he had agreed with the labourers for a penny a day , he sent them into his vineyard .
text2: Xeurik cˈu jujun achijab , xuchomaj cˈu cucˈ chi cäquichˈac cacab quetzal che ri jun kˈij , xeutak cˈu bi pa ri rulew che ri chac .

text: And he went out about the third hour , and saw others standing idle in the marketplace ,
text2: Xel chi cˈu bi jumul pa ri u belej hora re ri akˈabil . Xeril niqˈuiaj achijab chic ri xak tajin quekasan kˈij pa ri cˈayibal .

text: And said unto them ; Go ye also into the vineyard , and whatsoever is right I will give you . And they went their way .
text2: Xubij cˈu chque : “ Jix pa ri nu chac , quinya cˈu na ri tojbal iwe ri takal chiwe , ” ― xcha chque . Ri e areˈ cˈut xebeˈ pa ri chac .

text: Again he went out about the sixth and ninth hour , and did likewise .
text2: Ri patrón xel chi bi jumul pa ri niqˈuiaj kˈij che qui tzucuxic ajchaquib , xukujeˈ pa ri urox hora re ri benak kˈij , junam xuban cucˈ niqˈuiaj ajchaquib chic .

text: And about the eleventh hour he went out , and found others standing idle , and saith unto them , Why stand ye here all the day idle ?
text2: Pa ri uroˈ hora chic re ri benak kˈij , xel chi bi jumul pa ri cˈayibal . Xeurika chi niqˈuiaj achijab ri xak tajin quekasan kˈij , xubij cˈu chque : “ ¿ Jas che xak ix cˈo waral juntir ri jun kˈij man cˈo tä cˈu chac quibano ? ” ― xcha chque .

text: They say unto him , Because no man hath hired us . He saith unto them , Go ye also into the vineyard ; and whatsoever is right , that shall ye receive .
text2: Ri e areˈ xquibij : “ Xa man cˈo tä jun ri cäbin chac chke , ” ― xecha che . Xubij cˈu chque : “ Jix pa chac wucˈ in pa ri wulew , quinya cˈu na ri tojbal iwe ri takal chiwe , ” ― xcha chque .

text: So when even was come , the lord of the vineyard saith unto his steward , Call the labourers , and give them their hire , beginning from the last unto the first .
text2: Aretak cˈut xoc ri akˈab , ri patrón xubij che ri chajil que ri ajchaquib : “ Cheasiqˈuij ri ajchaquib , chaya bi ri tojbal que . Are cachap qui tojic nabe ri xeboc qˈuisbal . Are cˈu ri xeboc nabe queatoj waˈ qˈuisbal , ” ― xcha che .

text: And when they came that were hired about the eleventh hour , they received every man a penny .
text2: Xepe cˈu ri ajchaquib ri teˈ xeboc pa chac pa ri uroˈ hora re ri benak kˈij . Chquijujunal tzˈakat cacab quetzal xyiˈ chque .

text: But when the first came , they supposed that they should have received more ; and they likewise received every man a penny .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ , aretak hora chic chi quetoj ri oquinak nabe pa ri chac , ri e areˈ xquichomaj chi más na ri tojbal que cäyiˈ chquiwäch ri cˈä teˈ xeboc pa ri chac . Xukujeˈ cˈu ri e areˈ xyiˈ cacab quetzal chque chquijujunal .

text: And when they had received it , they murmured against the goodman of the house ,
text2: Aretak xquicˈamo xquichap u yajic ri qui patrón .

text: Saying , These last have wrought but one hour , and thou hast made them equal unto us , which have borne the burden and heat of the day .
text2: Xquibij : “ We ajchaquib riˈ ri teˈ xebul qˈuisbal , xa jun hora xechacunic . Xak junam cˈu qui tojic xban la jas ri uj . Ri uj cˈut xkachˈij ronojel ri jun kˈij chac , xujchacun chuwäch ru chukˈab ri kˈij , ” ― xecha che .

text: But he answered one of them , and said , Friend , I do thee no wrong : didst not thou agree with me for a penny ?
text2: Ri patrón xubij che jun chque ri ajchaquib : “ E ri at , man cˈo tä jas ri tajin quinban chawe ri mat jicom . ¿ A mat junam xkachomaj chi xak quieb quetzal ri tojbal awe ?

text: Take that thine is , and go thy way : I will give unto this last , even as unto thee .
text2: Cˈama bi ri tojbal awe , jat . Ri in cwaj quinya ri tojbal que we niqˈuiaj riˈ ri teˈ xeboc qˈuisbal junam jas ri xinya chawe at .

text: Is it not lawful for me to do what I will with mine own ? Is thine eye evil , because I am good ?
text2: ¿ A mat pa nu kˈab cˈo wi jachique ri cwaj quinban rucˈ ri nu rajil ? ¿ A xa cˈäx ne canaˈ chi in utz cucˈ conojel ? ” ― xcha ri patrón che ri ajchac .

text: So the last shall be first , and the first last : for many be called , but few chosen .
text2: Je cˈu riˈ ri winak ri man nim tä queˈil wi cämic nim queˈil wi na . Are cˈu ri winak ri nim queˈil wi cämic , man nim tä chi queˈil wi na . E qˈuia ri e siqˈuim . Man e qˈuia tä cˈut ri e chaˈtalic , ― xcha chque ru tijoxelab .

text: And Jesus going up to Jerusalem took the twelve disciples apart in the way , and said unto them ,
text2: Pakalem re ri Jesús pa Jerusalén , xeusiqˈuij cˈu ri cablajuj u tijoxelab pa qui tuquiel wi , xubij chque :

text: Behold , we go up to Jerusalem ; and the Son of man shall be betrayed unto the chief priests and unto the scribes , and they shall condemn him to death ,
text2: ¡ Chiwilampeˈ ! Benam ke , tajin cujpaki pa ri tinimit Jerusalén . Quinjach cˈu na in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , pa qui kˈab ri qui nimakil ri sacerdotes , xukujeˈ pa qui kˈab ri tijonelab re ri Pixab . Cäquikˈat cˈu na tzij pa nu wiˈ chi quincämisax na .

text: And shall deliver him to the Gentiles to mock , and to scourge , and to crucify him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Quinquijach cˈu na pa qui kˈab ri niqˈuiaj winak chic , cäquetzˈbej na nu wäch , quinquichˈay na , quinquirip cˈu na cho ri cruz . Quincˈastaj cˈu na chquixol ri cäminakib churox kˈij , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ru tijoxelab .

text: Then came to him the mother of Zebedee ' s children with her sons , worshipping him , and desiring a certain thing of him .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ xekeb ru cˈojol ri tat Zebedeo rucˈ ri Jesús . E areˈ ri tat Jacobo , ri tat Juan , cachiˈl ri qui nan . Ri qui nan xxuqui chuwäch ri Jesús chutaˈic jun tokˈob che .

text: And he said unto her , What wilt thou ? She saith unto him , Grant that these my two sons may sit , the one on thy right hand , and the other on the left , in thy kingdom .
text2: Ri Jesús xutaˈ che : ¿ Jas caj la , nan ? ― xcha che . Ri chichuˈ xubij : Aretak cächaplej takanic la pa qui wiˈ ri winak , cwaj chi cäya la chque ri quieb wal chi quecuˈbi ucˈ la , ri jun pa wiquiäkˈab la , ri jun chic pa ri moxkˈab la , ― xcha che .

text: But Jesus answered and said , Ye know not what ye ask . Are ye able to drink of the cup that I shall drink of , and to be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ? They say unto him , We are able .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque : Ri ix man quichˈob taj jas u wäch tokˈob ri tajin quitaˈ chwe . ¿ A quixcowinic quichˈij ri cˈäx ri quinrik na in , quitij iwe ri cˈo pa ri vaso ri quintij wi na we ? ¿ A quixcowinic cäban na i kasnaˈ ix jas ri kasnaˈ ri cäban na chwe in ? ― xcha chque . Xquibij cˈu che : Cujcowinic , ― xecha che .

text: And he saith unto them , Ye shall drink indeed of my cup , and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with : but to sit on my right hand , and on my left , is not mine to give , but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared of my Father .
text2: Xubij ri Jesús chque : Kas tzij quirik na cˈäx , quitij cˈu na iwe ri cˈo pa ri vaso ri quintij na we in , xukujeˈ cäban na i kasnaˈ jas ri cäban na chwe in . Are cˈu ri tˈuyulem pa ri nu wiquiäkˈab o pa ri nu moxkˈab , man cuyaˈ taj quinya in chiwe , xane are waˈ quech ri e chaˈtal rumal ri nu Tat chi quetˈuyi pa tak ri tˈuyulibal riˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: And when the ten heard it , they were moved with indignation against the two brethren .
text2: Aretak ri lajuj tijoxelab chic xquita u bixic ronojel waˈ , xpe coyowal ri e areˈ chrij ri tat Jacobo , ri tat Juan .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Ye know that the princes of the Gentiles exercise dominion over them , and they that are great exercise authority upon them .
text2: Xeusiqˈuij cˈu ri Jesús , xubij chque : Ri ix iwetam chi ri winak ri yoˈm chque chi quetakan pa qui wiˈ ri niqˈuiaj winak chic , cäquinaˈ chi kas cˈo qui chukˈab pa qui wiˈ . Ri qui nimakil ri winak cˈut quetakan pa qui wiˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: But it shall not be so among you : but whosoever will be great among you , let him be your minister ;
text2: Man jeˈ tä cˈu waˈ ri ix . Xane apachin chiwe ri craj chi nim quil wi , rajwaxic chi coc na che patänil que conojel .

text: And whosoever will be chief among you , let him be your servant :
text2: Apachin chiwe ri craj coc che i nimal , rajwaxic chi coc na che patänil que ri niqˈuiaj chic .

text: Even as the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: Are je riˈ , rumal chi ri in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , man in petinak taj rech quinpatänixic , xane rech quinpatänin chque niqˈuiaj chic , xukujeˈ rech quinya ri nu cˈaslemal che tojbal re ri qui toric qˈuia winak , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ru tijoxelab .

text: And as they departed from Jericho , a great multitude followed him .
text2: Aretak ri Jesús tajin quel bi pa ri tinimit Jericó e rachiˈl ru tijoxelab , e qˈuia winak xeteri bi chrij .

text: And , behold , two blind men sitting by the way side , when they heard that Jesus passed by , cried out , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: E cˈo cˈu quieb achijab moyab tˈuyul chiˈ ri be . Xquito chi ri Jesús tajin cocˈow chilaˈ , xquirak qui chiˈ , xquibij che ri Jesús : ¡ Tat , lal riˈ ralcˈual can ri ka mam David , tokˈobisaj la ka wäch ! ― xecha che .

text: And the multitude rebuked them , because they should hold their peace : but they cried the more , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Ri winak xa xequiyajo , xquibij chque chi chquitzˈapij u pa qui chiˈ . Are cˈu ri e areˈ man xquita taj , xane sibalaj co chi na xquirak qui chiˈ , xquibij : ¡ Tat , lal riˈ ralcˈual can ri ka mam David , tokˈobisaj la ka wäch ! ― xecha che .

text: And Jesus stood still , and called them , and said , What will ye that I shall do unto you ?
text2: Xtaqˈui cˈu ri Jesús . Xeusiqˈuij ri quieb moyab , xutaˈ chque : ¿ Jas caj alak chi quinban chech alak ? ― xcha chque .

text: They say unto him , Lord , that our eyes may be opened .
text2: Ri moyab xquibij : Tat , cäkaj cujcaˈyic , ― xecha che .

text: So Jesus had compassion on them , and touched their eyes : and immediately their eyes received sight , and they followed him .
text2: Te riˈ ri Jesús xutokˈobisaj qui wäch , xuchap cˈu cok ri qui wakˈäch . Chanim cˈut xecowinic xecaˈyic , xebeˈ cˈu rucˈ ri Jesús .

text: And when they drew nigh unto Jerusalem , and were come to Bethphage , unto the mount of Olives , then sent Jesus two disciples ,
text2: Aretak nakaj chic e cˈo wi che ri tinimit Jerusalén , xeopan pa ri alaj tinimit Betfagé . Tajin queocˈow chuwäch ri Ujuyubal Olivos . Ri Jesús xeutak bi quieb chque ru tijoxelab .

text: Saying unto them , Go into the village over against you , and straightway ye shall find an ass tied , and a colt with her : loose them , and bring them unto me .
text2: Xubij bi chque : Jix pa ri alaj tinimit ri cˈo apan chkawäch . Chilaˈ quirik wi na jun atiˈt burro yukulic , rachiˈl jun alaj burro . Chiquiraˈ , cheicˈama cˈu lok chwe , ― xcha chque .

text: And if any man say ought unto you , ye shall say , The Lord hath need of them ; and straightway he will send them .
text2: We cˈo jachin jun cˈo jas cubij chiwe , chibij che chi xa cajwataj che ri Kajaw Jesús , chanim cˈut cutzelej chi na lok , ― quixcha che .

text: All this was done , that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying ,
text2: Jeˈ xbantaj waˈ rech kas jeˈ quelic jas ri xutzˈibaj can ri kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri cubij :

text: Tell ye the daughter of Sion , Behold , thy King cometh unto thee , meek , and sitting upon an ass , and a colt the foal of an ass .
text2: Chibij chque ri winak re ri tinimit Jerusalén ri cˈo puwiˈ ri juyub Sión : “ ¡ Chiwilampeˈ ! Ri Nimalaj i Takanel petem re iwucˈ . Man nim tä u banic u banom che rib , xane quiejeninak chrij jun burro . Chrij ri alaj ral jun burro quiejeninak wi , ”

text: And the disciples went , and did as Jesus commanded them ,
text2: ― cächa riˈ . Xebeˈ cˈu ri quieb tijoxelab , jeˈ xcaˈno jas ri xetak wi bi rumal ri Jesús .

text: And brought the ass , and the colt , and put on them their clothes , and they set him thereon .
text2: Xquicˈam lok ri atiˈt burro rachiˈl ri ral . Xquiya cˈu ri qui kˈuˈ chrij , xquiejen cˈu ri Jesús .

text: And a very great multitude spread their garments in the way ; others cut down branches from the trees , and strawed them in the way .
text2: E qˈuia cˈu ri winak xquilicˈ ri qui kˈuˈ pa ri be , xukujeˈ e cˈo niqˈuiaj chic ri xequiya u xak tak cheˈ pa ri be ri xequichˈupala pa tak ri juyub .

text: And the multitudes that went before , and that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna to the Son of David : Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord ; Hosanna in the highest .
text2: Ri winak ri e nabejinak chuwäch ri Jesús , xukujeˈ ri e teretoj chrij , co xechˈawic , xquibij : ¡ Chnimarisax u kˈij ri ralcˈualaxic ri ka mam David ri nim takanel ! ¡ Utz re ri petinak pa ru biˈ ri Kajaw Dios ! ¡ Chnimarisax u kˈij ri Dios ! ― xechaˈ .

text: And when he was come into Jerusalem , all the city was moved , saying , Who is this ?
text2: Aretak xoc ri Jesús pa ri tinimit Jerusalén , conojel ri winak xquituquij quib , xquitatabala chbil tak quib , xquibij : ¿ Jachin waˈ we achi riˈ ? ― xechaˈ .

text: And the multitude said , This is Jesus the prophet of Nazareth of Galilee .
text2: Ri winak xquibij : Are waˈ ri Jesús , ri kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios , ri aj Nazaret re Galilea , ― xechaˈ .

text: And Jesus went into the temple of God , and cast out all them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ,
text2: Te cˈu riˈ xoc bi ri Jesús pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , xeresax bi ri ajcˈayib xukujeˈ ri quequilokˈ tak jastak pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios . Xeutzak ri qui mesa ri qˈuexal tak puak xukujeˈ xeutzak ri qui tem ri ajcˈay tak palomäx .

text: And said unto them , It is written , My house shall be called the house of prayer ; but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Xubij chque ri winak : Tzˈibtal pa ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios , cubij : “ Ri wachoch in are jun ja ri cäban wi orar , ” ― cächaˈ . Ri alak cˈut jun cachoch elakˈomab banom alak che , ― xcha chque .

text: And the blind and the lame came to him in the temple ; and he healed them .
text2: Chilaˈ pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , xeopan jujun achijab moyab rucˈ ri Jesús , xukujeˈ jujun chˈocojib . Xecunax cˈu rumal ri Jesús .

text: And when the chief priests and scribes saw the wonderful things that he did , and the children crying in the temple , and saying , Hosanna to the Son of David ; they were sore displeased ,
text2: Aretak cˈut ri qui nimakil ri sacerdotes xukujeˈ ri tijonelab re ri Pixab , xquil tak ri cajmabal ri xuban ri Jesús , xukujeˈ xquito chi ri acˈalab cäquirak qui chiˈ pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , cäquibij : “ ¡ Nim u kˈij ri ralcˈual can ri nim takanel David ojer ! ” ― quechaˈ . Ri e areˈ xpe coyowal .

text: And said unto him , Hearest thou what these say ? And Jesus saith unto them , Yea ; have ye never read , Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings thou hast perfected praise ?
text2: Xquibij cˈu che ri Jesús : ¿ A cäta la jas ri tajin cäquibij ri acˈalab ? ― xecha che . Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij chque : Jeˈ , quinto , ― xcha chque . ¿ A mat siqˈuim pu alak ri tzˈibtal pa ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ? Je waˈ cubij : Xya la chque ri acˈalab , chque ri alaj tak acˈalab ri quetuˈnic chi kas tzij cäquibixoj bix ri cuya u kˈij ri Dios ,

text: And he left them , and went out of the city into Bethany ; and he lodged there .
text2: ― cächaˈ , ― xcha chque . Xeˈ cˈu ri Jesús , xeuya can ri qui nimakil sacerdotes xukujeˈ ri tijonelab re ri Pixab . Xel bi pa ri tinimit Jerusalén , xeˈ pa ri tinimit Betania . Chilaˈ cˈut xcanaj can che ri chakˈab .

text: Now in the morning as he returned into the city , he hungered .
text2: Akˈabil aretak tajin quetzelej bi pa Jerusalén , e petinak pa ri tinimit Betania , xnum cˈu ri Jesús .

text: And when he saw a fig tree in the way , he came to it , and found nothing thereon , but leaves only , and said unto it , Let no fruit grow on thee henceforward for ever . And presently the fig tree withered away .
text2: Xril apan jun u cheˈal higos ri cˈo chuchiˈ ri be . Xerilaˈ , man cˈo tä cˈu u wäch xuriko , xane xak xuwi u xak . Xubij cˈu ri Jesús che ri cheˈ : ¡ Man cˈo tä chi jumul chic cäcˈoji a wäch ! ― xcha che . Chanim cˈut xchakiˈjar ru cheˈal higos .

text: And when the disciples saw it , they marvelled , saying , How soon is the fig tree withered away !
text2: Ru tijoxelab ri Jesús aretak xquil waˈ sibalaj xquicajmaj . Xquitaˈ cˈu che ri Jesús : ¿ Jas che chanim xchakiˈjar ru cheˈal higos ? ― xecha che .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Verily I say unto you , If ye have faith , and doubt not , ye shall not only do this which is done to the fig tree , but also if ye shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; it shall be done .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij chque : Kas tzij quinbij chiwe , we kas quixcojonic , man cuban tä cˈu quieb i cˈux , man xuwi tä waˈ quixcowin chubanic jas ri xinban in che ru cheˈal higos . Xane cuyaˈ quibij che we juyub riˈ : “ Chatel bi waral , chaqˈuiäka bi awib pa ri mar , ” ― quixcha che . Cäbantaj cˈu na waˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: And all things , whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer , believing , ye shall receive .
text2: Ronojel cˈu ri quitaˈ che ri Dios cäyaˈtaj na chiwe we kas quixcojonic , ― xcha chque .

text: And when he was come into the temple , the chief priests and the elders of the people came unto him as he was teaching , and said , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority ?
text2: Ri Jesús xoc pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios . Aretak tajin queutijoj ri winak chilaˈ , ri qui nimakil sacerdotes , xukujeˈ ri qui nimakil ri winak aj Israel xeopan rucˈ , xquitaˈ che : ¿ Jachin xtakow la chi cäban la ronojel waˈ we riˈ ? ¿ Jachin lo ri yoˈwinak che la chi jeˈ cäban la waˈ ? ― xecha che .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I also will ask you one thing , which if ye tell me , I in like wise will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij chque : Ri in xukujeˈ cˈo ri quintaˈ chech alak . We cäcowin alak chubixic chwe jas ri quintaˈ , quinbij na chech alak jachin ri yoˈwinak chwe chi cˈo nu takanic rech jeˈ quinban waˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: The baptism of John , whence was it ? from heaven , or of men ? And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say unto us , Why did ye not then believe him ?
text2: Bij alak chwe : ¿ Jachin xtakow ri tat Juan chubanic ri kasnaˈ ? ¿ A are ri Dios o e are ri winak ? ― xcha chque . Xquichaplej cˈu u tzijobexic quib , xquibij : We cäkabij chi are ri Dios xtakowic , cubij na chke : “ ¿ Jas cˈu che man xcojon tä alak che ? ” ― cächa na .

text: But if we shall say , Of men ; we fear the people ; for all hold John as a prophet .
text2: We cäkabij chi e are ri winak xtakowic , cäkaxej kib chquiwäch ri winak . Conojel cˈu ri winak cäquicojo chi ri tat Juan are jun kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios , ― xechaˈ .

text: And they answered Jesus , and said , We cannot tell . And he said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Rumal waˈ xquibij che ri Jesús : Man ketam taj , ― xecha che . Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij chque : Man quinbij tä cˈu in chiwe jachin yoˈwinak chwe chi quinban waˈ we riˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: But what think ye ? A certain man had two sons ; and he came to the first , and said , Son , go work to day in my vineyard .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij chque ri tataˈib fariseos : ¿ Jas cächomaj alak che waˈ ri quinbij chech alak riˈ ? Cˈo jun achi ri e cˈo quieb u cˈojol . Xubij cˈu che jun chque ru cˈojol : “ Nu cˈojol , jat cämic pa ri nu chac che qui mulixic ru wäch tak ri uvas , ” ― xcha che .

text: He answered and said , I will not : but afterward he repented , and went .
text2: Ri ala xubij che ru tat : “ ¡ Man cˈo tä quineˈ wi in ! ” ― xcha che . Te cˈu riˈ xuqˈuex ru chomanic , xeˈ na che ri chac .

text: And he came to the second , and said likewise . And he answered and said , I go , sir : and went not .
text2: Ri tataˈ xeˈ chi rucˈ ri jun u cˈojol chic , xubij che : “ Jat cämic pa ri nu chac che qui mulixic ru wäch tak ri uvas , ” ― xcha che . Ru cˈojol xubij che : “ Jeˈ , tat , utz riˈ quineˈc , ” ― xcha che . Man xeˈ tä cˈut .

text: Whether of them twain did the will of his father ? They say unto him , The first . Jesus saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That the publicans and the harlots go into the kingdom of God before you .
text2: ¿ Jachin cˈu chque we quieb riˈ xubano jas ri xraj ru tat chi cäbanic ? ― xcha ri Jesús chque ri tataˈib fariseos . Ri e areˈ xquibij : Are ri xtak nabe , ― xecha che ri Jesús . Xubij ri Jesús chque : Kas tzij ri quinbij chech alak chi ri tokˈil tak alcabal , xukujeˈ ri itzel tak ixokib nabe queboc na chuwäch alak chquixol ri winak ri cätakan ri Dios pa qui wiˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: For John came unto you in the way of righteousness , and ye believed him not : but the publicans and the harlots believed him : and ye , when ye had seen it , repented not afterward , that ye might believe him .
text2: Je riˈ , rumal chi ri Juan Kasal Jaˈ xpetic , xucˈut chuwäch alak jas cäban alak rech jicom ri cˈaslemal alak cho ri Dios , man xcoj tä cˈu alak ru tzij . Are cˈu ri tokˈil tak alcabal , xukujeˈ ri itzel tak ixokib xquicojo . Are cˈu ri alak , pune xil alak waˈ ri xcaˈn ri e areˈ , man xqˈuex tä ri animaˈ alak , man xqˈuex tä cˈu ri chomanic alak . Man xcoj tä alak ri xubij ri tat Juan Kasal Jaˈ chech alak , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ri tataˈib fariseos .

text: Hear another parable : There was a certain householder , which planted a vineyard , and hedged it round about , and digged a winepress in it , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country :
text2: Tatabej baˈ alak we jun cˈutbal chic riˈ , ― xcha chque . Cˈo jun achi ri xuban jun ticbal uvas , xucoralij rij , te cˈu riˈ xucˈot jun jul ri cäpitzˈ wi ri uvas , xuban xukujeˈ jun tacˈaticalaj ja ri cäcoj che chajibal re ronojel . Xuya cˈu can pa kajomal chque jujun achijab , te riˈ xeˈ ri areˈ naj pa jun tinimit chic .

text: And when the time of the fruit drew near , he sent his servants to the husbandmen , that they might receive the fruits of it .
text2: Xopan cˈu ri kˈij ri xechäkˈaj ri qui wäch ri uvas , ri ajchakˈel xeutak bi jujun patänil tak re cucˈ ri ajchaquib chucˈamic re ri qui wäch ri uvas .

text: And the husbandmen took his servants , and beat one , and killed another , and stoned another .
text2: Are cˈu ri ajchaquib xequichap ri patäninelab , jun xquichˈayo , jun xquicämisaj , jun chic cˈut xcaˈn chabaj .

text: Again , he sent other servants more than the first : and they did unto them likewise .
text2: Ri ajchakˈel ri ulew xeutak chi bi niqˈuiaj takoˈn chic . E qˈuia chi na ri xeutak bic chuwäch ri nabe . Ri ajchaquib cˈut jeˈ xcaˈn chque jas ri xcaˈn chque ri nabe tak takoˈn .

text: But last of all he sent unto them his son , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: Chuqˈuisbal ronojel xutak bi ri u cˈojol , xuchomaj cˈut : “ Kas nim cäquil wi na ri nu cˈojol , ” ― xchaˈ .

text: But when the husbandmen saw the son , they said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and let us seize on his inheritance .
text2: Aretak cˈut ri ajchaquib xquil ru cˈojol ri tataˈ , xquitzijobela quib , xquibij : “ Are waˈ ri quechben na ronojel . Joˈ , kacämisaj rech cäkˈax can ronojel ri ulew pa ka kˈab uj , ” ― xechaˈ .

text: And they caught him , and cast him out of the vineyard , and slew him .
text2: Xquichapo , xquesaj bi pa ri ticbal uvas , xquicämisaj .

text: When the lord therefore of the vineyard cometh , what will he do unto those husbandmen ?
text2: Te cˈu riˈ ri Jesús xutaˈ chque , xubij : Aretak cäpe ri ajchakˈel ri ulew ticbal uvas , ¿ jas cuban na chque ri ajchaquib ? ― xcha chque .

text: They say unto him , He will miserably destroy those wicked men , and will let out his vineyard unto other husbandmen , which shall render him the fruits in their seasons .
text2: Ri e areˈ xquibij che ri Jesús : Man cutokˈobisaj tä na qui wäch , queucämisaj na ri itzel tak ajchaquib riˈ , cuya cˈu na ri ticbal uvas chque niqˈuiaj chic , ri cäquijach ru wäch ri ticoˈn aretak curik ri kˈij , ― xecha che .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Did ye never read in the scriptures , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner : this is the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque : ¿ A mat siqˈuim alak waˈ we tzij riˈ pa ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ? Je waˈ cubij : Ri abaj ri man xcaj tä ri yacal tak ja , are abaj waˈ xcoj che tokˈebal re ri ja . Jeˈ banom waˈ rumal ri Kajaw Dios . Kas cajmabal cˈu waˈ chkawäch ,

text: Therefore say I unto you , The kingdom of God shall be taken from you , and given to a nation bringing forth the fruits thereof .
text2: ― cächaˈ , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ri tataˈib fariseos . Rumal riˈ quinbij chech alak chi ri Dios man cätakan tä chi na puwiˈ alak , xane ri Dios are cätakan na pa qui wiˈ ri winak ri utz cäcaˈn che ri qui chac , ri cäquijach cuenta cho ri Dios aretak curik ri kˈij .

text: And whosoever shall fall on this stone shall be broken : but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Are cˈu we cˈo jun cätzak puwiˈ ri abaj , cäkˈaj na . We cˈu ne are ri abaj cätzak puwiˈ jun winak , cäcˈäjisax na rumal ri abaj , ― xcha chque .

text: And when the chief priests and Pharisees had heard his parables , they perceived that he spake of them .
text2: Aretak ri qui nimakil ri sacerdotes xukujeˈ ri tataˈib fariseos xquita waˈ , xquichˈobo chi chquij ri e areˈ xutzijoj wi waˈ we cˈutbal riˈ .

text: But when they sought to lay hands on him , they feared the multitude , because they took him for a prophet .
text2: Xcaj xquichap ri Jesús . Xquixej cˈu quib chquiwäch ri winak , rumal chi ri winak xquicojo chi ri Jesús are jun kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios .

text: And Jesus answered and spake unto them again by parables , and said ,
text2: Jumul chic ri Jesús xuchaplej qui tzijobexic ri winak cucˈ tak cˈutbal , xubij chque :

text: The kingdom of heaven is like unto a certain king , which made a marriage for his son ,
text2: Ru takanic ri Dios pa qui wiˈ ri winak , junam rucˈ jun nim takanel ri xuban jun nimakˈij che ru cˈulanem ru cˈojol .

text: And sent forth his servants to call them that were bidden to the wedding : and they would not come .
text2: Xeutak bi ri patänil tak re che qui siqˈuixic lok ri winak ri e siqˈuim pa ri cˈulanem , man xcaj tä cˈu ri winak xepetic .

text: Again , he sent forth other servants , saying , Tell them which are bidden , Behold , I have prepared my dinner : my oxen and my fatlings are killed , and all things are ready : come unto the marriage .
text2: Ri tataˈ xeutak chi bi niqˈuiaj chic patänil tak re , xubij bi chque : “ Chibij chque ri winak ri e siqˈuim chi xutzir ri wa . Xintakan che qui cämisaxic ri nu wacäx , ri awaj ri e nu kˈobsam xepilitajic . Ronojel ri ulabal cˈo chic , saˈj alak pa ri cˈulanem , ” ― quixcha chque .

text: But they made light of it , and went their ways , one to his farm , another to his merchandise :
text2: Are cˈu ri winak ri xesiqˈuix che ri cˈulanem man xeboc tä il che ri xubij ri nim takanel . Xak xquitzucuj jas xcaˈno . Jun xeˈ chusolixic ri rulew , jun chic xeˈ che cˈayinic .

text: And the remnant took his servants , and entreated them spitefully , and slew them .
text2: Ri niqˈuiaj chic xequichap ri u takoˈn ri nim takanel , xcaˈn cˈäx chque , xequicämisaj .

text: But when the king heard thereof , he was wroth : and he sent forth his armies , and destroyed those murderers , and burned up their city .
text2: Ri nim takanel sibalaj xpe royowal , xeutak cˈu bi ru soldados che qui cämisaxic ri winak ri xecämisan ru takoˈn . Xtakan che ru poroxic ri qui tinimit .

text: Then saith he to his servants , The wedding is ready , but they which were bidden were not worthy .
text2: Xubij cˈu chque ri patänil tak re : “ Ronojel ri cajwataj che ri cˈulanem cˈo chic , are cˈu ri winak ri xekasiqˈuij che ri cˈulanem man takal tä chque chi quepetic .

text: Go ye therefore into the highways , and as many as ye shall find , bid to the marriage .
text2: Rumal riˈ jix pa tak ri nim be , cheisiqˈuij lok conojel ri winak ri queiriko rech quepe pa ri cˈulanem , ” ― xcha chque .

text: So those servants went out into the highways , and gathered together all as many as they found , both bad and good : and the wedding was furnished with guests .
text2: Ru takoˈn xebel bi che qui tzucuxic ri winak pa tak ri be . Xequimulij cˈu lok conojel ri xequiriko , ri e utz xukujeˈ ri man e utz taj . Xnoj cˈu ri ja cumal ri winak .

text: And when the king came in to see the guests , he saw there a man which had not on a wedding garment :
text2: Xoc bi ri tataˈ che quilic conojel ri xesiqˈuix pa ri cˈulanem . Xril cˈu jun achi chquixol ri winak ri man u cojom tä atzˈiak re cˈulanem .

text: And he saith unto him , Friend , how camest thou in hither not having a wedding garment ? And he was speechless .
text2: Xubij che : E cˈu ri at , “ ¿ Jas che xatoc lok waral we man cˈo tä awatzˈiak re cˈulanem ? ” ― xcha che . Ri achi man cˈo tä jas xubij .

text: Then said the king to the servants , Bind him hand and foot , and take him away , and cast him into outer darkness ; there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Ri nim takanel xubij chque ri queˈilow ri mesa : “ Chiyutu ri rakan u kˈab . Jiqˈuiäka can chrij ja pa ri kˈekum . Chilaˈ cˈut cokˈ wi na , cukuchˈuchˈej na ru ware , ” ― xcha chque .

text: For many are called , but few are chosen .
text2: E qˈuia cˈu ri e siqˈuim , xak cˈu e quieb oxib ri e chaˈtalic , ― xcha chque .

text: Then went the Pharisees , and took counsel how they might entangle him in his talk .
text2: Xebeˈ cˈu ri tataˈib fariseos , xquitala qui noˈj , xjunamataj cˈu qui chomanic rech cäquicˈot u chiˈ ri Jesús xak rech cuyaˈ cäquibij chi cˈo u mac .

text: And they sent out unto him their disciples with the Herodians , saying , Master , we know that thou art true , and teachest the way of God in truth , neither carest thou for any man : for thou regardest not the person of men .
text2: Rumal riˈ xequitak bi jujun chque ri cachiˈl junam cucˈ niqˈuiaj chic ri e rachiˈl ri tat Herodes chubixic che ri Jesús : Ajtij , ketam chi jicom ri animaˈ la , xukujeˈ chi cäcˈut la ru beyal ru rayibal ri Dios chquiwäch conojel ri winak . Man cäxej tä ib la chquiwäch ri winak , pune cˈo jas cäquichomaj chij la , rumal chi man nim tä quil la jun winak chuwäch ri jun chic .

text: Tell us therefore , What thinkest thou ? Is it lawful to give tribute unto Caesar , or not ?
text2: Bij baˈ la chke jas ri cächomaj la : ¿ A takal chke cäkatoj alcabal che ri César o man takal taj ? ― xecha che .

text: But Jesus perceived their wickedness , and said , Why tempt ye me , ye hypocrites ?
text2: Ri Jesús xretamaj cˈut ri itzel tak qui chomanic , xubij chque : Xak quieb wäch alak , ¿ jas che cätaˈ alak waˈ chwe ? ¿ A mat xa caj alak chi quinkaj pa kˈab alak ?

text: Shew me the tribute money . And they brought unto him a penny .
text2: Cˈamampe alak lok jun puak chnuwäch ri cätojbex re ri alcabal , ― xcha chque . Xquicˈam cˈu lok ri jun puak .

text: And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ?
text2: Aretak ri Jesús xrilo , xubij chque : ¿ Jachin ajchakˈel we cayebal riˈ , xukujeˈ we biˈaj riˈ ri tzˈibtal chuwäch ? ― xcha chque .

text: They say unto him , Caesar ' s . Then saith he unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which are Caesar ' s ; and unto God the things that are God ' s .
text2: Ri e areˈ xechˈawic , xquibij : Are rech ri César , ― xecha che . Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque : Ya baˈ alak che ri César ri rech ri César . Ya cˈu alak che ri Dios ri rech ri Dios , ― xcha chque .

text: When they had heard these words , they marvelled , and left him , and went their way .
text2: Aretak ri tataˈib fariseos xquita ri xubij ri Jesús chque , sibalaj xquicajmaj u wäch . Xquiya cˈu canok , xebeˈc .

text: The same day came to him the Sadducees , which say that there is no resurrection , and asked him ,
text2: Pa ri kˈij riˈ xeopan jujun tataˈib saduceos rucˈ ri Jesús . Ri tataˈib riˈ cäquibij chi man quecˈastaj tä chi na ri cäminakib . Xquitaˈ cˈu che ri Jesús , xquibij :

text: Saying , Master , Moses said , If a man die , having no children , his brother shall marry his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: Ajtij , bim can chke rumal ri ka mam Moisés chi we cäcäm jun achi , cäcanaj can ri rixokil pa malcaˈnil , man cˈo tä cˈu can ralcˈual rucˈ , rajwaxic chi ri rachalal chakˈaxel ri cˈo canok cäcˈuli rucˈ ri ixok ri malcaˈn rech quecˈoji ralcˈual rucˈ . Ri acˈalab riˈ e jeˈ ta ne rech ri cäminak .

text: Now there were with us seven brethren : and the first , when he had married a wife , deceased , and , having no issue , left his wife unto his brother :
text2: Chkaxol uj jeˈ xcˈulmataj waˈ : Xecˈoji wukub achijab cachalal quib . Ri nabeal xcˈuliˈc , xcäm cˈut . Man cˈo tä ralcˈual xcˈoji can rucˈ ri rixokil , xa je riˈ xcanaj can ri malcaˈn ixok che rixokil ri chakˈaxel rachalal .

text: Likewise the second also , and the third , unto the seventh .
text2: Jeˈ xcˈulmataj xukujeˈ rucˈ ri ucab , ri urox rachalal , cˈä xeqˈuis na ri wukub achalaxic .

text: And last of all the woman died also .
text2: E cäminak chic conojel , xcäm cˈu bi ri ixok .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife shall she be of the seven ? for they all had her .
text2: Aretak cˈut quecˈastaj na ri cäminakib , ¿ jachin chque waˈ we wukub achijab riˈ cäcˈamow ri ixok che rixokil ? Xcˈoji cˈu che quixokil ri wukub , ― xecha che .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Ye do err , not knowing the scriptures , nor the power of God .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij chque : Ri alak xa sachinak alak rumal chi man etam tä alak ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic , man etam tä cˈu alak ru chukˈab ri Dios .

text: For in the resurrection they neither marry , nor are given in marriage , but are as the angels of God in heaven .
text2: Aretak ri cäminakib quecˈastajic , man quecˈuli tä chic , man cäquiya tä cˈu ri calcˈual che cˈulanem , xane xak e junam chic cucˈ ri ángeles rech ri Dios ri e cˈo chilaˈ chicaj , ― xcha chque .

text: But as touching the resurrection of the dead , have ye not read that which was spoken unto you by God , saying ,
text2: Chrij cˈu waˈ chi quecˈastaj na ri cäminakib , cˈo na ri cwaj quinbij chech alak : ¿ A mat siqˈuim alak ri cubij wi ri Dios ? Je waˈ cubij :

text: I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ? God is not the God of the dead , but of the living .
text2: “ In riˈ , in ru Dios ri Abraham , ru Dios ri Isaac , ru Dios ri Jacob , ” ― cächaˈ . Ri ka Dios man are tä Dios quech ri cäminakib , xane quech ri e cˈascˈoj , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ri tataˈib saduceos .

text: And when the multitude heard this , they were astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Aretak xquita ri winak waˈ ri xubij ri Jesús , conojel sibalaj xquicajmaj ru tijonic .

text: But when the Pharisees had heard that he had put the Sadducees to silence , they were gathered together .
text2: Aretak ri tataˈib fariseos xquito chi ri saduceos xtzˈapix u pa qui chiˈ rumal ri Jesús , ri e areˈ xquimulij quib .

text: Then one of them , which was a lawyer , asked him a question , tempting him , and saying ,
text2: Jun cˈu chque ri fariseos are tijonel re ri Pixab . Xopan cˈu rucˈ ri Jesús rech cucˈam u pu chiˈ , xubij che :

text: Master , which is the great commandment in the law ?
text2: Ajtij , ¿ jachique ri takanic ri nim na u banic ri cˈo pa ri Pixab ? ― xcha che .

text: Jesus said unto him , Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij che : “ Sibalaj chiwaj ri i Dios , ri Iwajaw , chijiquiba ri i cˈux , chijiquiba ri iwanimaˈ chrij , chicojo ri i chomanic chubanic waˈ , ” ― xcha che .

text: This is the first and great commandment .
text2: Are waˈ ri takanic ri nim na u banic , ri nabe chquiwäch conojel .

text: And the second is like unto it , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Ri ucab takanic ri nim na u banic ri junam rucˈ ri nabe are waˈ : “ Cheiwaj ri i wach winak , jas ri ix quiwaj iwib , ” ― xchaˈ .

text: On these two commandments hang all the law and the prophets .
text2: We quieb takanic riˈ e are waˈ ri kas u cˈux ronojel ri Pixab ri xutzˈibaj ri ka mam Moisés , xukujeˈ e are waˈ u cˈux ri qui tijonic ri kˈalajisal tak re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios , ― xcha che .

text: While the Pharisees were gathered together , Jesus asked them ,
text2: Cˈä qui mulim quib ri tataˈib fariseos .

text: Saying , What think ye of Christ ? whose son is he ? They say unto him , The Son of David .
text2: Ri Jesús xutaˈ chque : ¿ Jas cächomaj alak chrij ri Cristo ? ¿ Ralcˈual jachinok ? ― xcha chque . Ri e areˈ xquibij : Ri Cristo are ralcˈual can ri ka mam David ojer , ― xecha che .

text: He saith unto them , How then doth David in spirit call him Lord , saying ,
