text2: Ri Jesús xubij chque : ¿ Jas cˈu che ri ka mam David ojer rumal ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu xubij Kajaw che ri Cristo ? Xubij cˈut :

text: The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool ?
text2: Xubij ri Kajaw ri ka Dios che ri Wajaw : “ Chattˈuyul pa ri nu wiquiäkˈab , cˈä quinya na chawe chi catchˈacanic , cattakan cˈu pa qui wiˈ conojel ri cäcaˈn qui cˈulel chawe , ”

text: If David then call him Lord , how is he his son ?
text2: ― xcha ri ka mam David . ¿ Jas ta ne che ri Cristo are ralcˈual can ri David we ri ka mam David xubij Kajaw che ri Cristo ? ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: And no man was able to answer him a word , neither durst any man from that day forth ask him any more questions .
text2: Man cˈo tä chi cˈu jachin jun xcowinic xchˈawic , xubij ta chi jun tzij che ri Jesús . Pa tak cˈu ri kˈij riˈ xetaniˈc , man cˈo tä chi jachin jun cˈo jas xutaˈ che ri Jesús .

text: Then spake Jesus to the multitude , and to his disciples ,
text2: Ri Jesús xubij chque ri winak xukujeˈ chque ru tijoxelab :

text: Saying , The scribes and the Pharisees sit in Moses ' seat :
text2: Ri tijonelab re ri Pixab , xukujeˈ ri tataˈib fariseos cˈo takanic pa qui kˈab chukˈalajisaxic ri Pixab ri xutzˈibaj ri ka mam Moisés .

text: All therefore whatsoever they bid you observe , that observe and do ; but do not ye after their works : for they say , and do not .
text2: Cheinimaj baˈ , chibana cˈu ronojel ri cäquibij chiwe . Xuwi cˈu miban iwe jas ri cäcaˈn ri e areˈ , rumal chi jun wi ri cäquibij , jun chi cˈu wi ri cäcaˈno .

text: For they bind heavy burdens and grievous to be borne , and lay them on men ' s shoulders ; but they themselves will not move them with one of their fingers .
text2: Ri takanic ri cäquiya are jeˈ jas jun ekaˈn ri sibalaj al , ri man cˈo tä jun cuchˈij ri raˈlal . Cäcaj cˈut chi cäquinimaj ri winak . Ri e areˈ cˈut man cˈo tä jubikˈ cäcaˈn che qui toˈic .

text: But all their works they do for to be seen of men : they make broad their phylacteries , and enlarge the borders of their garments ,
text2: Ronojel ri cäcaˈno xak rech quilitaj cumal ri winak . Cäkaj chquiwäch cäquinacˈ paj tak tzij re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios cho ru crucil ri qui palaj xukujeˈ che ri qui kˈab ri tzˈibtal cho rabaraˈk tak wuj . Xukujeˈ cäkaj chquiwäch cäquicoj charchaˈk tak atzˈiak ri cˈo retzˈbalil nimak na chuwäch ri que ri winak .

text: And love the uppermost rooms at feasts , and the chief seats in the synagogues ,
text2: Are cäquitzucuj ri tˈuyulibal ri nim queˈil wi na pa tak ri ulaˈnem , xukujeˈ ri tˈuyulibal ri nimak qui banic pa tak ri rachoch Dios .

text: And greetings in the markets , and to be called of men , Rabbi , Rabbi .
text2: Cäcaj chi sibalaj utz qui chˈabexic cäban cumal ri winak pa tak ri be , xukujeˈ chi cäbix ajtij chque .

text: But be not ye called Rabbi : for one is your Master , even Christ ; and all ye are brethren .
text2: Are cˈu ri ix mibano chi ri winak cäquibij ajtij chiwe . Iwonojel ri ix , iwachalal iwib , xa cˈu jun ri Iwajtij cˈolic , are ri Cristo .

text: And call no man your father upon the earth : for one is your Father , which is in heaven .
text2: Miban i tat che jun winak cho ruwächulew , xa cˈu jun ri i Tat , are ri cˈo chilaˈ chicaj .

text: Neither be ye called masters : for one is your Master , even Christ .
text2: Miban che iwib chquiwäch ri winak chi ix cˈamal tak qui be , xuwi cˈu ri Cristo are Cˈamal i Be .

text: But he that is greatest among you shall be your servant .
text2: Jachin ri queupatänij conojel , are waˈ ri nim na u banic chixol .

text: And whosoever shall exalt himself shall be abased ; and he that shall humble himself shall be exalted .
text2: Jachin ri nim cuban che rib man nim tä quil wi na . Jachin cˈu ri man nim tä cuban che rib are riˈ nim quil wi na .

text: But woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye shut up the kingdom of heaven against men : for ye neither go in yourselves , neither suffer ye them that are entering to go in .
text2: ¡ Cˈäx ech alak , tijonelab re ri Pixab xukujeˈ ri alak tataˈib fariseos ! ¡ Xak quieb wäch alak ! Quekˈatej alak ri winak rech man queboc tä chquixol ri winak ri cätakan ri Dios pa qui wiˈ . Xak quekˈatej alak ri cäcaj queboquic , man coc tä cˈu alak xukujeˈ .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayer : therefore ye shall receive the greater damnation .
text2: ¡ Cˈäx ech alak , tijonelab re ri Pixab xukujeˈ ri alak tataˈib fariseos ! ¡ Xak quieb wäch alak ! Cätokij alak ri cachoch ri malcaˈnib tak ixokib , te riˈ cäyuk alak u tzaˈm ri tzij alak aretak cäban alak orar , rech man kˈalaj tä ri etzelal ri cäban alak . Rumal riˈ nim na ri cˈäjisabal wäch alak aretak cäkˈat na tzij pa qui wiˈ ri winak .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye compass sea and land to make one proselyte , and when he is made , ye make him twofold more the child of hell than yourselves .
text2: ¡ Cˈäx ech alak , tijonelab re ri Pixab xukujeˈ ri alak tataˈib fariseos ! ¡ Xak quieb wäch alak ! Ri alak cäwacat alak cho ronojel ruwächulew , cäkˈax alak chˈäkäp che tak ri mar chuchˈaquic jun winak rucˈ ri tijonic alak . Aretak cˈut cäcowin alak chuchˈaquic , cäban alak che chi takalic queˈ pa ri kˈakˈ nabe chuwäch alak .

text: Woe unto you , ye blind guides , which say , Whosoever shall swear by the temple , it is nothing ; but whosoever shall swear by the gold of the temple , he is a debtor !
text2: ¡ Cˈäx ech alak , ri alak moyab cˈamal tak be ! Ri alak cäbij alak : “ We jun winak cucoj ru biˈ ri nimalaj rachoch Dios pa ru tzij aretak cuban juramento , man kas rajwaxic tä riˈ cubano jas ri xuchiˈj u banic . Are cˈu we cucoj pa ru tzij ri kˈän puak ri cojom che ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , rajwaxic wi riˈ cubano jas ri xuchiˈj , ” ― cächa alak .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gold , or the temple that sanctifieth the gold ?
text2: ¡ Xak alak con , xak alak moyab ! ¿ Jachique nim na u banic : ri kˈän puak o ri nimalaj rachoch Dios ri cuban nim u banic che ri kˈän puak ?

text: And , Whosoever shall swear by the altar , it is nothing ; but whosoever sweareth by the gift that is upon it , he is guilty .
text2: Xukujeˈ cäbij alak : “ We jun winak cucoj ri taˈbal tokˈob pa ru tzij aretak cuban juramento , man kas rajwaxic tä riˈ cubano jas ri xuchiˈj u banic . We cˈu are cucoj ri sipanic ri cˈo puwiˈ ri taˈbal tokˈob pa ru tzij , rajwaxic riˈ cubano jas ri xuchiˈj , ” ― cächa alak .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gift , or the altar that sanctifieth the gift ?
text2: ¡ Xak alak con , xak alak moyab ! ¿ Jachique ri nim na u banic : ri sipanic o ri taˈbal tokˈob ri cuban sibalaj lokˈ che ri sipanic ?

text: Whoso therefore shall swear by the altar , sweareth by it , and by all things thereon .
text2: Jachin ri cucoj ri taˈbal tokˈob pa ru tzij , man xuwi tä ri taˈbal tokˈob riˈ cucoj pa ru tzij , xane ronojel ri cˈo puwiˈ ri taˈbal tokˈob .

text: And whoso shall swear by the temple , sweareth by it , and by him that dwelleth therein .
text2: Jachin ri cucoj ri nimalaj rachoch Dios pa ru tzij man xuwi tä ri nimalaj rachoch Dios riˈ cucoj pa ru tzij , xane xukujeˈ ri Dios ri cˈo chilaˈ .

text: And he that shall swear by heaven , sweareth by the throne of God , and by him that sitteth thereon .
text2: Xukujeˈ jachin ri cucoj ri caj pa ri u tzij aretak cuban juramento , man xuwi tä cucoj ri jeˈlalaj u tˈuyulibal ri Dios pa ru tzij , xane xukujeˈ ri Dios ri tˈuyul puwiˈ .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye pay tithe of mint and anise and cummin , and have omitted the weightier matters of the law , judgment , mercy , and faith : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: ¡ Cˈäx ech alak , tijonelab re ri Pixab xukujeˈ ri alak tataˈib fariseos ! ¡ Xak quieb wäch alak ! Ri alak cäya alak che ri Dios ru lajujil ri kˈebun , ri anís , ri comino , yoˈm cˈu can alak u banic ri tijonic ri nim u banic ri cˈo pa ri Pixab . Man cäban tä alak ri jicomal , man cätokˈobisaj tä alak qui wäch niqˈuiaj winak chic , man kas tä cäcojon alak che ri Dios . Are waˈ ri rajwaxic cäban alak , man cäya tä cˈu can alak u banic ri niqˈuiaj chic .

text: Ye blind guides , which strain at a gnat , and swallow a camel .
text2: ¡ Ri alak , xak alak moyab cˈamal tak be ! Cäban ech alak jas cuban jun achi , man craj taj cubikˈ bi jun amalo . Jeˈ ta ne chi cäbikˈ bi alak jun awaj camello .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye make clean the outside of the cup and of the platter , but within they are full of extortion and excess .
text2: ¡ Cˈäx ech alak , tijonelab re ri Pixab xukujeˈ ri alak tataˈib fariseos ! ¡ Xak quieb wäch alak ! Utz cäban alak chquiwäch ri winak xak rech utz quil wi alak cumal . Kas tzij cˈut quelakˈan alak , cärayij alak ri quech niqˈuiaj winak chic . Jeˈ ri banic alak jas ri lak ri xuwi chˈajtal ri rij , are cˈu ru pam tzˈil na .

text: Thou blind Pharisee , cleanse first that which is within the cup and platter , that the outside of them may be clean also .
text2: Alak moyab tak fariseos . Are rajwaxic nabe cächˈaj ru pam ri vaso xukujeˈ ri plato , te cˈu riˈ cächˈaj ri rij .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are like unto whited sepulchres , which indeed appear beautiful outward , but are within full of dead men ' s bones , and of all uncleanness .
text2: ¡ Cˈäx ech alak , tijonelab re ri Pixab xukujeˈ ri alak tataˈib fariseos ! ¡ Xak quieb wäch alak ! Junam alak cucˈ ri mukubal que tak ri cäminakib ri tzˈajom ri rij che chun . Rumal riˈ sibalaj jeˈl quelic . Are cˈu ru pam nojinak che qui bakil tak cäminakib , xukujeˈ nojinak che ronojel chulaj tzˈilol .

text: Even so ye also outwardly appear righteous unto men , but within ye are full of hypocrisy and iniquity .
text2: Je riˈ ri alak . Utz quel alak chquiwäch ri winak . Are cˈu ri animaˈ alak sibalaj man utz taj , xak cˈu quieb u wäch ri cäban alak .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! because ye build the tombs of the prophets , and garnish the sepulchres of the righteous ,
text2: ¡ Cˈäx ech alak , tijonelab re ri Pixab xukujeˈ ri alak tataˈib fariseos ! ¡ Xak quieb wäch alak ! Ri alak cäban alak qui banic ri mukubal quech ri kˈalajisal tak re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ojer . Cäwik alak ri mukubal quech ri winak ri utz xcaˈno .

text: And say , If we had been in the days of our fathers , we would not have been partakers with them in the blood of the prophets .
text2: Cäbij cˈu alak : “ We ta xujcˈoji can pa ri qui kˈijol ri ka nan ka tat ojer , mat xujtob riˈ che qui cämisaxic ri kˈalajisal tak re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ojer , ” ― cächa alak .

text: Wherefore ye be witnesses unto yourselves , that ye are the children of them which killed the prophets .
text2: Rucˈ waˈ we cäbij alak riˈ , cäkˈalajisaj ib alak chi alak cachalaxic can ri winak ri xecämisan ri kˈalajisal tak re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios .

text: Fill ye up then the measure of your fathers .
text2: ¡ Xak tajin cäqˈuis alak u banic ri xquichaplej can u banic ri nan tat alak ojer !

text: Ye serpents , ye generation of vipers , how can ye escape the damnation of hell ?
text2: ¡ Alak cumätz ! ¡ Itzel tak winak ! ¡ Alak cal tak cumätz ! ¿ Jachin ta lo ri cätoˈw alak chuwäch ri cˈäjisabal wächaj re ri kˈakˈ ?

text: Wherefore , behold , I send unto you prophets , and wise men , and scribes : and some of them ye shall kill and crucify ; and some of them shall ye scourge in your synagogues , and persecute them from city to city :
text2: Rumal riˈ queintak na lok kˈalajisal tak re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ucˈ alak , queintak na lok achijab ri cˈo qui noˈj xukujeˈ tijonelab . Are cˈu ri alak quecämisaj na alak , querip na alak jujun chque cho ri cruz . Jujun chic quechˈay na alak pa tak ri rachoch Dios . Jujun chic cäban alak cˈäx chque je riˈ chi rajwaxic queanimaj na bi pa tak ri tinimit .

text: That upon you may come all the righteous blood shed upon the earth , from the blood of righteous Abel unto the blood of Zacharias son of Barachias , whom ye slew between the temple and the altar .
text2: Rumal riˈ alak ajchakˈ mac che ri qui cämical conojel ri utzalaj tak winak ri e cämisam . Xchaptaj lok rucˈ ri Abel ri ala ri jicom ranimaˈ cˈä rucˈ ri Zacarías ru cˈojol ri Berequías ri xcämisaj alak chquixol ri rachoch Dios rucˈ ri taˈbal tokˈob .

text: Verily I say unto you , All these things shall come upon this generation .
text2: Kas tzij quinbij chech alak chi ronojel waˈ we mac riˈ cäkaj na pa qui wiˈ ri winak cämic , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ri tijonelab re ri Pixab xukujeˈ ri fariseos .

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , thou that killest the prophets , and stonest them which are sent unto thee , how often would I have gathered thy children together , even as a hen gathereth her chickens under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: ¡ Ay , winak aj Jerusalén ! ¡ Ix riˈ ri queicämisaj ri kˈalajisal tak re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios , queiban che abaj ru takoˈn ri Dios ! ¡ Qˈuia mul nu rayim i mulixic iwonojel ri ix jas cuban jun atiˈt ecˈ queumulij ri alaj tak ral chuxeˈ ru xicˈ ! ¡ Ri ix cˈut man xiwaj taj !

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate .
text2: Xak baˈ chiwila na cäwonobax na can ri iwachoch .

text: For I say unto you , Ye shall not see me henceforth , till ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Quinbij cˈu chiwe chi man quiwil tä chi na nu wäch cˈä copan na ri kˈij aretak quibij : “ Nim u kˈij ri petinak pa ru biˈ ri Kajaw Dios , ” ― quixcha na , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: And Jesus went out , and departed from the temple : and his disciples came to him for to shew him the buildings of the temple .
text2: Xel lok ri Jesús pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , benam re aretak xekeb ru tijoxelab rucˈ , xquichaplej u cˈutic tak ri ja re ri nimalaj rachoch Dios chuwäch .

text: And Jesus said unto them , See ye not all these things ? verily I say unto you , There shall not be left here one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Xchˈaw cˈu ri Jesús , xubij chque : ¿ A quiwil we nimak tak ja riˈ ? Kas tzij ri quinbij chiwe chi man cäcanaj tä cˈu can jun abaj puwiˈ jun abaj chic . Ronojel cäwulix na , ― xcha chque .

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives , the disciples came unto him privately , saying , Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign of thy coming , and of the end of the world ?
text2: Xeˈ cˈu ri Jesús e rachiˈl ru tijoxelab puwiˈ ri Ujuyubal Olivos . Tˈuyul cˈu ri Jesús chilaˈ , ru tijoxelab xeopan rucˈ , xquibij che pa u tuquiel wi : Cäkaj chi cäbij la chke , ¿ jampaˈ cäbantaj na waˈ ? ¿ Jas u wäch etal cäbantaj na chucˈutic chkawäch chi xopan ri kˈij re ri petbal la xukujeˈ ri qˈuisbal re ruwächulew ? ― xecha che .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Take heed that no man deceive you .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij chque : Chichajij iwib , cˈo jachin jun mixsubuwic , ― xcha chque .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: E qˈuia cˈut ri quepe na , cäquicoj na ri nu biˈ , cäquibij : “ In riˈ ri Cristo , ” ― quecha na . E qˈuia winak cˈut ri quesubtaj na cumal , ― xcha chque .

text: And ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars : see that ye be not troubled : for all these things must come to pass , but the end is not yet .
text2: Ri ix quita na chi tajin cäban nimalaj chˈoj , quita na qui tzijoxic tak chˈoj jawijeˈ tak chiˈ , mixej cˈu iwib . Rajwaxic chi jeˈ cäbantaj na waˈ , cˈä mäjaˈ cˈu ri qˈuisbal .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be famines , and pestilences , and earthquakes , in divers places .
text2: Cächˈojin cˈu na ri jun tinimit rucˈ ri jun tinimit chic , xukujeˈ cächˈojin na jun nim takanel rucˈ jun nim takanel chic . Cäpe na wiˈjal , cäpe na nimak tak yabil , quepe na qˈuia cäbrakan jawijeˈ tak chiˈ .

text: All these are the beginning of sorrows .
text2: Xak cˈu chaplebal waˈ re ronojel ri cˈäx ri cäpe na pa qui wiˈ ri winak .

text: Then shall they deliver you up to be afflicted , and shall kill you : and ye shall be hated of all nations for my name ' s sake .
text2: Quixjach cˈu na chquiwäch ri kˈatal tak tzij rech cäban cˈäx chiwe , quixcämisax na . Conojel ri winak cäquetzelaj na i wäch xa rumal wech in .

text: And then shall many be offended , and shall betray one another , and shall hate one another .
text2: Pa tak ri kˈij riˈ e qˈuia ri cuban na quieb qui cˈux chwij . Cäquetzelaj na quib chbil tak quib , cäquijachala na quib pa cämisaxic .

text: And many false prophets shall rise , and shall deceive many .
text2: E qˈuia ri quepe na ri xak e banal tak tzij , cäquibij chi e kˈalajisal tak re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios , e qˈuia cˈu ri winak ri quequisub na .

text: And because iniquity shall abound , the love of many shall wax cold .
text2: Sibalaj cänimar na ri etzelal . Je riˈ chi e qˈuia winak man cäcaj tä chi na quib .

text: But he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Jachin cˈu ri cuchˈij ri cˈäx cˈä cäqˈuis na ronojel , curik na ru tobanic ri Dios .

text: And this gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations ; and then shall the end come .
text2: Cätzijox cˈu na ri Utzalaj Tzij re ri Evangelio chrij ru takanic ri Dios cho ronojel ruwächulew chque conojel qui wäch winak , te cˈu riˈ cäpe na ri qˈuisbal .

text: When ye therefore shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , stand in the holy place , ( whoso readeth , let him understand : )
text2: Ri ka mam Daniel , jun chque ri kˈalajisal tak re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios , xutzˈibaj ojer chrij ri itzel awaj ri quetzelan na ronojel . ( Jachin ri cusiqˈuij waˈ ri tzˈibtal waral , chuchˈoboˈ jachin riˈ ri awaj ri cubij chiˈ . ) Quiwil na waˈ cäcˈoji chilaˈ pa ri lokˈalaj cˈolibal jawijeˈ ri man yaˈtal tä wi chi cˈolic .

text: Then let them which be in Judaea flee into the mountains :
text2: Rajwaxic chi ri winak ri e cˈo pa Judea queanimaj bi pa tak ri juyub .

text: Let him which is on the housetop not come down to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Ri winak ri cˈo puwiˈ ri rachoch , aninak chkaj lok , moc chi bi chupam ri ja chucˈamic bi jas jun jasach .

text: Neither let him which is in the field return back to take his clothes .
text2: Xukujeˈ ri winak ri cˈo pa ri juyub , mätzelej chi bi cho ja chucˈamic bi ri ratzˈiak .

text: And woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: ¡ Sibalaj cˈäx que ri ixokib ri yawab tak winak chic pa tak ri kˈij riˈ , xukujeˈ ri cˈo alaj tak cal ri cˈä quetuˈnic !

text: But pray ye that your flight be not in the winter , neither on the sabbath day :
text2: Chibana baˈ orar , chitaˈ che ri Dios chi mäcˈulmataj ronojel waˈ pa u kˈijol ri tew , xukujeˈ chi mat cäbantaj waˈ pa ri kˈij re uxlanem .

text: For then shall be great tribulation , such as was not since the beginning of the world to this time , no , nor ever shall be .
text2: Cäpe cˈu na nimalaj cˈäxcˈol pa tak ri kˈij riˈ , ri man cˈo tä jumul u banom waˈ tzare chiˈ xchaplex lok ru banic ruwächulew rumal ri Dios , cˈä cämic . Te cˈu riˈ man cäpe tä chi na nimalaj cˈäxcˈol junam rucˈ ri cˈäxcˈol riˈ .

text: And except those days should be shortened , there should no flesh be saved : but for the elect ' s sake those days shall be shortened .
text2: We ta ri Kajaw Dios mat cubano chi xak kˈatatal kˈij cäcˈoji we cˈäxcˈol riˈ , mat cˈo jun winak riˈ ri cäcˈasi canok . Ri Dios cˈut u banom chi xak kˈatatal kˈij cäcˈoji waˈ we cˈäxcˈol riˈ rumal chi queraj ri e chaˈtal rumal ri Areˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: Then if any man shall say unto you , Lo , here is Christ , or there ; believe it not .
text2: We cˈu cˈo jun ri cubij chiwe : “ Chiwilampeˈ , cˈo ri Cristo chi riˈ , ” we cubij : “ Chiwilampeˈ , cˈo jelaˈ , ” ― cächa chiwe , micojo ri cubij .

text: For there shall arise false Christs , and false prophets , and shall shew great signs and wonders ; insomuch that , if it were possible , they shall deceive the very elect .
text2: Quepe cˈu na winak ri cäcaˈn che quib chi e Cristo , xukujeˈ quepe na juleˈ chic ri cäcaˈn che quib chi e kˈalajisal tak re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios . Cäcaˈn na nimak tak etal , xukujeˈ nimak tak cajmabal che qui subic ri winak , xukujeˈ ne ri e chaˈtal rumal ri Dios we quecowinic .

text: Behold , I have told you before .
text2: Nu bim chi cˈu apan waˈ chiwe ix , cˈä mäjaˈ cäbantajic .

text: Wherefore if they shall say unto you , Behold , he is in the desert ; go not forth : behold , he is in the secret chambers ; believe it not .
text2: Rumal riˈ , we cäbix chiwe : “ Chiwilampeˈ , waral cˈo wi ri Areˈ pa ri juyub ri cätzˈinowic , ” mixeˈ che rilic . We cäbix chiwe : “ Chiwilampeˈ , waral cˈo wi pa ja , ” micojo , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: For as the lightning cometh out of the east , and shineth even unto the west ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Jeˈ jas cuban ri caypaˈ ri cärepkˈun cho ri caj chrelbal kˈij cäkˈalajin cˈä chukajbal kˈij , are je riˈ ri nu petic in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak .

text: For wheresoever the carcase is , there will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: Jawijeˈ cˈu cˈo wi ri cäminak , chilaˈ cäquimulij wi na quib ri cˈuch , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ru tijoxelab .

text: Immediately after the tribulation of those days shall the sun be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light , and the stars shall fall from heaven , and the powers of the heavens shall be shaken :
text2: Xak xuwi cˈu cocˈow ri nimalaj cˈäx riˈ , ri kˈij cäkˈekumar na , ri icˈ man cätunun tä chic , quetzak cˈu na lok ri chˈimil cho ri caj . Queslabisax cˈu na conojel ri cˈo qui chukˈab ri e cˈo cho ri caj jeˈ jas ri kˈij , ri icˈ , ri chˈimil xukujeˈ niqˈuiaj chic .

text: And then shall appear the sign of the Son of man in heaven : and then shall all the tribes of the earth mourn , and they shall see the Son of man coming in the clouds of heaven with power and great glory .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ quilitaj na cho ri caj ri retal ri nu petbal in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak . Quebokˈ cˈu na ri winak pa conojel tinimit cho ruwächulew . Quinquil cˈu na in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , in petinak pa tak ri sutzˈ cho ri caj rucˈ nimalaj chukˈab , cänimarisax cˈu na nu kˈij .

text: And he shall send his angels with a great sound of a trumpet , and they shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from one end of heaven to the other .
text2: Queintak cˈu na bi ri nu ángeles , rech rucˈ ru chˈabal ri trompeta ri sibalaj co cätataj na pa ronojel ruwächulew , quebeˈ cˈu che qui mulixic conojel ri e chaˈtal rumal ri Dios pa ri relbal kˈij , pa ri u kajbal kˈij , pa ri u mox ri relbal kˈij , pa ri uwiquiäkˈab ri relbal kˈij , pa ronojel ruwächulew , ― xcha chque .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When his branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is nigh :
text2: Chichˈobo baˈ ri cˈutbal chrij ru cheˈal higos : Aretak queräxar ru kˈab , quetuxin cˈu ru xak , iwetam riˈ chi xak jubikˈ chic man copan ri kˈalaj .

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall see all these things , know that it is near , even at the doors .
text2: Je riˈ xukujeˈ ri ix aretak quiwilo chi tajin cäcˈulmataj ronojel waˈ , chiwetamaj chi xak jubikˈ chic man copan ri kˈij ri quinpetic . Jeˈ ta ne chi in cˈo chiˈ ri uchibe .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass , till all these things be fulfilled .
text2: Kas tzij ri quinbij chiwe chi quebantaj na ronojel waˈ cˈä mäjok quecäm ri winak re we kˈij junab riˈ .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away , but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Cäsach na u wäch ri caj xukujeˈ ruwächulew , are cˈu ri tzij ri nu bim chiwe quebantaj na waˈ , man cäsach tä qui wäch , ― xcha chque .

text: But of that day and hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels of heaven , but my Father only .
text2: Man cˈo tä cˈu jachin jun retam jampaˈ copan ri kˈij riˈ , man etamtal tä cˈu ri hora . Man quetam tä ri ángeles chilaˈ chicaj , man retam tä cˈu ru Cˈojol ri Dios , xane xak xuwi ri ka Tat Dios retam waˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: But as the days of Noe were , so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Jas ri xcˈulmataj pa ru kˈijol ri ka mam Noé ojer , are jeˈ cäcˈulmataj na aretak ri in quinpetic , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak .

text: For as in the days that were before the flood they were eating and drinking , marrying and giving in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark ,
text2: Pa tak ri kˈij riˈ , cˈä mäjok xkaj ri nimalaj kˈekal jäb , ri winak xak xuwi xquilij ri wiˈm , ru tijic tak vino . Xecˈuliˈc , xquiya ri calcˈual che cˈulanem . Je waˈ xcaˈn ronojel kˈij cˈä xoc na ri ka mam Noé pa ri arca .

text: And knew not until the flood came , and took them all away ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Man xeboc tä il cˈä xkaj na ri kˈekal jäb pa qui wiˈ , xecäm cˈu conojel . Je riˈ xukujeˈ cäcˈulmataj na aretak quinpe in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak .

text: Then shall two be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Pa ri kˈij riˈ quecˈoji na quieb achijab ri tajin quechacun pa juyub . Jun chque cäcˈam na bic , are cˈu ri jun chic cäyiˈ na canok .

text: Two women shall be grinding at the mill ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Pa ri kˈij riˈ quecˈoji na quieb ixokib ri tajin quequeˈnic . Ri jun cäcˈam na bic , are cˈu ri jun chic cäyiˈ na canok .

text: Watch therefore : for ye know not what hour your Lord doth come .
text2: Chiwila baˈ iwib , chixcˈascˈatok , rumal chi man iwetam taj jachique hora ri cäpe ri Iwajaw , ru Cˈojol ri Dios .

text: But know this , that if the goodman of the house had known in what watch the thief would come , he would have watched , and would not have suffered his house to be broken up .
text2: Mäsach baˈ chiwe ri quinbij chanim riˈ : We ta jun rajaw ja retam jas hora copan ri elakˈom chakˈab , man cäwar tä na riˈ , xane cäcˈasi na . Man cuya tä riˈ chi ri elakˈom coc bi pa ri rachoch che relakˈaxic bi ri jastak re .

text: Therefore be ye also ready : for in such an hour as ye think not the Son of man cometh .
text2: Rumal riˈ chibana u banic iwib , xak chixeyenok . Aretak cˈut man quichomaj taj chi quinpetic , quinpe na in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak .

text: Who then is a faithful and wise servant , whom his lord hath made ruler over his household , to give them meat in due season ?
text2: Kachomajmpeˈ jas ri cuban jun patrón , ri cˈo jun patänil re ri jicom ranimaˈ , ri cˈo u noˈj , cucoj cˈu can che qui chajixic conojel ri e cˈo pa rachoch rech cuya ri qui wa conojel ri rajchaquib ronojel kˈij .

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: Utz re ri patäninel riˈ we tajin cubano jas ri xtak wi canok aretak cätzelej lok ru patrón .

text: Verily I say unto you , That he shall make him ruler over all his goods .
text2: Kas tzij ri quinbij chiwe , chi ri patrón cucoj na ri patäninel riˈ che chajil re conojel ri jastak re .

text: But and if that evil servant shall say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ;
text2: We cˈu ri patäninel man utzalaj achi taj , cuchomaj cˈu ri areˈ chi ru patrón man cätzelej tä lok chanim ,

text: And shall begin to smite his fellowservants , and to eat and drink with the drunken ;
text2: cuchaplej u banic cˈäx chque ri niqˈuiaj ajchaquib , cuchaplej wiˈm , cuchaplej u tijic jaˈ cucˈ ri kˈabarelab .

text: The lord of that servant shall come in a day when he looketh not for him , and in an hour that he is not aware of ,
text2: Teˈtalic ri patrón cätzelej lok pa ri kˈij ri man retam tä ri patäninel , pa ri hora ri man cuchomaj taj .

text: And shall cut him asunder , and appoint him his portion with the hypocrites : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Sibalaj cˈäx cˈu ri cˈäjisabal u wäch cuya na ri patrón , junam u cˈäjisaxic u wäch cuban na cucˈ ri winak ri xak quieb qui wäch . Cutij cˈu na okˈej cucˈ , cukuchˈuchˈej na ru ware , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ru tijoxelab .

text: Then shall the kingdom of heaven be likened unto ten virgins , which took their lamps , and went forth to meet the bridegroom .
text2: Ru takanic ri Dios pa qui wiˈ ri winak quinjunamaj rucˈ ri lajuj alitomab ri xebeˈ cho rachoch ri ali ri cäcˈuliˈc che reyexic ri novio . Chquijujunal cˈut xquicˈam bi ri qui lámparas .

text: And five of them were wise , and five were foolish .
text2: E job chque ri alitomab e sakˈorib , are cˈu ri job chic e sacˈaj .

text: They that were foolish took their lamps , and took no oil with them :
text2: Ri alitomab ri e sakˈorib xquicˈam bi ri qui lámparas , man xquicˈam tä cˈu bi niqˈuiaj aceite chic rech cäquiya chquipam .

text: But the wise took oil in their vessels with their lamps .
text2: Are cˈu ri alitomab ri e sacˈaj xquicˈam bi ri qui lámparas xukujeˈ xquicˈam bi ri qui lemeˈt re aceite .

text: While the bridegroom tarried , they all slumbered and slept .
text2: Xbeytaj cˈu ri novio . Ri lajuj alitomab conojel xquichaplej yuxcˈatem , xewar cˈut .

text: And at midnight there was a cry made , Behold , the bridegroom cometh ; go ye out to meet him .
text2: Pa niqˈuiaj akˈab cˈut xtataj jun ri co xchˈawic , xubij cˈut : “ ¡ Chiwilampeˈ , xpe ri novio , chixel lok chucˈulaxic ! ” ― xchaˈ .

text: Then all those virgins arose , and trimmed their lamps .
text2: Xewalij cˈu conojel ri alitomab , xquiban u banic ri qui lámparas .

text: And the foolish said unto the wise , Give us of your oil ; for our lamps are gone out .
text2: Are cˈu ri alitomab ri e sakˈorib xquibij chque ri alitomab ri e sacˈaj : “ Chiya jubikˈ ke ri iwaceite rech man quechup tä ri ka lámparas uj , ” ― xecha chque .

text: But the wise answered , saying , Not so ; lest there be not enough for us and you : but go ye rather to them that sell , and buy for yourselves .
text2: Ri alitomab ri e sacˈaj xechˈawic , xquibij : “ Man cuyaˈ taj , rumal chi man cubana tä ne ri kech uj we cäkaya ri iwe ix . Are utz xa quilokˈo lok ri iwe pa ri cˈayibal , ” ― xecha chque .

text: And while they went to buy , the bridegroom came ; and they that were ready went in with him to the marriage : and the door was shut .
text2: E benak cˈu ri job alitomab ri e sakˈorib chulokˈic ri aceite aretak xopan can ri novio . Ri job alitomab ri cucˈam caceite xeboc rucˈ ri novio pa ri nimakˈij re ri cˈulanem . Xtzˈapix cˈu ri uchija .

text: Afterward came also the other virgins , saying , Lord , Lord , open to us .
text2: Xetzelej cˈu lok ri job alitomab chic ri xebeˈ chulokˈic ri caceite , xquibij cˈut : “ ¡ Tat , tat , jaka la ri uchija chkawäch ! ” ― xechaˈ .

text: But he answered and said , Verily I say unto you , I know you not .
text2: Ri areˈ cˈut xubij chque : “ Kas tzij quinbij chiwe chi man wetam tä i wäch , ” ― xcha chque .

text: Watch therefore , for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque ru tijoxelab : Chiwila baˈ iwib ix , chixcˈascˈatok , rumal chi man iwetam taj jachique kˈij , jachique hora quinpe in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , ― xcha chque .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is as a man travelling into a far country , who called his own servants , and delivered unto them his goods .
text2: Ru takanic ri Dios pa qui wiˈ ri winak quinjunamaj rucˈ jun achi ri queˈ pa binem . Ri achi riˈ , aretak xak jubikˈ craj chi quel bic rech queˈ pa jun tinimit chic , xeusiqˈuij ri patänil tak re , xujach cˈu can ru rajil chquiwäch rech quechacun rucˈ .

text: And unto one he gave five talents , to another two , and to another one ; to every man according to his several ability ; and straightway took his journey .
text2: Xuya chque chquijujunal jas ri quecowinic chucojic . Xuya job mil quetzal che ri jun , che ri jun chic xuya quieb mil quetzal , che ri jun chic xuya mil quetzal . Te riˈ ri achi xeˈ pa ru binem .

text: Then he that had received the five talents went and traded with the same , and made them other five talents .
text2: Ri patäninel ri xucˈam job mil quetzal xeˈc , xchacun rucˈ ri puak . Je riˈ xuchˈac chi job mil quetzal chic .

text: And likewise he that had received two , he also gained other two .
text2: Xukujeˈ ri patäninel ri xucˈam quieb mil quetzal jeˈ xubano , xuchˈac chi quieb mil quetzal chic .

text: But he that had received one went and digged in the earth , and hid his lord ' s money .
text2: Are cˈu ri patäninel ri xucˈam xa mil quetzal xeˈc , xucˈuˈ ru rajil ru patrón , xumuk pa ri ulew .

text: After a long time the lord of those servants cometh , and reckoneth with them .
text2: Xqueˈ cˈu qˈuia kˈij , xtzelej lok ri qui patrón ri patäninelab , xuchap cˈu u banic cuenta cucˈ chrij ru rajil .

text: And so he that had received five talents came and brought other five talents , saying , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me five talents : behold , I have gained beside them five talents more .
text2: Nabe xopan ri u cˈamom job mil quetzal , xujach cˈu che ru patrón ri job mil quetzal chic ru chˈacom , xubij che : “ Tat , job mil quetzal xya la chwe , cämic riˈ quinjach che la ri job mil quetzal chic ri xinchˈaco , ” ― xcha che .

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , thou good and faithful servant : thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: Ri patrón xubij che : “ Ri at , at utzalaj patäninel ri jicom awanimaˈ . Rumal chi jicom awanimaˈ rucˈ ri jubikˈ ri xinya chawe , nim cˈu na ri quinya chi na chawe . Chatoc baˈ lok , chatquicot junam wucˈ , ” ― xcha che .

text: He also that had received two talents came and said , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me two talents : behold , I have gained two other talents beside them .
text2: Xopan chi cˈu ri patäninel ru cˈamom quieb mil quetzal , xubij che ru patrón : “ Tat , quieb mil quetzal xya la chwe , cämic riˈ quinjach che la ri quieb mil chic ri xinchˈaco , ” ― xcha che .

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , good and faithful servant ; thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: Ri patrón xubij che : “ Ri at xukujeˈ at utzalaj patäninel ri jicom awanimaˈ . Rumal chi jicom awanimaˈ rucˈ ri jubikˈ ri xinya chawe , nim cˈu na ri quinya chawe , chatoc baˈ lok , chatquicot junam wucˈ , ” ― xcha che .

text: Then he which had received the one talent came and said , Lord , I knew thee that thou art an hard man , reaping where thou hast not sown , and gathering where thou hast not strawed :
text2: Aretak cˈut xopan ri patäninel ri u cˈamom xa mil quetzal , xubij che ru patrón : “ Tat , ri in wetam chi sibalaj lal cˈaˈn , chi cäyac la u wäch ri ulew ri man xticonij tä wi la , cämol la ri man xjopin tä wi la .

text: And I was afraid , and went and hid thy talent in the earth : lo , there thou hast that is thine .
text2: Rumal riˈ xinxej wib , xineˈ cˈut , xincˈuˈ ri rajil la , xinmuk pulew . Quinjach cˈu we rajil la riˈ , ” ― xcha che .

text: His lord answered and said unto him , Thou wicked and slothful servant , thou knewest that I reap where I sowed not , and gather where I have not strawed :
text2: Xubij cˈu ri patrón che : “ Ri at , at itzelalaj patäninel ri xa casakˈorij ra chac . Caqˈuey u chˈaquic ri puak . Ri at awetam chi quinyac u wäch ri ulew ri man quinticonij tä wi , xukujeˈ quinmol ri man xinjopij taj .

text: Thou oughtest therefore to have put my money to the exchangers , and then at my coming I should have received mine own with usury .
text2: We je riˈ , xaya ta cˈu ri nu rajil pa ri banco . We ta je riˈ xabano , aretak xintzelej lok xincˈam ta riˈ ri nu rajil rucˈ ri ral , ” ― xcha che .

text: Take therefore the talent from him , and give it unto him which hath ten talents .
text2: Ri patrón xubij chque ri niqˈuiaj ajchaquib chic ri e cˈo chilaˈ : “ Chicˈama baˈ ri mil quetzal che , chiya che ri jun ri cˈo lajuj mil quetzal rucˈ , ” ― xcha chque .

text: For unto every one that hath shall be given , and he shall have abundance : but from him that hath not shall be taken away even that which he hath .
text2: “ Je riˈ , rumal chi jachin ri qˈuia cˈo rucˈ cäyiˈ na niqˈuiaj chic che , cocˈow cˈu na u wiˈ ri cˈo rucˈ . Are cˈu ri jun ri man qˈuia tä cˈo rucˈ , quesax na ri jubikˈ ri cˈo rucˈ , ” ― xcha chque .

text: And cast ye the unprofitable servant into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: “ Are cˈu we patäninel riˈ ri man cˈo tä xuchˈac chrij ri rajil ri xyiˈ che , jiqˈuiäka can chrij ja pa ri kˈekum . Chilaˈ cˈut cokˈ wi na , chilaˈ cukuchˈuchˈej wi na ru ware , ” ― xcha ri Jesús chque ru tijoxelab .

text: When the Son of man shall come in his glory , and all the holy angels with him , then shall he sit upon the throne of his glory :
text2: Aretak quinpe na in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , ya jun Nim Takanel chic quinpetic . Conojel ri ángeles quepe na che wachiˈl , quintˈuyi cˈu na pa ri jeˈlalaj nu tˈuyulibal ri sibalaj nim u kˈij .

text: And before him shall be gathered all nations : and he shall separate them one from another , as a shepherd divideth his sheep from the goats :
text2: Ri winak re conojel tak ri tinimit cho ruwächulew cäquimulij na quib chnuwäch , queinchaˈ cˈu na ri jicom qui cˈaslemal chquixol ri man jicom taj . Jeˈ quinban na jas ri cuban ri ajyukˈ queuchaˈ ri u chij chquixol ri qˈuisicˈ .

text: And he shall set the sheep on his right hand , but the goats on the left .
text2: Queinya na ri chij pa ri nu wiquiäkˈab , are cˈu ri qˈuisicˈ pa nu moxkˈab .

text: Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand , Come , ye blessed of my Father , inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world :
text2: Te riˈ ri in , in riˈ ri Nim Takanel , quinbij na chque ri e cˈo pa nu wiquiäkˈab : “ Chixsaˈj ix , ri ix tewchital rumal ri nu Tat . Chixoc chilaˈ jawijeˈ ri cätakan wi ri Dios , ri u chomam chi cˈu lok waˈ tzaretak xuban ri cajulew chi cuya chiwe .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me drink : I was a stranger , and ye took me in :
text2: Rumal chi aretak xinnumic , xiya nu wa , aretak xchakiˈj nu chiˈ , xiya jas quintijo , aretak xinwonocatic , xinicˈulaj cho tak iwachoch .

text: Naked , and ye clothed me : I was sick , and ye visited me : I was in prison , and ye came unto me .
text2: Aretak man cˈo tä chi watzˈiak , ri ix xiya ri watzˈiak , aretak xinyawajic , xixopan wucˈ , aretak xinoc pa cheˈ , xixeˈ che wilic , ” ― quincha na chque .

text: Then shall the righteous answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , and fed thee ? or thirsty , and gave thee drink ?
text2: Ri winak ri jicom canimaˈ chuwäch ri Dios cäquibij na chwe : “ Tat , ¿ jampaˈ cˈu ri xkilo chi cänum la , te cˈu riˈ xkaya wa la ? ¿ Jampaˈ xkilo chi cächakiˈj chiˈ la , te cˈu riˈ xkaya jas ri cätij la ?

text: When saw we thee a stranger , and took thee in ? or naked , and clothed thee ?
text2: ¿ Jampaˈ ta cˈu xkilo chi xak cäwonocat la , xkacˈulaj ta cˈu la pa ri kachoch ? ¿ Jampaˈ xkilo chi man cˈo tä atzˈiak la , xkaya cˈut ?

text: Or when saw we thee sick , or in prison , and came unto thee ?
text2: ¿ Jampaˈ ta cˈu xkilo chi lal yawab o cˈo la pa cheˈ , te cˈu riˈ xujopan ucˈ la che rilic jas banom la ? ” ― quecha na .

text: And the King shall answer and say unto them , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren , ye have done it unto me .
text2: Ri in , in riˈ ri Nim Takanel , quinbij na chque : “ Kas tzij quinbij chiwe , chi apachique utzil ri xiban che apachin chque ri wachalal pune man nim u banic , chwe in riˈ xiban wi waˈ , ” ― quincha na chque .

text: Then shall he say also unto them on the left hand , Depart from me , ye cursed , into everlasting fire , prepared for the devil and his angels :
text2: Quinbij cˈu na chque ri winak ri e cˈo pa nu moxkˈab : “ Chixel chnuwäch , ix ri kˈatom tzij pi wiˈ chi cäcˈäjisax i wäch . Jix pa ri kˈakˈ ri man cächuptaj taj ri banom u banic rech chilaˈ quecˈol wi ri Itzel e rachiˈl ru ángeles .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me no meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me no drink :
text2: Rumal chi aretak xinnumic , man xiya tä nu wa , aretak xchakiˈj nu chiˈ , man xiya tä chwe jas quintijo .

text: I was a stranger , and ye took me not in : naked , and ye clothed me not : sick , and in prison , and ye visited me not .
text2: Aretak xak xinwonocatic , man xinicˈulaj tä cho tak iwachoch . Aretak man cˈo tä chi watzˈiak , man cˈo tä ri xiya chwe . Aretak xinyawajic , aretak xinoc pa cheˈ , man xixopan tä che wilic , ” ― quincha na chque .

text: Then shall they also answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , or athirst , or a stranger , or naked , or sick , or in prison , and did not minister unto thee ?
text2: Cäquibij cˈu na chwe : “ Tat , ¿ jampaˈ ta cˈu lo xkilo chi cänum la , jampaˈ xkilo chi cächakiˈj chiˈ la , jampaˈ xkilo chi xak cäwonocat la , jampaˈ xkilo chi man cˈo tä atzˈiak la , jampaˈ xkilo chi xyawaj la o xoc la pa cheˈ , te cˈu riˈ man xujtob tä che la ? ” ― quecha na chwe .

text: Then shall he answer them , saying , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye did it not to one of the least of these , ye did it not to me .
text2: Ri in , in riˈ ri Nim Takanel , quinchˈawic , quinbij na chque : “ Kas tzij quinbij chiwe chi apachique utzil ri man xiban tä che apachin jun winak , pune man nim u banic , chwe in riˈ man xiban tä wi , ” ― quincha na chque .

text: And these shall go away into everlasting punishment : but the righteous into life eternal .
text2: Ri winak riˈ quebeˈ na chilaˈ jawijeˈ ri man cätäni tä wi ru cˈäjisaxic qui wäch . Are cˈu ri winak ri jicom canimaˈ cho ri Dios quebeˈ na chilaˈ jawijeˈ ri cˈo wi ri cˈaslemal ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had finished all these sayings , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Aretak xtoˈtaj ri Jesús chubixic ronojel waˈ we tzij riˈ , xubij chque ru tijoxelab :

text: Ye know that after two days is the feast of the passover , and the Son of man is betrayed to be crucified .
text2: Ri ix iwetam chi xa pa quieb kˈij cäban na ri nimakˈij , Pascua u biˈ . Ri in cˈut , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , quinjach na pa qui kˈab ri nu cˈulel , rech quinrip cho ri cruz , quincämisax na , ― xcha chque .

text: Then assembled together the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders of the people , unto the palace of the high priest , who was called Caiaphas ,
text2: Xquimulij cˈu quib ri qui nimakil sacerdotes , ri tijonelab re ri Pixab xukujeˈ ri qui nimal ri winak aj Israel cho ri nimalaj ja rech ri tat Caifás ri qui nimal sacerdotes .

text: And consulted that they might take Jesus by subtilty , and kill him .
text2: Chilaˈ xquitala qui noˈj chbil tak quib jas cäcaˈn na chuchapic ri Jesús rucˈ subunic rech cäquicämisaj .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar among the people .
text2: Xquibij cˈut : Mächap pa ri nimakˈij , rech metuquin ne ri winak , ― xechaˈ .

text: Now when Jesus was in Bethany , in the house of Simon the leper ,
text2: Are cˈu ri Jesús cˈo pa ri tinimit Betania cho rachoch ri tat Simón , jun tataˈ ri xcˈoji na itzel chˈaˈc che .

text: There came unto him a woman having an alabaster box of very precious ointment , and poured it on his head , as he sat at meat .
text2: Xopan jun ixok ri rucˈam jun cˈolibal cunabal re alabastro ri nojinak che cˈocˈalaj cunabal . Sibalaj pakal rajil waˈ we cunabal riˈ . Tˈuyul cˈu ri Jesús chiˈ ri mesa , ri ixok xukˈij ri aceite pu jolom ri Jesús .

text: But when his disciples saw it , they had indignation , saying , To what purpose is this waste ?
text2: Aretak ri tijoxelab xquil waˈ , xpe coyowal , xquibij cˈu chbil tak quib : ¿ Jas che xak xtix waˈ we cunabal riˈ ? ― xechaˈ .

text: For this ointment might have been sold for much , and given to the poor .
text2: Xqˈuiyix ta ne waˈ , xtoj ta nimalaj rajil , xyiˈ ta cˈu ri puak chque ri mebaˈib , ― xechaˈ .

text: When Jesus understood it , he said unto them , Why trouble ye the woman ? for she hath wrought a good work upon me .
text2: Xuta cˈu ri Jesús ri cäquibij , xubij chque : ¿ Jas che quiya latzˈ che ri ixok riˈ ? Jun nimalaj utzil cˈu waˈ ru banom chwe , ― xcha chque .

text: For ye have the poor always with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Amakˈel ronojel kˈij cˈut e cˈo ri mebaˈib iwucˈ , are cˈu ri in man in cˈo tä iwucˈ amakˈel .

text: For in that she hath poured this ointment on my body , she did it for my burial .
text2: Ri xuban ri ixok aretak xukˈij ri cˈocˈalaj aceite chwij , xa xucoj cˈu bi ri cˈocˈalaj cunabal chrij ri nu cuerpo cˈä mäjok quinmukic , ― xcha chque .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached in the whole world , there shall also this , that this woman hath done , be told for a memorial of her .
text2: Kas cˈu tzij ri quinbij chiwe chi apawijeˈ ta ne ri cätzijox wi na ri Utzalaj Tzij re ri Evangelio cho ronojel ruwächulew , ru banom we ixok riˈ cätzijox na che naˈtabal re , ― xcha chque .

text: Then one of the twelve , called Judas Iscariot , went unto the chief priests ,
text2: Te cˈu riˈ jun chque ri cablajuj tijoxelab , ri u biˈ Judas Iscariote , xel bic , xeˈ cucˈ ri qui nimakil ri sacerdotes .

text: And said unto them , What will ye give me , and I will deliver him unto you ? And they covenanted with him for thirty pieces of silver .
text2: Xubij cˈu chque : ¿ Jas cäya alak chwe , we quinjach ri Jesús pa kˈab alak ? ― xcha chque . Ri e areˈ cˈut xquiya juwinak lajuj rakan sak puak che ri tat Judas .

text: And from that time he sought opportunity to betray him .
text2: Tzare chiˈ cˈut ri tat Judas xutzucuj jun utzalaj kˈij rech cujach ri Jesús pa qui kˈab .

text: Now the first day of the feast of unleavened bread the disciples came to Jesus , saying unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare for thee to eat the passover ?
text2: Pa ri nabe kˈij re ri nimakˈij aretak cätijow ri caxlan wa ri man cäyiˈ tä chˈäm rucˈ , ru tijoxelab ri Jesús xekeb rucˈ , xquibij che : ¿ Jawijeˈ caj wi la chi cäkaˈn wi ri wiˈm re ri Pascua rech cätij la ? ― xecha che .

text: And he said , Go into the city to such a man , and say unto him , The Master saith , My time is at hand ; I will keep the passover at thy house with my disciples .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij chque : Jix pa ri tinimit cho rachoch ri jun achi , chibij cˈu che : “ Cutaˈ ri Kajtij che la , cubij : Ya xopan ri hora . Cho achoch cˈu la quinban na u banic wi ri nimakˈij re ri Pascua cucˈ ri nu tijoxelab , ” ― cächa riˈ , ― quixcha che , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: And the disciples did as Jesus had appointed them ; and they made ready the passover .
text2: Ri tijoxelab xcaˈno jas ri xetak wi rumal ri Jesús . Xcaˈn cˈu u banic ri wiˈm re ri Pascua chilaˈ .

text: Now when the even was come , he sat down with the twelve .
text2: Aretak chakˈab chic , ri Jesús xtˈuyi chiˈ ri mesa cucˈ ri cablajuj u tijoxelab .

text: And as they did eat , he said , Verily I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: E tˈuyul chilaˈ chiˈ ri mesa , tajin quewiˈc aretak ri Jesús xubij chque : Kas tzij ri quinbij chiwe chi cˈo jun chiwe ri quinujach na , ― xcha chque .

text: And they were exceeding sorrowful , and began every one of them to say unto him , Lord , is it I ?
text2: Ru tijoxelab sibalaj xebisonic . Chquijujunal cˈut xquichaplej u taˈic che ri Jesús : Kajaw , ¿ a man xa in riˈ ? ― xechaˈ .

text: And he answered and said , He that dippeth his hand with me in the dish , the same shall betray me .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij chque : Are ri jun ri curub ru wa wucˈ pa ri lak , are cˈu riˈ ri quinjachow na , ― xcha chque .

text: The Son of man goeth as it is written of him : but woe unto that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! it had been good for that man if he had not been born .
text2: Jeˈ cˈu quel na jas ri tzˈibtal pa ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios chwij in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak . ¡ Cˈäx cˈu ri curik na ri achi ri quinjachow na ! ¡ Utz na re we achi riˈ we ta mat xil u wäch ! ― xcha chque .

text: Then Judas , which betrayed him , answered and said , Master , is it I ? He said unto him , Thou hast said .
text2: Xchˈaw cˈu ri Judas ri tijoxel ri cäjachow na , xubij che ri Jesús : We ne in , Ajtij , ― xcha che . Xubij ri Jesús che : Jeˈ , at riˈ , ― xcha che .

text: And as they were eating , Jesus took bread , and blessed it , and brake it , and gave it to the disciples , and said , Take , eat ; this is my body .
text2: Aretak tajin quewiˈc , ri Jesús xucˈam ri caxlan wa , xuban orar , xumaltioxij waˈ che ri Dios . Te cˈu riˈ xupiro , xuya chquiwäch ru tijoxelab , xubij : Chitija iwe waˈ , jeˈ ta ne chi are nu cuerpo waˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and gave it to them , saying , Drink ye all of it ;
text2: Te cˈu riˈ xucˈam jun vaso , xumaltioxij waˈ che ri Dios , te riˈ xuya chquiwäch ru tijoxelab , xubij chque : Chitija iwe iwonojel .

text: For this is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many for the remission of sins .
text2: Jeˈ ta ne chi are nu quiqˈuel waˈ ri cujiquiba ri cˈacˈ trato ru banom ri Dios cucˈ ri winak . Cäturuw cˈu na waˈ ri nu quiqˈuel che sachbal qui mac qˈuia winak .

text: But I say unto you , I will not drink henceforth of this fruit of the vine , until that day when I drink it new with you in my Father ' s kingdom .
text2: Kas tzij ri quinbij chiwe chi man cˈo tä jumul quintij chi na we ri vino re uvas , cˈä pa ri kˈij ri quintij na ri cˈacˈ vino junam iwucˈ chilaˈ jawijeˈ ri cätakan wi ri nu Tat , ― xcha chque .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ xquibixoj jun bix ri cuya u kˈij ri Dios , xebel bi chilaˈ , xebeˈ pa ri Ujuyubal Olivos .

text: Then saith Jesus unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep of the flock shall be scattered abroad .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque : Ri ix iwonojel quibisoj na nu wäch , quiniya na can nu tuquiel cämic chakˈab . Je cˈu tzˈibtal can pa ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios : “ Quincämisaj na ri ajyukˈ , quejabun cˈu na ri chij , ” ― cächaˈ .

text: But after I am risen again , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Aretak cˈu ri in , in cˈastajinak chic chquixol ri cäminakib , quinnabej na bi chiwäch , quineˈ na pa Galilea , ― xcha chque .

text: Peter answered and said unto him , Though all men shall be offended because of thee , yet will I never be offended .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri tat Pedro che ri Jesús : Pune conojel cäyiˈ la can cumal , ri in man jeˈ tä riˈ quinbano , ― xcha che .

text: Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this night , before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús che : Kas tzij ri quinbij chawe chi tzpa we akˈab riˈ cämic , cabij na at oxmul chi man awetam tä nu wäch mäjok cokˈ ri amaˈ ecˈ , ― xcha che .

text: Peter said unto him , Though I should die with thee , yet will I not deny thee . Likewise also said all the disciples .
text2: Ri tat Pedro xubij che : Pune rajwaxic chi quincäm na ucˈ la , man cˈo tä na jumul quinbij chi man wetam tä wäch la , ― xcha che . Je cˈu xquibij xukujeˈ conojel ru tijoxelab .

text: Then cometh Jesus with them unto a place called Gethsemane , and saith unto the disciples , Sit ye here , while I go and pray yonder .
text2: Xopan cˈu ri Jesús pa ri chˈäkap ulew u biˈ Getsemaní e rachiˈl ru tijoxelab , xubij cˈu chque : Chixtˈuyul can waral . Ri in cˈut quineˈ na jelaˈ chubanic orar , ― xcha chque .

text: And he took with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee , and began to be sorrowful and very heavy .
text2: Xucˈam bi ri tat Pedro rucˈ xukujeˈ ri quieb u cˈojol ri tat Zebedeo . Xuchaplej cˈu tˈujuwem ri Jesús , xcˈäxcˈob ri ranimaˈ .

text: Then saith he unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful , even unto death : tarry ye here , and watch with me .
text2: Xubij cˈu chque : Sibalaj cuqˈuis rib ri wanimaˈ chupam ri bis . Chixcanaj can chiˈ , chixcˈascˈat wucˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: And he went a little further , and fell on his face , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if it be possible , let this cup pass from me : nevertheless not as I will , but as thou wilt .
text2: Te riˈ xbin chi apan jubikˈ ri Jesús , xxuquiˈc , xuya ru palaj cho ri ulew , xuban orar , xubij : Tat , we cuyaˈ , chesaj baˈ la we vaso riˈ chnuwäch , bana la chi man cäpe tä ri cˈäx riˈ chwij . Mäban baˈ xa jas ri nu rayibal in , xane jas ri rayibal la , ― xcha che ri Dios .

text: And he cometh unto the disciples , and findeth them asleep , and saith unto Peter , What , could ye not watch with me one hour ?
text2: Xtzelej cˈu ri Jesús jawijeˈ e cˈo wi ru tijoxelab , xeurika tajin quewaric . Xubij cˈu che ri tat Pedro : ¿ A mat xixcowinic xixcˈasi ta jun hora wucˈ ? ― xcha che .

text: Watch and pray , that ye enter not into temptation : the spirit indeed is willing , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Chiwila baˈ iwib , chixcˈascˈatok , chibana orar rech man quixtzak taj aretak quixtakchiˈx che mac . Kas tzij pa ri iwanimaˈ quiwaj quiban ri utzil , man cˈo tä cˈu u chukˈab ri i cuerpo chubanic waˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: He went away again the second time , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if this cup may not pass away from me , except I drink it , thy will be done .
text2: Xeˈ chi jumul ri Jesús chubanic orar , jeˈ xubij waˈ : ¡ Tat ! We baˈ tzrajwaxic wi chi cäpe ri cˈäx riˈ chwij , bana baˈ la chwe jas ri rayibal la , ― xcha che ri Dios .

text: And he came and found them asleep again : for their eyes were heavy .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ xtzelej chic , xeurika ru tijoxelab jumul chic tajin quewaric rumal chi sibalaj cˈäx qui waram .

text: And he left them , and went away again , and prayed the third time , saying the same words .
text2: Xeuya canok , xeˈ chi jumul ri Jesús chubanic orar churoxmul , je cˈu xubij jas ri xubij nabe .

text: Then cometh he to his disciples , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : behold , the hour is at hand , and the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ xeˈ jelaˈ jawijeˈ e cˈo wi ru tijoxelab , xubij chque : Chixwar baˈ , chixuxlanok . Xopan ri hora . Quinjach cˈu na in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , pa qui kˈab ri ajmaquib , ― xcha chque .

text: Rise , let us be going : behold , he is at hand that doth betray me .
text2: ¡ Joˈ baˈ ! ¡ Chixwalijok ! Chiwilampeˈ , xpe ri jachal we , ― xcha chque .

text: And while he yet spake , lo , Judas , one of the twelve , came , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and elders of the people .
text2: Cˈä tajin cächˈaw ri Jesús aretak xopan ri tat Judas , jun chque ri cablajuj u tijoxelab . E petinak rucˈ ri areˈ qˈuia winak ri cucˈam machetes , cucˈam cheˈ . E takom lok cumal ri qui nimakil sacerdotes , xukujeˈ cumal ri qui nimakil ri winak aj Israel .

text: Now he that betrayed him gave them a sign , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he : hold him fast .
text2: Ri tat Judas ri jachal re ri Jesús u yoˈm cˈu can jun etal chque ri winak , xubij : “ Ri quintzˈumaj , are riˈ ri Jesús . Chichapaˈ , kas utz chibana bi chucˈamic , ” ― xcha chque .

text: And forthwith he came to Jesus , and said , Hail , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Xkeb cˈu ri tat Judas rucˈ ri Jesús , xubij che : ¡ Xoc akˈab , Ajtij ! ― xcha che . Te cˈu riˈ xutzˈumaj .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Friend , wherefore art thou come ? Then came they , and laid hands on Jesus , and took him .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij che : Wachiˈl , ¿ jas a tajquil xatpetic ? ― xcha che . Xekeb cˈu ri winak rucˈ ri Jesús , xquichapo , xquiyut bic .

text: And , behold , one of them which were with Jesus stretched out his hand , and drew his sword , and struck a servant of the high priest ' s , and smote off his ear .
text2: Aretak jeˈ xbanic , jun chque ri e rachiˈl ri Jesús xucˈam ru machete , xusoc ri patänil re ri qui nimal sacerdotes , xukˈat apan ru xiquin .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Put up again thy sword into his place : for all they that take the sword shall perish with the sword .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús che : Chaya ri a machete pa ri cˈolibal re . Conojel cˈu ri quechˈayan rucˈ machete , rucˈ machete quecämisax na , ― xcha che .

text: Thinkest thou that I cannot now pray to my Father , and he shall presently give me more than twelve legions of angels ?
text2: ¿ A mat awetam chi quincowinic quintaˈ apan che ri nu Tat chi quinutoˈ , chi ri Areˈ cutak na lok chanim oxcˈal lajuj mil ángeles che nu toˈic ?

text: But how then shall the scriptures be fulfilled , that thus it must be ?
text2: We ta cˈu je riˈ , man jeˈ tä quel wi riˈ ri tzˈibtal pa ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios , chi rajwaxic cäbantaj na waˈ we riˈ , ― xcha che .

text: In that same hour said Jesus to the multitudes , Are ye come out as against a thief with swords and staves for to take me ? I sat daily with you teaching in the temple , and ye laid no hold on me .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque ri winak : ¿ Jas lo waˈ chi jeˈ ta ne chrij jun elakˈom elinak wi lok alak ? ¿ A cˈamom alak lok ri machete alak , ri cheˈ alak che nu chapic ? ― xcha chque . Ronojel kˈij xincˈoji ucˈ alak pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , xinya ri tijonic chech alak , man xinchap tä cˈu alak .

text: But all this was done , that the scriptures of the prophets might be fulfilled . Then all the disciples forsook him , and fled .
text2: Je cˈu cäban na waˈ chwe , rech jeˈ cäbantaj na jas ri tzˈibam can chwij cumal ri kˈalajisal tak re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios , ― xcha chque . Chanim cˈut conojel ri tijoxelab xquiya can ri Jesús u tuquiel , xeanimaj bic .

text: And they that had laid hold on Jesus led him away to Caiaphas the high priest , where the scribes and the elders were assembled .
text2: Ri winak ri xechapow ri Jesús xquicˈam bi chuwäch ri tat Caifás , ri kas qui nimal ri sacerdotes . Chilaˈ cˈut qui mulim wi quib ri tijonelab re ri Pixab , xukujeˈ ri qui nimakil ri winak aj Israel .

text: But Peter followed him afar off unto the high priest ' s palace , and went in , and sat with the servants , to see the end .
text2: Are cˈu ri tat Pedro xuterenej bi ri Jesús chi naj , xopan pa ri uwoja rech ri rachoch ri kas qui nimal sacerdotes . Xoc bi ri tat Pedro , xtˈuyi cˈu ri areˈ chilaˈ cucˈ ri chajil tak re ri nimalaj rachoch Dios rech cärilo jas ri cäcˈulmataj na rucˈ ri Jesús .

text: Now the chief priests , and elders , and all the council , sought false witness against Jesus , to put him to death ;
text2: Ri qui nimakil sacerdotes , ri qui nimakil ri winak aj Israel , xukujeˈ conojel ri cˈamal tak qui be ri winak , tajin cäquitzucuj jas u wäch mac ri cäkˈalajisax chrij ri Jesús , pune man kas tzij taj , rech cäkˈat tzij puwiˈ chi cäcämisaxic .

text: But found none : yea , though many false witnesses came , yet found they none . At the last came two false witnesses ,
text2: Man xquirik tä cˈut , pune e qˈuia winak xquimulij quib , xquibij ri man kas tzij taj chrij ri Jesús . Qˈuisbal re cˈut xepe quieb achijab chic ri xquikˈalajisaj ri man kas tzij taj chrij ri Jesús .

text: And said , This fellow said , I am able to destroy the temple of God , and to build it in three days .
text2: Xquibij : We achi riˈ cubij : “ Ri in quincowinic quinwulij ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , quinyac chi cˈu na pa oxib kˈij , ” ― cächaˈ , ― xecha ri achijab .

text: And the high priest arose , and said unto him , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Xwalij cˈu ri kas qui nimal sacerdotes , xutaˈ che ri Jesús , xubij che : ¿ A mat cˈo jas jun tzij cabij chutzelexic u wäch ri tajin cäbix chawij ? ¿ Jas pu waˈ ri tajin cäquikˈalajisaj we achijab riˈ chawij ? ― xcha che .

text: But Jesus held his peace . And the high priest answered and said unto him , I adjure thee by the living God , that thou tell us whether thou be the Christ , the Son of God .
text2: Man xchˈaw tä cˈu ri Jesús . Xubij cˈu ri qui nimal sacerdotes che : Pa ru biˈ ri cˈaslic Dios , quinbij chawe chi chabana juramento chubixic ri kas tzij . Chabij chke we at riˈ ri Cristo ri u Cˈojol ri Dios , ― xcha che .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thou hast said : nevertheless I say unto you , Hereafter shall ye see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Xchˈaw cˈu ri Jesús , xubij che : In riˈ , tat , jas ri cäbij la , ― xcha che . Quinbij cˈu in chech alak , chi quinil na alak ri in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , aretak in tˈuyul pa ru wiquiäkˈab ri Dios ri sibalaj cˈo u chukˈab , aretak quinpe pa tak ri sutzˈ ajchicaj , ― xcha che .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , saying , He hath spoken blasphemy ; what further need have we of witnesses ? behold , now ye have heard his blasphemy .
text2: Are cˈu ri kas qui nimal sacerdotes xurakˈatij ri ratzˈiak chucˈutic chi sibalaj cˈäx xunaˈ ri xubij ri Jesús . Xubij cˈu ri tataˈ : We achi riˈ u bim ri äwas u bixic chrij ri Dios . ¿ Jas ta ne che e rajwaxic chi niqˈuiaj kˈalajisanelab chic chrij ? I tom cˈu ix chi u bim ri äwas u bixic chrij ri Dios , ― xcha chque ri winak .

text: What think ye ? They answered and said , He is guilty of death .
text2: ¿ Jas cˈu quichomaj ? Ri e areˈ xquibij : Cˈo u mac , rajwaxic cˈut chi cäcämisaxic , ― xechaˈ .

text: Then did they spit in his face , and buffeted him ; and others smote him with the palms of their hands ,
text2: Xquichubaj u palaj ri Jesús , xquitˈoco . Niqˈuiaj chic xquicoj kˈab chupalaj .

text: Saying , Prophesy unto us , thou Christ , Who is he that smote thee ?
text2: Xquibij cˈu che : At riˈ ri Cristo , ¡ chachˈobo ne jachin ri xatchˈayowic ! ― xecha che .

text: Now Peter sat without in the palace : and a damsel came unto him , saying , Thou also wast with Jesus of Galilee .
text2: Are cˈu ri tat Pedro tˈuyul can cho ja . Xopan cˈu jun ali ajicˈ rucˈ , xubij che : Ri at xukujeˈ xatcˈoji rucˈ ri Jesús ri aj Galilea , ― xcha che .

text: But he denied before them all , saying , I know not what thou sayest .
text2: Are cˈu ri tat Pedro xresaj rib chupam chquiwäch conojel , xubij : Man quinchˈob taj jas ri tajin cabij , ― xcha che .

text: And when he was gone out into the porch , another maid saw him , and said unto them that were there , This fellow was also with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Ri tat Pedro kas raj quel bi chuchiˈ ri ja , aretak xilitaj chi rumal jun ajicˈ chic , ri ajicˈ xubij chque ri e cˈo chilaˈ : We achi riˈ xukujeˈ xcˈoji rucˈ ri Jesús ri aj Nazaret , ― xcha chque .

text: And again he denied with an oath , I do not know the man .
text2: Jumul chic ri tat Pedro xresaj rib chupam , xuban jurar , xubij : Ri in man wetam tä u wäch ri achi riˈ , ― xchaˈ .

text: And after a while came unto him they that stood by , and said to Peter , Surely thou also art one of them ; for thy speech bewrayeth thee .
text2: Man naj tä cˈu riˈ ri winak ri e cˈo chilaˈ xeopan rucˈ ri tat Pedro , xquibij che : Kas tzij ri at , at jun cucˈ ri e rachiˈl ri Jesús , rumal chi junam catchˈawic jas ri winak aj Galilea , ― xecha che .

text: Then began he to curse and to swear , saying , I know not the man . And immediately the cock crew .
text2: Co cˈu xchˈaw ri tat Pedro , xuban jurar cho ri Dios , xubij : Man wetam tä u wäch ri achi riˈ , ― xcha chque . Are chiˈ cˈut xokˈ jun amaˈ ecˈ .

text: And Peter remembered the word of Jesus , which said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice . And he went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Xnaˈtaj cˈu che ri tat Pedro ru bim ri Jesús che : “ Ri at cabij na oxmul chi man awetam tä nu wäch , mäjok cokˈ ri amaˈ ecˈ , ” ― xcha che . Xel cˈu bi ri tat Pedro , sibalaj xuqˈuis rib che okˈej .

text: When the morning was come , all the chief priests and elders of the people took counsel against Jesus to put him to death :
text2: Aretak xsakiric , conojel ri qui nimakil ri sacerdotes , xukujeˈ ri qui nimakil ri winak aj Israel xquitala qui noˈj , xquichomaj jas cäcaˈn chucämisaxic ri Jesús .

text: And when they had bound him , they led him away , and delivered him to Pontius Pilate the governor .
text2: Xquiyut cˈu bi ri Jesús , xquicˈam bic , xequijacha pu kˈab ri tat Poncio Pilato ri kˈatal tzij .

text: Then Judas , which had betrayed him , when he saw that he was condemned , repented himself , and brought again the thirty pieces of silver to the chief priests and elders ,
text2: Aretak cˈut ri tat Judas , ri jachal re ri Jesús , xrilo chi xkˈat tzij puwiˈ ri Jesús chi cäcämisaxic , xunaˈ cˈäx pa ri ranimaˈ . Xutzelej ri juwinak lajuj rakan sak puak chque ri qui nimakil ri sacerdotes xukujeˈ ri qui nimakil ri winak aj Israel .

text: Saying , I have sinned in that I have betrayed the innocent blood . And they said , What is that to us ? see thou to that .
text2: Xubij chque : Xinmacun cho ri Dios rumal chi xinjach pa kˈab alak jun achi ri man cˈo tä u mac rech cäcämisaj alak , ― xcha chque . Ri e areˈ cˈut xquibij che ri tat Judas : ¿ Jas ke uj che ? ¡ At chatilowok ! ― xecha che .

text: And he cast down the pieces of silver in the temple , and departed , and went and hanged himself .
text2: Are cˈu ri tat Judas xuqˈuiäk can ri puak pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , xel bic , xeˈc , xujitzˈaj rib .

text: And the chief priests took the silver pieces , and said , It is not lawful for to put them into the treasury , because it is the price of blood .
text2: Ri qui nimakil ri sacerdotes xquisicˈ ri puak , xquibij : Man cuyaˈ taj cäkaya waˈ we puak riˈ pa ri cˈolibal cuchuj , rumal chi rajil quicˈ waˈ , ― xechaˈ .

text: And they took counsel , and bought with them the potter ' s field , to bury strangers in .
text2: Xquichomaj cˈut chi rucˈ waˈ we puak riˈ cäquilokˈ ri ulew ri cäbix Rulew ri Banal Boˈj che , rech cˈo jun ulew ri quemuk wi ri winak ri man e aj Israel taj .

text: Wherefore that field was called , The field of blood , unto this day .
text2: Rumal riˈ , cˈä cämic , ri ulew riˈ cäbix Ulew re Quicˈ che .

text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet , saying , And they took the thirty pieces of silver , the price of him that was valued , whom they of the children of Israel did value ;
text2: Je riˈ xbantajic jas ri xubij can ri ka mam Jeremías ri kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios : “ Xquicˈam ri juwinak lajuj rakan sak puak ( ri rajil jun achi ri chomam cumal ri winak aj Israel ) .

text: And gave them for the potter ' s field , as the Lord appointed me .
text2: Rucˈ waˈ xquilokˈ ri rulew ri banal boˈj . Are waˈ ri in u takom wi ri Kajaw Dios , ” ― xcha riˈ .

text: And Jesus stood before the governor : and the governor asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And Jesus said unto him , Thou sayest .
text2: Xcˈam cˈu bi ri Jesús , xequijacha cho ri tat Pilato ri kˈatal tzij . Xutaˈ cˈu ri Pilato che , xubij : ¿ A at riˈ ri cattakan pa qui wiˈ ri winak aj Israel ? ― xcha che . Ri Jesús xubij che : Je riˈ jas ri cäbij la , ― xcha che .

text: And when he was accused of the chief priests and elders , he answered nothing .
text2: Qˈuia tzij cˈut xcaˈn ri qui nimakil ri sacerdotes chrij ri Jesús , xukujeˈ ri qui nimakil ri winak aj Israel . Are cˈu ri Jesús man cˈo tä jas xubij .

text: Then said Pilate unto him , Hearest thou not how many things they witness against thee ?
text2: Xubij cˈu ri tat Pilato che : ¿ A mat cata ri tajin cäbix chawij ? ― xcha che .

text: And he answered him to never a word ; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly .
text2: Man cˈo tä cˈu jun tzij xubij ri Jesús , je riˈ chi xucajmaj waˈ ri tat Pilato . Man curik tä cˈu ri areˈ jas cubano .

text: Now at that feast the governor was wont to release unto the people a prisoner , whom they would .
text2: Are cˈu ri tat Pilato ri kˈatal tzij nakˈatalic chi pa ri nimakˈij cuban jun tokˈob chque ri winak , cutzokopij bi jun ajpacheˈ , apachin ta ne ri cächaˈ cumal ri winak .

text: And they had then a notable prisoner , called Barabbas .
text2: Cˈo cˈu jun ajpacheˈ , Barrabás u biˈ , ri etamtalic chi are jun itzel achi .

text: Therefore when they were gathered together , Pilate said unto them , Whom will ye that I release unto you ? Barabbas , or Jesus which is called Christ ?
text2: Aretak cˈut qui mulim chi quib ri winak , ri tat Pilato xutaˈ chque : ¿ Jachin ri quiwaj chi quintzokopij bic ? ¿ A are quintzokopij bi ri tat Barrabás o are quintzokopij bi ri Jesús ri cäbix Cristo che ? ― xcha chque ri winak .

text: For he knew that for envy they had delivered him .
text2: Cuchˈob cˈu ri tat Pilato chi xa rumal chi cˈäx cäquinaˈ che ri Jesús , rumal riˈ qui jachom pu kˈab .

text: When he was set down on the judgment seat , his wife sent unto him , saying , Have thou nothing to do with that just man : for I have suffered many things this day in a dream because of him .
text2: Tˈuyul cˈu ri tat Pilato pa ri kˈatbal tzij , aretak ri rixokil xtakan chubixic che : “ Cˈo jas maban che we achi riˈ ri man cˈo tä u mac . Xinwachicˈaj cˈu jun jasach ri sibalaj xibibal chakˈab rumal we achi riˈ , ” ― xcha che .

text: But the chief priests and elders persuaded the multitude that they should ask Barabbas , and destroy Jesus .
text2: Are cˈu ri qui nimakil ri sacerdotes xukujeˈ ri qui nimakil ri winak aj Israel xquicoj qui chukˈab chubixic chque ri winak chi más utz na cäquibij chi are cätzokopix ri tat Barrabás , cäcämisax cˈu ri Jesús .

text: The governor answered and said unto them , Whether of the twain will ye that I release unto you ? They said , Barabbas .
text2: Ri kˈatal tzij cˈut xchˈaw chi jumul , xutaˈ chque ri winak : ¿ Jachin chque ri quieb achijab quiwaj chi quintzokopij bic ? ― xcha chque . Ri winak xquibij : Are cätzokopij la ri tat Barrabás , ― xecha che .

text: Pilate saith unto them , What shall I do then with Jesus which is called Christ ? They all say unto him , Let him be crucified .
text2: Xutaˈ cˈu ri tat Pilato chque ri winak : ¿ Jas cˈu quinban che ri Jesús ri cäbix Cristo che ? ― xcha chque . Conojel ri winak xechˈawic , xquibij : ¡ Chripok ! ― xechaˈ .

text: And the governor said , Why , what evil hath he done ? But they cried out the more , saying , Let him be crucified .
text2: Xchˈaw cˈu ri tat Pilato , xubij chque : ¿ Jas che ? ¿ Jas pu etzelal u banom waˈ we achi riˈ ? ― xcha chque . Co cˈu na xechˈaw ri winak , xquibij : ¡ Chripok ! ― xechaˈ .

text: When Pilate saw that he could prevail nothing , but that rather a tumult was made , he took water , and washed his hands before the multitude , saying , I am innocent of the blood of this just person : see ye to it .
text2: Aretak ri tat Pilato xrilo chi man coc tä tzij pa qui jolom ri winak , xane xa tajin cäquituquij quib , xtakan chucˈamic joron , xuchˈaj ru kˈab chquiwäch ri winak , te cˈu riˈ xubij : Man cˈo tä we in che ru cämical we achi riˈ ri man cˈo tä u mac . Chibana ix jas ri quiwaj quiban che , ― xcha chque .

text: Then answered all the people , and said , His blood be on us , and on our children .
text2: Conojel cˈu ri winak xechˈawic , xquibij : ¡ Ri uj , xukujeˈ ri kalcˈual , uj ajchakˈ mac che ru cämical we achi riˈ ! ― xechaˈ .

text: Then released he Barabbas unto them : and when he had scourged Jesus , he delivered him to be crucified .
text2: Ri tat Pilato xutzokopij cˈu bi ri tat Barrabás . Xtakan chuchˈayic ri Jesús , te cˈu riˈ xujach bic rech cäripic , cäcämisax cho ri cruz .

text: Then the soldiers of the governor took Jesus into the common hall , and gathered unto him the whole band of soldiers .
text2: Te riˈ xepe ru soldados ri kˈatal tzij , xquicˈam bi ri Jesús pa ri nimalaj ja jawijeˈ conojel ri soldados xquimulij quib chrij .

text: And they stripped him , and put on him a scarlet robe .
text2: Xquesaj ri ratzˈiak ri Jesús , xquicoj jun quiäk kˈuˈ chrij .

text: And when they had platted a crown of thorns , they put it upon his head , and a reed in his right hand : and they bowed the knee before him , and mocked him , saying , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Xquicoj jun corona re quemom qˈuix chujolom , xquiya jun cheˈ pu kˈab re uwiquiäkˈab , xexuqui chuwäch , xquitzeˈj u wäch , xquibij : ¡ Nim u kˈij ri Nim Takanel pa qui wiˈ ri winak aj Israel ! ― xechaˈ .

text: And they spit upon him , and took the reed , and smote him on the head .
text2: Xechuban chupalaj ri Jesús , xukujeˈ xquicˈam ri cheˈ pu kˈab , xquikˈosij chujolom .

text: And after that they had mocked him , they took the robe off from him , and put his own raiment on him , and led him away to crucify him .
text2: Aretak xetoˈtaj che retzˈbexic u wäch , xquijolij ri quiäk kˈuˈ chrij , xquicoj cˈu ri kas ratzˈiak ri Areˈ chrij . Te cˈu riˈ xquicˈam bi churipic cho ri cruz .

text: And as they came out , they found a man of Cyrene , Simon by name : him they compelled to bear his cross .
text2: Elem bi que , xquirik cˈu jun achi aj Cirene , Simón u biˈ , xquicoj qui chukˈab che rech cutelej bi ru cruz ri Jesús .

text: And when they were come unto a place called Golgotha , that is to say , a place of a skull ,
text2: Je wa riˈ xeopan pa ri juyub ri cäbix Gólgota che . We biˈaj riˈ quel cubij : Ri Juyub re ru Bakil Jolomaj .

text: They gave him vinegar to drink mingled with gall : and when he had tasted thereof , he would not drink .
text2: Xquiya jun vino che ri Jesús ri yujtal rucˈ jun cˈa kˈayes ri cäbix “ mirra ” che . Aretak cˈut xunaˈ ri Jesús , man xraj taj xutijo .

text: And they crucified him , and parted his garments , casting lots : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , They parted my garments among them , and upon my vesture did they cast lots .
text2: Aretak qui ripom chic ri Jesús cho ri cruz , ri soldados xquesaj suerte chujachic ri ratzˈiak ri Jesús chquiwäch . Je cˈu xbantajic jas ri xubij can ri kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ojer : “ Xquesaj suerte chujachic ri watzˈiak chquiwäch , ” ― xchaˈ .

text: And sitting down they watched him there ;
text2: Te cˈu riˈ ri soldados xetˈuyi chilaˈ chuchajixic ri Areˈ .

text: And set up over his head his accusation written , THIS IS JESUS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Cojom cˈu puwiˈ ri cruz jun tzˈibtalic ri cubij jas che xkˈat tzij puwiˈ ri Jesús rech cäripic . Ri tzˈibtalic xubij : ARE WAˈ RI JESÚS , RI NIM TAKANEL PA QUI WIˈ RI WINAK AJ ISRAEL , ― cächaˈ .

text: Then were there two thieves crucified with him , one on the right hand , and another on the left .
text2: Xukujeˈ xerip quieb elakˈomab rucˈ . Jun pu wiquiäkˈab , jun pu moxkˈab .

text: And they that passed by reviled him , wagging their heads ,
text2: Ri winak ri xeocˈowic xquiyokˈo , xquisutusa ri qui jolom .

text: And saying , Thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days , save thyself . If thou be the Son of God , come down from the cross .
text2: Xquibij : At riˈ ri cabij chi catcowinic cawulij ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , xa cˈu pa oxib kˈij cayac chi na waˈ jumul chic , chatoˈ baˈ awib . We at riˈ ru Cˈojol ri Dios , chatkaj lok cho ri cruz , ― xecha che .

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking him , with the scribes and elders , said ,
text2: Jeˈ xukujeˈ ri qui nimakil ri sacerdotes , ri tijonelab re ri Pixab , ri tataˈib fariseos cucˈ ri qui nimakil ri winak aj Israel , xquitzeˈj u wäch , xquitzijobela quib , xquibij :

text: He saved others ; himself he cannot save . If he be the King of Israel , let him now come down from the cross , and we will believe him .
text2: Xtob chque niqˈuiaj chic , man cäcowin tä cˈu ri Areˈ chutoˈic rib . We kas are Nim Takanel quech ri winak aj Israel , chkaj lok cho ri cruz , rech cujcojon che , ― xechaˈ .

text: He trusted in God ; let him deliver him now , if he will have him : for he said , I am the Son of God .
text2: Cubij chi u cuˈbam u cˈux chrij ri Dios . We baˈ kas tzij lokˈ chuwäch ri Dios , ri Areˈ cätoˈw ta na chanim riˈ . U bim cˈut chi are u Cˈojol ri Dios , ― xechaˈ .

text: The thieves also , which were crucified with him , cast the same in his teeth .
text2: Ri elakˈomab ri e ripom rucˈ ri Jesús , xukujeˈ xquetzˈbej u wäch .

text: Now from the sixth hour there was darkness over all the land unto the ninth hour .
text2: Xkˈekumar cˈu ronojel ruwächulew . Xuwi xuchap pa ri niqˈuiaj kˈij , cˈä teˈ xocˈow pa ri urox hora benak kˈij .

text: And about the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eli , Eli , lama sabachthani ? that is to say , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Kas pa ri hora riˈ xurak u chiˈ ri Jesús , co xchˈawic , xubij : Eloi , Eloi , ¿ lama sabactani ? ― xchaˈ . Jeˈ quel cubij waˈ : Nu Dios , nu Dios , ¿ jas che in wonobam la canok ? ― cächaˈ .

text: Some of them that stood there , when they heard that , said , This man calleth for Elias .
text2: Jujun cˈu chque ri e tacˈatoj chilaˈ xquita waˈ , xquibij : We achi riˈ are tajin cusiqˈuij ri ka mam Elías ri kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ojer , ― xechaˈ .

text: And straightway one of them ran , and took a spunge , and filled it with vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ jun chque ri winak xutic anim , xeˈc , xucˈama lok jun estropajo , xurub chupam chˈäm vino , xuya waˈ puwiˈ jun aj , xuya akˈan che ri Jesús rech cutijo .

text: The rest said , Let be , let us see whether Elias will come to save him .
text2: Are cˈu ri niqˈuiaj winak chic xquibij : Chiya canok , chkila na we ne cäpe ri ka mam Elías chutoˈic , ― xechaˈ .

text: Jesus , when he had cried again with a loud voice , yielded up the ghost .
text2: Jumul chic co xurak u chiˈ ri Jesús , xcäm cˈut , xel ranimaˈ .

text: And , behold , the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom ; and the earth did quake , and the rocks rent ;
text2: Are chiˈ cˈut ri tasbal u pam ri nimalaj rachoch Dios xjisjobic , quieb xubano , xpe ajsic cˈä iquim . Xpe jun cäbrakan , ri nimak tak abaj cˈut xepaxic .

text: And the graves were opened ; and many bodies of the saints which slept arose ,
text2: Ri qui jul tak ri cäminakib xejakjobic , e qˈuia ri ojer tak winak ri xecojon che ri Dios , ri e cäminak chic , xecˈastaj chquixol ri cäminakib .

text: And came out of the graves after his resurrection , and went into the holy city , and appeared unto many .
text2: Ri e areˈ xebel bi pa ri qui jul aretak cˈastajinak chi ri Jesús chquixol ri cäminakib , xeboc cˈu pa ri lokˈalaj tinimit Jerusalén . Chilaˈ cˈut qˈuia winak xeilowic .

text: Now when the centurion , and they that were with him , watching Jesus , saw the earthquake , and those things that were done , they feared greatly , saying , Truly this was the Son of God .
text2: Are cˈu ri qui nimal soldados aj Roma xukujeˈ ri soldados ri e cˈo rucˈ ri qui chajim ri Jesús , aretak xquinaˈ ri cäbrakan xukujeˈ xquil ronojel ri xcˈulmatajic , sibalaj xquixej quib , xquibij : ¡ Kas tzij , u Cˈojol ri Dios waˈ we achi riˈ ! ― xechaˈ .

text: And many women were there beholding afar off , which followed Jesus from Galilee , ministering unto him :
text2: E cˈo cˈu qˈuia ixokib chilaˈ ri tajin quecaˈy apan chinaj . We ixokib riˈ xeteri rucˈ ri Jesús , xepe rucˈ pa Galilea , xetob cˈu che .

text: Among which was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James and Joses , and the mother of Zebedee ' s children .
text2: Chquixol cˈu ri e areˈ cˈo ri nan María ri aj Magdala , ri María ru nan ri Jacobo , ri José , xukujeˈ ri qui nan ru cˈojol ri Zebedeo .

text: When the even was come , there came a rich man of Arimathaea , named Joseph , who also himself was Jesus ' disciple :
