text2: Xukujeˈ rajwaxic chi jun winak sibalaj craj ri Dios , cujiquiba ru cˈux , cujiquiba ri ranimaˈ , cucoj ru chomanic , cutij cˈu u chukˈab chubanic waˈ . Xukujeˈ rajwaxic chi craj ri rach winak jeˈ jas ri areˈ craj rib . Nim na u banic waˈ chquiwäch conojel ri sipanic ri queporox cho ri Dios , xukujeˈ chquiwäch conojel ri awaj ri quecämisax che sipanic cho ri Dios , ― xcha che .

text: And when Jesus saw that he answered discreetly , he said unto him , Thou art not far from the kingdom of God . And no man after that durst ask him any question .
text2: Aretak ri Jesús xuto chi sibalaj cänaˈw ri tataˈ chutzelexic u wäch u tzij , xubij che : Xak jubikˈ craj man cätakan ri Dios puwiˈ la , ― xcha che . Te cˈu riˈ man cˈo tä chi jun xuchajij animaˈ chi cˈo jas xutaˈ che ri Jesús .

text: And Jesus answered and said , while he taught in the temple , How say the scribes that Christ is the Son of David ?
text2: Ri Jesús tajin queutijoj ri winak pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , cächˈawic , cubij : ¿ Jas che cäquibij ri tijonelab re ri Pixab chi ri Cristo are xak xuwi ralcˈual can ri ka mam David ?

text: For David himself said by the Holy Ghost , The Lord said to my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: Tzare cˈu ri ka mam David cubij rumal ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu : Xubij ri Kajaw ri ka Dios che ri Kajaw : “ Chattˈuyul pa ri nu wiquiäkˈab , cˈä quinya na chawe chi catchˈacanic cattakan pa qui wiˈ conojel ri cäcaˈn qui cˈulel chawe , ”

text: David therefore himself calleth him Lord ; and whence is he then his son ? And the common people heard him gladly .
text2: ― cächaˈ . We ri ka mam David cubij : “ Kajaw ” che ri Cristo , ¿ jas ta cˈu che cäquibij ri e areˈ chi ri Cristo are xak xuwi ralcˈual can ri ka mam David ? ¡ Man jeˈ tä riˈ ! ― xcha chque . Ri winak cˈut , ri sibalaj e qˈuia chic qui mulim quib , cäquicot canimaˈ chutatabexic ru tzij ri Jesús .

text: And he said unto them in his doctrine , Beware of the scribes , which love to go in long clothing , and love salutations in the marketplaces ,
text2: Ri Jesús tajin queutijoj ri winak , cubij chque : Chajij ib alak chquiwäch ri tijonelab re ri Pixab . Ri e areˈ cäkaj chquiwäch quebinicat pa chärchäk tak catzˈiak . Xukujeˈ cäkaj chquiwäch chi nim queil wi na , cäyiˈ cˈu rutzil qui wäch pa tak ri cˈayibal , pa tak ri be .

text: And the chief seats in the synagogues , and the uppermost rooms at feasts :
text2: Cäquitzucuj ri tˈuyulibal ri nimak qui banic pa tak ri rachoch Dios , xukujeˈ ri tˈuyulibal ri nim queil wi pa tak ri ulaˈnem ri quewiˈ wi , ― cächa chque .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayers : these shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Xukujeˈ cäquitokij tak ri cachoch ri malcaˈnib tak ixokib . Te riˈ cäquiyuk u tzaˈm ri qui tzij aretak cäcaˈn orar rech man kˈalaj tä ri etzelal ri tajin cäcaˈno . ¡ Kas nim na ri cˈäx cäquirik ri tijonelab re ri Pixab aretak cäkˈat na tzij pa qui wiˈ ! ― xcha ri Jesús chque ri winak .

text: And Jesus sat over against the treasury , and beheld how the people cast money into the treasury : and many that were rich cast in much .
text2: Tˈuyul cˈu ri Jesús pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios chquiwäch tak ri cäxon ri cäyiˈ wi ri puak ri cäsipax cho ri Dios . Tajin cäcaˈy chque ri winak ri cäquiya ri qui rajil chupam tak ri cäxon riˈ . E qˈuia cˈu chque ri kˈinomab xequiya nimak tak qui rajil .

text: And there came a certain poor widow , and she threw in two mites , which make a farthing .
text2: Xopan cˈu jun malcaˈn chichuˈ ri mebaˈ , xuya xa quieb alaj tak puak , craj ne xa jun centavo rajil ri quieb puak riˈ .

text: And he called unto him his disciples , and saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That this poor widow hath cast more in , than all they which have cast into the treasury :
text2: Ri Jesús xeusiqˈuij ru tijoxelab , xubij cˈu chque : Kas tzij ri quinbij chiwe , chi we mebaˈlaj malcaˈn chichuˈ riˈ , are nim na waˈ ri xusipaj ri areˈ chquiwäch conojel ri niqˈuiaj winak ri qui yoˈm qui rajil pa tak ri cäxon ri cˈolibal puak .

text: For all they did cast in of their abundance ; but she of her want did cast in all that she had , even all her living .
text2: Ri e areˈ qui yoˈm jubikˈ re ri qˈuia ri cˈo cucˈ . Are cˈu we malcaˈn chichuˈ riˈ u yoˈm ronojel ri cˈo rucˈ , ronojel ri tzukubal re , ― xcha chque .

text: And as he went out of the temple , one of his disciples saith unto him , Master , see what manner of stones and what buildings are here !
text2: Elem bi re ri Jesús pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , jun chque ru tijoxelab xubij che : ¡ Ajtij , chilampe la we jeˈlalaj tak abaj riˈ , xukujeˈ tak we ja ri yacom riˈ ri sibalaj e cajmabal ! ― xcha che .

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Seest thou these great buildings ? there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Xchˈaw cˈu ri Jesús , xubij che : ¿ A cawil conojel we nimalaj tak ja ri e yacom riˈ ? ― cächaˈ . Man cäcanaj tä cˈu can jun abaj puwiˈ ri jun abaj chic ri mat cäwulix na , ― xcha che .

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives over against the temple , Peter and James and John and Andrew asked him privately ,
text2: Xeˈ cˈu ri Jesús , e rachiˈl ru tijoxelab , pa ri Ujuyubal Olivos ri cˈo apan cho ri rachoch Dios . Tˈuyul cˈu ri Jesús chilaˈ , ri tat Pedro , ri tat Jacobo , ri tat Juan , xukujeˈ ri tat Andrés xquitaˈ che ri Areˈ pu tuquiel wi ,

text: Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign when all these things shall be fulfilled ?
text2: xquibij : Cäkaj chi cäbij la chke jampaˈ cäbantaj na waˈ . ¿ Jas u wäch etal cäban na chucˈutic chkawäch chi xopan ri kˈij riˈ ri quebantaj na conojel tak waˈ ri bim la chke ? ― xecha che .

text: And Jesus answering them began to say , Take heed lest any man deceive you :
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij chque : ¡ Chichajij iwib cˈo jachin jun mixsubuwic ! ― cächaˈ .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: E qˈuia cˈut ri quepe na , cäquicoj na ri nu biˈ , cäquibij : “ ¡ In riˈ ri Cristo ! ” ― quecha na . E qˈuia cˈu riˈ ri quequisub na , ― cächa chque .

text: And when ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars , be ye not troubled : for such things must needs be ; but the end shall not be yet .
text2: Aretak quita nimalaj tak chˈoj , xukujeˈ quita u tzijoxic tak chˈoj jawijeˈ tak chiˈ , mixej iwib . Rajwaxic chi cäbantaj na waˈ . Cˈä mäjok cˈu ri qˈuisbal re ri kˈij junab riˈ , ― cächaˈ .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be earthquakes in divers places , and there shall be famines and troubles : these are the beginnings of sorrows .
text2: Cächˈojin cˈu jun tinimit rucˈ ri jun tinimit chic , xukujeˈ cächˈojin jun nim takanel rucˈ jun nim takanel chic . Quepe cˈu na qˈuia cäbrakan jawijeˈ tak chiˈ , cäpe na wiˈjal xukujeˈ , ri winak cˈut sibalaj cäquituquij na quib . Xak cˈu chaplebal waˈ re ronojel ri cˈäx ri cäpe na pa qui wiˈ ri winak , ― cächa chque .

text: But take heed to yourselves : for they shall deliver you up to councils ; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten : and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them .
text2: ¡ Chichajij baˈ iwib ! ― cächaˈ . Quixjach cˈu na pa tak qui kˈab ri qui nimakil winak ri quetakan pa qui wiˈ , xukujeˈ quixchˈay na chquiwäch ri qui nimakil ri winak pa tak ri rachoch Dios ri cäquimulij wi quib ri winak . Quixtacˈabax na chquiwäch kˈatal tak tzij , xukujeˈ chquiwäch takanelab ri nimak qui banic rumal wech in rech quikˈalajisaj na ri Utzalaj Tzij re ri Evangelio chquiwäch ri e areˈ , ― cächa chque .

text: And the gospel must first be published among all nations .
text2: Cˈä mäjok cˈu copan ri qˈuisbal re ri kˈij junab riˈ , rajwaxic cätzijox na we Utzalaj Tzij riˈ re ri Evangelio chque conojel qui wäch winak cho ruwächulew , ― cächaˈ .

text: But when they shall lead you , and deliver you up , take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak , neither do ye premeditate : but whatsoever shall be given you in that hour , that speak ye : for it is not ye that speak , but the Holy Ghost .
text2: Aretak quixcˈam na bic rech quixjach chquiwäch ri kˈatal tak tzij , mixej iwib , michomaj bic jas ri quibij na chque , xane chibij ri cäyiˈ chiwe rumal ri Dios pa ri kˈij riˈ . Man ix tä cˈut ri quixtzijon na , xane are ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu .

text: Now the brother shall betray the brother to death , and the father the son ; and children shall rise up against their parents , and shall cause them to be put to death .
text2: Ri winak quequijach na ri cachalal pa cämisaxic , ri nan tat quequijach na ri calcˈual pa cämisaxic . Ri alcˈualaxelab cäquiyac na quib chquij ri qui nan qui tat , quequijach na pa cämisaxic .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: ¡ Conojel ri winak cäquetzelaj na i wäch xa rumal wech in ! ― cächaˈ . Are cˈu ri cächˈijowic cˈä cäqˈuis na ronojel , curik na riˈ ru tobanic ri Dios , ― cächa chque .

text: But when ye shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , standing where it ought not , ( let him that readeth understand , ) then let them that be in Judaea flee to the mountains :
text2: Ri ka mam Daniel , jun chque ri kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios , xutzˈibaj ojer chrij ri “ itzelalaj äwas ri quetzelan ronojel . ” ¡ Jachin ri cusiqˈuij waˈ , ri tzˈibtal waral , chuchˈoboˈ jas riˈ ri äwas ri cubij chiˈ ! Aretak quiwil waˈ cäcˈoji chilaˈ jawijeˈ ri man yaˈtal tä wi , rajwaxic chi ri winak ri e cˈo pa Judea queanimaj bi pa tak ri juyub .

text: And let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house , neither enter therein , to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Ri winak ri e cˈo puwiˈ tak cachoch , aninak chekaj lok , meboc chi bi chupam ri ja chucˈamic bi jun jasach .

text: And let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment .
text2: Xukujeˈ ri e cˈo pa ri juyub mätzelej bi cho ja chucˈamic ri qui kˈuˈ .

text: But woe to them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: ¡ Sibalaj cˈäx que ri ixokib ri yawab tak winak chic pa tak ri kˈij riˈ , xukujeˈ ri e cˈo alaj tak cal ri cˈä quetuˈnic !

text: And pray ye that your flight be not in the winter .
text2: ¡ Chibana baˈ orar , chixbochiˈn che ri Dios chi mäcˈulmataj ronojel waˈ pa tak ri u kˈijol ri tew !

text: For in those days shall be affliction , such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time , neither shall be .
text2: Je riˈ , rumal chi cäpe na nimalaj cˈäxcˈol pa tak ri kˈij riˈ , ri man cˈolinak tä riˈ tzpa ru chaplexic lok ru banic ruwächulew rumal ri Dios cˈä pa tak we kˈij riˈ . Te cˈu riˈ man cˈo tä jumul ri quepe chi na cˈäxalaj tak kˈij junam rucˈ ri cˈäxcˈol riˈ .

text: And except that the Lord had shortened those days , no flesh should be saved : but for the elect ' s sake , whom he hath chosen , he hath shortened the days .
text2: We ta ri Kajaw Dios mat cubano chi xak kˈatatal kˈij cäcˈoji we cˈäxcˈol riˈ , mat cˈo jun winak riˈ ri cäcˈasi canok . Ri Dios cˈut u banom chi xak kˈatatal kˈij cäcˈoji waˈ rumal chi queraj ri e chaˈtal rumal ri Areˈ .

text: And then if any man shall say to you , Lo , here is Christ ; or , lo , he is there ; believe him not :
text2: We cˈu cˈo jun ri cubij chiwe : “ ¡ Chiwilampeˈ , cˈo ri Cristo chi riˈ ! ” We cubij : “ ¡ Chiwilampeˈ , cˈo jelaˈ ! ” ― we cächaˈ . ¡ Micoj baˈ ! ― cächa chque .

text: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise , and shall shew signs and wonders , to seduce , if it were possible , even the elect .
text2: Quepe na winak ri cäcaˈn che quib chi e are ri Cristo , xukujeˈ quepe chi na juleˈ chic ri cäcaˈn che quib chi e kˈalajisal tak re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios . Quecaˈn cˈu na etal , xukujeˈ cajmabal che qui subic ri winak ri e chaˈtal rumal ri Dios we quecowinic , ― cächaˈ .

text: But take ye heed : behold , I have foretold you all things .
text2: ¡ Chiwila baˈ iwib ! Nu bim chi cˈu apan ronojel waˈ chiwe , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: But in those days , after that tribulation , the sun shall be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light ,
text2: Pa tak ri kˈij riˈ aretak ocˈowinak chic ri nimalaj cˈäx riˈ , ri kˈij cäkˈekumar na , ri icˈ cˈut man cätunun tä chic .

text: And the stars of heaven shall fall , and the powers that are in heaven shall be shaken .
text2: Quetzak cˈu na lok ri chˈimil cho ri caj . Queslabisax cˈu na conojel ri cˈo qui chukˈab ri e cˈo cho ri caj , jeˈ jas ri kˈij , ri chˈimil , ri icˈ , xukujeˈ niqˈuiaj chic , ― cächaˈ .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in the clouds with great power and glory .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ quilitaj cˈu na chi ri in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , quinpe pa tak ri sutzˈ rucˈ nimalaj nu chukˈab , cänimarisax cˈu nu kˈij , ― cächaˈ .

text: And then shall he send his angels , and shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from the uttermost part of the earth to the uttermost part of heaven .
text2: Te riˈ queintak na bi ri ángeles rech quequimulij ri winak ri e chaˈtal rumal ri Dios pa ri relbal kˈij , pa ru kajbal kˈij , pa ri u moxkˈab ri relbal kˈij , pa ru wiquiäkˈab ri relbal kˈij , tzpa ronojel ri cajulew , ― xcha chque .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When her branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is near :
text2: Chichˈobo baˈ ri cˈutbal chrij ru cheˈal higos : Aretak queräxar ru kˈab , quetuxin cˈu ru xak , iwetam riˈ chi xak jubikˈ chic man copan ri kˈalaj .

text: So ye in like manner , when ye shall see these things come to pass , know that it is nigh , even at the doors .
text2: Je riˈ xukujeˈ ri ix aretak quiwil qui cˈulmaxic ronojel waˈ , quiwetamaj na chi xak jubikˈ chic man copan ri kˈij ri quinpetic . Jeˈ ta ne chi in cˈo chiˈ ri uchibe .

text: Verily I say unto you , that this generation shall not pass , till all these things be done .
text2: Kas tzij ri quinbij chiwe chi quebantaj na ronojel waˈ ri xinbij chiwe cˈä mäjok quecäm ri winak re we kˈij junab riˈ , ― cächaˈ .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Cäsach na u wäch ri caj , xukujeˈ ruwächulew , are cˈu ri tzij ri nu bim chiwe quebantaj na waˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: But of that day and that hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels which are in heaven , neither the Son , but the Father .
text2: Man cˈo tä cˈu jachin jun ri retam jampaˈ copan ri kˈij riˈ , o ri hora . Man quetam tä ri ángeles , man retam tä ru Cˈojol ri Dios , xane xak xuwi ri ka Tat Dios retam waˈ , ― cächaˈ .

text: Take ye heed , watch and pray : for ye know not when the time is .
text2: Rumal waˈ , ¡ chiwila baˈ iwib , chixcˈascˈatok , chibana orar ! ¡ Man iwetam tä cˈut jampaˈ copan ri kˈij riˈ ! ― cächa chque .

text: For the Son of man is as a man taking a far journey , who left his house , and gave authority to his servants , and to every man his work , and commanded the porter to watch .
text2: Are jeˈ jas jun achi benam cubano , naj queˈ wi . Cˈä mäjaˈ quel bic cho ja , cuya can ronojel pa qui kˈab ri patänil tak re , xukujeˈ cuya can ri qui chac chquijujunal . Cätakan can che ri chajil uchibe chi utz rilic ri ja cubano , ― cächa chque .

text: Watch ye therefore : for ye know not when the master of the house cometh , at even , or at midnight , or at the cockcrowing , or in the morning :
text2: ¡ Chiwila baˈ iwib , chixcˈascˈatok ! rumal chi man iwetam taj jampaˈ cäpe ri ajchakˈel ja , we tajin coc ri akˈab aretak cäpetic , we pa niqˈuiaj akˈab , we pa ri hora ri cokˈ ri amaˈ äcˈ , we tajin cäpe chi ru sakiric .

text: Lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping .
text2: Chiwila baˈ iwib rech we xak teˈtalic cäpetic mixulurika ne tajin quixwaric .

text: And what I say unto you I say unto all , Watch .
text2: Ri quinbij chiwe , quinbij cˈu chque conojel . ¡ Chiwila baˈ iwib , chixcˈascˈatok ! ― xcha chque .

text: After two days was the feast of the passover , and of unleavened bread : and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft , and put him to death .
text2: Xa quieb kˈij chic craj che ri nimakˈij , Pascua u biˈ , xukujeˈ ri nimakˈij re ri caxlan wa ri man cäyiˈ tä chˈäm rucˈ . Ri qui nimakil sacerdotes , xukujeˈ ri tijonelab re ri Pixab cäquitzucuj jas cäcaˈn na chuchapic ri Jesús rucˈ subunic rech cäquicämisaj .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar of the people .
text2: Xquibij cˈut : ¡ Mächap pa ri nimakˈij rech metuquin ne ri winak ! ― xechaˈ .

text: And being in Bethany in the house of Simon the leper , as he sat at meat , there came a woman having an alabaster box of ointment of spikenard very precious ; and she brake the box , and poured it on his head .
text2: Are cˈu ri Jesús cˈo pa ri tinimit Betania cho rachoch ri tat Simón , jun tataˈ ri xcˈoji itzel chˈaˈc che . Tˈuyul cˈu ri Jesús chiˈ ri mesa , xopan jun ixok rucˈam jun cˈolibal cunabal re alabastro , cˈo cˈocˈalaj cunabal re kas nardo chupam . Sibalaj pakal rajil waˈ we cunabal riˈ . Ri ixok xupaxij ri cˈolibal cunabal , xutix cˈu ri cunabal pu jolom ri Jesús .

text: And there were some that had indignation within themselves , and said , Why was this waste of the ointment made ?
text2: E cˈo cˈu jujun chilaˈ ri xa xpe coyowal , xquibij chbil tak quib : ¿ Jas che xak xtix waˈ we cunabal riˈ ? ― xechaˈ .

text: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence , and have been given to the poor . And they murmured against her .
text2: ¡ Xqˈuiyix ta cˈu waˈ che oxib cientos quetzales rucˈ u wiˈ , xyiˈ ta cˈu ri puak chque ri mebaˈib ! ― xechaˈ . Xeyokˈon cˈu che ri ixok .

text: And Jesus said , Let her alone ; why trouble ye her ? she hath wrought a good work on me .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús : ¿ Jas che quiya latzˈ che ri ixok ? ¡ Miban waˈ che ! ¡ Jun nimalaj utzil cˈut ru banom chwe ! ― cächa chque .

text: For ye have the poor with you always , and whensoever ye will ye may do them good : but me ye have not always .
text2: Amakˈel cˈut e cˈo ri mebaˈib iwucˈ , cuyaˈ cˈut quiban utzil chque aretak quiwaj u banic waˈ . Are cˈu ri in man in cˈo tä iwucˈ ronojel kˈij .

text: She hath done what she could : she is come aforehand to anoint my body to the burying .
text2: We ixok riˈ u banom jas ri xcowin chubanic , ri xpe pa ranimaˈ . U cojom cˈu bi ri cˈocˈalaj cunabal che ri nu cuerpo cˈä mäjok quinmukic .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached throughout the whole world , this also that she hath done shall be spoken of for a memorial of her .
text2: Kas cˈu tzij ri quinbij chiwe chi apawijeˈ ta ne ri cätzijox wi na ri Utzalaj Tzij re ri Evangelio cho ronojel ruwächulew , ri u banom we ixok riˈ cätzijox na che naˈtabal re , ― xcha chque .

text: And Judas Iscariot , one of the twelve , went unto the chief priests , to betray him unto them .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ xel bi ri tat Judas Iscariote , jun chque ri cablajuj tijoxelab , xeˈ ri areˈ cucˈ ri qui nimakil sacerdotes chuchomaxic cucˈ jas cuban chujachic ri Jesús pa qui kˈab .

text: And when they heard it , they were glad , and promised to give him money . And he sought how he might conveniently betray him .
text2: Aretak xquito , xequicotic , xquibij cˈu che ri tat Judas chi cäquiya na puak che . Ri tat Judas cˈut tajin cäreyej chi copan jun utzalaj kˈij chujachic ri Jesús pa qui kˈab .

text: And the first day of unleavened bread , when they killed the passover , his disciples said unto him , Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover ?
text2: Pa ri nabe kˈij re ri nimakˈij re ri caxlan wa ri man cäyiˈ tä chˈäm rucˈ , aretak cäcämisax ri chij che ri nimakˈij Pascua , ru tijoxelab ri Jesús xquibij che : ¿ Jawijeˈ caj wi la chi cäkaˈn wi ri wiˈm re ri Pascua rech cätij la ? ― xecha che .

text: And he sendeth forth two of his disciples , and saith unto them , Go ye into the city , and there shall meet you a man bearing a pitcher of water : follow him .
text2: Xeutak cˈu bi quieb chque ru tijoxelab , xubij cˈu chque : ¡ Jix pa ri tinimit ! Quixurika na jun achi rucˈam jun kˈebal joron . Chiterenej bic .

text: And wheresoever he shall go in , say ye to the goodman of the house , The Master saith , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: Jawijeˈ cˈu ri coc wi ri achi , chibij cˈu che ri ajchakˈel ri ja : “ Cutaˈ ri Kajtij che la , cubij : ¿ Jawijeˈ quinban wi ri wiˈm re ri Pascua ri quintij junam cucˈ ri nu tijoxelab ? ” ― cächa riˈ , ― quixcha che .

text: And he will shew you a large upper room furnished and prepared : there make ready for us .
text2: Ri areˈ cucˈut na chiwäch jun nim ja pa ru cawik ja ri ya sucˈumatal chic . Chibana u banic ri wiˈm re ri Pascua chke uj chilaˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: And his disciples went forth , and came into the city , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Xebel cˈu bi ri tijoxelab , xebeˈ pa ri tinimit , xquirika ronojel jas ri xubij bi ri Jesús chque . Xcaˈn cˈu u banic ri wiˈm re ri Pascua chilaˈ .

text: And in the evening he cometh with the twelve .
text2: Aretak chakˈab chic xopan ri Jesús , e rachiˈl cˈu ri cablajuj tijoxelab .

text: And as they sat and did eat , Jesus said , Verily I say unto you , One of you which eateth with me shall betray me .
text2: E tˈuyul chilaˈ chiˈ ri mesa , tajin quewiˈc aretak ri Jesús xubij chque : Kas tzij ri quinbij chiwe chi cˈo jun chiwe ri quinujach na , are jun ri tajin cäwiˈ wucˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: And they began to be sorrowful , and to say unto him one by one , Is it I ? and another said , Is it I ?
text2: Ru tijoxelab sibalaj xebisonic . Chquijujunal cˈut xquichaplej u taˈic che ri Jesús : ¿ A man xa in riˈ ? ― xecha che .

text: And he answered and said unto them , It is one of the twelve , that dippeth with me in the dish .
text2: Xchˈaw cˈu ri Jesús , xubij chque : Are jun chque ri cablajuj tijoxelab ri curub ru wa wucˈ pa ri lak , ― cächaˈ .

text: The Son of man indeed goeth , as it is written of him : but woe to that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! good were it for that man if he had never been born .
text2: Jeˈ quinel na in jas ri tzˈibtal pa ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios chwij in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak . ¡ Cˈäx cˈu curik na ri achi ri quinjachow na in ! ¡ Utz na re we achi riˈ we ta mat xil u wäch ! ― xcha chque .

text: And as they did eat , Jesus took bread , and blessed , and brake it , and gave to them , and said , Take , eat : this is my body .
text2: Aretak tajin quewiˈc , ri Jesús xucˈam ri caxlan wa , xumaltioxij waˈ che ri Dios , xuban orar puwiˈ chutewchixic . Te riˈ xupiro . Xuya chquiwäch ru tijoxelab , xubij : ¡ Chicˈama iwe ! Jeˈ ta ne are nu cuerpo waˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: And he took the cup , and when he had given thanks , he gave it to them : and they all drank of it .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ xucˈam jun vaso , xumaltioxij cˈu waˈ che ri Dios . Xuya ri vaso chquiwäch , xquitij cˈu que conojel .

text: And he said unto them , This is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque : Jeˈ ta ne are nu quiqˈuel waˈ ri cujiquiba ri cˈacˈ trato ri u banom ri Dios cucˈ ri winak . Cäturuw cˈu na waˈ ri nu quiqˈuel rech cuban utzil chque qˈuia winak , ― cächaˈ .

text: Verily I say unto you , I will drink no more of the fruit of the vine , until that day that I drink it new in the kingdom of God .
text2: Kas tzij ri quinbij chiwe chi man quintij tä chi na we ri vino re uvas , cˈä pa ri kˈij ri quintij na ri cˈacˈ vino chilaˈ jawijeˈ ri cätakan wi ri Dios , ― xcha chque .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ xquibixoj jun bix ri cuya u kˈij ri Dios , xebel bic , xebeˈ pa ri Ujuyubal Olivos .

text: And Jesus saith unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep shall be scattered .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque : Ri ix iwonojel quibisoj na nu wäch , quiniya na can cämic chakˈab . Jeˈ cˈu tzˈibam canok pa ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios : “ Quinsoc na ri ajyukˈ , quejabun cˈu na ri chij , ” ― cächaˈ .

text: But after that I am risen , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Aretak cˈu in cˈastajinak chic chquixol ri cäminakib , quinnabej na bi chiwäch , quineˈ na pa Galilea , ― xcha chque .

text: But Peter said unto him , Although all shall be offended , yet will not I .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri tat Pedro che ri Jesús : ¡ Pune conojel cäquiya la canok , ri in man jeˈ tä riˈ quinbano ! ― xchaˈ .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this day , even in this night , before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús che : Kas tzij ri quinbij chawe chi tzpa we akˈab riˈ cabij na at oxmul chi man awetam tä nu wäch mäjok cokˈ camul ri amaˈ äcˈ , ― xcha che .

text: But he spake the more vehemently , If I should die with thee , I will not deny thee in any wise . Likewise also said they all .
text2: Ri tat Pedro tzco na xchˈawic , xubij : Pune rajwaxic chi quincäm na ucˈ la , kas tzij chi man quinbij taj chi man wetam tä wäch la , ― xcha che . Jeˈ cˈu xquibij xukujeˈ conojel ri tijoxelab .

text: And they came to a place which was named Gethsemane : and he saith to his disciples , Sit ye here , while I shall pray .
text2: Aretak xeopan pa ri chˈäkap ulew , Getsemaní u biˈ , xubij ri Jesús chque ru tijoxelab : Chixtˈuyul can chiˈ cˈä quintoˈtaj na chubanic orar , ― xchaˈ .

text: And he taketh with him Peter and James and John , and began to be sore amazed , and to be very heavy ;
text2: Xeucˈam bi ri tat Pedro , ri tat Jacobo , ri tat Juan rucˈ . Xuchaplej cˈu tˈujuwem ri ranimaˈ ri Jesús , xcˈäxcˈob cˈu waˈ .

text: And saith unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful unto death : tarry ye here , and watch .
text2: Xubij cˈu chque : ¡ Xa are cuqˈuis rib ri wanimaˈ chupam ri bis ! Chixcanaj can chiˈ , chixcˈascˈatok , ― xcha chque .

text: And he went forward a little , and fell on the ground , and prayed that , if it were possible , the hour might pass from him .
text2: Te riˈ xbin chi apan jubikˈ ri Jesús , xutzak rib pa ulew , tajin cuban orar , xutzˈonoj che ri Dios chi we ta cˈo banom wi , mat curik we cˈäx riˈ ri petinak chrij .

text: And he said , Abba , Father , all things are possible unto thee ; take away this cup from me : nevertheless not what I will , but what thou wilt .
text2: Aretak xuban orar , xubij : ¡ Abba ! ¡ Tat ! Ri lal cäcowin la che ronojel . Chesaj bi la we vaso riˈ chnuwäch . Bana baˈ la chi man cäpe tä we cˈäx riˈ chwij . Mäban cˈu la xa jas ri cwaj in , xane jas ri caj la cäban la chwe , ― xcha che ri Dios .

text: And he cometh , and findeth them sleeping , and saith unto Peter , Simon , sleepest thou ? couldest not thou watch one hour ?
text2: Xtzelej cˈu lok ri Jesús cucˈ ru tijoxelab , xeurikaˈ , tajin quewaric . Xubij cˈu che ri tat Pedro : ¿ A catwaric , Simón ? ¿ A mat catcowinic catcˈasi jun hora wucˈ ? ― cächa che .

text: Watch ye and pray , lest ye enter into temptation . The spirit truly is ready , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Chiwila baˈ iwib , chixcˈascˈatok , chibana orar rech man quixtzak taj aretak quixtakchiˈx che mac . Kas tzij ri iwanimaˈ craj u banic utzil , man cˈo tä cˈu u chukˈab ri i cuerpo chubanic waˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: And again he went away , and prayed , and spake the same words .
text2: Xeˈ jumul chic ri Jesús , xubana orar , jeˈ xubij jas ri xubij nabe .

text: And when he returned , he found them asleep again , ( for their eyes were heavy , ) neither wist they what to answer him .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ xtzelej chi lok , xeurika ru tijoxelab chi jumul chic tajin quewaric rumal chi sibalaj cˈäx qui waram . Man xquirik tä cˈu ru tijoxelab jas cäquibij che ri Jesús .

text: And he cometh the third time , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : it is enough , the hour is come ; behold , the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Churoxmul xtzelej chi lok ri Jesús cucˈ , xubij cˈu chque : Chixwar baˈ , chixuxlanok , ― xchaˈ . Te riˈ xubij : ¡ Rucˈ waˈ ! ― cächaˈ . Opaninak cˈu ri hora . Quinjach cˈu na in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , pa qui kˈab ri ajmaquib , ― cächaˈ .

text: Rise up , let us go ; lo , he that betrayeth me is at hand .
text2: ¡ Joˈ baˈ ! ¡ Chixwalijok ! Chiwilampeˈ , xpe ri jachal we , ― xcha chque .

text: And immediately , while he yet spake , cometh Judas , one of the twelve , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and the scribes and the elders .
text2: Cˈä tajin cächˈaw ri Jesús aretak xopan ri tat Judas , jun chque ri cablajuj u tijoxelab . E petinak rucˈ ri areˈ qˈuia winak , cucˈam machetes , cucˈam cheˈ . E takom lok cumal ri qui nimakil sacerdotes , cumal cˈu tak ri tijonelab re ri Pixab , xukujeˈ ri qui nimakil ri winak .

text: And he that betrayed him had given them a token , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he ; take him , and lead him away safely .
text2: Ri tat Judas , ri jachal re ri Jesús , u yoˈm cˈu can jun etal chque ri winak , xubij : Ri quintzˈumaj , are riˈ ri Jesús . ¡ Chichapaˈ ! Kas utz chibana bi chujatˈixic , ― xcha chque .

text: And as soon as he was come , he goeth straightway to him , and saith , Master , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Aretak xopanic , chanim xkeb rucˈ ri Jesús , xubij : ¡ Kajtij , Kajtij ! ― xcha che . Xutzˈumaj cˈut .

text: And they laid their hands on him , and took him .
text2: Xquichap cˈu ri Jesús , xquiyut bic .

text: And one of them that stood by drew a sword , and smote a servant of the high priest , and cut off his ear .
text2: Jun chque ri e tacˈatoj chilaˈ xucˈam ru machete , xusoc ri patänil re ri qui nimal sacerdotes , xukˈat apan ru xiquin .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Are ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and with staves to take me ?
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque ri winak : ¿ Jas lo waˈ chi jeˈ ta ne chrij jun elakˈom elinak wi alak lok ? Cˈamom alak lok ri machetes alak , ri cheˈ alak che nu chapic , ― cächa chque .

text: I was daily with you in the temple teaching , and ye took me not : but the scriptures must be fulfilled .
text2: Ronojel kˈij in cˈo ucˈ alak pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , tajin quinya tijonic chech alak , man xinchap tä cˈu alak . Jeˈ cˈu cäban na waˈ chwe rech jeˈ cäban na jas ri tzˈibam chwij pa ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios , ― xcha chque .

text: And they all forsook him , and fled .
text2: Chanim cˈut conojel ru tijoxelab xquiya can ri Jesús , xeanimaj bic .

text: And there followed him a certain young man , having a linen cloth cast about his naked body ; and the young men laid hold on him :
text2: Cˈo cˈu jun ala teren chrij ri Jesús , xak jun sak atzˈiak u kˈuˈm chrij . Xchap cˈu riˈ cumal ri winak .

text: And he left the linen cloth , and fled from them naked .
text2: Ri areˈ cˈut xuya can ri ratzˈiak pa qui kˈab , chˈanalic xanimaj bi chquiwäch .

text: And they led Jesus away to the high priest : and with him were assembled all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes .
text2: Te riˈ xquicˈam bi ri Jesús cho ri kas qui nimal sacerdotes . Xquimulij cˈu quib conojel ri qui nimakil sacerdotes , ri qui nimakil ri winak , xukujeˈ ri tijonelab re ri Pixab .

text: And Peter followed him afar off , even into the palace of the high priest : and he sat with the servants , and warmed himself at the fire .
text2: Ri tat Pedro cˈut xuterenej bi ri Jesús chinaj , xopan cˈu pa ri uwoja re ri rachoch ri kas qui nimal sacerdotes . Xtˈuyi cˈu ri tat Pedro chilaˈ cucˈ ri chajil tak re ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , tajin cumikˈ rib chrij ri kˈakˈ .

text: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death ; and found none .
text2: Ri qui nimakil sacerdotes cucˈ conojel ri qui nimakil ri winak tajin cäquitzucuj jas u wäch mac ri cäkˈalajisax chrij ri Jesús rech cäcämisaxic . ¡ Man xquirik tä cˈut !

text: For many bare false witness against him , but their witness agreed not together .
text2: E qˈuia cˈu ri xcaˈn tzij chrij aretak xcaˈn kˈalajisanic . Man xak tä cˈu jun u wäch ri xquibij .

text: And there arose certain , and bare false witness against him , saying ,
text2: Te riˈ xewalij jujun ri cäcaˈn tzij chrij ri Areˈ , xquibij :

text: We heard him say , I will destroy this temple that is made with hands , and within three days I will build another made without hands .
text2: Ka tom ri xubij : “ Ri in quinwulij na we nimalaj rachoch Dios riˈ ri banom cumal ri winak , quinyac chi cˈu na pa oxib kˈij jun ri man banom tä waˈ cumal winak , ” ― xcha riˈ , ― xecha chque .

text: But neither so did their witness agree together .
text2: Man rucˈ tä waˈ xjunamataj u wäch ri xquibij chrij .

text: And the high priest stood up in the midst , and asked Jesus , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Xwalij cˈu ri kas qui nimal sacerdotes , xtaqˈui chquiwäch conojel , xutaˈ che ri Jesús , xubij che : ¿ A mat cˈo jas jun tzij cabij chutzelexic u wäch ri tajin cäbix chawij ? ¿ Jas pu waˈ we tajin cäquikˈalajisaj we achijab riˈ chawij ? ― xcha che .

text: But he held his peace , and answered nothing . Again the high priest asked him , and said unto him , Art thou the Christ , the Son of the Blessed ?
text2: Man cächˈaw tä cˈu ri Jesús , man cˈo tä wi jas cubij che . Ri kas qui nimal sacerdotes xutaˈ jumul chic che ri Jesús , xubij : ¿ A kas at riˈ ri Cristo , ru Cˈojol ri Dios ri cäkaya u kˈij ? ― xcha che .

text: And Jesus said , I am : and ye shall see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Xchˈaw cˈu ri Jesús , xubij che : ¡ In riˈ , tat ! ― cächa che . ¡ Quinil cˈu na alak ri in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , aretak in tˈuyul pa ru wiquiäkˈab ri Dios ri sibalaj cˈo u chukˈab , xukujeˈ quinil na alak aretak quinpe na cucˈ tak ri sutzˈ chicaj ! ― xcha che .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , and saith , What need we any further witnesses ?
text2: Are cˈu ri kas qui nimal sacerdotes xurakˈachij ru kˈuˈ chucˈutic chi sibalaj cˈäx cunaˈ ri cubij ri Jesús . Xubij cˈu ri tataˈ : ¿ Jas cˈu che e rajwaxic chi niqˈuiaj kˈalajisanelab chrij ?

text: Ye have heard the blasphemy : what think ye ? And they all condemned him to be guilty of death .
text2: ¡ I tom cˈu ri ix chi xubij ri äwas u bixic chrij ri Dios ! ¿ Jas cˈu quichomaj ? ― xcha chque . Conojel cˈut xquikˈat tzij puwiˈ , xquibij chi rajwaxic cäcämisaxic .

text: And some began to spit on him , and to cover his face , and to buffet him , and to say unto him , Prophesy : and the servants did strike him with the palms of their hands .
text2: E cˈo cˈu jujun xquichaplej u chubaxic . Xquichˈuk ru palaj , xquichˈayo , xquibij cˈu che : ¡ Chachˈobo ne jachin ri xatuchˈayo ! ― xecha che . Xukujeˈ ri chajinelab xquicoj kˈab chupalaj .

text: And as Peter was beneath in the palace , there cometh one of the maids of the high priest :
text2: Cˈä cˈo ri tat Pedro iquim pa ri uwoja aretak xpe jun chque ri alitomab , ri ajicˈ rech ri kas qui nimal sacerdotes .

text: And when she saw Peter warming himself , she looked upon him , and said , And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Aretak xril ri tat Pedro chi tajin cumikˈ rib cho ri kˈakˈ , co xcaˈy che , xubij : ¡ Ri at xukujeˈ xatcˈoji rucˈ ri Jesús aj Nazaret ! ― xcha che .

text: But he denied , saying , I know not , neither understand I what thou sayest . And he went out into the porch ; and the cock crew .
text2: Are cˈu ri tat Pedro xresaj rib chupam , xubij : ¡ Man wetam tä u wäch riˈ , man quinchˈob tä cˈu riˈ ri tajin cabij ! ― xcha che . Xel cˈu bi chilaˈ , xopan chiˈ ri uchibe . Are chiˈ xokˈ ri amaˈ äcˈ .

text: And a maid saw him again , and began to say to them that stood by , This is one of them .
text2: Ri ali xril ri tat Pedro jumul chic , xuchaplej chi na u bixic chque ri e tacˈatoj chunakaj , xubij : ¡ We achi riˈ are jun chque ri e rachiˈl ri Jesús ! ― xchaˈ .

text: And he denied it again . And a little after , they that stood by said again to Peter , Surely thou art one of them : for thou art a Galilaean , and thy speech agreeth thereto .
text2: Ri tat Pedro xresaj chi cˈu rib jumul chic chupam , xubij chi man cuchˈob tä u wäch ri Jesús . Man naj tä cˈu riˈ ri e tacˈatoj chilaˈ xquibij jumul chic che ri tat Pedro : Kas tzij at jun chque rumal chi at aj Galilea . Xukujeˈ xak junam catchˈawic jas ri winak aj Galilea , ― xecha che .

text: But he began to curse and to swear , saying , I know not this man of whom ye speak .
text2: Co cˈu xchˈaw ri tat Pedro , xuban cˈu jurar cho ri Dios , xubij : ¡ Kas tzij riˈ chi ri in man wetam tä u wäch ri achi riˈ ri tajin quitzijoj ! ― xcha chque .

text: And the second time the cock crew . And Peter called to mind the word that Jesus said unto him , Before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice . And when he thought thereon , he wept .
text2: Xokˈ chi cˈu na ri amaˈ äcˈ chucamul . Xnaˈtaj cˈu che ri tat Pedro ru bim ri Jesús che : “ Cabij na at oxmul chi man awetam tä nu wäch mäjok cokˈ camul ri amaˈ äcˈ , ” ― xcha che . Aretak ri tat Pedro xnaˈtaj waˈ che , xutzokopij cˈu okˈej .

text: And straightway in the morning the chief priests held a consultation with the elders and scribes and the whole council , and bound Jesus , and carried him away , and delivered him to Pilate .
text2: Sibalaj akˈab cˈu riˈ xquimulij quib ri qui nimakil sacerdotes , ri qui nimakil ri winak , xukujeˈ ri tijonelab re ri Pixab cucˈ ri niqˈuiaj nimak tak tataˈib . Te cˈu riˈ conojel we nimak tak tataˈib riˈ xquitalaˈ qui noˈj chuchomaxic jas cäcaˈno . Xquiyut cˈu bi ri Jesús , xquicˈam bic , xquijacha cˈu cho ri tat Pilato .

text: And Pilate asked him , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answering said unto him , Thou sayest it .
text2: Xutaˈ cˈu ri tat Pilato che , xubij : ¿ A at riˈ ri cattakan pa qui wiˈ ri winak aj Israel ? ― xchaˈ . Xchˈaw cˈu ri Jesús , xubij : Je riˈ jas ri cäbij la , ― xcha che .

text: And the chief priests accused him of many things : but he answered nothing .
text2: Qˈuia tzij cˈut xcaˈn ri qui nimakil sacerdotes chrij ri Jesús .

text: And Pilate asked him again , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? behold how many things they witness against thee .
text2: Xutaˈ cˈu ri tat Pilato jumul chic che ri Jesús , xubij : ¿ A mat cˈo jas ri cabij ? ¡ Chatampeˈ chi qˈuia ri cäquibij chawij ! ― xcha che .

text: But Jesus yet answered nothing ; so that Pilate marvelled .
text2: Man cˈo tä jun tzij chic xubij ri Jesús , je cˈu riˈ chi xucajmaj waˈ ri tat Pilato , man xurik tä chic jas cubano .

text: Now at that feast he released unto them one prisoner , whomsoever they desired .
text2: Are cˈu ri tat Pilato nakˈatal wi chi pa ri nimakˈij riˈ ri areˈ cuban jun tokˈob chque ri winak , cutzokopij bi jun ajpacheˈ , apachin ta ne ri cäquitaˈ che .

text: And there was one named Barabbas , which lay bound with them that had made insurrection with him , who had committed murder in the insurrection .
text2: Cˈo cˈu jun achi , Barrabás u biˈ , yoˈm pa cheˈ junam cucˈ ri rachiˈl rumal chi xcaˈn cämisanic aretak ri winak re ri tinimit xquiwalijisaj quib chquij ri quetakan pa qui wiˈ .

text: And the multitude crying aloud began to desire him to do as he had ever done unto them .
text2: Xquimulij cˈu quib ri winak chuwäch ri tat Pilato , xquichaplej u tzˈonoxic che chi chubana tokˈob chque , jas ri nakˈatal wi ri areˈ .

text: But Pilate answered them , saying , Will ye that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Xchˈaw cˈu ri tat Pilato , xubij chque : ¿ A quiwaj chi quinban tokˈob chiwe , quintzokopij bi ri tataˈ ri cˈo u takanic pi wiˈ ix ri winak aj Israel ? ― xcha chque .

text: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy .
text2: Cuchˈob cˈu ri tat Pilato chi xa rumal chi cˈäx cäquinaˈ ri qui nimakil sacerdotes che ri Jesús qui jachom ri Areˈ pu kˈab .

text: But the chief priests moved the people , that he should rather release Barabbas unto them .
text2: Ri qui nimakil sacerdotes cˈut tajin cäcaˈno chi ri winak cäquituquij quib , xa cäquibij chi más utz na are cuban tokˈob chque , cätzokopix bi ri Barrabás .

text: And Pilate answered and said again unto them , What will ye then that I shall do unto him whom ye call the King of the Jews ?
text2: Xchˈaw chi ri tat Pilato , xutaˈ cˈu chque : ¿ Jas cˈu ri quiwaj chi quinban che ri achi ri quibij ix chi are cˈo u takanic pi wiˈ ix ri ix winak aj Israel ? ― xcha chque .

text: And they cried out again , Crucify him .
text2: Ri winak co xquirak qui chiˈ , xquibij : ¡ Chripok ! ― xechaˈ .

text: Then Pilate said unto them , Why , what evil hath he done ? And they cried out the more exceedingly , Crucify him .
text2: Xchˈaw cˈu ri tat Pilato , xutaˈ chque : ¿ Jas che ? ¿ Jas etzelal u banom waˈ we achi riˈ ? ― xcha chque . Co cˈu na xechˈaw ri winak , xquibij : ¡ Chripok ! ― xechaˈ .

text: And so Pilate , willing to content the people , released Barabbas unto them , and delivered Jesus , when he had scourged him , to be crucified .
text2: Ri Pilato are cˈu craj u banic xa jas ri qui rayinic ri winak . Xuban chque ri tokˈob ri xquitaˈ , xutzokopij cˈu bi ri Barrabás . Xtakan cˈut chi cächˈay ri Jesús , te cˈu riˈ xujach bic rech cäripic .

text: And the soldiers led him away into the hall , called Praetorium ; and they call together the whole band .
text2: Xepe cˈu ri soldados , xquicˈam bi ri Jesús pa ri uwoja re ri rachoch ri nim kˈatal tzij , xequisiqˈuij ri niqˈuiaj soldados chic rech cäquimulij quib cucˈ .

text: And they clothed him with purple , and platted a crown of thorns , and put it about his head ,
text2: Xquicoj cˈu jun atzˈiak morada chrij ri Jesús . Xukujeˈ xquicoj jun corona re quemom qˈuix chujolom .

text: And began to salute him , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Chanim cˈut xquichaplej u rakic qui chiˈ chrij , xquibij : Lal riˈ ri cätakan la pa qui wiˈ ri winak aj Israel , ¡ chnimarisax kˈij la ! ― xecha che .

text: And they smote him on the head with a reed , and did spit upon him , and bowing their knees worshipped him .
text2: Xquichˈay cˈu chujolom rucˈ jun aj , xquichubaj , xexuqui chuwäch , xak cäcaˈn che quib chi tajin cäquikˈijilaj .

text: And when they had mocked him , they took off the purple from him , and put his own clothes on him , and led him out to crucify him .
text2: Aretak xetoˈtaj che retzˈbexic u wäch , xquijolij ru kˈuˈ ri morada chrij , xquicoj ri kas ratzˈiak ri Areˈ chrij , te cˈu riˈ xquicˈam bi churipic cho ri cruz .

text: And they compel one Simon a Cyrenian , who passed by , coming out of the country , the father of Alexander and Rufus , to bear his cross .
text2: Cˈo cˈu jun achi aj Cirene , Simón u biˈ , qui tat ri tat Alejandro , ri tat Rufo . Ri areˈ tajin cocˈowic , u petic cˈu riˈ pa juyub . Xquicoj qui chukˈab che rech cutelej bi ru cruz ri Jesús .

text: And they bring him unto the place Golgotha , which is , being interpreted , The place of a skull .
text2: Xquicˈam cˈu bi ri Jesús chilaˈ jawijeˈ ri cäbix Gólgota che . Quel cubij waˈ ri biˈaj riˈ : Ri Juyub re ru Bakil Jolomaj , ― cuchixic .

text: And they gave him to drink wine mingled with myrrh : but he received it not .
text2: Xquiya cˈu vino yujtal rucˈ mirra chuwäch ri Jesús rech cutijo . Man xutij tä cˈut .

text: And when they had crucified him , they parted his garments , casting lots upon them , what every man should take .
text2: Aretak qui ripom chic cho ri cruz , ri soldados xquijach ri ratzˈiak ri Jesús chquiwäch , xquesaj cˈu suerte chrij rech cäquilo jas ri cäquicˈam bi chquijujunal .

text: And it was the third hour , and they crucified him .
text2: Akˈab cˈut xrip ri Jesús pa ri u belej hora .

text: And the superscription of his accusation was written over , THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Cojom cˈu puwiˈ ri cruz jun tzˈibtalic ri cubij jas che cäkˈat tzij puwiˈ ri Jesús rech cäripic , cubij cˈut : RI NIM TAKANEL PA QUI WIˈ RI WINAK AJ ISRAEL , ― cächaˈ .

text: And with him they crucify two thieves ; the one on his right hand , and the other on his left .
text2: Xerip cˈu quieb elakˈomab rucˈ , jun pu wiquiäkˈab , jun pu moxkˈab .

text: And the scripture was fulfilled , which saith , And he was numbered with the transgressors .
text2: Xbantaj cˈu can ri tzˈibam chrij pa ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri cubij : “ Jeˈ ta ne chi are jun chque ri banal tak etzelal ri xkˈat tzij puwiˈ , ” ― cächaˈ .

text: And they that passed by railed on him , wagging their heads , and saying , Ah , thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days ,
text2: Ri queocˈowic cäquiyokˈo , cäquisutisaˈ ri qui jolom , cäquibij : ¡ Aa ! ¡ At riˈ ri cabij chi catcowinic cawulij ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , xa cˈu pa oxib kˈij cayac chi na waˈ jumul chic ! ― quecha che .

text: Save thyself , and come down from the cross .
text2: ¡ Chatoˈ baˈ awib , chatkaj cˈu lok cho ri cruz ! ― xecha che .

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking said among themselves with the scribes , He saved others ; himself he cannot save .
text2: Jeˈ xukujeˈ ri qui nimakil sacerdotes cucˈ ri tijonelab re ri Pixab cäquitzeˈj u wäch , cäquichˈabej quib , cäquibij : ¡ Xtob chque niqˈuiaj chic , man cäcowin tä cˈu ri Areˈ chutoˈic rib ! ― quechaˈ .

text: Let Christ the King of Israel descend now from the cross , that we may see and believe . And they that were crucified with him reviled him .
text2: Chkaj baˈ lok cho ri cruz ri Cristo “ ri Nim Takanel quech ri winak aj Israel ” rech cäkilo , ¡ cujcojon cˈu na che ! ― xechaˈ . Ri e ripom rucˈ ri Jesús xukujeˈ xquitzeˈj u wäch .

text: And when the sixth hour was come , there was darkness over the whole land until the ninth hour .
text2: Aretak xurik ri cablajuj hora , xkˈekumar ronojel ruwächulew oxib horas .

text: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eloi , Eloi , lama sabachthani ? which is , being interpreted , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Tzpa ri rox hora re ri benak kˈij xurak u chiˈ ri Jesús , co xchˈawic , xubij : Eloi , Eloi , ¿ lama sabactani ? ― xchaˈ . Jeˈ quel cubij waˈ : Nu Dios , nu Dios , ¿ jas che in wonobam la canok ? ― cächaˈ .

text: And some of them that stood by , when they heard it , said , Behold , he calleth Elias .
text2: Jujun cˈu chque ri e tacˈatoj chilaˈ xquita waˈ , xquibij : ¡ Chitampeˈ ! ― quechaˈ . Tajin cusiqˈuij ri ka mam Elías ri ojer kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios , ― xecha riˈ .

text: And one ran and filled a spunge full of vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink , saying , Let alone ; let us see whether Elias will come to take him down .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ jun chque ri winak xutic anim , xeˈc , xurubu jun estropajo pa chˈäm vino , xuya waˈ puwiˈ jun aj , xuya akˈan chuwäch ri Jesús rech cutijo , xubij cˈu apan chque ri winak : ¡ Chiweyej baˈ ! Chkila na we cäpe ri ka mam Elías chukasaxic , ― xcha chque .

text: And Jesus cried with a loud voice , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Sibalaj co xurak u chiˈ ri Jesús , xel ranimaˈ , xcäm cˈu ri Areˈ .

text: And the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom .
text2: Are cˈu ri tasbal u pam ri nimalaj rachoch Dios xjisjobic , quieb xubano , xpe ajsic cˈä iquim .

text: And when the centurion , which stood over against him , saw that he so cried out , and gave up the ghost , he said , Truly this man was the Son of God .
text2: Ri qui nimal soldados aj Roma , ri tacˈal cho ri Jesús , aretak xuto xurak u chiˈ ri Jesús , xukujeˈ xrilo jas xubano aretak xcämic , xubij : ¡ Kas tzij u Cˈojol ri Dios waˈ we achi riˈ ! ― xchaˈ .

text: There were also women looking on afar off : among whom was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James the less and of Joses , and Salome ;
text2: E cˈo cˈu jujun ixokib ri tajin quecaˈy apan chinaj . Chquixol ri e areˈ cˈo ri nan María aj Magdala , xukujeˈ ri nan María u nan ri tat Jacobo ri más cˈacˈal na , ri xukujeˈ are u nan ri tat José waˈ . Cˈo xukujeˈ ri nan Salomé cucˈ .

text: ( Who also , when he was in Galilee , followed him , and ministered unto him ; ) and many other women which came up with him unto Jerusalem .
text2: Aretak ri Jesús xcˈoji pa Galilea , we ixokib riˈ xebin rucˈ , xepatänin che . Xukujeˈ e cˈo chilaˈ qˈuia chque ri niqˈuiaj ixokib chic ri e opaninak rucˈ ri Jesús pa Jerusalén .

text: And now when the even was come , because it was the preparation , that is , the day before the sabbath ,
text2: Benak chi ri kˈij pa ri kˈij ri cäban u banic ronojel che ri kˈij re uxlanem , are cˈu víspera waˈ re ri kˈij riˈ .

text: Joseph of Arimathaea , and honourable counseller , which also waited for the kingdom of God , came , and went in boldly unto Pilate , and craved the body of Jesus .
text2: Xopan cˈu ri tat José aj Arimatea , jun chque ri qui nimakil ri winak aj Israel ri tznim quil wi . Ri areˈ xukujeˈ cuˈl u cˈux che reyexic chi cäpe na ri Dios rech cätakan na pa qui wiˈ ri winak . Xuchajij cˈu animaˈ , xoc cho ri tat Pilato chutaˈic chi cäyiˈ ru cuerpo ri Jesús che .

text: And Pilate marvelled if he were already dead : and calling unto him the centurion , he asked him whether he had been any while dead .
text2: Xucajmaj waˈ ri tat Pilato chi sibalaj chanim xcäm ri Jesús . Xtakan cˈu chusiqˈuixic ri qui nimal ri soldados chuwäch , xutaˈ che we kas tzij cäminak chic .

text: And when he knew it of the centurion , he gave the body to Joseph .
text2: Aretak ri qui nimal soldados xubij chi kas tzij cäminak chic ri Jesús , ri tat Pilato xuya ru cuerpo che ri tat José .

text: And he bought fine linen , and took him down , and wrapped him in the linen , and laid him in a sepulchre which was hewn out of a rock , and rolled a stone unto the door of the sepulchre .
text2: Ri tat José cˈut xulokˈ jun payuˈ , xukasaj ru cuerpo ri Jesús , xupis cˈu chupam ri payuˈ . Te riˈ xuya chupam jun mukubal ri cˈotom cok pa ri abaj . Xuwolkotij cˈu jun abaj chuchiˈ ri mukubal .

text: And Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joses beheld where he was laid .
text2: Ri nan María aj Magdala rucˈ ri nan María u nan ri tat José tajin cäquilo jawijeˈ ri cäyiˈ wi can ru cuerpo ri Jesús .

text: And when the sabbath was past , Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James , and Salome , had bought sweet spices , that they might come and anoint him .
text2: Ocˈowinak chi cˈu ri kˈij re uxlanem , ri nan María aj Magdala , xukujeˈ ri nan María u nan ri tat Jacobo rucˈ ri nan Salomé , xquilokˈ cˈocˈalaj tak cunabal rech quequibila chrij ru cuerpo ri Jesús .

text: And very early in the morning the first day of the week , they came unto the sepulchre at the rising of the sun .
text2: Sibalaj akˈab cˈut pa ri nabe kˈij re ri semana xebeˈ ri ixokib chuchiˈ ri mukubal . Elinak chi cˈu lok ri kˈij aretak xeopanic .

text: And they said among themselves , Who shall roll us away the stone from the door of the sepulchre ?
text2: Xquichˈabej cˈu quib , xquibij : ¿ Jachin ta cˈu lo ri cäwolkotin na apan ri abaj chkawäch ? ¡ Tzchuchiˈ ri mukubal cˈut cˈo wi ! ― xechaˈ .

text: And when they looked , they saw that the stone was rolled away : for it was very great .
text2: Aretak cˈut xecaˈyic , cˈä teˈ xquilo chi wolkotim chi apan ri nimalaj abaj riˈ .

text: And entering into the sepulchre , they saw a young man sitting on the right side , clothed in a long white garment ; and they were affrighted .
text2: Xeboc cˈu bi pa ri mukubal , xquil jun acˈal achi tˈuyul pa ru wiquiäkˈab ri mukubal . Sakloloj cˈu ri ratzˈiak ri achi . ¡ Xquixej cˈu quib ri ixokib , xquicajmaj waˈ !

text: And he saith unto them , Be not affrighted : Ye seek Jesus of Nazareth , which was crucified : he is risen ; he is not here : behold the place where they laid him .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri achi chque : ¡ Mixej iwib ! Ri ix quitzucuj ri Jesús aj Nazaret , ri xrip cho ri cruz . Cˈastajinak cˈu bi ri Areˈ chquixol ri cäminakib , man cˈo tä chic waral . Chiwilampeˈ jawijeˈ ri xyiˈ wi , ― cächa chque .

text: But go your way , tell his disciples and Peter that he goeth before you into Galilee : there shall ye see him , as he said unto you .
text2: Jix baˈ , chitzijoj cˈu waˈ chque ru tijoxelab , xukujeˈ che ri tat Pedro , chibij : “ Nabejinak ri Jesús chiwäch , benam re pa Galilea . Chilaˈ quiwila wi na u wäch ri Areˈ jeˈ jas ri xubij chiwe , ” ― xcha chque ri ixokib .

text: And they went out quickly , and fled from the sepulchre ; for they trembled and were amazed : neither said they any thing to any man ; for they were afraid .
text2: Te riˈ xebel bi ri ixokib , xeanimaj bi chuchiˈ ri mukubal . Sibalaj xebirbitic , qui xibim cˈu quib . Man cˈo tä cˈu jas cäquibij che jachin jun rumal chi sibalaj qui xem quib .

text: Now when Jesus was risen early the first day of the week , he appeared first to Mary Magdalene , out of whom he had cast seven devils .
text2: Cˈastajinak chi cˈu ri Jesús chquixol ri cäminakib sibalaj akˈab pa ri nabe kˈij re ri semana , xucˈut rib nabe chuwäch ri nan María aj Magdala ri e resam bi wukub itzel tak espíritus che .

text: And she went and told them that had been with him , as they mourned and wept .
text2: Xeˈ cˈu ri areˈ , xutzijoj waˈ chque ri niqˈuiaj chic ri xecˈoji rucˈ ri Jesús . Ri e areˈ sibalaj quebisonic , tajin quebokˈic .

text: And they , when they had heard that he was alive , and had been seen of her , believed not .
text2: Aretak xquito chi cˈasal chi ri Jesús , chi ilom chi u wäch rumal ri nan María , ¡ man xquicoj taj !

text: After that he appeared in another form unto two of them , as they walked , and went into the country .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ jun chi wi u cˈutic rib ri xuban ri Jesús chquiwäch quieb chque ru tijoxelab ri benam que pa juyub .

text: And they went and told it unto the residue : neither believed they them .
text2: Xetzelej cˈu bi ri e areˈ , xebeˈc , xquitzijoj waˈ chque ri niqˈuiaj chic . Man xquicoj tä cˈu ri qui tzij ri e areˈ .

text: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat , and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart , because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen .
text2: Chuqˈuisbal ri Jesús xucˈut rib chquiwäch ri julajuj u tijoxelab , aretak e tˈuyul chiˈ ri mesa . Xeuyajo rumal chi man xecojon taj , chi xa abajarinak ri canimaˈ . Jeˈ xuban waˈ rumal chi man xquicoj tä ri qui tzij ri winak ri quilom u wäch ri Areˈ chi cˈasal chic .

text: And he said unto them , Go ye into all the world , and preach the gospel to every creature .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque : Jix cho ronojel ruwächulew , chitzijoj ri Utzalaj Tzij re ri Evangelio chque conojel ri winak , ― cächaˈ .

text: He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved ; but he that believeth not shall be damned .
text2: Apachin cˈu ri cäcojonic , cäban cˈu na u kasnaˈ , curik na riˈ ru tobanic ri Dios . Ri man cäcojon taj , cäkˈat na tzij puwiˈ chi cäcˈäjisax na u wäch , ― cächaˈ .

text: And these signs shall follow them that believe ; In my name shall they cast out devils ; they shall speak with new tongues ;
text2: Ri quecojonic cäcaˈn na waˈ we cajmabal tak etal riˈ : Pa ri nu biˈ quequesaj na bi itzel tak espíritus , quechˈaw cˈu na pa juleˈ tak chˈabal chic .

text: They shall take up serpents ; and if they drink any deadly thing , it shall not hurt them ; they shall lay hands on the sick , and they shall recover .
text2: Cäquichap na cumätz , xukujeˈ we cäquitij cämisanel cunabal , man cˈo tä cˈäx cäquiriko . Cäquiya na qui kˈab pa qui wiˈ ri yawabib , queutzir cˈu na canok , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: So then after the Lord had spoken unto them , he was received up into heaven , and sat on the right hand of God .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ , aretak ri Kajaw Jesús xtoˈtaj che tzijonem cucˈ ru tijoxelab , xcˈam bi chicaj , xtˈuyi cˈu pa ru wiquiäkˈab ri Dios .

text: And they went forth , and preached everywhere , the Lord working with them , and confirming the word with signs following . Amen .
text2: Are cˈu ru tijoxelab xebel bic , xquitzijoj ri Utzalaj Tzij re ri Evangelio apawijeˈ chiˈ ri xeopan wi . Tzare cˈu ri Kajaw Jesús xtob chque , xujiquiba chquiwäch ri winak chi kas tzij ri tajin cäquitzijoj rumal chi xuya chque chi cäcaˈn cajmabal tak etal junam rucˈ ri tajin cäquitzijoj . Amén .

text: Forasmuch as many have taken in hand to set forth in order a declaration of those things which are most surely believed among us ,
text2: Lokˈalaj tat Teófilo : E qˈuia ri winak ri xcaj xquitzˈibaj pa cholaj ri tzijobelil chrij ri kas xbantaj waral chkaxol .

text: Even as they delivered them unto us , which from the beginning were eyewitnesses , and ministers of the word ;
text2: Ri xbantaj na are jeˈ jas ri cˈutum chkawäch cumal ri winak ri xquil ronojel waˈ kas pa ri u chaplexic lok . We winak riˈ e areˈ ri xetob chutzijoxic ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios .

text: It seemed good to me also , having had perfect understanding of all things from the very first , to write unto thee in order , most excellent Theophilus ,
text2: Ri in xukujeˈ sibalaj utz rilic waˈ nu banom in rech quinwetamaj ronojel waˈ kas pa ru chaplexic lok . Rumal rech waˈ xinchomaj in chi are utz we ri in xukujeˈ quintzˈibaj bi pa ru cholajil ronojel ri xbantajic .

text: That thou mightest know the certainty of those things , wherein thou hast been instructed .
text2: Je riˈ quinban na rech quetamaj la ri kas tzij chrij ri tijonic ri yoˈm che la .

text: There was in the days of Herod , the king of Judaea , a certain priest named Zacharias , of the course of Abia : and his wife was of the daughters of Aaron , and her name was Elisabeth .
text2: Aretak ri tat Herodes are nim takanel pa qui wiˈ ri winak aj Judea , xcˈoji jun tataˈ chic chilaˈ , Zacarías u biˈ . Ri tataˈ riˈ are sacerdote aj Israel ri jun cucˈ ri juchˈob sacerdotes aj re ri mam Abías . Ri rixokil , Elisabet u biˈ , are jun chque ri rachalaxic ri mam Aarón .

text: And they were both righteous before God , walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blameless .
text2: E utzalaj tak winak waˈ we jucˈulaj riˈ , jicom cˈu canimaˈ cho ri Dios . Xeniman che ri Dios pa ronojel ri xtakan wi , pa ronojel ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Kajaw . Man cˈo tä etzelal ri xcaˈno .

text: And they had no child , because that Elisabeth was barren , and they both were now well stricken in years .
text2: Man cˈo tä cˈu calcˈual rumal chi ri nan Elisabet man calcˈualan taj . E nimak tak winak chi cˈut ri quieb riˈ .

text: And it came to pass , that while he executed the priest ' s office before God in the order of his course ,
text2: Pa jun kˈij ri tat Zacarías tajin cäpatänin ri areˈ pa ri nimalaj rachoch ri Dios rumal chi cäquirik u banic waˈ ri achijab ri e jun cucˈ ri juchˈob sacerdotes aj re ri mam Abías pa tak ri kˈij riˈ . Ri u chac ri tat Zacarías are laˈ chi cächˈaw pa qui wiˈ ri winak rucˈ ri Dios .

text: According to the custom of the priest ' s office , his lot was to burn incense when he went into the temple of the Lord .
text2: Jeˈ jas ri qui nakˈatisam wi quib ri sacerdotes , xquichaˈ ri tat Zacarías rech coc bi pa ri lokˈalaj cˈolibal ri sibalaj äwas chi coc bi xa apachinok chuporoxic ri incienso .

text: And the whole multitude of the people were praying without at the time of incense .
text2: Conojel ri winak xquimulij apan quib cho ja chubanic orar aretak tajin cäporox ri incienso .

text: And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense .
text2: Teˈtalic cˈut xucˈut rib jun ángel cho ri tat Zacarías , ri takom lok rumal ri Dios . Xtaqˈui cˈu chuxcut ri cäporox wi ri incienso .

text: And when Zacharias saw him , he was troubled , and fear fell upon him .
text2: Aretak ri tat Zacarías xril ri ángel , man xurik taj jas xubano , xane sibalaj xuxej rib .

text: But the angel said unto him , Fear not , Zacharias : for thy prayer is heard ; and thy wife Elisabeth shall bear thee a son , and thou shalt call his name John .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri ángel che ri tat Zacarías : Maxej awib . Ri a bochiˈnic xtaˈtaj rumal ri Dios . Quil cˈu na u wäch jun a cˈojol rumal ri nan Elisabet ri awixokil . Cacoj cˈu na a Juan che ru biˈ , ― cächa che .

text: And thou shalt have joy and gladness ; and many shall rejoice at his birth .
text2: Xukujeˈ xubij : Sibalaj catquicot na rumal ri acˈal , xukujeˈ e qˈuia chque ri juleˈ winak chic ri quequicot na aretak quil u wäch , ― cächa ri ángel che .

text: For he shall be great in the sight of the Lord , and shall drink neither wine nor strong drink ; and he shall be filled with the Holy Ghost , even from his mother ' s womb .
text2: Cänimar na u kˈij cho ri Kajaw Dios . Man cutij tä na vino , man cutij tä cˈu tzam . Cätakan na ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu pa ranimaˈ ri acˈal cˈä mäjok quil u wäch , ― cächaˈ .

text: And many of the children of Israel shall he turn to the Lord their God .
text2: Cuban cˈu na ri a Juan chi qˈuia chque ri winak aj Israel quetzelej na rucˈ ri Kajaw ri qui Dios , ― cächa ri ángel che ri tat Zacarías .

text: And he shall go before him in the spirit and power of Elias , to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children , and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just ; to make ready a people prepared for the Lord .
text2: Ri a Juan cänabej na cho ri Kajaw Jesús . Cäcˈoji cˈu na ru noˈj xukujeˈ ru chukˈab jeˈ jas ri xcˈoji che ri mam Elías , kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ojer . Cuban na chi ri nan tat quetzelejic queutzir cucˈ ri calcˈual , xukujeˈ chi ri winak ri cäquiyac quib chrij ri Dios cäquiqˈuex na canimaˈ , cäquiqˈuex ri qui chomanic , cäquetamaj na ri nimanic , quetzelej qui wäch cucˈ ri utzalaj tak winak , cäcaˈn na que ri e areˈ . Ri a Juan cuban na chque ri winak chi quecowin na chucˈulaxic ri Kajaw , ― xcha ri ángel che ri tat Zacarías .

text: And Zacharias said unto the angel , Whereby shall I know this ? for I am an old man , and my wife well stricken in years .
text2: Xutaˈ cˈu ri tat Zacarías che ri ángel , xubij : ¿ Jas ta quinban che retamaxic waˈ chi kas tzij ri cätzijoj la chwe ? Ri in , in riˈj achi chic , xukujeˈ ri wixokil are nim winak chic , ― xcha che .

text: And the angel answering said unto him , I am Gabriel , that stand in the presence of God ; and am sent to speak unto thee , and to shew thee these glad tidings .
text2: Xchˈaw chi na jumul ri ángel , xubij che : In riˈ ri Gabriel , in patänil re ri Dios . In takom cˈu lok che a tzijobexic , che qui tzijoxic we utzalaj tak tzij riˈ chawe , ― cächa che .

text: And , behold , thou shalt be dumb , and not able to speak , until the day that these things shall be performed , because thou believest not my words , which shall be fulfilled in their season .
text2: Tzche we cämic riˈ man catcowin tä chic catchˈawic cˈä copan na ri kˈij ri cäbantaj na waˈ ri xinbij chawe , cˈä quil na u wäch ri a cˈojol rumal rech waˈ chi man xacoj tä ri nu tzij , ― cächa riˈ . Cäbantaj na waˈ we nu tzijom riˈ tzpa ru kˈijol , ― xcha ri ángel che .

text: And the people waited for Zacharias , and marvelled that he tarried so long in the temple .
text2: Ri winak cˈut queyeˈm ri tat Zacarías . Xquicajmaj waˈ chi sibalaj xbeytaj pa ri lokˈalaj cˈolibal ri sibalaj äwas chi coc bi xa apachinok .

text: And when he came out , he could not speak unto them : and they perceived that he had seen a vision in the temple : for he beckoned unto them , and remained speechless .
text2: Aretak xel lok ri tat Zacarías , man xcowin tä chic che qui chˈabexic ri winak . Xquetamaj chi cˈo jas ri xucˈut rib chuwäch ri tat Zacarías pa ri lokˈalaj cˈolibal . Xak pa memal chic xeuchˈabej , rumal chi xmemar canok .

text: And it came to pass , that , as soon as the days of his ministration were accomplished , he departed to his own house .
text2: Aretak xetzˈakat ri kˈij ri cäpatänin ri tat Zacarías pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , xeˈ ri areˈ cho rachoch .

text: And after those days his wife Elisabeth conceived , and hid herself five months , saying ,
text2: Te cˈu riˈ ri nan Elisabet xcanaj yawab winak chic , xcanaj cˈu job icˈ cho rachoch . Xubij ri nan Elisabet pa ranimaˈ :

text: Thus hath the Lord dealt with me in the days wherein he looked on me , to take away my reproach among men .
text2: “ Xcaˈy ri Kajaw Dios chwe , xutokˈobisaj cˈu nu wäch rech man quinquiyokˈ tä chi ri winak , ” ― xcha ri nan Elisabet .

text: And in the sixth month the angel Gabriel was sent from God unto a city of Galilee , named Nazareth ,
text2: Chuwak icˈ chi cˈut ri Dios xutak bi ri ángel Gabriel pa ri tinimit Nazaret re Galilea .

text: To a virgin espoused to a man whose name was Joseph , of the house of David ; and the virgin ' s name was Mary .
text2: Xopan cˈu rucˈ jun kˈapoj ali , María u biˈ , ri tzˈonom chic rumal jun achi , José u biˈ . We achi riˈ rachalaxic can ri nim takanel David ojer .

text: And the angel came in unto her , and said , Hail , thou that art highly favoured , the Lord is with thee : blessed art thou among women .
text2: Ri ángel xoc bi chilaˈ jawijeˈ cˈo wi ri kˈapoj al María , xubij che : ¿ A utz a wäch , María ? ― cächaˈ . ¡ At riˈ ri at chaˈtal rumal ri Dios ! Kas cˈo ri Kajaw Dios awucˈ , ― cächa che . Ri at cˈut , at tewchim na rumal ri Dios chquiwäch conojel ixokib , ― xcha ri ángel che ri al María .

text: And when she saw him , she was troubled at his saying , and cast in her mind what manner of salutation this should be .
text2: Aretak ri al María xril ri ángel , xutatabej ru tzij , xtˈujuw cˈu ri ranimaˈ rumal ri xbix che . Xuchomaj pa ranimaˈ , xubij : ¿ Jas waˈ ri cubij chwe ? ― xcha riˈ .

text: And the angel said unto her , Fear not , Mary : for thou hast found favour with God .
text2: Xchˈaw chi ri ángel , xubij che ri kˈapoj al María : Maxej awib , María , ― cächa che . Ri at sibalaj at lokˈ cho ri Dios .

text: And , behold , thou shalt conceive in thy womb , and bring forth a son , and shalt call his name JESUS .
text2: Ri at cˈut catcanaj can yawab winak . Cawil na u wäch jun awal ala ri cacoj na “ Jesús ” che ru biˈ , ― cächaˈ .

text: He shall be great , and shall be called the Son of the Highest : and the Lord God shall give unto him the throne of his father David :
text2: Cänimar na u kˈij ri a Jesús . Cäbix na u Cˈojol ri Dios aj Chicaj che . Ri Kajaw Dios cucoj na che nim takanel jeˈ jas ra mam David .

text: And he shall reign over the house of Jacob for ever ; and of his kingdom there shall be no end .
text2: Je riˈ rech cätakan na puwiˈ ri tinimit Israel pa tak ri kˈij ri junab ri quepetic . Ru takanic ri Areˈ , man cˈo tä u qˈuisic , ― xcha ri ángel che ri al María .

text: Then said Mary unto the angel , How shall this be , seeing I know not a man ?
text2: Te riˈ ri al María xutaˈ che ri ángel , xubij : ¿ Jas lo quincˈulmaj waˈ ? ― cächaˈ . Mäjaˈ quincˈoji rucˈ achi , ― xcha che ri ángel .

text: And the angel answered and said unto her , The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee , and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee : therefore also that holy thing which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God .
text2: Xchˈaw cˈu ri ángel , xubij che : Cäkaj na lok ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu pa wiˈ . Ri Dios aj Chicaj cärokxanej na waˈ awucˈ rumal ru chukˈab . Rumal riˈ we lokˈalaj acˈal riˈ ri quil na u wäch cäbix na u Cˈojol ri Dios che , ― cächa che .

text: And , behold , thy cousin Elisabeth , she hath also conceived a son in her old age : and this is the sixth month with her , who was called barren .
text2: Xukujeˈ ri nan Elisabet ri awachalal areˈ cäril na u wäch jun acˈal pune riˈj chic . Are cˈu wakib icˈ waˈ cämic yawab winak chic ri nan Elisabet pune xbix canok che chi man cäcowin tä che ri alcˈualanic .

text: For with God nothing shall be impossible .
text2: Man cˈo tä cˈu jas ri mat cäcowin ri Dios chubanic , ― xcha ri ángel .

text: And Mary said , Behold the handmaid of the Lord ; be it unto me according to thy word . And the angel departed from her .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri kˈapoj al María : In riˈ ri patänil re ri Kajaw Dios . Chubana baˈ ri Areˈ chwe jas ri tzijom la chwe , ― xcha che . Xel cˈu bi ri ángel chuwäch .

text: And Mary arose in those days , and went into the hill country with haste , into a city of Juda ;
text2: Pa tak ri kˈij riˈ xel bic ri al María cho ja , xeˈ aninak pa jun tinimit ri cˈo pa tak ri u juyubal ri Judea .

text: And entered into the house of Zacharias , and saluted Elisabeth .
text2: Xoc cˈu bic pa rachoch ri tat Zacarías , xuya rutzil u wäch ri nan Elisabet ri rixokil .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Elisabeth heard the salutation of Mary , the babe leaped in her womb ; and Elisabeth was filled with the Holy Ghost :
text2: Ri nan Elisabet , aretak xuta ru tzij ri al María , xslab cˈu ri ral pa ru cˈux . Xkaj ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu puwiˈ ri nan Elisabet , xtakan cˈu pa ranimaˈ .

text: And she spake out with a loud voice , and said , Blessed art thou among women , and blessed is the fruit of thy womb .
text2: Co xchˈaw ri nan Elisabet , xubij che ri al María : Ri at cˈut at tewchim na rumal ri Dios chquiwäch conojel ixokib . U tewchim na ri awal at xukujeˈ , ― cächaˈ .

text: And whence is this to me , that the mother of my Lord should come to me ?
text2: ¿ Jas lo waˈ chi ri Dios cuban jun nimalaj utzil chwe in , chi ru nan ri Kajaw xpe wucˈ ? ― cächa ri nan Elisabet .

text: For , lo , as soon as the voice of thy salutation sounded in mine ears , the babe leaped in my womb for joy .
text2: Chanim riˈ aretak xinto chi xatchˈawic , ri wal xquicotic , xslab pa nu cˈux .

text: And blessed is she that believed : for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord .
text2: Utz awe at ri xatcojon che ri Kajaw Dios , rumal chi kas tzij cäbantaj na ri xbix chawe rumal ri Dios , ― xcha ri nan Elisabet che ri al María .

text: And Mary said , My soul doth magnify the Lord ,
text2: Xubij ri kˈapoj al María : Quinnimarisaj u kˈij ri Kajaw Dios .

text: And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour .
text2: Cäquicot cˈu ri wanimaˈ rumal ri Dios ri Toˈl We .

text: For he hath regarded the low estate of his handmaiden : for , behold , from henceforth all generations shall call me blessed .
text2: Quinquicotic rumal chi ri Dios xcaˈy chwe in ru patäninel ri man nim tä nu banic . Conojel winak cäquibij na chwe pa tak ri kˈij ri junab ri quepetic chi utz we .

text: For he that is mighty hath done to me great things ; and holy is his name .
text2: Je riˈ cäquibij na rumal rech waˈ chi ri Dios ri sibalaj cˈo u chukˈab u banom nimak tak utzil chwe . Sibalaj lokˈ ri Dios , sibalaj lokˈ ru biˈ ri Areˈ ,

text: And his mercy is on them that fear him from generation to generation .
text2: ― cächa ri al María . Amakˈel ronojel kˈij cutokˈobisaj na qui wäch conojel winak ri nim cäquil wi ri Areˈ , ri cäquixej quib chuwäch .

text: He hath shewed strength with his arm ; he hath scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts .
text2: U cˈutum ri nimalaj u chukˈab chquiwäch conojel . Xukasaj qui kˈij ri winak ri cäquichomaj chi sibalaj nim qui banic ,

text: He hath put down the mighty from their seats , and exalted them of low degree .
text2: ― cächaˈ . Xeresaj ri takanic pa qui kˈab ri nimak qui banic , xuya cˈu waˈ chque ri winak ri man nim tä queil wi .

text: He hath filled the hungry with good things ; and the rich he hath sent empty away .
text2: E qˈuia ri utzil ri xuban ri Dios chque ri mebaˈib , ri winak ri quenumic . Ri Dios xubij chque ri kˈinomab : Jix , man cˈo tä iwe ix ,

text: He hath holpen his servant Israel , in remembrance of his mercy ;
text2: ― xcha chque , ― cächaˈ . Xtoban chque ri winak aj Israel , ri patänil tak re ri Dios . Man xsach tä pu jolom ri Dios ru tokˈobisaxic qui wäch .

text: As he spake to our fathers , to Abraham , and to his seed for ever .
text2: Jeˈ xuban waˈ rumal chi jeˈ xuchiˈj chque ri katiˈt ka mam , che ri ka mam Abraham xukujeˈ ri rachalaxic ri areˈ amakˈel pa tak ri kˈij ri junab ri quepetic ,

text: And Mary abode with her about three months , and returned to her own house .
text2: ― xcha ri al María . Craj oxib icˈ xcanaj na can ri al María rucˈ ri nan Elisabet . Te cˈu riˈ xtzelej bic , xeˈ cho rachoch .

text: Now Elisabeth ' s full time came that she should be delivered ; and she brought forth a son .
text2: Aretak xopan ri kˈij ri cutzir ri nan Elisabet , xril cˈu u wäch jun ral ala .

text: And her neighbours and her cousins heard how the Lord had shewed great mercy upon her ; and they rejoiced with her .
text2: Ri u cˈul tak ja ri nan Elisabet xukujeˈ ri rachalaxic , aretak xquito chi ri Kajaw Dios sibalaj xutokˈobisaj u wäch ri nan Elisabet , xequichˈabej , xequicot cˈu rucˈ .

text: And it came to pass , that on the eighth day they came to circumcise the child ; and they called him Zacharias , after the name of his father .
text2: Chuwajxak kˈij cˈut xebeˈ chucojic ri retal ri ojer u trato ri Dios che ru cuerpo ri acˈal . Xcaj cˈut xquicoj Zacarías che ru biˈ , junam rucˈ ru biˈ ru tat .

text: And his mother answered and said , Not so ; but he shall be called John .
text2: Xchˈaw cˈu ru nan , xubij chque : ¡ No ! ― cächaˈ . Ru biˈ ri cäkacoj chrij ri acˈal are Juan , ― xcha chque .

text: And they said unto her , There is none of thy kindred that is called by this name .
text2: Xquibij cˈu che : ¿ Jas che ? Man cˈo tä jun chque ri achalal la ri jeˈ u biˈ waˈ , ― xecha che .

text: And they made signs to his father , how he would have him called .
text2: Xak pa memal xquichˈabej ru tat ri acˈal , xquitaˈ che : ¿ Jas u biˈ ri acˈal cäcoj la ? ― xecha che .

text: And he asked for a writing table , and wrote , saying , His name is John . And they marvelled all .
text2: Ri tat Zacarías xutaˈ jun wuj rech cätzˈibanic . Xutzˈibaj cˈu waˈ , xubij : “ Juan ru biˈ ri acˈal , ” ― xcha pa ri tzˈibanic . Conojel xquicajmaj waˈ .

text: And his mouth was opened immediately , and his tongue loosed , and he spake , and praised God .
text2: Xak cˈu teˈtalic xtzelej ru chˈabal ri tat Zacarías , xcowin chic cätzijonic . Xtzijon cˈut , xunimarisaj u kˈij ri Dios .

text: And fear came on all that dwelt round about them : and all these sayings were noised abroad throughout all the hill country of Judaea .
text2: Sibalaj xquixej quib conojel ri qui cˈul tak ja , xquicajmaj waˈ . Ronojel ri xucˈulmataj jelaˈ xtzijox apan pa tak ronojel ri juyub re Judea .

text: And all they that heard them laid them up in their hearts , saying , What manner of child shall this be ! And the hand of the Lord was with him .
text2: Conojel ri winak ri xetowic xechoman pa que wi , xquibij : ¿ Jas lo cuban waˈ we acˈal riˈ ? ― xechaˈ . Jeˈ xquibij waˈ rumal chi kˈalaj chi cˈo ri Kajaw Dios rucˈ ri acˈal .

text: And his father Zacharias was filled with the Holy Ghost , and prophesied , saying ,
text2: Kajinak ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu puwiˈ ri tat Zacarías ru tat ri ala , xkˈalajisanic , xubij :

text: Blessed be the Lord God of Israel ; for he hath visited and redeemed his people ,
text2: Quinya baˈ u kˈij ri Kajaw ri ka Dios uj , uj riˈ ri winak aj Israel , rumal chi xulic , xpe che ka toˈic uj , uj cˈu riˈ ri winak re ri u tinimit .

text: And hath raised up an horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David ;
text2: Xuya cˈu chke jun Toˈl Ke ri sibalaj cˈo u chukˈab . Are cˈu waˈ jun chque ri rachalaxic ri ka mam David , patänil re ri Dios ,

text: As he spake by the mouth of his holy prophets , which have been since the world began :
text2: ― cächa riˈ . Are waˈ ri xuchiˈj lok ri Dios cumal ri lokˈalaj tak kˈalajisal tak re ru Lokˈ Pixab pa ri ojer tak kˈij canok .

text: That we should be saved from our enemies , and from the hand of all that hate us ;
text2: Xubij chi cujutoˈ na chquiwäch ri ka cˈulel , che ka toˈic pa qui kˈab , xukujeˈ pa qui kˈab conojel ri queetzelan ka wäch ,

text: To perform the mercy promised to our fathers , and to remember his holy covenant ;
text2: ― cächa ri tat Zacarías . Xukujeˈ xubij chi cutokˈobisaj na qui wäch ri katiˈt ka mam , xukujeˈ chucˈutic chquiwäch chi xnaˈtaj che ri Areˈ ri Lokˈalaj Trato ri xuchiˈj chque .

text: The oath which he sware to our father Abraham ,
text2: Are cˈu waˈ ri Kas Tzij ri u bim che ri ka mam Abraham ,

text: That he would grant unto us , that we being delivered out of the hand of our enemies might serve him without fear ,
text2: ― cächaˈ . Je riˈ rech aretak uj esam chic pa qui kˈab ri ka cˈulel , cuyaˈ cujpatänin che ri Dios , man cäkaxej tä chi kib ,

text: In holiness and righteousness before him , all the days of our life .
text2: xukujeˈ rech jicom ri kanimaˈ cujpatänin che , ka jachom kib pu kˈab ri Dios pa tak ronojel ri kˈij re ri ka cˈaslemal ,

text: And thou , child , shalt be called the prophet of the Highest : for thou shalt go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways ;
text2: ― cächa riˈ . At cˈut , alaj acˈal , cäbix na kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios aj Chicaj chawe , rumal chi catnabej na chuwäch ri Kajaw chubanic jicom che ru be .

text: To give knowledge of salvation unto his people by the remission of their sins ,
text2: At cˈut catyoˈw na retamaxic ri u tobanic ri Dios chque ri winak re ri u tinimit , xukujeˈ chi cäsach na ri qui mac , ― cächaˈ .

text: Through the tender mercy of our God ; whereby the dayspring from on high hath visited us ,
text2: Ri ka Dios sibalaj quel u cˈux chke . Rumal riˈ cutak na lok ri Kajaw Jesús kucˈ uj . Sibalaj jeˈl cˈu ri Areˈ jeˈ jas ru sakilal ri kˈij aretak cäsakiric .

text: To give light to them that sit in darkness and in the shadow of death , to guide our feet into the way of peace .
text2: Cuya na sakilal pa canimaˈ ri winak ri jeˈ ta ne e cˈo pa ri kˈekumal rumal ri qui mac , cäquixej cˈu quib cho ri cämical . Cäcˈoji na che cˈamal ka be pa ri be ri cuxlan wi ri kanimaˈ ,

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , and was in the deserts till the day of his shewing unto Israel .
text2: ― xcha ri tat Zacarías . Ri a Juan xqˈuiyic , sibalaj cˈo u chukˈab ri xyiˈ che rumal ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu . Xcanaj can pa tak ri juyub ri sibalaj cätzˈinowic cˈä pa ri kˈij ri xucˈut rib chquiwäch ri winak aj Israel .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that there went out a decree from Caesar Augustus , that all the world should be taxed .
text2: Pa tak ri kˈij riˈ , ri nimalaj takanel Augusto César xuya takanic chque conojel winak chi cätzˈibax ri qui biˈ .

text: ( And this taxing was first made when Cyrenius was governor of Syria . )
text2: Aretak ri tat Cirenio are kˈatal tzij re ri tinimit Siria , xbantaj we nabe tzˈiban biˈaj riˈ . Are jun censo waˈ .

text: And all went to be taxed , every one into his own city .
text2: Xebeˈ cˈu conojel ri winak chquijujunal pa tak ri qui tinimit rech cätzˈibax ri qui biˈ .

text: And Joseph also went up from Galilee , out of the city of Nazareth , into Judaea , unto the city of David , which is called Bethlehem ; ( because he was of the house and lineage of David : )
text2: Xa je riˈ xel lok ri tat José pa ri tinimit Nazaret re Galilea , xeˈc , xopan pa jun tinimit re Judea , Belén u biˈ . Chilaˈ xeˈ wi ri tat José rumal chi are rachalaxic ri mam David . Ri tinimit Belén are u tinimit ri mam David pa ojer tak kˈij canok .

text: To be taxed with Mary his espoused wife , being great with child .
text2: Aretak xeˈ ri tat José rech cätzˈibax ru biˈ , xucˈam bi ri al María ri u toˈm chic che rixokil , yawab winak chi cˈut .

text: And so it was , that , while they were there , the days were accomplished that she should be delivered .
text2: Aretak e cˈo chilaˈ pa Belén , xopan ri kˈij ri cutzir ri al María .

text: And she brought forth her firstborn son , and wrapped him in swaddling clothes , and laid him in a manger ; because there was no room for them in the inn .
