text: And Zacchaeus stood , and said unto the Lord ; Behold , Lord , the half of my goods I give to the poor ; and if I have taken any thing from any man by false accusation , I restore him fourfold .
text2: Xtaqˈui cˈu ri tat Zaqueo , xubij che ri Jesús : Tampe la ri quinbano . Pa niqˈuiaj ri jastak we quinya na chque ri mebaˈib . Xukujeˈ we cˈo jas nu kˈipom chrij jun winak , quincajmulij na u tzelexic waˈ che , ― xchaˈ .

text: And Jesus said unto him , This day is salvation come to this house , forsomuch as he also is a son of Abraham .
text2: Xubij ri Jesús che : Cämic xrik la ru tobanic ri Dios , xukujeˈ ri winak ri e cˈo cho achoch la , rumal chi cäkˈalajinic chi lal riˈ are kas rachalal ri ka mam Abraham , ― cächaˈ .

text: For the Son of man is come to seek and to save that which was lost .
text2: Ri in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , in petinak che qui tzucuxic ri winak ri e tzakinak , xukujeˈ che qui toˈic , ― xcha ri Jesús .

text: And as they heard these things , he added and spake a parable , because he was nigh to Jerusalem , and because they thought that the kingdom of God should immediately appear .
text2: Ri winak qui tatabem we tzij riˈ , ri Jesús xuchaplej u tzijoxic jun cˈutbal chic re tijonic chque rumal chi quenakajin chic che ri tinimit Jerusalén . Xquichomaj ri winak chi ri Dios cucˈut na rib chquiwäch chanim , cuchaplej cˈu takanic pa qui wiˈ .

text: He said therefore , A certain nobleman went into a far country to receive for himself a kingdom , and to return .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque : Cˈo jun achi , nim u banic , ri xeˈ naj pa jun tinimit chic rech coc che nim takanel pa qui wiˈ ri winak re ri tinimit riˈ . Cuchomaj ri tataˈ chi aretak cätoˈtaj chilaˈ , cätzelej chi na lok cho ja .

text: And he called his ten servants , and delivered them ten pounds , and said unto them , Occupy till I come .
text2: Ri achi cˈut xeusiqˈuij lajuj chque ri patänil re , xeuya juwinak quetzales chque chquijujunal . Xubij cˈu chque : “ Chicojo waˈ we puak riˈ rech cˈo quichˈac na chrij . Chibana waˈ cˈä copan na ri kˈij ri quintzelej lok , ” ― xcha chque .

text: But his citizens hated him , and sent a message after him , saying , We will not have this man to reign over us .
text2: Are cˈu ri winak re ri tinimit ri queˈ wi , sibalaj cäquetzelaj u wäch , xequitak cˈu bi nimak tataˈib chrij chubixic : “ Man cäkaj tä waˈ we achi riˈ che nim takanel pa ka wiˈ , ” ― xecha che .

text: And it came to pass , that when he was returned , having received the kingdom , then he commanded these servants to be called unto him , to whom he had given the money , that he might know how much every man had gained by trading .
text2: Pune je riˈ xoc cˈu na che nim takanel . Aretak xtzelej lok cho ja , xtakanic chi quesiqˈuix lok ri patäninel tak re , ri xecˈamow ri puak , rech cäretamaj na jas ri qui chˈacom chquijujunal .

text: Then came the first , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained ten pounds .
text2: Xopan cˈu ri nabe patänil re rucˈ , xubij : “ Tat , ri rajil la xuchˈac chi lajuj mul jeˈ jas ri xya la chwe , ” ― xchaˈ .

text: And he said unto him , Well , thou good servant : because thou hast been faithful in a very little , have thou authority over ten cities .
text2: Xubij cˈu ru patrón che : “ Utz a banom , utzalaj patänil we , ” ― cächaˈ . “ Catincoj na che takanel pa qui wiˈ lajuj tinimit rumal chi utz a banom at chrij ri jun alaj chac , ” ― xcha che .

text: And the second came , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained five pounds .
text2: Xopan cˈu rucab patänil re , xubij che : “ Tat , ri rajil la u chˈacom chi job mul jeˈ jas ri yoˈm la chwe , ” ― xcha che .

text: And he said likewise to him , Be thou also over five cities .
text2: Xubij cˈu ru patrón che : “ Ri at cˈut catcoj na che takanel pa qui wiˈ job tinimit , ” ― xcha che .

text: And another came , saying , Lord , behold , here is thy pound , which I have kept laid up in a napkin :
text2: Xopan chi cˈu jun chic patänil re , xubij : “ Tat , riˈ ri rajil la ri cˈo wucˈ , nu cˈolom cˈu waˈ pa jun suˈt , ” ― cächaˈ .

text: For I feared thee , because thou art an austere man : thou takest up that thou layedst not down , and reapest that thou didst not sow .
text2: “ Jeˈ nu banom waˈ rumal chi quinxej wib chuwäch la . Ri lal cˈut sibalaj cˈaˈn la . Cäcˈam la ri man ech tä la , cäkˈat cˈu la ri man ticom tä la , ” ― xcha che .

text: And he saith unto him , Out of thine own mouth will I judge thee , thou wicked servant . Thou knewest that I was an austere man , taking up that I laid not down , and reaping that I did not sow :
text2: Xubij cˈu ri nim takanel che : “ ¡ Ay , patänil we ri sibalaj man utz taj ! Quinkˈat na tzij pa wiˈ rucˈ ri tzij ri a bim chwe . Awetam cˈut chi ri in sibalaj in cˈaˈn , chi quincˈam ri man wech taj , quinkˈat cˈu ri man nu ticom taj , ” ― cächaˈ .

text: Wherefore then gavest not thou my money into the bank , that at my coming I might have required mine own with usury ?
text2: “ ¿ Jas che man xaya tä ri nu rajil rucˈ jun winak ri cäyoˈw pa jalomal rech quintokˈij rucˈ ral aretak quinulic ? ” ― xcha che .

text: And he said unto them that stood by , Take from him the pound , and give it to him that hath ten pounds .
text2: Xubij cˈu chque ri e tacˈatoj chunakaj : “ Chiwesaj ri puak ri cˈo rucˈ , chiya che ri patänil we ri cˈo ri lajuj cientos quetzales rucˈ , ” ― xcha chque .

text: ( And they said unto him , Lord , he hath ten pounds . )
text2: Xquibij cˈu che : “ Tat , ya cˈo chic lajuj cientos quetzales rucˈ , ” ― xecha che .

text: For I say unto you , That unto every one which hath shall be given ; and from him that hath not , even that he hath shall be taken away from him .
text2: Xubij cˈu chque : “ Quinbij chiwe chi ronojel jachin ri cˈo cˈo rucˈ , cäyataj na más che . Apachin cˈu ri man cˈo tä cˈo rucˈ , quesax na che ri jubikˈ ri cˈolic , ” ― cächa chque .

text: But those mine enemies , which would not that I should reign over them , bring hither , and slay them before me .
text2: “ Are cˈu ri nu cˈulel , ri man xcaj taj chi quintakan pa qui wiˈ , chicˈama lok , chicämisaj waˈ chnuwäch , ” ― xcha chque , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ri winak .

text: And when he had thus spoken , he went before , ascending up to Jerusalem .
text2: Aretak xbitaj waˈ rumal ri Jesús , xnabej chquiwäch , xutakej ru be , xeˈ cˈu pa ri tinimit Jerusalén .

text: And it came to pass , when he was come nigh to Bethphage and Bethany , at the mount called the mount of Olives , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Nakaj chi cˈu e cˈo wi che ri tinimit Betfagé , xukujeˈ ri tinimit Betania chuwäch ri juyub u biˈam Ujuyubal Olivos , xeutak bic quieb chque ru tijoxelab .

text: Saying , Go ye into the village over against you ; in the which at your entering ye shall find a colt tied , whereon yet never man sat : loose him , and bring him hither .
text2: Xubij cˈu chque : Jix pa ri alaj tinimit ri cˈo apan chkawäch . Aretak ix opaninak chi chilaˈ , quirika na jun burro yukulic , ri man cˈo tä jumul jun winak quiejeninak chrij . Chiquira waˈ , chicˈama lok , ― cächa chque .

text: And if any man ask you , Why do ye loose him ? thus shall ye say unto him , Because the Lord hath need of him .
text2: We cˈo jun cutaˈ chiwe : ¿ Jas che quiquiro ? ― cächa ne . Jeˈ quibij waˈ che : Xa cajwataj waˈ che ri Kajaw Jesús , ― quixcha che , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: And they that were sent went their way , and found even as he had said unto them .
text2: Xebeˈ cˈu ri tijoxelab ri xeutak bic , jeˈ xequirika jas ri xubij ri Jesús chque .

text: And as they were loosing the colt , the owners thereof said unto them , Why loose ye the colt ?
text2: Tajin cäquiquir ri burro aretak ri ajchakˈel xquitaˈ chque , xquibij : ¿ Jas che tajin quiquir ri burro ? ― xecha chque .

text: And they said , The Lord hath need of him .
text2: Ri e areˈ xquibij : Xa cajwataj waˈ che ri Kajaw Jesús , ― xecha chque .

text: And they brought him to Jesus : and they cast their garments upon the colt , and they set Jesus thereon .
text2: Xquicˈam cˈu bic , xquiya cˈu che ri Jesús . Xquicoj ri qui kˈuˈ chrij , xquiya cˈu ri Jesús chrij .

text: And as he went , they spread their clothes in the way .
text2: Quiejeninak ri Jesús , tajin cäbinic . Xquilicˈ ri qui kˈuˈ pa ri be .

text: And when he was come nigh , even now at the descent of the mount of Olives , the whole multitude of the disciples began to rejoice and praise God with a loud voice for all the mighty works that they had seen ;
text2: Nakaj chi cˈu e cˈo wi che ri Jerusalén , xeopan pa ri xulanic re ri Ujuyubal Olivos . Conojel ri qˈuialaj tak u tijoxelab xquichaplej quicotem , co xechˈawic , xquinimarisaj u kˈij ri Dios rumal conojel ri nimak tak cajmabal ri quilom .

text: Saying , Blessed be the King that cometh in the name of the Lord : peace in heaven , and glory in the highest .
text2: Cäquibij cˈut : ¡ Tewchim baˈ ri Nim Takanel ri petinak pa ru biˈ ri Kajaw Dios ! ― quechaˈ . Cuxlan na kanimaˈ rumal ri Dios chicaj . ¡ Chnimarisax baˈ u kˈij ri Dios ajchicaj ! ― xecha ri winak .

text: And some of the Pharisees from among the multitude said unto him , Master , rebuke thy disciples .
text2: Jujun chque ri tataˈib fariseos ri e cˈo chquixol ri qˈuialaj winak xquibij che ri Jesús : Ajtij , cheyaja la ri tijoxelab la , ― xecha che .

text: And he answered and said unto them , I tell you that , if these should hold their peace , the stones would immediately cry out .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij chque : Kas tzij , we ta mat quechˈaw waˈ we winak riˈ , are co quechˈaw na ri abaj , ― xcha chque .

text: And when he was come near , he beheld the city , and wept over it ,
text2: Aretak xenakajin che ri tinimit , ri Jesús xokˈ pa qui wiˈ ri winak aj Jerusalén .

text: Saying , If thou hadst known , even thou , at least in this thy day , the things which belong unto thy peace ! but now they are hid from thine eyes .
text2: Xubij : Cwaj ta ne chi pa we kˈij riˈ quiwetamaj jachin riˈ ri cäcowinic cuya utzil chixol . Cˈuˈtal cˈu waˈ cämic chiwäch , ― cächaˈ .

text: For the days shall come upon thee , that thine enemies shall cast a trench about thee , and compass thee round , and keep thee in on every side ,
text2: Quepe cˈu na ri kˈij chiwij aretak ri qˈuialaj i cˈulel cäcaˈn na jun cˈotom chrij ri tinimit , cäquisutij na rij , sibalaj cˈu cäquilatzˈobisaj na waˈ , ― cächaˈ .

text: And shall lay thee even with the ground , and thy children within thee ; and they shall not leave in thee one stone upon another ; because thou knewest not the time of thy visitation .
text2: Quequiwulij na can ri iwachoch cho ulew , quixquicämisaj na . Man cäcanaj tä cˈu na can jun abaj puwiˈ jun abaj chic , ― cächaˈ . Are cˈu rumal waˈ chi man iwetam taj chi pa we kˈij riˈ ri Dios xixusolij , ― xcha chque .

text: And he went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold therein , and them that bought ;
text2: Xoc cˈu bic ri Jesús pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , xuchaplej quesaxic bic ri ajcˈayib , xukujeˈ ri lokˈomanelab .

text: Saying unto them , It is written , My house is the house of prayer : but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Xubij cˈu chque : Tzˈibam cˈut pa ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios : “ Ri wachoch in are ja ri cäban wi orar , ” ― cächa ri Tzˈibtalic . Ri alak cˈut , cachoch elakˈomab banom alak che , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: And he taught daily in the temple . But the chief priests and the scribes and the chief of the people sought to destroy him ,
text2: Ronojel kˈij ri Jesús xuya tijonic pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios . Are cˈu ri qui nimakil sacerdotes , ri tijonelab re ri Pixab , xukujeˈ ri qui nimakil ri winak re ri tinimit xquitzucuj u cämisaxic .

text: And could not find what they might do : for all the people were very attentive to hear him .
text2: Man xquirik tä cˈut jas cäcaˈn che , rumal chi conojel ri winak qui jiquibam canimaˈ chutatabexic ri cubij chque .

text: And it came to pass , that on one of those days , as he taught the people in the temple , and preached the gospel , the chief priests and the scribes came upon him with the elders ,
text2: Pa jun kˈij ri Jesús tajin queutijoj ri winak pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , tajin cutzijoj ri Utzalaj Tzij re ri Evangelio chque . Xeopan cˈu ri qui nimakil tak sacerdotes cucˈ ri tijonelab re ri Pixab xukujeˈ ri qui nimakil ri winak .

text: And spake unto him , saying , Tell us , by what authority doest thou these things ? or who is he that gave thee this authority ?
text2: Xquibij cˈu che : ¿ Jachin xtakow la chi ri lal cäban la waˈ we riˈ ? ¿ Jachin lo ri yoˈwinak takanic pa kˈab la chi jeˈ cäban la waˈ ? ― xecha che .

text: And he answered and said unto them , I will also ask you one thing ; and answer me :
text2: Xchˈaw ri Jesús , xubij chque : Ri in xukujeˈ cˈo jas quintaˈ chech alak , ― cächaˈ . Bij alak chwe :

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ?
text2: ¿ Jachin xtakow ri tat Juan chubanic kasnaˈ ? ¿ A are ri Dios , o are ri winak ? ¿ Jachin xyoˈw che chi jeˈ cuban waˈ ? ― xcha chque .

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then believed ye him not ?
text2: Xquitzijobela quib , xquibij : We cäkabij chi are ri Dios , ri areˈ cubij na chke chi jas che man xkacoj tä waˈ , ― quechaˈ .

text: But and if we say , Of men ; all the people will stone us : for they be persuaded that John was a prophet .
text2: We cˈu cäkabij chi xa are ri winak , conojel ri winak cujcaˈn na che abaj . Elinak cˈu chi sak chquiwäch ri winak chi ri tat Juan are kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios , ― xecha riˈ .

text: And they answered , that they could not tell whence it was .
text2: Xechˈaw chic , xquibij che ri Jesús chi man cäquichˈob tä waˈ chi jachin riˈ ri xyoˈw che ri tat Juan chi cuban kasnaˈ .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque : Xukujeˈ ri in man quinbij tä in chech alak jachin ri yoˈwinak chwe chi in quinban waˈ we riˈ , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: Then began he to speak to the people this parable ; A certain man planted a vineyard , and let it forth to husbandmen , and went into a far country for a long time .
text2: Ri Jesús xuchaplej u tzijoxic waˈ we cˈutbal riˈ re tijonic chque ri winak : Cˈo jun achi ri xuban jun ticbal uvas . Xticonijic , xuya cˈu can ri ulew pa kajomal chque jujun tajinelab . Te cˈu riˈ xeˈ naj pa jun tinimit chic , naj xsachic .

text: And at the season he sent a servant to the husbandmen , that they should give him of the fruit of the vineyard : but the husbandmen beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Xopan cˈu ri kˈij re ru yaquic ri wächinic , xutak bi jun patänil re cucˈ ri ajchaquib rech cäquiya bi niqˈuiaj re ri u wäch ri ticbal uvas . Are cˈu ri ajchaquib xquichˈayo , xquitak bic , man cˈo tä xquiya bi che , ― cächaˈ .

text: And again he sent another servant : and they beat him also , and entreated him shamefully , and sent him away empty .
text2: Xutak cˈu bi jun u patäninel chic . Xukujeˈ waˈ xquichˈayo , xquetzelaj u wäch , xquitak bic , man cˈo tä xquiya bi che , ― cächaˈ .

text: And again he sent a third : and they wounded him also , and cast him out .
text2: Churox mul xutak bic jun patänil re cucˈ . Xquisoc waˈ , xukujeˈ xquesaj bi pa ri ticbal uvas , ― cächaˈ .

text: Then said the lord of the vineyard , What shall I do ? I will send my beloved son : it may be they will reverence him when they see him .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ xuchomaj ri rajaw ri ticbal uvas , xubij : “ ¿ Jas ta cˈu lo quinbano ? ” ― cächaˈ . “ Quintak na bic ri lokˈalaj nu cˈojol . Craj ne nim cäquil wi ri areˈ aretak cäquilo , ” ― xcha riˈ .

text: But when the husbandmen saw him , they reasoned among themselves , saying , This is the heir : come , let us kill him , that the inheritance may be ours .
text2: Ri ajchaquib , aretak xquilo , xquichˈabej quib , xquibij : “ ¡ Chawilampeˈ ! Are waˈ ri quechben na ronojel , ” ― quechaˈ . “ Chixsaˈj , kacämisaj ri achi rech cäkechbej na waˈ we ulew riˈ , ” ― xecha riˈ .

text: So they cast him out of the vineyard , and killed him . What therefore shall the lord of the vineyard do unto them ?
text2: Xquesaj cˈu bi ru cˈojol ri ajchakˈel ri ticbal uvas , xquicämisaj cˈut , ― xcha ri Jesús chque . Te riˈ xutaˈ ri Jesús chque , xubij : ¿ Jas cˈu cuban na ri rajaw ri ticbal uvas chque ? ― cächa riˈ .

text: He shall come and destroy these husbandmen , and shall give the vineyard to others . And when they heard it , they said , God forbid .
text2: Cäpe na ri areˈ , queucämisaj na ri ajchaquib riˈ , cuya na ri rulew chque juleˈ chic , ― xcha ri Jesús chque . Aretak xquita waˈ , xquibij ri winak : ¡ Ay , mäbantaj waˈ ! ― xecha che .

text: And he beheld them , and said , What is this then that is written , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner ?
text2: Xcaˈy cˈu ri Jesús chque , xubij : ¿ Jas quel cubij waˈ ri tzˈibam canok pa ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ? cubij : Ri abaj ri man xcaj tä ri yacal tak ja , we abaj riˈ are xcoj che tokˈebal re ri ja ,

text: Whosoever shall fall upon that stone shall be broken ; but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: ― cächa ri Tzˈibtalic , ― xcha ri Jesús . Ronojel winak jachin ri cätzak puwiˈ ri abaj riˈ , cäsoctaj na . We cˈu cätzak we abaj riˈ chrij jun , cucˈäjij na , ― xcha chque .

text: And the chief priests and the scribes the same hour sought to lay hands on him ; and they feared the people : for they perceived that he had spoken this parable against them .
text2: Ri tijonelab re ri Pixab cucˈ ri qui nimakil sacerdotes aj Israel xquichaplej u tzucuxic jas cäcaˈn chuchapic ri Jesús pa ri hora riˈ , xquixej cˈu quib chquiwäch ri winak . Xquichˈob cˈut chi ri cˈutbal riˈ , xtzijox waˈ chquij ri e areˈ .

text: And they watched him , and sent forth spies , which should feign themselves just men , that they might take hold of his words , that so they might deliver him unto the power and authority of the governor .
text2: Xcaluchij ri Jesús , xequitak bi winak chuyuxlexic . Ri winak riˈ xcaˈn che quib chi e utzalaj tak winak rech cäquirik jun tzij pu chiˈ ri Jesús rech cäquijach bi ri Areˈ pu kˈab ri kˈatal tzij , cäkˈat cˈu na tzij puwiˈ .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , we know that thou sayest and teachest rightly , neither acceptest thou the person of any , but teachest the way of God truly :
text2: Rumal waˈ xquicˈot u chiˈ ri Jesús , xquibij : Ajtij , ketam chi utz waˈ ri cätzijon la xukujeˈ rucˈ jicomal cätijon la . Ketam cˈut chi man nim tä quil la jun winak chuwäch jun chic . Xane cäcˈut la ri kas u rayinic ri Dios , ― quecha che .

text: Is it lawful for us to give tribute unto Caesar , or no ?
text2: ¿ A rajwaxic cäkatoj alcabal che ri nimalaj takanel aj Roma ? We ne man rajwaxic taj , ― xecha che .

text: But he perceived their craftiness , and said unto them , Why tempt ye me ?
text2: Xretamaxtaj cˈu ri Jesús ri qui chomanic , xubij chque : ¿ Jas che cätaˈ alak waˈ chwe ?

text: Shew me a penny . Whose image and superscription hath it ? They answered and said , Caesar ' s .
text2: Cˈutu baˈ alak jun puak chnuwäch , ― cächa chque . ¿ Jachin cˈu rech we caˈyebal riˈ xukujeˈ ri biˈaj riˈ ri cˈo chuwäch ri puak ? ― xcha ri Jesús . Xechˈaw chi na ri winak , xquibij che : Are rech ri César ri nimalaj takanel , ― xecha che .

text: And he said unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which be Caesar ' s , and unto God the things which be God ' s .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque : Ya alak che ri tat César ri rech ri César . Ya baˈ alak che ri Dios ri rech ri Dios , ― xcha chque .

text: And they could not take hold of his words before the people : and they marvelled at his answer , and held their peace .
text2: Man cˈo tä cˈu jun tzij xecowin churikic pu chiˈ ri Jesús ri xkaj ta wi pa qui kˈab chquiwäch ri winak . Xane xquicajmaj ri xubij ri Jesús chque , man xechˈaw tä cˈu chic .

text: Then came to him certain of the Sadducees , which deny that there is any resurrection ; and they asked him ,
text2: Xeopan cˈu jujun chque ri tataˈib saduceos , ri cäquibij chi man quecˈastaj tä chi na ri cäminakib . Ri tataˈib riˈ xquicˈot u chiˈ ri Jesús .

text: Saying , Master , Moses wrote unto us , If any man ' s brother die , having a wife , and he die without children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: Xquibij che : Ajtij , tzˈibam can chke rumal ri ka mam Moisés chi we cäcäm jun achi , cˈo cˈu can rixokil , man e cˈo tä cˈu can ralcˈual chrij areˈ , rajwaxic chi ri rachalal ri cäminak cäcˈuli rucˈ ri ixok malcaˈn riˈ rech quecˈoji can ralcˈual rucˈ . Ri acˈalab ri quil qui wäch jeˈ ta ne e rech ri cäminak , ― quechaˈ .

text: There were therefore seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and died without children .
text2: Xquibij cˈut : E cˈo wukub achijab cachalal quib . Ri nabeal xcˈuliˈc , xcäm cˈut , man xcˈoji tä can ralcˈual rucˈ ri rixokil .

text: And the second took her to wife , and he died childless .
text2: Ri ucab xcˈuli rucˈ ri rixnam malcaˈn , xukujeˈ xcäm bic , man xcˈoji tä can ralcˈual rucˈ .

text: And the third took her ; and in like manner the seven also : and they left no children , and died .
text2: Ri urox xukujeˈ xcˈuli rucˈ ri malcaˈn . Je cˈu riˈ xcaˈn ri wukub achijab chquijujunal , xecämic , man xecˈoji tä can calcˈual .

text: Last of all the woman died also .
text2: Qˈuisbal cˈut xcäm ri ixok , ― quechaˈ .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife of them is she ? for seven had her to wife .
text2: Aretak cˈut quecˈastaj chi ri cäminakib , ¿ jachin lo chque ri wukub achijab riˈ cäcˈoji na che rachajil ri chichuˈ ? Xoc cˈu che quixokil ri wukub , ― xecha che ri Jesús .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , The children of this world marry , and are given in marriage :
text2: Xchˈaw chi ri Jesús , xubij chque : Ri winak ajuwächulew quecˈuliˈc , cäquiya ri calcˈual pa cˈulanem .

text: But they which shall be accounted worthy to obtain that world , and the resurrection from the dead , neither marry , nor are given in marriage :
text2: Ri winak ri yaˈtal chque chi quecˈastaj bic chquixol ri cäminakib , xukujeˈ chi cäcˈoji qui cˈaslemal ri man cäqˈuis taj , man quecˈuli tä chic , man queyiˈ tä cˈu che cˈulanem , ― cächaˈ .

text: Neither can they die any more : for they are equal unto the angels ; and are the children of God , being the children of the resurrection .
text2: E junam chic jas ri ángeles . Man quecowin tä chic quecämic . E are cˈu ralcˈual ri Dios waˈ , ri e cˈastajinak chic chquixol ri cäminakib , ― cächaˈ .

text: Now that the dead are raised , even Moses shewed at the bush , when he calleth the Lord the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob .
text2: Ri ka mam Moisés xutzijoj chi ri cäminakib quecˈastaj na , ― cächaˈ . Are waˈ ri cukˈalajisaj ri tzij ri xutzˈibaj chrij ri qˈuix ri cäcˈatic . Chilaˈ cˈut cubij wi xukujeˈ chi ri Kajaw Dios are ri u Dios ri ka mam Abraham , u Dios ri ka mam Isaac , u Dios ri ka mam Jacob , ― cächaˈ .

text: For he is not a God of the dead , but of the living : for all live unto him .
text2: Ri Dios cˈut , man are tä Dios quech cäminakib , xane quech ri winak ri e cˈascˈoj . Ri e cˈaslic , e cˈascˈoj cˈu waˈ rumal ri Dios , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: Then certain of the scribes answering said , Master , thou hast well said .
text2: Xechˈaw chi na jujun chque ri tijonelab re ri Pixab , xquibij : Ajtij , kas utz ri bim la , ― xecha che .

text: And after that they durst not ask him any question at all .
text2: Man xquichajij tä chi cˈu animaˈ chucˈotic u chiˈ ri Jesús jumul chic .

text: And he said unto them , How say they that Christ is David ' s son ?
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque : ¿ Jas che cäbixic chi ri Cristo are ralcˈual can ri ka mam David ?

text: And David himself saith in the book of Psalms , The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand ,
text2: Are cˈu ri ka mam David cubij pa ri wuj Salmos : Xubij ri Kajaw Dios che ri Wajaw : “ Chattˈuyul pa nu wiquiäkˈab

text: Till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: cˈä quinya na chawe chi catchˈacanic , cattakan cˈu na pa qui wiˈ ri cäcaˈn qui cˈulel chawe , ”

text: David therefore calleth him Lord , how is he then his son ?
text2: ― cächaˈ . We ri ka mam David cubij Wajaw che , ¿ jas ta cˈu che cäbij alak chi are xa ralcˈual can ri ka mam David ? ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: Then in the audience of all the people he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Conojel ri winak xetowic aretak xubij waˈ chque ru tijoxelab .

text: Beware of the scribes , which desire to walk in long robes , and love greetings in the markets , and the highest seats in the synagogues , and the chief rooms at feasts ;
text2: Je waˈ xubij : Chichajij iwib chquiwäch ri tijonelab re ri Pixab . Cäkaj chquiwäch quebinicat pa chärchäk tak catzˈiak . Xukujeˈ jeˈl cäquilo , nim cˈu queil wi ri cäyiˈ rutzil qui wäch pa tak ri cˈayibal . Cäquitzucuj cˈu ri tˈuyulibal ri nim qui banic pa tak ri rachoch Dios , xukujeˈ ri tˈuyulibal ri nim queil wi pa tak ulaˈnem , ― cächa chque .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a shew make long prayers : the same shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Xukujeˈ cäquitokij tak ri cachoch ri ixokib malcaˈnib . Te riˈ cäquiyuk rakan ri qui tzij aretak cäcaˈn orar rech man kˈalaj tä ri etzelal ri cäcaˈno . Kas nim na ri cˈäx cäquirik na ri tijonelab re ri Pixab aretak cäkˈat tzij pa qui wiˈ , ― xcha ri Jesús .

text: And he looked up , and saw the rich men casting their gifts into the treasury .
text2: Pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios ri Jesús xeril ri kˈinomab ri tajin cäquiya ri qui rajil pa ri cˈolibal ri cäyiˈ wi ri cuchuj .

text: And he saw also a certain poor widow casting in thither two mites .
text2: Xril xukujeˈ jun chichuˈ malcaˈn ri sibalaj mebaˈ . Xeuya cˈu quieb puak ri man nim tä rajil pa ri cˈolibal cuchuj , craj ne xa jun centavo rajil ri quieb puak riˈ .

text: And he said , Of a truth I say unto you , that this poor widow hath cast in more than they all :
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús : Kas tzij ri quinbij chiwe chi we mebaˈlaj chichuˈ malcaˈn riˈ , are nim na waˈ ri xuya ri areˈ chquiwäch conojel ri juleˈ winak ri qui yoˈm que .

text: For all these have of their abundance cast in unto the offerings of God : but she of her penury hath cast in all the living that she had .
text2: Ri juleˈ winak chic qui yoˈm jubikˈ che ri qˈuia ri cˈo cucˈ . Are cˈu we chichuˈ malcaˈn riˈ , pune sibalaj mebaˈ , u yoˈm ronojel ri tzukubal re , ― xcha chque .

text: And as some spake of the temple , how it was adorned with goodly stones and gifts , he said ,
text2: E cˈo cˈu jujun chque ri winak tajin quetzijon chrij ri nimalaj rachoch Dios chi wiktal cucˈ jeˈlalaj taj abaj , xukujeˈ cucˈ lokˈalaj tak sipanic . Xubij cˈu ri Jesús :

text: As for these things which ye behold , the days will come , in the which there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Copan na ri kˈij ri man cäcanaj tä na can jun abaj puwiˈ jun abaj chic re we ja riˈ ri quiwilo . Conojel quewulix na , ― xcha chque .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , but when shall these things be ? and what sign will there be when these things shall come to pass ?
text2: Xquitaˈ cˈu che ri Jesús , xquibij : Kajtij , ¿ jampaˈ cäbantaj na waˈ ? ¿ A cˈo etal ri cukˈalajisaj chkawäch chi are kˈij riˈ ri cäban na ri xbij la chke ? ― xecha che .

text: And he said , Take heed that ye be not deceived : for many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and the time draweth near : go ye not therefore after them .
text2: Xubij ri Jesús : Chichajij iwib rech mixsubtajic . E qˈuia ri quepe na ri cäquicoj na ri nu biˈ , cäquibij : “ In riˈ ri Cristo , ” ― quecha na . Xukujeˈ cäquibij : “ Ketetinak chi lok ri kˈij , ” ― quecha riˈ , ― cächa ri Jesús . Mixeˈ cˈu cucˈ ri e areˈ , ― cächa ri Jesús chque .

text: But when ye shall hear of wars and commotions , be not terrified : for these things must first come to pass ; but the end is not by and by .
text2: Aretak quita u tzijol nimalaj chˈoj xukujeˈ chi cäquiwalijisaj quib ri winak chquij kˈatal tak tzij , mixej iwib . Rajwaxic chi nabe cäbantaj na waˈ we riˈ , ― cächa chque . Cˈä mäjok ri qˈuisbal re we kˈij junab riˈ , ― xcha ri Jesús .

text: Then said he unto them , Nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom :
text2: Te riˈ xubij chi ri Jesús chque : Quechˈojin na ri winak , ri juchˈob winak cucˈ ri juchˈob chic . Xukujeˈ cächˈojin na jun tinimit rucˈ jun tinimit chic , ― cächaˈ .

text: And great earthquakes shall be in divers places , and famines , and pestilences ; and fearful sights and great signs shall there be from heaven .
text2: Cäpe na nimalaj wiˈjal pa tak jujun tinimit . Pa tak niqˈuiaj tinimit chic quepe na lawalo tak yabil . Quepe cˈu na nimak tak cäbrakan . Queilitaj na xibibalalaj tak jastak xukujeˈ nimalaj tak etal chicaj , ― xcha chque .

text: But before all these , they shall lay their hands on you , and persecute you , delivering you up to the synagogues , and into prisons , being brought before kings and rulers for my name ' s sake .
text2: Nabe cˈut chquiwäch waˈ we jastak riˈ quixquichap na ri winak , quixquijach na pa qui kˈab ri qui nimakil ri winak , xukujeˈ quixquicoj na pa cheˈ . Quixquicˈam na bi chquiwäch nimak tak tataˈib ri quetakan pa qui wiˈ ri winak , xukujeˈ chquiwäch kˈatal tak tzij rumal wech in , ― xcha chque .

text: And it shall turn to you for a testimony .
text2: Are kˈij waˈ rech quinikˈalajisaj na in chquiwäch , ― cächaˈ .

text: Settle it therefore in your hearts , not to meditate before what ye shall answer :
text2: Cˈol baˈ pa iwanimaˈ chi michomaj na bic jas riˈ ri quibij na chutoˈic iwib .

text: For I will give you a mouth and wisdom , which all your adversaries shall not be able to gainsay nor resist .
text2: Ri in quinya na chiwe ri rajwaxic u tzijoxic , xukujeˈ quinya ri i noˈj . Ri i cˈulel man cäquirik tä chi na jas cäquibij chiwe , man quechˈacan tä pi wiˈ , ― cächaˈ .

text: And ye shall be betrayed both by parents , and brethren , and kinsfolks , and friends ; and some of you shall they cause to be put to death .
text2: Cäban na tzijtal chiwij cumal ri i tat , i nan , ri iwachalal , ri iwachiˈl rech quixjach bic . Quecämisax na jujun chiwe .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake .
text2: Conojel cäquetzelaj na i wäch xa rumal wech in , ― cächaˈ .

text: But there shall not an hair of your head perish .
text2: Man cäsach tä cˈu na u wäch jun chiwe .

text: In your patience possess ye your souls .
text2: We quichˈij waˈ , quixtoˈtaj na , cˈo na ri i cˈaslemal ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: And when ye shall see Jerusalem compassed with armies , then know that the desolation thereof is nigh .
text2: Aretak quiwil ri tinimit Jerusalén sutim rij cumal soldados , chichˈoboˈ chi cäsach na u wäch ri tinimit chanim .

text: Then let them which are in Judaea flee to the mountains ; and let them which are in the midst of it depart out ; and let not them that are in the countries enter thereinto .
text2: Pa ri kˈij riˈ ri winak ri e cˈo pa Judea cheanimaj bi pa tak ri juyub . Ri e cˈo pa ri tinimit , chebel bic . Ri e cˈo pa tak ri juyub , meboc chi bi pa ri tinimit , ― cächaˈ .

text: For these be the days of vengeance , that all things which are written may be fulfilled .
text2: Are cˈu waˈ ri kˈij ri cätoj na u qˈuexel ri qui mac ri winak aj Jerusalén cho ri Dios . Cäbantaj na ronojel ri tzˈibam chrij we tinimit riˈ , ― cächaˈ .

text: But woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck , in those days ! for there shall be great distress in the land , and wrath upon this people .
text2: ¡ Tokˈob cˈu qui wäch ri ixokib ri yawab tak winak chic , xukujeˈ ri e cˈo alaj tak cal ri cˈä tajin quetuˈnic pa ri kˈij riˈ ! Cäcˈoji cˈu na nimalaj cˈäxcˈol cho ruwächulew . Are cäpe na ri nimalaj royowal ri Dios pa qui wiˈ ri winak re ri tinimit riˈ , ― cächaˈ .

text: And they shall fall by the edge of the sword , and shall be led away captive into all nations : and Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles , until the times of the Gentiles be fulfilled .
text2: E qˈuia ri quecämisax na cucˈ tak chˈichˈ . Quechap cˈu niqˈuiaj , quecˈam cˈu na bi naj pa tak ronojel tinimit . Ri tinimit Jerusalén cäban na pa tak akan cumal ri winak ri man e aj Israel taj , cˈä cätzˈakat na ri kˈij ri yoˈm chque we winak riˈ chi jeˈ cäcaˈn waˈ , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: And there shall be signs in the sun , and in the moon , and in the stars ; and upon the earth distress of nations , with perplexity ; the sea and the waves roaring ;
text2: Quecˈoji na etal ajsic chrij ri kˈij , chrij ri icˈ , chquij tak ri chˈimil . Sibalaj cˈäx cäquirik na ri winak ri e cˈo cho ruwächulew . Man cäquirik tä chic jas cäcaˈno , xane sibalaj cäquixej na quib rumal ri nimalaj rokˈebal ri cuban ruwojaˈ re ri mar , ― cächaˈ .

text: Men ' s hearts failing them for fear , and for looking after those things which are coming on the earth : for the powers of heaven shall be shaken .
text2: Cäbirbit na ri canimaˈ ri winak rumal ri xibriquil xukujeˈ rumal ru chomaxic waˈ ri cäbantaj na cho ruwächulew . Queyicopisax na ri u chukˈab ri caj , ― xchaˈ .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in a cloud with power and great glory .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ quilitaj na chi quinpetic , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , pa jun sutzˈ rucˈ nimalaj nu chukˈab , cänimarisax cˈu na nu kˈij , ― cächaˈ .

text: And when these things begin to come to pass , then look up , and lift up your heads ; for your redemption draweth nigh .
text2: Aretak quechap qui banic waˈ we riˈ ri nu bim chiwe , chiwilampeˈ , chixcaˈy chicaj . Cäketet chi cˈu lok ri kˈij ri quixutor na ri Dios , ― xcha chque .

text: And he spake to them a parable ; Behold the fig tree , and all the trees ;
text2: Xutzijoj cˈu jun cˈutbal chic re tijonic chque , xubij : Chiwilampe ri u cheˈal higos , xukujeˈ ronojel u wäch cheˈ .

text: When they now shoot forth , ye see and know of your own selves that summer is now nigh at hand .
text2: Aretak quiwilo chi quetux ri qui xak , quichˈob pa iwe wi chi ketetinak chi lok ri kˈalaj .

text: So likewise ye , when ye see these things come to pass , know ye that the kingdom of God is nigh at hand .
text2: Je riˈ xukujeˈ ri ix aretak quiwilo chi cäbantaj waˈ ri nu tzijom chiwe , chichˈoboˈ chi xak jubikˈ craj chi cäpe ri Dios che takanic pa qui wiˈ ri winak , ― xcha chque .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass away , till all be fulfilled .
text2: Kas tzij quinbij chiwe chi man cocˈow tä na we kˈij junab riˈ cˈä cäbantaj na ronojel .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Cäsach cˈu na u wäch ri caj , xukujeˈ ruwächulew , are cˈu ri nu tzij ri nu bim chiwe , quebantaj na waˈ , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: And take heed to yourselves , lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting , and drunkenness , and cares of this life , and so that day come upon you unawares .
text2: Chichajij baˈ iwib rech man queˈ tä iwanimaˈ cucˈ tak nimakˈij , kˈabaric , rech man queˈ tä ne cucˈ niqˈuiaj jastak chic ajuwächulew pune are ri i chac , pune are ri qui tzukic iwalcˈual . Teˈtalic cˈut cäpe na ri kˈij riˈ chiwij jas jun awanel .

text: For as a snare shall it come on all them that dwell on the face of the whole earth .
text2: Jeˈ u petic waˈ ri kˈij riˈ pa qui wiˈ conojel winak ri e cˈo cho ruwächulew , ― cächaˈ .

text: Watch ye therefore , and pray always , that ye may be accounted worthy to escape all these things that shall come to pass , and to stand before the Son of man .
text2: Chiwila baˈ iwib amakˈel ronojel kˈij jas ri quibano , chibana orar amakˈel che ri Dios rech cäyiˈ na chiwe chi quixresaj na chuwäch ronojel waˈ ri cäpe na cho ruwächulew . Chibana waˈ rech cuyaˈ quixtaqˈui na chnuwäch in pa utzil , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: And in the day time he was teaching in the temple ; and at night he went out , and abode in the mount that is called the mount of Olives .
text2: Ri Jesús xuya tijonic ronojel kˈij pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios . Chakˈab cˈut xel bic , xcanaj can pa ri juyub ri cojom Ujuyubal Olivos che ru biˈ .

text: And all the people came early in the morning to him in the temple , for to hear him .
text2: Sibalaj akˈab cäquimulij quib ri winak chuwäch ri Jesús pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios chutatabexic ru tzij .

text: Now the feast of unleavened bread drew nigh , which is called the Passover .
text2: Xketet chic ri nimakˈij re ri caxlan wa ri man cäyiˈ tä chˈäm rucˈ . “ Pascua ” u biˈ ri nimakˈij riˈ .

text: And the chief priests and scribes sought how they might kill him ; for they feared the people .
text2: Ri qui nimakil ri sacerdotes aj Israel , xukujeˈ ri tijonelab re ri Pixab tajin cäquitzucuj jas cäcaˈn chucämisaxic ri Jesús . Cäquixej cˈu quib chquiwäch ri winak .

text: Then entered Satan into Judas surnamed Iscariot , being of the number of the twelve .
text2: Xoc cˈu ri Satanás pa ranimaˈ ri tat Judas ri xukujeˈ cäcoj Iscariote che ru biˈ . Are jun chque ri cablajuj apóstoles .

text: And he went his way , and communed with the chief priests and captains , how he might betray him unto them .
text2: Xeˈ ri tat Judas , xeutzijobej cˈu ri qui nimakil sacerdotes , xukujeˈ ri qui nimakil soldados rech cärilo jas cuban na chujachic ri Jesús pa qui kˈab .

text: And they were glad , and covenanted to give him money .
text2: Xequicot cˈut , xquiya qui tzij chi cäquiya na puak che ri tat Judas chutojic waˈ .

text: And he promised , and sought opportunity to betray him unto them in the absence of the multitude .
text2: Xuchiˈj cˈu ri tat Judas u jachic ri Jesús aretak man e cˈo tä qˈuia winak .

text: Then came the day of unleavened bread , when the passover must be killed .
text2: Xopan cˈu ri nimakˈij re ri caxlan wa ri man cäyiˈ tä chˈäm rucˈ . Pa ri kˈij riˈ rajwaxic u cämisaxic ri alaj chij re ri Pascua rech cäquitijo .

text: And he sent Peter and John , saying , Go and prepare us the passover , that we may eat .
text2: Ri Jesús xeutak bi ri tat Pedro , ri tat Juan , xubij chque : Jibana u banic ri wiˈm re ri Pascua rech cäkatijo .

text: And they said unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare ?
text2: Xquitaˈ cˈu che ri Jesús , xquibij : ¿ Jawijeˈ caj wi la chi cäkaˈn wi ri wiˈm ? ― xecha che .

text: And he said unto them , Behold , when ye are entered into the city , there shall a man meet you , bearing a pitcher of water ; follow him into the house where he entereth in .
text2: Xubij ri Jesús chque : Aretak quixopan pa ri tinimit , quirika na jun achi rucˈam jun kˈebal joron . Chiterenej bic cˈä quixopan na pa ri ja ri coc wi .

text: And ye shall say unto the goodman of the house , The Master saith unto thee , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: Chibij che ri rajaw ja : “ Cutaˈ ri Kajtij che la : ¿ Jawijeˈ cˈo wi ri cuarto ri quintij wi ri wiˈm re ri Pascua cucˈ ri nu tijoxelab ? ” ― quixcha che .

text: And he shall shew you a large upper room furnished : there make ready .
text2: Cucˈut na chiwäch jun nimalaj cuarto sucˈumatal chic pa ri cawik ja . Chibana u banic ri wiˈm re ri Pascua chilaˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: And they went , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Xebeˈ cˈut , xequirika ronojel jeˈ jas ri u bim bi ri Jesús chque . Xquichap u banic ri wiˈm re ri Pascua .

text: And when the hour was come , he sat down , and the twelve apostles with him .
text2: Aretak xopan ri hora , xtˈuyi ri Jesús chiˈ ri mesa . E cˈo ri cablajuj apóstoles rucˈ .

text: And he said unto them , With desire I have desired to eat this passover with you before I suffer :
text2: Xubij chque : Sibalaj nu rayim u tijic waˈ we wiˈm riˈ re ri Pascua iwucˈ cˈä mäjaˈ quinrik cˈäx .

text: For I say unto you , I will not any more eat thereof , until it be fulfilled in the kingdom of God .
text2: Quinbij cˈu chiwe chi man cˈo tä chi na jumul ri quintij na waˈ cˈä cäbantaj na waˈ pa ru takanic ri Dios , ― xcha chque .

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and said , Take this , and divide it among yourselves :
text2: Xucˈam cˈu ri vaso , xumaltioxij waˈ che ri Dios , xubij chque ru tijoxelab : Chicˈama waˈ . Chijacha waˈ chiwäch , chitija baˈ .

text: For I say unto you , I will not drink of the fruit of the vine , until the kingdom of God shall come .
text2: Quinbij cˈu chiwe chi man quintij tä chi na we ri u waˈl uvas cˈä cäpe na ri Dios che takanic pa qui wiˈ ri winak , ― xcha chque .

text: And he took bread , and gave thanks , and brake it , and gave unto them , saying , This is my body which is given for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: Aretak ri Jesús xucˈam ri wa , xumaltioxij waˈ che ri Dios . Xupiro , xuya chque ru tijoxelab , xubij : Are jeˈ jas ri nu cuerpo ri cäjach na rumal iwech ix . Chitija waˈ che natabal we , ― xchaˈ .

text: Likewise also the cup after supper , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood , which is shed for you .
text2: Aretak e wokinak chic , xucˈam xukujeˈ ri vaso junam jas ri xuban che ri wa , xubij : Ri cˈo chupam we vaso quinjunamaj rucˈ ri nu quiqˈuel ri cäturuwisax na rumal iwech ix . Cäban cˈu na ri cˈacˈ trato rumal we nu quiqˈuel riˈ , ― cächa ri Jesús chque .

text: But , behold , the hand of him that betrayeth me is with me on the table .
text2: ¡ Chiwilampeˈ ! Ri jachal we tajin cäwiˈ wucˈ chiˈ we mesa riˈ .

text: And truly the Son of man goeth , as it was determined : but woe unto that man by whom he is betrayed !
text2: Kas tzij quincäm na in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , jeˈ jas u beyal ru chomanic ri Dios . ¡ Cˈäx cˈu re ri achi ri quinjachowic ! ― xcha chque .

text: And they began to inquire among themselves , which of them it was that should do this thing .
text2: Te riˈ xquichap u cˈotic qui chiˈ chbil quib chrij jachin chque ri cäbanow na waˈ .

text: And there was also a strife among them , which of them should be accounted the greatest .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ ri tijoxelab xquichaplej u chomalaxic quib chrij jachin chque ri nim na u banic .

text: And he said unto them , The kings of the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and they that exercise authority upon them are called benefactors .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque : Ri kˈatal tak tzij quetakan waˈ pa qui wiˈ ri winak . Ri e cˈo pa qui wiˈ ri winak cäbix “ Banal tak Utzil ” chque .

text: But ye shall not be so : but he that is greatest among you , let him be as the younger ; and he that is chief , as he that doth serve .
text2: Man jeˈ tä cˈu waˈ ri ix . Xane ri nabeal chiwe are jeˈ ta ne ri más acˈal . Are cˈu ri nim u banic chixol are junam jas ri patänil iwe .

text: For whether is greater , he that sitteth at meat , or he that serveth ? is not he that sitteth at meat ? but I am among you as he that serveth .
text2: ¿ Jachin cˈu ri nim na u banic ? ¿ A are ri cätˈuyi chiˈ ri mesa , o are ri patänil iwe ? ¿ A mat are ri cätˈuyi chiˈ ri mesa ? Are cˈu ri in , in cˈo iwucˈ jeˈ jas ri patänil iwe , ― xcha chque .

text: Ye are they which have continued with me in my temptations .
text2: Ri ix cˈut , ronojel kˈij xixcˈoji wucˈ in . I rikom cˈäx junam wucˈ in .

text: And I appoint unto you a kingdom , as my Father hath appointed unto me ;
text2: Rumal waˈ quinya na chiwe chi quixtakan na jeˈ jas ri xuya ri Dios ri nu Tat chwe in chi ri in quintakanic .

text: That ye may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom , and sit on thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Quinban na waˈ rech quixwiˈ wucˈ in chiˈ ri nu mesa pa ri nu takanic in . Ri ix cˈut cäyiˈ na chiwe chi quikˈat na tzij pa qui wiˈ ri winak re ri cablajuj juchˈob winak re ri tinimit Israel , ― xcha chque .

text: And the Lord said , Simon , Simon , behold , Satan hath desired to have you , that he may sift you as wheat :
text2: Xukujeˈ xubij ri Kajaw Jesús : Simón , Simón , chawilaˈ chi ix iwonojel ix u tzˈonom ri Satanás rech quixutakchiˈj che mac che rilic we kas tzij quichˈij waˈ . Junam cuban na ri areˈ chiwe jas ri cuban jun winak cuseysaˈ ri trico rech cätzak na canok ri man utz taj , ― cächaˈ .

text: But I have prayed for thee , that thy faith fail not : and when thou art converted , strengthen thy brethren .
text2: In bochiˈm cˈu ri Dios pa wiˈ at rech catcojon na , rech man cattzak taj . Ri at cˈut , aretak caqˈuex awanimaˈ , catzelej awib , queatoˈ baˈ ri awachalal , ― xcha che .

text: And he said unto him , Lord , I am ready to go with thee , both into prison , and to death .
text2: Xubij ri Simón Pedro che : Kajaw , nu jiquibam ri wanimaˈ in chi quineˈ ucˈ la , pune baˈ pa cheˈ , pune baˈ quincäm ucˈ la , ― xcha che .

text: And he said , I tell thee , Peter , the cock shall not crow this day , before that thou shalt thrice deny that thou knowest me .
text2: Xubij ri Jesús che : Pedro , kas tzij quinbij chawe chi cˈä mäjok cätzintzirikin ri amaˈ äcˈ cämic , cabij na at oxmul chi man awetam tä nu wäch , ― xcha che .

text: And he said unto them , When I sent you without purse , and scrip , and shoes , lacked ye any thing ? And they said , Nothing .
text2: Xubij ri Jesús chque conojel : Aretak xixintak bic , man cˈo tä i bolsa re puak , man cˈo tä i chim , man xicˈam tä bic i xajäb . ¿ A cˈo lo jas xajwataj chiwe ? ― xcha chque . Man cˈo taj , ― xecha che .

text: Then said he unto them , But now , he that hath a purse , let him take it , and likewise his scrip : and he that hath no sword , let him sell his garment , and buy one .
text2: Xubij cˈu chque : Cämic cˈut , apachin ri cˈo u bolsa re puak , chucˈama bic , xukujeˈ chucˈama bi ru chim . We man cˈo tä u machete , chuqˈuiyij ru kˈuˈ chulokˈic jun re , ― cächa chque .

text: For I say unto you , that this that is written must yet be accomplished in me , And he was reckoned among the transgressors : for the things concerning me have an end .
text2: Quinbij cˈu chiwe chi tzrajwaxic wi chi cäbantaj ri tzˈibam chwij pa ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios , ― cächaˈ . Are waˈ ri cubij : “ Xbix che chi are jun chque ri itzel tak winak , ” ― cächaˈ . Ronojel cˈu ri tzˈibtal chwij , rajwaxic chi cäbantaj na waˈ , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: And they said , Lord , behold , here are two swords . And he said unto them , It is enough .
text2: Xquibij ru tijoxelab che : Kajaw , ¡ chilampe la ! E cˈo quieb machetes waral , ― xecha che . Rucˈ waˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: And he came out , and went , as he was wont , to the mount of Olives ; and his disciples also followed him .
text2: Xel bi ri Jesús , xeˈ pa ri Ujuyubal Olivos jeˈ jas ru nakˈatisam wi rib . Xukujeˈ ru tijoxelab xeteri bi chrij .

text: And when he was at the place , he said unto them , Pray that ye enter not into temptation .
text2: Aretak xeopan jelaˈ , xubij chque ru tijoxelab : Chibana orar rech man quixtzak taj aretak quixtakchiˈx che mac , ― xcha chque .

text: And he was withdrawn from them about a stone ' s cast , and kneeled down , and prayed ,
text2: Ri Jesús cˈut xutas apan rib chque . Jeˈ xecˈol wi apanok jas ru najil jun abaj ri cusirirej apan jun . Xxuquiˈc , xuban orar .

text: Saying , Father , if thou be willing , remove this cup from me : nevertheless not my will , but thine , be done .
text2: Xubij : Tat , we caj la , bana baˈ la chi man rajwaxic taj chi quinrik we nimalaj cˈäx ri cäpetic , ― cächaˈ . Mäban cˈu la ri nu rayibal in , xane ri rayibal la , ― xcha ri Kajaw Jesús .

text: And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven , strengthening him .
text2: Xucˈut cˈu rib jun ángel ajchicaj chuwäch ri xyoˈw u chukˈab .

text: And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly : and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground .
text2: Ri Jesús , rumal chi sibalaj nim ri cˈäx ri tajin cunoˈ , sibalaj xucoj u chukˈab chubanic orar . Sibalaj xubok jaˈ jeˈ ta ne chi are nimak tak tzˈuj re quicˈ ri cäkaj cho rulew .

text: And when he rose up from prayer , and was come to his disciples , he found them sleeping for sorrow ,
text2: Aretak xtoˈtaj ri Jesús chubanic orar , xeˈ cucˈ ru tijoxelab . Xeurikaˈ . Tajin quewar rumal ri qui bis .

text: And said unto them , Why sleep ye ? rise and pray , lest ye enter into temptation .
text2: Xubij ri Jesús chque : ¿ Jas che quixwaric ? Chixwalijok , chibana orar rech man quixtzak taj aretak quixtakchiˈx che mac , ― xcha chque .

text: And while he yet spake , behold a multitude , and he that was called Judas , one of the twelve , went before them , and drew near unto Jesus to kiss him .
text2: Tajin cätzijon ri Jesús aretak xeopan qˈuia winak . Ri tat Judas , jun chque ri cablajuj u tijoxelab ri Jesús u cˈamom ri qui be . Xnakajin ri tat Judas che ri Jesús chutzˈumaxic .

text: But Jesus said unto him , Judas , betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss ?
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús che : Judas , ― cächaˈ . ¿ A quinatzˈumaj che nu jachic bic ? ¿ A jeˈ caban chwe in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual Dios ri Kas Winak ? ― xcha ri Jesús che .

text: When they which were about him saw what would follow , they said unto him , Lord , shall we smite with the sword ?
text2: Ri e sutininak rij ri Jesús , aretak xquil ri xucˈulmaj , xquibij che : Kajaw , ¿ a quekachˈay na che machete ? ― xecha che .

text: And one of them smote the servant of the high priest , and cut off his right ear .
text2: Jun chque ri tijoxelab xusoc jun achi ri patänil re ri qui nimal sacerdotes aj Israel , xresaj cˈu ru xiquin re u wiquiäkˈab .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Suffer ye thus far . And he touched his ear , and healed him .
text2: Xchˈaw chi ri Jesús , xubij : Rucˈ waˈ , ― xchaˈ . Chiya can ri chˈoj , ― xcha chque . Xuchap cˈu cok ru xiquin ri achi , xucunaj .

text: Then Jesus said unto the chief priests , and captains of the temple , and the elders , which were come to him , Be ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and staves ?
text2: Te riˈ xchˈaw ri Jesús jumul chic , xubij chque ri qui nimakil sacerdotes , xukujeˈ chque ri qui nimakil soldados ri chajinelab re ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , xukujeˈ chque ri qui nimakil ri winak , e areˈ cˈu tak waˈ ri e petinak chrij chuchapic : Jeˈ ta ne chrij jun elakˈom ri elinak wi lok alak cucˈ machetes , cucˈ cheˈ , ― cächaˈ .

text: When I was daily with you in the temple , ye stretched forth no hands against me : but this is your hour , and the power of darkness .
text2: In cˈo cˈu ucˈ alak ronojel kˈij pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , man xinchap tä alak . Are cˈu hora waˈ ri yoˈm chech alak chi cäban alak waˈ . Ri chukˈab alak are re ri Itzel waˈ ri cätakan pa ri kˈekum , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: Then took they him , and led him , and brought him into the high priest ' s house . And Peter followed afar off .
text2: Xquichap cˈu ri Jesús , xquicˈam bi cho rachoch ri qui nimal sacerdotes aj Israel . Ri tat Pedro u terenem chinaj .

text: And when they had kindled a fire in the midst of the hall , and were set down together , Peter sat down among them .
text2: Aretak xquinucˈ kˈakˈ pu niqˈuiajal ruwoja , conojel xquimulij quib chrij , xetˈuyiˈc . Xukujeˈ ri tat Pedro xtˈuyi chquixol .

text: But a certain maid beheld him as he sat by the fire , and earnestly looked upon him , and said , This man was also with him .
text2: Te riˈ jun ali ajicˈ xril ri tat Pedro tˈuyul chrij ri kˈakˈ . Co xcaˈy che , xubij : Ri achi riˈ are jun rucˈ ri Jesús xukujeˈ , ― xcha ri ali .

text: And he denied him , saying , Woman , I know him not .
text2: Ri tat Pedro xresaj rib chupam , xubij : Man jeˈ taj , ali , ― xchaˈ . Man wetam tä u wäch , ― xcha riˈ .

text: And after a little while another saw him , and said , Thou art also of them . And Peter said , Man , I am not .
text2: Man naj tä chi cˈut , cˈo jun chic xilow ri tat Pedro , xubij che : Ri at xukujeˈ , at jun chque ri e cˈo rucˈ ri tat Jesús , ― xcha che . Xubij ri tat Pedro : Man in tä riˈ , tat , ― xcha che .

text: And about the space of one hour after another confidently affirmed , saying , Of a truth this fellow also was with him : for he is a Galilaean .
text2: Craj ocˈowinak jun hora chic , cˈo chi jun xujiquiba u bixic , xubij : Kas tzij ri areˈ jun rucˈ rumal chi are aj Galilea , ― xchaˈ .

text: And Peter said , Man , I know not what thou sayest . And immediately , while he yet spake , the cock crew .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri tat Pedro : Tat , man quinchˈob taj jas ri cäbij la , ― xcha che . Cˈä tajin cätzijon ri tat Pedro aretak xtzintzirikin jun amaˈ äcˈ .

text: And the Lord turned , and looked upon Peter . And Peter remembered the word of the Lord , how he had said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Te riˈ xutzolkˈomij rib ri Kajaw Jesús , xcaˈy che ri tat Pedro . Xnaˈtaj cˈu ri tzij ri u bim ri Kajaw Jesús che : “ Cˈä mäjok cätzintzirikin ri amaˈ äcˈ , cabij na at oxmul chi man awetam tä nu wäch , ” ― xcha ri Jesús .

text: And Peter went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Xel cˈu apan ri tat Pedro chrij ri ja , xuqˈuis rib che okˈej .

text: And the men that held Jesus mocked him , and smote him .
text2: Ri achijab cˈut , ri e chajininak ri Jesús , cäquetzˈbej u wäch , xukujeˈ cäquichˈayo .

text: And when they had blindfolded him , they struck him on the face , and asked him , saying , Prophesy , who is it that smote thee ?
text2: Xquichˈuk ru wakˈäch , xquibij cˈu che : ¡ Chachˈoboˈ ! ¿ Jachin riˈ ri xatchˈayowic ? ― xecha che .

text: And many other things blasphemously spake they against him .
text2: Qˈuia ri mälom tak tzij ri xquibij che , sibalaj xquiyokˈo .

text: And as soon as it was day , the elders of the people and the chief priests and the scribes came together , and led him into their council , saying ,
text2: Aretak xsakiric , xquimulij quib ri qui nimakil ri winak aj Israel , ri qui nimakil sacerdotes aj Israel , xukujeˈ ri tijonelab re ri Pixab . Xcˈam bi ri Jesús chquiwäch .

text: Art thou the Christ ? tell us . And he said unto them , If I tell you , ye will not believe :
text2: Xquibij cˈu che : ¿ A lal riˈ ri Cristo ? Bij baˈ la chke , ― xecha che . Xchˈaw chi ri Jesús , xubij chque : Pune ta ne quinbij chech alak , man cäcoj tä alak ri nu tzij , ― cächaˈ .

text: And if I also ask you , ye will not answer me , nor let me go .
text2: We ta cˈu cˈo jas quintaˈ chech alak , man cäbij tä alak chwe jas ri quintaˈ chech alak . Man quintzokopij tä bi alak , ― cächaˈ .

text: Hereafter shall the Son of man sit on the right hand of the power of God .
text2: Tzcämic riˈ , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , quintˈuyi na pu wiquiäkˈab ri Dios ri sibalaj cˈo u chukˈab , ― xcha chque .

text: Then said they all , Art thou then the Son of God ? And he said unto them , Ye say that I am .
text2: Chanim cˈut xquitaˈ che , xquibij conojel : ¿ A lal ne lo riˈ ru Cˈojol ri Dios ? ― xecha che . Xchˈaw chi ri Jesús , xubij chque : Je riˈ jas ri cäbij alak chwe chi in riˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: And they said , What need we any further witness ? for we ourselves have heard of his own mouth .
text2: Xquibij cˈut : ¿ A cajwataj ta cˈu lo jun kˈalajisanel chic chkawäch ? ¡ Man rajwaxic taj ! Ri uj cˈut , uj xujtow pu chiˈ jas ri cubij chbil rib , ― xecha ri tataˈib .

text: And the whole multitude of them arose , and led him unto Pilate .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ xewalij conojel ri winak ri xquimulij quib . Xquicˈam bi ri Jesús cho ri kˈatal tzij Pilato .

text: And they began to accuse him , saying , We found this fellow perverting the nation , and forbidding to give tribute to Caesar , saying that he himself is Christ a King .
text2: Xquichaplej u banic tzij chrij ri Jesús , xquibij : Ka rikom chi we achi riˈ tajin cusach qui cˈux ri winak , xukujeˈ xujutijoj chi man rajwaxic taj cäkaya alcabal che ri tat César . Cubij cˈu chbil rib chi ri areˈ , are ri Cristo , jun nim takanel .

text: And Pilate asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answered him and said , Thou sayest it .
text2: Xutaˈ cˈu ri tat Pilato che : ¿ A at riˈ ri cattakan pa qui wiˈ ri winak aj Israel ? ― xcha riˈ . Xchˈaw ri Jesús , xubij : Je riˈ jas ri cäbij la , ― xcha che .

text: Then said Pilate to the chief priests and to the people , I find no fault in this man .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri tat Pilato chque ri qui nimakil sacerdotes , xukujeˈ chque ri niqˈuiaj winak chic : Man cˈo tä mac quinrik chrij we achi riˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: And they were the more fierce , saying , He stirreth up the people , teaching throughout all Jewry , beginning from Galilee to this place .
text2: Co cˈut xquijiquiba u bixic waˈ conojel , xquibij : Xa cusach qui cˈux ri winak , cuya tijonic pa ronojel tinimit rech Judea . Xuchaplej lok tijonic pa Galilea , u takem u banic waˈ , xul waral pa Jerusalén , ― xecha che .

text: When Pilate heard of Galilee , he asked whether the man were a Galilaean .
text2: Aretak ri tat Pilato xuta waˈ , xutaˈ we ri achi riˈ are aj Galilea .

text: And as soon as he knew that he belonged unto Herod ' s jurisdiction , he sent him to Herod , who himself also was at Jerusalem at that time .
text2: Aretak xretamaj chi jelaˈ quel wi lok ri Jesús jawijeˈ cätakan wi ri tat Herodes , xutak bi ri Jesús cho ri areˈ . Ri tat Herodes cˈo apan pa Jerusalén pa tak ri kˈij riˈ .

text: And when Herod saw Jesus , he was exceeding glad : for he was desirous to see him of a long season , because he had heard many things of him ; and he hoped to have seen some miracle done by him .
text2: Aretak ri tat Herodes xril ri Jesús , sibalaj xquicotic . Xqueˈ cˈu qˈuia kˈij u rayim rilic u wäch . Craj ta cˈu na cäril jun cajmabal rumal ri Jesús , rumal chi qˈuia tak tzijobelil u tom chrij .

text: Then he questioned with him in many words ; but he answered him nothing .
text2: Ri tat Herodes sibalaj xucˈot u chiˈ ri Jesús . Man cˈo tä cˈu jas xubij ri Jesús che .

text: And the chief priests and scribes stood and vehemently accused him .
text2: Ri qui nimakil sacerdotes aj Israel xukujeˈ ri tijonelab re ri Pixab sibalaj xquitzucuj jas cäcaˈn chubanic tzij chrij .

text: And Herod with his men of war set him at nought , and mocked him , and arrayed him in a gorgeous robe , and sent him again to Pilate .
text2: Are cˈu ri tat Herodes xukujeˈ ru soldados xquetzelaj u wäch ri Jesús . Xquetzˈbej cˈu u wäch xukujeˈ . Xquicoj jun jeˈlalaj atzˈiak che jeˈ jas ri cucoj jun nim takanel . Te riˈ ri tat Herodes xutak chi bi ri Jesús rucˈ ri tat Pilato .

text: And the same day Pilate and Herod were made friends together : for before they were at enmity between themselves .
text2: Xutzir cˈu ri qui chˈoj ri tat Herodes rucˈ ri tat Pilato pa we kˈij riˈ . Xjunamataj cˈu qui wäch . Xebux cachiˈl quib .

text: And Pilate , when he had called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people ,
text2: Te riˈ ri tat Pilato xeusiqˈuij ri qui nimakil sacerdotes , ri qui nimakil ri winak , xukujeˈ conojel ri winak rech cäquimulij quib chuwäch .

text: Said unto them , Ye have brought this man unto me , as one that perverteth the people : and , behold , I , having examined him before you , have found no fault in this man touching those things whereof ye accuse him :
text2: Xubij cˈu chque : Ri ix , i cˈamom lok ri achi riˈ chnuwäch . Xibij chi xa cusach qui cˈux ri winak . Aretak xincˈot u chiˈ chiwäch , man cˈo tä mac xinrik chrij we achi riˈ jas ri quibij ix .

text: No , nor yet Herod : for I sent you to him ; and , lo , nothing worthy of death is done unto him .
text2: Xukujeˈ ri tat Herodes man xurik tä mac chrij . U takom chi cˈu lok kucˈ . Chiwilampeˈ chi man cˈo tä jas u banom we achi riˈ ri takal u cämisaxic .

text: I will therefore chastise him , and release him .
text2: Quincˈäjisaj baˈ u wäch . Te cˈu riˈ quintzokopij bic , ― xcha chque .

text: ( For of necessity he must release one unto them at the feast . )
text2: Ri kˈatal tzij , jas ri qui nakˈatisam wi ri winak , ronojel nimakˈij rajwaxic cutzokopij bi jun ajpacheˈ .

text: And they cried out all at once , saying , Away with this man , and release unto us Barabbas :
text2: Conojel ri winak juntir xquirak qui chiˈ , xquibij : ¡ Chesaj la bi waˈ ! ¡ Tzokopij baˈ la ri tat Barrabás chke ! ― xecha che .

text: ( Who for a certain sedition made in the city , and for murder , was cast into prison . )
text2: Are cˈu ri tat Barrabás cˈo pa cheˈ rumal chi u cämisam jun winak , xukujeˈ xeumulij ri winak re ri tinimit rech cäquiyac quib chrij ri kˈatal tzij .

text: Pilate therefore , willing to release Jesus , spake again to them .
text2: Ri tat Pilato xeuchˈabej ri winak jumul chic . Are cˈu ri areˈ craj cutzokopij ri Jesús .

text: But they cried , saying , Crucify him , crucify him .
text2: Ri winak xquirak qui chiˈ jumul chic , xquibij : ¡ Chripok ! ¡ Chripok ! ― xechaˈ .

text: And he said unto them the third time , Why , what evil hath he done ? I have found no cause of death in him : I will therefore chastise him , and let him go .
text2: Churox mul xubij chque : ¿ Jas etzelal u banom waˈ we achi riˈ ? Man cˈo tä jun mac nu rikom chrij rech cäcämisaxic . Quincˈäjisaj baˈ u wäch , quintzokopij cˈu bic , ― xcha chque .

text: And they were instant with loud voices , requiring that he might be crucified . And the voices of them and of the chief priests prevailed .
text2: Ri winak cˈut xquicoj qui chukˈab junam cucˈ ri qui nimakil sacerdotes aj Israel . Sibalaj xquirak qui chiˈ chubixic chi cärip ri Jesús . Xecowinic , xechˈacan che ri tat Pilato . Xyiˈ cˈu chque jas ri xquirayij .

text: And Pilate gave sentence that it should be as they required .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ ri tat Pilato xukˈat tzij chi cäbantaj na jas ri xquitaˈ che .

text: And he released unto them him that for sedition and murder was cast into prison , whom they had desired ; but he delivered Jesus to their will .
text2: Xutzokopij cˈu ri tataˈ ri xquitaˈ , are ri ajpacheˈ , ri achi cämisanel ri xeumulij ri winak re ri tinimit rech cäquiyac quib chrij ri kˈatal tzij . Are cˈu ri Jesús xujach pa qui kˈab .

text: And as they led him away , they laid hold upon one Simon , a Cyrenian , coming out of the country , and on him they laid the cross , that he might bear it after Jesus .
text2: Aretak tajin cäcˈam bi ri Jesús churipic , xquichap apan jun achi aj Cirene , Simón u biˈ , ri petinak pa juyub . Xquiya cˈu ri cruz chrij rech cutelej bic , cuterenej bi ri Jesús .

text: And there followed him a great company of people , and of women , which also bewailed and lamented him .
text2: Xeteri cˈu bic qˈuialaj winak , xukujeˈ jujun tak ixokib ri cäquiqˈuis quib che okˈej , cäcokˈej u wäch ri Jesús .

text: But Jesus turning unto them said , Daughters of Jerusalem , weep not for me , but weep for yourselves , and for your children .
text2: Xutzolkˈomij rib ri Jesús , xerilo , xubij cˈu chque : Ixokib aj Jerusalén , ― cächaˈ . Mokˈej chi alak nu wäch in , are cˈu chokˈej ib alak , xukujeˈ cheokˈej alak qui wäch ri al alak , ― cächa chque .

text: For , behold , the days are coming , in the which they shall say , Blessed are the barren , and the wombs that never bare , and the paps which never gave suck .
text2: Copan cˈu na ri kˈij aretak cäbixic : “ Utz que ri chuchuib ri man quealcˈualan taj , ri man quecowin tä che alcˈualanic . Utz que ri chuchuib ri man cˈo tä cal ri quetuˈnic , ” ― cächa na .

text: Then shall they begin to say to the mountains , Fall on us ; and to the hills , Cover us .
text2: Pa ri kˈij riˈ cäquibij na ri winak chque ri nimak tak juyub : “ Chixtzak lok pa ka wiˈ , ” ― quecha na riˈ . Xukujeˈ cäquibij chque ri juyub : “ Chujichˈuku , ” ― quecha na chque .

text: For if they do these things in a green tree , what shall be done in the dry ?
text2: We cäban waˈ we cˈäx riˈ aretak räx ri cheˈ , ¿ jas ta ne ri cäcaˈn na aretak chakiˈj chic ri cheˈ ? ― xcha chque .

text: And there were also two other , malefactors , led with him to be put to death .
text2: Xukujeˈ xequicˈam bi rucˈ ri Jesús quieb banal tak etzelal rech quecämisaxic .

text: And when they were come to the place , which is called Calvary , there they crucified him , and the malefactors , one on the right hand , and the other on the left .
text2: Aretak xeopan pa ri cˈolibal ri cojom U Bakil Jolomaj che ru biˈ , chilaˈ xquirip wi ri Jesús , xukujeˈ ri quieb banal tak etzelal junam rucˈ , jun pu wiquiäkˈab , ri jun chic pu moxkˈab ri Jesús .

text: Then said Jesus , Father , forgive them ; for they know not what they do . And they parted his raiment , and cast lots .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús : Tat , sacha la qui mac . Xa man cäquichˈob tä riˈ jas ri tajin cäcaˈno , ― xchaˈ . Ri soldados cˈut xquesaj qui suerte chrij ri ratzˈiak ri Jesús , xquijach cˈu waˈ chquiwäch .

text: And the people stood beholding . And the rulers also with them derided him , saying , He saved others ; let him save himself , if he be Christ , the chosen of God .
text2: E tacˈatoj cˈu ri winak , tajin quecaˈy che ri Jesús . Ri qui nimakil ri winak xquetzˈbej u wäch , xquibij : Xutoˈ ri juleˈ winak chic . We kas tzij are ri Cristo ri chaˈtal rumal ri Dios , chutoˈ baˈ rib , ― xechaˈ .

text: And the soldiers also mocked him , coming to him , and offering him vinegar ,
text2: Xukujeˈ ri soldados xquetzˈbej u wäch . Xekeb rucˈ ri Jesús , xquiya chˈäm vino chuwäch .

text: And saying , If thou be the king of the Jews , save thyself .
text2: Xquibij che : ¡ We at riˈ ri cattakan pa qui wiˈ ri winak aj Israel chatoˈ baˈ awib ! ― xecha che .

text: And a superscription also was written over him in letters of Greek , and Latin , and Hebrew , THIS IS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Cojom cˈu jun tzˈibtalic puwiˈ ri cruz ri xrip wi ri Jesús . Are tzˈibam waˈ pa qui chˈabal ri winak aj Israel , ri winak latinos , xukujeˈ ri winak griegos , cubij : ARE NIM TAKANEL PA QUI WIˈ RI WINAK AJ ISRAEL , ― cächaˈ .

text: And one of the malefactors which were hanged railed on him , saying , If thou be Christ , save thyself and us .
text2: Jun chque ri banal tak etzelal , ri e tzäyebam rucˈ , xuyokˈo , xubij : We kas tzij lal riˈ ri Cristo , chtoˈ ib la . Chujtoˈ la uj xukujeˈ , ― xcha riˈ .

text: But the other answering rebuked him , saying , Dost not thou fear God , seeing thou art in the same condemnation ?
text2: Xchˈaw ri jun achi chic , xuyaj ri rachiˈl . Xubij che : ¿ A mat caxej awib at cho ri Dios , at cˈut junam tajin carik cˈäx rucˈ ?

text: And we indeed justly ; for we receive the due reward of our deeds : but this man hath done nothing amiss .
text2: Ri uj takal chke chi jeˈ cäban waˈ chke . Tajin cäkatoj u qˈuexel ri kaˈnom . Are cˈu waˈ we achi riˈ , man cˈo tä etzelal u banom , ― xcha che ri rachiˈl .

text: And he said unto Jesus , Lord , remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom .
text2: Xubij che ri Jesús : Tat , chinnataj che la aretak cächaplej la takanic , ― xcha che .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , To day shalt thou be with me in paradise .
text2: Xchˈaw ri Jesús , xubij : Kas tzij ri quinbij chawe chi cämic riˈ catcˈoji na wucˈ in pa ri jeˈlalaj cˈolibal “ paraíso ” u biˈ , ― xcha che .

text: And it was about the sixth hour , and there was a darkness over all the earth until the ninth hour .
text2: Craj pa ri cablajuj hora xkˈekumar ruwächulew cˈä pa ri urox hora re benak kˈij .

text: And the sun was darkened , and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst .
text2: Xatin cˈu ri kˈij , xukujeˈ xjisjob ri tasbal u pam ri nimalaj rachoch Dios .

text: And when Jesus had cried with a loud voice , he said , Father , into thy hands I commend my spirit : and having said thus , he gave up the ghost .
text2: Te riˈ xurakakej u chiˈ ri Jesús , co xchˈawic , xubij : ¡ Tat ! ― xchaˈ . Quinjach ri wanimaˈ pa kˈab la , ― xchaˈ . U bim waˈ , xel ranimaˈ .

text: Now when the centurion saw what was done , he glorified God , saying , Certainly this was a righteous man .
text2: Aretak ri qui nimal soldados xril ri xbantajic , xunimarisaj u kˈij ri Dios , xubij : Kas utzalaj achi waˈ we achi riˈ , ― xchaˈ .

text: And all the people that came together to that sight , beholding the things which were done , smote their breasts , and returned .
text2: Conojel ri winak xquimulij quib che rilic . Aretak xquil ri xbantajic , xetzelejic , sibalaj quebisonic , quebokˈic .

text: And all his acquaintance , and the women that followed him from Galilee , stood afar off , beholding these things .
text2: Conojel ri etamaninak u wäch ri Jesús , xukujeˈ ri ixokib ri tereninak u lok pa Galilea xecanaj can chinaj che rilic ri xban che .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Joseph , a counseller ; and he was a good man , and a just :
text2: Te riˈ xopan jun achi , José u biˈ . Are jun chque ri qui nimakil ri winak , utzalaj achi cˈu waˈ ri jicom ranimaˈ .

text: ( The same had not consented to the counsel and deed of them ; ) he was of Arimathaea , a city of the Jews : who also himself waited for the kingdom of God .
text2: Ri areˈ are aj Arimatea , jun tinimit re Judea . Are jun achi ri cuˈl na u cˈux che reyexic ru takanic ri Dios pa qui wiˈ ri winak . Man xucˈul tä cˈu re ri areˈ ri caˈnom ri niqˈuiaj qui nimakil ri winak chic .

text: This man went unto Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus .
text2: Xopan cˈu ri areˈ cho ri tat Pilato chutaˈic chi cäyiˈ ru cuerpo ri Jesús che .

text: And he took it down , and wrapped it in linen , and laid it in a sepulchre that was hewn in stone , wherein never man before was laid .
text2: Aretak xukajsaj , xubolkˈotij pa jun manta . Xuya cˈu pa jun mukubal ri mäjaˈ cˈo jun winak yoˈm chupam . Ri mukubal riˈ are jun pec cˈotom cok cho ri abaj .

text: And that day was the preparation , and the sabbath drew on .
text2: We kˈij riˈ are ri víspera waˈ re ri Pascua . Xak jubikˈ craj chi cächaplex ri kˈij re uxlanem .

text: And the women also , which came with him from Galilee , followed after , and beheld the sepulchre , and how his body was laid .
text2: Ri ixokib ri xeteri lok rucˈ ri Jesús pa Galilea , xquiterenej bic , xquil ri mukubal . Xquilo jas ri xban can chuyaˈic ri cäminak chupam .

text: And they returned , and prepared spices and ointments ; and rested the sabbath day according to the commandment .
text2: Aretak xetzelej bi cho ja , xcaˈn u banic cˈocˈalaj tak cunabal . Xeuxlan cˈu pa ri kˈij re uxlanem , jeˈ jas ri cubij ri Pixab .

text: Now upon the first day of the week , very early in the morning , they came unto the sepulchre , bringing the spices which they had prepared , and certain others with them .
text2: Pa ri nabe kˈij re ri semana , sibalaj akˈab xebeˈ ri ixokib , xeopan cˈu chuchiˈ ri mukubal . Xquicˈam bi ri cˈocˈalaj tak cunabal ri caˈnom .

text: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulchre .
text2: Xquirik ri abaj wolkotim chi apan jelaˈ chuchiˈ ri mukubal .

text: And they entered in , and found not the body of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Xeboc bic , man xquirik tä cˈu ru cuerpo ri Kajaw Jesús .

text: And it came to pass , as they were much perplexed thereabout , behold , two men stood by them in shining garments :
text2: Xquixej cˈu quib , man xquirik taj jas cäcaˈno rumal ri xbantajic . Xak teˈtalic cˈut xetaqˈui quieb achijab chquinakaj , ri sibalaj cäjuluw ri catzˈiak .

text: And as they were afraid , and bowed down their faces to the earth , they said unto them , Why seek ye the living among the dead ?
text2: Xquixej cˈu quib ri ixokib , xquipachba quib pulew . Xquibij cˈu ri achijab chque : ¿ Jas che quitzucuj ri cˈaslic chquixol ri cäminakib ?

text: He is not here , but is risen : remember how he spake unto you when he was yet in Galilee ,
text2: Man cˈo tä waral , xcˈastaj bi riˈ , ― quecha chque . Chnaˈtaj chiwe jas ri xutzijoj can ri Jesús chiwe aretak cˈä cˈo ri Areˈ pa Galilea , ― quechaˈ .

text: Saying , The Son of man must be delivered into the hands of sinful men , and be crucified , and the third day rise again .
text2: Jeˈ xubij waˈ chiwe : “ Rajwaxic chi ri in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , quinjach na pa qui kˈab ajmaquib , quinrip na cho ri cruz , quincˈastaj cˈu na bi chquixol ri cäminakib churox kˈij , ” ― xcha riˈ , ― xecha chque ri ixokib .

text: And they remembered his words ,
text2: Te cˈu riˈ xnaˈtaj ru tzij ri Jesús chque ri ixokib .

text: And returned from the sepulchre , and told all these things unto the eleven , and to all the rest .
text2: Aretak tzelejem lok que , qui petic pa ri mukubal , xquitzijoj chque ri tijoxelab , xukujeˈ chque ri niqˈuiaj cachiˈl chic ronojel ri xquicˈulmaj .

text: It was Mary Magdalene , and Joanna , and Mary the mother of James , and other women that were with them , which told these things unto the apostles .
text2: Ri xquitzijoj ri tzij riˈ chque ri apóstoles , ru takoˈn ri Jesús , e areˈ ri nan María Magdalena , ri nan Juana , ri nan María ru nan ri Jacobo , xukujeˈ ri juleˈ ixokib chic .

text: And their words seemed to them as idle tales , and they believed them not .
text2: Ri apóstoles man xquicoj tä ri qui tzij ri ixokib . Xel chquiwäch chi xak con tak tzij ri cäquibij .

text: Then arose Peter , and ran unto the sepulchre ; and stooping down , he beheld the linen clothes laid by themselves , and departed , wondering in himself at that which was come to pass .
text2: Pune ta ne je riˈ , ri tat Pedro xwalij bic . Xutic anim , xeˈ chuchiˈ ri mukubal . Xpachiˈc , xcaˈy cok chupam . Xuwi ri manta xrilo . Xucajmaj cˈu ri xcˈulmatajic .

text: And , behold , two of them went that same day to a village called Emmaus , which was from Jerusalem about threescore furlongs .
text2: Pa we kˈij riˈ e benak pa ri be quieb chque ri tijoxelab . Benam que pa jun alaj tinimit , Emaús u biˈ . Craj julajuj kilómetros u xol rucˈ ri tinimit Jerusalén .

text: And they talked together of all these things which had happened .
text2: Cäquitzijobela quib chrij ri xbantaj pa Jerusalén .

text: And it came to pass , that , while they communed together and reasoned , Jesus himself drew near , and went with them .
text2: Tajin cˈu cäquichˈabej quib , cäquicˈotola tak qui chiˈ aretak ri Jesús xurik bi rib cucˈ , xerachiˈlaj bi junam .

text: But their eyes were holden that they should not know him .
text2: Xban cˈut chi man xquichˈob tä u wäch .

text: And he said unto them , What manner of communications are these that ye have one to another , as ye walk , and are sad ?
text2: Xubij cˈu chque : ¿ Jas ri quitzijobela chbil tak iwib pa we be riˈ ? ― cächaˈ . ¿ Jas che quixbisonic ? ― xcha chque .

text: And the one of them , whose name was Cleopas , answering said unto him , Art thou only a stranger in Jerusalem , and hast not known the things which are come to pass therein these days ?
text2: Jun chque ri achijab , Cleofas u biˈ , xchˈawic , xubij che : ¿ A xak lal jun ocˈowel pa Jerusalén ? Craj ne xak xuwi ri lal man etam tä la ri xbantaj jelaˈ pa tak ri kˈij riˈ , ― xcha che .

text: And he said unto them , What things ? And they said unto him , Concerning Jesus of Nazareth , which was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people :
text2: Xubij cˈu chque : ¿ Jas riˈ ri xbanic ? ― xcha ri Jesús chque . Xquibij che : Are ri xban che ri Jesús aj Nazaret . We achi riˈ are jun kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios , ri sibalaj cˈo u chukˈab ru tzij ri xukujeˈ cuban cajmabal . Nim cˈu u banic cho ri Dios , xukujeˈ chquiwäch ri winak , ― quecha che .

text: And how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him to be condemned to death , and have crucified him .
text2: Xjach cˈu bic , xkˈat tzij puwiˈ chi cäcämisaxic ri Areˈ cumal ri qui nimakil sacerdotes aj Israel , xukujeˈ cumal ri qui nimakil ri ka winak uj . ¡ Xquirip cˈu cho ri cruz ! ― quechaˈ .

text: But we trusted that it had been he which should have redeemed Israel : and beside all this , to day is the third day since these things were done .
text2: Are cˈu ri uj xkachomaj chi are waˈ ri cutor na ri ka tinimit Israel . Ya xqueˈ oxib kˈij cämic ri xban waˈ , ― quecha che .

text: Yea , and certain women also of our company made us astonished , which were early at the sepulchre ;
text2: Xkacajmaj cˈut jas ri xquitzijoj jujun tak ixokib chkaxol . Akˈab xebeˈ chuchiˈ ru mukubal ri Jesús .

text: And when they found not his body , they came , saying , that they had also seen a vision of angels , which said that he was alive .
text2: Man xquirik tä chi cˈu ru cuerpo , ― quechaˈ . Aretak xetzelej bic , xquitzijoj chke chi xequil ángeles ri xquibij chi xcˈastaj bi ri Jesús , ― quechaˈ .

text: And certain of them which were with us went to the sepulchre , and found it even so as the women had said : but him they saw not .
text2: Te riˈ xebeˈ jujun chque ri kachiˈl chuchiˈ ri mukubal , jeˈ xquilo jas ri xquibij ri ixokib . Man xquil tä chi u wäch ri Jesús , ― xecha che .

text: Then he said unto them , O fools , and slow of heart to believe all that the prophets have spoken :
text2: Te riˈ xubij ri Jesús chque : ¡ Ay , con tak achijab ! ¡ Man quixcojon tä che ri qui tzijom can ri ojer tak kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios !

text: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things , and to enter into his glory ?
text2: ¿ A mat iwetam ix chi rajwaxic chi ri Cristo curik waˈ we cˈäx riˈ cˈä mäjok cänimarisax u kˈij ? ― xcha chque .

text: And beginning at Moses and all the prophets , he expounded unto them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself .
text2: Xuchaplej cˈu u kˈalajisaxic chquiwäch ri u tzij ri mam Moisés xukujeˈ ri qui tzij ri ojer tak kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios jas ri qui tzˈibam can chrij ri Cristo .

text: And they drew nigh unto the village , whither they went : and he made as though he would have gone further .
text2: Xenakajin cˈu che ri alaj tinimit jawijeˈ e benam wi que . Ri Jesús xubano chi jeˈ ta ne chi naj ri queˈ wi na , man xtaqˈui taj .

text: But they constrained him , saying , Abide with us : for it is toward evening , and the day is far spent . And he went in to tarry with them .
text2: Ri tijoxelab xquicoj qui chukˈab rech cäcanaj can cucˈ , xquibij che : Canaj can la kucˈ . Kajem cˈu cuban ri kˈij , coc cˈu na ri akˈab , ― xecha che . Xoc cˈu bi ri Jesús , xcanaj can cucˈ .

text: And it came to pass , as he sat at meat with them , he took bread , and blessed it , and brake , and gave to them .
text2: Aretak xtˈuyi cucˈ chiˈ ri mesa , xucˈam ri wa . Xutewchij , xupiro , xuya chque .

text: And their eyes were opened , and they knew him ; and he vanished out of their sight .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ xyiˈ chque chi xecowinic xquichˈob u wäch . Xak teˈtalic cˈut xsach ri Jesús chquiwäch .

text: And they said one to another , Did not our heart burn within us , while he talked with us by the way , and while he opened to us the scriptures ?
text2: Xquibila cˈu ri jun che ri jun chic : ¿ A mat cˈo jas xkanaˈ pa kanimaˈ aretak xujuchˈabej pa ri be , aretak xukˈalajisaj ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic chkawäch ? ― xechaˈ .

text: And they rose up the same hour , and returned to Jerusalem , and found the eleven gathered together , and them that were with them ,
text2: Pa ri hora riˈ xewalijic , xetzelej bi pa Jerusalén . Xequirika ri julajuj tijoxelab qui mulim quib xukujeˈ ri niqˈuiaj cachiˈl chic .

text: Saying , The Lord is risen indeed , and hath appeared to Simon .
text2: Xquibij cˈu chque : Kas tzij xcˈastaj ri Kajaw Jesús , u cˈutum cˈu rib chuwäch ri tat Simón , ― xecha chque .

text: And they told what things were done in the way , and how he was known of them in breaking of bread .
text2: Te riˈ xquitzijoj ri xquicˈulmaj pa ri be , xukujeˈ xquitzijoj jas xquetamabej u wäch ri Jesús aretak xupir ri wa .

text: And as they thus spake , Jesus himself stood in the midst of them , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Aretak tajin cäquitzijobela quib chrij ri xquicˈulmaj , xucˈut rib ri Jesús chquiwäch , xtaqˈui cˈu chquixol . Xubij chque : Chuxlan baˈ ri iwanimaˈ , ― xcha chque .
