text: But they were terrified and affrighted , and supposed that they had seen a spirit .
text2: ¡ Sibalaj cˈu xquixej quib ! Xquichomaj chi are jun xibinel ri tajin cäquilo .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye troubled ? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts ?
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque : ¿ Jas che quixbirbit pa iwanimaˈ , cuban cˈu quieb i cˈux ? ― cächaˈ .

text: Behold my hands and my feet , that it is I myself : handle me , and see ; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones , as ye see me have .
text2: Chiwila ri wakan xukujeˈ ri nu kˈab chi kas in riˈ ri Jesús . Chininaˈ , chiniwilaˈ , ― cächaˈ . Jun xibinel man cˈo tä u tijal , man cˈo tä cˈu u bakil jeˈ jas ri wech in ri quicaˈyej , ― xcha chque .

text: And when he had thus spoken , he shewed them his hands and his feet .
text2: Aretak xubij waˈ xucˈut ru kˈab xukujeˈ ri rakan chquiwäch .

text: And while they yet believed not for joy , and wondered , he said unto them , Have ye here any meat ?
text2: Cäcaj cäquicojo , cäcaj man cäquicoj taj rumal chi quicajmam quib . Jubikˈ quequicotic , jubikˈ cˈu cäquixej quib . Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque : ¿ A cˈo waral jas quintijo ? ― xcha chque .

text: And they gave him a piece of a broiled fish , and of an honeycomb .
text2: Xquiya cˈu jun chˈäkap bolom cär che .

text: And he took it , and did eat before them .
text2: Xucˈamo , xutij chquiwäch .

text: And he said unto them , These are the words which I spake unto you , while I was yet with you , that all things must be fulfilled , which were written in the law of Moses , and in the prophets , and in the psalms , concerning me .
text2: Xubij cˈu chque : Aretak ri in xincˈoji iwucˈ , xintzijoj chiwe chi rajwaxic quebantaj conojel ri tzˈibam chwij pa ru Pixab ri ka mam Moisés , xukujeˈ ri tzˈibam cumal ri ojer tak kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios , xukujeˈ pa tak ri salmos , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: Then opened he their understanding , that they might understand the scriptures ,
text2: Te cˈu riˈ xuya chque chi xquichˈob na ri Tzˈibtalic .

text: And said unto them , Thus it is written , and thus it behoved Christ to suffer , and to rise from the dead the third day :
text2: Xubij chque : Jeˈ tzˈibam waˈ chi curik na cˈäx ri Cristo , cäcˈastaj cˈu na bi chquixol ri cäminakib churox kˈij , ― cächaˈ .

text: And that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations , beginning at Jerusalem .
text2: Xukujeˈ tzˈibam chi rajwaxic u tzijoxic ru Tzij ri Dios chque conojel tinimit pa ri u biˈ ri Cristo chubixic chque chi rajwaxic cäquiqˈuex canimaˈ , cäquiqˈuex cˈu qui chomanic ri winak rech quesachtaj na ri qui mac . Are cächapletaj na bi u tzijoxic waˈ pa ri tinimit Jerusalén , ― cächa chque .

text: And ye are witnesses of these things .
text2: Ri ix cˈut , ix kˈalajisanelab chrij ronojel waˈ we riˈ .

text: And , behold , I send the promise of my Father upon you : but tarry ye in the city of Jerusalem , until ye be endued with power from on high .
text2: Quintaka na lok pi wiˈ jas ri xubij ri Dios ri nu Tat chi cuya na chiwe . Chixcanaj baˈ can pa ri tinimit Jerusalén cˈä cäyiˈ na chiwe ri i chukˈab ajchicaj .

text: And he led them out as far as to Bethany , and he lifted up his hands , and blessed them .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ ri Jesús xeucˈam bi apan chrij ri tinimit Betania . Chilaˈ xuwalijisaj ru kˈab , xeutewchij .

text: And it came to pass , while he blessed them , he was parted from them , and carried up into heaven .
text2: Aretak tajin queutewchij , xel bi chquiwäch , xcˈam bi chicaj .

text: And they worshipped him , and returned to Jerusalem with great joy :
text2: Xnimarisax na u kˈij cumal chilaˈ . Te riˈ xetzelej lok pa Jerusalén , sibalaj cˈu quequicotic .

text: And were continually in the temple , praising and blessing God . Amen .
text2: Amakˈel ronojel kˈij e cˈo pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , tajin cäquiya cˈu u kˈij ri Dios . Amén .

text: In the beginning was the Word , and the Word was with God , and the Word was God .
text2: Aretak mäjok cäban ri cajulew , ri Cristo , ri cäbix “ u Tzij ri Dios ” che , ya cˈo chic ri Areˈ . Ri Areˈ ri cäbix “ u Tzij ri Dios ” che cˈo chic rucˈ ri Dios , are cˈu kas Dios waˈ .

text: The same was in the beginning with God .
text2: Ri Areˈ cˈut cˈo rucˈ ri Dios ojer tzaretak xchaptaj lok u banic ronojel .

text: All things were made by him ; and without him was not any thing made that was made .
text2: Rumal ri Areˈ ri Dios xuban ronojel ri cˈolic . Man cˈo tä cˈu jas ri cˈolic ri mat xban rumal ri Areˈ .

text: In him was life ; and the life was the light of men .
text2: Rucˈ ri Areˈ cˈo wi ri kas cˈaslemal ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic . We cˈaslemal riˈ are waˈ ri kas sakil chque conojel ri winak cho ruwächulew .

text: And the light shineth in darkness ; and the darkness comprehended it not .
text2: Ri sakil riˈ cäjuluw pa ri kˈekum , man cäcowin tä cˈu ri kˈekum chusachic u wäch .

text: There was a man sent from God , whose name was John .
text2: Cˈo jun tataˈ ri xtak lok rumal ri Dios . Ri tataˈ riˈ are Juan u biˈ .

text: The same came for a witness , to bear witness of the Light , that all men through him might believe .
text2: Xpe cˈu ri areˈ chukˈalajisaxic ri sakil chquiwäch ri winak rech conojel quecojon ta che ri sakil rumal ri u tzij ri areˈ .

text: He was not that Light , but was sent to bear witness of that Light .
text2: Ri tat Juan man are tä ri sakil , xane xa takom lok rech cukˈalajisaj ri kas tzij chrij ri sakil .

text: That was the true Light , which lighteth every man that cometh into the world .
text2: Ri kas sakil cˈut , ri cäjuluw pa qui wiˈ conojel ri winak , tajin cäpe cho ruwächulew .

text: He was in the world , and the world was made by him , and the world knew him not .
text2: Ri Jun ri cäbix “ u Tzij ri Dios ” che cˈo chic cho ruwächulew . Pune cˈu rumal ri Areˈ ri Dios xuban ruwächulew , ri winak cˈut ri e cˈo cho ruwächulew man kas xquichˈob tä u wäch .

text: He came unto his own , and his own received him not .
text2: Xopan pa ru tinimit , ru winakil cˈut man xquicˈulaj taj .

text: But as many as received him , to them gave he power to become the sons of God , even to them that believe on his name :
text2: Pune je riˈ e cˈo cˈu jujun ri utz u cˈulaxic xcaˈno , xecojon che ri Areˈ . E are cˈu tak waˈ ri xyiˈ chque chi queboc che ralcˈual ri Dios .

text: Which were born , not of blood , nor of the will of the flesh , nor of the will of man , but of God .
text2: Ri xecojonic , ri xeboc che ralcˈual ri Dios , man jeˈ tä xban che calcˈualaxic jas ri calcˈual ri winak ri xak quil qui wäch rumal chi je waˈ xquichomaj ri qui nan qui tat , o rumal ru rayibal jun winak . Xane ri Dios are ri kas qui Tat ri e areˈ .

text: And the Word was made flesh , and dwelt among us , ( and we beheld his glory , the glory as of the only begotten of the Father , ) full of grace and truth .
text2: Ri Jun ri cäbix “ u Tzij ri Dios ” che xuban winak , xcˈoji cˈu chkaxol waral cho ruwächulew . Lokˈ xeril wi conojel winak , xubij cˈu ri kas tzij chque . Xkil ri quelic , kˈalaj chi kas are ru Cˈojol ri ka Tat ri sibalaj nim u kˈij , ri xuwi waˈ u Cˈojol cˈolic .

text: John bare witness of him , and cried , saying , This was he of whom I spake , He that cometh after me is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Ri tat Juan xukˈalajisaj ri kas tzij chrij ri Areˈ , xubij : Are waˈ ri xinbij , chi ri Jun chic ri cäpe na , are nim na u kˈij chnuwäch in rumal chi ri Areˈ cˈo chic aretak ri in mäjaˈ quil nu wäch , ― xchaˈ .

text: And of his fulness have all we received , and grace for grace .
text2: Konojel ka cˈamom ke ri nimalaj u kˈinomal , ka rikom cˈu tewchibal kˈij chi kˈij .

text: For the law was given by Moses , but grace and truth came by Jesus Christ .
text2: Ri ka mam Moisés xutzˈibaj can ri Pixab ri xuya ri Dios che . Are cˈu ri Jesucristo xucˈut can chkawäch chi kas cujraj ri Dios , xukˈalajisaj ri kas tzij chkawäch .

text: No man hath seen God at any time ; the only begotten Son , which is in the bosom of the Father , he hath declared him .
text2: Man cˈo tä wi jun winak ilowinak u wäch ri Dios . Xane xak xuwi ru Cˈojol ri Dios ri cˈo rucˈ ri ka Tat , ri xak xuwi waˈ u Cˈojol cˈolic , are ri Areˈ xulkˈalajisan chkawäch ru banic ri Dios .

text: And this is the record of John , when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him , Who art thou ?
text2: Ri winak aj Israel pa Jerusalén xequitak bi sacerdotes xukujeˈ levitas rucˈ ri tat Juan chutaˈic che jachin ri areˈ .

text: And he confessed , and denied not ; but confessed , I am not the Christ .
text2: Ri areˈ kas xukˈalajisaj chquiwäch chi sakil , xubij : Ri in , man in tä ri Cristo , ― xcha chque .

text: And they asked him , What then ? Art thou Elias ? And he saith , I am not . Art thou that prophet ? And he answered , No .
text2: Xquitaˈ chi cˈu jumul che , xquibij : ¿ Jachin cˈu ri lal ? ¿ A lal riˈ ri ka mam Elías ri kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ? ― xecha che . Ri tat Juan xubij : Man in tä riˈ , ― xcha chque . Jumul chic xquitaˈ che , xquibij : ¿ A man lal cˈu riˈ ri kˈalajisal u Tzij ri Dios ri cäbixic chi cäpe na ? ― xecha che . Ri areˈ xchˈawic , xubij : Man in tä riˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? that we may give an answer to them that sent us . What sayest thou of thyself ?
text2: Xquibij cˈu che : ¿ Jachin cˈu ri lal ? Rajwaxic chi cujeˈc , cˈo jas ri queˈkabij chque ri xujtakow lok . ¿ Jas ri cäbij la chke chij ib la ? ― xecha che .

text: He said , I am the voice of one crying in the wilderness , Make straight the way of the Lord , as said the prophet Esaias .
text2: Ri tat Juan xchˈawic , xubij : In riˈ ri jun ri co cächˈaw pa tak ri juyub ri cätzˈinowic , cubij : “ Chibana u banic ri nim be ri cäbin wi ri Kajaw , chibana jicom che , ” ― cächaˈ . Jeˈ jas ri xubij lok ri ka mam Isaías ri kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios , ― xcha chque .

text: And they which were sent were of the Pharisees .
text2: Ri achijab riˈ ri xeopan rucˈ ri tat Juan chuchˈabexic , e areˈ qui takoˈn ri tataˈib fariseos waˈ .

text: And they asked him , and said unto him , Why baptizest thou then , if thou be not that Christ , nor Elias , neither that prophet ?
text2: Xquitaˈ cˈu che ri tat Juan : We ri lal , man lal tä riˈ ri Cristo , man lal tä riˈ ri ka mam Elías , man lal tä cˈu riˈ ri kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios , ¿ jas che cäban la kasnaˈ ? ― xecha che .

text: John answered them , saying , I baptize with water : but there standeth one among you , whom ye know not ;
text2: Ri tat Juan xubij chque : Ri in quinban kasnaˈ rucˈ joron . Cˈo cˈu Jun chxol alak ri man etam tä alak u wäch ri Areˈ .

text: He it is , who coming after me is preferred before me , whose shoe ' s latchet I am not worthy to unloose .
text2: Are cˈu waˈ ri Jun ri teren lok chwij , pune nim cˈu na u banic chnuwäch in . Man takal tä cˈu chwe in quinquir ru cˈamal u xajäb , ― xcha chque .

text: These things were done in Bethabara beyond Jordan , where John was baptizing .
text2: Ronojel waˈ we riˈ xcˈulmataj pa Betábara ri cˈo chrelbal kˈij che ri nimaˈ Jordán jawijeˈ ri tajin cuban wi kasnaˈ ri tat Juan .

text: The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him , and saith , Behold the Lamb of God , which taketh away the sin of the world .
text2: Chucab kˈij ri tat Juan xril ri Jesús tajin cänakajin lok rucˈ , xubij : ¡ Chilampe alak ! ― cächaˈ . Are waˈ ri Jun ri cäcämisax na cho ri Dios jeˈ ta ne jun alaj chij che resaxic bi ri qui mac ri winak ri e cˈo cho ruwächulew , ― cächaˈ .

text: This is he of whom I said , After me cometh a man which is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Chrij cˈu ri Areˈ xintzijon wi aretak xinbij : Cäpe chi na Jun ri nim na u banic chnuwäch in . Je riˈ , rumal chi ri Areˈ ya cˈo chic mäjok quil nu wäch in .

text: And I knew him not : but that he should be made manifest to Israel , therefore am I come baptizing with water .
text2: Ri in xukujeˈ man wetam tä u wäch nabe , tajin cˈu quinban qui kasnaˈ ri winak rech conojel ri winak aj Israel cäquetamaj u wäch , ― xcha ri tat Juan .

text: And John bare record , saying , I saw the Spirit descending from heaven like a dove , and it abode upon him .
text2: Xukujeˈ xubij ri tat Juan : Xinwil ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu xkaj lok chicaj jeˈ u banic jun palomäx , xcanaj cˈu can puwiˈ ri Jesús .

text: And I knew him not : but he that sent me to baptize with water , the same said unto me , Upon whom thou shalt see the Spirit descending , and remaining on him , the same is he which baptizeth with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ri in nabe man wetam taj jachin ri Areˈ , ri Dios cˈut ri xintakowic chi quinban kasnaˈ rucˈ joron , are xubij chwe : “ Jachin ri cawilo chi cäkaj ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu puwiˈ , cäcanajic , are riˈ ri Jun ri cuban na kasnaˈ rucˈ ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu , ” ― xcha chwe .

text: And I saw , and bare record that this is the Son of God .
text2: Ri in wilom ri xucˈulmaj , quinkˈalajisaj cˈut jas ri xinwilo chi are waˈ ru Cˈojol ri Dios , ― xcha ri tat Juan chque ri winak .

text: Again the next day after John stood , and two of his disciples ;
text2: Chucab kˈij ri tat Juan cˈo chilaˈ jumul chic e rachiˈl quieb chque ru tijoxelab .

text: And looking upon Jesus as he walked , he saith , Behold the Lamb of God !
text2: Aretak ri tat Juan xrilo chi tajin cocˈow ri Jesús , xubij : ¡ Chiwilampeˈ ! ― cächaˈ . Are waˈ ri Jun ri cäcämisax na cho ri Dios jeˈ ta ne jun alaj chij , ― xcha chque .

text: And the two disciples heard him speak , and they followed Jesus .
text2: Ri quieb u tijoxelab ri tat Juan , aretak xquita ri xubij , xebeˈ rucˈ ri Jesús .

text: Then Jesus turned , and saw them following , and saith unto them , What seek ye ? They said unto him , Rabbi , ( which is to say , being interpreted , Master , ) where dwellest thou ?
text2: Ri Jesús xcaˈy can chrij , xrilo chi terenem ri Areˈ cumal ri quieb tijoxelab , xubij chque : ¿ Jas tajin quitzucuj ? ― xchaˈ . Ri e areˈ xquibij che : Ajtij , ¿ jawijeˈ jekel wi la ? ― xecha che .

text: He saith unto them , Come and see . They came and saw where he dwelt , and abode with him that day : for it was about the tenth hour .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij chque : ¡ Chixsajmpeˈ ! Joˈ baˈ , quiwila cˈu na , ― xcha riˈ chque . Xebeˈ cˈu rucˈ ri Areˈ , xquil na jawijeˈ ri jekel wi . Chilaˈ cˈut xecanaj wi can pa ri kˈij riˈ , rumal chi craj are ucaj hora riˈ re ri benak kˈij .

text: One of the two which heard John speak , and followed him , was Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother .
text2: Jun cˈu chque ri quieb achijab ri xquita ri xubij ri tat Juan , ri xebeˈ rucˈ ri Jesús , are ri tat Andrés ri ratz ri tat Simón Pedro .

text: He first findeth his own brother Simon , and saith unto him , We have found the Messias , which is , being interpreted , the Christ .
text2: Xeˈ ri tat Andrés chanim chutzucuxic ri tat Simón ru chakˈ , xubij cˈu che : Xkarik ri Mesías , ― xcha che . ( Ri tzij riˈ quel cubij “ Cristo ” . )

text: And he brought him to Jesus . And when Jesus beheld him , he said , Thou art Simon the son of Jona : thou shalt be called Cephas , which is by interpretation , A stone .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ ri tat Andrés xucˈam bi ri tat Simón rucˈ ri Jesús . Ri Jesús cˈut , aretak xrilo , xubij che : At riˈ ri tat Simón ru cˈojol ri Jonás . Cefas chic cäbix na chawe ( ri quel cubij Pedro ) , ― xcha che .

text: The day following Jesus would go forth into Galilee , and findeth Philip , and saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Chucab kˈij chic ri Jesús xuchomaj chi queˈ pa Galilea . Xurik cˈu ri tat Felipe , xubij che : Tasaˈj wucˈ , ― xcha che .

text: Now Philip was of Bethsaida , the city of Andrew and Peter .
text2: Ri tat Felipe jelaˈ cäpe wi pa ri tinimit Betsaida ri qui tinimit ri tat Andrés , ri tat Pedro .

text: Philip findeth Nathanael , and saith unto him , We have found him , of whom Moses in the law , and the prophets , did write , Jesus of Nazareth , the son of Joseph .
text2: Ri tat Felipe xeˈ chutzucuxic ri tat Natanael , xubij che : Xkil u wäch ri achi ri cˈo xutzˈibaj ri ka mam Moisés chrij pa tak ri wuj re ri Pixab , xukujeˈ ri cˈo xquitzˈibaj ri kˈalajisal tak re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios chrij pa ri qui wuj . Are waˈ ri Jesús ru cˈojol ri tat José aj Nazaret , ― xcha che .

text: And Nathanael said unto him , Can there any good thing come out of Nazareth ? Philip saith unto him , Come and see .
text2: Ri tat Natanael xubij che : ¿ A cˈo pu lo jun winak nim u banic ri cäpe pa Nazaret ? ― xcha che . Ri tat Felipe xubij che : Tasaˈj baˈ , cawil cˈu na at , ― xcha che .

text: Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him , and saith of him , Behold an Israelite indeed , in whom is no guile !
text2: Ri Jesús , aretak xrilo chi petinak ri tat Natanael , xubij : Xpe jun achi ri kas aj Israel , ri man cˈo tä subunic pa ranimaˈ , ― xchaˈ .

text: Nathanael saith unto him , Whence knowest thou me ? Jesus answered and said unto him , Before that Philip called thee , when thou wast under the fig tree , I saw thee .
text2: Te riˈ ri tat Natanael xutaˈ che ri Jesús : ¿ Jas xban la che retamaxic nu wäch ? ― xcha che . Ri Jesús xubij che : Xatinwilo aretak mäjaˈ catsiqˈuix rumal ri tat Felipe , aretak at cˈo chuxeˈ ri jun u cheˈal higos , ― xcha che .

text: Nathanael answered and saith unto him , Rabbi , thou art the Son of God ; thou art the King of Israel .
text2: Ri tat Natanael xubij che : Ajtij , lal riˈ ri u Cˈojol ri Dios , ri Nim Takanel pa qui wiˈ ri winak aj Israel , ― xcha che .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Because I said unto thee , I saw thee under the fig tree , believest thou ? thou shalt see greater things than these .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij che : E ri at , ¿ a cacoj waˈ xa rumal chi xinbij chawe chi xatinwilo aretak ri at cˈo chuxeˈ ru cheˈal higos ? Cawil cˈu na nimak tak cajmabal chuwäch waˈ we riˈ , ― xcha che .

text: And he saith unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Hereafter ye shall see heaven open , and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man .
text2: Xukujeˈ xubij ri Jesús : Kas tzij ri quinbij chiwe chi quiwil na ri caj jaktalic . Quiwil cˈu na ri ángeles rech ri Dios quepakiˈc , quexuli pa nu wiˈ in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee ; and the mother of Jesus was there :
text2: Churox kˈij xban jun cˈulanem pa ri tinimit Caná re Galilea . Ru nan ri Jesús cˈo pa ri cˈulanem .

text: And both Jesus was called , and his disciples , to the marriage .
text2: Xukujeˈ ri Jesús e rachiˈl ru tijoxelab xesiqˈuix pa ri cˈulanem .

text: And when they wanted wine , the mother of Jesus saith unto him , They have no wine .
text2: Xqˈuis cˈu ri vino . Xpe ru nan ri Jesús , xubij che ri Areˈ : Man cˈo tä chi vino , ― xcha che .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , what have I to do with thee ? mine hour is not yet come .
text2: Ri Jesús cˈut xchˈawic , xubij che : Nan , ¿ jas che cabij waˈ chwe in ? Mäjaˈ curik ri kˈij chwe , ― xcha che ru nan .

text: His mother saith unto the servants , Whatsoever he saith unto you , do it .
text2: Xubij cˈu ru nan chque ri tajin quecojow ri vino : Chibana ronojel ri cubij na chiwe , ― xcha chque .

text: And there were set there six waterpots of stone , after the manner of the purifying of the Jews , containing two or three firkins apiece .
text2: Cˈo cˈu wakib nimak tak kˈebal re abaj chilaˈ , cˈolibal joron ri cäquicoj ri winak aj Israel che chˈajbal quib aretak cäquesaj ri äwas chquij . Chquijujunal ri kˈebal cäquichˈij jumuchˈ o cien litros joron .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Fill the waterpots with water . And they filled them up to the brim .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij chque ri tajin quepatänin chque ri winak : Nojisaj alak we kˈebal riˈ che joron , ― xcha chque . Xquichap cˈu qui nojisaxic ri nimak tak kˈebal cˈä xenoj na .

text: And he saith unto them , Draw out now , and bear unto the governor of the feast . And they bare it .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque : Chesaj alak bi jubikˈ , cˈama bi alak che ri cˈamal be pa ri nimakˈij , ― xcha chque . Jeˈ cˈu xcaˈno .

text: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine , and knew not whence it was : ( but the servants which drew the water knew ; ) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom ,
text2: Aretak ri cˈamal be pa ri nimakˈij xunaˈ ri joron ri qˈuextajinak chi pa vino , man retam tä cˈut jawijeˈ xeˈcˈam wi . Xak xuwi ri patäninelab cˈo quetam chic che ri vino jawijeˈ quesam wi bic . Ri cˈamal be xusiqˈuij ri ala ( ri novio ) .

text: And saith unto him , Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine ; and when men have well drunk , then that which is worse : but thou hast kept the good wine until now .
text2: Xubij cˈu che : Conojel ri winak are cäquicoj nabe ri utzalaj vino . Aretak cˈut e nojinak chi ri ulaˈ , te cˈu riˈ coc ri vino ri man kas tä pakal rajil . Are cˈu ri at a cˈolom can ri utzalaj vino rech cˈä teˈ coc waˈ qˈuisbal , ― xcha che .

text: This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee , and manifested forth his glory ; and his disciples believed on him .
text2: Ri xuban ri Jesús pa Caná re Galilea , are waˈ ri nabe cajmabal etal . Rucˈ waˈ xucˈutu chi sibalaj nim u kˈij ri Areˈ . Xecojon cˈu ru tijoxelab che .

text: After this he went down to Capernaum , he , and his mother , and his brethren , and his disciples : and they continued there not many days .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ xel bi chilaˈ , xeˈ pa ri tinimit Capernaum , rachiˈl ru nan , ru tijoxelab , xukujeˈ tak ru chakˈ . Xecanaj cˈu na can quieb oxib kˈij chilaˈ .

text: And the Jews ' passover was at hand , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem ,
text2: Xa jubikˈ craj man curik ri Pascua , jun chque ri qui nimakˈij ri winak aj Israel . Rumal riˈ ri Jesús xeˈ pa ri tinimit Jerusalén .

text: And found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves , and the changers of money sitting :
text2: Chilaˈ pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios xeurik ajcˈay tak wacäx , ajcˈay tak chij , xukujeˈ ajcˈay tak palomäx . Xukujeˈ xeurik ri qˈuexel tak qui rajil ri winak tˈuyutˈoj pa tak ri qui tem .

text: And when he had made a scourge of small cords , he drove them all out of the temple , and the sheep , and the oxen ; and poured out the changers ' money , and overthrew the tables ;
text2: Ri Jesús aretak xeril waˈ , xuban u banic jun colob che u chˈayibal , xuchaplej quesaxic bi conojel ri winak riˈ pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , junam cucˈ ri qui chij , ri qui wacäx . Xujabuj ri qui rajil ri qˈuexel tak puak , xupakchij apan ri qui mesa .

text: And said unto them that sold doves , Take these things hence ; make not my Father ' s house an house of merchandise .
text2: Xubij chque ri ajcˈay tak palomäx : ¡ Chesaj bi alak ronojel waˈ waral ! Mäban alak jun cˈayibal che ri rachoch ri nu Tat , ― xcha chque .

text: And his disciples remembered that it was written , The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up .
text2: Are cˈu ru tijoxelab , xnaˈtaj chque ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic , ri cubij : “ Jeˈ ta ne tajin cäcˈat ri wanimaˈ rumal ri u lokˈal ri achoch la , ” ― cächaˈ .

text: Then answered the Jews and said unto him , What sign shewest thou unto us , seeing that thou doest these things ?
text2: Te riˈ ri winak aj Israel xquitaˈ che ri Jesús : ¿ Jas etal cäcˈut la chkawäch rech cäkilo chi cˈo takanic pa kˈab la chubanic ronojel waˈ ? ― xecha che .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Destroy this temple , and in three days I will raise it up .
text2: Xchˈaw ri Jesús , xubij chque : We ta ri alak cäwulij alak ri nimalaj rachoch Dios riˈ , xa oxib kˈij quinsachi na chuyaquic waˈ jumul chic , ― xcha chque .

text: Then said the Jews , Forty and six years was this temple in building , and wilt thou rear it up in three days ?
text2: Xquibij cˈu ri winak aj Israel che : Cawinak wakib junab xbeytaj u banic waˈ we nimalaj rachoch Dios riˈ , te cˈu riˈ cäbij la chi xa choxib kˈij cäyac ta chi la jumul , ― xecha che .

text: But he spake of the temple of his body .
text2: Are cˈu ri nimalaj rachoch Dios ri xubij ri Jesús , are ru cuerpo ri Areˈ .

text: When therefore he was risen from the dead , his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them ; and they believed the scripture , and the word which Jesus had said .
text2: Rumal riˈ aretak xcˈastaj ri Jesús chquixol ri cäminakib , xnaˈtaj waˈ we tzij riˈ ri xubij ri Jesús chque ru tijoxelab , xquicoj cˈut ri cubij ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic , xukujeˈ xecojon che ru tzij ri Jesús .

text: Now when he was in Jerusalem at the passover , in the feast day , many believed in his name , when they saw the miracles which he did .
text2: Aretak ri Jesús xcˈoji pa Jerusalén pa ri nimakˈij re ri Pascua , e qˈuia xecojon che aretak xquil ri cajmabal tak etal ri xubano .

text: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them , because he knew all men ,
text2: Ri Jesús cˈut man xcuˈbi tä u cˈux chquij rumal chi ri Areˈ retam ri cˈo pa canimaˈ conojel winak .

text: And needed not that any should testify of man : for he knew what was in man .
text2: Man rajwaxic taj chi cˈo jachin jun cäbin che ri cäquichomaj ri winak rumal chi ri Areˈ retam ri cˈo pa tak ri canimaˈ .

text: There was a man of the Pharisees , named Nicodemus , a ruler of the Jews :
text2: Cˈo jun tataˈ fariseo , Nicodemo u biˈ . Ri tataˈ riˈ nim u banic chquixol ri winak aj Israel .

text: The same came to Jesus by night , and said unto him , Rabbi , we know that thou art a teacher come from God : for no man can do these miracles that thou doest , except God be with him .
text2: Ri tat Nicodemo xopan rucˈ ri Jesús chakˈab chuchˈabexic , xubij che : Ajtij , ― xcha che . Ketam chi are ri Dios takowinak la lok che ka tijoxic rumal chi man cˈo tä jun cäcowin chucˈutic ri u chukˈab cucˈ cajmabal tak etal jas ri tajin cäban la we ta mat cˈo ri Dios rucˈ , ― xcha che ri Jesús .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born again , he cannot see the kingdom of God .
text2: Te riˈ ri Jesús xubij che : Kas tzij quinbij che la chi we jun winak man quil chi na u wäch jumul chic , man cuyaˈ taj queˈrilaˈ jawijeˈ ri cätakan wi ri Dios , ― xcha che .

text: Nicodemus saith unto him , How can a man be born when he is old ? can he enter the second time into his mother ' s womb , and be born ?
text2: Ri tat Nicodemo xutaˈ che , xubij : ¿ Jas ta cˈu lo cuban jun achi ri riˈj chic rech quil chi na u wäch jumul chic ? ¿ A cäcowin ta cˈu lo coc ri areˈ jumul chic chupam ru nan rech quil chi na u wäch chucamul ? ― xcha che .

text: Jesus answered , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit , he cannot enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij che : Kas tzij quinbij che la chi ri winak ri man quil tä na u wäch rucˈ joron , xukujeˈ rucˈ ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu , man cuyaˈ taj copan chilaˈ jawijeˈ ri cätakan wi ri Dios , ― cächa che .

text: That which is born of the flesh is flesh ; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit .
text2: Ri winak ri calcˈualax cumal ru nan u tat , xak winak riˈ . Are cˈu ri winak ri calcˈualax rumal ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu , ralcˈual ri Dios riˈ .

text: Marvel not that I said unto thee , Ye must be born again .
text2: Mäcajmaj baˈ la chi quinbij che la : “ Rajwaxic chi quil chi na u wäch jun winak jumul chic , ” ― cächa che .

text: The wind bloweth where it listeth , and thou hearest the sound thereof , but canst not tell whence it cometh , and whither it goeth : so is every one that is born of the Spirit .
text2: Jeˈ jas ri quiäkikˈ xa apawijeˈ cäjichˈichˈ wi , cätataj ru jininem , man kˈalaj tä cˈut jawijeˈ ri cäpe wi , o jawijeˈ ri queˈ wi . Are cˈu je riˈ ri winak ri quil u wäch rumal ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu , ― xcha ri Jesús che .

text: Nicodemus answered and said unto him , How can these things be ?
text2: Ri tat Nicodemo xutaˈ chi jumul che ri Jesús , xubij : ¿ Jas cˈu ru banic waˈ ? ― xcha che .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Art thou a master of Israel , and knowest not these things ?
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij che : Ri lal , lal jun nimalaj ajtij pa Israel . ¿ A mat cächˈob la waˈ ri tajin quinbij ? ― cächa che .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , We speak that we do know , and testify that we have seen ; and ye receive not our witness .
text2: Kas tzij quinbij che la , chi ri uj cäkabij ri ketam , cäkakˈalajisaj cˈu ri kilom . Are cˈu ri alak man cäcoj tä alak ri cäkabij chech alak .

text: If I have told you earthly things , and ye believe not , how shall ye believe , if I tell you of heavenly things ?
text2: We man cäcoj alak ri quinbij chrij ri cäcˈulmataj waral cho ruwächulew , ¿ a are ta cˈu lo cäcoj alak riˈ we quintzijon chrij ri cäcˈulmataj pa ri caj ? ― cächa che .

text: And no man hath ascended up to heaven , but he that came down from heaven , even the Son of man which is in heaven .
text2: Man cˈo tä jun winak pakalinak bi chilaˈ chicaj , xane xak xuwi ri kajinak lok chicaj . Are cˈu ri in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , ― cächa ri Jesús .

text: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness , even so must the Son of man be lifted up :
text2: Jas ri xbantaj pa ri juyub ri cätzˈinowic aretak ri ka mam Moisés xuyac ri jun cumätz re chˈichˈ bronce puwiˈ jun cheˈ chquiwäch ri winak , je cˈu riˈ cäban na chwe in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak . Quinyac na in chquiwäch ri winak .

text: That whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have eternal life .
text2: Je riˈ rech apachin ri cäcojon chwe in man cäsach tä u wäch , xane curik ri cˈaslemal ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic , ― xcha ri Jesús che ri tat Nicodemo .

text: For God so loved the world , that he gave his only begotten Son , that whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have everlasting life .
text2: Ri Dios cˈut sibalaj queraj ri winak cho ruwächulew chi xusipaj lok ru Cˈojol ri xak xuwi waˈ u Cˈojol cˈolic , rech apachin ri cäcojon che ri Areˈ man cäsach tä u wäch , xane curik ri cˈaslemal ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic .

text: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world ; but that the world through him might be saved .
text2: Ri Dios man xutak tä lok ru Cˈojol cho ruwächulew chukˈatic tzij pa qui wiˈ ri winak chi cˈäjisaxic qui wäch , xane che qui toˈic .

text: He that believeth on him is not condemned : but he that believeth not is condemned already , because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God .
text2: Jachin ri cäcojon che ru Cˈojol ri Dios , man cäkˈat tä tzij puwiˈ chi cäcˈäjisax u wäch . Jachin cˈu ri man cäcojon tä che , ya kˈatom chi tzij puwiˈ chi cäcˈäjisax u wäch rumal chi man cäcojon tä che ru Cˈojol ri Dios ri xak xuwi u Cˈojol waˈ cˈolic .

text: And this is the condemnation , that light is come into the world , and men loved darkness rather than light , because their deeds were evil .
text2: Ri man quecojon taj kˈatom chi tzij pa qui wiˈ chi cäcˈäjisax qui wäch rumal chi aretak ri sakil xpe cho ruwächulew , ri winak are utz xquil wi ri kˈekum rumal chi man utz taj ri tajin cäcaˈno .

text: For every one that doeth evil hateth the light , neither cometh to the light , lest his deeds should be reproved .
text2: Conojel ri cäcaˈn etzelal cäquetzelaj u wäch ri sakil . Man cäcaj tä cˈu quekeb cho ri sakil rumal chi man cäcaj taj chi cäkˈalajin ri etzelal ri tajin cäcaˈno .

text: But he that doeth truth cometh to the light , that his deeds may be made manifest , that they are wrought in God .
text2: Jachin cˈu tak ri cäcaˈn ri kas tzij , quekeb riˈ cho ri sakil rech cäkˈalajinic chi ronojel ri tajin cäcaˈno are waˈ ri craj ri Dios .

text: After these things came Jesus and his disciples into the land of Judaea ; and there he tarried with them , and baptized .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ ri Jesús xel bi chilaˈ , xeˈ pa Judea junam cucˈ ru tijoxelab . Naj cˈut xcanaj na chilaˈ cucˈ ri e areˈ , xuban cˈu kasnaˈ .

text: And John also was baptizing in Aenon near to Salim , because there was much water there : and they came , and were baptized .
text2: Ri tat Juan xukujeˈ tajin cuban kasnaˈ pa Enón , chunakaj ri Salim , jawijeˈ cˈo wi qˈuia joron . Xeopan ri winak rucˈ , xuban cˈu qui kasnaˈ .

text: For John was not yet cast into prison .
text2: Mäjaˈ cˈu coc ri tat Juan pa cheˈ aretak xbantaj waˈ .

text: Then there arose a question between some of John ' s disciples and the Jews about purifying .
text2: Te riˈ xchaptaj jun chˈoj chquixol ru tijoxelab ri tat Juan cucˈ jujun aj Israel chrij ri resaxic ri äwas chquij .

text: And they came unto John , and said unto him , Rabbi , he that was with thee beyond Jordan , to whom thou barest witness , behold , the same baptizeth , and all men come to him .
text2: Xeˈquibij cˈu che ri tat Juan : Ajtij , chilampe la chi ri Jun ri xcˈoji ucˈ la chrelbal kˈij che ri nimaˈ Jordán , ri Jun ri xkˈalajisaj la chkawäch , ri Areˈ tajin cuban kasnaˈ cämic , conojel cˈu ri winak tajin quebeˈ rucˈ , ― xecha che .

text: John answered and said , A man can receive nothing , except it be given him from heaven .
text2: Ri tat Juan xubij chque : Man cˈo tä jun winak cˈo jas cäcowin chubanic , we man yoˈm che rumal ri Dios .

text: Ye yourselves bear me witness , that I said , I am not the Christ , but that I am sent before him .
text2: Ri ix , kas xita riˈ jas ri xinbij , chi man in taj ri Cristo , xane xa in takom lok nabe chuwäch ri Areˈ .

text: He that hath the bride is the bridegroom : but the friend of the bridegroom , which standeth and heareth him , rejoiceth greatly because of the bridegroom ' s voice : this my joy therefore is fulfilled .
text2: Pa jun cˈulanem , ri cˈamowinak bi ri ali are ri ala . Are cˈu ri rachiˈl ri ala ri cˈo chilaˈ cutatabej ri ala cätzijonic , cäquicot cˈu rucˈ aretak cuto . Je cˈu riˈ ri in cämic sibalaj quinquicotic .

text: He must increase , but I must decrease .
text2: Ri Areˈ rajwaxic are cänimar na u kˈij , are cˈu ri in , rajwaxic chi nojim man nim tä chic quinil wi , ― xcha ri tat Juan chque ru tijoxelab .

text: He that cometh from above is above all : he that is of the earth is earthly , and speaketh of the earth : he that cometh from heaven is above all .
text2: Ri Jun ri cäpe chilaˈ chicaj are cˈo pa qui wiˈ conojel . Are cˈu ri jun ri xak ajuwächulew , xuwi cutzijoj ri cäbantaj waral cho ruwächulew . Are cˈu ri Jun ri cäpe chilaˈ chicaj are cˈo pa qui wiˈ conojel .

text: And what he hath seen and heard , that he testifieth ; and no man receiveth his testimony .
text2: Ri Areˈ cˈut , are cutzijoj ri rilom , ri u tom . Man cˈo tä cˈu jun cucojo jas ri cubij .

text: He that hath received his testimony hath set to his seal that God is true .
text2: Jachin cˈu ri cucojo , rucˈ waˈ cujiquiba u bixic chi ri Dios cubij ri kas tzij .

text: For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God : for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him .
text2: Ri Jun ri takom lok rumal ri Dios , cutzijoj ru Tzij ri Dios , rumal chi ri Dios man xak tä jubikˈ ri Espíritu rech Areˈ u yoˈm che .

text: The Father loveth the Son , and hath given all things into his hand .
text2: Ri Dios ka Tat lokˈ ru Cˈojol chuwäch , u yoˈm cˈu ronojel pu kˈab .

text: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life : and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life ; but the wrath of God abideth on him .
text2: Jachin ri cäcojon che ru Cˈojol ri Dios cˈo u cˈaslemal ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic . Jachin cˈu ri man craj taj cäcojon che ru Cˈojol ri Dios , man cˈo tä u cˈaslemal riˈ , xane ri nimalaj royowal ri Dios cäpe na puwiˈ , cäcˈäjisax cˈu na u wäch .

text: When therefore the Lord knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John ,
text2: Ri tataˈib fariseos xquetamaj chi ri Jesús e qˈuia na ru tijoxelab ri Areˈ , xukujeˈ e qˈuia na ri xban qui kasnaˈ rumal ri Areˈ chuwäch ri xban qui kasnaˈ rumal ri tat Juan .

text: ( Though Jesus himself baptized not , but his disciples , )
text2: Kas tzij cˈut , man are tä ri Jesús ri xbanow ri kasnaˈ , xane e are ru tijoxelab xebanowic .

text: He left Judaea , and departed again into Galilee .
text2: Aretak ri Jesús xuta waˈ , ri tajin cäbixic , xel bi pa Judea , xtzelej chic pa Galilea .

text: And he must needs go through Samaria .
text2: Pa ru tzelejic cˈut rajwaxic chi cocˈow pa tak ri juyub re Samaria .

text: Then cometh he to a city of Samaria , which is called Sychar , near to the parcel of ground that Jacob gave to his son Joseph .
text2: Xopan cˈu pa jun tinimit re Samaria , Sicar u biˈ , chunakaj ri ulew ri u yoˈm ri Jacob che rechbal ri José ru cˈojol .

text: Now Jacob ' s well was there . Jesus therefore , being wearied with his journey , sat thus on the well : and it was about the sixth hour .
text2: Chilaˈ cˈut cˈo wi ri cˈuaˈ ri cäbix “ ru cˈuaˈ ri Jacob ” che . Ri Jesús cosinak chic che ri binem , xtˈuyi chuchiˈ ri cˈuaˈ . Xa cˈu jubikˈ man curik ri niqˈuiaj kˈij .

text: There cometh a woman of Samaria to draw water : Jesus saith unto her , Give me to drink .
text2: E benak cˈu ru tijoxelab pa ri tinimit chulokˈic ri cäquitijo ,

text: ( For his disciples were gone away unto the city to buy meat . )
text2: aretak xopan jun ixok aj Samaria chuchiˈ ri cˈuaˈ chucˈamic u joron . Ri Jesús xubij che : Ya la jubikˈ nu joron , ― xcha che .

text: Then saith the woman of Samaria unto him , How is it that thou , being a Jew , askest drink of me , which am a woman of Samaria ? for the Jews have no dealings with the Samaritans .
text2: Man cäquichˈabej tä cˈu quib ri winak aj Israel cucˈ ri winak aj Samaria , rumal riˈ ri ixok xubij che ri Jesús : ¿ Jas che ri lal cätaˈ la joron la chwe in ? Ri lal cˈut , lal aj Israel . Ri in , in aj Samaria , ― xcha che .

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , If thou knewest the gift of God , and who it is that saith to thee , Give me to drink ; thou wouldest have asked of him , and he would have given thee living water .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij che : We ta etam la jas ri cusipaj ri Dios , xukujeˈ we ta etam la jachin ri in ri tajin quintaˈ nu joron che la , ri lal kas tzij cätaˈ la joron la riˈ chwe in , quinya cˈu na cˈaslic joron che la , ― xcha che .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , thou hast nothing to draw with , and the well is deep : from whence then hast thou that living water ?
text2: Ri ixok xubij che : Tat , man cˈo tä ne jas cäcoj la che resaxic ri joron , sibalaj naj cˈut kajinak ri cˈuaˈ . ¿ Jawijeˈ ta cˈu ne queˈcˈama wi la ri cˈaslic joron ri cäya la chwe ? ― cächa che .

text: Art thou greater than our father Jacob , which gave us the well , and drank thereof himself , and his children , and his cattle ?
text2: Ri Jacob ri ka mam ojer are yoˈwinak can waˈ we cˈuaˈ riˈ chke , ri xresaj wi u joron ri areˈ , ri ralcˈual , xukujeˈ ri xresaj wi qui joron ri rawaj . ¿ A lal ta cˈut ri nim na banic la chuwäch ri areˈ ? ― xcha ri ixok che ri Jesús .

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again :
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij che : Conojel ri cäquitij que we joron riˈ cächakiˈj chi na qui chiˈ jumul chic .

text: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst ; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life .
text2: Jachin cˈu ri cutij re ri joron ri quinya in , man cˈo tä chi na jumul cächakiˈj chi u chiˈ . Je riˈ , rumal chi ri joron ri quinya in che cäbulbut na pa ranimaˈ jeˈ jas jun u qˈuiyibal jaˈ ri cuya cˈaslemal ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic , ― xcha che .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , give me this water , that I thirst not , neither come hither to draw .
text2: Ri ixok xubij che : Tat , ya la we ri joron riˈ rech man cächakiˈj tä chi nu chiˈ , rech man rajwaxic tä chi quinpe chi waral chucˈamic nu joron , ― xcha che .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Go , call thy husband , and come hither .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij che : Oj baˈ la , jesiqˈuij la lok ri achajil la , cäpe chi cˈu na la waral , ― xcha che .

text: The woman answered and said , I have no husband . Jesus said unto her , Thou hast well said , I have no husband :
text2: Ri ixok xchˈawic , xubij : Man cˈo tä wachajil , ― xcha che . Xubij cˈu ri Jesús che : Tzij ri cäbij la chi man cˈo tä achajil la .

text: For thou hast had five husbands ; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband : in that saidst thou truly .
text2: E job cˈu ne ri achajil la e cˈolinak . Are cˈu ri jun ri cˈo ucˈ la cämic , man are tä kas achajil la . Kas tzij baˈ ri bim la , ― xcha ri Jesús che ri ixok .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , I perceive that thou art a prophet .
text2: Aretak xuta ri ixok waˈ , xubij che ri Jesús : Tat , quinwilo chi lal jun kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios .

text: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain ; and ye say , that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship .
text2: Ri ka mam uj ojer , ri uj aj Samaria , xquikˈijilaj ri Dios waral pa we juyub riˈ . Are cˈu ri alak , ri alak aj Israel , cäbij alak chi pa ri tinimit Jerusalén rajwaxic cäkˈijilax wi ri Dios , ― xcha che .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , believe me , the hour cometh , when ye shall neither in this mountain , nor yet at Jerusalem , worship the Father .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij : Nan , cojo baˈ la ri quinbij chi copan na ri kˈij aretak ri alak cäkˈijilaj na alak ri ka Tat , man rajwaxic tä cˈu na chi cäpe alak waral pa we juyub riˈ o chi queˈ alak pa Jerusalén chukˈijilaxic ri ka Tat , ― xcha che .

text: Ye worship ye know not what : we know what we worship : for salvation is of the Jews .
text2: Ri alak , alak aj Samaria man kas etam alak jachin ri cäkˈijilaj alak . Are cˈu ri uj ketam jachin ri cäkakˈijilaj , rumal chi ru tobanic ri Dios cäpetic cumal ri winak aj Israel .

text: But the hour cometh , and now is , when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth : for the Father seeketh such to worship him .
text2: Curik cˈu na ri kˈij , are cämic cˈut , aretak ri winak ri kas tzij cäquikˈijilaj ri ka Tat , kas cäquikˈijilaj na ri Areˈ rucˈ ru takanic ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu pa canimaˈ . Ri ka Tat cˈut , craj chi jeˈ cäban waˈ cumal ri winak ri quekˈijilan che .

text: God is a Spirit : and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth .
text2: Ri Dios are Espíritu , jachin cˈu tak ri quekˈijilan che , rajwaxic kas tzij cäquikˈijilaj na rucˈ ru takanic ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu pa canimaˈ .

text: The woman saith unto him , I know that Messias cometh , which is called Christ : when he is come , he will tell us all things .
text2: Ri ixok xubij che : Ri in wetam chi cäpe na ri Mesías ri xukujeˈ cäbix Cristo che . Aretak cäpe ri Areˈ , cukˈalajisaj na ronojel chkawäch , ― xcha che .

text: Jesus saith unto her , I that speak unto thee am he .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij che : In riˈ , ri tajin quintzijon ucˈ la , ― xcha che .

text: And upon this came his disciples , and marvelled that he talked with the woman : yet no man said , What seekest thou ? or , Why talkest thou with her ?
text2: Kas jeˈ tajin cubij waˈ ri Jesús aretak xeopan ru tijoxelab . Xquicajmaj cˈut chi tajin cätzijon rucˈ jun ixok . Man cˈo tä cˈu jun xucochˈo xutaˈ che ri Jesús jas ri craj ri ixok o jas ri tajin cubij che .

text: The woman then left her waterpot , and went her way into the city , and saith to the men ,
text2: Ri ixok cˈut xuya can ru kˈebal , xeˈ pa ri tinimit , xubij chque ri winak :

text: Come , see a man , which told me all things that ever I did : is not this the Christ ?
text2: Chixsajmpeˈ , jiliwila cˈu jun achi ri u bim chwe ronojel ri nu banom . ¿ A mat are waˈ ri Cristo ? ― xcha chque ri winak .

text: Then they went out of the city , and came unto him .
text2: Xebel cˈu bi ri winak pa ri tinimit , xebeˈ jelaˈ jawijeˈ cˈo wi ri Jesús .

text: In the mean while his disciples prayed him , saying , Master , eat .
text2: Are cˈu ri tijoxelab tajin cäquibij che ri Jesús : Ajtij , wok baˈ la , ― xecha che .

text: But he said unto them , I have meat to eat that ye know not of .
text2: Ri Jesús cˈut xubij chque : Ri in cˈo ri nu wa ri quintijo ri man iwetam tä ix jasach , ― xcha chque .

text: Therefore said the disciples one to another , Hath any man brought him ought to eat ?
text2: Ri tijoxelab xquichaplej u taˈic chbil tak quib , xquibij : ¿ A xa ta cˈu lo cˈo jachin xcˈamow lok ri cutijo ? ― xechaˈ .

text: Jesus saith unto them , My meat is to do the will of him that sent me , and to finish his work .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij chque : Ri nu wa are ru banic ru rayibal ri Jun ri xintakow lok , ru qˈuisic cˈut ru chaplem lok u banic .

text: Say not ye , There are yet four months , and then cometh harvest ? behold , I say unto you , Lift up your eyes , and look on the fields ; for they are white already to harvest .
text2: Ri ix quibij : “ Craj na quiejeb icˈ ri cosecha . ” Ri in cˈut quinbij chiwe : Chicaˈyej tak ri ticoˈn , e chakiˈj chi cˈut , e utz chic che ri cosecha .

text: And he that reapeth receiveth wages , and gathereth fruit unto life eternal : that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together .
text2: Ri cächacun pa ri cosecha , cäyiˈ na ri tojbal re . Are cˈu ri cosecha ri cuyaco are re cˈaslemal waˈ ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic , rech ri queticoˈnijic , xukujeˈ ri queyacowic , junam quequicotic .

text: And herein is that saying true , One soweth , and another reapeth .
text2: Kas tzij cˈut ri cäbixic : “ Jun winak cäticoˈnijic , are cˈu jun winak chic ri cäyacowic , ” ― cächaˈ .

text: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour : other men laboured , and ye are entered into their labours .
text2: Ri in xixintak bic rech quiyac u wäch ri ticoˈn ri man xirik tä cˈäx chutiquic . Juleˈ winak chic ri xechacunic , are cˈu ri ix xak xuwi quixquicot chuyaquic u wäch ri qui ticoˈn , ― xcha chque ru tijoxelab .

text: And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman , which testified , He told me all that ever I did .
text2: E qˈuia cˈu chque ri winak pa ri alaj tinimit riˈ re Samaria ri xecojon che ri Jesús rumal ri xuban ri ixok , xujiquiba cˈu u bixic chque : “ U bim chwe ronojel ri nu banom , ” ― xcha riˈ .

text: So when the Samaritans were come unto him , they besought him that he would tarry with them : and he abode there two days .
text2: Je riˈ chi aretak xeopan ri winak aj Samaria rucˈ ri Jesús , xquibochiˈj chi cäcanaj na can cucˈ . Xcanaj cˈu na can quieb kˈij cucˈ .

text: And many more believed because of his own word ;
text2: E qˈuia cˈu na ri xecojonic aretak xquita ri tzij ri xubij ri Jesús .

text: And said unto the woman , Now we believe , not because of thy saying : for we have heard him ourselves , and know that this is indeed the Christ , the Saviour of the world .
text2: Xquibij cˈu che ri ixok : Cämic cäkacojo , man xuwi tä rumal ri xabij at chke , xane rumal chi ka tom uj ri cubij . Ketam cˈut chi kas tzij are waˈ ri Cristo ri Toˈl Que ri winak cho ruwächulew , ― xecha che .

text: Now after two days he departed thence , and went into Galilee .
text2: Churox kˈij ri Jesús xel bi pa Samaria , xutakej ru be , xeˈ pa Galilea .

text: For Jesus himself testified , that a prophet hath no honour in his own country .
text2: Je riˈ , rumal chi jun kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios man nim tä quil wi ri areˈ pa ri kas u tinimit jeˈ jas ri xubij ri Jesús .

text: Then when he was come into Galilee , the Galilaeans received him , having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast : for they also went unto the feast .
text2: Aretak xopan pa Galilea ri winak chilaˈ utz u cˈulaxic xcaˈno . Ri e areˈ cˈut e petinak pa ri nimakˈij Pascua ri cäban pa ri tinimit Jerusalén , quilom cˈu ronojel ri u banom ri Areˈ chilaˈ pa ri nimakˈij .

text: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee , where he made the water wine . And there was a certain nobleman , whose son was sick at Capernaum .
text2: Te riˈ ri Jesús xeˈ chi jumul pa ri tinimit Caná pa Galilea jawijeˈ ri xuqˈuex wi ri joron pa vino . Cˈo cˈu jun tataˈ chilaˈ ri nim u banic pa ri tinimit Capernaum . Jun toˈl re ri nim takanel waˈ . Yawab cˈu ri u cˈojol .

text: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judaea into Galilee , he went unto him , and besought him that he would come down , and heal his son : for he was at the point of death .
text2: Aretak ri tataˈ riˈ xuto chi ri Jesús xpe pa Judea , xopan cˈu pa Galilea , xeˈ ri areˈ che rilic . Xutaˈ tokˈob che chi queˈ cho rachoch chucunaxic ri u cˈojol , ri xa jubikˈ man cäcämic .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Except ye see signs and wonders , ye will not believe .
text2: Ri Jesús cˈut xubij che : Ri alak man cäcojon tä alak we ta mat quil alak cajmabal , xukujeˈ etal , ― xcha ri Jesús .

text: The nobleman saith unto him , Sir , come down ere my child die .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri tataˈ ri nim u banic che : Tat , saˈj la chanim cho wachoch mäjaˈ cˈu cäcäm ri nu cˈojol , ― xcha che .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Go thy way ; thy son liveth . And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him , and he went his way .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús che : ¡ Oj la cho ja , cäcˈasi cˈu na ri cˈojol la ! ― xcha che . Xucoj cˈu ri tataˈ ri xbix che rumal ri Jesús , xeˈ cˈut .

text: And as he was now going down , his servants met him , and told him , saying , Thy son liveth .
text2: Aretak xa jubikˈ man copan ri tataˈ cho rachoch , xepe ri patänil tak re chucˈulaxic , xquibij cˈu che : ¡ Cˈasal ri cˈojol la ! ― xecha che .

text: Then inquired he of them the hour when he began to amend . And they said unto him , Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him .
text2: Ri tataˈ xutaˈ chque jas hora xuchap rutziric ri u cˈojol . Ri e areˈ xquibij che : Iwir pa ri nabe hora re ri benak kˈij xel ri kˈakˈ chrij , ― xecha che .

text: So the father knew that it was at the same hour , in the which Jesus said unto him , Thy son liveth : and himself believed , and his whole house .
text2: Ru tat ri ala xuchˈobo chi pa ri hora riˈ xubij ri Jesús che : “ Ri cˈojol la cäcˈasi na , ” ― xcha ri Jesús . Xcojon cˈu ri tataˈ che ri Jesús , xukujeˈ conojel ri e cˈo pa rachoch .

text: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did , when he was come out of Judaea into Galilee .
text2: Are waˈ ri ucab cajmabal etal ri xuban ri Jesús aretak xtzelej lok pa Judea , xopan cˈu pa Galilea .

text: After this there was a feast of the Jews ; and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ ri winak aj Israel xcaˈn jun qui nimakˈij chic pa Jerusalén . Ri Jesús cˈut xeˈ chi na jumul jelaˈ .

text: Now there is at Jerusalem by the sheep market a pool , which is called in the Hebrew tongue Bethesda , having five porches .
text2: Pa ri tinimit Jerusalén chunakaj ri uchibe ri cäbix “ Uchibe ri Queboc wi Chij ” che , cˈo jun atinibal ri cäbix Betesda che ru biˈ pa ri chˈabal hebreo . E cˈo job rakan ja chrij .

text: In these lay a great multitude of impotent folk , of blind , halt , withered , waiting for the moving of the water .
text2: Pa tak ri rakan ja riˈ e kˈoyokˈoj qˈuia yawabib . E cˈo moyab , chˈocojib , xukujeˈ winak ri cäminak qui cuerpo . Tajin cäqueyej chi cäslab ri joron .

text: For an angel went down at a certain season into the pool , and troubled the water : whosoever then first after the troubling of the water stepped in was made whole of whatsoever disease he had .
text2: Jun tak paˈ cˈut cäkaj lok jun ángel pa ri atinibal , cuslabisaj cˈu ri joron . Jachin ri nabe cäkaj pa ri joron aretak cäslabtaj can rumal ri ángel cäcunataj che apachique u wäch yabil ri cˈo che .

text: And a certain man was there , which had an infirmity thirty and eight years .
text2: Cˈo cˈu jun achi chilaˈ ri xqueˈ juwinak lajuj rucˈ wajxakib junab yawab .

text: When Jesus saw him lie , and knew that he had been now a long time in that case , he saith unto him , Wilt thou be made whole ?
text2: Aretak ri Jesús xrilo kˈoyol cho ri ulew , xukujeˈ xretamaj chi qˈuia junab chic yawab , xutaˈ che : ¿ A caj la cutzir la ? ― xcha che .

text: The impotent man answered him , Sir , I have no man , when the water is troubled , to put me into the pool : but while I am coming , another steppeth down before me .
text2: Ri yawab xchˈawic , xubij che : Tat , man cˈo tä jun quinkasan pa ri atinibal aretak cäslab ri joron . Amakˈel aretak cwaj quinkajic , jun chic cäkaj bi nabe chnuwäch in , ― xcha che .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Rise , take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij che : ¡ Walij baˈ la , yaca la bi ri soc la , bin yaˈ la ! ― xcha ri Jesús che .

text: And immediately the man was made whole , and took up his bed , and walked : and on the same day was the sabbath .
text2: Chanim xutzir ri achi . Xuyac bi ru soc , xuchaplej binem . Are cˈu kˈij re uxlanem aretak xbantaj waˈ .

text: The Jews therefore said unto him that was cured , It is the sabbath day : it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed .
text2: Ri winak aj Israel xquibij che ri achi ri xutziric : Cämic cˈut are kˈij re uxlanem . Man yaˈtal taj cawekaj bi ra soc , ― xecha che .

text: He answered them , He that made me whole , the same said unto me , Take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Ri achi xchˈawic , xubij chque : Ri jun ri xincunanic xubij chwe : “ ¡ Yaca la bi ri soc la , bin yaˈ la ! ” ― xcha riˈ chwe , ― xcha ri achi chque ri winak .

text: Then asked they him , What man is that which said unto thee , Take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: Ri e areˈ xquitaˈ che , xquibij : ¿ Jachin riˈ ri xbin chawe : “ ¡ Yaca la bi ri soc la , bin yaˈ la ! ” ? ― xecha che .

text: And he that was healed wist not who it was : for Jesus had conveyed himself away , a multitude being in that place .
text2: Are cˈu ri achi man xuchˈob tä chi u wäch jachin ri xcunanic rumal chi ri Jesús xsach chquixol ri qˈuialaj winak ri e cˈo chilaˈ .

text: Afterward Jesus findeth him in the temple , and said unto him , Behold , thou art made whole : sin no more , lest a worse thing come unto thee .
text2: Te riˈ ri Jesús xurik ri achi pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , xubij che : ¡ Chilampe la ! ― xchaˈ . Cämic ri lal utz chic . Mämacun chi baˈ la , mäpe chi ne jun cˈäx chic chij la ri más nim na , ― xcha ri Jesús che .

text: The man departed , and told the Jews that it was Jesus , which had made him whole .
text2: Xeˈ cˈu ri achi , xubij chque ri winak aj Israel chi ri xcunanic are ri Jesús .

text: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus , and sought to slay him , because he had done these things on the sabbath day .
text2: Rumal riˈ ri winak aj Israel xquitzucuj u chapic ri Jesús rech cäquicämisaj , rumal chi cuban tak waˈ we riˈ pa ri kˈij re uxlanem .

text: But Jesus answered them , My Father worketh hitherto , and I work .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque : Ri nu Tat amakˈel chacuninak petinak lok . Rajwaxic cˈut chi ri in xukujeˈ quinchacunic , ― xcha chque .

text: Therefore the Jews sought the more to kill him , because he not only had broken the sabbath , but said also that God was his Father , making himself equal with God .
text2: Rumal riˈ ri winak aj Israel xa sibalaj xpe na coyowal , xcaj xquicämisaj ri Jesús rumal chi man nim tä xril wi ri cubij ri Pixab chrij ri kˈij re uxlanem . Man xuwi tä cˈu riˈ , xane xukujeˈ xujunamaj rib rucˈ ri Dios aretak xubij chi ri Dios Are ru Tat .

text: Then answered Jesus and said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , The Son can do nothing of himself , but what he seeth the Father do : for what things soever he doeth , these also doeth the Son likewise .
text2: Te riˈ ri Jesús xubij chque : Kas tzij quinbij chech alak chi ri u Cˈojol ri Dios man cäcowin taj cˈo jas cubano xak pa re wi . Xuwi cubano jachique ri cärilo chi cuban ri u Tat . Ronojel ri cuban ri u Tat , cuban cˈu ri u Cˈojol xukujeˈ .

text: For the Father loveth the Son , and sheweth him all things that himself doeth : and he will shew him greater works than these , that ye may marvel .
text2: Ri ka Tat sibalaj lokˈ ri u Cˈojol chuwäch , cucˈut cˈu chuwäch jachique ri cuban ri Areˈ . Cucˈut cˈu na nimak tak cajmabal chuwäch ru Cˈojol , ri sibalaj cäcajmaj na alak .

text: For as the Father raiseth up the dead , and quickeneth them ; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will .
text2: Jeˈ jas ri ka Tat queucˈastajisaj ri cäminakib , cuya cˈu qui cˈaslemal , je riˈ xukujeˈ ri u Cˈojol cuya cˈaslemal chque jachin tak ri craj cuya wi .

text: For the Father judgeth no man , but hath committed all judgment unto the Son :
text2: Ri ka Tat man cukˈat tä tzij puwiˈ jachin jun , xane u yoˈm ronojel u wäch takanic pu kˈab ru Cˈojol rech ri Areˈ cäkˈatow tzij .

text: That all men should honour the Son , even as they honour the Father . He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him .
text2: Je riˈ rech conojel ri winak cäquiya u kˈij ri u Cˈojol ri Dios junam jas ri cäcaˈn chuyaˈic u kˈij ri ka Tat . Jachin ri man cuya tä u kˈij ri u Cˈojol ri Dios , man cuya tä riˈ u kˈij ri ka Tat ri xutak lok ri Areˈ .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that heareth my word , and believeth on him that sent me , hath everlasting life , and shall not come into condemnation ; but is passed from death unto life .
text2: Kas tzij quinbij chech alak chi jachin ri cutatabej ri nu tzij , cäcojon cˈu che ri Dios ri xintakow lok , curik na riˈ ri cˈaslemal ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic . Man cäkˈat tä cˈu tzij puwiˈ chi cäcˈäjisax u wäch rumal chi elinak chic pa ri cämical re ri ojer cˈaslemal , cˈo chic ri kas u cˈaslemal .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The hour is coming , and now is , when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God : and they that hear shall live .
text2: Kas tzij quinbij chech alak chi cäpe na ri kˈij , cämic cˈut ri kˈij riˈ aretak ri cäminakib cäquita na chi quinchˈawic , in riˈ ri u Cˈojol ri Dios . Jachin tak ri cäquinimaj ri quinbij quecˈasi na .

text: For as the Father hath life in himself ; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself ;
text2: Ri ka Tat cˈo cuinem pu kˈab pa re wi chuyaˈic cˈaslemal , xukujeˈ u yoˈm pa nu kˈab in , in riˈ ri u Cˈojol , chi quincowinic quinya cˈaslemal .

text: And hath given him authority to execute judgment also , because he is the Son of man .
text2: Xukujeˈ u yoˈm takanic pa nu kˈab rech quinkˈat tzij rumal chi ri in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak .

text: Marvel not at this : for the hour is coming , in the which all that are in the graves shall hear his voice ,
text2: Mäcajmaj alak waˈ rumal chi copan na ri kˈij aretak conojel ri cäminakib cäquita na chi quinchˈawic .

text: And shall come forth ; they that have done good , unto the resurrection of life ; and they that have done evil , unto the resurrection of damnation .
text2: Quebel na lok pa tak ri mukubal . Ri caˈnom ri utzil quecˈastajic rech cäcˈoji na qui cˈaslemal . Are cˈu ri caˈnom ri man utz taj quecˈastajic rech cäkˈat na tzij pa qui wiˈ chi cäcˈäjisax na qui wäch .

text: I can of mine own self do nothing : as I hear , I judge : and my judgment is just ; because I seek not mine own will , but the will of the Father which hath sent me .
text2: Ri in man cˈo tä jas quincowin chubanic xak pa we wi . Ri in quinkˈat tzij xa jas ri quintak wi . Jicom cˈu quinban in chukˈatic tzij . Man are tä cˈu quinban xa jas ri cwaj in , xane are quinban jas ri craj ri nu Tat ri xintakow lok .

text: If I bear witness of myself , my witness is not true .
text2: We ri in quinkˈalajisaj ri kas tzij chwij chbil wib , man cˈo tä u patän riˈ ri quinbij .

text: There is another that beareth witness of me ; and I know that the witness which he witnesseth of me is true .
text2: Cˈo cˈu Jun chic ri cˈo jas cukˈalajisaj chwij , wetam cˈut chi ri cubij ri Areˈ chwij are kas tzij .

text: Ye sent unto John , and he bare witness unto the truth .
text2: Ri alak xtak alak u taˈic che ri tat Juan . Ri xubij cˈu ri areˈ chech alak are kas tzij .

text: But I receive not testimony from man : but these things I say , that ye might be saved .
text2: Ri in cˈut man are tä cuˈl nu cˈux chrij ri cukˈalajisaj jun winak chwij . Xuwi quinbij waˈ rech ri alak cärik na alak ru tobanic ri Dios .

text: He was a burning and a shining light : and ye were willing for a season to rejoice in his light .
text2: Ri tat Juan are junam rucˈ jun chäj o jun candela ri cäcˈatic , ri cäjuluwic . Ri alak cˈut xquicot alak quieb oxib kˈij rucˈ ri sakil riˈ .

text: But I have greater witness than that of John : for the works which the Father hath given me to finish , the same works that I do , bear witness of me , that the Father hath sent me .
text2: Cˈo cˈu na ri cäcˈutuwic chi kas tzij ri quinbij . Are utz na waˈ chuwäch ri xukˈalajisaj ri tat Juan chwij . Ri tajin quinbano , are waˈ ri xinutak ri nu Tat chubanic . Are cˈu waˈ ri cäcˈutuwic chi kas tzij are ri nu Tat ri in takowinak lok .

text: And the Father himself , which hath sent me , hath borne witness of me . Ye have neither heard his voice at any time , nor seen his shape .
text2: Xukujeˈ ri nu Tat ri xintakow lok cukˈalajisaj ri kas tzij chwij , pune ta ne ri alak man tom tä alak ri Areˈ cächˈawic , man ilom tä cˈu alak u wäch .

text: And ye have not his word abiding in you : for whom he hath sent , him ye believe not .
text2: Man kajinak tä cˈu ru Tzij ri Dios pa animaˈ alak rumal chi man cäcojon tä alak che ri Jun ri takom lok rumal ri ka Tat .

text: Search the scriptures ; for in them ye think ye have eternal life : and they are they which testify of me .
text2: Ri alak naˈl cäsiqˈuij alak u wäch ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic rumal chi cächomaj alak chi chilaˈ cärik wi alak ri cäyoˈw ri cˈaslemal ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic . Are cˈu ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic ri cukˈalajisaj ri kas tzij chwij in .

text: And ye will not come to me , that ye might have life .
text2: Pune je riˈ , ri alak man caj tä alak cäpe alak wucˈ rech cärik alak we cˈaslemal riˈ ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic .

text: I receive not honour from men .
text2: Ri in man cwaj taj chi cäyiˈ nu kˈij cumal ri winak .

text: But I know you , that ye have not the love of God in you .
text2: Wetam cˈu in ri animaˈ alak , wetam chi man caj tä alak ri Dios .

text: I am come in my Father ' s name , and ye receive me not : if another shall come in his own name , him ye will receive .
text2: Ri in , in petinak chuqˈuexwäch ri nu Tat . Ri alak cˈut man xincˈulaj tä alak . Are cˈu we ta cäpe jachin jun chic xak pa re wi , ¡ are ri areˈ cäcˈulaj na alak !

text: How can ye believe , which receive honour one of another , and seek not the honour that cometh from God only ?
text2: ¿ A cäcowin lo alak riˈ cäcojon alak chwe we xa cätzucuj alak u yaˈic kˈij alak chbil tak ib alak , man are tä cätzucuj alak chi cäyiˈ kˈij alak rumal ri Dios ri xak xuwi Dios waˈ cˈolic ?

text: Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father : there is one that accuseth you , even Moses , in whom ye trust .
text2: Mächomaj alak chi ri in quinchap u bixic ri man utz taj chij alak cho ri nu Tat . Ri cäbin na waˈ chij alak are ri ka mam Moisés , ri cuˈbam cˈux alak chrij .

text: For had ye believed Moses , ye would have believed me : for he wrote of me .
text2: We ta ri alak kas xcojon alak che ri xubij ri ka mam Moisés , cäcojon ta cˈu alak riˈ chwe in rumal chi ri ka mam Moisés cˈo ri u tzˈibam chwij in .

text: But if ye believe not his writings , how shall ye believe my words ?
text2: We cˈu man xcojon alak che ri xutzˈibaj ri areˈ , ¿ jas ta cˈu lo cäban alak chucojic ri quinbij in ? ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: After these things Jesus went over the sea of Galilee , which is the sea of Tiberias .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ ri Jesús xkˈax chˈäkäp che ri mar ri cäbix “ Mar re Galilea ” che , ri xukujeˈ cäcoj “ Mar re Tiberias ” che ru biˈ .

text: And a great multitude followed him , because they saw his miracles which he did on them that were diseased .
text2: E qˈuia winak cˈut xeteri bi chrij ri Jesús rumal chi quilom ri cajmabal tak etal ri xubano aretak xeucunaj tak ri yawabib .

text: And Jesus went up into a mountain , and there he sat with his disciples .
text2: Te riˈ xpaki ri Jesús puwiˈ jun juyub , chilaˈ cˈut xtˈuyi wi junam cucˈ ru tijoxelab .

text: And the passover , a feast of the Jews , was nigh .
text2: Xa cˈu jubikˈ craj man curik ri nimakˈij ri cäbix “ Pascua ” che , jun chque ri qui nimakˈij ri winak aj Israel .

text: When Jesus then lifted up his eyes , and saw a great company come unto him , he saith unto Philip , Whence shall we buy bread , that these may eat ?
text2: Aretak ri Jesús xeril ri qˈuialaj winak ri e benak rucˈ , xubij che ri tat Felipe : ¿ Jawijeˈ ta ne quekalokˈ wi ri wa ri cäkaya chque ri qˈuialaj winak riˈ ? ― xcha che .

text: And this he said to prove him : for he himself knew what he would do .
text2: Xubij waˈ ri Jesús xa rech cärilo jas cubij ri tat Felipe . Kas retam cˈu ri Areˈ jas ri cuban na .

text: Philip answered him , Two hundred pennyworth of bread is not sufficient for them , that every one of them may take a little .
text2: Xchˈaw cˈu ri tat Felipe , xubij : Quieb cientos quetzales caxlan wa man cuban tä riˈ rech cˈo ju tak bikˈ que conojel chquijujunal , ― xcha che .

text: One of his disciples , Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother , saith unto him ,
text2: Are cˈu ri tat Andrés , ratz ri tat Simón Pedro , jun chque ru tijoxelab ri Jesús , xubij che :

text: There is a lad here , which hath five barley loaves , and two small fishes : but what are they among so many ?
text2: Waral cˈo wi jun ala rucˈam job caxlan wa re cebada rucˈ quieb cär . ¿ Jas ta cˈu lo u patän waˈ che qui tzukic ri qˈuialaj winak ri e cˈolic ? ― xcha che .

text: And Jesus said , Make the men sit down . Now there was much grass in the place . So the men sat down , in number about five thousand .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque ru tijoxelab : Chibij chque conojel ri winak chi quetˈuyiˈc , ― xcha chque . Sibalaj qˈuia cˈu ri räx kˈayes cˈo cho ri juyub riˈ , xetˈuyi cˈut . Craj e cˈo job mil achijab .

text: And Jesus took the loaves ; and when he had given thanks , he distributed to the disciples , and the disciples to them that were set down ; and likewise of the fishes as much as they would .
text2: Te riˈ ri Jesús xeucˈam ri caxlan wa . Aretak xetewchitaj waˈ rumal , xeuya chque ru tijoxelab , ri tijoxelab chic xequijach waˈ chquiwäch conojel ri winak ri e tˈuyutˈoj . Xukujeˈ jeˈ xuban chque ri cär , xeuya chque jampaˈ ri xcaj .

text: When they were filled , he said unto his disciples , Gather up the fragments that remain , that nothing be lost .
text2: Aretak e nojinak chic , ri Jesús xubij chque ru tijoxelab : Cheiyaca ri chˈäkatak ri xecanaj canok rech man xak tä quebeˈ pa mes , ― xcha chque .

text: Therefore they gathered them together , and filled twelve baskets with the fragments of the five barley loaves , which remained over and above unto them that had eaten .
text2: Xequiyac cˈut , xequinojisaj cablajuj chicäch cucˈ ri chˈäkatak ri xecanaj can chque ri job caxlan wa re cebada .

text: Then those men , when they had seen the miracle that Jesus did , said , This is of a truth that prophet that should come into the world .
text2: Ri winak , aretak xquil we cajmabal etal riˈ ri xuban ri Jesús , xquibij : Kas tzij are waˈ ri kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri cäbixic chi cäpe na cho ruwächulew , ― xecha riˈ .

text: When Jesus therefore perceived that they would come and take him by force , to make him a king , he departed again into a mountain himself alone .
text2: Ri Jesús cˈut xrilo chi cäcaj cäquicoj qui chukˈab chucˈamic bic rech cäquicoj che nim takanel pa qui wiˈ , rumal cˈu riˈ xa xel bi chquiwäch , xeˈ chi jumul puwiˈ ri juyub rech cäcˈoji chilaˈ u tuquiel .

text: And when even was now come , his disciples went down unto the sea ,
text2: Aretak chakˈab chic , ru tijoxelab ri Jesús xekaj bi chuchiˈ ri mar .

text: And entered into a ship , and went over the sea toward Capernaum . And it was now dark , and Jesus was not come to them .
text2: Xeboc cˈu pa jun barco , xquichaplej binem puwiˈ ri mar rech quekˈax pa Capernaum . Sibalaj kˈekum chic , ri Jesús cˈut mäjaˈ cätzelej lok pa ri juyub .

text: And the sea arose by reason of a great wind that blew .
text2: Xak teˈtalic xpe jun nimalaj quiäkikˈ . Xewalij cˈu nimak tak uwojaˈ puwiˈ ri mar rumal .

text: So when they had rowed about five and twenty or thirty furlongs , they see Jesus walking on the sea , and drawing nigh unto the ship : and they were afraid .
text2: Aretak qui binibem chi job o wakib kilómetros , xquil ri Jesús petinak tajin cäbin puwiˈ ri jaˈ . Nakaj chic cˈo wi che ri barco , xquixej cˈu quib che .

text: But he saith unto them , It is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Are cˈu ri Jesús xubij chque : ¡ In riˈ , mixej baˈ iwib ! ― xcha riˈ chque .

text: Then they willingly received him into the ship : and immediately the ship was at the land whither they went .
text2: Te riˈ ri e areˈ xequicotic , xquibij che ri Jesús chi cäpaki cucˈ pa ri barco . Chanim cˈut xeopan pa ri tinimit jawijeˈ ri benam wi que .

text: The day following , when the people which stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was none other boat there , save that one whereinto his disciples were entered , and that Jesus went not with his disciples into the boat , but that his disciples were gone away alone ;
text2: Chucab kˈij ri winak ri xecanaj can chˈäkäp che ri mar xquilo chi ri tijoxelab xebeˈ pa ri jun barco ri xuwi barco waˈ cˈo chilaˈ , man xeˈ tä cˈu ri Jesús cucˈ .

text: ( Howbeit there came other boats from Tiberias nigh unto the place where they did eat bread , after that the Lord had given thanks : )
text2: Xurika cˈut chi xeopan niqˈuiaj barcos chic ri qui petic pa ri tinimit Tiberias . Xeopan chilaˈ chunakaj ri uwosak jawijeˈ ri winak xquitij wi ri caxlan wa aretak xmaltioxitaj waˈ rumal ri Kajaw Jesús .

text: When the people therefore saw that Jesus was not there , neither his disciples , they also took shipping , and came to Capernaum , seeking for Jesus .
text2: Je riˈ chi ri winak aretak xquilo chi man cˈo tä chi ri Jesús chilaˈ , xukujeˈ chi man e cˈo tä chi ru tijoxelab , xeboc pa tak ri barcos , xebeˈ cˈu pa ri tinimit Capernaum chutzucuxic ri Jesús .

text: And when they had found him on the other side of the sea , they said unto him , Rabbi , when camest thou hither ?
text2: Aretak ri winak xeopan chˈäkäp che ri mar , xquirik ri Jesús , xquitaˈ cˈu che , xquibij : Ajtij , ¿ jampaˈ xul la waral ? ― xecha che .

text: Jesus answered them and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Ye seek me , not because ye saw the miracles , but because ye did eat of the loaves , and were filled .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque : Kas tzij ri quinbij chech alak chi ri alak quintzucuj alak xa rumal chi xwiˈ alak , xnoj cˈu alak . Man quintzucuj tä alak rumal chi cächˈob alak u beyal ri cajmabal tak etal ri quinbano .

text: Labour not for the meat which perisheth , but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life , which the Son of man shall give unto you : for him hath God the Father sealed .
text2: Moc il alak chutzucuxic ri wa ri xa cäsach u wäch , xane are rajwaxic chi coc il alak chutzucuxic ri wa ri man cäsach tä u wäch , ri cuya chech alak ri kas cˈaslemal ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic . Are waˈ ri wa ri quinya na in chech alak , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak . Rumal waˈ u cˈutum ri Dios ka Tat chi rucˈ Areˈ in petinak wi , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: Then said they unto him , What shall we do , that we might work the works of God ?
text2: Te riˈ ri winak xquitaˈ che ri Jesús , xquibij : ¿ Jas cˈu riˈ ri rajwaxic cäkaˈno rech cujcowinic cäkaˈno jachique ri craj ri Dios ? ― xecha che .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , This is the work of God , that ye believe on him whom he hath sent .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij chque : Ri craj ri Dios chi cäban alak are laˈ chi cäcojon alak che ri Jun ri u takom lok , ― xcha chque .

text: They said therefore unto him , What sign shewest thou then , that we may see , and believe thee ? what dost thou work ?
text2: Xquitaˈ chi che ri Jesús , xquibij che : ¿ Jas u wäch etal cäban la chkawäch rech cäkilo , cujcojon cˈu che la ? ¿ Jas ri cäcowin la chubanic ? ― quecha che .

text: Our fathers did eat manna in the desert ; as it is written , He gave them bread from heaven to eat .
text2: Ri ka nan ka tat ojer xquitij ri maná pa ri juyub ri cätzˈinowic , jeˈ jas ri cubij ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic : “ Ri Dios xuya chutijic ri qui wa ri xpe chilaˈ chicaj , ” ― xecha che ri Jesús .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Moses gave you not that bread from heaven ; but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven .
text2: Xchˈaw cˈu ri Jesús , xubij chque : Kas tzij ri quinbij chech alak chi man are tä ri ka mam Moisés ri xyoˈw ri wa chque ri cäpe chilaˈ chicaj , xane are ri nu Tat ri cäyoˈw ri kas wa ri cäpe chilaˈ chicaj .

text: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven , and giveth life unto the world .
text2: Ri wa ri cuya ri Dios are waˈ ri kajinak lok chicaj , ri cuya ri kas cˈaslemal chque conojel winak , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: Then said they unto him , Lord , evermore give us this bread .
text2: Xquibij cˈu che ri Jesús : Tat , ya la ke ri wa riˈ amakˈel ronojel kˈij , ― xecha che .

text: And Jesus said unto them , I am the bread of life : he that cometh to me shall never hunger ; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij chque : In riˈ ri wa ri cuya ri kas cˈaslemal . Jachin ri cäpe wucˈ , man cˈo tä jumul ri cänum chic . Jachin ri cäcojon chwe man cˈo tä jumul ri cächakiˈj chi u chiˈ .

text: But I said unto you , That ye also have seen me , and believe not .
text2: Nu bim chi cˈu chech alak chi ri alak man cäcojon tä alak chwe pune ilom alak nu wäch .

text: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me ; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out .
text2: Conojel ri queyiˈ chwe rumal ri nu tat quepe na wucˈ in . Apachin cˈu ri quepe wucˈ man queintzelejisaj tä bic .

text: For I came down from heaven , not to do mine own will , but the will of him that sent me .
text2: Ri in cˈut man xinpe tä chilaˈ chicaj xa chubanic jachique ri cwaj in , xane chubanic ru rayibal ri xintakow lok .

text: And this is the Father ' s will which hath sent me , that of all which he hath given me I should lose nothing , but should raise it up again at the last day .
text2: Ri u rayibal ri nu Tat ri xintakow lok are laˈ chi man cˈo tä jun chque ri xeuya chwe ri quintzako , xane chi queincˈastajisaj na chquixol ri cäminakib pa ri qˈuisbal kˈij .

text: And this is the will of him that sent me , that every one which seeth the Son , and believeth on him , may have everlasting life : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Ri u rayibal ri xintakow lok are laˈ chi conojel ri cäquil nu wäch in , in riˈ ri u Cˈojol ri Dios , quecojon cˈu chwe , cäquirik ri cˈaslemal ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic . Queincˈastajisaj cˈu na in chquixol ri cäminakib pa ri qˈuisbal kˈij , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: The Jews then murmured at him , because he said , I am the bread which came down from heaven .
text2: Ri winak aj Israel , aretak xquita waˈ we tzij riˈ , xquichap u bixic cˈäx tak tzij chrij ri Jesús rumal ri xubij : “ In riˈ ri wa ri cäpe chilaˈ chicaj , ” ― xcha chque .

text: And they said , Is not this Jesus , the son of Joseph , whose father and mother we know ? how is it then that he saith , I came down from heaven ?
text2: Xquibij cˈut : ¿ A mat are waˈ ri Jesús ru cˈojol ri tat José ? Ri uj ketam qui wäch ru nan u tat . ¿ Jas lo waˈ ri cubij chi petinak chilaˈ chicaj ? ― xecha riˈ .

text: Jesus therefore answered and said unto them , Murmur not among yourselves .
text2: Are cˈu ri Jesús xubij chque : ¡ Tanal alak che ri yokˈonic ! ― cächaˈ .

text: No man can come to me , except the Father which hath sent me draw him : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Man cˈo tä jun ri cuyaˈ cäpe wucˈ in we ta mat cäcˈam lok rumal ri nu Tat ri xintakow lok . Ri in cˈut quincˈastajisaj na chquixol ri cäminakib pa ri qˈuisbal kˈij , ― cächaˈ .

text: It is written in the prophets , And they shall be all taught of God . Every man therefore that hath heard , and hath learned of the Father , cometh unto me .
text2: Cubij pa tak ri wuj ri xquitzˈibaj ri kˈalajisal tak re ru Lokˈ Pixab ojer : “ Ri Dios cuya na tijonic chque conojel , ” ― cächa riˈ . Rumal riˈ conojel ri cäquitatabej ri cubij ri ka Tat , cˈo cˈu ri cäquetamaj na rucˈ , quepe na ri e areˈ wucˈ in , ― cächa chque .

text: Not that any man hath seen the Father , save he which is of God , he hath seen the Father .
text2: Are kas tzij chi man cˈo tä jun winak ilowinak u wäch ri ka Tat . Ri Jun ri ilowinak u wäch are xak xuwi ri petinak rucˈ ri Dios , ― cächaˈ .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me hath everlasting life .
text2: Kas tzij ri quinbij chech alak chi jachin ri cäcojon chwe in cˈo na ru cˈaslemal ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic .

text: I am that bread of life .
text2: In riˈ ri wa ri kas cuya cˈaslemal , ― cächa chque .

text: Your fathers did eat manna in the wilderness , and are dead .
text2: Ri nan tat alak ojer xquitij ri wa ri cäbix “ maná ” che pa ri juyub ri cätzˈinowic , conojel cˈut xecämic .

text: This is the bread which cometh down from heaven , that a man may eat thereof , and not die .
text2: Are cˈu ri in tajin quintzijoj chech alak jas riˈ ri kas wa ri petinak chilaˈ chicaj . Jachin cˈu ri cutij re we wa riˈ , man cäcäm tä riˈ , ― cächaˈ .

text: I am the living bread which came down from heaven : if any man eat of this bread , he shall live for ever : and the bread that I will give is my flesh , which I will give for the life of the world .
text2: In cˈu riˈ ri cˈaslic wa , ri kajinak lok chicaj . Jachin ri cutij re we wa riˈ , cäcˈasi na pa tak ri kˈij ri junab ri quepetic . Ri wa ri quinya in are ri nu cuerpo . Quinya waˈ rech cˈo ri qui cˈaslemal conojel winak cho ruwächulew , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: The Jews therefore strove among themselves , saying , How can this man give us his flesh to eat ?
text2: Ri winak aj Israel xquichaplej u tzijobexic quib chquixol , xquibij : ¿ Jas ta cˈu lo cuban we achi riˈ chuyaˈic ru tijal chke pa tijic ? ― xechaˈ .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except ye eat the flesh of the Son of man , and drink his blood , ye have no life in you .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij chque : Kas tzij ri quinbij chech alak chi we ri alak man cätij tä alak ri nu cuerpo , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , man cätij tä alak ri nu quiqˈuel , te cˈu riˈ man cäcˈoji tä na ri cˈaslemal alak riˈ .

text: Whoso eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , hath eternal life ; and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Jachin ri cutij ri nu cuerpo xukujeˈ cutij ri nu quiqˈuel , cˈo cˈu u cˈaslemal ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic . Ri in cˈut quincˈastajisaj na chquixol ri cäminakib pa ri qˈuisbal kˈij .

text: For my flesh is meat indeed , and my blood is drink indeed .
text2: Ri nu cuerpo cˈut are ri kas wa , ri nu quiqˈuel are kas jeˈ jas ri vino ri cätijowic .

text: He that eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , dwelleth in me , and I in him .
text2: Jachin ri cutij ri nu cuerpo , xukujeˈ cutij ri nu quiqˈuel kas cäcˈoji ri areˈ wucˈ in , ri in xukujeˈ kas quincˈoji rucˈ areˈ .

text: As the living Father hath sent me , and I live by the Father : so he that eateth me , even he shall live by me .
text2: Ri nu Tat ri xintakow lok cˈo u cˈaslemal . Ri in xukujeˈ in cˈasal rumal ri Areˈ . Je riˈ xukujeˈ jachin ri cutzuk rib chwe in , cäcˈasi na wumal in .

text: This is that bread which came down from heaven : not as your fathers did eat manna , and are dead : he that eateth of this bread shall live for ever .
