text2: Are tajin quintzijon chrij ri wa ri petinak chilaˈ chicaj . We wa riˈ man junam tä rucˈ ri maná ri xquitij ri nan tat alak ojer , xecäm cˈu ri e areˈ . Are cˈu ri cutij re we wa riˈ cäcˈasi na pa tak ri kˈij ri junab ri quepetic , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ri winak aj Israel .

text: These things said he in the synagogue , as he taught in Capernaum .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij waˈ we tzij riˈ chque ri winak ri qui mulim quib pa ri rachoch Dios pa Capernaum che qui tijoxic .

text: Many therefore of his disciples , when they had heard this , said , This is an hard saying ; who can hear it ?
text2: Aretak xquita waˈ we tijonic riˈ , e qˈuia chque ri winak ri e cˈo rucˈ xquibij : Sibalaj cˈäx waˈ ri tzij ri xubij . ¿ Jachin ta lo ri cäcowinic cutatabej ? ― xechaˈ .

text: When Jesus knew in himself that his disciples murmured at it , he said unto them , Doth this offend you ?
text2: Ri Jesús cˈut xretamaj chi cˈäx tajin quechˈaw chrij rumal ri tzij ri xubij , xutaˈ cˈu chque : ¿ A tzel cäta alak ri xinbij ? ― xcha chque .

text: What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before ?
text2: ¿ Jas cˈu ri cäcˈulmataj riˈ we ta quinil alak in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , quintzelejic quinpaki cˈu chicaj jawijeˈ ri in cˈo wi nabe ?

text: It is the spirit that quickeneth ; the flesh profiteth nothing : the words that I speak unto you , they are spirit , and they are life .
text2: Ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu are ri cäyoˈw ri cˈaslemal . Ri cuerpo xak u tuquiel man cˈo tä u patän . Ri tzij cˈut ri nu bim chech alak e areˈ kas tzij ri quepe rucˈ ri Dios , xukujeˈ cäquiya cˈaslemal .

text: But there are some of you that believe not . For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were that believed not , and who should betray him .
text2: E cˈo cˈu jujun chech alak ri man quecojon taj , ― xcha chque . Kas cˈu retam ri Jesús petinak lok jachin tak ri man quecojon tä che , xukujeˈ jachin riˈ ri cäjachow na .

text: And he said , Therefore said I unto you , that no man can come unto me , except it were given unto him of my Father .
text2: Xubij cˈut : Rumal riˈ nu bim chech alak chi man cˈo tä jun ri cuyaˈ cäpe wucˈ in we ta mat cäcˈam lok rumal ri nu Tat .

text: From that time many of his disciples went back , and walked no more with him .
text2: Tzare chiˈ cˈut e qˈuia chque ri e cˈo rucˈ ri Jesús xquiya canok , man xecˈoji tä cˈu rucˈ .

text: Then said Jesus unto the twelve , Will ye also go away ?
text2: Te riˈ ri Jesús xutaˈ chque ri cablajuj u tijoxelab , xubij : ¿ A quiwaj ix xukujeˈ quixeˈ cucˈ ? ― xcha chque .

text: Then Simon Peter answered him , Lord , to whom shall we go ? thou hast the words of eternal life .
text2: Xchˈaw cˈu ri tat Simón Pedro , xubij : Kajaw , ¿ jachin chi rucˈ cujeˈ wi ? Ri tzij la e are tzij ri cäquiya cˈaslemal ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic .

text: And we believe and are sure that thou art that Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Ri uj , uj cojoninak che la , ketam chi lal riˈ ri Cristo , ru Cˈojol ri cˈaslic Dios , ― xcha che .

text: Jesus answered them , Have not I chosen you twelve , and one of you is a devil ?
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij : ¿ A mat ix cablajuj xixinchaˈ rech quixcˈoji wucˈ ? Pune je riˈ jun chiwe are cˈo ri Itzel pa ranimaˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: He spake of Judas Iscariot the son of Simon : for he it was that should betray him , being one of the twelve .
text2: Ri Jesús aretak xubij waˈ are tajin cächˈaw chrij ri Judas Iscariote ru cˈojol ri tat Simón . Je riˈ , rumal chi ri tat Judas are ri cäjachow na , pune are jun chque ri cablajuj u tijoxelab .

text: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee : for he would not walk in Jewry , because the Jews sought to kill him .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ ri Jesús xubinibej ri Galilea . Man craj taj cäcˈoji pa Judea rumal chi ri winak aj Israel cäcaj cäquicämisaj .

text: Now the Jews ' feast of tabernacles was at hand .
text2: Xa cˈu jubikˈ craj man curik ri nimakˈij que ri Cäbal , jun chque ri qui nimakˈij ri winak aj Israel .

text: His brethren therefore said unto him , Depart hence , and go into Judaea , that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest .
text2: Ru chakˈ ri Jesús xquibij che : Mat canaj waral . Jat pa Judea rech xukujeˈ ra tijoxelab ri e cˈo chilaˈ cäquil na ri cajmabal ri cabano .

text: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret , and he himself seeketh to be known openly . If thou do these things , shew thyself to the world .
text2: We jun winak craj chi kas quetamax u wäch , man cuban tä riˈ chicˈuyal ri cubano . We ri at caban tak ri cajmabal riˈ , chabana waˈ chquiwäch conojel ri winak , ― xecha che .

text: For neither did his brethren believe in him .
text2: Kˈalaj cˈut chi ru chakˈ ri Jesús xa man xecojon tä che .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , My time is not yet come : but your time is alway ready .
text2: Te riˈ xubij ri Jesús chque : Ri in mäjaˈ curik ri kˈij chwe , are cˈu ri ix apachique kˈij utz chiwe cuyaˈ quixeˈc .

text: The world cannot hate you ; but me it hateth , because I testify of it , that the works thereof are evil .
text2: Ri winak ajuwächulew man quecowin taj cäquetzelaj i wäch ix . Are cˈu ri in cäquetzelaj nu wäch rumal chi quinkˈalajisaj chquiwäch chi man utz tä ri cäcaˈno .

text: Go ye up unto this feast : I go not up yet unto this feast ; for my time is not yet full come .
text2: Ri ix cˈut , jix pa ri nimakˈij . Ri in man quineˈ taj , rumal chi mäjaˈ curik ri kˈij chwe .

text: When he had said these words unto them , he abode still in Galilee .
text2: Aretak xbitaj waˈ we tzij riˈ chque , xcanaj ri Areˈ pa Galilea .

text: But when his brethren were gone up , then went he also up unto the feast , not openly , but as it were in secret .
text2: Aretak cˈut e benak chi ru chakˈ ri Jesús pa ri nimakˈij , ri Areˈ xukujeˈ xeˈ na pa ri nimakˈij , pune man xucˈut tä rib chquiwäch ri winak . Xane xak chicˈuyal xeˈ ri Areˈ .

text: Then the Jews sought him at the feast , and said , Where is he ?
text2: Ri winak aj Israel xquitij u tzucuxic pa ri nimakˈij , xquibij : ¿ Jawijeˈ cˈo wi ri achi riˈ ? ― xechaˈ .

text: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him : for some said , He is a good man : others said , Nay ; but he deceiveth the people .
text2: Chquixol cˈu ri winak , qˈuia ri cäbix chrij ri Jesús . Jujun cäquibij : “ Are jun utzalaj achi , ” ― quechaˈ . Niqˈuiaj chic cäquibij : “ Man are tä utzalaj achi , rumal chi queusub ri winak , ” ― quechaˈ .

text: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews .
text2: Man cˈo tä cˈu jun ri cucochˈo cäresaj u tzijol ri Jesús rumal chi cäquixej quib chquiwäch ri qui nimakil ri winak aj Israel .

text: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple , and taught .
text2: Niqˈuiajirinak chi cˈu ri nimakˈij aretak ri Jesús xoc bi pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , xuchaplej cˈu qui tijoxic ri winak .

text: And the Jews marvelled , saying , How knoweth this man letters , having never learned ?
text2: Are cˈu ri winak aj Israel sibalaj tajin cäquicajmaj waˈ , xquibij : ¿ Jas lo waˈ chi sibalaj qˈuia retam we achi riˈ , man cˈo tä cˈu jawijeˈ u tijom wi rib ? ― xechaˈ .

text: Jesus answered them , and said , My doctrine is not mine , but his that sent me .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij chque : Ri tijonic ri quinya man wech tä in , xane rech ri Jun ri xintakow lok .

text: If any man will do his will , he shall know of the doctrine , whether it be of God , or whether I speak of myself .
text2: We cˈo jun kas curayij u banic ri craj ri Dios , cäretamaj na we ri nu tijonic kas cäpe rucˈ ri Dios , o xak pa we wi quintzijonic .

text: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory : but he that seeketh his glory that sent him , the same is true , and no unrighteousness is in him .
text2: Ri winak ri xak pa re wi cätzijonic , xa are craj riˈ chi cänimarisax u kˈij cumal ri winak . Jachin cˈu ri craj chi are cänimarisax u kˈij ri xtakow lok , cubij riˈ ri kas tzij , man are tä jun banal tzij , ― xcha chque .

text: Did not Moses give you the law , and yet none of you keepeth the law ? Why go ye about to kill me ?
text2: ¿ A mat kas tzij chi ri ka mam Moisés xuya ri Pixab chech alak ? Pune je riˈ , man cˈo tä cˈu jun chech alak ri cunimaj ri Pixab riˈ . ¿ Jas che caj alak quincämisaj alak ? ― xcha chque .

text: The people answered and said , Thou hast a devil : who goeth about to kill thee ?
text2: Ri winak xechˈawic , xquibij : ¡ Xa cˈo jun itzel espíritu chawe ! ¿ Jachin lo ri craj catcämisanic ? ― xecha che .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , I have done one work , and ye all marvel .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij chque : Xa rucˈ jun cajmabal ri xinban pa ri kˈij re uxlanem , ri alak sibalaj cäcajman alak che .

text: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision ; ( not because it is of Moses , but of the fathers ; ) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man .
text2: Ri ka mam Moisés xunakˈatajisaj alak chucojic retal ri ojer trato . Pune ta ne man are tä ri areˈ xchapow lok u banic waˈ , xane are qui tijonic can ri nan tat alak ojer . Ri alak cˈut cäcoj alak retal ri ojer trato che jun alaj ala pune pa ri kˈij re uxlanem .

text: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision , that the law of Moses should not be broken ; are ye angry at me , because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day ?
text2: We cˈu ri alak rumal ri u nimaxic ri Pixab ri xutzˈibaj ri ka mam Moisés cäcoj alak retal ri ojer trato che ri ala pune pa ri kˈij re uxlanem , ¿ jas cˈu che xpe oyowal alak chwe in aretak xincunaj ronojel ru cuerpo jun achi pa ri kˈij re uxlanem ? ― cächaˈ .

text: Judge not according to the appearance , but judge righteous judgment .
text2: Cˈo jas mäbij alak chrij ri winak we utz cäpetic o man utz tä cäpetic . Aretak cˈo jas cäbij alak chrij jun winak chic , kas chomaj na alak jas ri cäban alak , bana cˈu alak waˈ rucˈ jicomal .

text: Then said some of them of Jerusalem , Is not this he , whom they seek to kill ?
text2: Te cˈu riˈ jujun chque ri winak aj Jerusalén xquichapla u taˈic , xquibij : ¿ A mat are waˈ we achi riˈ ri tajin cätzucuxic rech cäcämisaxic ? ― quechaˈ .

text: But , lo , he speaketh boldly , and they say nothing unto him . Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ ?
text2: Chiwilampeˈ , cätzijon cucˈ ri winak , man cˈo tä cˈu jun cˈo jas cubij che . ¿ A xa ta cˈu lo kas cäquicoj ri kˈatal tak tzij chi we achi riˈ are ri Cristo ? ― quechaˈ .

text: Howbeit we know this man whence he is : but when Christ cometh , no man knoweth whence he is .
text2: Ri uj cˈut ketam jawijeˈ petinak wi waˈ we achi riˈ . Aretak cˈut cäpe riˈ ri Cristo , man cˈo tä jun riˈ etamaninak jawijeˈ cäpe wi , ― xecha ri winak .

text: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught , saying , Ye both know me , and ye know whence I am : and I am not come of myself , but he that sent me is true , whom ye know not .
text2: Aretak ri Jesús , ri tajin cuya tijonic pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , xuta waˈ co xchˈawic , xubij : Cäbij alak chi etam alak nu wäch , xukujeˈ chi etam alak jawijeˈ chiˈ quinpe wi . Man in petinak tä cˈut xak pa we wi , xane in takom lok rumal ri Jun ri kas jicom ranimaˈ . Ri alak cˈut man etam tä alak u wäch .

text: But I know him : for I am from him , and he hath sent me .
text2: Ri in wetam u wäch rumal chi in petinak rucˈ , xukujeˈ are ri Areˈ in takowinak lok , ― xcha chque .

text: Then they sought to take him : but no man laid hands on him , because his hour was not yet come .
text2: Xcaj cˈut xquicˈam bi pa cheˈ , man cˈo tä cˈu jun xchapowic rumal chi mäjaˈ curik ru kˈij .

text: And many of the people believed on him , and said , When Christ cometh , will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done ?
text2: E qˈuia cˈut xecojon che , xquibij cˈut : Aretak cäpe ri Cristo , ¿ a cuban ta cˈu lo más cajmabal tak etal chic chuwäch ri u banom we achi riˈ ? ― xechaˈ .

text: The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him ; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him .
text2: Ri tataˈib fariseos xquita ri cäquibij ri winak chrij ri Jesús . Xa je riˈ ri e areˈ cucˈ ri qui nimakil sacerdotes xequitak bi jujun chajinelab re ri nimalaj rachoch Dios chucˈamic bi ri Jesús pa cheˈ .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Yet a little while am I with you , and then I go unto him that sent me .
text2: Te riˈ xubij ri Jesús : Xak quieb oxib kˈij chic quincˈoji na ucˈ alak , te cˈu riˈ quintzelej na rucˈ ri xintakow lok .

text: Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come .
text2: Ri alak quintzucuj na alak , man quinrik tä chi cˈu alak rumal chi man cäcowin tä alak copan alak chilaˈ jawijeˈ ri quinecˈol wi in , ― xcha chque .

text: Then said the Jews among themselves , Whither will he go , that we shall not find him ? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles , and teach the Gentiles ?
text2: Ri qui nimakil ri winak aj Israel cˈut , xquichaplej u taˈic chbil tak quib , xquibij : ¿ Jawijeˈ ta cˈu queˈ wi waˈ we achi riˈ chi man cujcowin tä uj quekarikaˈ ? ¿ A xa ta cˈu lo queˈ cucˈ ri winak aj Israel ri e jabuninak chquixol ri winak aj Grecia che qui tijoxic ri winak aj Grecia ?

text: What manner of saying is this that he said , Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come ?
text2: ¿ Jas quel cubij waˈ ri xubij chke : “ Quintzucuj na alak , man quinrik tä chi cˈu alak rumal chi man cäcowin tä alak copan alak chilaˈ jawijeˈ ri quinecˈol wi ” ? ― xcha riˈ , ― xechaˈ .

text: In the last day , that great day of the feast , Jesus stood and cried , saying , If any man thirst , let him come unto me , and drink .
text2: Pa ri qˈuisbal kˈij re ri nimakˈij , ri kˈij ri sibalaj nim na u banic , ri Jesús xtaqˈui akˈanok chquixol ri winak , co xchˈawic , xubij : We cˈo jun cächakiˈj u chiˈ , chpet wucˈ , chutija u joron .

text: He that believeth on me , as the scripture hath said , out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water .
text2: Jeˈ jas ri cubij ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic : Jachin ri cäcojon chwe , cäqˈuiy na lok pa ranimaˈ joron ri cuya ri kas cˈaslemal , ― cächaˈ , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ri winak .

text: ( But this spake he of the Spirit , which they that believe on him should receive : for the Holy Ghost was not yet given ; because that Jesus was not yet glorified . )
text2: Ri Jesús cˈut , are tajin cächˈaw chrij ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu ri cäquicˈam na ri winak ri quecojon che ri Areˈ . Mäjaˈ cˈu cäyiˈ lok ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu rumal chi mäjaˈ cätzelej ri Jesús chilaˈ chicaj rech cänimarisax u kˈij .

text: Many of the people therefore , when they heard this saying , said , Of a truth this is the Prophet .
text2: Jujun chque ri winak , aretak xquita ri xubij ri Jesús , xquibij : Kas tzij we achi riˈ are waˈ ri kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri cäbixic chi cäpe na , ― xechaˈ .

text: Others said , This is the Christ . But some said , Shall Christ come out of Galilee ?
text2: Niqˈuiaj chic xquibij : Are waˈ ri Cristo , ― xechaˈ . Niqˈuiaj chi cˈut xquibij : ¿ A xa ta cˈu lo pa Galilea cäpe wi ri Cristo ?

text: Hath not the scripture said , That Christ cometh of the seed of David , and out of the town of Bethlehem , where David was ?
text2: Ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic cubij chi ri Cristo rajwaxic chquixol ri rachalaxic ri ka mam David ri nim takanel cäpe wi na . Pa Belén cˈut cäpe wi na , ri tinimit ri xcˈoji wi ri ka mam David , ― xechaˈ .

text: So there was a division among the people because of him .
text2: Je cˈu riˈ ri winak xquitasala quib rumal rech ri Jesús .

text: And some of them would have taken him ; but no man laid hands on him .
text2: E cˈo jujun ri xcaj xquicˈam bi pa cheˈ , man cˈo tä cˈu jun xchapowic .

text: Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees ; and they said unto them , Why have ye not brought him ?
text2: Xetzelej cˈu ri chajinelab re ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , xeopan chilaˈ jawijeˈ e cˈo wi ri tataˈib fariseos xukujeˈ ri qui nimakil ri sacerdotes . Ri e areˈ cˈut xquitaˈ chque : ¿ Jas che man xicˈam tä lok ri Jesús ? ― xechaˈ .

text: The officers answered , Never man spake like this man .
text2: Ri chajinelab xechˈawic , xquibij : ¡ Man cˈo tä jun achi ka tom jeˈ cätzijonic jas ri cätzijon ri achi riˈ ! ― xechaˈ .

text: Then answered them the Pharisees , Are ye also deceived ?
text2: Are cˈu ri tataˈib fariseos xquibij chque : Ri ix xukujeˈ xa xiya iwib pa subic .

text: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him ?
text2: ¿ A cˈo pu lo jun chque ri ka nimakil ri cojoninak che , o jun ne chque ri tataˈib fariseos ? ¡ Man cˈo taj ! ― xechaˈ .

text: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed .
text2: Xquiqˈuiäk itzel tzij pa qui wiˈ , xquibij : ¡ We winak riˈ man quetam tä ri Pixab ! ― xecha chque .

text: Nicodemus saith unto them , ( he that came to Jesus by night , being one of them , )
text2: Are cˈu ri tat Nicodemo ri xopan rucˈ ri Jesús chakˈab , are jun chque ri tataˈib fariseos . Xubij cˈu chque :

text: Doth our law judge any man , before it hear him , and know what he doeth ?
text2: Ri ka Pixab cubij chi man cuyaˈ taj cäkakˈat tzij puwiˈ jun winak chi cäcˈäjisax u wäch we ta mat nabe cäkata na jas ri cubij che retamaxic jas ri u banom , ― xcha chque .

text: They answered and said unto him , Art thou also of Galilee ? Search , and look : for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet .
text2: Te riˈ xechˈaw ri e areˈ , xquibij che ri tat Nicodemo : E cˈu ri lal , ¿ a lal aj Galilea xukujeˈ ? ― xecha che . Naˈl siqˈuij la ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic , quil cˈu na la chi man cˈo tä jun kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri petinak pa Galilea , ― xecha che .

text: And every man went unto his own house .
text2: Chquijujunal cˈut xebeˈ cho tak cachoch .

text: Jesus went unto the mount of Olives .
text2: Are cˈu ri Jesús xeˈ pa ri nimalaj juyub ri cäbix “ Olivos ” che .

text: And early in the morning he came again into the temple , and all the people came unto him ; and he sat down , and taught them .
text2: Aretak xsakir chucab kˈij , ri Jesús xtzelej lok , xeˈ pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios . Conojel ri winak xquimulij quib rucˈ . Ri Areˈ cˈut xtˈuyiˈc , xuchaplej qui tijoxic .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees brought unto him a woman taken in adultery ; and when they had set her in the midst ,
text2: Te riˈ ri tijonelab re ri Pixab xukujeˈ ri tataˈib fariseos xquicˈam lok jun ixok ri xquiriko tajin cuban ri nimalaj mac ri äwas u banic chrij ri rachajil . Xquiya cˈu chquixol ri winak ri e cˈo chilaˈ .

text: They say unto him , Master , this woman was taken in adultery , in the very act .
text2: Xquibij cˈu che ri Jesús : Ajtij , we ixok riˈ xriktajic tajin cuban ri nimalaj mac ri äwas u banic chrij ri rachajil .

text: Now Moses in the law commanded us , that such should be stoned : but what sayest thou ?
text2: Ri Pixab ri xutzˈibaj ri ka mam Moisés cubij chi rajwaxic cäkacämisaj chabaj jun ixok ri jeˈ cuban waˈ . E ri lal , ¿ jas cˈu cäbij la ? ― xecha che .

text: This they said , tempting him , that they might have to accuse him . But Jesus stooped down , and with his finger wrote on the ground , as though he heard them not .
text2: Xquibij waˈ che xak rech cäkaj pa qui kˈab , je cˈu riˈ quecowinic cäquibij chi cˈo u mac ri Jesús . Are cˈu ri Jesús xa xpachiˈc , xuchaplej tzˈibanic cho ri ulew rucˈ ri u wiˈ u kˈab .

text: So when they continued asking him , he lifted up himself , and said unto them , He that is without sin among you , let him first cast a stone at her .
text2: Xquitakej cˈu u cˈotic u chiˈ ri Jesús . Xa je riˈ ri Areˈ xujicomaj rib , xubij cˈu chque : Apachin chech alak ri man cˈo tä u mac , chuqˈuiäka ri nabe abaj chrij we ixok riˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: And again he stooped down , and wrote on the ground .
text2: Xpachi chi jumul ri Jesús , xutakej tzˈibanic cho ri ulew .

text: And they which heard it , being convicted by their own conscience , went out one by one , beginning at the eldest , even unto the last : and Jesus was left alone , and the woman standing in the midst .
text2: Aretak cˈut xquita ri xubij ri Jesús , xquinaˈ quib pa canimaˈ chi cˈo qui mac . Chquijujunal cˈut xquichap elem bic . Nabe xebel bi ri riˈjab . Aretak conojel e elinak chi bic , xak xuwi chi ri Jesús cˈo canok rucˈ ri ixok ri canajinak can chilaˈ .

text: When Jesus had lifted up himself , and saw none but the woman , he said unto her , Woman , where are those thine accusers ? hath no man condemned thee ?
text2: Te riˈ ri Jesús xujicomaj rib . Man cˈo tä cˈu jun xrilo , xane xak xuwi ri ixok . Ri Areˈ xubij che : Nan , ¿ jawijeˈ e cˈo wi ri cäquibij chi cˈo mac la ? ¿ A mat cˈo jun xcanaj can chukˈatic tzij puwiˈ la chi cäcˈäjisax wäch la ? ― xcha che .

text: She said , No man , Lord . And Jesus said unto her , Neither do I condemn thee : go , and sin no more .
text2: Ri ixok xubij che ri Jesús : Man cˈo tä jun , Tat , ― xcha che . Are cˈu ri Jesús xubij che : Ri in xukujeˈ man quinkˈat tä tzij puwiˈ la chi cäcˈäjisax wäch la . ¡ Oj baˈ la chanim , mämacun chi cˈu la ! ― xcha che .

text: Then spake Jesus again unto them , saying , I am the light of the world : he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness , but shall have the light of life .
text2: Xtzijon chi jumul ri Jesús cucˈ ri winak , xubij chque : In riˈ , ri in quinya sakil chque ri winak cho ruwächulew . Jachin ri cäpe wucˈ , cäcˈoji na ri sakil rucˈ ri cuya cˈaslemal , man cäbin tä chi cˈu pa ri kˈekum , ― xcha chque .

text: The Pharisees therefore said unto him , Thou bearest record of thyself ; thy record is not true .
text2: Te riˈ ri tataˈib fariseos xquibij che ri Jesús : Ri lal xak tuquiel la tajin cäkˈalajisaj la ri utz chij ib la . Rumal riˈ ri tajin cäkˈalajisaj la man cˈo tä u patän , ― xecha che .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Though I bear record of myself , yet my record is true : for I know whence I came , and whither I go ; but ye cannot tell whence I come , and whither I go .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij chque : Ri tajin quinkˈalajisaj chwij in , kas tzij cˈo u patän , pune xak nu tuquiel quinkˈalajisaj ri utz chwij chbil wib . Wetam cˈut jawijeˈ ri in petinak wi , xukujeˈ jawijeˈ ri quineˈ wi . Ri alak cˈut man etam tä alak jawijeˈ ri quinpe wi , man etam tä cˈu alak jawijeˈ ri quineˈ wi .

text: Ye judge after the flesh ; I judge no man .
text2: Ri alak jeˈ cäkˈatow tzij alak jas ri quekˈatow tzij ri winak ajuwächulew . Ri in cˈut man quinkˈat tä tzij puwiˈ jachin jun .

text: And yet if I judge , my judgment is true : for I am not alone , but I and the Father that sent me .
text2: We cˈu quinkˈat tzij , jicom quinban chukˈatic tzij . Je riˈ , rumal chi man xak tä nu tuquiel quinkˈat tzij , xane ri nu Tat ri xintakow lok Are cukˈat tzij junam wucˈ .

text: It is also written in your law , that the testimony of two men is true .
text2: Pa ri Pixab alak tzˈibtal wi chi aretak quieb winak junam ri cäquibij chrij ri xquilo o chrij ri xquito , rajwaxic riˈ cäcojic chi kas tzij ri cäquibij .

text: I am one that bear witness of myself , and the Father that sent me beareth witness of me .
text2: Ri in cˈut quinkˈalajisaj ri kas tzij chwij chbil wib , xukujeˈ ri nu Tat ri xintakow lok cukˈalajisaj ri kas tzij chwij , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is thy Father ? Jesus answered , Ye neither know me , nor my Father : if ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also .
text2: Te riˈ ri tataˈib fariseos xquitaˈ che ri Jesús : ¿ Jawijeˈ cˈo wi ri tat la ? ― xecha che . Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij chque : Ri alak man kas tä etam alak nu wäch , xukujeˈ man etam tä alak u wäch ri nu Tat . We ta kas etam alak nu wäch in , etam ta alak u wäch riˈ ri nu Tat xukujeˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: These words spake Jesus in the treasury , as he taught in the temple : and no man laid hands on him ; for his hour was not yet come .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij waˈ we tzij riˈ aretak tajin cuya tijonic pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios chunakaj ri cˈolibal re tak ri cuchuj . Man cˈo tä cˈu jun xcˈamow bi pa cheˈ rumal chi mäjaˈ curik ru kˈij .

text: Then said Jesus again unto them , I go my way , and ye shall seek me , and shall die in your sins : whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈaw chi jumul , xubij chque : Ri in quineˈc . Ri alak cˈut quintzucuj na alak . Pa ri mac alak cˈut cäcäm wi alak , rumal chi man cäcowin tä alak queˈ alak chilaˈ jawijeˈ ri quineˈ wi , ― xcha chque .

text: Then said the Jews , Will he kill himself ? because he saith , Whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Te riˈ ri winak aj Israel xquibij : ¿ A xa ta lo cucämisaj rib , rumal cˈu riˈ cubij chi man cujcowin taj cujeˈ chilaˈ jawijeˈ ri queˈ wi ? ― xecha ri e areˈ .

text: And he said unto them , Ye are from beneath ; I am from above : ye are of this world ; I am not of this world .
text2: Te riˈ xubij ri Jesús chque : Ri alak , xak alak ajwaral , are cˈu ri in chilaˈ chicaj quinpe wi . Ri alak , xak alak ajuwächulew . Are cˈu ri in man in ajuwächulew taj .

text: I said therefore unto you , that ye shall die in your sins : for if ye believe not that I am he , ye shall die in your sins .
text2: Rumal riˈ xinbij chech alak chi pa ri mac alak cäcäm wi alak . Rumal chi we man cäcoj tä alak chi in riˈ ri tajin quinbij , pa ri mac alak cäcäm wi na alak , ― xcha chque .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? And Jesus saith unto them , Even the same that I said unto you from the beginning .
text2: Te riˈ xquitaˈ che ri Jesús , xquibij : ¿ Jachin cˈu ri lal ? ― xecha che . Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij chque : Ojer riˈ nu bim chech alak jachin ri in , ― xcha chque .

text: I have many things to say and to judge of you : but he that sent me is true ; and I speak to the world those things which I have heard of him .
text2: Qˈuia ri cwaj quinbij chech alak chrij ri tajin quinwilo chukˈatic tzij chrij ri cäban alak . Are cˈu ri xintakow lok cubij ri kas tzij . Ri in cˈut , jachique ri nu tom chuchiˈ ri Areˈ , are waˈ ri quinbij chque ri winak ajuwächulew , ― xcha chque .

text: They understood not that he spake to them of the Father .
text2: Ri e areˈ cˈut man xquichˈob taj chi ri Jesús are tajin cächˈaw chrij ri ka Tat chilaˈ chicaj .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , When ye have lifted up the Son of man , then shall ye know that I am he , and that I do nothing of myself ; but as my Father hath taught me , I speak these things .
text2: Rumal riˈ xubij chque : Aretak ri in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , quinyac na chicaj umal alak chquiwäch ri winak , quetamaj cˈu na alak chi In Riˈ . Man cˈo tä cˈu jas quinbano xak pa we wi , xane xak xuwi quinbij ri u cˈutum ri ka Tat chnuwäch , ― xcha chque .

text: And he that sent me is with me : the Father hath not left me alone ; for I do always those things that please him .
text2: Are cˈu ri xintakow lok cˈo wucˈ in . Ri nu Tat man in u yoˈm tä can nu tuquiel rumal chi amakˈel ronojel kˈij are quinban ri utz cäril wi ri Areˈ , ― xcha chque ri winak aj Israel .

text: As he spake these words , many believed on him .
text2: Aretak ri Jesús xubij waˈ we tzij riˈ , e qˈuia xecojon che ri Areˈ .

text: Then said Jesus to those Jews which believed on him , If ye continue in my word , then are ye my disciples indeed ;
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús chque ri winak aj Israel ri xecojon che : We ri alak cätakej alak u banic ri nu bim chech alak , kas tzij alak nu tijoxelab , ― xcha chque .

text: And ye shall know the truth , and the truth shall make you free .
text2: Quetamaj cˈu na alak ri kas tzij , ri kas tzij cˈut cubano chi tzokopital chi alak , ― xcha chque .

text: They answered him , We be Abraham ' s seed , and were never in bondage to any man : how sayest thou , Ye shall be made free ?
text2: Ri winak aj Israel xechˈawic , xquibij : Ri uj are ka mam ri Abraham ojer , man uj cojom tä cˈu xak che patänil re jun winak . ¿ Jas lo waˈ chi cäbij la chke chi cujtzokopitaj na ? ― xecha che .

text: Jesus answered them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij chque : Kas tzij quinbij chech alak chi conojel ri quemacunic e cojom riˈ che patänil tak re ri mac .

text: And the servant abideth not in the house for ever : but the Son abideth ever .
text2: Jun ri cojom che patäninel man are tä kas ajpaja . Are cˈu ri u cˈojol ri rajaw ja kas ajpaja riˈ amakˈel ronojel kˈij .

text: If the Son therefore shall make you free , ye shall be free indeed .
text2: Je cˈu riˈ , we ri in , in u Cˈojol ri Dios quintzokopin chech alak , kas tzij riˈ chi tzokopital chi alak , ― xcha chque .

text: I know that ye are Abraham ' s seed ; but ye seek to kill me , because my word hath no place in you .
text2: Ri in wetam chi ri mam alak are ri Abraham ojer . Caj cˈu alak quincämisaj alak rumal chi man cäcoj tä alak ri quinbij chech alak .

text: I speak that which I have seen with my Father : and ye do that which ye have seen with your father .
text2: Ri in are quinbij ri u cˈutum ri nu Tat chnuwäch . Are cˈu ri alak are cäban alak jachique ri bim chech alak rumal ri tat alak , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: They answered and said unto him , Abraham is our father . Jesus saith unto them , If ye were Abraham ' s children , ye would do the works of Abraham .
text2: Ri e areˈ xechˈawic , xquibij : Ri ka tat uj are ri ka mam Abraham ojer , ― xechaˈ . Ri Jesús xubij chque : We ta kas tzij are tat alak ri ka mam Abraham , are ta cäban alak riˈ jas ri xuban ri areˈ .

text: But now ye seek to kill me , a man that hath told you the truth , which I have heard of God : this did not Abraham .
text2: Pune nu bim ri kas tzij chech alak ri u cˈutum ri Dios chnuwäch , ri alak caj alak quincämisaj alak . Ri ka mam Abraham man cˈo tä jumul ri jeˈ xuban waˈ .

text: Ye do the deeds of your father . Then said they to him , We be not born of fornication ; we have one Father , even God .
text2: Ri alak cˈut jeˈ cäban alak jas ri cuban ri tat alak , ― xcha ri Jesús chque . Ri e areˈ cˈut xquibij che : Ri uj , man uj alcˈualaxelab taj ri mat kˈalaj u wäch ka tat . Ri ka Tat xa jun cˈolic , are cˈu ri Dios , ― xechaˈ .

text: Jesus said unto them , If God were your Father , ye would love me : for I proceeded forth and came from God ; neither came I of myself , but he sent me .
text2: Ri Jesús cˈut xubij chque : We ta kas tzij chi ri Dios are Tat alak , quinaj ta alak riˈ rumal chi ri in rucˈ ri Dios in petinak wi , waral cˈut in cˈo wi . Man in petinak taj xak pa we wi , xane are ri Dios xintakow lok .

text: Why do ye not understand my speech ? even because ye cannot hear my word .
text2: ¿ Jas che ri alak man cäcowin tä alak chuchˈobic ri quinbij ? Xa rumal chi man caj tä alak cätatabej alak ri nu tzij .

text: Ye are of your father the devil , and the lusts of your father ye will do . He was a murderer from the beginning , and abode not in the truth , because there is no truth in him . When he speaketh a lie , he speaketh of his own : for he is a liar , and the father of it .
text2: Ri tat alak are ri Itzel . Ri alak , alak rech ri areˈ , are cˈu caj alak cäban alak jachique ri craj ri areˈ . Ri Itzel are jun cämisanel ojer lok . Ri areˈ man cuban tä ri kas tzij , man cubij tä cˈu ri kas tzij . Aretak cuban tzij , are cubij ri u banic ri areˈ . Are jun banal tzij , qui tat cˈut ri banal tak tzij .

text: And because I tell you the truth , ye believe me not .
text2: Ri in cˈut quinbij ri kas tzij , rumal cˈu riˈ ri alak man cäcoj tä alak ri nu tzij .

text: Which of you convinceth me of sin ? And if I say the truth , why do ye not believe me ?
text2: ¿ Jachin chech alak cäcowinic cukˈalajisaj chi kas tzij cˈo mac nu banom ? We cˈu quinbij ri kas tzij , ¿ jas cˈu che man cäcoj tä alak ri quinbij ?

text: He that is of God heareth God ' s words : ye therefore hear them not , because ye are not of God .
text2: Apachin ri rech ri Dios cutatabej riˈ ru Tzij ri Dios . Are cˈu ri alak man alak tä rech ri Dios . Rumal riˈ man caj tä alak cätatabej alak ru Tzij ri Dios , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ri winak aj Israel .

text: Then answered the Jews , and said unto him , Say we not well that thou art a Samaritan , and hast a devil ?
text2: Ri winak aj Israel xquibij che ri Jesús : Kas tzij ri xkabij aretak xkabij chi ri lal , xa lal aj Samaria , xukujeˈ chi ri lal cˈo jun itzel espíritu che la , ― xecha che ri Jesús .

text: Jesus answered , I have not a devil ; but I honour my Father , and ye do dishonour me .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij chque : Man cˈo tä jun itzel espíritu chwe . Ri tajin quinbano , xa tajin quinya u kˈij ri nu Tat , are cˈu ri alak xa quesaj alak nu qˈuixbal .

text: And I seek not mine own glory : there is one that seeketh and judgeth .
text2: Ri in cˈut man cwaj taj chi cäyiˈ nu kˈij , pune ta ne cˈo Jun ri craj chi cäyiˈ nu kˈij , cukˈat cˈu na tzij ri Areˈ pa qui wiˈ ri cäquetzelaj nu wäch .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , If a man keep my saying , he shall never see death .
text2: Kas tzij quinbij chech alak chi jachin ri cunimaj ri quinbij , man cäcäm tä na ri areˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Now we know that thou hast a devil . Abraham is dead , and the prophets ; and thou sayest , If a man keep my saying , he shall never taste of death .
text2: Te riˈ ri winak aj Israel xechˈawic , xquibij : Cämic kas xel chi sak chkawäch chi xa cˈo jun itzel espíritu che la , ― xecha che ri Jesús . Ri ka mam Abraham , xukujeˈ conojel ri kˈalajisal tak re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios xecämic , te cˈu riˈ cäbij la : “ Jachin ri cunimaj ri quinbij man cäcäm taj , ” ― cächa la .

text: Art thou greater than our father Abraham , which is dead ? and the prophets are dead : whom makest thou thyself ?
text2: ¿ A lal ta cˈut nim na ri kˈij la chuwäch ri ka mam Abraham ? Ri areˈ xcämic , xukujeˈ xecäm ri kˈalajisal tak re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios . ¿ Jachin ta cˈu ri lal ri cäban che ib la ? ― xecha che .

text: Jesus answered , If I honour myself , my honour is nothing : it is my Father that honoureth me ; of whom ye say , that he is your God :
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij chque : We ta xak in quinya nu kˈij chbil wib , man cˈo tä u patän riˈ . Are cˈu ri cäyoˈw nu kˈij are ri nu Tat , ri cäbij alak chi are Dios alak .

text: Yet ye have not known him ; but I know him : and if I should say , I know him not , I shall be a liar like unto you : but I know him , and keep his saying .
text2: Ri alak cˈut man etamam tä alak u wäch . Ri in kas tzij wetam u wäch . We ta quinbij chi man wetam tä u wäch , in banal tzij ta riˈ jeˈ jas ri alak . Ri in cˈut kas tzij wetam u wäch , quinnimaj cˈut ri cubij .

text: Your father Abraham rejoiced to see my day : and he saw it , and was glad .
text2: Ri Abraham ri mam alak xquicotic aretak xuto chi cäril na ri nu kˈij . Xril cˈut , kas cˈu xquicotic , ― xcha chque .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Thou art not yet fifty years old , and hast thou seen Abraham ?
text2: Ri winak aj Israel xquibij che ri Jesús : Mäjaˈ ne niqˈuiaj ciento junab la , te cˈu riˈ cäbij la chi xil la u wäch ri ka mam Abraham , ― xecha che .

text: Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Before Abraham was , I am .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij : Kas tzij quinbij chech alak chi ri in , in cˈo chic ojer , cˈä mäjok cäcˈoji ri Abraham , ― xcha chque ri winak aj Israel .

text: Then took they up stones to cast at him : but Jesus hid himself , and went out of the temple , going through the midst of them , and so passed by .
text2: Xepe cˈu ri winak aj Israel , xquicˈam abaj rech cäquiqˈuiäk chrij ri Jesús . Ri Areˈ cˈut , xucˈuˈ rib chquiwäch , xel lok pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , xocˈow chquixol ri winak , xeˈc .

text: And as Jesus passed by , he saw a man which was blind from his birth .
text2: Ri Jesús benak pa ri be aretak xril jun achi ri moy tzaretak xil u wäch .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Master , who did sin , this man , or his parents , that he was born blind ?
text2: Ru tijoxelab xquitaˈ che ri Jesús : Ajtij , ― xecha che . ¿ Jas che moy we achi riˈ tzaretak xil u wäch ? ¿ A xa rumal ri qui mac ru nan u tat o xa rumal ru mac ri areˈ ? ― xecha che .

text: Jesus answered , Neither hath this man sinned , nor his parents : but that the works of God should be made manifest in him .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij chque : Man rumal tä rech ru mac ri areˈ , man rumal tä cˈu rech ri qui mac ru nan u tat , xane rech rumal ri areˈ cäkˈalajin ri cäcowin ri Dios chubanic , ― xcha chque .

text: I must work the works of him that sent me , while it is day : the night cometh , when no man can work .
text2: Chanim riˈ ri cˈo na ri kˈij , rajwaxic chi quinban na ri xintak chubanic rumal ri xintakow lok . Coc cˈu na ri akˈab aretak man cˈo tä chi jun cäcowinic cächacunic .

text: As long as I am in the world , I am the light of the world .
text2: Pa tak we kˈij riˈ aretak in cˈo cho ruwächulew , ri in quinya sakil chque ri winak ajuwächulew , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ru tijoxelab .

text: When he had thus spoken , he spat on the ground , and made clay of the spittle , and he anointed the eyes of the blind man with the clay ,
text2: Aretak xbitaj waˈ we tzij riˈ rumal ri Jesús , xutzak u chub pulew , xuban jubikˈ xokˈol rucˈ ru chub , xubil cˈu chrij tak ru wakˈäch ri moy .

text: And said unto him , Go , wash in the pool of Siloam , ( which is by interpretation , Sent . ) He went his way therefore , and washed , and came seeing .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ xubij che : ¡ Oj la ! Chˈaja la ri wäch la pa ri atinibal ri cäbix “ Siloé ” che . ( We biˈaj riˈ quel cubij “ Takom ” . ) Ri moy achi xeˈc , xuchˈaj ru wäch . Aretak xtzelej lok , xcowinic xcaˈy chic .

text: The neighbours therefore , and they which before had seen him that he was blind , said , Is not this he that sat and begged ?
text2: Are cˈu ri u cˈul tak ja , xukujeˈ ri winak ri quetamam u wäch chi moy nabe , xquibij : ¿ A mat are waˈ we achi riˈ ri cätˈuyi chiˈ tak ri be chutaˈic u limosna ? ― xechaˈ .

text: Some said , This is he : others said , He is like him : but he said , I am he .
text2: Jujun xquibij : Jeˈ , are waˈ , ― xechaˈ . Niqˈuiaj chic xquibij : Man are taj . Xak cˈu junam quel rucˈ , ― xechaˈ . Are cˈu ri achi ri moy can nabe xubij : Jeˈ , in riˈ , ― xcha chque ri winak .

text: Therefore said they unto him , How were thine eyes opened ?
text2: Te riˈ ri winak xquitaˈ che ri achi : ¿ Jas lo waˈ chi catcowin chic catcaˈyic ? ― xecha che .

text: He answered and said , A man that is called Jesus made clay , and anointed mine eyes , and said unto me , Go to the pool of Siloam , and wash : and I went and washed , and I received sight .
text2: Ri areˈ xchˈawic , xubij chque : Ri achi ri Jesús u biˈ xuban jubikˈ xokˈol , xubil chrij tak ri nu wakˈäch , te cˈu riˈ xubij chwe : “ Oj la chiˈ ri atinibal ri cäbix “ Siloé ” che , chˈaja la ri wäch la chilaˈ , ” ― xcha chwe . Xineˈ cˈut . Aretak xchˈajtaj ri nu wäch , xincowinic xincaˈyic , ― xcha chque .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is he ? He said , I know not .
text2: Te riˈ ri winak xquibij : ¿ Jawijeˈ cˈo wi ri achi riˈ ? ― xecha che . Ri areˈ xubij chque : Man wetam taj , ― xcha chque .

text: They brought to the Pharisees him that aforetime was blind .
text2: Te riˈ xquicˈam bi ri achi ri moy can nabe , xequiya chquiwäch ri tataˈib fariseos .

text: And it was the sabbath day when Jesus made the clay , and opened his eyes .
text2: Are cˈu jun kˈij re uxlanem aretak ri Jesús xuban ri jubikˈ xokˈol , xucunaj ri achi ri moy .

text: Then again the Pharisees also asked him how he had received his sight . He said unto them , He put clay upon mine eyes , and I washed , and do see .
text2: Ri tataˈib fariseos xukujeˈ xquitaˈ che ri achi chi jas lo waˈ chi cäcowin chic cäcaˈyic . Ri areˈ xubij chque : Xubil xokˈol chrij tak ri nu wakˈäch , te cˈu riˈ xinchˈaj ri nu wäch . Quincaˈy chi cˈu cämic , ― xcha chque .

text: Therefore said some of the Pharisees , This man is not of God , because he keepeth not the sabbath day . Others said , How can a man that is a sinner do such miracles ? And there was a division among them .
text2: Te riˈ jujun chque ri tataˈib fariseos xquibij : Ri achi ri xbanow waˈ we cunanic riˈ man rech tä ri Dios , rumal chi man nim tä cäril wi ri kˈij re uxlanem , ― xechaˈ . Niqˈuiaj chi cˈut xquibij : ¿ Jas ta cˈu lo waˈ chi cäcowinic cuban tak we cajmabal etal riˈ we ta kas tzij ajmac ? ― xechaˈ . Je riˈ chi man xjunamataj tä ri qui chomanic , xquitasala cˈu quib .

text: They say unto the blind man again , What sayest thou of him , that he hath opened thine eyes ? He said , He is a prophet .
text2: Xquitaˈ chi cˈu jumul che ri achi ri moy can nabe : E ri at , ¿ jas cabij at chrij ri achi ri xcunan ra wakˈäch ? ― xecha che . Ri areˈ cˈut xubij : Ri in quinbij chi are jun kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios , ― xcha chque .

text: But the Jews did not believe concerning him , that he had been blind , and received his sight , until they called the parents of him that had received his sight .
text2: Are cˈu ri winak aj Israel man xquicoj taj chi ri achi riˈ are waˈ ri moy can nabe , cämic cˈut cäcaˈy chic . Cˈä teˈ xquicojo aretak xesiqˈuix na lok ru nan u tat ri achi ri xcunatajic .

text: And they asked them , saying , Is this your son , who ye say was born blind ? how then doth he now see ?
text2: Xquitaˈ cˈu chque : ¿ A are waˈ ri alcˈual alak ri cäbij alak chi moy xil u wäch ? ¿ Jas lo waˈ chi cämic cäcowin chic cäcaˈyic ? ― xecha chque .

text: His parents answered them and said , We know that this is our son , and that he was born blind :
text2: Ru nan u tat xechˈawic , xquibij : Ketam chi are waˈ ri kalcˈual ri moy xil u wäch .

text: But by what means he now seeth , we know not ; or who hath opened his eyes , we know not : he is of age ; ask him : he shall speak for himself .
text2: Man ketam tä cˈut jas waˈ chi cämic cäcowin chic cäcaˈyic , man ketam tä cˈu jachin ri xcunan ru wakˈäch . Taˈ alak che ri areˈ . Achi chi yaˈ , cubij cˈu na chech alak jas waˈ chi cäcowin chic cäcaˈyic , ― xecha chque .

text: These words spake his parents , because they feared the Jews : for the Jews had agreed already , that if any man did confess that he was Christ , he should be put out of the synagogue .
text2: Je waˈ xquibij ru nan u tat rumal chi xa xquixej quib chquiwäch ri winak aj Israel . Ri e areˈ cˈut qui chomam chic junam chi jachin ri cucojo chi ri Jesús are ri Cristo cäquesaj na bi pa ri rachoch Dios .

text: Therefore said his parents , He is of age ; ask him .
text2: Rumal riˈ ru nan u tat ri achi ri xcunax ru wakˈäch xquibij : “ Taˈ alak che ri areˈ . Achi chi yaˈ , ” ― xecha riˈ .

text: Then again called they the man that was blind , and said unto him , Give God the praise : we know that this man is a sinner .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ ri winak aj Israel xquisiqˈuij chi jumul ri achi ri moy can nabe , xquibij che : Chabij baˈ ri kas tzij chke chuwäch ri Dios . Ri uj ketam chi ri achi riˈ are jun ajmac , ― xecha che .

text: He answered and said , Whether he be a sinner or no , I know not : one thing I know , that , whereas I was blind , now I see .
text2: Ri achi xchˈawic , xubij chque : Ri in man wetam taj we are jun ajmac o man are taj , xuwi wetam chi nabe canok in moy , cämic cˈut quincaˈy chic , ― xcha chque .

text: Then said they to him again , What did he to thee ? how opened he thine eyes ?
text2: Xquitaˈ chi cˈu jumul che : ¿ Jas xuban chawe ? ¿ Jas xuban chucunaxic ri a wakˈäch ? ― xecha che .

text: He answered them , I have told you already , and ye did not hear : wherefore would ye hear it again ? will ye also be his disciples ?
text2: Xchˈaw ri achi , xubij chque : Xinbij chech alak , ri alak cˈut xa man cäta tä alak . ¿ Jas che caj alak chi quinbij waˈ jumul chic ? ¿ A xa caj alak coc alak che u tijoxel ? ― xcha chque .

text: Then they reviled him , and said , Thou art his disciple ; but we are Moses ' disciples .
text2: Te riˈ ri e areˈ xquitzeˈj u wäch , xquibij cˈu che : Ri at , at jun rucˈ we achi riˈ , are cˈu ri uj , uj jun rucˈ ri ka mam Moisés .

text: We know that God spake unto Moses : as for this fellow , we know not from whence he is .
text2: Ri uj ketam chi ri Dios xchˈaw rucˈ ri ka mam Moisés . Are cˈu we achi riˈ man ketam taj jawijeˈ ri cäpe wi , ― xecha che .

text: The man answered and said unto them , Why herein is a marvellous thing , that ye know not from whence he is , and yet he hath opened mine eyes .
text2: Ri achi cˈut xchˈawic , xubij chque : ¡ Coˈl ta ne riˈ ! Ri alak man etam tä alak jawijeˈ cäpe wi , ri in cˈut xucunaj ri nu wakˈäch .

text: Now we know that God heareth not sinners : but if any man be a worshipper of God , and doeth his will , him he heareth .
text2: Kas ketam chi ri Dios man cuta tä ri qui tzˈonobal tokˈob ri ajmaquib , xuwi cuta ri qui tzˈonobal tokˈob ri winak ri quekˈijilan che , ri cäcaˈn ru rayibal .

text: Since the world began was it not heard that any man opened the eyes of one that was born blind .
text2: Man cˈo tä jumul ka tom cäbixic chi cˈo jun cäcowin chucunaxic ru wakˈäch jun achi ri moy xil u wäch .

text: If this man were not of God , he could do nothing .
text2: We ta ri achi riˈ mat rucˈ ri Dios petinak wi , mat cˈo jas cäcowin riˈ chubanic , ― xcha chque .

text: They answered and said unto him , Thou wast altogether born in sins , and dost thou teach us ? And they cast him out .
text2: Te riˈ xquibij che : Ri at , xa at ajmac xil a wäch . ¿ A are cawaj cujatijoj ? ― xecha che . Xquesaj cˈu bic pa ri rachoch Dios .

text: Jesus heard that they had cast him out ; and when he had found him , he said unto him , Dost thou believe on the Son of God ?
text2: Ri Jesús xretamaj chi xesax bic ri achi ri moy can nabe . Aretak ri Jesús xuriko , xubij che : ¿ A cäcojon la che ru Cˈojol ri Dios ? ― xcha che .

text: He answered and said , Who is he , Lord , that I might believe on him ?
text2: Ri achi xubij che : Tat , bij la chwe jachin riˈ rech ri in quincojon che , ― xcha che .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Thou hast both seen him , and it is he that talketh with thee .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij che : Ilom chi la u wäch waˈ . In riˈ , ri tajin quintzijon ucˈ la , ― xcha che .

text: And he said , Lord , I believe . And he worshipped him .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ ri achi xxuqui chuwäch ri Jesús , xubij che : Quincojon che la , Kajaw , ― xcha che .

text: And Jesus said , For judgment I am come into this world , that they which see not might see ; and that they which see might be made blind .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús : Ri in , in petinak cho ruwächulew chukˈatic tzij , rech ri moyab cäjaktaj ri qui wakˈäch , xukujeˈ rech ri quecaˈyic quecanaj moy , ― xchaˈ .

text: And some of the Pharisees which were with him heard these words , and said unto him , Are we blind also ?
text2: Te riˈ jujun chque ri tataˈib fariseos ri e cˈo chilaˈ rucˈ ri Areˈ , aretak xquita ri xubij ri Jesús , xquibij che : ¿ A uj moy ta cˈu lo uj xukujeˈ ? ― xecha che .

text: Jesus said unto them , If ye were blind , ye should have no sin : but now ye say , We see ; therefore your sin remaineth .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij chque : We ta alak moy , mat cˈo mac alak riˈ . Rumal cˈu rech chi cäbij alak chi cäcaˈy alak , cˈo mac alak , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that entereth not by the door into the sheepfold , but climbeth up some other way , the same is a thief and a robber .
text2: Kas tzij quinbij chech alak chi jachin ri man coc tä bi chuchiˈ ri qui corral ri chij , xane xa cutzucuj jawijeˈ cunim wi bi rib , ri achi riˈ xa jun elakˈom , jun tˈorinel .

text: But he that entereth in by the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
text2: Are cˈu ri coc bi chuchiˈ ri corral are ajyukˈ riˈ , ri chajil que ri chij .

text: To him the porter openeth ; and the sheep hear his voice : and he calleth his own sheep by name , and leadeth them out .
text2: Ri chajil u chiˈ ri corral cujak riˈ chuwäch rech coquic . Ri chij cˈut cäquichˈob u wäch aretak cächˈawic . Ri ajyukˈ queusiqˈuij ru chij chquijujunal rucˈ ri qui biˈ , queresaj cˈu bi pa ri corral .

text: And when he putteth forth his own sheep , he goeth before them , and the sheep follow him : for they know his voice .
text2: Aretak e resam chi bic conojel ri chij pa ri corral , cänabej bi chquiwäch , are cˈu ri chij queteri bi chrij rumal chi cäquichˈob u wäch aretak cächˈawic .

text: And a stranger will they not follow , but will flee from him : for they know not the voice of strangers .
text2: Man queteri tä cˈu chrij jun winak ri man quetam tä u wäch , xane xa queanimaj chuwäch rumal chi man cäquichˈob taj aretak cächˈaw jun winak ri man quetam tä u wäch , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ri winak aj Israel .

text: This parable spake Jesus unto them : but they understood not what things they were which he spake unto them .
text2: Ri Jesús xucoj waˈ we cˈutbal riˈ chquiwäch , ri e areˈ cˈut man xquichˈob taj jas ri xraj xubij chque .

text: Then said Jesus unto them again , Verily , verily , I say unto you , I am the door of the sheep .
text2: Te riˈ ri Jesús xubij chi jumul chque : Kas tzij quinbij chech alak . Ri in , in ru chiˈ ri corral ri queboc wi bi ri chij .

text: All that ever came before me are thieves and robbers : but the sheep did not hear them .
text2: Conojel ri nabe xebul chnuwäch in , e elakˈomab riˈ , e tˈorinelab . Ri chij cˈut man xquitatabej taj ri xquibij .

text: I am the door : by me if any man enter in , he shall be saved , and shall go in and out , and find pasture .
text2: Ri in , in ru chiˈ ri corral . Jachin ri wumal in coc pa ri corral curik ru tobanic ri Dios . Ri winak riˈ junam rucˈ jun chij ri coc pa ri corral , te cˈu riˈ quel bic , curik utzalaj echaˈ .

text: The thief cometh not , but for to steal , and to kill , and to destroy : I am come that they might have life , and that they might have it more abundantly .
text2: Ri elakˈom xuwi petinak rech querelakˈaj bi ri chij , queucämisaj , cusach qui wäch . Ri in cˈut in petinak chuyaˈic qui cˈaslemal , rech cˈo qui cˈaslemal ri kas utz na .

text: I am the good shepherd : the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep .
text2: In riˈ ri utzalaj ajyukˈ . Ri utzalaj ajyukˈ cuya ru cˈaslemal pa cämical rumal quech ri chij .

text: But he that is an hireling , and not the shepherd , whose own the sheep are not , seeth the wolf coming , and leaveth the sheep , and fleeth : and the wolf catcheth them , and scattereth the sheep .
text2: Are cˈu ri ajyukˈ ri xuwi cuchomaj ri tojbal re , aretak cärilo cäpe ri utiw , queuya can ri chij , canimajic . Je riˈ cubano rumal chi man are tä kas cajyukˈ ri chij , xukujeˈ ri chij man e rech tä ri areˈ . Cäpe cˈu ri utiw queuchap ri chij , queujabuj .

text: The hireling fleeth , because he is an hireling , and careth not for the sheep .
text2: Ri achi riˈ canimajic rumal chi xuwi cuchomaj ri tojbal re . Man querilij tä ri chij .

text: I am the good shepherd , and know my sheep , and am known of mine .
text2: In riˈ ri utzalaj ajyukˈ , wetam qui wäch ri nu chij , xukujeˈ ri e areˈ quetam nu wäch in .

text: As the Father knoweth me , even so know I the Father : and I lay down my life for the sheep .
text2: Jeˈ jas ri nu Tat retam nu wäch in , ri in xukujeˈ wetam u wäch ri nu Tat . Quinya cˈu ri nu cˈaslemal pa cämical rumal quech ri chij .

text: And other sheep I have , which are not of this fold : them also I must bring , and they shall hear my voice ; and there shall be one fold , and one shepherd .
text2: Xukujeˈ e cˈo chi niqˈuiaj nu chij ri man e cˈo tä pa we corral riˈ . Rajwaxic cˈut queincˈama na lok xukujeˈ . Ri chij riˈ cäquinimaj na ri quinbij . Xa cˈu jumulaj chij cäcˈoji na , xukujeˈ xa jun ri cajyukˈ .

text: Therefore doth my Father love me , because I lay down my life , that I might take it again .
text2: Ri ka Tat quinraj in rumal chi quinya ri nu cˈaslemal pa cämical , quincˈastaj chi cˈu na rech cäcˈoji chic ri nu cˈaslemal .

text: No man taketh it from me , but I lay it down of myself . I have power to lay it down , and I have power to take it again . This commandment have I received of my Father .
text2: Man cˈo tä jun quesan ri nu cˈaslemal chwe , xane ri in pa wanimaˈ cäpe wi quinya ri nu cˈaslemal . Pa nu kˈab cˈo wi ru yaˈic ri nu cˈaslemal , xukujeˈ pa nu kˈab cˈo wi ru cˈamic jumul chic . Are waˈ ri xintak wi rumal ri nu Tat , ― xcha ri Jesús .

text: There was a division therefore again among the Jews for these sayings .
text2: Aretak ri winak aj Israel xquita waˈ we tzij riˈ , xquichapla u tasic quib jumul chic .

text: And many of them said , He hath a devil , and is mad ; why hear ye him ?
text2: E qˈuia chque xquibij : ¿ Jas che cätatabej alak ri cubij ? We achi riˈ cˈo jun itzel espíritu che , xukujeˈ chˈujarinak waˈ , ― xechaˈ .

text: Others said , These are not the words of him that hath a devil . Can a devil open the eyes of the blind ?
text2: Niqˈuiaj chi cˈut xquibij : Man cˈo tä jun winak ri cˈo jun itzel espíritu che ri jeˈ cätzijon waˈ we riˈ . ¿ A cäcowin pu lo jun itzel espíritu cujak ri qui wakˈäch ri moyab ? ― xechaˈ . ¡ Man cuyaˈ taj ! ― xecha riˈ .

text: And it was at Jerusalem the feast of the dedication , and it was winter .
text2: Pa tak ri kˈij riˈ xurik ri kˈalaj . Are chiˈ tajin cäban ri nimakˈij pa ri tinimit Jerusalén , natabal re ri kˈij ri xqˈuis u yaquic ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , xjach cˈu pu kˈab ri Dios .

text: And Jesus walked in the temple in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Ri Jesús tajin cäwacat pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios , pa ri rakan ja re Salomón .

text: Then came the Jews round about him , and said unto him , How long dost thou make us to doubt ? If thou be the Christ , tell us plainly .
text2: Xepe cˈu ri winak aj Israel xquimulij quib chrij , xquibij che : ¿ Cˈä jampaˈ cujya la pa sak ? We lal riˈ ri Cristo , bij baˈ la ri kas tzij cämic , ― xecha che .

text: Jesus answered them , I told you , and ye believed not : the works that I do in my Father ' s name , they bear witness of me .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij chque : Ya nu bim chic . Ri alak cˈut man cäcoj tä alak ri xinbij . Ronojel ri u takom ri nu Tat chwe chi quinbano , are cäcˈutuw na rucˈ sakil .

text: But ye believe not , because ye are not of my sheep , as I said unto you .
text2: Ri alak cˈut man cäcojon tä alak rumal chi ri alak man jun tä cucˈ ri nu chij , jas ri xinbij chech alak nabe .

text: My sheep hear my voice , and I know them , and they follow me :
text2: Ri nu chij quetam nu wäch aretak quinchˈawic . Ri in xukujeˈ wetam qui wäch , queteri cˈu chwij .

text: And I give unto them eternal life ; and they shall never perish , neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand .
text2: Ri in quinya cˈaslemal chque ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic . Man cäsach tä qui wäch , man cˈo tä cˈu jachin queesan pa nu kˈab .

text: My Father , which gave them me , is greater than all ; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father ' s hand .
text2: Ri nu Tat , ri nim na u kˈij chquiwäch conojel , are ri xeyoˈw chwe . Man cˈo tä cˈu jachin jun queesan pu kˈab ri Areˈ .

text: I and my Father are one .
text2: Ri in , xukujeˈ ri nu Tat , xa uj jun , ― xcha chque .

text: Then the Jews took up stones again to stone him .
text2: Te riˈ ri winak aj Israel jumul chic xquicˈam abaj rech cäquiqˈuiäk chrij ri Jesús .

text: Jesus answered them , Many good works have I shewed you from my Father ; for which of those works do ye stone me ?
text2: Ri Jesús xubij chque : Qˈuia u wäch utzil nu banom chuwäch alak rumal ru chukˈab ri nu Tat . ¿ Rumal cˈu jachique chque we utzil ri nu banom quinqˈuiäk alak chabaj ? ― xcha chque .

text: The Jews answered him , saying , For a good work we stone thee not ; but for blasphemy ; and because that thou , being a man , makest thyself God .
text2: Ri winak aj Israel xechˈawic , xquibij : Man cäkaqˈuiäk tä la chabaj rumal jun chque ri utzil ri banom la , xane rumal chi bim la ri äwas u bixic chrij ri Dios . Ri lal xak lal jun achi , banom cˈu ib la chi lal Dios , ― xecha che .

text: Jesus answered them , Is it not written in your law , I said , Ye are gods ?
text2: Ri Jesús cˈut xubij chque : Pa ri Pixab alak tzˈibtal wi ri xubij ri Dios : “ Ri ix , ix dioses , ” ― cächaˈ , ― xcha ri Areˈ .

text: If he called them gods , unto whom the word of God came , and the scripture cannot be broken ;
text2: Ketam chi ri cubij ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic , man cuyaˈ taj cäsach u wäch . Ri Dios xubij “ dios ” chque ri winak ri xecojon che ru Lokˈ Pixab .

text: Say ye of him , whom the Father hath sanctified , and sent into the world , Thou blasphemest ; because I said , I am the Son of God ?
text2: We ri Dios xinuchaˈ in , te cˈu riˈ xinutak lok cho we uwächulew , ¿ jas lo waˈ ri cäbij alak chi nu bim ri äwas u bixic chrij ri Dios rumal chi xinbij chi in u Cˈojol ri Dios ?

text: If I do not the works of my Father , believe me not .
text2: We man quinbano jachique ri cuban ri nu Tat , ri alak man rajwaxic taj cäcojon alak chwe .

text: But if I do , though ye believe not me , believe the works : that ye may know , and believe , that the Father is in me , and I in him .
text2: We cˈu quinbano , pune baˈ man cäcojon tä alak chwe , cojon baˈ alak che ri quinbano rech je riˈ kas quetamaj alak , xukujeˈ cäcoj alak chi ri ka Tat cˈo pa wanimaˈ in , xukujeˈ ri in , in cˈo pa ranimaˈ ri ka Tat .

text: Therefore they sought again to take him : but he escaped out of their hand ,
text2: Jumul chic are ta xcaj xquicˈam bi pa cheˈ . Ri Jesús cˈut xresaj rib pa qui kˈab .

text: And went away again beyond Jordan into the place where John at first baptized ; and there he abode .
text2: Te riˈ ri Jesús xeˈ jumul chic chˈäkäp che ri nimaˈ Jordán chrelbal kˈij jawijeˈ ri xuban wi kasnaˈ ri tat Juan nabe , xcanaj cˈu chilaˈ .

text: And many resorted unto him , and said , John did no miracle : but all things that John spake of this man were true .
text2: E qˈuia winak cˈut xebeˈ che rilic , xquibij cˈut : Kas tzij ri tat Juan , pune man xuban tä cajmabal tak etal , ronojel ri xubij chrij we achi riˈ are kas tzij , ― xechaˈ .

text: And many believed on him there .
text2: E qˈuia winak cˈut xecojon che ri Jesús chilaˈ .

text: Now a certain man was sick , named Lazarus , of Bethany , the town of Mary and her sister Martha .
text2: Cˈo jun achi yawab , Lázaro u biˈ , ri cäpe pa ri tinimit Betania , ri tinimit ri e jekel wi ri nan María xukujeˈ ri nan Marta ri ratz .

text: ( It was that Mary which anointed the Lord with ointment , and wiped his feet with her hair , whose brother Lazarus was sick . )
text2: We nan María riˈ , ri ranab ri tat Lázaro ri yawab , are waˈ ri xkˈijow ri cˈocˈalaj aceite chrij ri rakan ri Kajaw Jesús , ri xusuˈ cˈu rucˈ ru wiˈ .

text: Therefore his sisters sent unto him , saying , Lord , behold , he whom thou lovest is sick .
text2: We quieb ixokib riˈ ri cachalal quib , xquitak u bixic che ri Jesús : Kajaw , ri Lázaro ri sibalaj utz la rucˈ , yawab ri areˈ , ― xecha bic .

text: When Jesus heard that , he said , This sickness is not unto death , but for the glory of God , that the Son of God might be glorified thereby .
text2: Aretak xuta ri Jesús waˈ , xubij : Ri cämical ri cucˈam lok we yabil riˈ man are tä qˈuisbal re ru cˈaslemal , xane xa rech cäkˈalajinic chi nim u kˈij ri Dios , xukujeˈ rech rumal we yabil riˈ cäcˈutunic chi nim u kˈij ru Cˈojol ri Dios , ― xchaˈ .

text: Now Jesus loved Martha , and her sister , and Lazarus .
text2: Ri Jesús , pune sibalaj lokˈ ri nan Marta chuwäch , xukujeˈ ru chakˈ , xukujeˈ ri tat Lázaro ,

text: When he had heard therefore that he was sick , he abode two days still in the same place where he was .
text2: aretak xbix che chi yawab ri tat Lázaro , xcanaj na can quieb kˈij chilaˈ jawijeˈ ri cˈo wi .

text: Then after that saith he to his disciples , Let us go into Judaea again .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ xubij chque ru tijoxelab : Joˈ chi jumul pa Judea , ― xcha chque .

text: His disciples say unto him , Master , the Jews of late sought to stone thee ; and goest thou thither again ?
text2: Xquibij cˈu ru tijoxelab che : Ajtij , mäjaˈ naj riˈ ri winak aj Israel ri e cˈo chilaˈ xcaj xquicämisaj la che abaj . ¿ Te riˈ are caj la queˈ chi la jumul jelaˈ ? ― xecha che .

text: Jesus answered , Are there not twelve hours in the day ? If any man walk in the day , he stumbleth not , because he seeth the light of this world .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij chque : ¿ A mat cablajuj hora u pam ri jun kˈij ? We jun winak cäbin pakˈij , man cätzak taj , rumal chi cäril ru sakil ri kˈij ri cäcaˈy puwiˈ ruwächulew .

text: But if a man walk in the night , he stumbleth , because there is no light in him .
text2: We cˈu ri winak chakˈab cäbinic , cätzakic , rumal chi man cˈo tä ri sakil pa ru be , ― xcha chque .

text: These things said he : and after that he saith unto them , Our friend Lazarus sleepeth ; but I go , that I may awake him out of sleep .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ xubij chi ri Jesús chque : Ri tat Lázaro , ri sibalaj uj utz rucˈ , xwaric , quineˈ cˈut quincˈasuj na , ― xcha chque .

text: Then said his disciples , Lord , if he sleep , he shall do well .
text2: Te riˈ ri tijoxelab xquibij che ri Jesús : Kajaw , we cäwaric quel cubij waˈ chi cutzir na , ― xecha che .

text: Howbeit Jesus spake of his death : but they thought that he had spoken of taking of rest in sleep .
text2: Ri Jesús cˈut are tajin cubij chi ri tat Lázaro xcämic . Are cˈu ri tijoxelab xquichomaj e areˈ chi are tajin cubij ri waram ri cuban jun winak .

text: Then said Jesus unto them plainly , Lazarus is dead .
text2: Te riˈ xubij ri Jesús chque chi sakil : Ri tat Lázaro ya xcämic , ― xchaˈ .

text: And I am glad for your sakes that I was not there , to the intent ye may believe ; nevertheless let us go unto him .
text2: Ri in quinquicotic chi man in cˈo tä chilaˈ . Are cˈu utz na waˈ chiwe ix rech quixcojonic . Joˈ baˈ jekilaˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: Then said Thomas , which is called Didymus , unto his fellowdisciples , Let us also go , that we may die with him .
text2: Are cˈu ri tat Tomás ri “ Gemelo ” cuchixic , xubij chque ri niqˈuiaj tijoxelab chic ri e rachiˈl : Joˈ uj xukujeˈ rech cujecäm rucˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: Then when Jesus came , he found that he had lain in the grave four days already .
text2: Aretak xopan ri Jesús , teˈ xuto chi xqueˈ quiejeb kˈij mukutal chi ri tat Lázaro .

text: Now Bethany was nigh unto Jerusalem , about fifteen furlongs off :
text2: Ri alaj tinimit Betania nakaj cˈo wi che ri tinimit Jerusalén . Craj cˈo niqˈuiaj legua u najal .

text: And many of the Jews came to Martha and Mary , to comfort them concerning their brother .
text2: E qˈuia cˈu chque ri winak aj Israel e opaninak cho rachoch ri nan Marta , ri nan María , chucuˈbisaxic qui cˈux rumal ru cämical ri qui xibal .

text: Then Martha , as soon as she heard that Jesus was coming , went and met him : but Mary sat still in the house .
text2: Aretak ri nan Marta xretamaj chi opanem cuban ri Jesús , xeˈ chucˈulaxic , are cˈu ri nan María xcanaj can cho ja .

text: Then said Martha unto Jesus , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Ri nan Marta xubij che ri Jesús : Kajaw , we ta cˈo la waral , mat xcäm ri nu xibal , ― xcha che .

text: But I know , that even now , whatsoever thou wilt ask of God , God will give it thee .
text2: Wetam cˈut chi ronojel ri cätaˈ la che ri Dios , ri Areˈ cuya na waˈ che la , ― xcha che .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Thy brother shall rise again .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij che : Ri a xibal cäcˈastaj na chquixol ri cäminakib , ― xcha che .

text: Martha saith unto him , I know that he shall rise again in the resurrection at the last day .
text2: Ri nan Marta xubij che ri Jesús : Jeˈ , wetam chi cäcˈastaj na chquixol ri cäminakib pa ri qˈuisbal kˈij , ― xcha che .

text: Jesus said unto her , I am the resurrection , and the life : he that believeth in me , though he were dead , yet shall he live :
text2: Te riˈ xubij ri Jesús che : Ri in , in riˈ quincˈastajisaj ri cäminakib xukujeˈ quinya qui cˈaslemal . Jachin ri cäcojon chwe in , pune cäcämic , cäcˈasi chi cˈu na .

text: And whosoever liveth and believeth in me shall never die . Believest thou this ?
text2: Conojel cˈu ri cˈä e cˈaslic ri quecojon chwe , man quecäm tä wi . ¿ A cacoj waˈ ? ― xcha che ri nan Marta .

text: She saith unto him , Yea , Lord : I believe that thou art the Christ , the Son of God , which should come into the world .
text2: Ri nan Marta xubij che : Jeˈ , Wajaw , ri in quincojo chi lal riˈ ri Cristo , ru Cˈojol ri Dios , ri ulinak la waral cho ri uwächulew , ― xcha che .

text: And when she had so said , she went her way , and called Mary her sister secretly , saying , The Master is come , and calleth for thee .
text2: Aretak xbitaj waˈ we tzij riˈ rumal ri nan Marta , xeˈc , xusiqˈuij lok ri nan María ru chakˈ . Xak chcˈuyal xubij che : Ri Ajtij cˈo waral , catusiqˈuij , ― xcha che .

text: As soon as she heard that , she arose quickly , and came unto him .
text2: Ri nan María , xuwi xuto ri xbix che , chanim cˈu xwalijic , xeˈ chuchˈabexic ri Jesús .

text: Now Jesus was not yet come into the town , but was in that place where Martha met him .
text2: Mäjaˈ cˈu kas copan ri Jesús pa ri tinimit . Cˈä cˈo chilaˈ jawijeˈ ri xcˈulax wi rumal ri nan Marta .

text: The Jews then which were with her in the house , and comforted her , when they saw Mary , that she rose up hastily and went out , followed her , saying , She goeth unto the grave to weep there .
text2: Ri winak aj Israel , ri e cˈo cucˈ pa ja chucuˈbisaxic qui cˈux , aretak xquilo chi aninak xwalij bi ri nan María , xebeˈ ri e areˈ rucˈ . Xquichomaj chi jelaˈ queˈ chuchiˈ ri mukubal che okˈej .

text: Then when Mary was come where Jesus was , and saw him , she fell down at his feet , saying unto him , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Aretak cˈut xopan ri nan María rucˈ ri Jesús , xxuqui chuwäch , xubij che : Wajaw , we ta cˈo la waral , mat xcäm ri nu xibal , ― xcha che .

text: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping , and the Jews also weeping which came with her , he groaned in the spirit , and was troubled ,
text2: Ri Jesús , aretak xrilo chi xuchap okˈej ri nan María , xukujeˈ ri winak aj Israel ri e petinak rucˈ , sibalaj xbisonic , cˈäx xunaˈ pa ranimaˈ .

text: And said , Where have ye laid him ? They said unto him , Lord , come and see .
text2: Xutaˈ cˈu chque : ¿ Jawijeˈ ri mukutal wi ? ― xcha chque . Ri e areˈ xquibij che : Kajaw , saˈjmpe la , jeˈila la , ― xecha che .

text: Jesus wept .
text2: Ri Jesús cˈut xokˈic .

text: Then said the Jews , Behold how he loved him !
text2: Xquibij cˈu ri winak aj Israel : Chiwilampeˈ chi sibalaj lokˈ chuwäch , ― xechaˈ .

text: And some of them said , Could not this man , which opened the eyes of the blind , have caused that even this man should not have died ?
text2: Jujun cˈu chque xquibij : We achi riˈ ri xjakow ru wakˈäch ri moy , ¿ a mat xcowin ta waˈ chubanic jun tokˈob che ri tat Lázaro rech mat xcämic ? ― xechaˈ .

text: Jesus therefore again groaning in himself cometh to the grave . It was a cave , and a stone lay upon it .
text2: Ri Jesús , jumul chic sibalaj cˈäx tajin cunaˈ pa ranimaˈ , xnakajin chuchiˈ ri jul ri mukutal wi ri tat Lázaro . Are jun pec , cojom cˈu jun abaj che tzˈapibal re ru chiˈ .

text: Jesus said , Take ye away the stone . Martha , the sister of him that was dead , saith unto him , Lord , by this time he stinketh : for he hath been dead four days .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij : Chesaj alak ri abaj , ― xcha chque ri winak . Are cˈu ri nan Marta , ri ranab can ri cäminak , xubij che ri Jesús : Kajaw , cˈo chi ruxlab riˈ rumal chi xqueˈ quiejeb kˈij waˈ cäminak chic , ― xcha che .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Said I not unto thee , that , if thou wouldest believe , thou shouldest see the glory of God ?
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús che : ¿ A mat nu bim chawe chi we catcojonic cawil na u nimarisaxic u kˈij ri Dios ? ― xcha che .

text: Then they took away the stone from the place where the dead was laid . And Jesus lifted up his eyes , and said , Father , I thank thee that thou hast heard me .
text2: Te riˈ xquesaj ri abaj . Ri Jesús xcaˈy chicaj , xuban orar , xubij : Tat , quinmaltioxij che la chi xintatabej la .

text: And I knew that thou hearest me always : but because of the people which stand by I said it , that they may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Wetam chi amakˈel ronojel kˈij quintatabej la . Xa cˈu rumal quech we winak riˈ ri e cˈo waral , quinbij waˈ rech cäquicojo chi are ri lal in takowinak la lok , ― xchaˈ .

text: And when he thus had spoken , he cried with a loud voice , Lazarus , come forth .
text2: Aretak xbitaj waˈ rumal , co xchˈawic , xubij : ¡ Lázaro , chatel lok ! ― xchaˈ .

text: And he that was dead came forth , bound hand and foot with graveclothes : and his face was bound about with a napkin . Jesus saith unto them , Loose him , and let him go .
text2: Xel cˈu lok ri cäminak , botzˈom ri rakan u kˈab rucˈ tak atzˈiak . Ru palaj pistal rucˈ jun suˈt . Ri Jesús xubij chque ri winak : Soloˈ alak , tzokopij alak bic , ― xcha chque .

text: Then many of the Jews which came to Mary , and had seen the things which Jesus did , believed on him .
text2: Rucˈ waˈ ri xbantajic , e qˈuia chque ri winak aj Israel ri e opaninak chucuˈbisaxic u cˈux ri nan María , xecojon che ri Jesús . Xquil cˈu ri cajmabal ri xubano .

text: But some of them went their ways to the Pharisees , and told them what things Jesus had done .
text2: E cˈo cˈu jujun chque xebeˈ cucˈ ri tataˈib fariseos chubixic chque ri u banom ri Jesús .

text: Then gathered the chief priests and the Pharisees a council , and said , What do we ? for this man doeth many miracles .
text2: Are cˈu ri tataˈib fariseos , xukujeˈ ri qui nimakil ri sacerdotes xeˈquimulij quib cucˈ ri qui nimakil ri winak , xquibij : ¿ Jas cäkaˈno ? We achi riˈ tajin cuban qˈuia cajmabal tak etal , ― quechaˈ .

text: If we let him thus alone , all men will believe on him : and the Romans shall come and take away both our place and nation .
text2: We cäkaya can xak chi je riˈ , conojel ri winak quecojon na che ri Areˈ . Quepe cˈu na ri kˈatal tak tzij aj Roma , cäquiwulij na ri nimalaj rachoch Dios ri cäkamulij wi kib , cäquisach na u wäch ri ka tinimit , ― xechaˈ .

text: And one of them , named Caiaphas , being the high priest that same year , said unto them , Ye know nothing at all ,
text2: Are cˈu ri tat Caifás , ri qui nimal ri sacerdotes pa ri junab riˈ , xubij chque : Ri ix , xa man cˈo tä iwetam , ― cächaˈ .

text: Nor consider that it is expedient for us , that one man should die for the people , and that the whole nation perish not .
text2: ¿ A mat quichˈobo chi are utz na chke uj chi cäcäm xa jun achi che qui qˈuexwäch ri winak , chuwäch ri cäsach u wäch ronojel ri tinimit ? ― xcha chque .

text: And this spake he not of himself : but being high priest that year , he prophesied that Jesus should die for that nation ;
text2: Man xak tä cˈu pa ru chomanic ri tat Caifás xpe wi waˈ we tzij riˈ ri xubij , xane rumal chi are qui nimal ri sacerdotes pa ri junab riˈ ri Dios xyoˈw waˈ pa ranimaˈ chi cubij chi ri Jesús cäcäm na rumal quech ri winak aj Israel .

text: And not for that nation only , but that also he should gather together in one the children of God that were scattered abroad .
text2: Man xuwi tä cˈu rumal quech ri winak aj Israel cäcäm na ri Jesús , xane che qui mulixic conojel ri ralcˈual ri Dios ri e jabuninak cho ronojel ruwächulew .

text: Then from that day forth they took counsel together for to put him to death .
text2: Xa je riˈ ri qui nimakil ri winak aj Israel tzpa ri kˈij riˈ xquichap u chomaxic jas cäcaˈn chucämisaxic ri Jesús .

text: Jesus therefore walked no more openly among the Jews ; but went thence unto a country near to the wilderness , into a city called Ephraim , and there continued with his disciples .
text2: Rumal riˈ ri Jesús ya man xucˈut tä chi rib chquiwäch ri winak aj Israel . Xel bi pa Judea , xeˈ jelaˈ chunakaj ri juyub ri cätzˈinowic , pa jun tinimit Efraín u biˈ . Chilaˈ xcˈoji wi cucˈ ru tijoxelab .

text: And the Jews ' passover was nigh at hand : and many went out of the country up to Jerusalem before the passover , to purify themselves .
text2: Xa cˈu jubikˈ craj man curik ri Pascua , jun chque ri qui nimakˈij ri winak aj Israel . E qˈuia winak cˈut pa tak ri niqˈuiaj tak tinimit chic xebeˈ pa ri tinimit Jerusalén , mäjok ri Pascua , chuchˈajic quib che resaxic ri äwas chquij .

text: Then sought they for Jesus , and spake among themselves , as they stood in the temple , What think ye , that he will not come to the feast ?
text2: Tajin cˈu cäquitzucuj ri Jesús . Aretak e cˈo pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios cäquitala u tzijol chbil tak quib , cäquibij : ¿ Jas cäbij alak ? ¿ A cäpe riˈ pa we nimakˈij o man cäpe taj ? ― quechaˈ .

text: Now both the chief priests and the Pharisees had given a commandment , that , if any man knew where he were , he should shew it , that they might take him .
text2: Ri tataˈib fariseos , xukujeˈ ri qui nimakil ri sacerdotes , qui yoˈm takanic chi we cˈo jun winak retam jawijeˈ cˈo wi ri Jesús , chubij waˈ chque rech quecowinic quequichapa lok .

text: Then Jesus six days before the passover came to Bethany , where Lazarus was which had been dead , whom he raised from the dead .
text2: Wakib kˈij craj na che ri nimakˈij Pascua aretak ri Jesús xeˈ pa Betania , ri tinimit ri jekel wi ri tat Lázaro ri xcˈastajisax rumal ri Jesús chquixol ri cäminakib .

text: There they made him a supper ; and Martha served : but Lazarus was one of them that sat at the table with him .
text2: Chilaˈ cˈut xcaˈn u banic jun wiˈm re benak kˈij chuyaˈic u kˈij ri Jesús . Ri nan Marta tajin cucoj ri wa puwiˈ ri mesa , are cˈu ri tat Lázaro jun ri areˈ tˈuyul chiˈ ri mesa rucˈ ri Jesús .

text: Then took Mary a pound of ointment of spikenard , very costly , and anointed the feet of Jesus , and wiped his feet with her hair : and the house was filled with the odour of the ointment .
text2: Te riˈ xpe ri nan María rucˈam niqˈuiaj litro cˈocˈalaj cunabal re kas nardo . Sibalaj cˈu pakal rajil waˈ we cunabal riˈ . Xukˈij chrij ri rakan ri Jesús , te cˈu riˈ xusuˈ rucˈ ru wiˈ . Ronojel cˈu ru pam ri ja xnoj che ru cˈocˈal ri cunabal .

text: Then saith one of his disciples , Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , which should betray him ,
text2: Te riˈ jun chque ru tijoxelab ri Jesús , ri jun ri cäjachow na , ri Judas Iscariote ru cˈojol ri tat Simón , xubij :

text: Why was not this ointment sold for three hundred pence , and given to the poor ?
text2: ¿ Jas che man xqˈuiyix ta waˈ we cˈocˈalaj cunabal riˈ che oxib cientos quetzales , xyiˈ ta cˈu ri puak chque ri mebaˈib ? ― xchaˈ .

text: This he said , not that he cared for the poor ; but because he was a thief , and had the bag , and bare what was put therein .
text2: Man kas tzij tä cˈut chi ri tat Judas xa cutokˈobisaj qui wäch ri mebaˈib chi jeˈ xubij waˈ , xane rumal chi are jun elakˈom . Pu kˈab cˈu ri areˈ cˈo wi ri cˈolibal puak . Xa je riˈ xcowinic xrelakˈaj ri puak ri cˈo rucˈ .

text: Then said Jesus , Let her alone : against the day of my burying hath she kept this .
text2: Te riˈ xubij ri Jesús che : ¡ Maban waˈ che ri ixok ! U cˈolom cˈu bi ri cˈocˈalaj cunabal riˈ cˈä mäjok quinmukic .

text: For the poor always ye have with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Amakˈel cˈut e cˈo ri mebaˈib iwucˈ , are cˈu ri in man in cˈo tä iwucˈ amakˈel ronojel kˈij , ― xcha chque .

text: Much people of the Jews therefore knew that he was there : and they came not for Jesus ' sake only , but that they might see Lazarus also , whom he had raised from the dead .
text2: E qˈuia cˈu chque ri winak aj Israel xquito chi ri Jesús cˈo pa ri alaj tinimit Betania , xebeˈ cˈu jelaˈ man xuwi tä che rilic ri Jesús , xane xukujeˈ che rilic ri tat Lázaro ri xcˈastajisax rumal ri Jesús chquixol ri cäminakib .

text: But the chief priests consulted that they might put Lazarus also to death ;
text2: Are cˈu ri qui nimakil sacerdotes xjunamataj ri qui chomanic chucämisaxic ri tat Lázaro xukujeˈ .

text: Because that by reason of him many of the Jews went away , and believed on Jesus .
text2: Rumal cˈu rech ri areˈ e qˈuia chque ri winak aj Israel tajin cäquitas quib chquij ri qui nimakil sacerdotes rech quecojon che ri Jesús .

text: On the next day much people that were come to the feast , when they heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem ,
text2: E qˈuia winak e benak pa ri tinimit Jerusalén che ri nimakˈij Pascua . Chucab kˈij xquito chi ri Jesús copan na pa ri tinimit .

text: Took branches of palm trees , and went forth to meet him , and cried , Hosanna : Blessed is the King of Israel that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Te riˈ xquijol u xak tak palmas , xquicˈam bic , xebeˈ cˈu chucˈulaxic ri Jesús . Co xechˈawic , xquibij : ¡ Chnimarisax u kˈij ri Dios ! ¡ Utz re ri petinak pa ru biˈ ri Kajaw Dios ! ¡ Tewchital baˈ ri nim takanel pa qui wiˈ ri winak aj Israel ! ― xechaˈ .

text: And Jesus , when he had found a young ass , sat thereon ; as it is written ,
text2: Ri Jesús xurik jun burro , xquiejen cˈu chrij , jas ri cubij ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic :

text: Fear not , daughter of Sion : behold , thy King cometh , sitting on an ass ' s colt .
text2: Mixej iwib , winak aj Sión . ¡ Chiwilampeˈ ! Petinak ri Jun ri cätakan na pi wiˈ , quiejeninak chrij jun burro ,

text: These things understood not his disciples at the first : but when Jesus was glorified , then remembered they that these things were written of him , and that they had done these things unto him .
text2: ― cächaˈ . Pa tak ri kˈij riˈ ru tijoxelab ri Jesús man xquichˈob tä ri tajin cäbantajic . Te cˈu riˈ aretak xnimarisax u kˈij ri Jesús , xnaˈtaj chque chi ronojel waˈ ri quilom are tzˈibtal lok chrij ri Areˈ , ronojel cˈut bantajinak .

text: The people therefore that was with him when he called Lazarus out of his grave , and raised him from the dead , bare record .
text2: Ri winak ri e cˈo rucˈ ri Jesús aretak xusiqˈuij lok ri tat Lázaro pa ri mukubal , xucˈastajisaj cˈu chquixol ri cäminakib , xquitzijoj waˈ ri xquilo .

text: For this cause the people also met him , for that they heard that he had done this miracle .
text2: Rumal riˈ ri winak xebel lok chucˈulaxic ri Jesús , rumal chi xquetamaj we cajmabal etal riˈ ri xubano .

text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves , Perceive ye how ye prevail nothing ? behold , the world is gone after him .
text2: Are cˈu ri tataˈib fariseos xquibij chbil tak quib : Quil baˈ alak chi man cˈo tä jas cujcowin chubanic . ¡ Chilampe alak ! Conojel ri winak quebeˈ rucˈ , ― xechaˈ .

text: And there were certain Greeks among them that came up to worship at the feast :
text2: Chquixol ri winak ri e benak pa ri tinimit Jerusalén che kˈijilanic pa ri nimakˈij , e cˈo jujun winak aj Grecia .

text: The same came therefore to Philip , which was of Bethsaida of Galilee , and desired him , saying , Sir , we would see Jesus .
text2: We winak riˈ xeopan rucˈ ri tat Felipe ri aj Betsaida re Galilea , xquibochiˈj , xquibij che : Tat , cäkaj cäkil u wäch ri Jesús , ― xecha che .

text: Philip cometh and telleth Andrew : and again Andrew and Philip tell Jesus .
text2: Ri tat Felipe xeˈc , xubij che ri tat Andrés . Te cˈu riˈ ri quieb chic xebeˈc , xeˈquibij che ri Jesús .

text: And Jesus answered them , saying , The hour is come , that the Son of man should be glorified .
text2: Te riˈ ri Jesús xubij chque : Xurik ri kˈij ri cänimarisax nu kˈij in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except a corn of wheat fall into the ground and die , it abideth alone : but if it die , it bringeth forth much fruit .
text2: Kas tzij quinbij chiwe , chi we man cäkaj ri jun u wakˈäch trico pa ri ulew rech cäkˈayic , tajin wi riˈ xak jun u wakˈäch trico . We cˈu cäkˈayic , cätux na riˈ , cuya cˈu na qˈuia u wäch .
