text: He that loveth his life shall lose it ; and he that hateth his life in this world shall keep it unto life eternal .
text2: Apachin ta ne ri lokˈ cäril wi ru cˈaslemal , cäcäm na waˈ ri winak riˈ , cutzak na ronojel . Apachin cˈu ri man lokˈ taj cäril wi ru cˈaslemal cho we uwächulew , cutoˈ na u wiˈ riˈ , curik cˈu na ri cˈaslemal ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic .

text: If any man serve me , let him follow me ; and where I am , there shall also my servant be : if any man serve me , him will my Father honour .
text2: We cˈo jun ri craj cäpatänin chwe , chpet wucˈ . Jawijeˈ cˈu ri quincˈoji wi , chilaˈ xukujeˈ cäcˈoji wi na ri patänil we . We cˈo jun ri cäpatänin chwe , cäyiˈ na u kˈij rumal ri nu Tat , ― xcha chque .

text: Now is my soul troubled ; and what shall I say ? Father , save me from this hour : but for this cause came I unto this hour .
text2: Sibalaj cˈäx quinnaˈ pa wanimaˈ cämic . ¿ Jas ta cˈu lo ri quinbij na ? ¿ A quinbij ta cˈut : “ Tat , chintoˈ la chuwäch ri cäpe na pa nu wiˈ cämic ” ? Are cˈu waˈ nu patän in petinak , ― xcha ri Jesús .

text: Father , glorify thy name . Then came there a voice from heaven , saying , I have both glorified it , and will glorify it again .
text2: Tat , nimarisaj baˈ la u kˈij ri biˈ la , ― xchaˈ . Te cˈu riˈ cˈo Jun ri xchˈaw lok chicaj ri xubij : Nu nimarisam u kˈij , quinnimarisaj cˈu na u kˈij jumul chic , ― xchaˈ .

text: The people therefore , that stood by , and heard it , said that it thundered : others said , An angel spake to him .
text2: Are cˈu ri winak ri e cˈo chilaˈ ri tajin quetatabenic xquibij chi are jun quiäkulja ri xtatajic . Niqˈuiaj chic xquibij : Are jun ángel ri xchˈaw rucˈ , ― xechaˈ .

text: Jesus answered and said , This voice came not because of me , but for your sakes .
text2: Te riˈ ri Jesús xubij chque : Man rumal tä wech in xtatajic chi cˈo Jun ri xchˈaw lok chicaj , xane rumal iwech ix .

text: Now is the judgment of this world : now shall the prince of this world be cast out .
text2: Cämic waˈ ri kˈij ri cäkˈat tzij puwiˈ we uwächulew riˈ . Cämic ri kˈij ri cäpakchix apan ri jun ri cätakan puwiˈ we uwächulew .

text: And I , if I be lifted up from the earth , will draw all men unto me .
text2: Aretak cˈut ri in quinwalijisax chicaj , conojel quecaˈy na chwe , sibalaj cäquicajmaj cˈu na nu wäch , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: This he said , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Xubij waˈ we tzij riˈ chukˈalajisaxic jas u wäch cämical curik na .

text: The people answered him , We have heard out of the law that Christ abideth for ever : and how sayest thou , The Son of man must be lifted up ? who is this Son of man ?
text2: Xechˈaw cˈu ri winak , xquibij che : Ri uj ka tom u siqˈuixic pa tak ri ka wuj re ri Pixab chi ri Cristo cäcˈasi na pa tak ri kˈij ri junab ri quepetic . ¿ Jas cˈu che cäbij la chi ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak cäwalijisax na chicaj ? ¿ Jachin chi cˈu riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak ? ― xecha che .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Yet a little while is the light with you . Walk while ye have the light , lest darkness come upon you : for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth .
text2: Te riˈ ri Jesús xubij chque : Cämic riˈ cˈä cˈo na ri sakil iwucˈ , xa cˈu quieb oxib kˈij chic cˈolic . Chixbin baˈ chanim ri cˈä cˈo ri sakil iwucˈ , rech man quixcanaj tä can pa kˈekum . Jachin cˈu ri cäbin pa kˈekum , man cuchˈob tä riˈ jawijeˈ ri queˈ wi .

text: While ye have light , believe in the light , that ye may be the children of light . These things spake Jesus , and departed , and did hide himself from them .
text2: Chixcojon che ri sakil cämic , ri cˈä cˈo na ri sakil iwucˈ . Je riˈ rech ri ix , ix winak chic rech ri sakil , ― xcha ri Jesús chque . Xuwi xbitaj waˈ we tzij riˈ rumal ri Jesús , xeˈ ri Areˈ , xucˈuˈ rib chquiwäch .

text: But though he had done so many miracles before them , yet they believed not on him :
text2: Ri Jesús , pune xuban qˈuia cajmabal tak etal chquiwäch ri winak aj Israel , ri e areˈ man xecojon tä che .

text: That the saying of Esaias the prophet might be fulfilled , which he spake , Lord , who hath believed our report ? and to whom hath the arm of the Lord been revealed ?
text2: Rajwaxic cˈut chi cäbantaj na waˈ jas ri u tzˈibam can ri ka mam Isaías ri kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri cubij : Kajaw Dios , ¿ jachin ta lo ri cojoninak che ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri ka bim ? ¿ Jachin ta lo chuwäch u cˈutum wi ri Kajaw Dios ru chukˈab ?

text: Therefore they could not believe , because that Esaias said again ,
text2: ― cächa riˈ . Rumal riˈ man xecowin taj xecojonic , rumal chi xukujeˈ xutzˈibaj can ri ka mam Isaías :

text: He hath blinded their eyes , and hardened their heart ; that they should not see with their eyes , nor understand with their heart , and be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Ri Dios xuban moy chque , xukujeˈ xubano chi xeabajir ri canimaˈ , rech man cäquil tä rucˈ ri qui wakˈäch , man cäquichˈob tä rucˈ ri qui chomabal , man quetzelej tä cˈu wucˈ in rech quecunatajic , ― cächa ri Dios ,

text: These things said Esaias , when he saw his glory , and spake of him .
text2: ― cächaˈ . Ri ka mam Isaías xubij waˈ we tzij riˈ rumal chi ri areˈ xrilo xnimarisax u kˈij ri Jesús , xchˈaw cˈu chrij .

text: Nevertheless among the chief rulers also many believed on him ; but because of the Pharisees they did not confess him , lest they should be put out of the synagogue :
text2: Pune je riˈ , e qˈuia chque ri winak aj Israel xecojon na che ri Jesús , xukujeˈ ne jujun chque ri nimak qui banic . Man xquikˈalajisaj tä cˈu quib chquiwäch ri winak rumal chi xquixej quib chquiwäch ri tataˈib fariseos , rech man queesax tä bi pa ri rachoch Dios .

text: For they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God .
text2: Ri e areˈ cˈut are utz xquil na chi cäyiˈ qui kˈij cumal ri winak chuwäch ri cäyiˈ qui kˈij rumal ri Dios .

text: Jesus cried and said , He that believeth on me , believeth not on me , but on him that sent me .
text2: Ri Jesús sibalaj co xchˈawic , xubij : Jachin ri cäcojon chwe in , man xuwi tä chwe in cäcojon wi , xane xukujeˈ cäcojon riˈ che ri ka Tat ri xintakow lok .

text: And he that seeth me seeth him that sent me .
text2: Jachin cˈu ri quinril in , cäril riˈ xukujeˈ ri xintakow lok .

text: I am come a light into the world , that whosoever believeth on me should not abide in darkness .
text2: In riˈ ri quinya sakil , in petinak cho ruwächulew rech jachin tak ri quecojon chwe , man quecanaj tä can pa ri kˈekum .

text: And if any man hear my words , and believe not , I judge him not : for I came not to judge the world , but to save the world .
text2: Jachin cˈu ri cuta ri nu tzij , te cˈu riˈ man cunimaj taj , man in tä riˈ ri quinkˈatow tzij puwiˈ chi cäcˈäjisax u wäch . Je riˈ , rumal chi ri in man in petinak tä chukˈatic tzij pa qui wiˈ ri winak ajuwächulew , xane in petinak che qui toˈic .

text: He that rejecteth me , and receiveth not my words , hath one that judgeth him : the word that I have spoken , the same shall judge him in the last day .
text2: Jachin ri xa cäretzelaj nu wäch , man cunimaj tä cˈu ri nu tzij , cˈo ri cäkˈatow na tzij puwiˈ chi cäcˈäjisax u wäch . Ri tzij ri nu bim e are riˈ ri quekˈatow na tzij puwiˈ pa ri qˈuisbal kˈij .

text: For I have not spoken of myself ; but the Father which sent me , he gave me a commandment , what I should say , and what I should speak .
text2: Man xak tä cˈu pa we wi in quinchˈawic . Ri ka Tat ri xintakow lok , are ri Areˈ u bim chwe jachique ri quinbij xukujeˈ jachique ri quincˈutu .

text: And I know that his commandment is life everlasting : whatsoever I speak therefore , even as the Father said unto me , so I speak .
text2: Wetam cˈut chi ru takanic ri nu Tat are re cˈaslemal ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic . Xa je riˈ , ri quinbij , are quinbij jas ri in takom wi rumal ri ka Tat .

text: Now before the feast of the passover , when Jesus knew that his hour was come that he should depart out of this world unto the Father , having loved his own which were in the world , he loved them unto the end .
text2: Xa cˈu jun kˈij chic craj che ri nimakˈij , Pascua u biˈ . Retam chi cˈu ri Jesús chi xurik ri kˈij ri cuya na can ruwächulew , cätzelej cˈu rucˈ ru Tat . Ri Areˈ amakˈel ronojel kˈij sibalaj lokˈ xeril wi ru tijoxelab cho ruwächulew . Pa ri kˈij riˈ tajin cucˈut chquiwäch chi sibalaj lokˈ querilo , chi man cˈo tä u qˈuisic ri qui lokˈal chuwäch .

text: And supper being ended , the devil having now put into the heart of Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , to betray him ;
text2: Tajin cäcaˈn ri wiˈm re benak kˈij . Ri Itzel cˈut u yoˈm chi pa ranimaˈ ri tat Judas Iscariote ru cˈojol ri tat Simón chi pa ri akˈab riˈ cujach na ri Jesús .

text: Jesus knowing that the Father had given all things into his hands , and that he was come from God , and went to God ;
text2: Retam cˈu ri Jesús chi ronojel takanic yoˈm pu kˈab rumal ru Tat . Retam chi rucˈ ri Dios petinak wi ri Areˈ , xukujeˈ chi rucˈ ri Dios cätzelej wi .

text: He riseth from supper , and laid aside his garments ; and took a towel , and girded himself .
text2: Xwalij cˈu ri Jesús chiˈ ri mesa , xresaj ru kˈuˈ , xucˈam jun toalla , xuxim cˈu waˈ xeˈ ru pam .

text: After that he poureth water into a bason , and began to wash the disciples ' feet , and to wipe them with the towel wherewith he was girded .
text2: Te riˈ xuya joron pa jun palangana , xuchap u chˈajic cakan ru tijoxelab , xusuˈ cˈu rucˈ ri toalla ri ximital xeˈ ru pam .

text: Then cometh he to Simon Peter : and Peter saith unto him , Lord , dost thou wash my feet ?
text2: Aretak craj cuchˈaj rakan ri tat Pedro , ri areˈ xubij che ri Jesús : Wajaw , ¿ a cächˈaj cˈu la ri wakan in ? ― xcha che .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , What I do thou knowest not now ; but thou shalt know hereafter .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij che : Cämic riˈ man cachˈob taj jas ri tajin quinbano , cˈä teˈ baˈ pa jun kˈij chic cachˈob na , ― xcha che .

text: Peter saith unto him , Thou shalt never wash my feet . Jesus answered him , If I wash thee not , thou hast no part with me .
text2: Are cˈu ri tat Pedro xubij che : Ri in , man cˈo tä jumul quinya che la chi cächˈaj la ri wakan in , ― xcha che . Ri Jesús xubij che : We man quinchˈaj tä ri awakan , man cuyaˈ taj catcˈoji wucˈ , ― xcha che .

text: Simon Peter saith unto him , Lord , not my feet only , but also my hands and my head .
text2: Ri tat Simón Pedro xubij che : Wajaw , man xuwi tä baˈ ri wakan , xane chˈaja la ri nu kˈab xukujeˈ ri nu jolom , ― xcha che .

text: Jesus saith to him , He that is washed needeth not save to wash his feet , but is clean every whit : and ye are clean , but not all .
text2: Are cˈu ri Jesús xubij che : Jachin ri teˈ xtoˈtaj che ri atinem man rajwaxic tä chic cuchˈaj rib , xane xak xuwi chi ri rakan , rumal chi ronojel ru cuerpo chˈajchˈoj chic . Ri ix , ix chˈajchˈoj chic , pune man iwonojel taj , ― xcha che .

text: For he knew who should betray him ; therefore said he , Ye are not all clean .
text2: Ri Jesús ya retam chic jachin ri cäjachow na . Rumal riˈ xubij : “ Man iwonojel tä ri ix , ix chˈajchˈoj , ” ― xcha chque .

text: So after he had washed their feet , and had taken his garments , and was set down again , he said unto them , Know ye what I have done to you ?
text2: Aretak ri Jesús xtoˈtaj chuchˈajic ri cakan ru tijoxelab , xucˈam ru kˈuˈ , xucoj chrij , xtˈuyi chi cˈu jumul chiˈ ri mesa . Xubij cˈu chque : ¿ A quichˈobo jas quel cubij waˈ ri xinban chiwe ? ― xcha chque .

text: Ye call me Master and Lord : and ye say well ; for so I am .
text2: Ri ix quibij Kajtij , xukujeˈ Kajaw , ― quixcha chwe . Kas tzij ri quibij , rumal chi in cˈu riˈ .

text: If I then , your Lord and Master , have washed your feet ; ye also ought to wash one another ' s feet .
text2: We in , ri in Iwajtij , ri in Iwajaw nu chˈajom ri iwakan , ri ix xukujeˈ rajwaxic baˈ quichˈaj ri iwakan chbil tak iwib .

text: For I have given you an example , that ye should do as I have done to you .
text2: Ri in nu yoˈm jun cˈutbal chiwäch rech ri ix xukujeˈ jeˈ quibano jas ri nu banom in chiwe .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord ; neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him .
text2: Kas tzij quinbij chiwe chi man cˈo tä jun patäninel ri nim na u banic chuwäch ru patrón , xukujeˈ man cˈo tä jun takoˈn ri nim na u banic chuwäch ri takowinak bic .

text: If ye know these things , happy are ye if ye do them .
text2: We quichˈob waˈ we riˈ , quitakej cˈu u banic , utz cˈu iwe riˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: I speak not of you all : I know whom I have chosen : but that the scripture may be fulfilled , He that eateth bread with me hath lifted up his heel against me .
text2: Ri tajin quinbij chanim , man quinbij tä waˈ chiwij iwonojel ri ix . Ri in wetam jachin tak ri e chaˈtal wumal . Rajwaxic cˈut jeˈ cäbantaj na jas ri cubij ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic : “ Ri jun ri cäwiˈ junam wucˈ u banom u cˈulel chwe , ” ― cächa riˈ .

text: Now I tell you before it come , that , when it is come to pass , ye may believe that I am he .
text2: Quinbij waˈ chiwe chanim cˈä mäjaˈ cäbantajic , rech aretak cäbantaj waˈ , ri ix quicojo chi In Riˈ .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that receiveth whomsoever I send receiveth me ; and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: Kas tzij quinbij chiwe , chi jachin ri cucˈulaj ri quintak bic , in riˈ quinucˈulaj . Jachin cˈu ri quinucˈulaj in , cucˈulaj riˈ ri xintakow lok , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ru tijoxelab .

text: When Jesus had thus said , he was troubled in spirit , and testified , and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Aretak xbitaj waˈ we tzij riˈ rumal ri Jesús , sibalaj xunaˈ cˈäx pa ranimaˈ . Kas chi sakil xubij chquiwäch ru tijoxelab : Kas tzij quinbij chiwe chi jun chiwe are quinjachow na , ― xcha chque .

text: Then the disciples looked one on another , doubting of whom he spake .
text2: Te riˈ ri tijoxelab xquichap u caˈyexic quib ri jun rucˈ ri jun chic , man xquichˈob tä cˈu jachin ri tajin cubij ri Jesús .

text: Now there was leaning on Jesus ' bosom one of his disciples , whom Jesus loved .
text2: Jun chque ru tijoxelab ri Jesús , ri jun ri sibalaj lokˈ chuwäch tajin cäwiˈ chuxcut chiˈ ri mesa .

text: Simon Peter therefore beckoned to him , that he should ask who it should be of whom he spake .
text2: Ri tat Simón Pedro xubij che rareˈ pa memal chi cutaˈ che ri Jesús jachin ri tajin cubij .

text: He then lying on Jesus ' breast saith unto him , Lord , who is it ?
text2: Te riˈ ri areˈ xkeb rucˈ ri Jesús , xutaˈ che : Wajaw , ¿ jachin riˈ ri cäbij la ? ― xcha che .

text: Jesus answered , He it is , to whom I shall give a sop , when I have dipped it . And when he had dipped the sop , he gave it to Judas Iscariot , the son of Simon .
text2: Xchˈaw cˈu ri Jesús , xubij che : Quinrub na jun chˈäkap caxlan wa . Jachin cˈu che ri quinya wi waˈ , are ri areˈ , ― xcha che . Xurub cˈu ri chˈäkap caxlan wa , xuya che ri tat Judas Iscariote , u cˈojol ri tat Simón .

text: And after the sop Satan entered into him . Then said Jesus unto him , That thou doest , do quickly .
text2: Xuwi xcˈamtaj ri chˈäkap caxlan wa rumal ri tat Judas , xoc ri Satanás pa ranimaˈ . Xubij cˈu ri Jesús che : Ri cachomaj cabano , chabana waˈ chanim , ― xcha che .

text: Now no man at the table knew for what intent he spake this unto him .
text2: Man cˈo tä cˈu jun chque ri tajin quewiˈ chiˈ ri mesa ri xuchˈobo jas che ri Jesús xubij waˈ we tzij riˈ che .

text: For some of them thought , because Judas had the bag , that Jesus had said unto him , Buy those things that we have need of against the feast ; or , that he should give something to the poor .
text2: Quetam cˈut chi ri tat Judas pu kˈab cˈo wi ri cˈolibal puak , rumal riˈ jujun xquichomaj chi ri Jesús are tajin cubij che chi culokˈ ri rajwaxic chque che ri nimakˈij o cuya jubikˈ puak che qui toˈic ri mebaˈib .

text: He then having received the sop went immediately out : and it was night .
text2: Xuwi cˈu xcˈamtaj ri chˈäkap caxlan wa rumal ri tat Judas , xel bi ri areˈ . Chakˈab chi cˈu riˈ .

text: Therefore , when he was gone out , Jesus said , Now is the Son of man glorified , and God is glorified in him .
text2: Aretak elinak chi bi ri tat Judas , xubij ri Jesús : Cämic cäkˈalajin na chi kas nim nu kˈij in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak . Rumal cˈu wech in cänimarisax na u kˈij ri Dios .

text: If God be glorified in him , God shall also glorify him in himself , and shall straightway glorify him .
text2: We rumal wech in , in riˈ ri Ralcˈual ri Dios ri Kas Winak , cänimarisax na u kˈij ri Dios , xukujeˈ ri Dios cunimarisaj na nu kˈij in . Chanim cˈut cuban na waˈ .

text: Little children , yet a little while I am with you . Ye shall seek me : and as I said unto the Jews , Whither I go , ye cannot come ; so now I say to you .
text2: Ix riˈ , ix jeˈ ta ne alaj tak walcˈual , man naj tä chic in cˈo iwucˈ . Ri ix quinitzucuj na . Jas cˈu ri xinbij chque ri winak aj Israel , jeˈ xukujeˈ quinbij chiwe ix : Man quixcowin taj quixeˈ chilaˈ jawijeˈ ri quineˈ wi in .

text: A new commandment I give unto you , That ye love one another ; as I have loved you , that ye also love one another .
text2: Quinya cˈu can we cˈacˈ takanic riˈ chiwe : Chiwaj iwib chbil tak iwib . Jeˈ jas ri in quixwaj , jeˈ baˈ chibana ix , chiwaj iwib chbil tak iwib .

text: By this shall all men know that ye are my disciples , if ye have love one to another .
text2: We quiwaj iwib chbil tak iwib , conojel ri winak cäquetamaj na chi ri ix , ix nu tijoxelab , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: Simon Peter said unto him , Lord , whither goest thou ? Jesus answered him , Whither I go , thou canst not follow me now ; but thou shalt follow me afterwards .
text2: Ri tat Simón Pedro xutaˈ che ri Jesús : Kajaw , ¿ jawijeˈ queˈ wi la ? ― xcha che . Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij che : Jawijeˈ ri quineˈ wi , ri at man catcowin taj cateˈ wucˈ cämic . Cˈä te cˈu riˈ cateˈ na wucˈ , ― xcha che .

text: Peter said unto him , Lord , why cannot I follow thee now ? I will lay down my life for thy sake .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri tat Pedro che : Wajaw , ¿ jas che man quincowin taj quineˈ ucˈ la cämic ? Ri in quinya nu tzij chi quincäm rumal ech la , ― xcha che .

text: Jesus answered him , Wilt thou lay down thy life for my sake ? Verily , verily , I say unto thee , The cock shall not crow , till thou hast denied me thrice .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij che : ¿ A kas tzij caya a tzij chi catcäm rumal wech in ? ― xcha che . Kas tzij quinbij chawe chi cabij na oxmul chi man awetam tä nu wäch mäjok cokˈ ri amaˈ äcˈ , ― xcha che .

text: Let not your heart be troubled : ye believe in God , believe also in me .
text2: Xak mäkˈoxow iwanimaˈ . Chicuˈba i cˈux chrij ri Dios , xukujeˈ chicuˈba i cˈux chwij in .

text: In my Father ' s house are many mansions : if it were not so , I would have told you . I go to prepare a place for you .
text2: Cho rachoch ri nu Tat cˈo qˈuia ri jeˈl tak ja ri cuyaˈ quixcˈoji wi . We ta mat je riˈ , nu bim ta riˈ chiwe . Quineˈ baˈ , quinbana u banic jun ja ri cuyaˈ quixcˈoji wi .

text: And if I go and prepare a place for you , I will come again , and receive you unto myself ; that where I am , there ye may be also .
text2: Aretak in benak chic , bantajinak chi u banic ri ja ri quixcˈoji wi , quinpe chi na che i cˈamic bi wucˈ rech ri ix quixecˈol chilaˈ jawijeˈ ri in cˈo wi .

text: And whither I go ye know , and the way ye know .
text2: Ri ix iwetam jawijeˈ ri quineˈ wi , xukujeˈ iwetam ri be ri copan chilaˈ , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ru tijoxelab .

text: Thomas saith unto him , Lord , we know not whither thou goest ; and how can we know the way ?
text2: Ri tat Tomás xubij che : Kajaw , man ketam taj jawijeˈ ri queˈ wi la . ¿ Jas ta cˈu cäkaˈn che retamaxic ri be ? ― xcha che .

text: Jesus saith unto him , I am the way , the truth , and the life : no man cometh unto the Father , but by me .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij che : In riˈ quincˈut ri be , ri in quincˈut ri kas tzij , xukujeˈ ri in quinya na ri cˈaslemal . Xak xuwi rumal wech in jun winak cäcowinic copan rucˈ ri ka Tat .

text: If ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also : and from henceforth ye know him , and have seen him .
text2: We ta ri ix kas iwetam nu wäch , iwetam ta u wäch riˈ ri nu Tat xukujeˈ . Iwetam chi cˈu u wäch riˈ cämic rumal chi amakˈel tajin quiwil u wäch ri Areˈ , ― xcha che ri tat Tomás .

text: Philip saith unto him , Lord , shew us the Father , and it sufficeth us .
text2: Te riˈ xubij ri tat Felipe che : Kajaw , cˈutu baˈ la ri ka Tat chkawäch , xuwi waˈ rajwaxic chke , ― xcha che .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Have I been so long time with you , and yet hast thou not known me , Philip ? he that hath seen me hath seen the Father ; and how sayest thou then , Shew us the Father ?
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij che : Felipe , ojer chi riˈ in cˈo iwucˈ , ¿ te cˈu riˈ man awetam tä nu wäch ? Jachin ri rilom nu wäch in , rilom u wäch riˈ ri nu Tat . ¿ Jas che cataˈ chwe chi quincˈut ri ka Tat chiwäch ?

text: Believest thou not that I am in the Father , and the Father in me ? the words that I speak unto you I speak not of myself : but the Father that dwelleth in me , he doeth the works .
text2: ¿ A mat quicojo chi ri in , in cˈo rucˈ ri ka Tat , xukujeˈ chi ri ka Tat cˈo wucˈ in ? Ri tzij ri quinbij chiwe man xak tä in quinbinic . Ri ka Tat ri cäjeki wucˈ in , are ri Areˈ ri cäbanow ri chac .

text: Believe me that I am in the Father , and the Father in me : or else believe me for the very works ' sake .
text2: Chicojoˈ chi ri in , in cˈo rucˈ ri ka Tat , xukujeˈ chi ri ka Tat , Are cˈo wucˈ in . We man je riˈ , chixcojon baˈ chwe rumal ri quinbano .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me , the works that I do shall he do also ; and greater works than these shall he do ; because I go unto my Father .
text2: Kas tzij quinbij chiwe , chi jachin ri cäcojon chwe , cuban na re xukujeˈ ri cajmabal ri quinban in . Nimak tak cajmabal cˈut chuwäch waˈ cuban na rumal chi ri in quineˈc jawijeˈ ri cˈo wi ri ka Tat .

text: And whatsoever ye shall ask in my name , that will I do , that the Father may be glorified in the Son .
text2: Ronojel cˈu ri quitaˈ che ri ka Tat pa ri nu biˈ , ri in quinban na rech ri in u Cˈojol ri Dios quinkˈalajisaj chi nim na u kˈij ri ka Tat .

text: If ye shall ask any thing in my name , I will do it .
text2: Ri in quinban na apachique ri quitaˈ chwe pa ri nu biˈ .

text: If ye love me , keep my commandments .
text2: We ri ix kas quiniwaj , quinimaj na riˈ ri nu takanic .

text: And I will pray the Father , and he shall give you another Comforter , that he may abide with you for ever ;
text2: Ri in cˈut quinbochiˈj na ri nu Tat chi cutak lok Jun ri quixutoˈ , ri cuwalijisaj na iwanimaˈ , rech cäcˈoji iwucˈ amakˈel ronojel kˈij .

text: Even the Spirit of truth ; whom the world cannot receive , because it seeth him not , neither knoweth him : but ye know him ; for he dwelleth with you , and shall be in you .
text2: Are waˈ ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu ri cubij ri kas tzij . Ri winak ajuwächulew man quecowin taj cäquicˈamo rumal chi man quilom tä u wäch , xukujeˈ man quetam tä u wäch . Are cˈu ri ix iwetam u wäch rumal chi ri Areˈ cˈo iwucˈ , cäjeki cˈu na pa ri iwanimaˈ amakˈel ronojel kˈij .

text: I will not leave you comfortless : I will come to you .
text2: Man quixinya tä canok xak i tuquiel . Quintzelej na lok rech quincˈoji iwucˈ .

text: Yet a little while , and the world seeth me no more ; but ye see me : because I live , ye shall live also .
text2: Xak quieb oxib kˈij chic , ri winak man cäquil tä chi na nu wäch . Are cˈu ri ix , ix quiwil na nu wäch . Ri ix cˈut quixcˈasi na rumal chi ri in , in cˈaslic .

text: At that day ye shall know that I am in my Father , and ye in me , and I in you .
text2: Pa ri kˈij riˈ ri ix quiwetamaj na chi ri in , in cˈo rucˈ ri nu Tat , xukujeˈ chi ri ix , ix cˈo wucˈ in . Quiwetamaj na chi ri in , in cˈo iwucˈ ix .

text: He that hath my commandments , and keepeth them , he it is that loveth me : and he that loveth me shall be loved of my Father , and I will love him , and will manifest myself to him .
text2: Jachin ri retam ri nu takanic xukujeˈ cunimaj waˈ , cucˈut riˈ chi kas tzij quinraj . Lokˈ cˈut quil wi na rumal ri nu Tat jachin ri quinraj . Ri in xukujeˈ lokˈ quinwil wi , quincˈut cˈu na wib chuwäch .

text: Judas saith unto him , not Iscariot , Lord , how is it that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us , and not unto the world ?
text2: Ri tat Judas ( man are tä ri Judas Iscariote ) xutaˈ che ri Jesús , xubij : Kajaw , ¿ jas lo waˈ chi chkawäch uj cäcˈut wi ib la , man chquiwäch tä cˈu ri winak ajuwächulew ? ― xcha che .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , If a man love me , he will keep my words : and my Father will love him , and we will come unto him , and make our abode with him .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij che : Jachin ri quinraj cunimaj riˈ ri quinbij . Lokˈ cˈut quil wi na ri areˈ rumal ri nu Tat . Ri nu Tat , xukujeˈ ri in cujpe na , cujjekiˈ na rucˈ .

text: He that loveth me not keepeth not my sayings : and the word which ye hear is not mine , but the Father ' s which sent me .
text2: Jachin ri man quinraj taj man cunimaj tä riˈ ri quinbij . Ri tzij ri tajin quitatabej man are tä nu tzij in , xane u tzij ri nu Tat ri xintakow lok .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , being yet present with you .
text2: Tajin quinbij ronojel waˈ we tzij riˈ chiwe che tak ri kˈij riˈ ri cˈä in cˈo iwucˈ .

text: But the Comforter , which is the Holy Ghost , whom the Father will send in my name , he shall teach you all things , and bring all things to your remembrance , whatsoever I have said unto you .
text2: Are cˈu ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu ri cutak na lok ri nu Tat pa ri nu biˈ rech quixutoˈ , rech cucuˈbisaj i cˈux , ri Areˈ cˈut cucˈut na ronojel chiwäch . Cunaˈtaj cˈu na chiwäch ronojel ri nu bim chiwe .

text: Peace I leave with you , my peace I give unto you : not as the world giveth , give I unto you . Let not your heart be troubled , neither let it be afraid .
text2: Rucˈ utzil quixinya canok . Quinya chiwe chi cuxlan ri iwanimaˈ , man junam tä cˈu waˈ rucˈ ri cäquiya ri winak ajuwächulew . Mäkˈoxow baˈ iwanimaˈ , mixej cˈu iwib .

text: Ye have heard how I said unto you , I go away , and come again unto you . If ye loved me , ye would rejoice , because I said , I go unto the Father : for my Father is greater than I .
text2: Ri ix xito aretak xinbij chi quineˈc , quinpe chi cˈu na jumul chic rech quincˈoji iwucˈ . We ta kas tzij quiniwaj , xixquicot ta riˈ aretak xinbij chi quineˈ rucˈ ri nu Tat . Je riˈ , rumal chi ri nu Tat are nim na u kˈij chnuwäch in .

text: And now I have told you before it come to pass , that , when it is come to pass , ye might believe .
text2: Quinbij apan waˈ we riˈ chiwe cˈä mäjaˈ cäbantajic , rech aretak cäbantaj waˈ , quixcojon na .

text: Hereafter I will not talk much with you : for the prince of this world cometh , and hath nothing in me .
text2: Man cˈo tä chi qˈuia tzij quinbij chiwe . Cäpe cˈu ri jun ri cˈo u takanic puwiˈ we uwächulew . Man cäcowin tä cˈu ri areˈ cätakan pa nu wiˈ in .

text: But that the world may know that I love the Father ; and as the Father gave me commandment , even so I do . Arise , let us go hence .
text2: Rajwaxic wi chi jeˈ cäbantaj na waˈ , rech ri winak cäquetamaj chi lokˈ ri nu Tat chnuwäch , quinban cˈut jas ri in u takom wi . ¡ Chixwalijok ! Chujel bi waral , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ru tijoxelab .

text: I am the true vine , and my Father is the husbandman .
text2: In riˈ ri juwiˈ uvas , ri kas utzalaj ticoˈn . Ri nu Tat cˈut , Are ri ajchac ri queilow ri juwiˈ tak uvas .

text: Every branch in me that beareth not fruit he taketh away : and every branch that beareth fruit , he purgeth it , that it may bring forth more fruit .
text2: Conojel ri alaj tak u kˈab ri juwiˈ uvas ri man cäquiya tä qui wäch queˈresaj na apanok . Are cˈu ri cäquiya qui wäch querilo queuban qui banic rech sibalaj quewächin na .

text: Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you .
text2: Ri ix chˈajchˈoj chi ri iwanimaˈ rumal ri tijonic ri nu yoˈm chiwe .

text: Abide in me , and I in you . As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself , except it abide in the vine ; no more can ye , except ye abide in me .
text2: Chibana baˈ xa jun wucˈ in , jas ri in nu banom xa jun iwucˈ ix . Jeˈ jas jun alaj u kˈab ri juwiˈ uvas man cäcowin taj cuya u wäch xak u tuquiel we man tikil che ri rakan , je riˈ xukujeˈ ri ix , ix jeˈ jas jun ticoˈn ri man cäwächin taj we man quiban xa jun wucˈ in .

text: I am the vine , ye are the branches : He that abideth in me , and I in him , the same bringeth forth much fruit : for without me ye can do nothing .
text2: In riˈ ri juwiˈ uvas . Are cˈu ri ix , ix ri alaj tak u kˈab ri juwiˈ uvas . Jachin ri cuban xa jun wucˈ in , quinban cˈu xa jun in rucˈ ri areˈ , are riˈ sibalaj cäwächin na . Man cˈo tä cˈu jas quixcowin ix chubanic we man in cˈo in iwucˈ .

text: If a man abide not in me , he is cast forth as a branch , and is withered ; and men gather them , and cast them into the fire , and they are burned .
text2: Jachin ri man cuban tä xa jun wucˈ in , cäqˈuiäk na apanok , cächakiˈj cˈu na jeˈ jas ru kˈab tak ri cheˈ ri quemolic , queporox pa kˈakˈ .

text: If ye abide in me , and my words abide in you , ye shall ask what ye will , and it shall be done unto you .
text2: We ri ix xa ix jun wucˈ in , man cäsach tä cˈu ri nu tijonic chiwe , cuyaˈ quitaˈ jachique ri quiwaj , cäyaˈtaj cˈu na waˈ chiwe .

text: Herein is my Father glorified , that ye bear much fruit ; so shall ye be my disciples .
text2: Ri nu Tat cänimarisax na u kˈij aretak ri ix jeˈ quiban waˈ jas juwiˈ uvas ri sibalaj cäwächinic . Je waˈ riˈ kas tzij quixoc che nu tijoxelab .

text: As the Father hath loved me , so have I loved you : continue ye in my love .
text2: Ri in quixwaj ix jas ri nu Tat quinraj in . Chitakej baˈ quiwaj iwib jas ri nu banom in chiwe .

text: If ye keep my commandments , ye shall abide in my love ; even as I have kept my Father ' s commandments , and abide in his love .
text2: We quinimaj ri nu takanic , quitakej na riˈ quiwaj iwib jas ri nu banom in chiwe jeˈ jas ri in quinnimaj ru takanic ri nu Tat , ri Areˈ cˈut tajin wi lokˈ quinrilo .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that my joy might remain in you , and that your joy might be full .
text2: Jeˈ quintzijoj waˈ chiwe rech quixquicot wucˈ , je cˈu riˈ kas cäquicot na ri iwanimaˈ .

text: This is my commandment , That ye love one another , as I have loved you .
text2: Ri nu takanic are waˈ : Chiwaj iwib chbil tak iwib , jeˈ jas ri in quixwaj ix .

text: Greater love hath no man than this , that a man lay down his life for his friends .
text2: Ri rutzil ranimaˈ jun winak ri más nim ri cuyaˈ cäcˈoji pa ranimaˈ are laˈ chi cuya riˈ ru cˈaslemal che qui qˈuexwäch ri e utz rucˈ .

text: Ye are my friends , if ye do whatsoever I command you .
text2: Ri ix kas ix utz wucˈ in we quibano jas ri quixintak wi .

text: Henceforth I call you not servants ; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth : but I have called you friends ; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you .
text2: Ya man quinbij tä patänil tak we chiwe , rumal chi ri patäninel man retam tä riˈ jas ri cuban ru patrón . Xane quinbij chiwe chi kas ix utz wucˈ in rumal chi nu cˈutum chiwäch ronojel ri u bim ri nu Tat chwe .

text: Ye have not chosen me , but I have chosen you , and ordained you , that ye should go and bring forth fruit , and that your fruit should remain : that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name , he may give it you .
text2: Ri ix man xinichaˈ tä in , xane in riˈ ri xixinchaˈ ix . Xinya cˈu pi kˈab chi jeˈ quibano jas juwiˈ uvas ri sibalaj cäwächinic . Ri wächinic ri quiya man cäsach tä u wäch . Je cˈu riˈ ri nu Tat cuya na chiwe jachique ri quitaˈ che pa ri nu biˈ .

text: These things I command you , that ye love one another .
text2: Are baˈ waˈ ri quixintak wi : Chiwaj iwib chbil tak iwib ri jun rucˈ ri jun chic , ― xcha chque .

text: If the world hate you , ye know that it hated me before it hated you .
text2: We ri winak ajuwächulew cäquetzelaj i wäch , chiwetamaj chi in riˈ xquetzelaj nu wäch nabe .

text: If ye were of the world , the world would love his own : but because ye are not of the world , but I have chosen you out of the world , therefore the world hateth you .
text2: We ta ri ix , ix rech ruwächulew , ri winak ajuwächulew quixcaj ta riˈ , jeˈ jas ri e areˈ sibalaj quecaj ri cachiˈl . Ri in cˈut xixinchaˈ chquixol ri winak ajuwächulew , rumal cˈu riˈ ri winak ajuwächulew cäquetzelaj i wäch rumal chi man ix jun tä chi cucˈ .

text: Remember the word that I said unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord . If they have persecuted me , they will also persecute you ; if they have kept my saying , they will keep yours also .
text2: Chnaˈtaj baˈ chiwe jas ri xinbij chiwe : “ Man cˈo tä jun patäninel ri nim na u banic chuwäch ru patrón . ” We ri in cäban cˈäx chwe cumal ri winak , ri ix xukujeˈ cäban na cˈäx chiwe cumal . We cˈu qui nimam ri nu tijonic in , xukujeˈ cäquinimaj na ri i tijonic ix .

text: But all these things will they do unto you for my name ' s sake , because they know not him that sent me .
text2: Ronojel waˈ we cˈäx riˈ cäban na chiwe cumal ri winak rumal wech in , rumal chi man quetam tä u wäch ri xintakow lok .

text: If I had not come and spoken unto them , they had not had sin : but now they have no cloke for their sin .
text2: Mat cˈo qui mac we winak riˈ we ta mat xinpe che qui tzijobexic . Cämic cˈut man cuyaˈ taj cäquibij chi man cˈo tä qui mac .

text: He that hateth me hateth my Father also .
text2: Jachin cˈu tak ri cäquetzelaj nu wäch in , cäquetzelaj u wäch riˈ ri nu Tat xukujeˈ .

text: If I had not done among them the works which none other man did , they had not had sin : but now have they both seen and hated both me and my Father .
text2: Mat cˈo qui mac riˈ we ta mat cˈo ri nu banom chquixol ri man cˈo tä chi jun banowinak . Ri e areˈ cˈut quilom ronojel ri nu banom . Pune je riˈ cäquetzelaj nu wäch in , xukujeˈ cäquetzelaj u wäch ri nu Tat .

text: But this cometh to pass , that the word might be fulfilled that is written in their law , They hated me without a cause .
text2: Rajwaxic cˈut chi jeˈ cäbantaj na waˈ rumal chi kas jeˈ quel na jas ri tzˈibtal can pa ri qui Pixab : “ Xquetzelaj nu wäch , man cˈo tä cˈu mac xinban chquij , ” ― cächaˈ .

text: But when the Comforter is come , whom I will send unto you from the Father , even the Spirit of truth , which proceedeth from the Father , he shall testify of me :
text2: Aretak cˈut cäpe ri Jun ri cätoban chiwe , ri cuwalijisaj iwanimaˈ , ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu ri cubij ri kas tzij , ri quintak na lok aretak in cˈo chi rucˈ ri ka Tat , ri Areˈ cukˈalajisaj na ri kas tzij chwij .

text: And ye also shall bear witness , because ye have been with me from the beginning .
text2: Ri ix xukujeˈ quikˈalajisaj na ri kas tzij chwij , rumal chi ri ix cˈolinak wucˈ petinak lok , ― xcha ri Jesús chque ru tijoxelab .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that ye should not be offended .
text2: Quinbij waˈ we tzij riˈ chiwe rech man cuban tä quieb i cˈux , quixtzak cˈut .

text: They shall put you out of the synagogues : yea , the time cometh , that whosoever killeth you will think that he doeth God service .
text2: Quixesax cˈu na lok pa tak ri rachoch Dios . Je riˈ chi copan na ri kˈij aretak apachin ri quixcämisanic cuchomaj na chi tajin cäpatänin che ri Dios .

text: And these things will they do unto you , because they have not known the Father , nor me .
text2: Jeˈ cäcaˈn na waˈ rumal chi man cˈo tä jumul ri kas xquetamaj u wäch ri nu Tat , man cˈo tä cˈu jumul ri xquetamaj nu wäch in .

text: But these things have I told you , that when the time shall come , ye may remember that I told you of them . And these things I said not unto you at the beginning , because I was with you .
text2: Quinbij apan ronojel waˈ chiwe , rech aretak curik ri kˈij riˈ , cänaˈtaj chiwe chi ri in nu bim chi waˈ chiwe , ― xcha ri Jesús . Man xinbij tä waˈ chiwe petinak lok rumal chi ri in , in cˈo iwucˈ .

text: But now I go my way to him that sent me ; and none of you asketh me , Whither goest thou ?
text2: Cämic cˈut quineˈc rech quinecˈol rucˈ ri Jun ri xintakow lok . Man cˈo tä cˈu jun chiwe cutaˈ chwe jawijeˈ ri quineˈ wi .

text: But because I have said these things unto you , sorrow hath filled your heart .
text2: Xa cˈu xixbisonic rumal chi xinbij waˈ we tzij riˈ chiwe .

text: Nevertheless I tell you the truth ; It is expedient for you that I go away : for if I go not away , the Comforter will not come unto you ; but if I depart , I will send him unto you .
text2: Quinbij cˈu ri kas tzij chiwe : Are utz na chiwe ix chi quineˈc . We ta cˈu man quineˈc , man cäpe tä riˈ ri Jun ri cäcˈoji iwucˈ che i toˈic , ri cuwalijisaj iwanimaˈ . We cˈu quineˈc , quintak na lok .

text: And when he is come , he will reprove the world of sin , and of righteousness , and of judgment :
text2: Aretak cäpe ri Areˈ cuya na pa canimaˈ ri winak chi cäquichˈobo chi cˈo qui mac , chi rajwaxic cäcaˈn ri jicomal pa ri qui cˈaslemal , xukujeˈ chi ri Dios cukˈat na tzij pa qui wiˈ .

text: Of sin , because they believe not on me ;
text2: Cˈo qui mac rumal chi man quecojon tä chwe .

text: Of righteousness , because I go to my Father , and ye see me no more ;
text2: Cäquetamaj cˈu na chi rajwaxic u banic ri jicomal pa ri qui cˈaslemal rumal chi ri in quineˈ rucˈ ri nu Tat , ri ix cˈut man quiwil tä chi na nu wäch .

text: Of judgment , because the prince of this world is judged .
text2: Cäquetamaj na chi ri Dios cukˈat na tzij pa qui wiˈ rumal chi ri jun ri cätakan puwiˈ ruwächulew kˈatom chi tzij puwiˈ chi cäcˈäjisax u wäch .

text: I have yet many things to say unto you , but ye cannot bear them now .
text2: Qˈuia na ri cwaj quinbij chiwe , man quixcowin tä cˈu chuchˈobic waˈ cämic .

text: Howbeit when he , the Spirit of truth , is come , he will guide you into all truth : for he shall not speak of himself ; but whatsoever he shall hear , that shall he speak : and he will shew you things to come .
text2: Aretak cˈut cäpe ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu ri cubij ri kas tzij , cucˈut na ronojel ri kas tzij chiwäch . Man xak tä cˈu pa re wi cächˈawic , xane are cubij ronojel ri cuto , cucˈut cˈu na chiwäch jas ri cäbantaj na .

text: He shall glorify me : for he shall receive of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Ri Areˈ cunimarisaj na nu kˈij in rumal chi cucˈam na ri wech in , cucˈut cˈu na waˈ chiwäch ix .

text: All things that the Father hath are mine : therefore said I , that he shall take of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Ronojel ri cˈo rucˈ ri nu Tat are wech in xukujeˈ . Rumal riˈ xinbij chi ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu cucˈam na ri wech in , cucˈut cˈu na waˈ chiwäch ix .

text: A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me , because I go to the Father .
text2: Xak jubikˈ chic , te cˈu riˈ ri ix man quiwil tä chi na nu wäch . Cˈä te cˈu riˈ quiwil chi na jumul nu wäch pa quieb oxib kˈij , rumal chi quineˈc rech quinecˈol chilaˈ jawijeˈ ri cˈo wi ri ka Tat , ― xcha chque ru tijoxelab .

text: Then said some of his disciples among themselves , What is this that he saith unto us , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me : and , Because I go to the Father ?
text2: Te riˈ jujun chque ru tijoxelab xquitala chbil tak quib , xquibij : ¿ Jas quel cubij waˈ ? Cubij chke chi xak jubikˈ chic , te cˈu riˈ man cäkil tä chi u wäch . Cˈä te cˈu cäkil chi na u wäch jumul chic pa quieb oxib kˈij rumal chi queˈ jelaˈ jawijeˈ ri cˈo wi ri ka Tat .

text: They said therefore , What is this that he saith , A little while ? we cannot tell what he saith .
text2: ¿ Jas lo waˈ ri craj cubij chi “ xak jubikˈ chic ” ? Man cäkachˈob taj jas ri tajin cubij , ― xechaˈ .

text: Now Jesus knew that they were desirous to ask him , and said unto them , Do ye inquire among yourselves of that I said , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me ?
text2: Ri Jesús xuchˈobo chi cˈo jas ri cäcaj cäquitaˈ che , xubij cˈu chque : Ri in xinbij chiwe chi xak jubikˈ chic , te cˈu riˈ man quiwil tä chi nu wäch . Cˈä te cˈu quiwil chi na jumul nu wäch pa quieb oxib kˈij . ¿ A are waˈ ri tajin quitala chixol chbil tak iwib ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , That ye shall weep and lament , but the world shall rejoice : and ye shall be sorrowful , but your sorrow shall be turned into joy .
text2: Kas tzij quinbij chiwe chi ri ix quixokˈ na , quixbison na , are cˈu ri winak ajuwächulew quequicot na . Pune cˈu je riˈ , chi ri ix quixbison na , ri i bis cujala na pa quicotem .

text: A woman when she is in travail hath sorrow , because her hour is come : but as soon as she is delivered of the child , she remembereth no more the anguish , for joy that a man is born into the world .
text2: Aretak cäpe ri kˈij ri quil na u wäch ri ral jun ixok , cäbisonic rumal chi xurik ri kˈij re ri kˈoxom . Aretak cˈut rilom chi u wäch ri ral , man cänaˈtaj tä chi ri kˈoxom che rumal ri quicotemal ri cunaˈ chi ilom u wäch jun alaj acˈal cho ruwächulew .

text: And ye now therefore have sorrow : but I will see you again , and your heart shall rejoice , and your joy no man taketh from you .
text2: Je cˈu riˈ ri ix , cämic quixbisonic . Ri in cˈut quinwil chi na i wäch jumul chic , te cˈu riˈ cäquicot cˈu na ri iwanimaˈ . Are jun quicotemal waˈ ri man cˈo tä jun cäcowinic quesan chiwe .

text: And in that day ye shall ask me nothing . Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name , he will give it you .
text2: Pa ri kˈij riˈ man cˈo tä chi jas quitaˈ na chwe . Kas tzij quinbij chiwe chi ri ka Tat cuya na chiwe ronojel ri quitaˈ che pa ri nu biˈ .

text: Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name : ask , and ye shall receive , that your joy may be full .
text2: Cˈä we cämic riˈ ri ix man cˈo tä jas ri i tom pa ri nu biˈ . Chitaˈ baˈ , cäyaˈtaj cˈu na chiwe rech kas cäquicot ri iwanimaˈ , ― xcha chque .

text: These things have I spoken unto you in proverbs : but the time cometh , when I shall no more speak unto you in proverbs , but I shall shew you plainly of the Father .
text2: Nu bim waˈ we tzij riˈ chiwe cucˈ tak cˈutbal . Curik cˈu na ri kˈij aretak man quintzijon tä chi iwucˈ cucˈ tak cˈutbal . Xane chi sakil chic quintzijon na iwucˈ chrij ri ka Tat .

text: At that day ye shall ask in my name : and I say not unto you , that I will pray the Father for you :
text2: Pa ri kˈij riˈ cˈo ri quitaˈ na che ri Areˈ pa ri nu biˈ . Man quinbij tä cˈu chiwe chi quinbochiˈj ri nu Tat pi wiˈ .

text: For the Father himself loveth you , because ye have loved me , and have believed that I came out from God .
text2: Je riˈ , rumal chi ri ix , ix lokˈ chuwäch ri nu Tat . Ix lokˈ chuwäch rumal chi ri in , in lokˈ chiwäch ix , quicoj cˈut chi rucˈ ri Dios in petinak wi .

text: I came forth from the Father , and am come into the world : again , I leave the world , and go to the Father .
text2: Xinel lok rucˈ ri ka Tat rech quinpe waral cho we uwächulew , cämic chi cˈut tajin quinya can ruwächulew rech quintzelej rucˈ ri ka Tat , ― xcha ri Jesús chque .

text: His disciples said unto him , Lo , now speakest thou plainly , and speakest no proverb .
text2: Te riˈ xquibij ru tijoxelab ri Jesús : Cämic kas chi sakil tajin cätzijon la , man tajin tä cäcoj la cˈutbal .

text: Now are we sure that thou knowest all things , and needest not that any man should ask thee : by this we believe that thou camest forth from God .
text2: Cämic ketam chic chi etam la ronojel . Man rajwaxic taj chi cˈo jun cˈo jas cutaˈ che la . Rumal riˈ cäkacojo chi rucˈ ri Dios petinak wi la , ― xecha che .

text: Jesus answered them , Do ye now believe ?
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij chque : ¿ A tzij riˈ chi cämic kas quixcojonic ? ― cächaˈ .

text: Behold , the hour cometh , yea , is now come , that ye shall be scattered , every man to his own , and shall leave me alone : and yet I am not alone , because the Father is with me .
text2: Petinak cˈu ri kˈij , cämic cˈu riˈ aretak ri ix quixjabun na . Chijujunal quitzucuj na jawijeˈ quixeˈ wi , quiniya cˈu na can nu tuquiel . Man quincanaj tä cˈu na can nu tuquiel rumal chi ri ka Tat are cˈo wucˈ .

text: These things I have spoken unto you , that in me ye might have peace . In the world ye shall have tribulation : but be of good cheer ; I have overcome the world .
text2: Quinbij waˈ we tzij riˈ chiwe rech cuxlan ri iwanimaˈ rumal chi xa ix jun wucˈ . Cho ruwächulew quirik na cˈäx . ¡ Mixej baˈ iwib ! Ri in cˈut , in chˈacaninak puwiˈ ruwächulew .

text: These words spake Jesus , and lifted up his eyes to heaven , and said , Father , the hour is come ; glorify thy Son , that thy Son also may glorify thee :
text2: Aretak xbitaj waˈ we tzij riˈ rumal ri Jesús , xcaˈy chicaj , xubij : Tat , xurik ri kˈij . Nimarisaj baˈ la u kˈij ri Cˈojol la , rech xukujeˈ ri Cˈojol la cunimarisaj ri kˈij la .

text: As thou hast given him power over all flesh , that he should give eternal life to as many as thou hast given him .
text2: Yoˈm cˈu la takanic pu kˈab ri Cˈojol la pa qui wiˈ conojel winak rech cuya ri cˈaslemal ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic chque ri xeya la che .

text: And this is life eternal , that they might know thee the only true God , and Jesus Christ , whom thou hast sent .
text2: Ri cˈaslemal ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic are waˈ chi cäquetamaj wäch la chi xuwi ri lal , lal kas Dios , xukujeˈ chi cäquetamaj u wäch ri Jesucristo ri xtak la lok .

text: I have glorified thee on the earth : I have finished the work which thou gavest me to do .
text2: Ri in , nu nimarisam kˈij la waral cho ruwächulew xukujeˈ nu qˈuisom u banic ri xintak la chubanic .

text: And now , O Father , glorify thou me with thine own self with the glory which I had with thee before the world was .
text2: Cämic cˈut , Tat , ya la chwe chi cänimarisax nu kˈij ucˈ la jas ri nu banom nabe aretak mäjok xban ruwächulew .

text: I have manifested thy name unto the men which thou gavest me out of the world : thine they were , and thou gavest them me ; and they have kept thy word .
text2: Ri winak ri xechaˈ la chquixol ri winak cho ruwächulew rech queya la chwe , nu bim chque jachin ri lal . E ech la waˈ , xeya cˈu la chwe . Ri e areˈ cˈut qui nimam ri tzij la .

text: Now they have known that all things whatsoever thou hast given me are of thee .
text2: Cämic ri e areˈ quetam chi ronojel ri xya la chwe ucˈ la petinak wi .

text: For I have given unto them the words which thou gavest me ; and they have received them , and have known surely that I came out from thee , and they have believed that thou didst send me .
text2: Nu yoˈm cˈu ri tzij la chque ri xya la chwe , xquicoj cˈu pa canimaˈ . Xquichˈobo chi kas tzij ucˈ la in petinak wi , xukujeˈ xquicojo chi ri lal xintakow la lok .

text: I pray for them : I pray not for the world , but for them which thou hast given me ; for they are thine .
text2: Quinbochiˈn che la pa qui wiˈ . Man quinbochiˈn tä che la pa qui wiˈ ri winak ajuwächulew , xane pa qui wiˈ ri winak ri xeya la chwe , rumal chi e ech la waˈ .

text: And all mine are thine , and thine are mine ; and I am glorified in them .
text2: Ronojel ri wech in ech la waˈ , are cˈu ri ech la wech in waˈ . Cumal cˈu ri e areˈ cäkˈalajinic chi sibalaj nim na nu kˈij .

text: And now I am no more in the world , but these are in the world , and I come to thee . Holy Father , keep through thine own name those whom thou hast given me , that they may be one , as we are .
text2: Ri in man quincanaj tä chic cho ruwächulew . Ri e areˈ cˈut quecanaj na can cho ruwächulew . Ri in quineˈc rech quincˈoji ucˈ la . Lokˈalaj ka Tat , chechajij baˈ la rucˈ ri chukˈab la ri winak ri xeya la chwe , rech kas cäcaˈn xa jun , jas ri in , ri lal xa uj jun .

text: While I was with them in the world , I kept them in thy name : those that thou gavest me I have kept , and none of them is lost , but the son of perdition ; that the scripture might be fulfilled .
text2: Aretak xincˈoji cucˈ ri e areˈ waral cho we uwächulew , xeinchajij xukujeˈ xeintoˈ rucˈ ri chukˈab la conojel ri xeya la chwe . Man cˈo tä jun chque ri xsachic , xane xak xuwi ri jun ri yoˈm chrij chi cäsachic rech jeˈ cäbantajic jas ri cubij ri Lokˈ Pixab la ri Tzˈibtalic .

text: And now come I to thee ; and these things I speak in the world , that they might have my joy fulfilled in themselves .
text2: Cämic cˈut quineˈ chilaˈ jawijeˈ ri cˈo wi la . Che cˈu we chanim riˈ ri in cˈo na cho ruwächulew , quinbij can waˈ we tzij riˈ chque rech ri e areˈ kas cäquinaˈ pa canimaˈ ri quicotemal ri quinnaˈ in pa ri wanimaˈ .

text: I have given them thy word ; and the world hath hated them , because they are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Nu yoˈm ri tzij la chque . Quetzelax cˈu qui wäch ri e areˈ cumal ri winak ajuwächulew , rumal chi ri e areˈ man e rech tä ruwächulew jeˈ jas ri in man in rech tä ruwächulew .

text: I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world , but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil .
text2: Man quintaˈ tä che la chi queesaj la bi cho ruwächulew , xane quinbochiˈn che la chi quetoˈ la chuwäch ri Itzel .

text: They are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Jeˈ jas ri in man in rech tä ruwächulew , ri e areˈ xukujeˈ man e rech tä ruwächulew .

text: Sanctify them through thy truth : thy word is truth .
text2: Chetasa la chrij ronojel u wäch mac rucˈ ri kas tzij rech cäquijach quib pa kˈab la . Ri Lokˈ Pixab la are ri kas tzij .

text: As thou hast sent me into the world , even so have I also sent them into the world .
text2: Jas ri lal xintak la lok chquixol ri winak ajuwächulew , ri in xukujeˈ queintak na bi ri e areˈ chquixol ri winak ajuwächulew .

text: And for their sakes I sanctify myself , that they also might be sanctified through the truth .
text2: Rumal cˈu quech ri e areˈ ri in quinjach wib pa kˈab la , rech ri e areˈ xukujeˈ cäquijach quib pa kˈab la rumal ri kas tzij , cäquitas cˈu quib chrij ronojel u wäch mac .

text: Neither pray I for these alone , but for them also which shall believe on me through their word ;
text2: Man quinbochiˈn tä cˈu che la xak xuwi pa qui wiˈ ri e areˈ , xane xukujeˈ pa qui wiˈ ri cˈä teˈ quecojon na chwe , aretak cäquita ri tzij ri cäquitzijoj na ri e areˈ .

text: That they all may be one ; as thou , Father , art in me , and I in thee , that they also may be one in us : that the world may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Quinbochiˈn che la chi conojel ri e areˈ kas cäcaˈn na xa jun , chi kas cäcaˈn ta na xa jun junam kucˈ uj , Tat , jeˈ jas ri lal cˈo la wucˈ in , xukujeˈ ri in , in cˈo ucˈ la . Kas tzij ta baˈ cäcaˈn xa jun rech ri winak ajuwächulew cäquicojo chi lal xintakow la lok .

text: And the glory which thou gavest me I have given them ; that they may be one , even as we are one :
text2: Ri in nu nimarisam qui kˈij jas ri u nimarisaxic nu kˈij in banom la , rech xa e jun , jeˈ jas ri lal ri in xa uj jun .

text: I in them , and thou in me , that they may be made perfect in one ; and that the world may know that thou hast sent me , and hast loved them , as thou hast loved me .
text2: Ri in , in cˈo cucˈ , ri lal cˈut cˈo la wucˈ in , rech ri e areˈ kas cäcaˈn na xa e jun , rech je riˈ ri winak ajuwächulew cäquichˈobo chi lal xintakow la lok , xukujeˈ chi e lokˈ chuwäch la jas ri in , in lokˈ chuwäch la .

text: Father , I will that they also , whom thou hast given me , be with me where I am ; that they may behold my glory , which thou hast given me : for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world .
text2: Tat , lal xeyoˈw la chwe , cwaj cˈut chi quecˈol na wucˈ in jawijeˈ ri quincˈoji wi na in rech cäquilo chi yoˈm la chwe chi sibalaj nim nu kˈij in . Ojer cˈut in lokˈ chuwäch la tzaretak mäjok cäban ruwächulew .

text: O righteous Father , the world hath not known thee : but I have known thee , and these have known that thou hast sent me .
text2: Tat , lal ri jicom animaˈ la , ri winak ajuwächulew man kas quetam tä wäch la , ri in cˈut wetam wäch la . Ri winak cˈut ri e yoˈm la chwe quetam chi lal riˈ xintakow la lok .

text: And I have declared unto them thy name , and will declare it : that the love wherewith thou hast loved me may be in them , and I in them .
text2: Nu bim chque jachin ri lal , quintakej cˈu na u bixic waˈ chque , rech jas ri nu lokˈal in chuwäch la , jeˈ qui lokˈal ri e areˈ chuwäch la . Je riˈ rech ri in kas quincˈoji na cucˈ , ― xcha ri Jesús che ri ka Tat .

text: When Jesus had spoken these words , he went forth with his disciples over the brook Cedron , where was a garden , into the which he entered , and his disciples .
text2: Aretak xbitaj we tzij riˈ rumal ri Jesús , xel bi ri Areˈ . Junam cucˈ ru tijoxelab xeˈ ri Areˈ chˈäkäp che ri binel jaˈ , Cedrón u biˈ . Chilaˈ cˈo wi jun chˈäkap ulew ri e tictal wi ri cheˈ , chilaˈ cˈut xoc wi ri Jesús e rachiˈl ru tijoxelab .

text: And Judas also , which betrayed him , knew the place : for Jesus ofttimes resorted thither with his disciples .
text2: Ri tat Judas ri tajin cäjachow ri Jesús xukujeˈ retam areˈ ri chˈäkap ulew riˈ rumal chi ri Jesús qˈuia mul cˈolinak chilaˈ cucˈ ru tijoxelab .

text: Judas then , having received a band of men and officers from the chief priests and Pharisees , cometh thither with lanterns and torches and weapons .
text2: Je riˈ ri tat Judas xopan chilaˈ e rachiˈl jumulaj soldados , xukujeˈ jujun chajinelab re ri nimalaj rachoch Dios ri e takom bi cumal ri qui nimakil ri sacerdotes xukujeˈ ri tataˈib fariseos . We winak riˈ cucˈam qui machetes , cucˈam qui lámpara , cucˈam cˈu qui chäj .

text: Jesus therefore , knowing all things that should come upon him , went forth , and said unto them , Whom seek ye ?
text2: Retam chi cˈu ri Jesús ronojel ri cäban na che . Rumal riˈ xel apan chquiwäch ri winak , xutaˈ chque : ¿ Jachin ri cätzucuj alak ? ― xcha chque .

text: They answered him , Jesus of Nazareth . Jesus saith unto them , I am he . And Judas also , which betrayed him , stood with them .
text2: Ri e areˈ xechˈawic , xquibij che : Ri Jesús ri aj Nazaret , ― xechaˈ . Ri Jesús xubij : In riˈ , ― xcha chque . Ri tat Judas ri tajin cäjachowic cˈo chilaˈ chquixol .

text: As soon then as he had said unto them , I am he , they went backward , and fell to the ground .
text2: Aretak ri Jesús xubij : “ In riˈ ” , pacˈalic xebeˈc , xetzak cˈu pulew .

text: Then asked he them again , Whom seek ye ? And they said , Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Te riˈ ri Jesús xutaˈ chi jumul chque : ¿ Jachin ri cätzucuj alak ? ― xcha chque . Xquibij cˈu ri e areˈ : Ri Jesús ri aj Nazaret , ― xechaˈ .

text: Jesus answered , I have told you that I am he : if therefore ye seek me , let these go their way :
text2: Te riˈ xubij ri Jesús chque : Nu bim chi chech alak chi in riˈ , ― cächa chque . We are ri in ri quintzucuj alak , ya alak chque we niqˈuiaj riˈ chi quebeˈc , ― xcha chque .

text: That the saying might be fulfilled , which he spake , Of them which thou gavest me have I lost none .
text2: Jeˈ xubij waˈ ri Jesús rech jeˈ cäbantajic jas ri xubij ri Areˈ : “ Ri xeuya ri nu Tat chwe , man cˈo tä jun chque xsachic , ” ― xchaˈ .

text: Then Simon Peter having a sword drew it , and smote the high priest ' s servant , and cut off his right ear . The servant ' s name was Malchus .
text2: Te riˈ ri tat Simón Pedro ri cˈo ru machete xucˈamo , xukˈat cˈu apan ru xiquin ri tat Malco ri patänil re ri qui nimal sacerdotes .

text: Then said Jesus unto Peter , Put up thy sword into the sheath : the cup which my Father hath given me , shall I not drink it ?
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Jesús che ri tat Pedro : Chaya chi jumul ri a machete pa ri cˈolibal re . We ri nu Tat cuban chwe chi quintij ri cˈa ri cˈo pa ri vaso , ¿ a mat rajwaxic wi chi cäpe waˈ we cˈäx riˈ chwij ? ― xcha che .

text: Then the band and the captain and officers of the Jews took Jesus , and bound him ,
text2: Xepe cˈu ri jumulaj soldados cachiˈl ri qui nimal ri e areˈ , xukujeˈ ri chajinelab re ri nimalaj rachoch Dios ri aj Israel , xquichap ri Jesús , xquiyutu .

text: And led him away to Annas first ; for he was father in law to Caiaphas , which was the high priest that same year .
text2: Te riˈ xquicˈam bi cho rachoch ri tat Anás . Ri tat Anás are u jiˈ ri tat Caifás ri qui nimal sacerdotes pa ri junab riˈ .

text: Now Caiaphas was he , which gave counsel to the Jews , that it was expedient that one man should die for the people .
text2: Are ri tat Caifás waˈ ri u bim can nabe chque ri winak aj Israel chi are utz na chque ri e areˈ chi cäcäm xa jun achi che qui qˈuexwäch conojel ri winak .

text: And Simon Peter followed Jesus , and so did another disciple : that disciple was known unto the high priest , and went in with Jesus into the palace of the high priest .
text2: Ri tat Simón Pedro , rachiˈl jun tijoxel chic , e benak rucˈ ri Jesús . Ri jun tijoxel chic riˈ etamtal u wäch rumal ri qui nimal sacerdotes , rumal cˈu riˈ xoc bi ri areˈ rucˈ ri Jesús pa ri uwoja rech ri rachoch ri qui nimal sacerdotes .

text: But Peter stood at the door without . Then went out that other disciple , which was known unto the high priest , and spake unto her that kept the door , and brought in Peter .
text2: Are cˈu ri tat Pedro xcanaj can chrij ri ja chiˈ ri uchibe . Xa je riˈ xel lok ri tijoxel ri etamtal u wäch rumal ri qui nimal sacerdotes , xchˈaw rucˈ ri chajil uchibe , xrocsaj cˈu bi ri tat Pedro .

text: Then saith the damsel that kept the door unto Peter , Art not thou also one of this man ' s disciples ? He saith , I am not .
text2: Ri chajil uchibe xutaˈ che ri tat Pedro , xubij : ¿ A mat lal jun chque ru tijoxelab we achi riˈ ? ― xcha che . Ri tat Pedro xchˈawic , xubij : No , man in jun tä chque , ― xcha che .

text: And the servants and officers stood there , who had made a fire of coals ; for it was cold : and they warmed themselves : and Peter stood with them , and warmed himself .
text2: Sibalaj cˈäx tew tajin cubano . Rumal riˈ ri patäninelab xukujeˈ ri chajinelab qui nucˈum jun kˈakˈ . E tacˈatoj cˈu chilaˈ , tajin cäquimikˈ quib . Ri tat Pedro xukujeˈ cˈo cucˈ , tajin cˈu cumikˈ rib chrij ri kˈakˈ .

text: The high priest then asked Jesus of his disciples , and of his doctrine .
text2: Ri qui nimal sacerdotes xuchap u taˈic che ri Jesús jachin tak ru tijoxelab , xukujeˈ jas ri tajin cucˈut chquiwäch ri winak .

text: Jesus answered him , I spake openly to the world ; I ever taught in the synagogue , and in the temple , whither the Jews always resort ; and in secret have I said nothing .
text2: Ri Jesús xubij che : Ri in , in tzijoninak chquiwäch conojel ri winak chi sakil . Amakˈel nu yoˈm tijonic pa tak ri rachoch Dios xukujeˈ pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios jawijeˈ ri cäquimulij wi quib conojel ri winak aj Israel . Je riˈ chi man cˈo tä jun tzij nu bim xak chi cˈuyal , ― cächa che .

text: Why askest thou me ? ask them which heard me , what I have said unto them : behold , they know what I said .
text2: ¿ Jas che cätaˈ la chwe in ? Taˈ la chque ri winak ri qui tom ri nu tzij , chquibij cˈut jas chrij in tzijoninak wi . Ri e areˈ quetam jas ri nu bim , ― xcha che .

text: And when he had thus spoken , one of the officers which stood by struck Jesus with the palm of his hand , saying , Answerest thou the high priest so ?
text2: Aretak xbitaj waˈ we tzij riˈ rumal ri Jesús , jun chque ri chajinelab rech ri nimalaj rachoch Dios ri cˈo chilaˈ xuya jun kˈab chupalaj ri Jesús , te cˈu riˈ xubij che : ¿ A jeˈ u chˈabexic waˈ ri qui nimal sacerdotes cabano ? ― xcha che .

text: Jesus answered him , If I have spoken evil , bear witness of the evil : but if well , why smitest thou me ?
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij che : We cˈo jun tzij xinbij ri man utz taj , bij la chwe jachique ri tzij ri man utz taj . We cˈu utz ri xinbij , ¿ jas che quinchˈay la ? ― xcha che .

text: Now Annas had sent him bound unto Caiaphas the high priest .
text2: Yutum cˈu ri Jesús , xpe ri tat Anás , xutak bi rucˈ ri tat Caifás , ri qui nimal ri sacerdotes .

text: And Simon Peter stood and warmed himself . They said therefore unto him , Art not thou also one of his disciples ? He denied it , and said , I am not .
text2: Are cˈu ri tat Pedro tacˈalic tajin cumikˈ na rib chrij ri kˈakˈ . Xquitaˈ cˈu che , xquibij : ¿ A mat at jun chque ru tijoxelab we achi riˈ ? ― xecha che . Ri tat Pedro cˈut xresaj rib chupam , xubij : ¡ No , man in jun tä chque ! ― xcha chque .

text: One of the servants of the high priest , being his kinsman whose ear Peter cut off , saith , Did not I see thee in the garden with him ?
text2: Te riˈ xtaˈ che rumal jun chque ri patänil tak re ri qui nimal sacerdotes , ri alaxic rucˈ ri achi ri xkˈat apan u xiquin rumal ri tat Pedro , xubij che : ¿ A mat xinwilo chi at cˈo rucˈ ri Areˈ pa ri chˈäkap ulew ri e tictal wi ri cheˈ ? ― xcha che .

text: Peter then denied again : and immediately the cock crew .
text2: Ri tat Pedro xresaj chi jumul rib chupam , tzare chiˈ cˈut xokˈ ri amaˈ äcˈ .

text: Then led they Jesus from Caiaphas unto the hall of judgment : and it was early ; and they themselves went not into the judgment hall , lest they should be defiled ; but that they might eat the passover .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ xquicˈam bi ri Jesús cho rachoch ri tat Caifás , xebeˈ cho ri nimalaj ja re ri nim kˈatal tzij . Xak jubikˈ chic craj man cäsakiric , ri winak aj Israel cˈut man xeboc tä pa ri nimalaj ja rech man cäcaˈn tä ri äwas u banic . We je riˈ man cuyaˈ tä riˈ cäquitij ri wiˈm rech ri Pascua .

text: Pilate then went out unto them , and said , What accusation bring ye against this man ?
text2: Rumal riˈ ri tat Pilato xel lok che qui tzijobexic , xubij chque : ¿ Jas u mac we achi riˈ ri quibij ix ? ― xcha chque .

text: They answered and said unto him , If he were not a malefactor , we would not have delivered him up unto thee .
text2: Ri e areˈ xechˈawic , xquibij : We ta mat are jun banal etzelal mat xkajach waˈ pa kˈab la , ― xecha che .

text: Then said Pilate unto them , Take ye him , and judge him according to your law . The Jews therefore said unto him , It is not lawful for us to put any man to death :
text2: Xubij cˈu ri tat Pilato chque : Chicˈama bi ix , chikˈata tzij puwiˈ . Chibanaˈ jas ri cubij ri i pixab ix , ― xcha chque . Ri winak aj Israel xechˈawic , xquibij : Ri uj , ri uj aj Israel , man yaˈtal tä chke chi cäkacämisaj jun winak , ― xecha che .

text: That the saying of Jesus might be fulfilled , which he spake , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Je riˈ xbantajic jas ru bim can ri Jesús chrij ri cäban na che chucämisaxic .

text: Then Pilate entered into the judgment hall again , and called Jesus , and said unto him , Art thou the King of the Jews ?
text2: Ri tat Pilato xoc chi bi jumul pa ri nimalaj ja , xusiqˈuij ri Jesús , te cˈu riˈ xutaˈ che : ¿ A at riˈ ri cattakan pa qui wiˈ ri winak aj Israel ? ― xcha che .

text: Jesus answered him , Sayest thou this thing of thyself , or did others tell it thee of me ?
text2: Ri Jesús xubij che : ¿ A xak lal cäbin la waˈ o niqˈuiaj chic xebin che la chwij in ? ― xcha che .

text: Pilate answered , Am I a Jew ? Thine own nation and the chief priests have delivered thee unto me : what hast thou done ?
text2: Ri tat Pilato xchˈawic , xubij : ¿ A in pu lo jun aj Israel ? Ri awinakil at , xukujeˈ ri qui nimakil ri sacerdotes e are tak waˈ ri xatjachow pa nu kˈab . ¿ Jas cˈu ri a banom ? ― xcha che .

text: Jesus answered , My kingdom is not of this world : if my kingdom were of this world , then would my servants fight , that I should not be delivered to the Jews : but now is my kingdom not from hence .
text2: Te riˈ xchˈaw ri Jesús , xubij che : Ri nu takanic man rech tä we uwächulew riˈ . We ta rech ruwächulew , ri nu tijoxelab xechˈojin ta riˈ rech mat xinjach pa qui kˈab ri winak aj Israel . Ri nu takanic cˈut man ajwaral taj , ― xcha che .

text: Pilate therefore said unto him , Art thou a king then ? Jesus answered , Thou sayest that I am a king . To this end was I born , and for this cause came I into the world , that I should bear witness unto the truth . Every one that is of the truth heareth my voice .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri tat Pilato che : Je riˈ chi ri at , ¿ a at nim takanel ? ― xcha che . Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij : In nim takanel , jas ri cäbij la , ― xcha che . Ri in xil nu wäch waral cho ruwächulew chubixic jas riˈ ri kas tzij . Conojel cˈu ri queniman che ri kas tzij cäquitatabej ri quinbij , ― xcha che .

text: Pilate saith unto him , What is truth ? And when he had said this , he went out again unto the Jews , and saith unto them , I find in him no fault at all .
text2: Ri tat Pilato xubij che : ¿ Jas cˈu riˈ ri kas tzij ? ― xcha che . Xuwi xtaˈtaj waˈ che ri Jesús rumal ri tat Pilato , ri areˈ xel chi lok jumul che qui tzijobexic ri winak aj Israel , xubij chque : Ri in , man cˈo tä jun mac quinrik chrij we achi riˈ , ― cächa chque .

text: But ye have a custom , that I should release unto you one at the passover : will ye therefore that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Ri ix cˈut ix nakˈatalic chi quinban tokˈob chiwe , quintzokopij bi jun ajpacheˈ pa ri nimakˈij re ri Pascua . ¿ A quiwaj chi quintzokopij bi ri tataˈ riˈ ri cˈo u takanic pi wiˈ ix , ix winak aj Israel ? ― xcha chque .

text: Then cried they all again , saying , Not this man , but Barabbas . Now Barabbas was a robber .
text2: Te riˈ conojel co xechˈawic , xquibij : ¡ Mätzokopij la bi ri areˈ ! ¡ Are tzokopij la bi ri Barrabás ! ― xechaˈ . Areˈ cˈu jun elakˈom waˈ ri Barrabás .

text: Then Pilate therefore took Jesus , and scourged him .
text2: Te riˈ ri tat Pilato xucˈam bi ri Jesús , xtakan cˈu chuchˈayic .

text: And the soldiers platted a crown of thorns , and put it on his head , and they put on him a purple robe ,
text2: Ri soldados xquicoj jun corona re quemom qˈuix chujolom ri Jesús , xquicoj cˈu jun atzˈiak morada chrij .

text: And said , Hail , King of the Jews ! and they smote him with their hands .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ xekeb rucˈ , xquibij cˈut : Lal riˈ ri cätakan la pa qui wiˈ ri winak aj Israel , ¡ chnimarisax kˈij la ! ― xecha che . Xquichˈay cˈu chupalaj .

text: Pilate therefore went forth again , and saith unto them , Behold , I bring him forth to you , that ye may know that I find no fault in him .
text2: Ri tat Pilato xel lok jumul chic , xubij cˈu chque ri winak : Chiwilampeˈ , quinwesaj lok we achi riˈ chiwäch rech quiwetamaj chi man cˈo tä jubikˈ mac quinrik in chrij , ― xcha chque .

text: Then came Jesus forth , wearing the crown of thorns , and the purple robe . And Pilate saith unto them , Behold the man !
text2: Xel cˈu lok ri Jesús , cojom cˈu ri corona re quemom qˈuix chujolom , cojom xukujeˈ ri atzˈiak morada chrij . Te cˈu riˈ xubij ri tat Pilato chque : ¡ Waral cˈo wi ri achi ! ― xcha chque .

text: When the chief priests therefore and officers saw him , they cried out , saying , Crucify him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Take ye him , and crucify him : for I find no fault in him .
text2: Aretak ri qui nimakil sacerdotes , xukujeˈ ri chajinelab re ri nimalaj rachoch Dios xquilo , co xechˈawic , xquibij : ¡ Chripok ! ¡ Chripok ! ― xechaˈ . Ri tat Pilato xubij chque : ¡ Chicˈama bi ix , chiripaˈ ! Ri in man cˈo tä jubikˈ mac quinrik in chrij , ― xcha chque .

text: The Jews answered him , We have a law , and by our law he ought to die , because he made himself the Son of God .
text2: Ri winak aj Israel xechˈawic , xquibij : Ri uj cˈo jun ka pixab , ri ka pixab cˈut cubij chi rajwaxic cäcämisaxic rumal chi xuban che rib chi are u Cˈojol ri Dios , ― xechaˈ .

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he was the more afraid ;
text2: Ri tat Pilato , aretak xuta waˈ ri xquibij , sibalaj xuxej na rib .

text: And went again into the judgment hall , and saith unto Jesus , Whence art thou ? But Jesus gave him no answer .
text2: Xoc chi bi jumul pa ri nimalaj ja , xutaˈ che ri Jesús : ¿ Jawijeˈ ri catpe wi ? ― xcha che . Are cˈu ri Jesús man xchˈaw taj , man cˈo tä cˈu jas xubij che .

text: Then saith Pilate unto him , Speakest thou not unto me ? knowest thou not that I have power to crucify thee , and have power to release thee ?
text2: Xubij cˈu ri tat Pilato che : ¿ Jas che man quinachˈabej taj ? ¿ A mat awetam chi cˈo takanic pa nu kˈab che a ripic cho ri cruz o che a tzokopixic bic ? ― xcha che .

text: Jesus answered , Thou couldest have no power at all against me , except it were given thee from above : therefore he that delivered me unto thee hath the greater sin .
text2: Ri Jesús xchˈawic , xubij che : Man cˈo tä jubikˈ takanic la pa nu wiˈ we ta mat yoˈm che la rumal ri Dios . Rumal riˈ , jachin ri xinjachow pa kˈab la nim na u mac riˈ chuwäch la , ― xcha che .

text: And from thenceforth Pilate sought to release him : but the Jews cried out , saying , If thou let this man go , thou art not Caesar ' s friend : whosoever maketh himself a king speaketh against Caesar .
text2: Tzare chiˈ cˈut ri tat Pilato xutzucuj jas xubano rech cutzokopij bi ri Jesús . Are cˈu ri winak aj Israel co xechˈawic , xquibij : ¡ We cätzokopij la bic , man utz tä animaˈ la riˈ rucˈ ri nimalaj takanel ! ¡ Jachin ri cuban che rib chi are nim takanel , u cˈulel riˈ ri nimalaj takanel ! ― xecha che .

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he brought Jesus forth , and sat down in the judgment seat in a place that is called the Pavement , but in the Hebrew , Gabbatha .
text2: Ri tat Pilato aretak xuta ri xquibij , xtakan che resaxic lok ri Jesús . Ri areˈ cˈut xtˈuyi cho ri kˈatbal tzij pa ri cˈolibal ri cäbix “ Gabata ” che pa hebreo , ri quel cubij “ Lajom Abaj ” .

text: And it was the preparation of the passover , and about the sixth hour : and he saith unto the Jews , Behold your King !
text2: Xa cˈu chuwek chic ri nimakˈij Pascua . Craj are ri niqˈuiaj kˈij . Ri tat Pilato cˈut xubij chque ri winak aj Israel : ¡ Waral cˈo wi ri tataˈ ri cˈo u takanic pi wiˈ ! ― xcha chque .

text: But they cried out , Away with him , away with him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Shall I crucify your King ? The chief priest answered , We have no king but Caesar .
text2: Ri e areˈ cˈut co xechˈawic , xquibij : ¡ Chcämisaxok ! ¡ Chcämisaxok ! ¡ Chripok ! ― xechaˈ . Ri tat Pilato xubij chque : ¿ A quinrip ta cˈu cho ri cruz ri tataˈ ri cˈo u takanic pi wi ? ― xcha chque . Are cˈu ri qui nimakil ri sacerdotes xechˈawic , xquibij che : Ri uj man cˈo tä chi jun achi chic ri cätakan pa ka wiˈ , xane xak xuwi ri nimalaj takanel , ― xechaˈ .

text: Then delivered he him therefore unto them to be crucified . And they took Jesus , and led him away .
text2: Ri tat Pilato xuwi xuta waˈ , xujach bi ri Jesús pa qui kˈab rech cäquirip cho ri cruz . Xquicˈam cˈu bic .

text: And he bearing his cross went forth into a place called the place of a skull , which is called in the Hebrew Golgotha :
text2: Xel cˈu bi ri Jesús , xucˈam bi ru cruz , xeˈ pa ri juyub ri cäbix U Bakil Jolomaj che . ( Pa ri chˈabal hebreo are cäbix Gólgota che . )

text: Where they crucified him , and two other with him , on either side one , and Jesus in the midst .
text2: Chilaˈ xquirip wi cho ri cruz junam cucˈ quieb achijab chic , jujun pa tak u xcut . Ri Jesús xcanaj pa qui niqˈuiajal .

text: And Pilate wrote a title , and put it on the cross . And the writing was , JESUS OF NAZARETH THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Ri tat Pilato xtakan chucojic jun tzˈibtalic puwiˈ ri cruz ri cubij : JESÚS AJ NAZARET RI NIM TAKANEL PA QUI WIˈ RI WINAK AJ ISRAEL .

text: This title then read many of the Jews : for the place where Jesus was crucified was nigh to the city : and it was written in Hebrew , and Greek , and Latin .
text2: E qˈuia chque ri winak aj Israel xquisiqˈuij u wäch ri tzˈibtalic riˈ rumal chi ri juyub ri xrip wi ri Jesús nakaj cˈo wi che ri tinimit Jerusalén . Ri tzˈibtalic , tzˈibtal waˈ pa ri hebreo , griego , xukujeˈ pa ri latín .

text: Then said the chief priests of the Jews to Pilate , Write not , The King of the Jews ; but that he said , I am King of the Jews .
text2: Rumal riˈ ri qui nimakil sacerdotes quech ri winak aj Israel xquibij che ri tat Pilato : Mätzˈibaj la : “ Ri Nim Takanel quech ri winak aj Israel . ” Xane tzˈibaj la : “ Ri cubij che rib chi are Nim Takanel quech ri winak aj Israel , ” ― xecha che .

text: Pilate answered , What I have written I have written .
text2: Are cˈu ri tat Pilato xchˈawic , xubij chque : Ri xintzˈibaj , xak je waˈ cäcanajic , ― xcha chque .

text: Then the soldiers , when they had crucified Jesus , took his garments , and made four parts , to every soldier a part ; and also his coat : now the coat was without seam , woven from the top throughout .
text2: Te riˈ , aretak xetoˈtaj ri soldados churipic ri Jesús cho ri cruz , xquicˈam ri ratzˈiak , xcaˈn cˈu quiejeb che , jujun que ri jujun soldados . Xukujeˈ xquicˈam ri camixaˈ . Man tˈisom tä cˈu waˈ , xane xa jun u banom , quemom petinak ajsic cˈä iquim .

text: They said therefore among themselves , Let us not rend it , but cast lots for it , whose it shall be : that the scripture might be fulfilled , which saith , They parted my raiment among them , and for my vesture they did cast lots . These things therefore the soldiers did .
text2: Ri soldados xquibij chbil tak quib : Man cäkarakˈatij taj . Chkesaj suerte chrij rech cäkilo jachin cächˈacowic , ― xechaˈ . Je riˈ xbantajic jas ri tzˈibtal pa ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri cubij : “ Xquijach ri watzˈiak chquiwäch , xquesaj suerte chrij , ” ― cächaˈ . Are waˈ ri xcaˈn ri soldados .

text: Now there stood by the cross of Jesus his mother , and his mother ' s sister , Mary the wife of Cleophas , and Mary Magdalene .
text2: Chunakaj ri cruz ri ripom wi ri Jesús cˈo ru nan , cˈo ru chakˈ ru nan , cˈo ri nan María ri rixokil ri tat Cleofas , xukujeˈ cˈo ri nan María ri aj Magdala .

text: When Jesus therefore saw his mother , and the disciple standing by , whom he loved , he saith unto his mother , Woman , behold thy son !
text2: Aretak ri Jesús xril ru nan xukujeˈ ri tijoxel ri sibalaj lokˈ chuwäch tacˈal chuxcut , xubij che ru nan : Nan , chabana awal che we achi riˈ , ― xcha che .

text: Then saith he to the disciple , Behold thy mother ! And from that hour that disciple took her unto his own home .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ xubij che ru tijoxel : Chabana a nan che ri nu nan , ― xcha che . Tzare chiˈ cˈut ri tijoxel riˈ xucˈam bi ru nan ri Jesús cho rachoch .

text: After this , Jesus knowing that all things were now accomplished , that the scripture might be fulfilled , saith , I thirst .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ rumal chi ri Jesús retam chi ronojel ri tzˈibtal chrij bantajinak chic , xukujeˈ rech kas cäbantajic jas ri cubij ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios , xubij : Cächakiˈj nu chiˈ , ― xchaˈ .

text: Now there was set a vessel full of vinegar : and they filled a spunge with vinegar , and put it upon hyssop , and put it to his mouth .
text2: Cˈo cˈu apan jun lak nojinak che chˈäm vino . Xquirub cˈu jun estropajo chupam ri vino riˈ , xquiya puwiˈ jun aj , te cˈu riˈ xquiya akˈan chuchiˈ ri Jesús .

text: When Jesus therefore had received the vinegar , he said , It is finished : and he bowed his head , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Ri Jesús xutij ri chˈäm vino , te cˈu riˈ xubij : Ronojel xbantajic , ― xchaˈ . Xupachba cˈu ru jolom , xel ranimaˈ .

text: The Jews therefore , because it was the preparation , that the bodies should not remain upon the cross on the sabbath day , ( for that sabbath day was an high day , ) besought Pilate that their legs might be broken , and that they might be taken away .
text2: Xa cˈu chuwek chic ri nimakˈij Pascua . Man cäcaj tä cˈu ri winak aj Israel chi ri qui cuerpo ri winak quecanaj can cho tak ri cruz pa ri kˈij re uxlanem . Ri kˈij re uxlanem riˈ are jun kˈij waˈ nim u banic . Rumal riˈ xquitaˈ che ri tat Pilato chi cätakan chukˈajisaxic ri cakan ri e ripil cho tak ri cruz , xukujeˈ chi cäkasax ri qui cuerpo cho ri cruz .

text: Then came the soldiers , and brake the legs of the first , and of the other which was crucified with him .
text2: Te riˈ xebeˈ ri soldados , xquikˈajisaj ri rakan ri nabe xukujeˈ ri jun chic ri e ripom rucˈ ri Jesús .

text: But when they came to Jesus , and saw that he was dead already , they brake not his legs :
text2: Aretak cˈut xekeb rucˈ ri Jesús , xquilo chi cäminak chic , xa je riˈ man xquikˈajisaj tä ri rakan ri Areˈ .

text: But one of the soldiers with a spear pierced his side , and forthwith came there out blood and water .
text2: Pune je riˈ jun chque ri soldados xujak ru cˈalcˈax ri Jesús rucˈ jun lanza , chanim cˈut xel lok quicˈ xukujeˈ joron .

text: And he that saw it bare record , and his record is true : and he knoweth that he saith true , that ye might believe .
text2: Ri cäbin waˈ we tzij riˈ , are jun ri kas xrilo , kas tzij cˈu ri cubij . Ri areˈ cubij ri kas tzij ri retam rech ri ix xukujeˈ quixcojonic .

text: For these things were done , that the scripture should be fulfilled , A bone of him shall not be broken .
text2: Je cˈu xcˈulmataj waˈ rech cäbantajic jas ri tzˈibtal pa ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri cubij : “ Man cˈo tä jun bak xquikˈajisaj che , ” ― cächaˈ .

text: And again another scripture saith , They shall look on him whom they pierced .
text2: Cubij xukujeˈ ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios pa jun u xak chic : “ Cäquil na ri xquisoco , ” ― cächaˈ .

text: And after this Joseph of Arimathaea , being a disciple of Jesus , but secretly for fear of the Jews , besought Pilate that he might take away the body of Jesus : and Pilate gave him leave . He came therefore , and took the body of Jesus .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ xpe ri tat José ri quel pa ri tinimit Arimatea , xutaˈ che ri tat Pilato chi cäyiˈ che chi cukasaj ru cuerpo ri Jesús . Ri tat José are jun u tijoxel ri Jesús , xa cˈu chi cˈuyal rumal chi cuxej rib chquiwäch ri winak aj Israel . Xyiˈ cˈu che rumal ri tat Pilato . Xa je riˈ xeˈ ri tat José , xukasaj ru cuerpo ri Jesús , xucˈam cˈu bi pa mukic .

text: And there came also Nicodemus , which at the first came to Jesus by night , and brought a mixture of myrrh and aloes , about an hundred pound weight .
text2: Xpe xukujeˈ ri tat Nicodemo ri nabe canok xopan rucˈ ri Jesús chakˈab chutzijobexic . Ri areˈ rucˈam jun cunabal , are mirra ri yujtal rucˈ áloes , ri cäpajan cien libras .

text: Then took they the body of Jesus , and wound it in linen clothes with the spices , as the manner of the Jews is to bury .
text2: Je riˈ ri tat José rachiˈl ri tat Nicodemo xquicˈam bi ru cuerpo ri Jesús , xquipis cˈu pa tak manta re lino ri yoˈm ri cˈocˈalaj tak cunabal chrij . Jeˈ xcaˈn che jas ri e nakˈatal wi ri winak aj Israel che qui mukic ri cäminakib .

text: Now in the place where he was crucified there was a garden ; and in the garden a new sepulchre , wherein was never man yet laid .
text2: Pa ri juyub ri xrip wi ri Jesús cho ri cruz , cˈo jun chˈäkap ulew ri e tictal wi ri cheˈ . Pa ri ulew riˈ cˈo jun cˈacˈ mukubal ri mäjaˈ yoˈm jun cäminak chupam .

text: There laid they Jesus therefore because of the Jews ' preparation day ; for the sepulchre was nigh at hand .
text2: Chupam cˈut xquiya wi ru cuerpo ri Jesús , rumal chi ri mukubal riˈ nakaj cˈo wi , xukujeˈ rumal chi xa jubikˈ craj man cächaptaj ri kˈij re uxlanem chque ri winak aj Israel .

text: The first day of the week cometh Mary Magdalene early , when it was yet dark , unto the sepulchre , and seeth the stone taken away from the sepulchre .
