text2: ¿ Jampaˈ xkˈalajisax rumal ri Dios chi jicom ranimaˈ ? ¿ A xuban waˈ aretak cojom chi ri retal ri ojer trato che o aretak mäjaˈ xcojic ? Man cˈä te tä xkˈalajisax rumal ri Dios chi jicom ranimaˈ aretak cojom chi retal ri ojer trato che , xane aretak mäjaˈ cäcojic .

text: And he received the sign of circumcision , a seal of the righteousness of the faith which he had yet being uncircumcised : that he might be the father of all them that believe , though they be not circumcised ; that righteousness might be imputed unto them also :
text2: Te cˈu riˈ ri ka mam Abraham xoc ri retal ri ojer trato che ru cuerpo ri areˈ . Are cˈu waˈ retal ri cäcˈutuwic chi kˈalajisam chi rumal ri Dios chi jicom ranimaˈ rumal chi xcojonic . Je riˈ ri Abraham xoc che qui tat conojel ri cojonelab ri man cojom tä ri retal ri ojer trato che ri qui cuerpo . Je wa riˈ ri e areˈ xukujeˈ quekˈalajisax rumal ri Dios chi jicom canimaˈ .

text: And the father of circumcision to them who are not of the circumcision only , but who also walk in the steps of that faith of our father Abraham , which he had being yet uncircumcised .
text2: Kas tzij ri ka mam Abraham are xoc che qui tat ri cojom retal ri ojer trato che ri qui cuerpo , man xuwi tä cˈu rumal waˈ , xane xukujeˈ rumal chi xecojonic junam jas ri ka mam Abraham xcojonic aretak mäjok coc ri retal ri ojer trato che ru cuerpo .

text: For the promise , that he should be the heir of the world , was not to Abraham , or to his seed , through the law , but through the righteousness of faith .
text2: Ri Dios xuchiˈj che ri ka mam Abraham xukujeˈ chque ri rachalaxic ri quil na qui wäch chi cäquechbej na ruwächulew , man rumal tä cˈu rech chi xniman ri ka mam Abraham che ri Pixab ri xutzˈibaj ri ka mam Moisés , xane rumal chi xcojonic , xkˈalajisax cˈu rumal ri Dios chi jicom ranimaˈ .

text: For if they which are of the law be heirs , faith is made void , and the promise made of none effect :
text2: We ta xak xuwi ri queniman che ri Pixab cäquicˈam na que ri echbal , man cˈo tä baˈ u patän riˈ chi cujcojonic . Xukujeˈ ri xuchiˈj lok ri Dios chi cuya na man cˈo tä chi u patän riˈ .

text: Because the law worketh wrath : for where no law is , there is no transgression .
text2: Je riˈ , rumal chi ri Dios cucˈäjisaj qui wäch ri man queniman tä che ri Pixab . Jawijeˈ cˈu ri man cˈo tä wi pixab , man cˈo tä mac riˈ chrij ri pixab .

text: Therefore it is of faith , that it might be by grace ; to the end the promise might be sure to all the seed ; not to that only which is of the law , but to that also which is of the faith of Abraham ; who is the father of us all ,
text2: Rech ri xuchiˈj ri Dios che ri ka mam Abraham kas cäquechbej na conojel ri rachalaxic ri quil na qui wäch , rajwaxic chi are jun sipanic ri cuya ri Dios chque ri quecojonic . Quel cubij chi ri xuchiˈj ri Dios man xuwi tä chque ri queniman che ri Pixab , xane xukujeˈ chque conojel ri quecojonic jas ri xuban ri ka mam Abraham . Ri areˈ cˈut are xoc che ka tat uj konojel ri uj cojonelab chuwäch ri Dios ,

text: ( As it is written , I have made thee a father of many nations , ) before him whom he believed , even God , who quickeneth the dead , and calleth those things which be not as though they were .
text2: ri xukujeˈ xcojon ri ka mam Abraham che . Jeˈ jas ri tzˈibtal pa ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios : “ At nu cojom che qui tat qˈuia u wäch winak ” , ― cächaˈ . Ri Dios cˈut are cäyoˈw qui cˈaslemal ri cäminakib , xukujeˈ queuban ri jastak ri cˈä mäjaˈ quecˈojiˈc .

text: Who against hope believed in hope , that he might become the father of many nations ; according to that which was spoken , So shall thy seed be .
text2: Ri ka mam Abraham , pune man cäcowin tä chic cäcˈoji ralcˈual , xucoj chi cäcˈoji na jun u cˈojol . Xcuˈbi cˈu u cˈux chrij ri Dios , je riˈ xoc che “ qui tat qˈuia u wäch winak ” , jas ri bim che rumal ri Dios : “ Are je waˈ qui qˈuial ri awachalaxic ri quil na qui wäch , ” ― xuchixic .

text: And being not weak in faith , he considered not his own body now dead , when he was about an hundred years old , neither yet the deadness of Sara ' s womb :
text2: Ri ka mam Abraham man xuban tä quieb u cˈux , pune xa jubikˈ man cätzˈakat tä cien u junab . Retam chi ri areˈ rachiˈl ri Sara ri rixokil xak cämem chi que , e nimak tak winak chic , man quecowin tä chic cäcˈoji calcˈual .

text: He staggered not at the promise of God through unbelief ; but was strong in faith , giving glory to God ;
text2: Man xuban tä quieb u cˈux chrij ri xbix che rumal ri Dios , xane xa sibalaj xcojonic , xcuˈbi u cˈux , xuya cˈu u kˈij ri Dios .

text: And being fully persuaded that , what he had promised , he was able also to perform .
text2: Xujiquiba u cˈux chi ri Dios cäcowin chubanic ronojel ri cubij .

text: And therefore it was imputed to him for righteousness .
text2: Rumal riˈ xkˈalajisax rumal ri Dios chi jicom ranimaˈ , rumal chi xcojonic .

text: Now it was not written for his sake alone , that it was imputed to him ;
text2: Man xak xuwi tä ri ka mam Abraham xtzˈibax chrij chi xkˈalajisax rumal ri Dios chi jicom ranimaˈ .

text: But for us also , to whom it shall be imputed , if we believe on him that raised up Jesus our Lord from the dead ;
text2: Ri uj xukujeˈ xtzˈibax chkij chi ri Dios cukˈalajisaj chi jicom kanimaˈ rumal chi cujcojonic , konojel ri uj , uj cojoninak che ri Dios ri xcˈastajisan ri Kajaw Jesús chquixol ri cäminakib .

text: Who was delivered for our offences , and was raised again for our justification .
text2: Ri Kajaw Jesús xjach pa cämisaxic rumal rech ri ka mac , xcˈastaj cˈu chquixol ri cäminakib rech cäjicomataj ri kanimaˈ cho ri Dios .

text: Therefore being justified by faith , we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Cämic cˈut ri xjicomataj ri kanimaˈ cho ri Dios rumal chi xujcojonic , cˈo chi cˈu utzil chkaxol rucˈ Areˈ rumal ri Kajaw Jesucristo .

text: By whom also we have access by faith into this grace wherein we stand , and rejoice in hope of the glory of God .
text2: Rumal cˈu ri Cristo xtokˈobisax ka wäch rumal ri Dios rumal chi xujcojonic . Ri tokˈob ri xkariko man cˈo tä quesan chke , rumal riˈ cujquicotic , cuˈl ka cˈux chi cäkarik na ke uj ri u nimarisaxic u kˈij ri Dios .

text: And not only so , but we glory in tribulations also : knowing that tribulation worketh patience ;
text2: Man xuwi tä waˈ cujquicot wi , xane xukujeˈ cujquicot chupam ri cˈäxcˈol , rumal chi ri cˈäxcˈol cuban chke chi cäkachajij paciencia .

text: And patience , experience ; and experience , hope :
text2: Ri paciencia cuban chke chi utz cujel na cho ri Dios . Aretak utz chic uj cˈolic , cäcuˈbi ka cˈux chrij ri Dios .

text: And hope maketh not ashamed ; because the love of God is shed abroad in our hearts by the Holy Ghost which is given unto us .
text2: Aretak cäcuˈbi ka cˈux chrij ri Dios man cˈo tä bis cäkariko rumal chi ri rutzil ranimaˈ ri Dios cˈo pa kanimaˈ rumal ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu ri u yoˈm chke .

text: For when we were yet without strength , in due time Christ died for the ungodly .
text2: Ri uj , aretak man xujcowin taj xkatoˈ kib ka tuquiel wi , kas pa ru kˈijol xpe ri Cristo , xcäm cˈu rumal kech uj ri uj ajmaquib .

text: For scarcely for a righteous man will one die : yet peradventure for a good man some would even dare to die .
text2: Man cˈo tä jun winak cuya u tzij cäcämisax chuqˈuexwäch jun winak chic , pune are jun winak ri kas jicom ranimaˈ . Craj cˈu ne cˈo jun ri cuya u tzij cäcämisax chuqˈuexwäch jun winak ri sibalaj utz .

text: But God commendeth his love toward us , in that , while we were yet sinners , Christ died for us .
text2: Ri Dios cˈut xucˈut chkawäch chi sibalaj cujraj aretak ri Cristo xcäm rumal kech , pune cˈu uj ajmaquib .

text: Much more then , being now justified by his blood , we shall be saved from wrath through him .
text2: Cämic cˈut ri ya jicom chi kanimaˈ cho ri Dios rumal ru cämical ri Cristo , kas cujutoˈ na ri Cristo chuwäch ri cˈäjisabal wächaj ri cäpe na chuqˈuisbal .

text: For if , when we were enemies , we were reconciled to God by the death of his Son , much more , being reconciled , we shall be saved by his life .
text2: Ri uj nabe canok aretak ka cˈulel na ri Dios , xujrutzirisaj rucˈ Areˈ rumal ru cämical ru Cˈojol , rumal riˈ cämic ri ya uj utz chi rucˈ ri Dios , kas cäkarik wi na ru tobanic ri Dios rumal ru cˈaslemal ri Cristo .

text: And not only so , but we also joy in God through our Lord Jesus Christ , by whom we have now received the atonement .
text2: Man xuwi tä waˈ , xane xukujeˈ cujquicot rucˈ ri Areˈ rumal ri Kajaw Jesucristo . Rumal cˈu ri Cristo uj utz chi rucˈ ri Dios .

text: Wherefore , as by one man sin entered into the world , and death by sin ; and so death passed upon all men , for that all have sinned :
text2: Je cˈu riˈ , ri mac xoc cho we uwächulew xa rumal jun winak . Rumal cˈu ri mac xpe ri cämical pa qui wiˈ conojel ri winak rumal chi conojel xemacunic .

text: ( For until the law sin was in the world : but sin is not imputed when there is no law .
text2: Aretak mäjok cäpe ri Pixab , ri mac ya cˈo chic cho ruwächulew . Man cäcoj tä cˈu ri mac pa cuenta aretak man cˈo tä pixab .

text: Nevertheless death reigned from Adam to Moses , even over them that had not sinned after the similitude of Adam ' s transgression , who is the figure of him that was to come .
text2: Pune je riˈ , xtakan cˈu ri mac pa qui wiˈ ri winak ri xemacunic xchaptaj lok rucˈ ri Adán cˈä xopan ru kˈij ri Moisés , pune man jeˈ tä qui mac jas ru mac ri Adán ri man xunimaj tä ru Pixab ri Dios . Ri Adán cˈut are jun cˈutbal chrij ri Cristo ri cäpe na .

text: But not as the offence , so also is the free gift . For if through the offence of one many be dead , much more the grace of God , and the gift by grace , which is by one man , Jesus Christ , hath abounded unto many .
text2: Man cuyaˈ taj cäjunamataj ri mac ri xuban ri Adán rucˈ ri sipanic ri cuya ri Dios . Rumal cˈu ri mac ri xuban xa jun winak e qˈuia xecämic . Are cˈu ri tobanic ri cusipaj ri Dios chke rumal ri nimalaj u tokˈob pa ka wiˈ , sibalaj nim na u banic waˈ . Xuya waˈ chke rumal xa jun winak , ri Jesucristo , chubanic utzil chque qˈuia winak .

text: And not as it was by one that sinned , so is the gift : for the judgment was by one to condemnation , but the free gift is of many offences unto justification .
text2: Ri mac ri xuban xa jun winak man cuyaˈ taj cäjunamataj waˈ rucˈ ri tobanic ri cusipaj ri Dios . Je riˈ , rumal chi ri mac ri xuban xa jun winak xubano chi cäkˈat tzij pa qui wiˈ ri winak chi cäcˈäjisax qui wäch . Are cˈu ru tobanic ri Dios xpetic rech cäjicomataj ri canimaˈ ri winak cho ri Dios , pune sibalaj qˈuia ri qui mac caˈnom .

text: For if by one man ' s offence death reigned by one ; much more they which receive abundance of grace and of the gift of righteousness shall reign in life by one , Jesus Christ . )
text2: We ri cämical xcˈoji u takanic pa qui wiˈ ri winak rumal ri mac ri xuban xa jun winak , sibalaj nim cˈu na u banic waˈ chi ri winak ri cäjicomataj canimaˈ cho ri Dios rumal ru tokˈob quetakan na pa ri cˈacˈ qui cˈaslemal rumal xa jun winak , ri Jesucristo .

text: Therefore as by the offence of one judgment came upon all men to condemnation ; even so by the righteousness of one the free gift came upon all men unto justification of life .
text2: Jeˈ jas ru mac ri Adán xubano chi cäkˈat tzij pa qui wiˈ conojel ri winak chi cäcˈäjisax qui wäch , je cˈu riˈ xukujeˈ ri jicomal ri xuban ri Jesucristo cubano chi conojel ri winak cäquirik na qui cˈaslemal , man cäkˈat tä cˈu tzij pa qui wiˈ chi cäcˈäjisax qui wäch .

text: For as by one man ' s disobedience many were made sinners , so by the obedience of one shall many be made righteous .
text2: Quel cubij chi rumal ri jun winak ri man xniman tä che ri Dios e qˈuia winak xeboc che ajmaquib , je riˈ xukujeˈ , rumal ri Jun ri xniman che ri Dios e qˈuia winak cäjicomataj ri canimaˈ cho ri Dios .

text: Moreover the law entered , that the offence might abound . But where sin abounded , grace did much more abound :
text2: Xpe cˈu ri Pixab rech quel na ri mac chi sak . Aretak cˈut xnimar u wäch ri mac , ru tokˈob ri Dios xukujeˈ xnimar na u wäch waˈ .

text: That as sin hath reigned unto death , even so might grace reign through righteousness unto eternal life by Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Je cˈu riˈ jas ri mac xcowinic xucˈam lok ri cämical pa qui wiˈ ri winak , je riˈ xukujeˈ aretak ri uj cäjicomataj ri kanimaˈ cho ri Dios , ri nimalaj u tokˈob ri Areˈ cäcowinic cuya ka cˈaslemal ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic rumal ri Jesucristo ri Kajaw .

text: What shall we say then ? Shall we continue in sin , that grace may abound ?
text2: ¿ Jas cˈu ri cäkabij ? ¿ A cäkatakej u banic ri mac rech ri Dios sibalaj cucˈut na ri nimalaj u tokˈob ?

text: God forbid . How shall we , that are dead to sin , live any longer therein ?
text2: ¡ Man jeˈ tä riˈ ! Ri uj , jeˈ ta ne chi uj cäminak chuwäch ri mac . Man cˈo tä chi u chukˈab ri mac pa ka wiˈ . We je riˈ , ¿ a cuyaˈ ta cˈu lo cäkatakej u banic ri mac ?

text: Know ye not , that so many of us as were baptized into Jesus Christ were baptized into his death ?
text2: ¿ A mat iwetam chi ri uj ri banom ka kasnaˈ rech xa uj jun chic rucˈ ri Jesucristo , jeˈ ta ne ri junam xujcäm rucˈ ri Areˈ ?

text: Therefore we are buried with him by baptism into death : that like as Christ was raised up from the dead by the glory of the Father , even so we also should walk in newness of life .
text2: Rumal ri kasnaˈ jeˈ ta ne junam xujmuk rucˈ ri Cristo , jeˈ ta ne xujcämic rech cujcˈastajisaxic , cäcˈoji cˈu jun cˈacˈ ka cˈaslemal jeˈ jas ru cˈaslemal ri Cristo aretak xcˈastaj chquixol ri cäminakib rumal ri nimalaj u chukˈab ri ka Tat .

text: For if we have been planted together in the likeness of his death , we shall be also in the likeness of his resurrection :
text2: We cˈu xkaˈn jun rucˈ ri Cristo rumal ri cämical ri xuriko , je riˈ xukujeˈ cäkaˈn na jun rucˈ Areˈ rumal chi xcˈastaj chquixol ri cäminakib .

text: Knowing this , that our old man is crucified with him , that the body of sin might be destroyed , that henceforth we should not serve sin .
text2: Ketam chi ri ojer ka cˈaslemal xrip cho ri cruz junam rucˈ ri Cristo , rech cäsach u wäch ri u chukˈab ri ka rayibal ajuwächulew ri man utz taj . Je riˈ man uj cˈo tä chi pu kˈab ri mac , man cujpatänin tä chi che ri mac jeˈ ta ne che jun patrón .

text: For he that is dead is freed from sin .
text2: Je riˈ , rumal chi ri winak ri cäminak chic , man chaptal tä chi riˈ rumal ri mac .

text: Now if we be dead with Christ , we believe that we shall also live with him :
text2: We ri uj , uj cäminak chic junam rucˈ ri Cristo , cäcuˈbi ka cˈux chi cujecˈasal na rucˈ ri Areˈ .

text: Knowing that Christ being raised from the dead dieth no more ; death hath no more dominion over him .
text2: Je riˈ , rumal chi ketam chi ri Cristo cˈastajinak chic chquixol ri cäminakib , man cäcäm tä chi wi . Ri cämical man cätakan tä chi puwiˈ .

text: For in that he died , he died unto sin once : but in that he liveth , he liveth unto God .
text2: Ri Cristo aretak xcämic , xa jumul xcäm chusachic u wäch ri mac , man xak tä tajin wi cäcämic . Aretak cˈu xcˈastajic , xcˈasi chunimarisaxic u kˈij ri Dios .

text: Likewise reckon ye also yourselves to be dead indeed unto sin , but alive unto God through Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Je cˈu riˈ ri ix , chichomaj chi ix cäminak chic chuwäch ri mac . Man cˈo tä chi u chukˈab ri mac pi wiˈ . Ix cˈasal cˈu cämic chunimarisaxic u kˈij ri Dios junam rucˈ ri Cristo Jesús ri Kajaw .

text: Let not sin therefore reign in your mortal body , that ye should obey it in the lusts thereof .
text2: Rumal riˈ miya baˈ chi ri mac cutakej takanic puwiˈ ri i cuerpo ri xa cäcämic , mixutak cˈu ne chunimaxic ri i rayibal ri man utz taj .

text: Neither yield ye your members as instruments of unrighteousness unto sin : but yield yourselves unto God , as those that are alive from the dead , and your members as instruments of righteousness unto God .
text2: Mijach baˈ iwib pu kˈab ri mac chubanic ri man utz taj . Xane chijacha iwib pu kˈab ri Dios , jeˈ ta ne chi xixcäm na , ix cˈastajinak chi cˈut . Chijacha iwib pu kˈab ri Dios chubanic ri utzil .

text: For sin shall not have dominion over you : for ye are not under the law , but under grace .
text2: Je riˈ , rumal chi ri mac man cätakan tä chi pi wiˈ . Man ix cˈo tä chi cˈu pu kˈab ri Pixab , xane ix cˈo pu kˈab ri Dios rumal ru tokˈob pa ka wiˈ .

text: What then ? shall we sin , because we are not under the law , but under grace ? God forbid .
text2: ¿ Jas cˈu cujcanaj wi ? ¿ A cujmacunic rumal chi man uj cˈo tä chi pu kˈab ri Pixab , xane pu kˈab ri Dios rumal ru tokˈob pa ka wiˈ ? ¡ Man jeˈ tä riˈ !

text: Know ye not , that to whom ye yield yourselves servants to obey , his servants ye are to whom ye obey ; whether of sin unto death , or of obedience unto righteousness ?
text2: Ri ix kas iwetam chi we quijach iwib chupatänixic jun patrón rech quixniman che , quixoc cˈu che patänil tak re ri patrón riˈ , tzrajwaxic cˈu wi chi quixniman che . Are je riˈ , we are quixpatänin che ri mac jeˈ ta ne are jun i patrón ri cucˈam lok cämical pi wiˈ , o are quixniman che ri Dios rech cäjicomataj ri iwanimaˈ chuwäch ri Areˈ , quiban cˈu na ri utzil .

text: But God be thanked , that ye were the servants of sin , but ye have obeyed from the heart that form of doctrine which was delivered you .
text2: Maltiox cˈu che ri Dios chi ri ix ri nabe canok xipatänij na ri mac , cämic cˈut pa iwanimaˈ xpe wi ru nimaxic ri kas tzij re ri tijonic ri xijach iwib che retamaxic .

text: Being then made free from sin , ye became the servants of righteousness .
text2: Aretak xixel lok pu kˈab ri mac ri ix chapowinak , ri ix xijach iwib chupatänixic ri Dios rech quiban ri jicom pa ri i cˈaslemal .

text: I speak after the manner of men because of the infirmity of your flesh : for as ye have yielded your members servants to uncleanness and to iniquity unto iniquity ; even so now yield your members servants to righteousness unto holiness .
text2: Quinbij waˈ chiwe pa qui tzij winak , rumal chi ri ix i tuquiel wi man kas quixcowin tä chuchˈobic waˈ we chomanic riˈ . Man jeˈ tä quibano jas ri xiban can nabe aretak xijach iwib chupatänixic ri mac rech quiban ri äwas u banic cho ri Dios xukujeˈ ri etzelal . Xane che we cämic , chijacha iwib pu kˈab ri Dios chubanic ri jicom pa ri i cˈaslemal rech quixcˈoji chuwäch ri Areˈ chˈajchˈoj ri iwanimaˈ .

text: For when ye were the servants of sin , ye were free from righteousness .
text2: Ri ix nabe , aretak tajin quipatänij na ri mac , man i yoˈm tä iwib chubanic ri jicom pa ri i cˈaslemal .

text: What fruit had ye then in those things whereof ye are now ashamed ? for the end of those things is death .
text2: ¿ Jas cˈu xichˈac che ri xiban can nabe ri quiqˈuix chi che cämic ? Xuwi cˈu ri cämical xiriko .

text: But now being made free from sin , and become servants to God , ye have your fruit unto holiness , and the end everlasting life .
text2: Cämic cˈu ri ix , ix elinak chi pu kˈab ri mac , ix oquinak chi che patänil tak re ri Dios . Cˈo cˈu xichˈac waˈ che . Ri xichˈaco are ru jachic iwib pu kˈab ri Dios , chuqˈuisbal cˈut quirik na ri cˈaslemal ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic .

text: For the wages of sin is death ; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Ri tojbal ri cuya ri mac are xak xuwi ri cämical , are cˈu ri Dios cusipaj ri cˈaslemal ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic rumal ri Cristo Jesús , ri Kajaw .

text: Know ye not , brethren , ( for I speak to them that know the law , ) how that the law hath dominion over a man as long as he liveth ?
text2: Kachalal , ri ix ri iwetam ri Pixab quichˈobo chi ri Pixab xuwi cˈo chukˈab pu kˈab puwiˈ jun winak aretak cˈasal na .

text: For the woman which hath an husband is bound by the law to her husband so long as he liveth ; but if the husband be dead , she is loosed from the law of her husband .
text2: Quincoj na jun cˈutbal chiwäch : Ri ixok ri cˈulanic rajwaxic chi cänim riˈ che ri pixab re ri cˈulanem aretak cˈä cˈasal na ri rachajil . We cˈu cäcäm ri rachajil , cˈä te riˈ man rajwaxic tä chic cäniman che we pixab riˈ .

text: So then if , while her husband liveth , she be married to another man , she shall be called an adulteress : but if her husband be dead , she is free from that law ; so that she is no adulteress , though she be married to another man .
text2: Rumal riˈ , we ri ixok cäcˈuli rucˈ jun achi chic aretak cˈasal na ri rachajil , cuban ri nimalaj mac ri äwas u banic chrij ri rachajil . We cˈu cäcäm ri rachajil , man rajwaxic tä chic cäniman che ri pixab re ru cˈulanem . Pune cäcˈuli rucˈ jun achi chic , man cuban tä riˈ ri nimalaj mac ri äwas u banic .

text: Wherefore , my brethren , ye also are become dead to the law by the body of Christ ; that ye should be married to another , even to him who is raised from the dead , that we should bring forth fruit unto God .
text2: Je cˈu riˈ ri ix , kachalal , ri ix u tzˈakatil ru cuerpo ri Cristo , man cˈo tä chic ri Pixab pi wiˈ rumal chi ix jeˈ ta ne ix cˈulan chic rucˈ ri Cristo . Ix rech chi ri Cristo ri xcˈastaj chquixol ri cäminakib . Je riˈ rech ri ka cˈaslemal coc waˈ chupatänixic ri Dios .

text: For when we were in the flesh , the motions of sins , which were by the law , did work in our members to bring forth fruit unto death .
text2: Nabe canok , aretak ri ka cˈaslemal are ru banic xak jas ri cäkaj uj , ri itzel tak ka rayinic xecˈastaj rumal ri Pixab . Ri riˈ cˈut xa xujucˈam bi pa ri cämical .

text: But now we are delivered from the law , that being dead wherein we were held ; that we should serve in newness of spirit , and not in the oldness of the letter .
text2: Cämic cˈut uj cäminak chic chuwäch ri Pixab ri xtakan pa ka wiˈ nabe . Je riˈ man cˈo tä chi ri Pixab pa ka wiˈ . Cämic cäkapatänij ri Dios pa ri cˈacˈ ka cˈaslemal ri cuya ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu . Ri ojer Pixab ri tzˈibtalic man cˈo tä chi pa ka wiˈ .

text: What shall we say then ? Is the law sin ? God forbid . Nay , I had not known sin , but by the law : for I had not known lust , except the law had said , Thou shalt not covet .
text2: ¿ Jas cˈu ri cäkabij ? ¿ A cäkabij lo chi mac riˈ ri Pixab ? ¡ Man jeˈ taj ! Rumal cˈu ri cubij ri Pixab xinwetamaj jas riˈ ri mac . ¡ Kachomajmpeˈ ! Mat xinwetamaj riˈ chi ru rayixic ri jastak que niqˈuiaj winak chic are mac , we ta mat xubij ri Pixab : “ Marayij u wäch ri jastak que niqˈuiaj winak chic , ” ― cächaˈ .

text: But sin , taking occasion by the commandment , wrought in me all manner of concupiscence . For without the law sin was dead .
text2: Ri mac cˈut xnimar u wäch rumal ri takanic , xucˈasuj cˈu pa ri wanimaˈ ronojel u wäch itzel tak rayinic . Je riˈ , rumal chi we ta mat cˈo ri Pixab , man kˈalaj tä riˈ chi cˈo ri mac .

text: For I was alive without the law once : but when the commandment came , sin revived , and I died .
text2: Ri in nabe canok aretak mäjaˈ cˈo wetam chrij ri Pixab xinchomaj chi kas utz ri tajin quinban pa ri nu cˈaslemal . Aretak cˈut xpe ri takanic , xinchˈob jas ri cubij ri Pixab . Te riˈ xcˈastaj ri mac ri cˈo pa wanimaˈ , are cˈu ri in xinwetamaj chi in cäminak chuwäch ri Dios .

text: And the commandment , which was ordained to life , I found to be unto death .
text2: Je riˈ ri takanic ri xpe chuyaˈic cˈaslemal , chwe in cˈut xa xuya cämical .

text: For sin , taking occasion by the commandment , deceived me , and by it slew me .
text2: Rumal ri Pixab ri mac xucoj u chukˈab chwe , xinusub cˈut . Xucoj ri takanic che nu cämisaxic .

text: Wherefore the law is holy , and the commandment holy , and just , and good .
text2: Kas tzij cˈut , ri Pixab rucˈ ri takanic man cˈo tä qui mac , xane jicom xukujeˈ utz ri cäquibij .

text: Was then that which is good made death unto me ? God forbid . But sin , that it might appear sin , working death in me by that which is good ; that sin by the commandment might become exceeding sinful .
text2: ¿ A are ta cˈu lo ri u banic utzil ri xbanow chwe chi quincämic ? ¡ Man are taj ! Xane are ri mac ri quincämisanic . Je riˈ xubano rech cäkˈalajinic jas riˈ ri mac . Are cˈu xucoj ri utz chubanic waˈ . Je riˈ ri takanic xukˈalajisaj chi ri mac are sibalaj man utz taj .

text: For we know that the law is spiritual : but I am carnal , sold under sin .
text2: Ketam chi ri Pixab rucˈ ri Dios cäpe wi , ri in cˈut xak in winak . In cˈo pu kˈab ri mac .

text: For that which I do I allow not : for what I would , that do I not ; but what I hate , that do I .
text2: Man quinchˈob tä cˈut jas ri tajin quinbano . Man are tä cˈu quinban ri cwaj , xane ri tzel quinwilo are waˈ ri tajin quinbano .

text: If then I do that which I would not , I consent unto the law that it is good .
text2: We cˈu are quinban ri man cwaj taj quinbano , je riˈ quinchˈobo chi utz ri Pixab .

text: Now then it is no more I that do it , but sin that dwelleth in me .
text2: Rumal cˈu riˈ man in tä chi riˈ ri tajin quinbanowic , xane are ri mac ri cˈo pa ri wanimaˈ ri tajin cuban waˈ .

text: For I know that in me ( that is , in my flesh , ) dwelleth no good thing : for to will is present with me ; but how to perform that which is good I find not .
text2: Ri in wetam chi man cˈo tä jubikˈ ri utz pa ri wanimaˈ rumal chi xak in winak ajuwächulew . Cˈo nu rayinic chubanic ri utz , xa cˈu man quincowin tä quinban waˈ .

text: For the good that I would I do not : but the evil which I would not , that I do .
text2: Man quinban tä ri utz ri cwaj quinbano , xane are quintakej u banic ri man utz taj ri man cwaj taj quinbano .

text: Now if I do that I would not , it is no more I that do it , but sin that dwelleth in me .
text2: We cˈu are quinban ri man cwaj taj quinbano , man in tä chi riˈ quinbanowic , xane are ri mac ri cˈo pa wanimaˈ .

text: I find then a law , that , when I would do good , evil is present with me .
text2: Ri quincˈulmaj cˈut are waˈ : Aretak cwaj quinban ri utz , xuwi ri etzelal cucˈut rib chnuwäch .

text: For I delight in the law of God after the inward man :
text2: Ri wanimaˈ cˈut cäquicot rucˈ ru Pixab ri Dios .

text: But I see another law in my members , warring against the law of my mind , and bringing me into captivity to the law of sin which is in my members .
text2: Quinwil cˈut chi pa ri nu cuerpo cˈo jun pixab ri xa cucˈulelaj u wäch ri pixab ri cˈo pa ri nu chomabal . Are cˈu waˈ ri pixab re ri mac ri cˈo pa ri nu cuerpo , are waˈ ri in chapowinak .

text: O wretched man that I am ! who shall deliver me from the body of this death ?
text2: ¡ Cˈäx waˈ ri nu banic ! ¿ Jachin ta ri quinesan na pu kˈab waˈ we cuerpo riˈ ri xa quinucˈam bi pa ri cämical ?

text: I thank God through Jesus Christ our Lord . So then with the mind I myself serve the law of God ; but with the flesh the law of sin .
text2: Xuwi ri Dios cäcowin che nu toˈic rumal ri Kajaw Jesucristo . ¡ Maltiox baˈ che ri Dios ! Rumal riˈ ri in quinchˈobo chi rajwaxic quinnimaj ru Pixab ri Dios , are cˈu ri nu cuerpo cuya rib pu kˈab ri mac .

text: There is therefore now no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus , who walk not after the flesh , but after the Spirit .
text2: Cämic cˈut , ri winak ri xa e jun chic rucˈ ri Cristo Jesús , man cäkˈat tä na tzij pa qui wiˈ chi cäcˈäjisax qui wäch . E are cˈu tak waˈ ri man cäcaˈn tä ri qui rayibal ri man utz taj , xane are cäcaˈno jas ri craj ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu .

text: For the law of the Spirit of life in Christ Jesus hath made me free from the law of sin and death .
text2: Ri pixab cˈut ri rech ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu ri cuya cˈaslemal rumal ri Cristo Jesús , are xinesan pu kˈab ri pixab re ri mac xukujeˈ re ri cämical .

text: For what the law could not do , in that it was weak through the flesh , God sending his own Son in the likeness of sinful flesh , and for sin , condemned sin in the flesh :
text2: Ri Dios xubano jachique ri man xcowin tä chubanic ri Pixab ri xutzˈibaj ri ka mam Moisés . Ri Pixab riˈ man cˈo tä u chukˈab chuqˈuexic ri qui cˈaslemal ri winak . Ri Dios cˈut xutak lok ru Cˈojol ri ya winak chic , xucoj cˈu che sipanic chutojic ri ka mac . Xutak lok jeˈ ta ne are xa jun winak ajmac . Je riˈ ri Dios xucˈäjisaj u wäch ri mac rumal ru cämical ri Jesús .

text: That the righteousness of the law might be fulfilled in us , who walk not after the flesh , but after the Spirit .
text2: Jeˈ xuban waˈ ri Dios rech ri uj cujcowin chubanic jas ri cätakan wi ri Pixab , man cäkaˈn tä chi cˈut xa jas ri cäkaj uj , xane are cäkaˈno jas ri craj ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu .

text: For they that are after the flesh do mind the things of the flesh ; but they that are after the Spirit the things of the Spirit .
text2: Ri winak cˈut ri cäcaˈno xak jas ri cäcaj ri e areˈ , are queboc il chubanic ri qui rayibal ajuwächulew . Are cˈu ri cäcaˈno jas ri craj ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu , are queboc il chubanic jas ri craj ri Areˈ .

text: For to be carnally minded is death ; but to be spiritually minded is life and peace .
text2: Ri coc il jun chubanic ri ka rayibal ajuwächulew cäcˈaman bi waˈ pa ri cämical . Are cˈu ri coc il jun chubanic jas ri craj ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu cuban chi curik na cˈaslemal , xukujeˈ cubano chi cuxlan ri ranimaˈ .

text: Because the carnal mind is enmity against God : for it is not subject to the law of God , neither indeed can be .
text2: Ri winak ri xa cäquichomaj u banic ri qui rayibal ajuwächulew cäcaˈn qui cˈulel che ri Dios rumal chi man quecowin taj queniman che ru Pixab ri Dios , xukujeˈ man cäcaj taj .

text: So then they that are in the flesh cannot please God .
text2: Rumal riˈ ri winak ri cäcaˈno xak jas ri cäcaj ri e areˈ , man cuyaˈ taj cäkaj ri qui cˈaslemal chuwäch ri Dios .

text: But ye are not in the flesh , but in the Spirit , if so be that the Spirit of God dwell in you . Now if any man have not the Spirit of Christ , he is none of his .
text2: Ri ix cˈut man benak tä iwanimaˈ chubanic xak jas ri quiwaj ix , xane are quibano jas ri craj ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu , we kas cˈo ri Espíritu rech ri Dios pa ri iwanimaˈ . Jachin cˈu ri man cˈo tä ri Espíritu rech ri Cristo pa ranimaˈ , man rech tä ri Cristo riˈ .

text: And if Christ be in you , the body is dead because of sin ; but the Spirit is life because of righteousness .
text2: We ri Cristo cˈo pa iwanimaˈ , pune baˈ cäcäm na ri i cuerpo rumal ri mac , cäcˈasi cˈu ri iwespíritu rumal chi xjicomataj ri iwanimaˈ cho ri Dios .

text: But if the Spirit of him that raised up Jesus from the dead dwell in you , he that raised up Christ from the dead shall also quicken your mortal bodies by his Spirit that dwelleth in you .
text2: We pa ri iwanimaˈ ix cˈo wi ri Espíritu rech ri Dios ri xcˈastajisan ri Jesús chquixol ri cäminakib , ri Dios are cäyoˈw na cˈacˈ u cˈaslemal ri i cuerpo ri xa cäcämic . Jeˈ cuban waˈ rumal ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu rech ri Areˈ ri cˈo pa iwanimaˈ .

text: Therefore , brethren , we are debtors , not to the flesh , to live after the flesh .
text2: Je cˈu riˈ , kachalal , cˈo ri rajwaxic cäkaˈno , man are tä cˈu ru banic xak jas ri cäkaj uj .

text: For if ye live after the flesh , ye shall die : but if ye through the Spirit do mortify the deeds of the body , ye shall live .
text2: We cˈu ri ix quiban xak jas ri quiwaj ix , quixcäm na . We cˈu rumal ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu quicämisaj ri i rayibal ri man utz taj , quixcˈasi na .

text: For as many as are led by the Spirit of God , they are the sons of God .
text2: Conojel cˈu ri cˈamom qui be rumal ri Espíritu rech ri Dios , e are waˈ ralcˈual ri Dios .

text: For ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear ; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption , whereby we cry , Abba , Father .
text2: Ri Espíritu ri yoˈm chiwe rumal ri Dios man are tä jun espíritu ri xak ix u cojom che tak patäninelab ri xukujeˈ cuban chiwe chi quixej iwib , xane are ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu ri xubano chi ix ralcˈual ri Dios . Ri Espíritu riˈ cuya chke chi cäkabij : “ ¡ Ka Tat ! ” che ri Dios .

text: The Spirit itself beareth witness with our spirit , that we are the children of God :
text2: Tzare cˈu we Espíritu riˈ cubij pa ri kanimaˈ chi uj ralcˈual chi ri Dios .

text: And if children , then heirs ; heirs of God , and joint - heirs with Christ ; if so be that we suffer with him , that we may be also glorified together .
text2: Rumal chi uj ralcˈual ri Dios , yaˈtalic chi cäyiˈ ke ri echbal ri xuchiˈj ri Dios , cäkacˈam cˈu na waˈ junam rucˈ ri Cristo . Je riˈ we junam cäkarik cˈäx rucˈ ri Cristo , rech junam rucˈ ri Areˈ cänimarisax na ka kˈij .

text: For I reckon that the sufferings of this present time are not worthy to be compared with the glory which shall be revealed in us .
text2: Ri in cˈut quinchomaj chi ri cˈäx ri tajin cäkarik pa tak we kˈij cämic , man cäjunamataj tä waˈ rucˈ ri nimarisabal ka kˈij ri cäyiˈ na chke pa tak ri kˈij ri junab ri quepe na .

text: For the earnest expectation of the creature waiteth for the manifestation of the sons of God .
text2: Ronojel cˈu ri banom rumal ri Dios xak reyeˈm chi cäpe ri kˈij aretak quekˈalajisax na jachin tak ri e ralcˈual ri Dios .

text: For the creature was made subject to vanity , not willingly , but by reason of him who hath subjected the same in hope ,
text2: Je riˈ , rumal chi ronojel ri banom rumal ri Dios , xkˈat tzij puwiˈ chi man cˈo tä u patän . Man are tä cˈu waˈ ri u rayibal , xane are ri Dios xbanow che . Pune je riˈ , cˈo jas ri cäreyej na .

text: Because the creature itself also shall be delivered from the bondage of corruption into the glorious liberty of the children of God .
text2: Are laˈ chi cäpe na ri kˈij aretak ronojel ri banom rumal ri Dios cätzokopitaj na , man cäcanaj tä chi can pu kˈab ri cämical , cänimarisax cˈu na u kˈij junam cucˈ ri e ralcˈual ri Dios .

text: For we know that the whole creation groaneth and travaileth in pain together until now .
text2: Cämic riˈ , ketam chi ronojel ri banom rumal ri Dios quel chˈuj , cˈo pa kˈoxom , jeˈ jas ru kˈoxom jun yawab ixok .

text: And not only they , but ourselves also , which have the firstfruits of the Spirit , even we ourselves groan within ourselves , waiting for the adoption , to wit , the redemption of our body .
text2: Man xuwi tä cˈu ri banom rumal ri Dios quel chˈuj , xane ri uj xukujeˈ ri yoˈm ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu chke , ri nabe kechbal ri xuya ri Dios . Ri uj xukujeˈ cäkˈoxow kanimaˈ , keyeˈm cˈut jampaˈ cujkˈalajisax chi uj kas ralcˈual ri Dios , rech quel ri ka cuerpo pu kˈab ri cämical .

text: For we are saved by hope : but hope that is seen is not hope : for what a man seeth , why doth he yet hope for ?
text2: Xkarik ru tobanic ri Dios rumal chi cˈo ri xcuˈbi wi ka cˈux . We cäcuˈbi u cˈux jun chrij ri tajin cäril chic , man cuˈlbal cˈux tä riˈ . Ri tajin cäril chic man rajwaxic tä riˈ chi cäreyej na .

text: But if we hope for that we see not , then do we with patience wait for it .
text2: We cˈu ri keyeˈm are ri mäjaˈ cäkilo , rajwaxic chi rucˈ paciencia cujeyen na che .

text: Likewise the Spirit also helpeth our infirmities : for we know not what we should pray for as we ought : but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered .
text2: Ri uj man cˈo tä ka chukˈab . Tzare cˈu ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu cujtoˈwic . Man ketam taj cäkaˈn orar , man cäkachˈob tä cˈut jas ri rajwaxic cäkataˈ che ri Dios , tzare cˈu ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu cäbochiˈn che ri Dios pa ka wiˈ rucˈ okˈej ri man cujcowin tä uj cäkabij rucˈ ri ka tzij .

text: And he that searcheth the hearts knoweth what is the mind of the Spirit , because he maketh intercession for the saints according to the will of God .
text2: Are cˈu ri Dios ri cäcaˈy pa tak kanimaˈ , ri Areˈ retam jas ri craj cubij ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu , rumal chi ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu cubochiˈj ri Dios jas ru rayibal ri Areˈ pa qui wiˈ ri winak ri e rech .

text: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God , to them who are the called according to his purpose .
text2: Ketam cˈut chi ri Dios cubano chi utz quel na ronojel ri cäpe pa qui wiˈ ri winak ri lokˈ cäquil wi ri Areˈ . E are cˈu tak waˈ ri winak ri e siqˈuim rumal ri Areˈ jas ri u chomam lok .

text: For whom he did foreknow , he also did predestinate to be conformed to the image of his Son , that he might be the firstborn among many brethren .
text2: Conojel cˈu ri xetamax qui wäch rumal ri Dios ojer , e are tak waˈ xeuchaˈ rech quejunamataj na rucˈ ru Cˈojol . Je riˈ xubano rech ru Cˈojol coc che nabeal chquixol qˈuia winak ri cachalal quib .

text: Moreover whom he did predestinate , them he also called : and whom he called , them he also justified : and whom he justified , them he also glorified .
text2: Ri xechaˈtaj rumal ri Dios ojer e areˈ tak waˈ xeusiqˈuij , ri xeusiqˈuij e areˈ tak waˈ ri xujicomaj canimaˈ , ri xujicomaj canimaˈ cˈut , e areˈ tak waˈ xunimarisaj qui kˈij junam rucˈ ri Areˈ .

text: What shall we then say to these things ? If God be for us , who can be against us ?
text2: ¿ Jas cˈu ri cäkabij chrij waˈ ? Cäkabij cˈut : We ri Dios are cˈo pa ka wiˈ , man cˈo tä jun ri cuyaˈ cuyac rib chkij .

text: He that spared not his own Son , but delivered him up for us all , how shall he not with him also freely give us all things ?
text2: Ri Dios man xukˈil tä rib chuyaˈic ri u Cˈojol , xane xujach pa ri cämical rumal kech uj nimalaj konojel . ¿ A mat cˈu cuya ri Areˈ junam rucˈ ri u Cˈojol ronojel ri cajwataj chke ? ¡ Jeˈ , je riˈ !

text: Who shall lay any thing to the charge of God ' s elect ? It is God that justifieth .
text2: ¿ Jachin ta ri cäcowinic cumol ka mac uj , ri uj chaˈtal rumal ri Dios ? Ri Dios cˈut u bim chkij chi jicom kanimaˈ .

text: Who is he that condemneth ? It is Christ that died , yea rather , that is risen again , who is even at the right hand of God , who also maketh intercession for us .
text2: ¿ Jachin ta lo ri cuyaˈ cukˈat tzij pa ka wiˈ chi cäcˈäjisax ka wäch ? Are cˈu ri Cristo xcäm che ka qˈuexwäch . Man xuwi tä waˈ , xane xukujeˈ xcˈastaj chquixol ri cäminakib . Tˈuyul ri Areˈ cämic pa ru wiquiäkˈab ri Dios , tajin cˈu cäbochiˈn pa ka wiˈ cho ri Dios .

text: Who shall separate us from the love of Christ ? shall tribulation , or distress , or persecution , or famine , or nakedness , or peril , or sword ?
text2: ¿ Jachin ta lo ri cäcowinic cujtasow chrij ri rutzil ranimaˈ ri Cristo ? ¡ Man cˈo taj ! Pune cˈu cäkarik ri cˈäx , pune cäpe ri bis , pune cˈo winak ri cäquetzelaj ka wäch , pune cäkarik numic , pune man cˈo tä chi katzˈiak ri cäkajalbej , pune xa jubikˈ man cujcämic , pune cˈu cujcämisaxic , man cˈo tä ri cäcowinic cujtasow chrij ri rutzil ranimaˈ ri Cristo .

text: As it is written , For thy sake we are killed all the day long ; we are accounted as sheep for the slaughter .
text2: Cubij cˈu ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic : Rumal ech la uj cˈo cho ri cämical amakˈel ronojel kˈij . Jeˈ cäban chke jas ri cäban chque ri chij ri quecˈam bi pa pilic ,

text: Nay , in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us .
text2: ― cächaˈ . Pa ronojel cˈu tak waˈ ri cˈäx ri cäkariko , cujchˈacan na , rumal ru tobanic ri Jun ri cujraj .

text: For I am persuaded , that neither death , nor life , nor angels , nor principalities , nor powers , nor things present , nor things to come ,
text2: Rumal riˈ nu jiquibam nu cˈux chi man cˈo tä jas ri cäcowinic cujtasow chrij ri rutzil ranimaˈ ri Dios . Man are tä ri cämical , man are tä ri cˈaslemal , man are tä ri ángeles , man are tä cˈu niqˈuiaj ri cˈo takanic pa qui kˈab , xukujeˈ ri cˈo qui chukˈab ri man queilitaj taj . Man are tä ri cˈo pa tak ri kˈij cämic , o ri cäcˈoji na pa tak ri kˈij ri quepetic .

text: Nor height , nor depth , nor any other creature , shall be able to separate us from the love of God , which is in Christ Jesus our Lord .
text2: Man cˈo tä jas ri cˈo chicaj , man cˈo tä jas ri cˈo pulew , man cˈo tä cˈu jun jasach chic ri banom rumal ri Dios ri cäcowinic cujutas chrij ri rutzil ranimaˈ ri Dios ri u cˈutum chkawäch rumal ri Cristo Jesús ri Kajaw .

text: I say the truth in Christ , I lie not , my conscience also bearing me witness in the Holy Ghost ,
text2: Tajin quinbij ri kas tzij rumal chi in cojoninak che ri Cristo . Man quinban tä cˈu tzij . Quinnaˈ pa wanimaˈ chi kas tzij ri tajin quinbij rumal ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu ri cätakan pa wanimaˈ .

text: That I have great heaviness and continual sorrow in my heart .
text2: Sibalaj quinbisonic , amakˈel cˈut cäkˈoxow ri wanimaˈ rumal ri cˈäx ri qui rikom ri nu winakil .

text: For I could wish that myself were accursed from Christ for my brethren , my kinsmen according to the flesh :
text2: Cwaj ta ne in , pune baˈ cäpe cˈäx pa nu wiˈ rumal ri Dios chi quintastaj in chrij ri Cristo we rajwaxic che qui toˈic ri nu winakil .

text: Who are Israelites ; to whom pertaineth the adoption , and the glory , and the covenants , and the giving of the law , and the service of God , and the promises ;
text2: Ri e areˈ e aj Israel , ri Dios cˈut xuban ralcˈual chque . Ri Dios ri sibalaj nim u kˈij xcˈoji cucˈ , xukujeˈ xeuban tak tratos cucˈ . Xuya ru Pixab chque rumal ri Moisés , xubij cˈu chque jas u banic ri kˈijilanic pa ri nimalaj rachoch Dios . Cˈo qˈuia ri xuchiˈj chque .

text: Whose are the fathers , and of whom as concerning the flesh Christ came , who is over all , God blessed for ever . Amen .
text2: Conojel waˈ we winak riˈ e calcˈual can ri ka mam aj Israel ojer , chquixol cˈu ri e areˈ xil wi u wäch ri Cristo ri xcˈoji cho ruwächulew . Ri Areˈ are Dios ri cätakan puwiˈ ronojel . ¡ Amakˈel ronojel kˈij cˈut chyoˈk u kˈij ! Amén .

text: Not as though the word of God hath taken none effect . For they are not all Israel , which are of Israel :
text2: Man xa tä cˈu mat jeˈ xel wi ri xuchiˈj lok ri Dios chque ri winak aj Israel , xane rumal chi man conojel tä ri calcˈual can ri ojer ka mam aj Israel kas e rech ri Israel ru tinimit ri Dios .

text: Neither , because they are the seed of Abraham , are they all children : but , In Isaac shall thy seed be called .
text2: Man conojel tä ri rachalaxic ri ka mam Abraham ri xil qui wäch kas e ralcˈual ri Dios . Xubij cˈu ri Dios che : “ Rumal ri Isaac quecˈoji na uwiˈ tak a mam , ” ― xuchixic .

text: That is , They which are the children of the flesh , these are not the children of God : but the children of the promise are counted for the seed .
text2: Quel cubij waˈ chi man conojel taj e ralcˈual ri Dios , pune cäquibij chi e areˈ aj Israel . Xane jachin tak ri cäquicoj pa canimaˈ ri xuchiˈj lok ri Dios , e are waˈ kas e ralcˈual ri Dios rumal ri xubij ri Dios che ri ka mam Abraham .

text: For this is the word of promise , At this time will I come , and Sara shall have a son .
text2: Ri xuchiˈj ri Dios che ri ka mam Abraham are waˈ , xubij cˈu che : “ Pa ri kˈij riˈ pa ri jun junab chic quintzelej na lok . Are chiˈ cˈut ri Sara cäril na u wäch jun ral ala , ” ― xcha che .

text: And not only this ; but when Rebecca also had conceived by one , even by our father Isaac ;
text2: Man xuwi tä cˈu waˈ . Ri quieb ral ala ri Rebeca xa jun ri qui tat , are ri Isaac ri ka mam ojer .

text: ( For the children being not yet born , neither having done any good or evil , that the purpose of God according to election might stand , not of works , but of him that calleth ; )
text2: Aretak mäjok quil qui wäch we quieb acˈalab riˈ , mäjok cäcaˈn jun utzil o jun etzelal , ri Dios xubij che ri Rebeca : “ Ri nabeal coc na che patänil re ru chakˈ , ” ― xcha che . Junam waˈ rucˈ ri cubij ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic : “ Lokˈ xinwil wi ri Jacob , are cˈu xinwetzelaj u wäch ri Esaú , ” ― cächaˈ . Je riˈ xujiquiba u bixic chi ri Dios cächomanic jachin ri craj cuchaˈ . Queusiqˈuij jachin tak ri craj , man rumal tä cˈu ri quecowin chubanic .

text: What shall we say then ? Is there unrighteousness with God ? God forbid .
text2: ¿ Jas cˈu ri cäkabij ? ¿ A cäkabij chi ri Dios man cuban tä ri jicomal ? ¡ Man jeˈ taj !

text: For he saith to Moses , I will have mercy on whom I will have mercy , and I will have compassion on whom I will have compassion .
text2: Xubij cˈu ri Dios che ri ka mam Moisés : “ Quel na nu cˈux che jachin ri cwaj quel wi nu cˈux , quintokˈobisaj cˈu na u wäch jachin ri cwaj quintokˈobisaj u wäch , ” ― xcha che .

text: So then it is not of him that willeth , nor of him that runneth , but of God that sheweth mercy .
text2: Rumal riˈ man are tä cächaˈ ri jun ri sibalaj craj cächaˈic , o ri jun ri sibalaj cucoj u chukˈab , xane ri Dios are quilowic jachin ri craj cutokˈobisaj u wäch .

text: For the scripture saith unto Pharaoh , Even for this same purpose have I raised thee up , that I might shew my power in thee , and that my name might be declared throughout all the earth .
text2: Cubij ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic chi ri Dios xubij che ri tat Faraón ri nim takanel puwiˈ ri Egipto : “ Xatincoj che nim takanel rech awumal at quincˈut ri nu chukˈab chquiwäch ri winak , rech quetamax nu wäch cho ronojel ruwächulew , ” ― xchaˈ .

text: Therefore hath he mercy on whom he will have mercy , and whom he will he hardeneth .
text2: Je riˈ ri Dios cutokˈobisaj u wäch jachin ri craj cutokˈobisaj u wäch , xukujeˈ cucowirisaj ri ranimaˈ jachin ri craj jeˈ jas ri xuban che ri tat Faraón .

text: Thou wilt say then unto me , Why doth he yet find fault ? For who hath resisted his will ?
text2: Jun chiwe cubij cˈu chwe : “ We je riˈ , ¿ jas che ri Dios cubij chi are qui mac ri winak ? ¿ Jachin ta cˈu lo ri cäcowinic cukˈatej u wäch ri Dios ? ” ― cächa na .

text: Nay but , O man , who art thou that repliest against God ? Shall the thing formed say to him that formed it , Why hast thou made me thus ?
text2: E ri at , ¿ jachin lo ri at chi ri at cacˈulelaj u wäch ri Dios ? ¿ A cubij lo ri boˈj che ri xbanowic : “ ¿ Jas che jeˈ xban la waˈ chwe ? ” ― ¿ a cächa lo che ? ¡ Man jeˈ taj !

text: Hath not the potter power over the clay , of the same lump to make one vessel unto honour , and another unto dishonour ?
text2: ¿ A mat are cäban re ri banal boˈj jas ri craj cuban che ri ulew ? We craj cuban jun lak ri cäcoj pa tak nimakˈij , o we craj cuban jun lak ri cäcoj ronojel kˈij , are riˈ cäban re .

text: What if God , willing to shew his wrath , and to make his power known , endured with much longsuffering the vessels of wrath fitted to destruction :
text2: Ri Dios cˈut xraj xuya jun cˈutbal chrij ri royowal xukujeˈ ru chukˈab . Rumal riˈ xuchajij nimalaj paciencia cucˈ ri winak ri yaˈtal chque chi cäcˈäjisax qui wäch , ri xa cäsach na qui wäch .

text: And that he might make known the riches of his glory on the vessels of mercy , which he had afore prepared unto glory ,
text2: Jeˈ xuban ri Dios waˈ rech kumal uj cucˈut chquiwäch conojel chi sibalaj nim u kˈij ri Areˈ , kumal uj ri winak ri xel u cˈux chke , ri uj ri chaˈtal rumal ojer lok rech cänimarisax ka kˈij junam rucˈ ri Areˈ .

text: Even us , whom he hath called , not of the Jews only , but also of the Gentiles ?
text2: Ri Dios cˈut xujusiqˈuij , jujun chquixol ri winak aj Israel , jujun chic chquixol ri winak ri man e aj Israel taj .

text: As he saith also in Osee , I will call them my people , which were not my people ; and her beloved , which was not beloved .
text2: Jeˈ jas ri cubij chupam ri wuj ri xutzˈibaj ri Oseas , jun kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios : Ri winak ri man aj nu tinimit taj , quinbij na “ nu tinimit ” chque . Ri winak ri nabe man lokˈ taj xeinwil wi , quinbij na chque : “ ¡ Ix riˈ ix nu lokˈ ! ”

text: And it shall come to pass , that in the place where it was said unto them , Ye are not my people ; there shall they be called the children of the living God .
text2: ― quincha na . Jawijeˈ ri xubij wi chque : “ Ri ix man ix nu tinimit taj ” , chilaˈ cäbix wi na chque chi e ralcˈual ri cˈaslic Dios ,

text: Esaias also crieth concerning Israel , Though the number of the children of Israel be as the sand of the sea , a remnant shall be saved :
text2: ― cächa na chque . Ri Isaías cˈut ri kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios xchˈaw chquij ri winak aj Israel , xubij : “ Pune ta ne ri qui qˈuial ri winak aj Israel are junam rucˈ ru qˈuial ri senyäb ri cˈo chiˈ ri mar , xak cˈu e quieb oxib chque ri cäquirik na ru tobanic ri Dios .

text: For he will finish the work , and cut it short in righteousness : because a short work will the Lord make upon the earth .
text2: Je riˈ , rumal chi ri Dios cuban na chanim jas ri xubij , cuban cˈu na waˈ pa qui wiˈ conojel ri winak ri e cˈo cho ruwächulew , ” ― xchaˈ .

text: And as Esaias said before , Except the Lord of Sabaoth had left us a seed , we had been as Sodoma , and been made like unto Gomorrha .
text2: Jeˈ jas ri u bim canok ri ka mam Isaías ojer : We ta ri Nimalaj ka Dios ri cˈo u takanic puwiˈ ronojel mat xujutoˈ rech e cˈo can kalcˈual , xsach ta ka wäch riˈ jas ri tinimit Sodoma , uj junam ta riˈ rucˈ ri tinimit Gomorra ,

text: What shall we say then ? That the Gentiles , which followed not after righteousness , have attained to righteousness , even the righteousness which is of faith .
text2: ― xchaˈ . ¿ Jas cˈu ri cäkabij chrij waˈ ? Cäkabij chi ri winak ri man e aj Israel taj , ri man xquitzucuj taj chi xjicomataj ri canimaˈ cho ri Dios , e areˈ xjicomataj ri canimaˈ cho ri Dios rumal ri cojonic .

text: But Israel , which followed after the law of righteousness , hath not attained to the law of righteousness .
text2: Are cˈu ri winak aj Israel ri xcuˈbi qui cˈux chrij jun pixab rech rumal ri pixab riˈ cäjicomataj ri canimaˈ cho ri Dios , man e cowininak tä cˈut chubanic ri cubij ri pixab .

text: Wherefore ? Because they sought it not by faith , but as it were by the works of the law . For they stumbled at that stumblingstone ;
text2: ¿ Jas che ? Rumal chi ri e areˈ man xecojon taj . Xane xquichomaj chi rumal ru banic ri cubij ri Pixab cäjicomataj ri canimaˈ cho ri Dios . Rumal riˈ xa xetzak puwiˈ ri “ abaj ri cäquichakˈij quib ri winak chrij . ”

text: As it is written , Behold , I lay in Sion a stumblingstone and rock of offence : and whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed .
text2: Are cˈu waˈ ri abaj ri cubij ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic : Ri in quinya na pa ri nu tinimit Sión Jun ri jeˈ jas jun abaj ri cäquichakˈij quib ri winak chrij , jun nimalaj abaj waˈ ri xa quetzak rumal , ― cächaˈ . Jachin ri cäcojon che ri Areˈ man cäkˈoxow tä na ri ranimaˈ ,

text: I say then , Hath God cast away his people ? God forbid . For I also am an Israelite , of the seed of Abraham , of the tribe of Benjamin .
text2: Quinbij chi cˈu che we chanim : Ri Dios cˈut , ¿ a xa retzelam qui wäch ri winak rech ru tinimit Israel ? ¡ Man jeˈ taj ! Ri in cˈut , in aj Israel . Are nu mam ri Abraham . In riˈ , in re ri rachalaxic ri ka mam Benjamín ojer .

text: God hath not cast away his people which he foreknew . Wot ye not what the scripture saith of Elias ? how he maketh intercession to God against Israel , saying ,
text2: Ri Dios tzojer lok xequichaˈ ri winak rech ru tinimit Israel , man retzelam tä cˈu qui wäch waˈ cämic . ¿ A mat cänaˈtaj chiwe jas cubij ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic chrij ri ka mam Elías ? Ri areˈ aretak xuban orar , xchˈaw chquij ri winak aj Israel , xubij :

text: Lord , they have killed thy prophets , and digged down thine altars ; and I am left alone , and they seek my life .
text2: “ Kajaw Dios , qui cämisam ri kˈalajisal tak re ri Lokˈ Pixab la , qui wulim cˈu tak ri taˈbal tokˈob ri cäkˈijilax wi la . Xuwi ri in chic in canajinak canok , are cˈu cäcaj quinquicämisaj in xukujeˈ , ” ― xchaˈ .

text: But what saith the answer of God unto him ? I have reserved to myself seven thousand men , who have not bowed the knee to the image of Baal .
text2: Ri Dios cˈut xubij che : “ E nu tasom can wukub mil achijab ri man xexuqui tä chuwäch ri tiox Baal , ” ― xcha ri Dios .

text: Even so then at this present time also there is a remnant according to the election of grace .
text2: Je cˈu waˈ ri cämic , e canajinak can quieb oxib chque ri aj Israel ri xeuchaˈ can ri Dios rumal ri u tokˈob pa qui wiˈ .

text: And if by grace , then is it no more of works : otherwise grace is no more grace . But if it be of works , then is it no more grace : otherwise work is no more work .
text2: We xa rumal ru tokˈob ri Dios xechaˈtajic , man are tä rumal ri cäcowinic ri winak chubanic . We ta rumal ri cäcowin jun chubanic , ru tokˈob ri Dios man tokˈob tä cˈu riˈ .

text: What then ? Israel hath not obtained that which he seeketh for ; but the election hath obtained it , and the rest were blinded
text2: ¿ Jas cˈut ? Ri xquitzucuj ri winak aj Israel , man xquirik taj . Are xerikow ri winak ri xechaˈ rumal ri Dios . Are cˈu ri niqˈuiaj winak chic xa xcowirisax ri canimaˈ .

text: ( According as it is written , God hath given them the spirit of slumber , eyes that they should not see , and ears that they should not hear ; ) unto this day .
text2: Jas ri cubij ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic : “ Ri Dios xuban chque chi man cäquinaˈ tä chic . Pune cˈo qui xiquin , xuban chque chi man cäquita taj . Pune cˈo qui wakˈäch , xuban chque chi man quecaˈy taj . Je cˈu waˈ caˈnom pa tak we kˈij cämic , ” ― cächaˈ .

text: And David saith , Let their table be made a snare , and a trap , and a stumbling block , and a recompence unto them :
text2: Ri ka mam David ojer xukujeˈ xubij : Ri nimak tak wiˈm ri cäcaˈno chuban ta na chque chi areˈ chapäbal , chi areˈ xukujeˈ cˈambal , rech cäquichakˈij quib , quetzakic , cäcˈäjisax cˈu qui wäch ,

text: Let their eyes be darkened , that they may not see , and bow down their back alway .
text2: ― cächaˈ . Chemoyir ta na ri e areˈ rech man quecaˈy tä chic , xukujeˈ chumej ta rib ri quij , mat chjicomataj chic ,

text: I say then , Have they stumbled that they should fall ? God forbid : but rather through their fall salvation is come unto the Gentiles , for to provoke them to jealousy .
text2: ― cächaˈ . Quinbij cˈut : ¿ A tzij lo chi ri winak aj Israel aretak xquichakˈij quib , xetzakic , man xewalij tä chic ? ¿ A xa xetzak canok ? ¡ Man jeˈ taj ! Xane aretak ri winak aj Israel man xeniman taj , ri niqˈuiaj winak chic , ri man e aj Israel taj , xquirik ru tobanic ri Dios , rech ri winak aj Israel cäquicoj ta qui chukˈab chubanic que jas ri xcaˈn ri niqˈuiaj winak chic .

text: Now if the fall of them be the riches of the world , and the diminishing of them the riches of the Gentiles ; how much more their fulness ?
text2: Rumal cˈu ri qui mac ri winak aj Israel ri winak cho ruwächulew xquirik nimalaj utzil . Rumal ri qui tzakic ri e areˈ xquirik utzil ri winak ri man e aj Israel taj . E ta cˈu lo aretak quetzelej chi lok jumul ri winak aj Israel , ¿ a mat sibalaj nim na ri utzil ri cäriktajic ? ¡ Jeˈ , je riˈ !

text: For I speak to you Gentiles , inasmuch as I am the apostle of the Gentiles , I magnify mine office :
text2: Cˈo cˈu ri cwaj quinbij chiwe ix ri man ix aj Israel taj . Rumal chi in apóstol ri takom bi rumal ri Dios cucˈ ri winak ri man e aj Israel taj , nim na quinwil wi ri nu chac .

text: If by any means I may provoke to emulation them which are my flesh , and might save some of them .
text2: Cwaj chi jujun chque ri nu winak in , ri e aj Israel , chquirayij ta u banic que jas ri i banom ix , rech cäquirik ru tobanic ri Dios .

text: For if the casting away of them be the reconciling of the world , what shall the receiving of them be , but life from the dead ?
text2: We cˈu aretak xetzelax qui wäch ri winak aj Israel rumal ri Dios , xcˈoji utzil chquixol ri niqˈuiaj winak chic rucˈ ri Dios , ¿ jas ri cäcˈulmataj na aretak ri winak aj Israel quecˈamowax chi na jumul rumal ri Dios ? Are jeˈ ta ne jun cäminak waˈ cäcˈastaj chquixol ri cäminakib .

text: For if the firstfruit be holy , the lump is also holy : and if the root be holy , so are the branches .
text2: We ri nabe caxlan wa ri cäban che ri kˈor are jachom cho ri Dios , ronojel ri kˈor jachom riˈ che ri Dios . We ru xeraˈ ri cheˈ jachom che ri Dios , xukujeˈ ru kˈab tak ri cheˈ e jachom riˈ che ri Dios .

text: And if some of the branches be broken off , and thou , being a wild olive tree , wert graffed in among them , and with them partakest of the root and fatness of the olive tree ;
text2: Jujun cˈu chque ri winak aj Israel e areˈ jeˈ ta ne ri kas u kˈab ru cheˈal olivo . Pune je riˈ , xeesax cˈu apanok . Ri at cˈut , at jeˈ jas ru kˈab ru cheˈal olivo re juyub , xatcoj cˈu che qui qˈuexwäch ri xeesaxic . Catcˈasi cˈu na rumal ru xeraˈ ri kas cheˈ , xukujeˈ rumal ru raxal .

text: Boast not against the branches . But if thou boast , thou bearest not the root , but the root thee .
text2: Machomaj cˈut chi nim na a banic at chquiwäch ri kas u kˈab ri cheˈ . We cachomaj chi nim na a banic , chnaˈtaj chawe chi man at taj ri tokˈaninak ru xeraˈ ri cheˈ , xane ru xeraˈ ri cheˈ are at tokˈaninak at .

text: Thou wilt say then , The branches were broken off , that I might be graffed in .
text2: Craj ne cabij : “ Xeesax cˈu apan ru kˈab ri cheˈ rech quinnacˈ cok in che ru cheˈal olivo , ” ― catchaˈ .

text: Well ; because of unbelief they were broken off , and thou standest by faith . Be not highminded , but fear :
text2: Kas tzij , xa cˈu rumal chi man xecojon taj xeesax apanok , are cˈu ri at xa rumal chi xatcojonic xatnacˈ cok . Manimarisaj baˈ awib , xane xa chaxej awib cho ri Dios .

text: For if God spared not the natural branches , take heed lest he also spare not thee .
text2: We ri Dios man xusach tä qui mac ri winak aj Israel ri jeˈ ta ne e kas u kˈab ri cheˈ , ri at xukujeˈ man cäsach tä na a mac riˈ .

text: Behold therefore the goodness and severity of God : on them which fell , severity ; but toward thee , goodness , if thou continue in his goodness : otherwise thou also shalt be cut off .
text2: Chawila baˈ chi ri Dios sibalaj utz na , xukujeˈ cˈut sibalaj cˈaˈn . Are cˈaˈn chque ri winak ri xetzakic , utz cˈu chawe at . Rajwaxic cˈut chi ri at catakej ri rutzil ranimaˈ , rech mäjiˈ ri at xukujeˈ catresaj na apanok .

text: And they also , if they abide not still in unbelief , shall be graffed in : for God is able to graff them in again .
text2: Ri winak aj Israel cˈut , we quecojon na ri e areˈ , quetzelej na rucˈ ri Dios , quenacˈ chi na cok jumul chic che ri cheˈ rumal chi ri Dios cäcowinic queunacˈ chi na cok jumul chic .

text: For if thou wert cut out of the olive tree which is wild by nature , and wert graffed contrary to nature into a good olive tree : how much more shall these , which be the natural branches , be graffed into their own olive tree ?
text2: Ri at cˈut ri man at aj Israel taj , xa at jeˈ ta ne u kˈab olivo re juyub xatesax cˈu apanok . Te cˈu riˈ xatnacˈ che ru cheˈal ri kas olivo ri man are tä a cheˈal at . We je riˈ ri winak aj Israel ri jeˈ ta ne e u kˈab ri kas olivo , man cˈäx taj quenacˈ cok che ri kas qui cheˈal jumul chic .

text: For I would not , brethren , that ye should be ignorant of this mystery , lest ye should be wise in your own conceits ; that blindness in part is happened to Israel , until the fulness of the Gentiles be come in .
text2: Kachalal , cwaj in chi quiwetamaj ru chomam lok ri Dios ojer ri man esam tä chi sak , rech man quichomaj taj chi ri ix nim na i banic . Are waˈ : Ri winak aj Israel xcowir jubikˈ ri canimaˈ . Ri Dios cˈut jeˈ xuban waˈ chque rech cäqˈuis na coquic conojel ri niqˈuiaj winak chic ri man e aj Israel taj ru chomam lok ri Areˈ ojer .

text: And so all Israel shall be saved : as it is written , There shall come out of Sion the Deliverer , and shall turn away ungodliness from Jacob :
text2: Aretak cäbantaj waˈ , conojel ri winak aj Israel cäquirik na ru tobanic ri Dios . Cubij cˈu ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic : Pa ri tinimit Sión quel wi na lok ri Torol Que ri winak , cäresaj cˈu na ri etzelal chquij ri ralcˈual can ri ka mam Jacob ,

text: For this is my covenant unto them , when I shall take away their sins .
text2: ― cächaˈ . Are waˈ ri trato ri quinban na cucˈ , aretak ri in quinwesaj ri qui mac ,

text: As concerning the gospel , they are enemies for your sakes : but as touching the election , they are beloved for the fathers ' sakes .
text2: ― xchaˈ . Ri winak aj Israel , rumal chi man xecojon tä che ri Utzalaj Tzij re ri Evangelio , ri Dios xuban u cˈulel chque . Je riˈ xyaˈtaj chiwe ix chi quixcojonic . Ri Dios cˈut queraj na ri winak aj Israel rumal chi xeuchaˈ ri qui mam ojer .

text: For the gifts and calling of God are without repentance .
text2: Je riˈ , rumal chi ri Dios man cäresaj tä chic ri cusipaj . Aretak cusiqˈuij jun winak , man cuqˈuex tä ru chomanic chrij .

text: For as ye in times past have not believed God , yet have now obtained mercy through their unbelief :
text2: Ri ix nabe canok man xixniman tä che ri Dios . Cämic riˈ rumal chi man xeniman tä ri winak aj Israel , ri Dios xutokˈobisaj i wäch ix .

text: Even so have these also now not believed , that through your mercy they also may obtain mercy .
text2: Jeˈ xukujeˈ cämic ri winak aj Israel man e nimaninak taj , xak cˈu rech ri Dios cutokˈobisaj qui wäch jas ri xuban chiwe ix , ri ix man aj Israel taj .

text: For God hath concluded them all in unbelief , that he might have mercy upon all .
text2: Ri Dios cˈut junam xuban chque conojel winak chi man queniman taj , rech xukujeˈ junam cutokˈobisaj qui wäch nimalaj conojel .

text: O the depth of the riches both of the wisdom and knowledge of God ! how unsearchable are his judgments , and his ways past finding out !
text2: ¡ Sibalaj cajmabal waˈ ru bantajic ri ka Dios ! ¡ Sibalaj nim na ru noˈj , ri retambal ! Man cujcowin tä chuchˈobic ru chomanic , man cujcowin tä che retamaxic ri cuchomaj u banic .

text: For who hath known the mind of the Lord ? or who hath been his counseller ?
text2: Jeˈ jas ri cubij ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Tzˈibtalic : “ ¿ Jachin u chˈobom ru chomanic ri Dios ? ¿ Jachin lo ri yaˈtal che chi cuya ru noˈj ri Areˈ ? ¡ Man cˈo tä jun !

text: Or who hath first given to him , and it shall be recompensed unto him again ?
text2: ¿ Jachin ri cˈo jas xuya che ri Dios rech cäyiˈ rajil u qˈuexel che ? ¡ Man cˈo tä jun ! ” ― cächa ri Tzˈibtalic .

text: For of him , and through him , and to him , are all things : to whom be glory for ever . Amen .
text2: Ronojel cˈut ri cˈolic cäpe rucˈ ri Dios . Ri Areˈ cˈut xebanow conojel rech cˈo cupatänij che . ¡ Chnimarisax ta baˈ u kˈij ri Dios amakˈel pa tak ri kˈij ri junab ri quepetic ! Amén .

text: I beseech you therefore , brethren , by the mercies of God , that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice , holy , acceptable unto God , which is your reasonable service .
text2: Je cˈu riˈ , kachalal , rumal chi ri Dios sibalaj quel u cˈux chke , quixinbochiˈj chi quijach iwib che ri Dios , jeˈ jas jun sipanic ri cˈaslic , ri jachom cho ri Dios , ri utz cäril wi ri Areˈ . We sipanic riˈ are waˈ ri kas kˈijilanic ri rajwaxic quiban cho ri Dios .

text: And be not conformed to this world : but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind , that ye may prove what is that good , and acceptable , and perfect , will of God .
text2: Miban chi iwe ix jas ri cäcaˈn ri winak cho ruwächulew . Xane chiqˈuexa ri i chomabal rech cuban cˈacˈ ri i cˈaslemal . Je riˈ kas quiwetamaj na jas ru rayibal ri Dios . Are cˈu waˈ ri kas utz , ri cäkaj chuwäch , xukujeˈ ri jicom cho ri Dios .

text: For I say , through the grace given unto me , to every man that is among you , not to think of himself more highly than he ought to think ; but to think soberly , according as God hath dealt to every man the measure of faith .
text2: Rumal ri xsipax chwe rumal ri Dios aretak xutokˈobisaj nu wäch , cˈo ri quinbij chiwe ix iwonojel : Cˈo jun chiwe muchomaj chi nim u banic , xane rajwaxic quichomaj iwib chnojimal jas u beyal ri cojonic ri xuya ri Dios chiwe chijujunal .

text: For as we have many members in one body , and all members have not the same office :
text2: Ri ka cuerpo e qˈuia ru tzˈakatil cˈolic , man conojel tä cˈut xa junam u wäch ri qui chac .

text: So we , being many , are one body in Christ , and every one members one of another .
text2: Je cˈu riˈ ri uj xukujeˈ . Pune uj qˈuia , xa uj jun cuerpo rumal ri Cristo . Konojel ka nucˈum kib jeˈ jas ru tzˈakatil ri ka cuerpo .

text: Having then gifts differing according to the grace that is given to us , whether prophecy , let us prophesy according to the proportion of faith ;
text2: Ri Dios u yoˈm jalajoj tak cuinem chke , xa jas ri xraj ri Areˈ xuya chke . Rajwaxic baˈ utz qui cojic tak we cuinem riˈ cäkaˈno . We yoˈm chke chi cäcowinic cäkakˈalajisaj tzij ri cuya ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu , kaˈna waˈ rucˈ ri ka cojonic ri cˈolic .

text: Or ministry , let us wait on our ministering : or he that teacheth , on teaching ;
text2: We yoˈm chke chi cupatänin chque niqˈuiaj winak chic , utz kaˈna che qui patänixic . We yoˈm che jun chi cäcowinic queutijoj niqˈuiaj chic , chutzaka u kˈij chubanic waˈ .

text: Or he that exhorteth , on exhortation : he that giveth , let him do it with simplicity ; he that ruleth , with diligence ; he that sheweth mercy , with cheerfulness .
text2: We yoˈm che jun chi cäcowinic cuwalijisaj canimaˈ niqˈuiaj chic , chutzak u kˈij chubanic waˈ . We yoˈm che jun chi cäsipanic , muya xa rumal chi cˈo ri craj . We yoˈm che jun chi cucˈam qui be niqˈuiaj chic , chunaˈ na jas ri cubano . We cˈu yoˈm che jun chi queutoˈ ri cˈo qui rajwaxic , chubana waˈ rucˈ quicotemal .

text: Let love be without dissimulation . Abhor that which is evil ; cleave to that which is good .
text2: Kas chiwaj iwib ri jun rucˈ ri jun chic , man cuban tä cˈu quieb i cˈux . Chiwetzelaj u wäch ri man utz taj , chitakej cˈu u banic ri utz .

text: Be kindly affectioned one to another with brotherly love ; in honour preferring one another ;
text2: Rajwaxic chi quiwaj iwib ri jun rucˈ ri jun chic jeˈ ta ne chi kas iwachalal iwib . Chiya i kˈij chbil tak iwib , nim cˈut chiwila wi iwib , ri jun rucˈ ri jun chic .

text: Not slothful in business ; fervent in spirit ; serving the Lord ;
text2: Chicojo i chukˈab pa ronojel , xak mixsakˈorinic . Chipatänij ri Kajaw Jesús rucˈ nimalaj quicotemal .

text: Rejoicing in hope ; patient in tribulation ; continuing instant in prayer ;
text2: Chixquicot chrij ri cuˈl wi i cˈux . Chichajij paciencia pa tak ri cˈäx ri quiriko . Chibana orar amakˈel ronojel kˈij .

text: Distributing to the necessity of saints ; given to hospitality .
text2: Cheitoˈ ri kachalal cojonelab pa tak ri qui rajwaxic . Utz chibana che qui cˈulaxic ri queopan iwucˈ .

text: Bless them which persecute you : bless , and curse not .
text2: Chibochiˈj ri Dios pa qui wiˈ ri queyokˈon chiwe . Chitaˈ tokˈob pa qui wiˈ , mitaˈ cˈu pa qui wiˈ chi xa cˈäx cäquiriko .

text: Rejoice with them that do rejoice , and weep with them that weep .
text2: Chixquicot cucˈ ri quequicotic . Chixokˈ cˈut cucˈ ri quebokˈic .

text: Be of the same mind one toward another . Mind not high things , but condescend to men of low estate . Be not wise in your own conceits .
text2: Chixoc il chbil tak iwib ri jun che ri jun chic . Miban i nimal , xane chiwachilaj iwib cucˈ ri man nimak tä qui banic . Michomaj chi cˈo na iwetambal ix chquiwäch niqˈuiaj chic .

text: Recompense to no man evil for evil . Provide things honest in the sight of all men .
text2: Miya rajil u qˈuexel ri cˈäx ri cäban chiwe . Chicojo i chukˈab chubanic ri utz chquiwäch conojel ri winak .

text: If it be possible , as much as lieth in you , live peaceably with all men .
text2: Chibana ronojel ri quixcowin chubanic rech cäcˈoji utzil chixol cucˈ conojel ri winak .

text: Dearly beloved , avenge not yourselves , but rather give place unto wrath : for it is written , Vengeance is mine ; I will repay , saith the Lord .
text2: Lokˈalaj tak kachalal , miyac iwib ix chquij ri i cˈulel , xane chiya can che ri Dios chi cucˈäjisaj qui wäch . Cubij yaˈ ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic : “ In quincˈäjisan na qui wäch , quintoj na rajil u qˈuexel ri cˈäx ri cäban chiwe , ” ― cächa ri Kajaw Dios .

text: Therefore if thine enemy hunger , feed him ; if he thirst , give him drink : for in so doing thou shalt heap coals of fire on his head .
text2: Xukujeˈ cubij : “ We cänum ri a cˈulel , chaya u wa . We cächakiˈj u chiˈ , chaya baˈ ri cutijo . We jeˈ caban waˈ , ri a cˈulel sibalaj cäqˈuix na chawäch , cunaˈ cˈut chi cˈäx ri xuban chawe , ” ― cächaˈ .

text: Be not overcome of evil , but overcome evil with good .
text2: Maya che ri etzelal chi cächˈacan pa wiˈ , xane are chatchˈacan at puwiˈ ri etzelal rumal ri utzil ri cabano .

text: Him that is weak in the faith receive ye , but not to doubtful disputations .
text2: We cˈo jun kachalal ri mäjaˈ cˈo u chukˈab ru cojonic , chicˈulaj . Xak cˈu mixchˈojin rucˈ we man junam ri u chomanic iwucˈ .

text: For one believeth that he may eat all things : another , who is weak , eateth herbs .
text2: Quinbij jun cˈutbal : Kabij na chi e cˈo jujun kachalal ri cäquichomaj chi ronojel cuyaˈ cätijic , e cˈo cˈu jujun chic ri mäjaˈ cˈo u chukˈab ri qui cojonic , ri xa ichaj cäquitijo .

text: Let not him that eateth despise him that eateth not ; and let not him which eateth not judge him that eateth : for God hath received him .
text2: Ri jun ri ronojel u wäch cutijo , tzel baˈ märil wi ri jun chic ri xak kˈalaj u wäch cutijo . Ri jun ri xak kˈalaj u wäch cutijo , mukˈat tzij puwiˈ ri jun ri ronojel u wäch cutijo . Je riˈ , rumal chi ri Dios u cˈamowam waˈ we winak riˈ .

text: Who art thou that judgest another man ' s servant ? to his own master he standeth or falleth . Yea , he shall be holden up : for God is able to make him stand .
text2: ¿ Jachin lo ri at chi ri at cakˈat tzij puwiˈ ri patänil re jun winak chic ? We utz quel na ri cubano o man utz taj are ru patrón riˈ quilowic . Utz cˈu quel na ru chac rumal chi ri Dios cäcowinic cubano chi utz quelic .

text: One man esteemeth one day above another : another esteemeth every day alike . Let every man be fully persuaded in his own mind .
text2: Jun cˈutbal chic : E cˈo jujun kachalal ri nim cäquil wi jun kˈij chuwäch ri jun chic . E cˈo cˈu jujun kachalal ri xak e junam tak ri kˈij chquiwäch . Chkajujunal cˈut rajwaxic ketam jas ri kas ka chomanic .

text: He that regardeth the day , regardeth it unto the Lord ; and he that regardeth not the day , to the Lord he doth not regard it . He that eateth , eateth to the Lord , for he giveth God thanks ; and he that eateth not , to the Lord he eateth not , and giveth God thanks .
text2: Ri jun ri nim cäril wi jun kˈij , jeˈ cuban waˈ chuyaˈic u kˈij ri Kajaw Dios . Ri jun ri man nim tä cäril wi ri jun kˈij , xukujeˈ cuban waˈ chuyaˈic u kˈij ri Kajaw Dios . Ri jun ri ronojel u wäch cutijo , cutij riˈ chuyaˈic u kˈij ri Kajaw Dios rumal chi cumaltioxij waˈ che ri Dios . Ri jun ri xak kˈalaj u wäch cutijo , cuban riˈ chuyaˈic u kˈij ri Kajaw Dios , xukujeˈ cämaltioxin riˈ che ri Dios .

text: For none of us liveth to himself , and no man dieth to himself .
text2: Man cˈo tä jun chke ri cˈasal xak chi je riˈ , man cˈo tä cˈu jun chke ri cäcäm xak chi je riˈ .

text: For whether we live , we live unto the Lord ; and whether we die , we die unto the Lord : whether we live therefore , or die , we are the Lord ' s .
text2: We cujcˈasiˈc , cujcˈasi riˈ chupatänixic ri Kajaw Jesús , we cˈu cujcämic cˈo u patän waˈ cho ri Kajaw Jesús . Je riˈ , we cujcˈasiˈc o we cujcämic , uj rech ri Kajaw Jesús .

text: For to this end Christ both died , and rose , and revived , that he might be Lord both of the dead and living .
text2: Rumal cˈu riˈ ri Cristo xcämic , xcˈastaj cˈu chquixol ri cäminakib rech coc che Cajaw ri e cˈaslic xukujeˈ ri e cäminak chic .

text: But why dost thou judge thy brother ? or why dost thou set at nought thy brother ? for we shall all stand before the judgment seat of Christ .
text2: Ri at cˈut , ¿ jachin lo ri at chi ri at cakˈat tzij puwiˈ ri awachalal ? ¿ Jas che tzel cawil wi ? ¡ Konojel cˈut cujetacˈal na chuwäch ri Cristo rech cukˈat tzij pa ka wiˈ !

text: For it is written , As I live , saith the Lord , every knee shall bow to me , and every tongue shall confess to God .
text2: Cubij cˈu ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic : Cubij ri Kajwal Dios : Jeˈ jas ri in kas tzij chi in cˈasal in , jeˈ xukujeˈ are kas tzij chi conojel ri winak quexuqui na chnuwäch . Conojel cˈut cäquiya nu kˈij , cäquibij chquiwäch conojel chi xuwi ri in , in Dios ,

text: So then every one of us shall give account of himself to God .
text2: ― cächa na ri Kajaw Dios . Je cˈu riˈ konojel ri uj chkajujunal cäkabij na cho ri Dios jas ri kaˈnom .

text: Let us not therefore judge one another any more : but judge this rather , that no man put a stumblingblock or an occasion to fall in his brother ' s way .
text2: Rumal riˈ , mäkakˈat baˈ tzij chbil tak kib ri jun rucˈ ri jun chic . Xane chicojo i chukˈab rech man cˈo tä jas cˈo pa ri i cˈaslemal ri cubano chi cätzak ri iwachalal o cakaj ne pa mac .

text: I know , and am persuaded by the Lord Jesus , that there is nothing unclean of itself : but to him that esteemeth any thing to be unclean , to him it is unclean .
text2: Ri in wetam , rumal chi in cojoninak che ri Kajaw Jesús , chi man cˈo tä jun jasach ri äwas pa re wi . We cˈu cˈo jun cuchomaj chi äwas jun jasach , che ri are riˈ tzäwas wi .

text: But if thy brother be grieved with thy meat , now walkest thou not charitably . Destroy not him with thy meat , for whom Christ died .
text2: We cˈu rumal ri catijo cuban cˈäx ri ranimaˈ ri awachalal , man lokˈ tä cawil riˈ ri awachalal . Maban baˈ chi jun winak chic cäkaj pa mac xa rumal chi ri at cˈo jas cawaj catijo . Musach chawe chi rumal rech ri areˈ xukujeˈ xcäm ri Cristo .

text: Let not then your good be evil spoken of :
text2: Cˈo baˈ jas mibano ri cuya chque ri winak chi cäquibij ri man utz taj chrij ri utzil ri tajin quibano .

text: For the kingdom of God is not meat and drink ; but righteousness , and peace , and joy in the Holy Ghost .
text2: Je riˈ , rumal chi pa ru takanic ri Dios man are tä nim u banic riˈ ri cutij jun , xane are ru banic ri jicomal pa ri ka cˈaslemal , chi cuxlan kanimaˈ , chi cujquicot cˈu rumal ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu .

text: For he that in these things serveth Christ is acceptable to God , and approved of men .
text2: Jachin ri jeˈ cuban waˈ chupatänixic ri Cristo , cäkaj riˈ chuwäch ri Dios xukujeˈ utz quil wi cumal ri winak .

text: Let us therefore follow after the things which make for peace , and things wherewith one may edify another .
text2: Katakej baˈ u banic ronojel ri cubano chi cuxlan ri kanimaˈ . Je riˈ cujcowinic cäkatoˈla kib ri jun rucˈ ri jun chic rech cˈo u chukˈab ri ka cojonic .

text: For meat destroy not the work of God . All things indeed are pure ; but it is evil for that man who eateth with offence .
text2: Mäsach u wäch ru banom ri Dios pa ranimaˈ jun kachalal xa rumal ri catijo . Kas tzij ronojel ri cˈolic yaˈtal u tijic , are cˈu man utz taj aretak cˈo jas cutij jun ri cubano chi niqˈuiaj chic quekaj pa mac .

text: It is good neither to eat flesh , nor to drink wine , nor any thing whereby thy brother stumbleth , or is offended , or is made weak .
text2: Are utz na riˈ man catij tä tiˈj , man catij tä vino , man cˈo tä cˈu jas cabano ri cubano chi cätzak ri awachalal o cäkaj pa mac . Cˈo baˈ jas mabano ri cubano chi man cˈo tä chi u chukˈab ru cojonic ri awachalal .

text: Hast thou faith ? have it to thyself before God . Happy is he that condemneth not himself in that thing which he alloweth .
text2: We cacojo chi utz ri tajin caban cho ri Dios , at wi riˈ . Utz re ri winak ri utz cäril wi ri tajin cubano , we man cunaˈ tä cˈäx pa ranimaˈ .

text: And he that doubteth is damned if he eat , because he eateth not of faith : for whatsoever is not of faith is sin .
text2: Jachin cˈu ri xak cuban quieb u cˈux che ri cutijo , we äwas o man äwas taj ru tijic , cämacun riˈ aretak cutijo . Ronojel cˈu ri cuban jun , we cuban quieb u cˈux che , are mac riˈ .

text: We then that are strong ought to bear the infirmities of the weak , and not to please ourselves .
text2: Ri uj , ri cˈo chi u chukˈab ri ka cojonic , rajwaxic cäkachajij paciencia cucˈ ri kachalal ri mäjaˈ cˈo u chukˈab ri qui cojonic , quekatoˈ cˈut . Man are tä cäkatzucuj xuwi ri utz cäkil wi uj .

text: Let every one of us please his neighbour for his good to edification .
text2: Xane chkajujunal rajwaxic cäkaˈn ri cäkaj chquiwäch ri kachalal pa ronojel ri cuban utzil chque . Je riˈ cäkaˈno jachique ri cuya u chukˈab ri qui cojonic .

text: For even Christ pleased not himself ; but , as it is written , The reproaches of them that reproached thee fell on me .
text2: Are cˈu ri Cristo man are tä xutzucuj ri utz cäril wi ri Areˈ . Xane jeˈ xucˈulmaj jas ri cubij ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic : “ Ri qui yokˈonic ri winak ri queyokˈon che la , pa nu wiˈ in xkaj wi , ” ― cächaˈ .

text: For whatsoever things were written aforetime were written for our learning , that we through patience and comfort of the scriptures might have hope .
text2: Ronojel ri xtzˈibax can ojer pa ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic xtzˈibax canok che ka tijoxic rech cäcuˈbi ka cˈux chrij ri Dios rumal ri paciencia , xukujeˈ rumal ri cuˈlbal ka cˈux ri cucˈut ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios chkawäch .

text: Now the God of patience and consolation grant you to be likeminded one toward another according to Christ Jesus :
text2: Ri Dios cˈut ri cuya ka chukˈab rech cäkachˈij ri cˈäx , cucuˈbisaj cˈu ka cˈux , are ta quixtoˈw ix iwonojel rech quinaˈ pa iwanimaˈ chi xa ix jun chic jas ri xucˈut can ri Cristo Jesús chkawäch .

text: That ye may with one mind and one mouth glorify God , even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Je riˈ rech iwonojel junam , jeˈ ta ne chi xa jun i chˈabal , quinimarisaj ta u kˈij ri Dios , ru Tat ri Kajaw Jesucristo .

text: Wherefore receive ye one another , as Christ also received us to the glory of God .
text2: Chicˈamowaj baˈ iwib , ri jun rucˈ ri jun chic chunimarisaxic u kˈij ri Dios , jeˈ jas ri xuban ri Cristo xujucˈamowaj uj .

text: Now I say that Jesus Christ was a minister of the circumcision for the truth of God , to confirm the promises made unto the fathers :
text2: Jeˈ quinbij chiwe rumal chi ri Cristo xpe che qui patänixic ri winak aj Israel , rech jeˈ quelic jas ri xubij can ri Dios chque ri ka mam ojer , xukujeˈ chucˈutic chi kas jicom ranimaˈ ri Dios chubanic ri cubij .

text: And that the Gentiles might glorify God for his mercy ; as it is written , For this cause I will confess to thee among the Gentiles , and sing unto thy name .
text2: Xukujeˈ ri Cristo xpetic rech ri niqˈuiaj winak chic ri man e aj Israel taj cäquiya u kˈij ri Dios rumal chi xel u cˈux chque . Jeˈ jas ri cubij cˈu ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic : Rumal riˈ quinnimarisaj na kˈij la chquixol ri niqˈuiaj winak ri man e aj Israel taj , xukujeˈ quinbixoj na bix chuyaˈic kˈij la ,

text: And again he saith , Rejoice , ye Gentiles , with his people .
text2: ― cächaˈ . Xukujeˈ cubij ri Tzˈibtalic pa jun u xak wuj chic : Ix riˈ ri xak ix winak ri man aj Israel taj , chixquicot na cucˈ ri winak ri e chaˈtal rumal ri Dios ,

text: And again , Praise the Lord , all ye Gentiles ; and laud him , all ye people .
text2: ― cächaˈ . Pa jun u xak wuj chic cubij : Ix riˈ , iwonojel ix ri xak ix winak , ri man aj Israel taj , chiya u kˈij ri Kajaw Dios . Nimalaj iwonojel cˈu ri ix , ix winak ajuwächulew , chiya u kˈij ri Dios ,

text: And again , Esaias saith , There shall be a root of Jesse , and he that shall rise to reign over the Gentiles ; in him shall the Gentiles trust .
text2: ― cächaˈ . Ri Isaías , ri kˈalajisal re ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios , xukujeˈ xubij : Cäwalij na jun chquixol ri rachalaxic can ri ka mam Isaí , ru tat ri ka mam David , ri coc na che takanel pa qui wiˈ conojel qui wäch winak . Conojel cˈut cäcuˈbi na qui cˈux chrij ri Areˈ ,

text: Now the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing , that ye may abound in hope , through the power of the Holy Ghost .
