text2: Je cˈu riˈ , pune man cˈo jun patrón ri cätakan pa nu wiˈ , nu cojom cˈu wib che qui patänixic conojel , rech e qˈuia ri queinchˈac na rech quecojon na che ri Cristo .

text: And unto the Jews I became as a Jew , that I might gain the Jews ; to them that are under the law , as under the law , that I might gain them that are under the law ;
text2: Quinban che wib chi in aj Israel aretak in cˈo chquixol ri winak aj Israel che qui chˈaquic ri e areˈ . Pune man in cˈo pu kˈab ri Pixab ri xutzˈibaj ri ka mam Moisés , quinban cˈut chi in cˈo pu kˈab rech queinchˈac ri e cˈo pu kˈab ri Pixab .

text: To them that are without law , as without law , ( being not without law to God , but under the law to Christ , ) that I might gain them that are without law .
text2: Xukujeˈ quinbano chi man in cˈo tä pu kˈab ru Pixab ri ka mam Moisés che qui chˈaquic ri winak ri man e cˈo tä pu kˈab we Pixab riˈ . Pune kas tzij in cˈo pu kˈab ru Pixab ri Dios , quinniman cˈu che ru Pixab ri Cristo .

text: To the weak became I as weak , that I might gain the weak : I am made all things to all men , that I might by all means save some .
text2: Aretak in cˈo chquixol ri man cˈo tä u chukˈab ri qui cojonic , quinban che wib chi man cˈo tä u chukˈab ri nu cojonic in che qui chˈaquic ri e areˈ xukujeˈ . Je riˈ quinbano chi in junam cucˈ chquijujunal ri winak , rech quincowinic quinbano chi jujun chque cäquirik ru tobanic ri Dios .

text: And this I do for the gospel ' s sake , that I might be partaker thereof with you .
text2: Ronojel waˈ quinbano rumal ru tzijoxic ri Utzalaj Tzij re ri Evangelio , rech quinrik we ri utzil ri cucˈam lok ri Utzalaj Tzij riˈ .

text: Know ye not that they which run in a race run all , but one receiveth the prize ? So run , that ye may obtain .
text2: Ri ix iwetam chi pa jun etzˈenem re ticow anim , conojel cäquitic anim , xa cˈu jun ri cächˈacanic , cucˈam ri tojbal . Chitica baˈ anim ix rech quixchˈacanic , quirik ri tojbal .

text: And every man that striveth for the mastery is temperate in all things . Now they do it to obtain a corruptible crown ; but we an incorruptible .
text2: Ronojel ajdeporte cäresaj ronojel ri cuya latzˈ che , man cuban tä cˈu xa jas ri craj ri areˈ . Ri e areˈ cˈut cäcaˈn waˈ chuchˈaquic jun tojbal ri xa jun corona ri banom rucˈ u xak cheˈ ri xa cäsach u wäch . Are cˈu ri uj cäkacoj ka chukˈab chuchˈaquic jun tojbal ri man cäsach tä u wäch .

text: I therefore so run , not as uncertainly ; so fight I , not as one that beateth the air :
text2: Je cˈu riˈ , ri in man in jeˈ taj jas jun ajdeporte ri xak quieb u cˈux cutic anim . Man in jeˈ taj jas jun ajdeporte ri man retam taj cächˈojinic , ri man maˈn tä ri u kˈab .

text: But I keep under my body , and bring it into subjection : lest that by any means , when I have preached to others , I myself should be a castaway .
text2: Xane quinya chi cäban cˈäx che ri nu cuerpo , quinchˈij cˈut . Xukujeˈ quintakan puwiˈ ri nu cuerpo rech ri in ri nu cˈamom qui be qˈuia winak , man cˈä te tä quilitajic chi man cˈo tä chi nu banic , quinesax cˈu apanok .

text: Moreover , brethren , I would not that ye should be ignorant , how that all our fathers were under the cloud , and all passed through the sea ;
text2: Kachalal , cwaj in chi cänaˈtaj chiwe chi conojel ri ka mam ojer xecˈoji pa ri u muˈjal ri sutzˈ ri xuya ri Dios , conojel cˈut xekˈax pa ri “ Quiäk Mar ” .

text: And were all baptized unto Moses in the cloud and in the sea ;
text2: Je riˈ conojel xban qui kasnaˈ pa ri sutzˈ xukujeˈ pa ri mar chucˈutic chi e jun chic rucˈ ri ka mam Moisés .

text: And did all eat the same spiritual meat ;
text2: Conojel junam xquitij que ri wa ri xyiˈ rumal ri Dios .

text: And did all drink the same spiritual drink : for they drank of that spiritual Rock that followed them : and that Rock was Christ .
text2: Xukujeˈ conojel xquitij que ri joron ri xuya ri Dios ri xel lok pa ri abaj ri xyiˈ pa ri qui be rumal ri Dios . Ri abaj riˈ are u qˈuexwäch ri Cristo ri xeachiˈlan pa ri qui binem .

text: But with many of them God was not well pleased : for they were overthrown in the wilderness .
text2: Pune je riˈ , e qˈuia chque ri winak riˈ ri man utz tä xeilitaj wi rumal ri Dios , rumal cˈu riˈ xecäm can pa ri juyub ri cätzˈinowic .

text: Now these things were our examples , to the intent we should not lust after evil things , as they also lusted .
text2: Ronojel waˈ xcˈulmatajic che jun cˈutbal chkawäch uj , rech man cäkarayij tä ri man utz taj jas ri xcaˈn ri e areˈ .

text: Neither be ye idolaters , as were some of them ; as it is written , The people sat down to eat and drink , and rose up to play .
text2: Rumal riˈ meikˈijilaj tak tiox jas ri xcaˈn jujun chque ri e areˈ , ri tzˈibtal pa ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri cubij : “ Xecuˈbi ri winak , xekaj che wiˈm . Aretak cˈut xetoˈtaj che ri wiˈm , xewalijic , xquichaplej cˈu u banic nimakˈij , ” ― cächaˈ .

text: Neither let us commit fornication , as some of them committed , and fell in one day three and twenty thousand .
text2: Mäkaˈn cˈu ke jas ri cäcaˈn ri tzˈiˈ ri xak cäquirik quib , man cˈo tä qui pixab . Je cˈu waˈ xcaˈn jujun chque ri e areˈ . Xa pa jun kˈij cˈut xecäm juwinak oxib mil winak .

text: Neither let us tempt Christ , as some of them also tempted , and were destroyed of serpents .
text2: Mäkayac ne royowal ri Dios jas ri xcaˈn jujun chque ri e areˈ , xecäm cˈut rumal chi xetiaˈ cumal ri cumätz .

text: Neither murmur ye , as some of them also murmured , and were destroyed of the destroyer .
text2: Mibij cˈäx tak tzij chrij ri Dios jas ri xcaˈn jujun chque ri e areˈ , xecämisax cˈu rumal ri ángel re ri cämical .

text: Now all these things happened unto them for ensamples : and they are written for our admonition , upon whom the ends of the world are come .
text2: Ronojel waˈ xquicˈulmaj ri ka mam ojer . Xtzˈibax cˈu can waˈ pa ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios che jun cˈutbal chkawäch che ka pixbexic uj ri uj cˈo cämic pa ri qˈuisbal tak kˈij .

text: Wherefore let him that thinketh he standeth take heed lest he fall .
text2: Rumal riˈ , jachin ri cunaˈ pa ranimaˈ chi kas utz u banom pa ru cˈaslemal , chrilaˈ baˈ chi mätzak pa ri mac .

text: There hath no temptation taken you but such as is common to man : but God is faithful , who will not suffer you to be tempted above that ye are able ; but will with the temptation also make a way to escape , that ye may be able to bear it .
text2: Ri cˈäxcˈol ri tajin quirik ix , xa junam waˈ rucˈ ri tajin cäquirik conojel . Cuyaˈ cˈut cäcuˈbi i cˈux chrij ri Dios chi ri Areˈ man cuya tä chiwe chi quirik na jun cˈäx ri mat quixcowin chuchˈijic . Xane aretak cäpe ri cˈäx chiwij , ri Dios quixutoˈ na rech quixel chupam . Xa je riˈ quixcowin chuchˈijic waˈ .

text: Wherefore , my dearly beloved , flee from idolatry .
text2: Rumal cˈu riˈ , lokˈalaj tak kachalal , chitasa iwib chrij ru kˈijilaxic tak tiox ri xa e banom cumal winak .

text: I speak as to wise men ; judge ye what I say .
text2: Quintzijon iwucˈ ix , ix winak cˈut ri cäquichˈobo . Ri ix quixcowinic quichomaj we utz o man utz taj ri tajin quinbij .

text: The cup of blessing which we bless , is it not the communion of the blood of Christ ? The bread which we break , is it not the communion of the body of Christ ?
text2: Aretak cäkatij ke ri cˈo chupam ri vaso ri tewchitalic ri cäkayabej maltioxinic che ri Dios , are jeˈ ta ne ru quiqˈuel ri Cristo ri junam ka wäch tajin cäkatijo . Aretak cäkapir ri caxlan wa , cäkatij cˈu ke , are jeˈ ta ne ru cuerpo ri Cristo ri junam ka wäch tajin cäkatijo .

text: For we being many are one bread , and one body : for we are all partakers of that one bread .
text2: Rumal chi xa jun u banic ri caxlan wa ri cˈolic , konojel ri uj , pune uj qˈuia , xa uj jun cuerpo rumal chi cäkatij ke ri jun u wäch caxlan wa .

text: Behold Israel after the flesh : are not they which eat of the sacrifices partakers of the alter ?
text2: Chichomajmpeˈ ri cäcaˈn ri winak aj Israel : Ri cäquitij que ri sipanic ri yoˈm cho ri Dios , conojel riˈ junam qui wäch cäquitij que ri sipanic ri yoˈm cho ri Dios .

text: What say I then ? that the idol is any thing , or that which is offered in sacrifice to idols is any thing ?
text2: Man quinbij tä chi ri tiox ri xa e banom cumal winak cˈo qui banic , o ri tiˈj ri cäyiˈ chquiwäch ri tiox cˈo ta na u banic chuwäch apachique u wäch tiˈj .

text: But I say , that the things which the Gentiles sacrifice , they sacrifice to devils , and not to God : and I would not that ye should have fellowship with devils .
text2: Ri quinbij are laˈ chi aretak ri winak ri man quetam tä u wäch ri Dios cäquiya ri qui sipanic chuwäch jun tiox , chquiwäch ri itzel tak espíritus cäquiya wi waˈ , man chuwäch tä cˈu ri Dios . Ri in cˈut man cwaj taj chi ri ix , ix jun cucˈ ri itzel tak espíritus .

text: Ye cannot drink the cup of the Lord , and the cup of devils : ye cannot be partakers of the Lord ' s table , and of the table of devils .
text2: Man cuyaˈ taj quitij iwe ri cˈo chupam ri vaso ri cuban xa jun chke rucˈ ri Kajaw Jesús , te cˈu riˈ quitij iwe ri cˈo chupam ri qui vaso ri itzel tak espíritus . Man cuyaˈ taj quitij iwe ri wa ri cuban xa jun chke rucˈ ri Kajaw Jesús , te cˈu riˈ quitij iwe ri qui wa ri itzel tak espíritus .

text: Do we provoke the Lord to jealousy ? are we stronger than he ?
text2: ¿ A are lo xa quiwaj quiyac royowal ri Kajaw Dios rumal ru kˈijilaxic jun tiox ? ¿ A cˈo lo i chukˈab ix chuwäch ri Areˈ ? ¡ Man cˈo taj !

text: All things are lawful for me , but all things are not expedient : all things are lawful for me , but all things edify not .
text2: Kas tzij ri cäbixic : “ Jachique ri cwaj quinbano , cuyaˈ quinbano , ” ― quecha ri winak . Man ronojel tä cˈut curik utzil rumal . Jun winak cuyaˈ cubano jachique ri craj , man ronojel tä cˈut cuya u chukˈab ri ka cojonic .

text: Let no man seek his own , but every man another ' s wealth .
text2: Rajwaxic are cäkatzucuj ri u banic utzil chque niqˈuiaj chic , man xuwi tä ru banic utzil chke uj chbil kib .

text: Whatsoever is sold in the shambles , that eat , asking no question for conscience sake :
text2: Ronojel ri cäqˈuiyix pa ri cˈayibal cuyaˈ quitijo , mitaˈ cˈu che jachin jun we yoˈm chquiwäch ri tiox rech man cˈo tä jun chiwe cunaˈ pa ranimaˈ chi mac riˈ ri tajin cubano .

text: For the earth is the Lord ' s , and the fulness thereof .
text2: Je riˈ , rumal chi ronojel ruwächulew , xukujeˈ ronojel ri cˈo chuwäch rech ri Kajaw Dios waˈ .

text: If any of them that believe not bid you to a feast , and ye be disposed to go ; whatsoever is set before you , eat , asking no question for conscience sake .
text2: We cˈu ne cˈo jun ri man cojonel taj cubij chiwe chi quixwiˈ rucˈ , quiwaj cˈut quixeˈc . Chitija ronojel ri cuya chiwäch , mitaˈ cˈu che we yoˈm chquiwäch ri tiox rech man cˈo tä jun chiwe cunaˈ pa ri ranimaˈ chi mac riˈ ri tajin cubano .

text: But if any man say unto you , This is offered in sacrifice unto idols , eat not for his sake that shewed it , and for conscience sake : for the earth is the Lord ' s , and the fulness thereof :
text2: We cˈu cˈo jachin jun cubij chiwe : “ Ri tiˈj riˈ yoˈm waˈ chquiwäch ri tiox , ” ― cächaˈ , mitijo , rech man quiban tä cˈäx che ri jun ri xbinic , xukujeˈ rech man cˈo tä jun chiwe cunaˈ pa ri ranimaˈ chi mac riˈ ri tajin cubano .

text: Conscience , I say , not thine own , but of the other : for why is my liberty judged of another man ' s conscience ?
text2: Are tajin quinbij ri cunaˈ jun winak chic pa ranimaˈ , man are tä cˈu ri canaˈ at pa ri awanimaˈ . Craj cˈu ne cˈo jun cubij : “ ¿ Jas che cubij jun winak chic chi cˈo ri man cuyaˈ taj quinbano xa rumal rech ri cunaˈ ri areˈ pa ranimaˈ ?

text: For if I by grace be a partaker , why am I evil spoken of for that for which I give thanks ?
text2: We quinmaltioxij na che ri Dios jachique ri quintijo , ¿ jas che cäbixic chi tajin quinban cˈäx rumal rech ri quintijo ? ” ― cächa ne lo .

text: Whether therefore ye eat , or drink , or whatsoever ye do , do all to the glory of God .
text2: Je baˈ riˈ jachique ri quibano , we quixwiˈc , we cˈo jas quitijo , chibana ronojel waˈ chunimarisaxic u kˈij ri Dios .

text: Give none offence , neither to the Jews , nor to the Gentiles , nor to the church of God :
text2: Mibano chi quetzak niqˈuiaj chic , we ne e areˈ ri winak aj Israel , we ne e areˈ niqˈuiaj winak chic ri man e aj Israel taj , o e areˈ ri kachalal cojonelab che ri Dios .

text: Even as I please all men in all things , not seeking mine own profit , but the profit of many , that they may be saved .
text2: Ri in cˈut , quintij nu chukˈab rech utz quinilitaj cumal conojel pa ronojel ri quinbano . Man xak xuwi tä quintzucuj chi cäban utzil chwe in , xane ri u banic utzil chque conojel rech e qˈuia chque cäquirik na ru tobanic ri Dios .

text: Be ye followers of me , even as I also am of Christ .
text2: Chibana baˈ iwe ri quinban in pa ri nu cˈaslemal , jeˈ jas ri in quinban we ri cuban ri Cristo .

text: Now I praise you , brethren , that ye remember me in all things , and keep the ordinances , as I delivered them to you .
text2: Sibalaj quinquicot iwucˈ , kachalal , rumal chi amakˈel ronojel kˈij quinnaˈtaj chiwe , quitakej cˈu ri tijonic ri nu cˈutum can chiwäch .

text: But I would have you know , that the head of every man is Christ ; and the head of the woman is the man ; and the head of Christ is God .
text2: Cwaj cˈut quichˈobo chi ri Cristo are cˈamal u be ri achi jeˈ jas ri cuban ri ka jolom cˈo puwiˈ ri ka cuerpo . Ri achi cˈut are cˈamal u be ri ixok , jeˈ jas ri Dios are cˈamal u be ri Cristo .

text: Every man praying or prophesying , having his head covered , dishonoureth his head .
text2: We ri achi cuchˈuk ru jolom aretak cuban orar , o aretak cukˈalajisaj ri tzij ri yoˈm che rumal ri Dios , xa qˈuixbal riˈ che ri Cristo ri achi riˈ .

text: But every woman that prayeth or prophesieth with her head uncovered dishonoureth her head : for that is even all one as if she were shaven .
text2: Are cˈu we ri ixok man cuchˈuk tä ru jolom aretak cuban orar o aretak cukˈalajisaj ri tzij ri yoˈm che rumal ri Dios , xa qˈuixbal riˈ ri ixok riˈ che ri jun ri cätakan puwiˈ . Xak junam riˈ we ta cusocaj ru wiˈ .

text: For if the woman be not covered , let her also be shorn : but if it be a shame for a woman to be shorn or shaven , let her be covered .
text2: We ri ixok man cuchˈuk tä ru jolom , are utz na riˈ cukupij ru wiˈ . We cˈu qˈuixbal riˈ chi ri ixok cukupij ru wiˈ o cusocaj , are utz na cuchˈuk ru jolom .

text: For a man indeed ought not to cover his head , forasmuch as he is the image and glory of God : but the woman is the glory of the man .
text2: Are cˈu ri achi man utz tä riˈ we cuchˈuk ru jolom , rumal chi are u wächbal ri Dios xukujeˈ rumal ri areˈ cäkˈalajinic chi nim u kˈij ri Dios . Are cˈu rumal ri ixok cäkˈalajinic chi nim u kˈij ri achi .

text: For the man is not of the woman ; but the woman of the man .
text2: Aretak cˈut ri Dios xuban ri achi , man xresaj tä ri areˈ che ri ixok , xane are ri ixok xesax che ri achi .

text: Neither was the man created for the woman ; but the woman for the man .
text2: Ri ixok xbanic che rachiˈl ri achi , man are tä cˈu ri achi xbanic che rachiˈl ri ixok .

text: For this cause ought the woman to have power on her head because of the angels .
text2: Rumal cˈu quech ri ángeles , ri ixok rajwaxic cäcˈoji jun chˈukbal u jolom . Etal cˈu waˈ chi cˈo jun ri cätakan puwiˈ .

text: Nevertheless neither is the man without the woman , neither the woman without the man , in the Lord .
text2: Pa ri ka cˈaslemal uj , ri uj cojonelab che ri Cristo , ri achi man cˈo tä u banic we man cˈo tä ri ixok , xukujeˈ ri ixok man cˈo tä u banic we man cˈo tä ri achi .

text: For as the woman is of the man , even so is the man also by the woman ; but all things of god .
text2: Pune kas tzij chi ri ixok xesax che ri achi , xukujeˈ are kas tzij chi ri achi quil u wäch rumal ri ixok . Ronojel cˈut petinak waˈ rucˈ ri Dios .

text: Judge in yourselves : is it comely that a woman pray unto God uncovered ?
text2: Chichomaj baˈ ix we takal che ri ixok chi man cuchˈuk tä ru jolom aretak cuban orar cho ri Dios .

text: Doth not even nature itself teach you , that , if a man have long hair , it is a shame unto him ?
text2: Ketam cˈu waˈ pa ke wi chi qˈuixbal che ri achi we nimak ru wiˈ .

text: But if a woman have long hair , it is a glory to her : for her hair is given her for a covering .
text2: Are cˈu ri ixok sibalaj cäyiˈ u kˈij we nimak ru wiˈ , yoˈm cˈu ri nimak u wiˈ che ri areˈ rumal ri Dios che chˈukbal re ru jolom .

text: But if any man seem to be contentious , we have no such custom , neither the churches of God .
text2: We cˈu cˈo jachin jun craj cächˈojin chrij waˈ we tijonic riˈ , chretamaj chi ri uj , xukujeˈ ri kachalal cojonelab che ri Dios , man cˈo tä chi jun tijonic chic ri uj nakˈatal wi .

text: Now in this that I declare unto you I praise you not , that ye come together not for the better , but for the worse .
text2: Pa we wuj riˈ ri quintzˈibaj chi bi chiwe , man quinbij taj chi sibalaj utz i banom . Aretak cˈut quimulij iwib man are tä chubanic utzil chbil tak iwib , xane xa cˈäx quiriko .

text: For first of all , when ye come together in the church , I hear that there be divisions among you ; and I partly believe it .
text2: Ri nabe are waˈ : Xbix chwe chi aretak quimulij iwib che tak ri i kˈijilanic , xa quitasala tak iwib . Ri in cˈut quincoj ne lo jubikˈ chi kas tzij je waˈ quibano .

text: For there must be also heresies among you , that they which are approved may be made manifest among you .
text2: Kas cˈu tzij ne lo chi rajwaxic quitasala tak iwib pa tak mulaj rech quekˈalajinic jachin tak ri kas tzij e cojonelab .

text: When ye come together therefore into one place , this is not to eat the Lord ' s supper .
text2: Ri cäbantajic rumal ri tasow ib ri quibano , are laˈ chi aretak quimulij iwib che ri i wiˈm , man are tä chic ri wiˈm quibano ri xucˈut can ri Kajaw Jesús .

text: For in eating every one taketh before other his own supper : and one is hungry , and another is drunken .
text2: Rumal chi aretak quixwiˈc , chijujunal quixnabej chutijic ri i wa . Niqˈuiaj quecanaj can pa numic . Are cˈu ri niqˈuiaj chic cäquiya u wiˈ cˈä quekˈabar na pa ri wiˈm .

text: What ? have ye not houses to eat and to drink in ? or despise ye the church of God , and shame them that have not ? What shall I say to you ? shall I praise you in this ? I praise you not .
text2: ¿ A xa lo man cˈo tä iwachoch ri quixwiˈ wi ? Aretak jeˈ quiban waˈ , quiwetzelaj qui wäch ri kachalal cojonelab che ri Dios . Xa cˈu quiwesaj qui qˈuixbal ri man cˈo tä qui wa . ¿ Jas ta cˈu lo quichomaj chi quinbij na chiwe ? ¿ A utz lo riˈ xa quinya i kˈij rumal ri quibano ? ¡ Man utz taj !

text: For I have received of the Lord that which also I delivered unto you , That the Lord Jesus the same night in which he was betrayed took bread :
text2: Tzare cˈu ri Kajaw Jesús xyoˈw waˈ we tijonic chwe ri xinya in chiwe : Chi pa ri akˈab riˈ ri xjach can ri Kajaw Jesús , xucˈam ri caxlan wa .

text: And when he had given thanks , he brake it , and said , Take , eat : this is my body , which is broken for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: Aretak xmaltioxitaj rumal , xupiro , xuya cˈu chquiwäch . Te cˈu riˈ xubij : “ Chicˈama iwe , chitijaˈ . Jeˈ ta ne are nu cuerpo waˈ ri cäban na cˈäx che rech quirik utzil rumal . Amakˈel cˈut aretak quitijo chibana waˈ che naˈtabal we , ” ― xchaˈ .

text: After the same manner also he took the cup , when he had supped , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood : this do ye , as oft as ye drink it , in remembrance of me .
text2: Xukujeˈ aretak xquelej xucˈam ri vaso , xubij : “ We vaso riˈ are cˈutbal re ri cˈacˈ trato ri cäjiquibax na rumal ri nu quiqˈuel . Ronojel mul ri quitij ri cˈo chupam ri vaso , chibana waˈ che naˈtabal we , ” ― xcha ri Areˈ .

text: For as often as ye eat this bread , and drink this cup , ye do shew the Lord ' s death till he come .
text2: Je cˈu riˈ , ronojel mul ri quitij we caxlan wa riˈ , xukujeˈ ronojel mul ri quitij ri cˈo pa ri vaso , are ru cämical ri Kajaw Jesús tajin quitzijoj apanok cˈä cäpe na ri Areˈ jumul chic .

text: Wherefore whosoever shall eat this bread , and drink this cup of the Lord , unworthily , shall be guilty of the body and blood of the Lord .
text2: Je cˈu riˈ , apachin ri cutij ri caxlan wa , xukujeˈ cutij ri cˈo pa ri vaso , we man chˈajchˈoj tä ri ranimaˈ cho ri Dios , cuban ri äwas riˈ chrij ru cuerpo ri Kajaw Jesús , xukujeˈ chrij ru quiqˈuel .

text: But let a man examine himself , and so let him eat of that bread , and drink of that cup .
text2: Rumal riˈ chijujunal rajwaxic chiwila iwib jas i banom pa ri i cˈaslemal , xukujeˈ jas ri cˈo pa ri iwanimaˈ . Te cˈu riˈ cuyaˈ quitij ri caxlan wa , xukujeˈ ri cˈo pa ri vaso .

text: For he that eateth and drinketh unworthily , eateth and drinketh damnation to himself , not discerning the Lord ' s body .
text2: We cˈo jun cutij ri caxlan wa xukujeˈ ri cˈo pa ri vaso , man cuchomaj tä cˈu na chi are jeˈ ta ne ru cuerpo ri Kajaw Jesús ri cutijo , xukujeˈ jeˈ ta ne are u quiqˈuel cutijo , xa cutzucuj riˈ chi cäkˈat na tzij puwiˈ chi cäcˈäjisax na u wäch .

text: For this cause many are weak and sickly among you , and many sleep .
text2: Rumal riˈ e qˈuia ri yawabib chixol , e qˈuia cˈu ri man cˈo tä qui chukˈab , xukujeˈ e cˈo jujun ri ya xecämic .

text: For if we would judge ourselves , we should not be judged .
text2: We ta cˈu kas cäkachomaj na jas ri tajin cäkaˈno , mat cäkˈat na tzij riˈ pa ka wiˈ rumal ri Kajaw Dios .

text: But when we are judged , we are chastened of the Lord , that we should not be condemned with the world .
text2: Aretak cˈut cäkˈat tzij pa ka wiˈ rumal ri Kajaw Dios , cucˈäjisaj ka wäch riˈ rech man cäkˈat tä tzij pa ka wiˈ chi cäsachisax ka wäch junam cucˈ ri winak ajuwächulew .

text: Wherefore , my brethren , when ye come together to eat , tarry one for another .
text2: Rumal riˈ , kachalal , aretak quimulij iwib che ri wiˈm , chiweyej na iwib rech junam quixwiˈc .

text: And if any man hunger , let him eat at home ; that ye come not together unto condemnation . And the rest will I set in order when I come .
text2: We cˈo jun cänumic , utz cäwiˈ lok cho rachoch , rech man cäcˈäjisax tä i wäch rumal ri Dios rumal chi man utz tä ri quibano aretak quimulij iwib . Ri niqˈuiaj chic ri cwaj chi cäbanic , cˈä teˈ quinban u banic waˈ aretak quinopan iwucˈ .

text: Now concerning spiritual gifts , brethren , I would not have you ignorant .
text2: Kachalal , cˈo ri cwaj chi quiwetamaj chrij tak ri cuinem ri cusipaj ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu chke chkajujunal .

text: Ye know that ye were Gentiles , carried away unto these dumb idols , even as ye were led .
text2: Ri ix kas iwetam chi aretak mäjaˈ quixcojonic xak utz chiwe quixcˈam bi je waˈ je riˈ cumal tak ri tiox ri man quechˈaw taj ri xa e banom cumal winak .

text: Wherefore I give you to understand , that no man speaking by the Spirit of God calleth Jesus accursed : and that no man can say that Jesus is the Lord , but by the Holy Ghost .
text2: Rumal riˈ cwaj chi quiwetamaj chi man cˈo tä jun ri cuyaˈ cubij ri äwas u bixic chrij ri Jesús rumal ru chukˈab ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu rech ri Dios . Xukujeˈ man cˈo tä jun ri cuyaˈ cubij chi ri Jesús are ri Kajaw we ta mat rumal ru chukˈab ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu .

text: Now there are diversities of gifts , but the same Spirit .
text2: Cˈo jalajoj tak cuinem ri cusipaj ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu che jun winak , xa cˈu jun ri Espíritu ri cäyoˈwic .

text: And there are differences of administrations , but the same Lord .
text2: Cˈo jalajoj tak u wäch patäninic , xa cˈu jun ri Kajaw Jesús ri cäkapatänij .

text: And there are diversities of operations , but it is the same God which worketh all in all .
text2: Xukujeˈ cˈo jalajoj u wäch qui banic tak ri chac , xa cˈu jun ri Dios cˈolic . Tzare cˈu waˈ ri cäyoˈw qui noˈj ri winak chquijujunal chubanic waˈ we chac riˈ .

text: But the manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal .
text2: Ri Dios cuya chque ri cojonelab chquijujunal jas ri cäcˈutuwic chi cˈo ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu pa canimaˈ . Yoˈm cˈu waˈ chque rech conojel cäquirik utzil .

text: For to one is given by the Spirit the word of wisdom ; to another the word of knowledge by the same Spirit ;
text2: Rumal ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu jujun cojonelab sipam chque chi quechˈaw rucˈ noˈj , jujun chi cˈut sipam chque rumal ri Espíritu riˈ chi quechˈaw rucˈ nimalaj etambal .

text: To another faith by the same Spirit ; to another the gifts of healing by the same Spirit ;
text2: Jujun chic sipam chque rumal ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu chi sibalaj quecojon na , jujun chi cˈut sipam chque chi quecowinic che qui cunaxic ri yawabib .

text: To another the working of miracles ; to another prophecy ; to another discerning of spirits ; to another divers kinds of tongues ; to another the interpretation of tongues :
text2: Jujun chic sipam chque chi quecowinic cäcaˈn tak cajmabal , jujun chic sipam chque chi cäquikˈalajisaj tzij ri yoˈm chque rumal ri Dios . Jujun chi cˈut sipam chque chi quecowinic cäquichˈobo jachique ri Espíritu ri kas rech ri Dios , jachique cˈut ri man e areˈ taj . Niqˈuiaj chic sipam chque chi quecowinic quechˈaw pa jalajoj tak chˈabal , niqˈuiaj chi cˈut sipam chque chi quecowinic cäquikˈalajisaj ri cäbix pa ri juleˈ tak chˈabal riˈ .

text: But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit , dividing to every man severally as he will .
text2: Ronojel cˈu waˈ xa Jun cäbanowic , tzare ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu . Are cˈu ri Areˈ ri cäsipan chque ri cojonelab chquijujunal ri jalajoj tak cuinem xa jas ri craj cuya chque .

text: For as the body is one , and hath many members , and all the members of that one body , being many , are one body : so also is Christ .
text2: Ri Cristo are jeˈ jas jun cuerpo ri qˈuia ru tzˈakatil cˈolic . Pune cˈu qˈuia ru tzˈakatil cˈolic , cäquinucˈ xa jun cuerpo .

text: For by one Spirit are we all baptized into one body , whether we be Jews or Gentiles , whether we be bond or free ; and have been all made to drink into one Spirit .
text2: Konojel ri uj , we aj Israel , we man aj Israel taj , we cˈo ka patrón , we man cˈo tä ka patrón , aretak xban ka kasnaˈ xkanucˈ xa jun cuerpo rumal ri jun Espíritu . Konojel cˈut ka cˈamom ke che ri jun Espíritu riˈ .

text: For the body is not one member , but many .
text2: Ri ka cuerpo man xa tä jun u wäch , xane qˈuia ru tzˈakatil cˈolic .

text: If the foot shall say , Because I am not the hand , I am not of the body ; is it therefore not of the body ?
text2: We ta cäcowinic cächˈaw ri kakan cubij : “ Ri in man in rech tä ri cuerpo rumal chi man in kˈabaj taj , ” ― cächa ta ne . Man rucˈ tä riˈ mat rech ri cuerpo .

text: And if the ear shall say , Because I am not the eye , I am not of the body ; is it therefore not of the body ?
text2: We ta cäcowinic cächˈaw ri ka xiquin cubij : “ Ri in man in rech tä ri cuerpo rumal chi man in wakˈächaj taj , ” ― cächa ta ne . Man rucˈ tä riˈ mat rech ri cuerpo .

text: If the whole body were an eye , where were the hearing ? If the whole were hearing , where were the smelling ?
text2: We ta ronojel ri ka cuerpo are wakˈächaj , ¿ jas ta cäkaˈn riˈ rech cujtatabenic ? We ta ronojel ri ka cuerpo are xiquinaj , ¿ jas ta cäkaˈn riˈ rech cujsikonic ?

text: But now hath God set the members every one of them in the body , as it hath pleased him .
text2: Ri Dios cˈut u cojom ru tzˈakatil ri ka cuerpo jawijeˈ chiˈ ri xraj xucoj wi .

text: And if they were all one member , where were the body ?
text2: We ta ronojel ri ka cuerpo xa jun u wäch , ¿ jas ta lo ri ka banic riˈ ?

text: But now are they many members , yet but one body .
text2: Man xa tä cˈu jun u wäch ronojel ri ka cuerpo , xane qˈuia u tzˈakatil cˈolic . Pune je riˈ , xa cˈu jun ri ka cuerpo .

text: And the eye cannot say unto the hand , I have no need of thee : nor again the head to the feet , I have no need of you .
text2: We ta cäcowinic cächˈaw ri ka wakˈäch , man cuyaˈ taj cubij che ri ka kˈab : “ Man at rajwaxic tä chwe , ” ― cächa ne . Xukujeˈ ri ka jolom , we ta cäcowinic cächˈawic , man cuyaˈ taj cubij che ri kakan : “ Man ix rajwaxic tä chwe , ” ― cächa ta ne .

text: Nay , much more those members of the body , which seem to be more feeble , are necessary :
text2: Xane ru tzˈakatil ri ka cuerpo ri jeˈ ta ne chi sibalaj man cˈo tä qui chukˈab , e are waˈ ri sibalaj rajwaxic na chke .

text: And those members of the body , which we think to be less honourable , upon these we bestow more abundant honour ; and our uncomely parts have more abundant comeliness .
text2: Ru tzˈakatil ri ka cuerpo ri man kas tä nim quekil wi , are sibalaj utz cäkaˈn na che qui chajixic . Ru tzˈakatil ri ka cuerpo ri cäkilo chi man kas tä e jeˈlic , are sibalaj lokˈ na quekil wi pune quechˈukic .

text: For our comely parts have no need : but God hath tempered the body together , having given more abundant honour to that part which lacked :
text2: Are cˈu ru tzˈakatil ri ka cuerpo ri e jeˈlic , man rajwaxic taj quechˈukic . Ri Dios cˈut je waˈ xuban che ri ka cuerpo , rech ru tzˈakatil ri ka cuerpo ri man kas tä nim quekil wi , are nim na qui banic waˈ .

text: That there should be no schism in the body ; but that the members should have the same care one for another .
text2: Je riˈ xuban ri Dios chke rech man cutas tä rib ri ka cuerpo , xane ru tzˈakatil ri ka cuerpo quechacun junam che qui toˈic quib ri jun rucˈ ri jun chic .

text: And whether one member suffer , all the members suffer with it ; or one member be honoured , all the members rejoice with it .
text2: We jun u tzˈakatil ri ka cuerpo curik cˈäx , conojel cäquirik cˈäx junam rucˈ . We jun u tzˈakatil ri ka cuerpo nim quil wi , are jeˈ ta ne chi conojel quequicot rucˈ .

text: Now ye are the body of Christ , and members in particular .
text2: Ix cˈu riˈ i nucˈum ru cuerpo ri Cristo waral cho ruwächulew . Chijujunal ix , ix u tzˈakatil ru cuerpo ri Areˈ .

text: And God hath set some in the church , first apostles , secondarily prophets , thirdly teachers , after that miracles , then gifts of healings , helps , governments , diversities of tongues .
text2: Ri Dios cˈut u yoˈm quekleˈn jujun chque ri kachalal cojonelab . Ri nabe e areˈ ri apóstoles , ri u cab cˈut e areˈ ri cäquikˈalajisaj tzij ri yoˈm chque rumal ri Dios . Ri u rox e areˈ ri cäquiya tijonic , te cˈu riˈ ri winak ri cäcaˈn tak cajmabal , te cˈu riˈ ri quequicunaj yawabib , xukujeˈ ri kas quetoban chque niqˈuiaj chic , ri cˈamal tak be , xukujeˈ ri sipam chque chi quecowinic quechˈaw pa juleˈ tak chˈabal chic .

text: Are all apostles ? are all prophets ? are all teachers ? are all workers of miracles ?
text2: ¿ A conojel cˈut e apóstoles ? ¿ A conojel cäquikˈalajisaj tzij ri yoˈm chque rumal ri Dios ? ¿ A conojel cäquiya tijonic ? ¿ A conojel cäcaˈn tak cajmabal ?

text: Have all the gifts of healing ? do all speak with tongues ? do all interpret ?
text2: ¿ A conojel sipam chque ri cuinem chi quecunanic ? ¿ A conojel quechˈaw pa juleˈ tak chˈabal ? ¿ A conojel quecowin chukˈalajisaxic ru bim pa juleˈ tak chˈabal ? ¡ Man jeˈ tä riˈ !

text: But covet earnestly the best gifts : and yet shew I unto you a more excellent way .
text2: Chicojo baˈ i chukˈab che qui rikic ri cuinem ri queusipaj ri Dios ri kas e utz na . Cˈo cˈu ri quincˈut in chiwäch ri nim na u banic chuwäch ronojel .

text: Though I speak with the tongues of men and of angels , and have not charity , I am become as sounding brass , or a tinkling cymbal .
text2: We ta ri in quincowinic quinchˈaw pa ri jalajoj tak qui chˈabal ri winak cho ruwächulew , xukujeˈ pa ri qui chˈabal ri ángeles , te cˈu riˈ man queinwaj tä ri winak , in jeˈ jas jun tambor ri cätanlajic . In jeˈ jas jun campana ri xa cächˈarnajic .

text: And though I have the gift of prophecy , and understand all mysteries , and all knowledge ; and though I have all faith , so that I could remove mountains , and have not charity , I am nothing .
text2: We ta quinkˈalajisaj tzij ri yoˈm chwe rumal ri Dios , we ta wetam ronojel ri man etamtal tä cumal ri niqˈuiaj winak chic , xukujeˈ wetam ronojel u wäch noˈj , we ta cˈo nimalaj nu cojonic chi quincowinic queinslabisaj tak ri juyub , te cˈu riˈ man queinwaj tä ri winak , man kas cˈo tä nu banic riˈ .

text: And though I bestow all my goods to feed the poor , and though I give my body to be burned , and have not charity , it profiteth me nothing .
text2: We ta quinjach conojel ri jastak we chque ri mebaˈib , we ta xukujeˈ quinjach ri nu cuerpo rech cäporoxic xa rumal ri nu cojonic che ri Cristo , te cˈu riˈ man queinwaj tä ri winak , man kas cˈo tä u patän riˈ chwe .

text: Charity suffereth long , and is kind ; charity envieth not ; charity vaunteth not itself , is not puffed up ,
text2: Ri winak ri queraj niqˈuiaj winak chic , cuchajij paciencia , cächˈawic , man cˈäx tä cunaˈ chrij jun winak chic xa rumal ri jastak re , man cunaˈ tä rib chi nim u banic , man cuban tä cˈu nimal .

text: Doth not behave itself unseemly , seeketh not her own , is not easily provoked , thinketh no evil ;
text2: Man cuban tä riˈ ri man takal tä u banic , ri xa cuya cˈäx chque niqˈuiaj chic . Man cutzucuj tä xuwi ri utz che ri areˈ , man xak tä rucˈ jubikˈ cäyactaj royowal , man cucˈol tä cˈu pa ranimaˈ ri cˈäx ri cäban che .

text: Rejoiceth not in iniquity , but rejoiceth in the truth ;
text2: Man cäquicot tä riˈ aretak cäril ri etzelal cäbanic , xane are cäquicot riˈ rucˈ ru banic ri kas tzij .

text: Beareth all things , believeth all things , hopeth all things , endureth all things .
text2: Ronojel u wäch cˈäx cuchˈijo , cäcojon che ri Dios , cuˈl u cˈux chrij , cuchajij cˈu paciencia pa ronojel .

text: Charity never faileth : but whether there be prophecies , they shall fail ; whether there be tongues , they shall cease ; whether there be knowledge , it shall vanish away .
text2: Ri rutzil kanimaˈ chbil tak kib man cäqˈuis tä u wäch . Cäpe cˈu na ri kˈij aretak man cˈo tä chi jun cukˈalajisaj tzij ri cäyiˈ che rumal ri Dios , man cˈo tä chi jun cächˈaw pa juleˈ tak chˈabal chic , xukujeˈ ri etamanic xa cäqˈuis na u wäch waˈ .

text: For we know in part , and we prophesy in part .
text2: Ri ketam uj xa jubikˈ waˈ , xukujeˈ we cäkakˈalajisaj tzij ri cäyiˈ chke rumal ri Dios , xa jubikˈ waˈ cujcowin chukˈalajisaxic .

text: But when that which is perfect is come , then that which is in part shall be done away .
text2: Aretak cˈut cäpe ri kˈij ri cäketamaj na ronojel , ri jubikˈ ri ketam uj cäsach na u wäch waˈ .

text: When I was a child , I spake as a child , I understood as a child , I thought as a child : but when I became a man , I put away childish things .
text2: Ri in aretak in acˈal na , jeˈ xinchˈawic jas jun acˈal , jeˈ ri nu chomanic jas jun acˈal , jeˈ xukujeˈ nu noˈj are noˈj rech acˈal . Aretak cˈut in achi chic , xinya can riˈ ri cuban jun acˈal .

text: For now we see through a glass , darkly ; but then face to face : now I know in part ; but then shall I know even as also I am known .
text2: Je cˈu riˈ cämic riˈ jeˈ ta ne ri xak pa jun espejo tajin cujcaˈy wi , xak jubikˈ kˈalaj , man kˈalaj tä ronojel chkawäch . Cäpe cˈu na ri kˈij aretak kas cäkil na ronojel chi sak . Cämic riˈ xak jubikˈ wetam , cäpe cˈu na ri kˈij aretak kas quinwetamaj na ronojel jeˈ jas ri Dios retamam nu wäch in .

text: And now abideth faith , hope , charity , these three ; but the greatest of these is charity .
text2: Je baˈ riˈ ri ka cojonic , ri cuˈlbal ka cˈux , xukujeˈ ri rutzil kanimaˈ chbil tak kib man cˈo tä qui qˈuisic waˈ . Are cˈu ri nim na u banic chque we oxib riˈ , are ri rutzil kanimaˈ chbil tak kib .

text: Follow after charity , and desire spiritual gifts , but rather that ye may prophesy .
text2: Chicojo baˈ i chukˈab rech quiwaj iwib , xukujeˈ chirayij chi ri Dios queuya na ri cuinem chiwe ri queusipaj ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu . Are cˈu sibalaj utz na chi cäyaˈtaj chiwe chi quikˈalajisaj tzij ri yoˈm rumal ri Dios .

text: For he that speaketh in an unknown tongue speaketh not unto men , but unto God : for no man understandeth him ; howbeit in the spirit he speaketh mysteries .
text2: Ri winak ri cächˈaw pa juleˈ tak chˈabal chic , are rucˈ ri Dios ri cächˈaw wi , man cucˈ tä ri winak , rumal chi man cˈo tä jun cächˈobow ri cubij . Are cˈu ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu riˈ cäyoˈw ri tzij ri cubij , ri man etamtal tä cumal ri winak .

text: But he that prophesieth speaketh unto men to edification , and exhortation , and comfort .
text2: Are cˈu ri jun ri cukˈalajisaj tzij ri yoˈm che rumal ri Dios , cucˈ ri winak riˈ cächˈaw wi . Ri areˈ cuya u chukˈab ri qui cojonic , cuwalijisaj ri canimaˈ , cucuˈbisaj cˈu qui cˈux .

text: He that speaketh in an unknown tongue edifieth himself ; but he that prophesieth edifieth the church .
text2: Ri winak ri cächˈaw pa juleˈ tak chˈabal , xak u tuquiel riˈ cutoˈ rib pa ru cojonic . Are cˈu ri jun ri cukˈalajisaj tzij ri cäyiˈ che rumal ri Dios , are cuya u chukˈab ri qui cojonic ri kachalal cojonelab .

text: I would that ye all spake with tongues , but rather that ye prophesied : for greater is he that prophesieth than he that speaketh with tongues , except he interpret , that the church may receive edifying .
text2: Cwaj ta ne in chi iwonojel sipam chiwe chi quixcowinic quixchˈaw pa juleˈ tak chˈabal . Are cˈu sibalaj cwaj chi iwonojel quixcowinic quikˈalajisaj tzij ri cäyiˈ chiwe rumal ri Dios . Je riˈ , rumal chi are nim na u banic waˈ chuwäch ri cächˈaw jun pa juleˈ tak chˈabal . Are utz cˈu na riˈ we cˈo jun cäkˈalajisan pa ka chˈabal ri cubij pa juleˈ chˈabal rech cuya u chukˈab ri qui cojonic ri kachalal cojonelab .

text: Now , brethren , if I come unto you speaking with tongues , what shall I profit you , except I shall speak to you either by revelation , or by knowledge , or by prophesying , or by doctrine ?
text2: Rumal riˈ , kachalal , we quinopan in iwucˈ , te cˈu riˈ quixinchˈabej pa juleˈ tak chˈabal , ¿ a cˈo lo cupatänij riˈ chiwe ri quinbij ? Man cˈo tä riˈ we man quinbij tä chiwe ri cubij ri Dios , we man quinbij tä jun tzij chiwe ri rajwaxic quiwetamaj . We man quinkˈalajisaj tä chiwäch ri tzij ri yoˈm chwe rumal ri Dios , we man quinya jun tijonic chiwe , man cˈo tä cupatänij waˈ chiwe .

text: And even things without life giving sound , whether pipe or harp , except they give a distinction in the sounds , how shall it be known what is piped or harped ?
text2: Kesajmpeˈ ka noˈj chquij tak ri kˈojom ri man e cˈasal taj , we ne are ri suˈ , we ne are jun arpa . We man cˈo u beyal ri kˈojom ri quesax chupam , ¿ a cächˈobtaj lo riˈ jas u wäch bix ? ¡ Man cächˈobtaj tä riˈ !

text: For if the trumpet give an uncertain sound , who shall prepare himself to the battle ?
text2: Aretak cokˈsax ri trompeta che qui siqˈuixic ri winak che ri chˈoj , we man cˈo u beyal cäban che , ¿ a cˈo lo jun winak riˈ cuyac rib che ri chˈoj ? ¡ Man cˈo taj !

text: So likewise ye , except ye utter by the tongue words easy to be understood , how shall it be known what is spoken ? for ye shall speak into the air .
text2: Jeˈ cˈu cäcˈulmataj waˈ iwucˈ ix . We man quicoj ri iwakˈ che qui bixic tzij ri quechˈobtajic , ¿ a cächˈobtaj lo riˈ ri quibij ? ¡ Man cächˈobtaj taj ! Xane xak pa ri quiäkikˈ riˈ cäsach wi ri i tzij .

text: There are , it may be , so many kinds of voices in the world , and none of them is without signification .
text2: Cho ruwächulew , kas tzij qˈuia u wäch ri quechˈaw wi ri winak , chquijujunal cˈut cˈo ri quel cubij ri qui tzij .

text: Therefore if I know not the meaning of the voice , I shall be unto him that speaketh a barbarian , and he that speaketh shall be a barbarian unto me .
text2: We cˈu ri in man quinchˈob tä ru chˈabal jachin ri tajin cätzijon wucˈ , man junam tä ri ka tinimit riˈ rucˈ . Jun wi riˈ ru tinimit ri areˈ , xukujeˈ jun wi riˈ ri nu tinimit in .

text: Even so ye , forasmuch as ye are zealous of spiritual gifts , seek that ye may excel to the edifying of the church .
text2: Je cˈu riˈ we ri ix sibalaj quel i cˈux che tak ri cuinem ri queusipaj ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu , chicojo baˈ i chukˈab rech cäyaˈtaj chiwe ri cuinem ri cäquiya u chukˈab ri qui cojonic ri kachalal cojonelab .

text: Wherefore let him that speaketh in an unknown tongue pray that he may interpret .
text2: Rumal riˈ jachin ri cächˈaw pa juleˈ tak chˈabal chutaˈ che ri Dios chi cäyiˈ ri cuinem che ri areˈ chukˈalajisaxic ri quel cubij ri tzij .

text: For if I pray in an unknown tongue , my spirit prayeth , but my understanding is unfruitful .
text2: We ri in quinban orar pa juleˈ chˈabal , are ri wanimaˈ riˈ cächˈaw rucˈ ri Dios . Are cˈu ri tzij ri tajin quinbij man cuchˈob tä nu jolom .

text: What is it then ? I will pray with the spirit , and I will pray with the understanding also : I will sing with the spirit , and I will sing with the understanding also .
text2: ¿ Jas cˈu ri rajwaxic quinbano ? Rajwaxic quinban orar rucˈ ri wanimaˈ xukujeˈ quinban orar rucˈ ri nu chomabal . Rajwaxic quinbixon rucˈ ri wanimaˈ xukujeˈ quinbixon rucˈ ri nu chomabal .

text: Else when thou shalt bless with the spirit , how shall he that occupieth the room of the unlearned say Amen at thy giving of thanks , seeing he understandeth not what thou sayest ?
text2: We ri at tajin caya u kˈij ri Dios xak rucˈ ri awanimaˈ , ri jun chic ri man cˈo tä retam ri tajin cutatabej man cäcowin tä riˈ cuya maltioxinic junam awucˈ rumal chi man cuchˈob tä ri cabij .

text: For thou verily givest thanks well , but the other is not edified .
text2: Pune ta ne kas utz tajin caban chuyaˈic ri maltioxinic , are ru cojonic ri jun chic man curik tä chukˈab .

text: I thank my God , I speak with tongues more than ye all :
text2: Quinmaltioxij che ri Dios chi quincowin na quinchˈaw pa juleˈ tak chˈabal chiwäch ix iwonojel .

text: Yet in the church I had rather speak five words with my understanding , that by my voice I might teach others also , than ten thousand words in an unknown tongue .
text2: Are cˈu chquiwäch ri kachalal cojonelab , are utz na chwe quinbij quieb oxib tzij ri cächˈobtajic rech qui tijoxic niqˈuiaj chic , chuwäch ri quinbij lajuj mil tzij pa jun chˈabal ri man cächˈobtaj taj .

text: Brethren , be not children in understanding : howbeit in malice be ye children , but in understanding be men .
text2: Kachalal , mixchomanic jeˈ jas ri quechoman ri acˈalab ri man cˈo tä quetam . Are cˈu chibana iwe jas ri cäcaˈn ri acˈalab ri man quetam taj cäcaˈn ri etzelal . Chixchoman cˈut jas ri riˈjab chubanic ri utzil .

text: In the law it is written , With men of other tongues and other lips will I speak unto this people ; and yet for all that will they not hear me , saith the Lord .
text2: Cubij cˈu pa ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Tzˈibtalic : “ Pa juleˈ tak chˈabal queinchˈabej na we winak riˈ , queincoj cˈu na winak ri man qui winakil taj che qui tzijobexic . Pune cˈu je riˈ man cäquita tä wi ri quinbij , cubij ri Kajaw Dios , ” ― cächaˈ .

text: Wherefore tongues are for a sign , not to them that believe , but to them that believe not : but prophesying serveth not for them that believe not , but for them which believe .
text2: Je cˈu riˈ ri chˈawem pa juleˈ tak chˈabal are jun cˈutbal chque ri man e cojonelab taj , man are tä riˈ chque ri cojonelab . Are cˈu ru kˈalajisaxic tzij ri yoˈm rumal ri Dios are jun cˈutbal waˈ chque ri cojonelab , man are tä riˈ chque ri man e cojonelab taj .

text: If therefore the whole church be come together into one place , and all speak with tongues , and there come in those that are unlearned , or unbelievers , will they not say that ye are mad ?
text2: Aretak qui mulim quib conojel ri kachalal cojonelab , we cˈu conojel tajin quechˈaw pa juleˈ tak chˈabal , queboc cˈu bi jujun ri man cˈo tä quetam , we ne jujun ri man e cojonelab taj , ¿ a mat cäquibij na ri e areˈ chi xa ix chˈujarinak chic ? ¡ Jeˈ , je riˈ !

text: But if all prophesy , and there come in one that believeth not , or one unlearned , he is convinced of all , he is judged of all :
text2: We cˈu conojel tajin cäquikˈalajisaj tzij ri yoˈm chque rumal ri Dios , aretak coc bi jun ri man cojonel taj , we ne jun ri man cˈo tä retam , cuchˈob rib riˈ chi ajmac , cunaˈ riˈ pa ranimaˈ ri mac ru banom aretak cutatabej ri tajin cäquibij conojel .

text: And thus are the secrets of his heart made manifest ; and so falling down on his face he will worship God , and report that God is in you of a truth .
text2: Je riˈ ri cˈo pa ranimaˈ ri man quetam tä niqˈuiaj winak chic quel na waˈ chi sak . Cäxuqui cˈu na , cäkˈijilan na che ri Dios , cubij cˈu na chi kas tzij cˈo ri Dios iwucˈ .

text: How is it then , brethren ? when ye come together , everyone of you hath a psalm , hath a doctrine , hath a tongue , hath a revelation , hath an interpretation . Let all things be done unto edifying .
text2: Je cˈu riˈ , kachalal , ri u beyal are je waˈ : Aretak quimulij iwib e cˈo jujun chiwe ri cäquibixoj salmos , niqˈuiaj chic cäquiya tijonic , e cˈo cˈu jujun cäquikˈalajisaj tzij ri yoˈm chque rumal ri Dios . Jujun chic cäquiya tzijonem pa juleˈ chˈabal , jujun chi cˈut cäquikˈalajisaj ri bim pa ri juleˈ chˈabal riˈ . Ronojel baˈ ri quibano , chibana waˈ chuyaˈic u chukˈab ri qui cojonic ri kachalal cojonelab .

text: If any man speak in an unknown tongue , let it be by two , or at the most by three , and that by course ; and let one interpret .
text2: Aretak quixchˈaw pa juleˈ tak chˈabal , rucˈ quieb quechˈawic , we ne oxib , xak xuwi riˈ . Rajwaxic cˈut chijujunal quixchˈawic , te cˈu riˈ rajwaxic chi jun chic cukˈalajisaj ri quibij .

text: But if there be no interpreter , let him keep silence in the church ; and let him speak to himself , and to God .
text2: We cˈu man cˈo tä jun ri cäcowin chukˈalajisaxic ri tzij ri quibij pa juleˈ tak chˈabal , cˈo jas mibij pa juleˈ tak chˈabal chquixol ri qui mulim quib , xane chijujunal chitzijobej iwib , xukujeˈ chixchˈaw rucˈ ri Dios .

text: Let the prophets speak two or three , and let the other judge .
text2: Je riˈ xukujeˈ ri cäquikˈalajisaj tzij ri yoˈm chque rumal ri Dios , xa quieb , we ne oxib quechˈawic , are cˈu ri niqˈuiaj chic quitatabej we utz ri cäbixic .

text: If any thing be revealed to another that sitteth by , let the first hold his peace .
text2: We cˈu cˈo jas ri cukˈalajisaj ri Dios chuwäch jun chic ri tˈuyulic , ri jun ri tajin cächˈawic rajwaxic riˈ cutänaba chˈawem .

text: For ye may all prophesy one by one , that all may learn , and all may be comforted .
text2: Je riˈ iwonojel ix ri quikˈalajisaj tzij ri yoˈm chiwe rumal ri Dios , quixcowinic quixchˈaw chijujunal rech conojel cˈo cäquetamaj xukujeˈ cäwalijisax ri canimaˈ .

text: And the spirits of the prophets are subject to the prophets .
text2: Ri cäquikˈalajisaj tzij ri yoˈm chque rumal ri Dios rajwaxic chi quenimanic , man cäcaˈn tä cˈu xa jas ri cäcaj ri e areˈ .

text: For God is not the author of confusion , but of peace , as in all churches of the saints .
text2: Je riˈ , rumal chi ri Dios are cuban ronojel pa ru cholajil , man xa tä cuban jechˈ che . Chitakej u banic jas ri cäcaˈn ri kachalal cojonelab pa conojel tak ri tinimit .

text: Let your women keep silence in the churches : for it is not permitted unto them to speak ; but they are commanded to be under obedience , as also saith the law .
text2: Ri ixokib , mechˈaw riˈ pa ri kˈijilanic aretak cäquimulij quib ri kachalal cojonelab rumal chi man yaˈtal tä chque . Rajwaxic quenimanic jas ri cätakan wi ru Pixab ri Dios .

text: And if they will learn any thing , let them ask their husbands at home : for it is a shame for women to speak in the church .
text2: Ri ixok we cˈo jas craj cäretamaj , chutaˈ waˈ che ri rachajil cho ja , rumal chi qˈuixbal waˈ chi cächˈaw jun ixok pa ri kˈijilanic .

text: What ? came the word of God out from you ? or came it unto you only ?
text2: Rajwaxic quichˈobo chi ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios man iwucˈ ix taj xchaptaj wi u tzijoxic , xukujeˈ man xak xuwi tä ri ix ri i cˈamom waˈ .

text: If any man think himself to be a prophet , or spiritual , let him acknowledge that the things that I write unto you are the commandments of the Lord .
text2: We cˈo jun cuchomaj chi cäcowinic cukˈalajisaj tzij ri yoˈm che rumal ri Dios , o cuchomaj chi are ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu ri cächˈaw rucˈ pa ranimaˈ , rajwaxic cuchˈobo chi ri tajin quintzˈibaj bic chiwe are u takanic ri Kajaw Jesús .

text: But if any man be ignorant , let him be ignorant .
text2: We cˈu man cuchˈob tä riˈ chi are u takanic ri Kajaw Jesús , utz laˈ we man cätatabex tä ri cubij ri areˈ .

text: Wherefore , brethren , covet to prophesy , and forbid not to speak with tongues .
text2: Je cˈu riˈ , kachalal , chicojo i chukˈab chukˈalajisaxic tzij ri yoˈm chiwe rumal ri Dios , meikˈatej cˈu ri quechˈaw pa juleˈ tak chˈabal chic .

text: Let all things be done decently and in order .
text2: Ronojel cˈu ri quibano , chibana waˈ pa cholajil , utz cˈu u banic quibano .

text: Moreover , brethren , I declare unto you the gospel which I preached unto you , which also ye have received , and wherein ye stand ;
text2: Kachalal , che we chanim are cwaj chi cänaˈtaj chiwe ri Utzalaj Tzij re ri Evangelio ri nu tzijom chiwe . Are cˈu waˈ ri tzij ri i cˈamom pa ri iwanimaˈ , ri kas i takem u banic .

text: By which also ye are saved , if ye keep in memory what I preached unto you , unless ye have believed in vain .
text2: Xukujeˈ rumal we Tzij riˈ ri ix i rikom ru tobanic ri Dios , we quitakej u banic ri nu tzijom chiwe , we man xak tä lokˈ ix cojoninak che rumal chi man kas tä xichˈobo .

text: For I delivered unto you first of all that which I also received , how that Christ died for our sins according to the scriptures ;
text2: Ri nu yoˈm chiwe are ri tijonic ri nim na u banic ri yoˈm chwe in . Xincˈut chiwäch chi ri Cristo xcämisax cho ri cruz rumal rech ri ka mac , jas ri cubij ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic .

text: And that he was buried , and that he rose again the third day according to the scriptures :
text2: Xinbij chi xmuktajic , te cˈu riˈ xcˈastaj churox kˈij chquixol ri cäminakib , jas ri xukujeˈ cubij ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic .

text: And that he was seen of Cephas , then of the twelve :
text2: Xucˈut cˈu rib chuwäch ri Pedro , te cˈu riˈ chquiwäch conojel ri cablajuj apóstoles .

text: After that , he was seen of above five hundred brethren at once ; of whom the greater part remain unto this present , but some are fallen asleep .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ xucˈut rib chquiwäch más na chquiwäch job cientos kachalal ri qui mulim quib . E qˈuia cˈu chque waˈ e cˈasal na cämic , pune niqˈuiaj chi cˈut e cäminak chic .

text: After that , he was seen of James ; then of all the apostles .
text2: Te cˈu riˈ xucˈut rib chuwäch ri Jacobo , te cˈu riˈ chquiwäch conojel ri apóstoles .

text: And last of all he was seen of me also , as of one born out of due time .
text2: Qˈuisbal re , aretak u cˈutum chi rib chquiwäch conojel ri niqˈuiaj chic , xucˈut rib chnuwäch in jeˈ ta ne in jun acˈal ri jun chi wi rilic nu wäch xbanic .

text: For I am the least of the apostles , that am not meet to be called an apostle , because I persecuted the church of God .
text2: Je riˈ , rumal chi ri in man nim tä nu banic chquixol ri apóstoles , man takal tä cˈut cäbix apóstol chwe rumal chi xinban cˈäx chque ri kachalal cojonelab rech ri Dios .

text: But by the grace of God I am what I am : and his grace which was bestowed upon me was not in vain ; but I laboured more abundantly than they all : yet not I , but the grace of God which was with me .
text2: Xa cˈu rumal ru tokˈob ri Dios pa nu wiˈ je waˈ nu banic . Man xak tä cˈu lokˈ u tokˈobisam nu wäch ri Dios , xane utz xelic rumal chi sibalaj in chacuninak na chquiwäch conojel . Man in tä cˈut nu tuquiel wi xinbanow ronojel waˈ , xane are ri Dios ru tokˈobisam nu wäch are cˈolinak wucˈ .

text: Therefore whether it were I or they , so we preach , and so ye believed .
text2: Man cˈo tä cˈu we in che , we rumal ri nu tzij in ix cojoninak , we cˈu ne rumal ri qui tzij ri niqˈuiaj chic . Are waˈ ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri cäkatzijoj , are cˈu waˈ ri ix cojoninak che .

text: Now if Christ be preached that he rose from the dead , how say some among you that there is no resurrection of the dead ?
text2: We cˈu ri cäkatzijoj are laˈ chi ri Cristo xcˈastaj chquixol ri cäminakib , ¿ jas che e cˈo jujun chiwe cäquibij chi man quecˈastaj tä chi ri cäminakib ?

text: But if there be no resurrection of the dead , then is Christ not risen :
text2: We cˈu man quecˈastaj ri cäminakib , mat baˈ xcˈastaj riˈ ri Cristo chquixol ri cäminakib .

text: And if Christ be not risen , then is our preaching vain , and your faith is also vain .
text2: We ta cˈu mat xcˈastaj ri Cristo chquixol ri cäminakib , mat baˈ cˈo u patän riˈ ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri cäkatzijoj , xukujeˈ mat cˈo u patän riˈ chi ix cojoninak che ri Cristo .

text: Yea , and we are found false witnesses of God ; because we have testified of God that he raised up Christ : whom he raised not up , if so be that the dead rise not .
text2: We ta kas tzij je riˈ , kˈalaj riˈ chi xak uj banal tak tzij chrij ri Dios , rumal chi ka bim chi ri Dios xucˈastajisaj ri Cristo chquixol ri cäminakib . We man kas tzij chi quecˈastaj na ri cäminakib , man kas tzij tä riˈ chi ri Dios xucˈastajisaj ri Cristo chquixol ri cäminakib .

text: For if the dead rise not , then is not Christ raised :
text2: We cˈu man quecˈastaj tä chi ri cäminakib , mat cˈu xcˈastaj riˈ ri Cristo chquixol ri cäminakib .

text: And if Christ be not raised , your faith is vain ; ye are yet in your sins .
text2: We ta cˈu mat xcˈastaj ri Cristo chquixol ri cäminakib , man cˈo tä u patän riˈ chi ix cojoninak . Cˈä ix sachinak riˈ rumal ri i mac .

text: Then they also which are fallen asleep in Christ are perished .
text2: We ta cˈu je riˈ , xukujeˈ quel cubij chi ri cojonelab che ri Cristo ri e cäminak chic , xukujeˈ xsach ta qui wäch riˈ .

text: If in this life only we have hope in Christ , we are of all men most miserable .
text2: We ta xak xuwi pa ri ka cˈaslemal cho ruwächulew cˈo u patän chi cäcuˈbi ka cˈux chrij ri Cristo , uj ta riˈ ri sibalaj bisobal ka wäch chquiwäch conojel ri winak .

text: But now is Christ risen from the dead , and become the firstfruits of them that slept .
text2: Cämic cˈut ketam chi kas tzij xcˈastaj ri Cristo chquixol ri cäminakib . Are cˈutbal re waˈ chi kas tzij quecˈastaj na ri cäminakib .

text: For since by man came death , by man came also the resurrection of the dead .
text2: Xa cˈu rumal jun winak xpe ri cämical pa qui wiˈ conojel ri winak , je riˈ xukujeˈ rumal jun winak quecˈastaj na conojel ri cäminakib .

text: For as in Adam all die , even so in Christ shall all be made alive .
text2: Rumal cˈu ri Adán conojel ri winak quecämic , je riˈ xukujeˈ conojel ri e rech ri Cristo cäquirik na ri kas cˈaslemal ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic .

text: But every man in his own order : Christ the firstfruits ; afterward they that are Christ ' s at his coming .
text2: Ronojel cˈu waˈ cäcˈulmataj na pa ru cholajil : Nabe xcˈastaj ri Cristo chquixol ri cäminakib . Te cˈu riˈ ri e rech ri Cristo quecˈastaj na aretak cäpetic .

text: Then cometh the end , when he shall have delivered up the kingdom to God , even the Father ; when he shall have put down all rule and all authority and power .
text2: Aretak bantajinak chi waˈ , cäpe na ru qˈuisbal ronojel . Are chiˈ ri Cristo cusach na qui wäch ri cˈo qui takanic , ri kˈatal tak tzij , xukujeˈ ri niqˈuiaj takanelab ajchicaj . Cujach cˈu na ronojel u wäch takanic pu kˈab ri Dios ka Tat .

text: For he must reign , till he hath put all enemies under his feet .
text2: Tzrajwaxic cˈut chi cätakan na ri Cristo , cˈä cäyiˈ na che rumal ri Dios chi cächˈacanic , kas cˈu cätakan pa qui wiˈ conojel ri cäcaˈn qui cˈulel che .

text: The last enemy that shall be destroyed is death .
text2: Ri qˈuisbal cˈulel ri cäsach na u wäch , are ri cämical .

text: For he hath put all things under his feet . But when he saith , all things are put under him , it is manifest that he is excepted , which did put all things under him .
text2: Ronojel cˈut u jachom ri Dios pu kˈab ri Cristo rech cätakan puwiˈ . Aretak cubij ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic chi ronojel jachom pu kˈab ri Cristo , kˈalaj chi man coc tä ri Dios pa cuenta rumal chi are ri Areˈ ri xjachow ronojel pu kˈab .

text: And when all things shall be subdued unto him , then shall the Son also himself be subject unto him that put all things under him , that God may be all in all .
text2: Aretak ronojel jachom chi pu kˈab ri Cristo rech cätakan puwiˈ , te cˈu riˈ ri Areˈ cˈut , ri u Cˈojol ri Dios , cujach na rib pu kˈab ru Tat ri xjachow ronojel pu kˈab ri Areˈ . Je riˈ ri Dios are ri Areˈ ri cätakan na puwiˈ ronojel ri cˈolic .

text: Else what shall they do which are baptized for the dead , if the dead rise not at all ? why are they then baptized for the dead ?
text2: We ta mat cˈo ri cˈastajibal chquixol ri cäminakib , ¿ jas che e cˈo jujun ri cäban qui kasnaˈ che qui qˈuexwäch ri ya e cäminak chic ? ¿ Jas che jeˈ cäcaˈn waˈ ? We man quecˈastaj tä chi ri cäminakib , ¿ jas u patän waˈ chi cäban qui kasnaˈ che qui qˈuexwäch ri cäminakib ? ¡ Man cˈo taj !

text: And why stand we in jeopardy every hour ?
text2: ¿ Jas cˈu che ri uj ronojel kˈij xa uj cˈo cho ronojel u wäch cˈäx ?

text: I protest by your rejoicing which I have in Christ Jesus our Lord , I die daily .
text2: Ri in ronojel kˈij xak in cˈo cho ri cämical . Are kas tzij ri quinbij , kachalal , pune je riˈ nim cˈu ri quicotemal ri quinnaˈ pa ri wanimaˈ iwumal ix rumal chi ix cojoninak chic che ri Kajaw Jesucristo .

text: If after the manner of men I have fought with beasts at Ephesus , what advantageth it me , if the dead rise not ? let us eat and drink ; for to morrow we die .
text2: Ri in je waˈ ri quinbij chi xintij nu chukˈab cucˈ ri winak aj Éfeso . Jeˈ ta ne cucˈ awaj aj pa tak juyub xinchˈojin wi . ¿ Jas cˈu xinchˈac che waˈ ? We kas tzij chi man quecˈastaj tä chi ri cäminakib , kas tzij ta riˈ ri cäquibij ri winak : “ Chujwok , katijaˈ cˈu jachique ri cäkaj rumal chi chuwek cujcämic , ” ― quecha riˈ .

text: Be not deceived : evil communications corrupt good manners .
text2: Cˈo jachin jun winak mixsubuwic . Jeˈ jas ri cubij ri tzij : “ Ri jun ri querachiˈlaj ri itzel tak winak , quetzeletaj na ri utzalaj u noˈj cumal , ” ― cächaˈ .

text: Awake to righteousness , and sin not ; for some have not the knowledge of God : I speak this to your shame .
text2: Chiqˈuexa ri i chomanic , chibana cˈu ri jicom pa ri i cˈaslemal , mixmacunic . E cˈo cˈu jujun chiwe ri man kas quetam tä u wäch ri Dios . Quinbij waˈ chiwe rech quixqˈuixic .

text: But some man will say , How are the dead raised up ? and with what body do they come ?
text2: We cˈu ne cˈo jun cutaˈ chke , cubij : “ ¿ Jas cäbantaj na rech ri cäminakib quecˈastajic ? ¿ Jas lo u banic riˈ ri qui cuerpo ? ” ― cächa riˈ .

text: Thou fool , that which thou sowest is not quickened , except it die :
text2: Jachin ri jeˈ cutaˈ waˈ xa con riˈ . Rumal chi aretak jun ijaˈ cätiquic , ri ijaˈ riˈ rajwaxic cäkˈay ri rij rech cätuxic , cäqˈuiy cˈu ri ticoˈn .

text: And that which thou sowest , thou sowest not that body that shall be , but bare grain , it may chance of wheat , or of some other grain :
text2: Ri cämuk can pa rulew man are tä ri ticoˈn ri qˈuiyinak chi lok , xane xa are ri ijaˈ , we are trico , o we ne are jun u wäch ijaˈ chic jas ri ixim .

text: But God giveth it a body as it hath pleased him , and to every seed his own body .
text2: Ri Dios cˈut cuban na che ri ijaˈ riˈ jas ru banic ri craj , chquijujunal cˈut queuqˈuiyisaj jas ri craj cuban chque .

text: All flesh is not the same flesh : but there is one kind of flesh of men , another flesh of beasts , another of fishes , and another of birds .
text2: Man conojel tä ri cuerpos xak junam qui wäch . Xane jun wi ri qui cuerpo ri winak , jun wi ri que ri awaj , jun wi ri que ri cär , xukujeˈ jun chi wi ri que ri chicop ajuwocaj .

text: There are also celestial bodies , and bodies terrestrial : but the glory of the celestial is one , and the glory of the terrestrial is another .
text2: Je riˈ xukujeˈ e cˈo cuerpos ajchicaj , e cˈo cˈu cuerpos ajuwächulew . Jun chi wi ri qui jeˈlal ri cuerpos ajchicaj , jun chi wi cˈut ri qui jeˈlal ri cuerpos ajuwächulew .

text: There is one glory of the sun , and another glory of the moon , and another glory of the stars : for one star differeth from another star in glory .
text2: Ru juluwem ri kˈij man junam tä rucˈ ru juluwem ri icˈ , xukujeˈ man junam tä rucˈ ri qui juluwem ri chˈimil . Chquixol ri chˈimil cˈut jalajoj wi ri qui juluwem ri jun rucˈ ri jun chic .

text: So also is the resurrection of the dead . It is sown in corruption ; it is raised in incorruption :
text2: Are cˈu je waˈ cäcˈulmataj na aretak quecˈastaj ri cäminakib . Cämuk can jun cuerpo ri cäkˈayic , cäcˈastaj cˈu na jun cuerpo ri man cäkˈay tä chic , ri man cäcäm taj .

text: It is sown in dishonour ; it is raised in glory : it is sown in weakness ; it is raised in power :
text2: Cämuk can jun cuerpo ri tzel quilitajic , cäcˈastaj cˈu na jun cuerpo ri jeˈlic , ri nim na u kˈij . Cämuk jun cuerpo ri man kas cˈo u chukˈab , cäcˈastaj cˈu na jun cuerpo ri kas cˈo u chukˈab .

text: It is sown a natural body ; it is raised a spiritual body . There is a natural body , and there is a spiritual body .
text2: Cämuk can jun cuerpo ajuwächulew , cäcˈastaj cˈu na jun cuerpo ajchicaj . We cˈo riˈ ri cuerpo ajuwächulew , xukujeˈ cˈo riˈ ri cuerpo ajchicaj .

text: And so it is written , The first man Adam was made a living soul ; the last Adam was made a quickening spirit .
text2: Jeˈ jas ri cubij ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic : “ Ri nabe achi , ri Adán , xban che chi are jun winak ri cˈo u cˈaslemal , ” ― cächaˈ . Are cˈu ri qˈuisbal Adán are ri Espíritu ri cuya cˈaslemal .

text: Howbeit that was not first which is spiritual , but that which is natural ; and afterward that which is spiritual .
text2: Man are tä cˈu xpe ri ajchicaj nabe , xane are nabe xpe ri ajuwächulew . Te cˈu riˈ xpe chi ri ajchicaj .

text: The first man is of the earth , earthy : the second man is the Lord from heaven .
text2: Ri nabe achi ri xban rucˈ ulew are jun ajuwächulew . Ri ucab achi , ri Kajaw Jesús , pa ri caj xpe wi .

text: As is the earthy , such are they also that are earthy : and as is the heavenly , such are they also that are heavenly .
text2: Ri cuerpos ajuwächulew , e are jeˈ jas ru cuerpo ri nabe winak ri xban rucˈ ulew . Are cˈu ri cuerpos ajchicaj e are jeˈ jas ru cuerpo ri Jun ri xpe chicaj .

text: And as we have borne the image of the earthy , we shall also bear the image of the heavenly .
text2: Ri ka banic cämic are jeˈ jas ri achi ri xban rucˈ ulew , copan cˈu na ri kˈij aretak jeˈ cujbantaj na jas ri Jun ri ajchicaj .

text: Now this I say , brethren , that flesh and blood cannot inherit the kingdom of God ; neither doth corruption inherit incorruption .
text2: Ri quel cubij ri tajin quinbij chiwe , kachalal , are laˈ chi uj rucˈ ri ka cuerpo riˈ ri xa re tiˈj , re bak man cuyaˈ taj cujopan chilaˈ chicaj jawijeˈ ri cätakan wi ri Dios pa ka wiˈ . Ri xa cäkˈayic man cuyaˈ taj chi mat cˈo u qˈuisic .

text: Behold , I shew you a mystery ; We shall not all sleep , but we shall all be changed ,
text2: Cwaj cˈut chi quiwetamaj ri man etamtal taj . Man konojel tä ri uj cujcäm na , konojel cˈut cäqˈuextaj na ri ka banic .

text: In a moment , in the twinkling of an eye , at the last trump : for the trumpet shall sound , and the dead shall be raised incorruptible , and we shall be changed .
text2: Xa cˈu pa jun rat cäcˈulmataj waˈ , jeˈ jas ri cuban jun winak cuyubaˈ u wakˈäch , aretak cäban ri qˈuisbal trompeta . Cätataj cˈu na chi cokˈsax ri trompeta . Te cˈu riˈ quecˈastaj na ri cäminakib rech man quecäm tä chic . Are cˈu ri uj , konojel cäqˈuextaj na ri ka banic .

text: For this corruptible must put on incorruption , and this mortal must put on immortality .
text2: Rajwaxic cˈut chi we ka cˈaslemal riˈ ri xa cäqˈuis u wäch , are cäqˈuextaj waˈ , cäcˈoji cˈu na ri ka cˈaslemal ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic . We ka cuerpo riˈ ri xa cäcämic cäqˈuextaj na waˈ rech cäcˈoji na jun ka cuerpo ri man cäcäm taj .

text: So when this corruptible shall have put on incorruption , and this mortal shall have put on immortality , then shall be brought to pass the saying that is written , Death is swallowed up in victory .
text2: Aretak we ka cˈaslemal riˈ ri xa cäqˈuis u wäch are qˈuextajinak chic , cäcˈoji cˈu ri ka cˈaslemal ri man cˈo tä u qˈuisic . Aretak we cuerpo riˈ ri xa cäcämic qˈuextajinak chic rech cäcˈoji na jun cuerpo ri man cäcäm taj , jeˈ quel na waˈ jas ri cubij ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios ri Tzˈibtalic : “ ¡ Sachinak u wäch ri cämical , tzˈakat cˈu ri chˈacanic ! ” ― cächaˈ .

text: O death , where is thy sting ? O grave , where is thy victory ?
text2: “ Ri at , cämical , ¡ man yaˈtal tä chic chawe ru banic cˈäx chke ! Cämical , cabij chi catcowinic catchˈacan pa ka wiˈ , man catchˈacan tä cˈu na , ” ― cächa riˈ .

text: The sting of death is sin ; and the strength of sin is the law .
text2: Ri cäyoˈw u chukˈab ri cämical chubanic cˈäx chke , tzare ri mac . Are cˈu ri cäyoˈw u chukˈab ri mac tzare ri ojer Pixab .

text: But thanks be to God , which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Maltiox cˈu che ri Dios chi cuya chke chi cujchˈacan na rumal ri Kajaw Jesucristo .

text: Therefore , my beloved brethren , be ye stedfast , unmoveable , always abounding in the work of the Lord , forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord .
text2: Rumal cˈu riˈ , lokˈalaj tak kachalal , chibana jicom che ri iwanimaˈ , chijiquiba cˈu i cˈux rech quitakej na u patänixic ri Kajaw Jesús amakˈel ronojel kˈij . Je riˈ , rumal chi ri ix iwetam chi ri chac ri quiban chupatänixic ri Kajaw Jesús , man xak tä lokˈ quiban waˈ .

text: Now concerning the collection for the saints , as I have given order to the churches of Galatia , even so do ye .
text2: Aretak quimulij ri puak che qui toˈic ri kachalal cojonelab , chibana ix jas ri xinbij chque ri kachalal cojonelab ri e cˈo pa tak ri tinimit re Galacia .

text: Upon the first day of the week let every one of you lay by him in store , as God hath prospered him , that there be no gatherings when I come .
text2: Pa tak ri nabe kˈij rech ronojel semana chijujunal rajwaxic quitas can jubikˈ che ri xichˈaco . Jampaˈ ri quixutoˈ wi ri Dios chutasic are riˈ quicˈol canok , rech aretak quinopan in iwucˈ man rajwaxic taj chi cˈo puak cämulic .

text: And when I come , whomsoever ye shall approve by your letters , them will I send to bring your liberality unto Jerusalem .
text2: Aretak in cˈo chi iwucˈ , queintak na bi pa Jerusalén jachin tak ri e chaˈtal chi iwumal . E are waˈ quecˈamow na bi ri puak ri i mulim rucˈ ri wuj ri quinya bi pa qui kˈab .

text: And if it be meet that I go also , they shall go with me .
text2: We cˈu cäkachomaj chi rajwaxic quineˈ in , quebeˈ na junam wucˈ .

text: Now I will come unto you , when I shall pass through Macedonia : for I do pass through Macedonia .
text2: Aretak quinopan iwucˈ chilaˈ pa Corinto , rajwaxic chi nabe quinocˈow pa Macedonia . Te cˈu riˈ quinopan iwucˈ ix .

text: And it may be that I will abide , yea , and winter with you , that ye may bring me on my journey whithersoever I go .
text2: We ne quincˈoji na quieb oxib icˈ iwucˈ , we cˈu ne quincˈoji na chilaˈ ronojel ri sakˈij . We je riˈ quinbano , ri ix quixcowinic quinitoˈ che ri nu binem jawijeˈ ri rajwaxic quineˈ chi wi na .

text: For I will not see you now by the way ; but I trust to tarry a while with you , if the Lord permit .
text2: Man cwaj tä cˈut chi xak jun rat quinwil i wäch , xane are cwaj quincˈoji na quieb oxib icˈ iwucˈ , we are waˈ craj ri Dios .

text: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost .
text2: Quincanaj cˈu na pa ri tinimit Éfeso cˈä curika na ri nimakˈij re Pentecostés .

text: For a great door and effectual is opened unto me , and there are many adversaries .
text2: Je riˈ quinban na rumal chi quinwilo chi yoˈm chwe chi cuyaˈ quintzijoj ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios rech qˈuia quecojon na , pune cˈu e qˈuia xukujeˈ ri cäcaˈn qui cˈulel chwe .

text: Now if Timotheus come , see that he may be with you without fear : for he worketh the work of the Lord , as I also do .
text2: We copan ri Timoteo iwucˈ , chitoˈ pa ronojel rech cäquicot na iwucˈ , man cˈo tä cˈu jas cubisoj . Jeˈ chibana waˈ che rumal chi ri areˈ cächacun chutzijoxic ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios jeˈ jas ri quinban in .

text: Let no man therefore despise him : but conduct him forth in peace , that he may come unto me : for I look for him with the brethren .
text2: Cˈo jun chiwe märetzelaj u wäch . Xane chitoˈ rech cäcowinic cutakej ru be rucˈ utzil , rech cätzelej chi na lok wucˈ rumal chi ri in weyeˈm ri areˈ junam cucˈ ri niqˈuiaj kachalal chic .

text: As touching our brother Apollos , I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren : but his will was not at all to come at this time ; but he will come when he shall have convenient time .
text2: Ri in sibalaj xinbochiˈj ri kachalal Apolos chi queˈ ri areˈ junam cucˈ ri niqˈuiaj kachalal che rilic jas i banom . Ri areˈ cˈut man xraj taj xeˈ cämic . Queˈ cˈu na ri areˈ aretak cäcowinic .

text: Watch ye , stand fast in the faith , quit you like men , be strong .
text2: Chcˈastaj baˈ ri i chomanic , chijiquiba ri iwanimaˈ rech quitakej ri cojonic chrij ri Cristo . Mixej cˈu iwib , xane chiwilaˈ chi cˈo i chukˈab .

text: Let all your things be done with charity .
text2: Ronojel ri quibano , chibana waˈ rumal chi queiwaj conojel .

text: I beseech you , brethren , ( ye know the house of Stephanas , that it is the firstfruits of Achaia , and that they have addicted themselves to the ministry of the saints , )
text2: Kachalal , ri ix iwetam chi ri rachalaxic ri Estéfanas , e areˈ ri nabe chque ri winak chilaˈ pa Acaya ri xecojon che ri Utzalaj Tzij re ri Evangelio . Ri e areˈ cˈut qui jachom quib che qui patänixic ri kachalal cojonelab .

text: That ye submit yourselves unto such , and to every one that helpeth with us , and laboureth .
text2: Cwaj cˈut chi ri ix queinimaj ri winak ri jeˈ cäcaˈno jas ri e areˈ , xukujeˈ chi queinimaj conojel ri quetobanic , ri quechacunic jas ri e areˈ .

text: I am glad of the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus : for that which was lacking on your part they have supplied .
text2: Quinquicotic rumal chi xepe ri Estéfanas , ri Fortunato , xukujeˈ ri Acaico . Ri e areˈ xcaˈno jachique ri man xixcowin tä ix chubanic rumal chi man ix cˈo tä waral .

text: For they have refreshed my spirit and yours : therefore acknowledge ye them that are such .
text2: Ri e areˈ xquiwalijisaj ri wanimaˈ in xukujeˈ ri iwanimaˈ ix . Nim baˈ cheiwila wi ri winak ri e jeˈ jas ri e areˈ .

text: The churches of Asia salute you . Aquila and Priscilla salute you much in the Lord , with the church that is in their house .
text2: Ri kachalal cojonelab ri e cˈo pa tak ri tinimit re Asia cäquiya bi rutzil i wäch . Ri Aquila rucˈ ri Priscila , xukujeˈ ri cojonelab ri cäquimulij quib cho cachoch , cäquiya bi nimalaj rutzil i wäch pa ru biˈ ri Kajaw Jesús .

text: All the brethren greet you . Greet ye one another with an holy kiss .
text2: Conojel ri kachalal cäquiya bi rutzil i wäch . Chiya baˈ rutzil i wäch ix chbil tak iwib . Chitzˈumaj iwib chuwäch ri Dios . Retal cˈu waˈ chi kas quiwaj iwib .

text: The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand .
text2: In waˈ , ri Pablo , quintzˈibaj bi waˈ we rutzil i wäch riˈ rucˈ ri nu kˈab in .

text: If any man love not the Lord Jesus Christ , let him be Anathema Maranatha .
text2: Jachin ri man lokˈ tä cäril wi ri Kajaw Jesucristo , chpe ta na cˈäx puwiˈ rumal ri Dios . ¡ Chpeta na la , Kajaw Jesús !

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you .
text2: Are ta baˈ ri Kajaw Jesucristo cätokˈobisan i wäch .

text: My love be with you all in Christ Jesus . Amen .
text2: Pa ru biˈ ri Kajaw Jesús , quintak bi u bixic chiwe chi quixwaj ix nimalaj iwonojel . Amén .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timothy our brother , unto the church of God which is at Corinth , with all the saints which are in all Achaia :
text2: In waˈ , ri Pablo , in apóstol . In jun chque ru takoˈn ri Jesucristo . Je waˈ nu banic rumal chi are u rayibal ri Dios . Ri in , wachiˈl ri kachalal Timoteo , quintzˈibaj bi waˈ we wuj riˈ chque ri kachalal cojonelab che ri Dios ri e cˈo pa ri tinimit Corinto , xukujeˈ chque conojel ri e rech ri Dios ri e cˈo pa tak ri tinimit re Acaya .

text: Grace be to you and peace from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Are ta baˈ ri Dios ka Tat xukujeˈ ri Kajaw Jesucristo cutokˈobisaj i wäch , cubano chi cuxlan ri iwanimaˈ .

text: Blessed be God , even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of mercies , and the God of all comfort ;
text2: Kaya baˈ u kˈij ri Dios ru Tat ri Kajaw Jesucristo . Ri Areˈ are ka Tat ri quel u cˈux chke , are ri ka Dios ri amakˈel cucuˈbisaj ka cˈux .

text: Who comforteth us in all our tribulation , that we may be able to comfort them which are in any trouble , by the comfort wherewith we ourselves are comforted of God .
text2: Ri Dios cucuˈbisaj ka cˈux chupam ronojel ri cˈäx ri cäkariko rech ri uj xukujeˈ cujcowinic cäkacuˈbisaj qui cˈux ri tajin cäquirik cˈäx . Jas ru cuˈbisaxic ka cˈux uj u banom ri Dios , jeˈ cäkaˈn uj chucuˈbisaxic qui cˈux ri e areˈ .

text: For as the sufferings of Christ abound in us , so our consolation also aboundeth by Christ .
text2: Jeˈ jas ri uj sibalaj tajin cäkarik ke ri cˈäx ri xurik ri Cristo , are cˈu rumal ri Cristo xukujeˈ sibalaj cäcuˈbisax na ka cˈux uj .

text: And whether we be afflicted , it is for your consolation and salvation , which is effectual in the enduring of the same sufferings which we also suffer : or whether we be comforted , it is for your consolation and salvation .
text2: Rumal riˈ we ri uj cäkarik cˈäx , cäkarik waˈ rech ri ix cäcuˈbisax i cˈux , xukujeˈ quirik ru tobanic ri Dios . We cˈu cäcuˈbisax ka cˈux rumal ri Dios , je cˈu riˈ cäban chke rech ri ix xukujeˈ cäcuˈbisax i cˈux , quirik cˈu na ru tobanic ri Dios . Je riˈ quixcowinic quichˈij ri cˈäxcˈol rucˈ paciencia junam jas ri cˈäxcˈol ri tajin cäkarik uj .

text: And our hope of you is stedfast , knowing , that as ye are partakers of the sufferings , so shall ye be also of the consolation .
text2: Sibalaj cuˈl ka cˈux chiwij rumal chi ketam chi jas ri ix tajin quirik iwe ri cˈäxcˈol , je riˈ xukujeˈ quirik na iwe ri cuˈlbal cˈux ri cuya ri Dios .

text: For we would not , brethren , have you ignorant of our trouble which came to us in Asia , that we were pressed out of measure , above strength , insomuch that we despaired even of life :
text2: Kachalal , cäkaj chi quiwetamaj chi sibalaj nim ri cˈäx ri xkarik pa Asia . Sibalaj nim cˈut ri cˈäx ri xkariko chi man cˈo tä chi ka chukˈab chuchˈijic waˈ . Ri uj man cuˈl tä chi ka cˈux chi cujcˈasiˈc , xane xkachomaj chi cujcäm wi na .

text: But we had the sentence of death in ourselves , that we should not trust in ourselves , but in God which raiseth the dead :
text2: Xkanaˈ chi jeˈ ta ne kˈatom tzij chkij chi cujcämisaxic . Xkacˈulmaj cˈu waˈ we cˈäx riˈ rech cäketamaj cäcuˈbi ka cˈux chrij ri Dios ri queucˈastajisaj ri cäminakib . Man cäcuˈbi tä cˈu ka cˈux chbil kib uj .

text: Who delivered us from so great a death , and doth deliver : in whom we trust that he will yet deliver us ;
text2: Ri Dios xujutoˈ chuwäch ri cˈäxalaj cämical , xukujeˈ cujutoˈ na . Ka cuˈbam ka cˈux chrij ri Areˈ chi cutakej na ka toˈic .

text: Ye also helping together by prayer for us , that for the gift bestowed upon us by the means of many persons thanks may be given by many on our behalf .
text2: Je waˈ cuban na chke we ri ix cujitoˈ rucˈ ri oración ri quiban pa ka wiˈ . We e qˈuia ri cäcaˈn orar pa ka wiˈ , e qˈuia riˈ xukujeˈ ri quemaltioxin na che ri Dios rumal ri nimak tak u tewchibal pa ka wiˈ .

text: For our rejoicing is this , the testimony of our conscience , that in simplicity and godly sincerity , not with fleshly wisdom , but by the grace of God , we have had our conversation in the world , and more abundantly to you - ward .
text2: Cˈo ri sibalaj cuya quicotemal chke . Are laˈ chi cäkanaˈ pa kanimaˈ chi chˈajchˈoj ri ka cˈaslemal xukujeˈ chi kas utz ri ka chomanic waral cho we uwächulew . Más cˈu na jeˈ ri ka banic waˈ chixol ix xukujeˈ . Man xak tä cˈu rucˈ ri ka noˈj uj jeˈ kaˈnom waˈ , xane are ri Dios uj u toˈm rucˈ ri nimalaj u tokˈob .

text: For we write none other things unto you , than what ye read or acknowledge ; and I trust ye shall acknowledge even to the end ;
text2: Ri ka tzˈibam bi chiwe chupam tak ri ka wuj are xak xuwi ri quixcowinic quisiqˈuij , ri quixcowinic quichˈobo . Cuˈl cˈu nu cˈux chi kas quixcowinic quichˈob na ronojel ri ka tzˈibam bic ,

text: As also ye have acknowledged us in part , that we are your rejoicing , even as ye also are ours in the day of the Lord Jesus .
text2: jeˈ jas ri i chˈobom jubikˈ cämic , rech pa ri kˈij ri cäpe ri Kajaw Jesús , ri ix quixcowinic quixquicot na kumal uj , jeˈ jas ri uj cujquicot na iwumal ix .

text: And in this confidence I was minded to come unto you before , that ye might have a second benefit ;
text2: Xcuˈbi cˈu nu cˈux chrij ronojel waˈ , je riˈ chi ri in nabe canok xinchomaj quinopan iwucˈ ix , rech je riˈ kas quixquicotic rumal chi camul quinopan iwucˈ .

text: And to pass by you into Macedonia , and to come again out of Macedonia unto you , and of you to be brought on my way toward Judaea .
text2: Xinchomaj chi quinopan iwucˈ aretak quineˈ pa Macedonia . Xinchomaj cˈut chi aretak quintzelej lok pa Macedonia quinopan chi na iwucˈ jumul chic . Je riˈ ri ix xixcowin ta xinutoˈ rech quintakej chi ri nu be , quineˈ pa Judea .

text: When I therefore was thus minded , did I use lightness ? or the things that I purpose , do I purpose according to the flesh , that with me there should be yea yea , and nay nay ?
text2: ¿ A xa lo man kas utz tä u chomaxic xinbano aretak xinchomaj u banic waˈ ? ¿ A quichomaj ix chi xak quinban ri nu chomanic jas ri cuban jun winak ajuwächulew ri cubij : “ Je riˈ quinbano , ” te cˈu riˈ cubij chic : “ Man jeˈ taj ” ? ― cächa riˈ .

text: But as God is true , our word toward you was not yea and nay .
text2: Ri Dios cˈut quilowic chi ri uj man cäkabij tä chiwe : “ Je riˈ cäkaˈno , ” te cˈu riˈ cäkabij chic : “ Man jeˈ taj , ” ― mujcha ne lo .

text: For the Son of God , Jesus Christ , who was preached among you by us , even by me and Silvanus and Timotheus , was not yea and nay , but in him was yea .
text2: Je riˈ , rumal rech ri Cristo Jesús ru Cˈojol ri Dios ri cäkatzijoj uj chiwe , ri in , ri Silvano xukujeˈ ri Timoteo . Ri Areˈ cˈut man cˈo tä jumul ri cubij : “ Jeˈ , ” te cˈu riˈ cubij chic : “ Man jeˈ taj , ” ― man cächa tä riˈ . Ru Lokˈ Pixab ri Dios rumal ri Cristo amakˈel ronojel kˈij are ri kas tzij .

text: For all the promises of God in him are yea , and in him Amen , unto the glory of God by us .
text2: Ronojel cˈu ri u bim ri Dios , jeˈ quel na rumal ri Cristo . Rumal riˈ aretak cäkaya u kˈij ri Dios cäkabij : “ ¡ Amén ! ” ― cujchaˈ , rumal ri Cristo Jesús .

text: Now he which stablisheth us with you in Christ , and hath anointed us , is God ;
text2: Tzare cˈu ri Dios ri xbanow chke chi ri ix xukujeˈ ri uj ka jiquibam ri kanimaˈ chrij ri Cristo , xukujeˈ xujutaso rech cäkajach kib pu kˈab ri Areˈ .

text: Who hath also sealed us , and given the earnest of the Spirit in our hearts .
text2: Xucoj ketal chi ri uj rech ri Areˈ . Ri Lokˈalaj Espíritu cˈut ri xuya pa kanimaˈ , are cˈutbal waˈ chi kas tzij cuya na ronojel ri xuchiˈj chke .

text: Moreover I call God for a record upon my soul , that to spare you I came not as yet unto Corinth .
